The green salad that came with it while looked simple, was great with the tasty dressing. Wanted the lava cake with ice cream but we were full. Next round we’d try. Yes, we will return

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: Good location on Level 2 of the Ascott Raffles Place building, this eatery changes name and operator every couple of years. Fortunately, NJ doesn’t stand for New Jersey (a gastronomic desert), but are are the initials of the current Indian operator. At night, it serves à la carte dinner, for which the Entertainer offer applies. At lunch, it’s a 3-course semi buffet attractively priced at $18++. You get what you pay for, as the food is a bit mediocre. Very polite service, though.

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: Booked this place due to them offering a mother's day menu. Arriving on the day itself, was suddenly told that mother's day menu was cancelled.

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: The salmon was crusty, spicy with Cajun and tender. I would recommend this dish and also use EATIGO for 50% o

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review:
food is pricey
even though with discount
portion small
eat not full
wait very long for food to be served
only dish nice is mushroom truffle soup

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: We heard the shocking news that the menu might be revamped but we strongly suggest keeping the taro waffle and siobak aglio on the menu! Two of your best dishes and the only reasons we keep coming back! Also special mention to Chef Cheryl for the amazing taro waffles - best in Singapore!

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: Nice food esp tom yum risotto and taro waffles. Will visit again ! Big portion and quiet environment

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: We celebrated two birthdays here and I called to ask for special arrangement for birthday "cakes". We ordered two desserts - lava cake and taro waffles. They dressed them up nicely with personalised message

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: The vermicille is ok. The tiger prawn pasta is a disaster, the pasta is too dry and bland. Tiger prawn was overcooked 😡 😡 😡. The dessert is just okay, nothing special for this meal. No excitement

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: Pasta is good and Taro waffle is good. Good place to meet as ambience is cozy. Good variety is interesting and tasty.

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: The food was nice. We both ordered Lobster Bisque for appetizer and Siobak Aglio for Maincourse. Siobak aglio was awesome, especially the pork belly. it was crispy on the outside and very tender and soft on the inside. 10/10. Lobster bisque is good too 9/1

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: The chef has tried his best to have an Asian influence on the food options. Some dishes didn't fulfil it's concept. The Tom Yum Risotto lacked the tom yum flavour, it was more like Risotto enveloped in saffron cream sauce. The prawn aglio was good as they used roasted chilli flakes than the usual red chill padi slices. A hint of lemongrass would have saved the dish. The lobster bisque has a bitter/ burnt chilli taste to it, but the Duck Ku Teh was good. Had a pleasant herbal taste to with sweetness from the red dates. Would have prefered if they used shredded duck breast meat than sliced duck meat with skin on it. The doritos chicken wings were good and we were pleased that they were de-boned. The house pour red wine was decent. They were very under staffed and got our dessert orders wrong. Furthermore, there was a family with muliple children seated diagonally opposite us. They were so noisy that we had to leave the premises to another location right after our dinner.

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: A BIG THUMBS UP for the wonderful service provided by the manager (Forgot his name). Service quality maintained 5 stars hotel expectation.Really appreciate that he made the whole dining experience very pleasant for us, he was attentive and helpfu

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: We went relatively early for dinner and was one of the first few in the restaurant. No issues with service as per what previous reviews have mentioned. In fact, the waiter/manager attending to us kindly went through recommendations on the menu. We had our starter course served to us by the Chef. I especially like the Hainanese Chicken Pasta and the molten lava cake with earl grey ice crea

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: Good customer service and ambience however food is only passable standard from starter to dessert. For same pricing can get better food

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: Asian Italian fusion... a good mix of variety and the descriptions make everything looks yummy. the food itself did not disappoint, we had to order everything to try everything because we simply can't decide. enjoyed the experience but seems a little short on manpower which makes service a little slow

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: Food is good, Hainanese chicken pasta is surprisingly yummy! Sio Bak pasta is value for money with many pieces of sio bak.

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: Its really frustrating that a restaurant like Froth tries to charge fine dining prices and yet cannot afford to serve tap water to its customers. If you like fusion food, its ok. But the poor hospitality and slow service will stop me from going back again.

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: Prompted to rate this restaurant and still remember how bad this restaurant was. Service was especially bad. Won’t ever get conned to going here again

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: It was pleasant not too crowded. Easy for business discussion. Reasonable pricing. Various choices on the menu. Would recommend it for others.

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: Froth had served up a collection of pretty looking dishes during our visit for dinner. However, there were some hits and miss

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: It was my first time to Froth@Ascott Raffles. The ambience was rich for a dinner setting. Further to that, the waitresses and chef were very helpful and efficient. To the chef, could I just let you know that your menu is unique; rich in flavors, but perhaps a little less salt in the future? Thanks so much! (:

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: I like the convenient location of the place. The restaurant is also very nicely done up and has a warm homely and cosy feel. The mix of food and cakes are special and unique, only available at this one and only place.

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: Pricey for lunch And selection of food was limited. Food wise a little bland. I had chicken rice pasta and it just chicken on top of pasta.

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: Was there with my colleagues for a lunch. Interesting and delicious fusion dishes. The portions are small, but perfect for the price offered and the CBD locati

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: Business lunch with an interesting fusion menu. Choices were unique. We tried the Sambal stingray burger and the Kungpo steak kimpap.

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: Cafe in Ascott itself that is pleasant and strategically located near Raffles Place MR

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: Located in cbd, the location was convenient. The restaurant looks posh. Service was great!  The waiters were nice, ready to give recommendations and accede to our requests. The food was amazing! We will be back!

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: The food was good but portion small. Staff not very attentive to our table without food until we asked. Serving was super slow and ambience not conducive as it was quite noisy.

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: Good service. Good music. Food was okay. Ordered the doritos winglets which was nice but got too greasy after a while

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: Froth is located in the Ascott Hotel and offers food at the bar and in the restaurant. You definitely need to try the hamburgers. Especially the one with stingray. Very tasteful and a good bite. And the staff at the bar is very friendly and have nice beer promotions on week days.

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: The desserts were yummy! Ambience of the restaurant was good, not noisy. Suitable for everyone. Chili crab pasta was a hit!

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: Food was average. Truffle fri

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: good location, good food, good view, very good, will visit again for business., it is a good place for casual business meeting

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: Food - Froth has a really interesting range of fusion cuisine! Personally love their food quality and creativity with their recipes infusing local favourites. Would recommend the tom yum risotto, siobak aglio and their waffl

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: Food was average. Tuffle fries was great but the tomyum risotto that we ordered did not taste like tomyum at all. Prawn aglio olio was average. The highly anticipated waffles with taro was underwhelming as well. Waffles were not crispy enough and the batter was just a little too gooey. 1 for 1 uob deal was worth though.

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: After multiple bad experiences with the main courses, I have resolved to only coming to Froth for their excellent taro and french toast waffles. The waffles are worth the price. So good.

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: I've visited them twice in old location and 1st time in this new place. Well, for the price and the portion I really don't think the mains are worth it. The hainanese chicken pasta, seafood Tom yum risotto were interesting and taste alright. The five spice Wagyu burger-bun was crispy but the patty I would say good effort for creativity but the taste doesn't really goes well. Disappointed with the wafer selection, there used to be more options and taste better in the past. Overall, food is average.

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: My friends and I organized a farewell dinner for one of us and was really looking forward to a great dining experience in Froth. Afterall, it's located within the CBD and standards should not be far off as it's also one of business meals location

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: Food was great (ponzu cod and ngoh-hiang wagyu burger) but portions definitely were not worth the price point.

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: Meal of the sessi

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review:
Food was generally good.  I had the tomyum risotto while my friend tried the bourbon steak with truffle fries.  We also had the lobster bisque which we thought could be a bit more concentrated.

Service was a tad slow but bearable.

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: Appreciate the Ascot has recently upgraded the level 2 dining facility from the Royal Mail to Froth, but in the process they have also upgraded their price list. $28 for a beef burger seems punchy, but maybe that's just me. The food is good, service can be slow and clunky but still not a bad place to have an executive lunch with clients. Menu is a bit mixed betwee Local, Western and Italian food. Overall, it's OK but they are slightly over charging their Menu, and the subdued ambience was maybe proof of that.

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: The fusion of food is really good, I had the hainesse chicken pasta, chilli is hot but taste very fresh! Manage to get to sit at the brighter area as its a business lunch. Their taro waffles are good and strictly meant for taro lovers :) Service wise is ok.

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: Great place to catch up with friends after a day's work, food is good with presentation standards and also quite generous portions (considering we ordered items with seafood and foie gras and were also going for a UOB promo). Do note water is not complimentary. Staff are friendly and also give you enough space. A little hardsell on the desserts which did look amazing however we just weren't sure whether we could also finish that after a carb-heavy main.

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: Food was good, service was very prompt. servers explained the menu well.  Suitable for business lunch and friends lunch as well

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: The service was slow despite the café was not crowded and we have to repeat our orders numerous times. even to the extend of putting up our hands to confirm the orders

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: Good food, good presentation; overall a very pleasant experience! A good place to celebrate special occasions.

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: Restaurant is located at a very convenient location - Raffles. Disappointed because the food I wanted was not available but will definitely go back again. Staff was nice and atmosphere was good.

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: There was a family that dined at the same time with us, and their children were running around the restaurant at the top of their voices. The service staff did nothing to address this (could have offered to move us to another seat) until we raised it up to th

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: Wonderful place for fusion cuisine if you into fusion food. Love their dessert especially the taro waffles and it never fails me every time. It is a must try for that taro waffles. However, price kind of steep for their main course and other dishes.

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: Nice ambience and the food was good. Tried their Siobak Aglio and Classic Cheeseburger. The one-for-one mains with uob debit/credit card during this period was an additional bonus.

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: Pasta selection was good and tasted nice as well. Burger was slightly underwhelming. Nice happy hour beer promo.

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: The pasta was average only, ordered Siobak and crab pasta but is nothing really special. However, the wings was great and I loved it. Service was great too.

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: Love the taro waffles with earl grey ice cream! I miss the old menu though, please bring some of the old items back!

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: I love the fusion menu which surprises my taste buds! The ingredients used are fresh and of quality and at such affordable pricing for their 3 course set lunch its such a steal! Good service as well!

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: Tried booking on chope and there was only available slot for 8.30pm. Well, we decided to head over at 7pm afterall and wow, nobody. It was a quiet place. The dessert was totally my favourite earl grey ice cream and molten flowy chocolate lava cake. Spaghetti of chilli soft shell crab was not bad. I bit into juicy crab meat and crispy softshell. Wasn't too impressed by the pasta though. Kale salad was fragra

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: The squid ink lobster burger was fantastic. Five spice wagyu beef patty burger was nt as good. Truffle fries served with the burgers were very yummy. Attentive and polite staff.

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: Had the set lunch. There was a choice of two starters, tomato soup and rocket salad with tofu. I don't drink tomato soup and asked if I just want the tofu without rocket leaves, the waiter said no. I asked if can check with the Chef and his reply was "it is a set lunch, rocket leaves cannot be removed". Food was good so service could be improved and allow a little flexibility.

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: went for a Saturday lunch, there was only a few tables besides us. the chili crab pasta was flavorful and fresh, the salted caramel latte was unique and nice... the tom yam risotto was a unique fusion with relatively mild taste (which makes it milder in comparison to the chili crab pasta).

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: Had my valentine's day dinner here. Service is prompt and quick. Ambience is good. Had chilli crab pasta which was slightly spicy but it was a good combination, especially with the roe that makes each bite more crunchy. Pricing of food is a little pricey, but for the quality served, it's worth paying for.

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: Ambience is better now that theyre in ascott. Still enjoying their waffles very much. Give the taro flavour a try!

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: We were charged $3 for 1 litre of room temperature tap water. This was in addition to my main course being served before I finished the appetiser. Will not return if I can help it.

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: Came over to froth and enjoyed the food. Will recommend the siobak aglio and the spam and cheese eggs ben!

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: Suitable for couple or family or gathering. Food are affordable and dessert are best. Especially taro series.

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: Ambience was good, food and service were above average. Good place for quiet dates and family gatherings.

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: The food was good and the drinks are awesome. The Christmas drinks are so nice! I came here with my best friend and would definitely be bringing more friends and boss here!

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: Food variety selection could be wider. Staff werent v responsive although it wasnt crowded. Missed out on orders.

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: Nice ambience within CBD area. Easy to locate, alight at Raffles Mrt station, follow the path along Exit I.

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: I stayed in Ibis Bencoolen for 4 nights. Location is very handy close to everything and less than 10mins walk to MRT Bugis station. The provision of a smart phone which adds extra value. You can take it everywhere to make calls including IDD back to Sydney! You can also hotspot to your own mobile. However, this is not available in every room so you have to ask for it when you make the booking.

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: I was wrong in thinking this place would be conducive for catching up with friends. The place itself is nice but service was lacking and place was rather noisy - couldn't hear myself at times. Food was not particularly tasty except for a thai beef salad we ordered, and there were no options for no carb diners like me. Shucks. I used the Entertainer 1-4-1 main course so the bill was about $22 per pax for 5 of us - reasonable. Not sure if it warrants a re-visit though.

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: Great service, unfortunately food fell flat for us. There just wasn't enough taste. Add a little more salt? Gave a complimentary small shot of watermelon slush but can't provide free water. Seriously, what's so hard to provide free water? Honestly, I won't go back because maybe with a little water to quench the thirst, food might have tasted better. Oh well, there are lots of other choices available and they serve free water.

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: Food is not bad but very stingy in  providing plain ice water. Customer experience could have been better.

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: The restaurant's service standards can be improved - i.e. there was no one at the entrance when we arrived. Then the wait for the food was quite long and the starters arrived later than the main courses. However, the food was indeed very good and we enjoyed the ambience of the venue as well.

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: I had to rush back to the office after 2.5 hours for lunch. We waited for an hour just for the soup to arrive which was a shame as there was a thick skin on the surface meaning it had also been sitting under a lamp for too long. The pumpkin soup was very nice although I felt I needed to add some more seasonin

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: With my $30 chope voucher, I decided to head down to Froth to try their weekend brunch menu which was not applicable to the 1-for-1 promo on entertainer app. Had visited Froth when they were still at Big Hotel and I must admit their food is of quality and standard despite the steep pricing. Ordered the lup cheong rosti and basil chicken eggs benedicts for mains, as well as the mixed mushroom tempura as a side for sharing. The mixed mushroom tempura is a must try if you are a fan of mushrooms- a mix of enoki, portobello and shitake mushrooms all coated with a really crispy and well battered tempura exterior. A really addictive side that was polished off within no time among the both of us. The basil chicken eggs benedict was something different and special from the usual eggs benedict, with basil hollandaise over poached eggs and thai basil minced chicken instead of the usual ham/smoked salmon. The poached eggs were on point, with an explosive factor and the minced chicken were juicy and flavourful. However, more toast could have been given as all we got was just 3 tiny triangle shaped wedges that made up only half a slice of toast. The lup cheong rosti, served with scrambled eggs and salad was a disappointment with a some parts being charred. The lupcheong slices could have been more too. The only saving grace was the fluffy, smooth scrambled eggs! Great ambience, decent service (used to be better!). If only there wasn't additional charges to plain water though >< It used to be complimentary...

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: Came here for lunch today with a friend. I ordered the fois gras risotto. This was tiny and very oily. My friend had the spicy crab pasta which was bigger and better but still quite oily. Charging $5 for tap water without informing us was also a bit rude. Won't be back.

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: I made bookings via Chope. Very convenient and easy. When we arrive, we took the stairs up to the 2nd floor. The service staff was very friendly and showed us to our seat. We ordered the Mushroom Portobello Burger set and added the Bubur Cha-Cha Panna Cotta with Gula Melaka and dehydrated Sweet Potato. I was surprised that the Mushroom Portobello was such a big portion, come with truffle fries, which I could not finish. Set come with Thai chicken salad or leek potato soup. All at about S$25.00.

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: I went to Froth with my girl friend...& had the most amazing time. Staff were very friendly & proactive. they even gave us recommendations to try out mocktails...we were pleasantly surprised with the welcome drink. The red velvet waffle was amazing. loved it. Will definitely go back to this place again.

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: let me start with a positive - the quality of the food was actually very good. the service on the other hand was bordering on comical it was that bad. i should start by pointing out that there were more staff than guests tonight so being busy is not an excuse. i am actually staying a the hotel and the only reason i decide to have a business dinner here was that the person who checked me in told me it had been recently renovated and that i could simply put the bill on my room. perfect given i had just arrived, had a business dinner and didn't have a lot of time to ea

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: Went for red velvet waffles and had a lychee tea. All up to expectations. The earl grey ice cream was pretty fragrant too. Had a lovely afternoon view of the traffic at raffles place.

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: chowder was good though the egg was not really poached. the truffle fries that came with the burger were pretty salty. it was good otherwise. the charcoal bun with lobster chunks was good. but only had 2 pieces of lobster meat. whereas the wagyu burger tasted just like normal 5 spice meat in a mixed veg stall.

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: Food selection is good, and location is convenient as there aren't many such less pricey places in the vicinity.

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: We ordered the Chilli crab pasta and the Siobak Aglio. The crab was tasty and the Siobak was very crispy but a tad too bland. The noodles in the Siobak Aglio was really tasty as compared to the Chilli crab pasta. However, we did not order drink but they still serve it to us insisting that we did and just place it on the table even though we said we never order. Also, when I first waved for the waiter, all I got was a hand wave sign and then the waiter never came back. His expression was pretty unfriendly as well.

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: The place is decent for dining, everything is all good except the fact that the carbonara on that day wasn't flavourful.

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: Visited on a Fri evening for dinner. Ordered the duck kut teh soup, aburi lobster salad, sio bah aglio olio pasta and foie gras risotto. In terms of taste, all the dishes fell short of our expectations. The duck kut teh had a strange herby taste. The lobster salad was pedestrian with its sesame dressing. The risotto was bland as was the foie gras, although the foie gras was well fried. The sio bah's skin was much too hard though the pasta was edible. Disappointing. The last straw was when after they got our bill wrong the waiter simply told us to go to the counter to pay, and there wasn't even a staff at the cashier counter.

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: Can be very noisy because the ceiling is Low, staff service was very good and attentive. was welcomed by the reservation tag with my name!

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: Great ambience and food was amazing. Was really shocked at how good the doritos wings tasted. Dessert was definately better than expected. Will be back for more

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: Ordered different main courses from ala carte menu for lunch. Most were mediocre. Only the risotto was pretty good. Tap water was charged by the btl. A poor way to increase revenue. Restaurant should think of ways to promote sale of drinks instead. Considering the amount of variety in CBD, its really hard to make us come back a second time.

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: Nice twist to the usual eggs benedict, paired with char siew or basil chicken. Tastewise was not bad and the staff were also really friendly and helpful!

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: Nice and quiet ambience, maybe is located in CBD area and is on a weekend. Service is great, food is good.

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: I went to lunch with a client. My wait time to be served, getting our food to getting our check was a task each time. It appears they maybe understaffed. And in delivering the food they would have one of our dishes ready and not the others. So timing of delivery for all the guest at the same time literally doesn't exist you eat like in shifts. Will not be back there again for sure!

Name: Cali Ascott Raffles Place
Location: 2 Finlayson Green Ascott Singapore Raffles Place, Singapore 049247 Singapore
Review: The cafe used to be located at the basement of Big Hotel before relocated to its current location. It took over the space formerly occupied by The Royal Mail which served British cuisine. Gone was the former old school dining decoration. It was replaced with a simple decoration. During the F1 weekend, the restaurant was having a 1-for-1 promotion for its items on the me

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: Food is aesthetically appealing but average at best. Escargot starter was extremely salty. Service was completely indifferent for what otherwise looks like a nicely decorated cafe. Disappointing.

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: Terrible customer serv

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: Ordered the traditional high tea s

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: My friends and I came to try out the afternoon tea set menu. The food is quite good and drinks are also good. We will definitely try the painting class next time, looks so fun

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: Lychee tea was superb and was able to customise my dish for me. Great ambience and definitely a great place for both friends gathering and also couple time!

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: website indicated sms to reserve so I started sms for reservation a week ago but no respon

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: Went with my wife for dinner at this restaurant in Plaza Singapura. We ordered Truffle Carbonara, Boston Love Boat and Otah Fries. The carbonara is too wet and not creamy, could not taste the different cheese in it. The Boston seafood soup the bone was not removed from seafood and was in shock when ate the salmon.

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: Went for high tea as I’ve heard great reviews about them, and I sure wasn’t disappointed. The high tea set was reasonably priced and the desserts were very delectable.

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: Had dinner with a pot of tea and a main of beef with black rice, spinach , truffles, a sous vide egg. Beef slices are soft and tender. Divine!

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: We celebrated our friend’s dinner at arteastiq. The food was amazing and ambience was good. Staff were friendly too. Highly recommend!

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review:
Lovely ambience 
Comfortable and clean seating 
Good for a quiet evening for couples and families 
Good selection of desserts

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: Visited arteastiq with my family, it was worth it. The lychee tea is refreshing and the pasta is flavourful and tasty.  Would definitely come back again.

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: Nice food and ambience for 5 of us on a Saturday afternoon at plaza Singapura. We will check out other outlets again.

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review:
The food is great, very healthy & tasty.
We tried the local flavour sambal fish & dried laksa, We also ordered the tea,  soup, smoked salmon vietnamese rolls & chestnut pie for desert, all fantastic.

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review:
Love the ambience and decor. Most of all, comfortable couches and amazing selection of tea.

Great for afternoon tea, relax after shopping

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: Chill ambience, complex flavours, insta worthy place, portion is just nice & friendly staff. A bit pricey & long waiting time. Overall it’s a pleasant experience otherwise.

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: The fish dish and soba salad’s great! Good tea, ambience as well. You should try the oosmonthus tea!

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: Food is well prepared and nice ambience for a weekend dinner with love one. Prawn fettuccine and hot osmanthus oolong definitely my favourite!

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: great food and ambience. portions a lil small but the flavors were on point. especially loved the prawn paste squid:)

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: My first visit.  Nice food, great desserts and helpful staff.  Had the slice beef with truffle sauce, beef cooked to perfection.  Fish & chips is good too.  Like the sauce that comes with it.  Something special.

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: Love the ambience -u would forget you are in a shopping mall for a while.  Tried their cheese tofu, quite an unique experience,  I like it .

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: High tea for 2 at $48++ with 2 types of tea of choic

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: Excellent makan for dinner in a cosy setting in the heart of town!! We like the dinner selection N the good mix for dessert n tea!!

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: Amazing gem hidden inside Plaza Singapura! Thankyou to the wonderful staff for making it a nice experience for both my mothers and myself. Would be a return customer when I come back to Singapore. Friendly staff and atmosphere. The rose tea and mini cheesecake was to die for! Highly recommend the signature high tea :)

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: Come taste this awesome food and great service. Located at plaza sing it is not difficult to find this place @ all

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: Refreshing fusion bistro ! This addition to Plaza Singapore is a good lunch spot amidst shopping or in the evenings a nice date spot that doesn’t burn a hole in your pocket. Excellent tea menu and innovative food and cocktails

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: First visit with great dining experien

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: Interesting concept, love the ambience with the dried flower decoration! Food was awesome, taste as good as it look! 5 star!

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: The food served was tasty and delicious esp the dry laksa. Thumbs up! Worth coming again to try the tea selection.

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: A nice and cosy place to relax and enjoy tea time with friends and family. Family and friends love it too.

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: Great food with equally good presentation. Wonderful array of teas. For starters, would recommend the prawn bisque, pan seared foie gras with brie, scallop bruschetta and spicy escargot. For mains, we had the truffle carbonara, marcaroni beef and beef fettuccine which were delightful. Would recommend.

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: Good quality food! The salmon was grilled to perfection while the beef was tender and delicious! However the wait was a little longer than expected. Would be great if they can provide us with free water.

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: Nice overall ambience, cozy lights, tasty tea selections especially the lychee tea (personal fa

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: Walking into Arteastiq is like attending Mad Hatter’s Tea Party, without the madness, just the wonderful imagination of the people behind this amazing joint. Dinner here is such a soothing experience. The tea selection is extensive and food menu is a well balanced fusion of Local and Western elements. The attention to the decor can be seen replicated on the food and drinks presentation. This place is suitable for group/ family gathering as well as a quiet date night. Highly reccomended.

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: excellent pasta and a very vast variety of teas, some with ice cream on top (highly recommended). Will come back.

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: We always look forward to our Sunday lunch together at this cozy restaurant for our meals. I love the lychee tea and fusion dishes.

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: Had a great dinner at Arteastiq Bistro & Bar. The ambience here is fantastic with nice music. Highly recommended.

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: Had a great experience with my girl friends for lunch. Great tea and good food, love the presentation which makes the day better

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: The place has a nice ambience. Was not too noisy when I went for afternoon tea. The tea was delicious and the serving was generous :)

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: Good ambiance, nice surrounding with friendly service. Must give their lychee tea a try...you won’t regret

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: The set up of the area was so nice; it was warm and cozy, much like how a house would feel. Still it had a classy feel of a restaurant that makes you feel like you’re in private island cafe. The food was the best thing I ever tasted and so worth the price, I’ll be sure to recommend and obviously come back!!✨

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: Nice tea selection. Food is good, nice ambience, but the staff are not very attentive and does not know their restaurant well.

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: Very good food! Great ambience. Friendly staff. Would come back again. The carbonara was very delicious with the truffle. My girlfriend had salmon which was also good

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: Had truffle carbonara for dinner and it was good! Place has nice ambience as well, and would love to come back for tea in future!

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: Nice foods and lychee tea . Will be back again . Friendly staff . Definitely a ideal place for gathering

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: We ordered the truffle pasta and the beef fettuccine, both is great. Lychee tea is a must try as well, very refreshing. Overall nice food and ambience.

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: Restaurant deco and layout is very cosy and welcoming. Food was decent but the portion is really small.

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: Good environment, can enjoy our weekend at this place. Food and service also good, if u wan to plan to meet up ur friend or dating, u can consider this arteastiq! Highly recommended

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: My daughter and I wanted a mother daughter afternoon tea and settled on here. We made a reservation on their sms reservation number provided on their website. Deciding to go directly to the venue, we were informed that they hadn’t checked their sms and were full. There were empty tables and at least one that looked almost done but the staff told us it could be a 30-60 minute wait. I asked about the empty tables and was informed that they were reserved for 1:30pm (we were there at 1pm) and asked if we could take one of the reserved tables since it looked like one table was leaving. The staff, again unsympathetic, said they had no idea how long the wait would be. A minute later, the people at the table left and the staff shrugged her shoulder as if nothing happened. Disappointing.

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: The food menu is limited but you can see that there’s a lot of thought put into the presentation and execution of the food. There is a wide variety of drinks available too. It can be pricey but the discount we had made it worth it.

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: Ordered black rice with beef n my favourite lychee tea. 😋 Yummy! The rest ordered pasta n duck sandwich. Good too.

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: Nice place to chill n relax. Been to both plaza Singapura and Mandarin Gallery outlets. U can even do canvas painting here.

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: Great ambiance! Great food! Definitely one of the best places I have visited if u are a tea lover. Give it a try!

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: Amazing place.. real chill out with a touch of elegance.... great place to hang out with the gurls 👍🏻👍🏻

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: This is a new outlet located in Jewel Changi. As the restaurant’s name suggests, it has a very arty decor and attractive presentation of the dish

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: Had a great meal @arteastiq. Down to the lines, angles and hue that surrounds the food presentation, the fine taste of this simple arabiatta pasta graced by delectable crayfish is a satisfying treat both to eye and tummy.

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: The favourite stop for nearby Temasek execs to meet their contacts for coffee, as it is discrete and not crowded. Their cold lychee tea is delightful. The food is pricey - probably overpriced for the quality.

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: This is one of the many restaurants in Pl

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: Food was alright but service could be better. Highly recommend the truffle carbonara if pasta is ur choice.

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: Wonderful food and ambience. Food is very delicious and healthy. Lovely ambience and music. Recommend for family with kids

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: Pretty tea sets and a reasonably good menu. Lots of people seem to like the fish and chips. The fizzy earl grey tea is interesting and quite nice. Macaroni beef was quite average though.

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: The environment of this restaurant is very comfortable and the food that I had is tasty and the lychee tea is refreshing. Price is affordable for everyone.

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: Great ambience and awesome food, will definitely come again with family and friends. The teas are refreshing!

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: Great service!!! Food are nice, Cod fish and chips and Cajun Prawn Fettuccine are recommended. Great ambiance, nice place for gathering.

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: Had heard about the place from friends but it was a disappointment. Place is dirty with hairs all over the corners and sofa. Not best hygienic place to bring children. Food was just about average. In fact fried chicken seemed to be fried in stale oil. Wouldn’t recommend and would definitely not come here again.

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: Have frequent meet ups with my girlfriends and we love coming to this place for a casual catch-up. Easy ambience and lovely teas - light on the palate and wallet! Loving this place. Do try the Signature Treasury set for 2!

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: I really enjoyed the minute details and thoughts given to the presentation of the teas and food are quite delicious as well! Loved how the staff sang the birthday song with us as she brought the cake over for my frien

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: Good food and service. My Friend has rib eye steak while I had cod fish & chips. However menu items could be increased.

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: It is a good place to relax and catch up with friends. Food and tea is nice and definitely worth the price.

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: Nice food and comfy environment. Nice decoration with style. Nice and unique drink. Nice and well serving

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: I could eat more! We had the vongole, squid ink spaghetti and crab cakes - all were spectacular. Would come again!!!

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: Went there with friends to catch up after 1 long year. Nice and good ambience.  Good food and many of choices for food and drinks. Their sofa seats are fabulous for chit chat. Their salmon cuisine very tasty. I will go again and highly recommended.

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: Nice ambience, great place for get-together, we love their drinks and their chocolate truffle cake is superb rich 😊

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review:
located at a non crowded part of the mall, this place was a great find. loved the ambience, food and company too!
Try the fish and chips and / or beef fettuccine if you drop by.

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: Food is excellent as well as the tea! I love their lychee tea! My Husband and I really enjoy it! Their service is quite good as well, and the ambiance is good as we re sitting beside the glass window! Love it

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review:
Enjoyed our visit for dinner as usual. Would love to come back again next time! 
Love their boston love boat!

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: Good environment! Good service ! Awesome foods .Definitely will comeback for this superfoods meal!! Love it !! Good job!

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: @TheKuoKn

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: I all the food that were served here. Presentation is gorgeous, food is yummy couples with a good selection of teas. Atmosphere is cozy accompanied by a nice background music. If you have time, try your hands on and be a painter for just a few hours. Who knows, you may be the next Van Gogh or Picasso

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: I had a great meal with my ex-Mba classmates at this restaurant which served up good food with artistic delivery! However, I felt that the dishes were a little pricey given their simplicity. Good place for a catch up, warm ambience and comfortable furnishings!

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: The food and presentation is awesome, great place for gathering and/or birthday celebrations. Service staff are very friendly too.

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review:
Lycee tea - 3 lyrcee
Only.
High tea 2-5pm starts
At 1.30 must reservation sofa seat.
Chicken lasana unique. Overall food taste is good. Service attitude.

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: Lovely venue, wonderful variety of many menu items, lots of specialty teas. Second visit for me, first for my husband. Well be back.

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: Very good atmosphere when everytimes come in. Get to meet with my friend coming from msia for CNY holiday & passby plaza Singapore to dine in at arteastiq cafe here. Enjoy our high tea with best refreshing lychee ice tea and Thai tea lava cake With the special ice cream ( taste like alcohol) .

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: Service here is abysmal. They won't greet you when you call them, they won't answer when you ask for something and you can't get a smile out of them. The restaurant is filthy. The Sofa has all kind of stains and strands of hair on it. The cutlery is full of dents and don't look like they've been washed. The kitchen is unprofessional because you can hear them shouting, laughing and using inappropriate language, they're banging on things inside. In regards to the food, some of it was average but others were a complete fail. I couldn't be more disappointed and will definitely not be coming here again.

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review:
Had a good dinner of rib eye steak topped with foie gras. I also like the sweet potato fries. 😋
Ambience of restaurant was cosy and pleasant.

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: Fun to play with our pop rock tea. We also had the honey lavender, the biscuit served was not nice, but the tea was just fine.

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: First visit here, everything was really delicious. My Vongole was flavorful but was a little small. So I decided to order the COD FISH and CHIPS to complete my dinner. The fish that came was COD alright, pacific cod. The photos should help you understand the rest. Would have given five stars if the cod was excellent like the Vongole.

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review:
The food and ambient is pretty decent. The thai milk tea lava cake is unique but the ice cream melted when served.
Overall, it is a good dining experience.

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: Booked a dinner here to surprise my friend for her birthday, the ambience was good on a weekday night, minimal crowds, it was easy to get a table by the window (tables can be cramped for those seated near the entrance). The food was pretty nice, we had the salted egg pasta, "pulses of passion" crepes with gelato, squid ink pasta was average and the honey lavender tea was nice. Staff was also friendly and accommodating to my special request of lighting a candle for the crepe. Would not mind going back again :)

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: First time at this branch but do recall fondly of the tea at Arteastiq Mandarin Gallery. The Lychee tea tasted more bitter and the lychee and tea did not mix well together. Food was average and lukewarm when served.

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: We had a great time spending dinner here. Great ambience and great food. Definitely will be back soon.

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review:
Good food and nice ambience. Recommended and will come again in the future. Thanks all! 
Good for ladies too

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: Nice ambient with dried flowers my favourite. Love their lycee tea. Food wise not really worth the price, waffles n toast is hard..but would definetely come again for the tea and evironment.

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: Great high tea session at Dhoby Ghaut’s Arteastiq Bistro, overlooking bustling Orchard Road 😌 Good ambience!

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: Awesome atmosphere environment with great foods! Was randomly roaming around for nice food when this restaurant show up upon me...  My friend n I was attracted by it and decided to try it.  Thumbs up! Definitely will introduce to my friends.

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: It’s a really awesome place to hang out with colleagues amidst the Christmas festivity. Food quality’s good and serves relatively quickly despite the crowd. High tea has superb presentation and looks especially pretty on photos too~ I really love the ambiance here. Instagram-worthy place.

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: Had lunch at Arteastiq with my friends, enjoyed a chicken and waffles with a side of sweet potato fries and ended off my meal with a lemongrass tea. The tea was great and the presentation was beautiful !

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: Favorite place to chill with friends over a nice Lychee tea. Tried the chicken lasagne today and it was great too!

Name: Arteastiq Bistro & Bar
Location: 68 Orchard Road Plaza Singapura #03-70/72, Plaza Singapura, Singapore 238839 Singapore
Review: Went to this place to celebrate a friend’s birthd

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: The food and service is excellent! Highly recommended. The current lunch promotion of 5 dishes for S$25+ per adult and S$15+ is super and my kids love the food too! We have been back a number of times since!

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Went there on a sunny Saturday afternoon as I was craving for Indian cuisine. This is not my first time at Ras and I am amazed at how the food can be so consistent over the years (first visit was in 2015/2016). Service was exceptional as well and I definitely felt well serve

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: The place is located in the Heart of singapore i.e. Clarke Quay/Boat Quay. This is the Party Hub or the go to Night life where people of all ages gather for a Stroll and Enjoying. The Menu is a Good mix of VEG and NON-VEG. It also has drinks on the menu for those who wish to hav

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: We have visited RAS ESSENCE OF INDIA on many of our trips to Singapo

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Stopped for an impromptu dinner last night at Ras. What a find! The food was top quality with excellent spicing and immaculate service. Nothing wS too much trouble. There is a wonderful vibe in the area with live music and a happy atmosphere . Clarke Quay is an must one a visit to Singapore and you must find the Ras restaurant if you appreciate highly skilled cooking from northern India.

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: We come with my frien

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Very good authentic indian food. Readonably priced but that is not the highlight of the place..the highlight of the place is its authentic taste.

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Very good food, well cooked meat, great breads and a memorable experience on a riverfront in Singapore amidst over priced, more often than not, average resturants. Worth a visit and caters to the Indian and international palate.

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: After three days in Singapore, and having tried Turkish and Singapore food, our craving for Indian food had climbed a few notches. That's when, by chance, we came across 'Ras, the Essence of India.' To begin with, the ambience of the neat and tidy restaurant by the riverside was great (we sat outdoors although there is provision to sit indoors too); the staff were courteous and served us with a smile. The preparations: Dal Makhani, Paneer and an assortment of breads (Pudina Paratha, Tandoori Roti and Butter Nan) tasted like any of the best restaurants in Delhi. We did not miss 'Home Food' at all. So delicious were the preparations that we reordered some breads and ate to our heart's content... nay, overate. Delicious indeed––the very thought of that dinner is mouth watering for us. Would strongly recommend to visitors to Singapore with a liking for Indian food. By choice we had ordered vegetarian food although non-vegetarian food was also available.

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: The food was really good and so does the customer service. Special thanks to raj who took the order and taken good care throughout the dinner. Recommended.

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Visited on 29 December, friendly greeting, arranged a table by the water after waiting just a few minutes. Food was good, the usual choice of dishes with service to match. Recommend for both couples and families.

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Totally disappointing experience. Seems like restuarant doesn't want to serve brown skin people. Went there with family. staff says give me 2 mins I will get that (a specific) table ready. The manager decides to give the table to a white skin group totally ignoring the commitment to us. What food quality and service can when expect from a Racist Restaurant! Go at your own risk

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Good Food And servi

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Very nice dinner on Christmas Eve with my wife. We booked in advance, table was ready on time and we were witted next to the river as I was asking for in the reservation. Waiter helped us very friendly with the order and gave some real good recommendations! Great service, great food, perfect evening! Thanks for all!

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Great option for tasty Indian food with friendly staff and good happy hour cocktails. The spice is just right and the location is very pleasant on the river watching the world go by.

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: 4 of us had dinner here, ordered naan, mutton, chicken, prawns and spinach with cheese, dont exactly remember the names of the dishes, but everything was delicious, also had a pint of beer! Highly recommended!

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: The location of the restaurant is really good, close to the water. The staff is really polite and the food is good. Enjoyed my time here and you can take a walk around Clarke Quay before/after the meal. Going to this place again during future travels.

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Good location on Clarke Quay. The food was terrible and very pricey. One naan was $7 Singapore dollars.....outrageous! Never again.

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Excellent experience and well situated by the river, good selection, very fresh and ample drinks choice. Staff make the place and they couldn’t be more efficient. Yes it doesn’t come cheap, but you know this before you order.

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: The food that we ordered was really nice...Sizzling Tandoori Prawns were fresh & very tasty...Butter chicken was really tasty...the location is right by the river. The restaurant manager Ajeesh was really courteous & helpf

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Best place to sit and have a nice view of river. Very polite staff and of helping. Have a good test of Indian food when you are in Singapore.

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: It is fantastic ambiance at river valley road, and it is great Indian food. During my singapore visit, I was not very keen to try the Indian food, but my other friends dragged me, and I confess the food was very delicious. We had a great time, great meal. A must try, if you are looking for Indian Food.

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Poor. Was expecting so much more from this restaurant given the other reviews. Not a happy customer I’m afrai

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: We just had dinner at RAS. The dishes tasted good although the lamb korma tasted sweet and more like beef rather than lamb. However, the prices were ridiculously expensive. Sadly, we will not go return again.

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: We had samosas and tandoori chicken as starters. Both were ok but not outstandi

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: The Mojito was good and the sitting area at the sea side is good. The white vine sangria? I can make it better. The fresh Tiger prawns(starter) with the Indian spice was really good.

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: We had dinner on 23/9/19. The restaurant was full however the staff made up a table for us and once a larger table became available they asked if we would like to move and we did. The atmosphere was lovely and we thoroughly enjoyed our food. The staff were attentive and helpful, especially our server Ajees

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: We went restore the on 28th September 19 I loved the food very tasty with good hospitality good vegetarian food we feel like we are India

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Went to the restaurant on my second trip to Singapore. Really loved the taste of the food. Kudos to the chef- The best Indian Food I tried so fa

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: A great place and delicious food for a relaxing dinner. We ate there twice over our 3 day stay! And we ate the same things!

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Situated by the riverside Clarke Quay, it offers authentic Indian cuisin

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: I went to this place after reading the reviews, but to my surprise there are other Indian restaurants which are much better than this place. Food is average, service is good.

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: We had a really lovely meal. After walking through Clarke quay and trying to find somewhere to eat we found this place. We all love curry and all agreed that it was one of the best curries we've had in a long time. I had the bhuna gosht which was so tasty and not too dry. My husband and 12yr old son had Chicken Chettinad which was spicy but you could really taste all of the flavours. Was quite expensive but happy to pay for something so good.

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Had Singapore Sling and light snacks after the River Cruise. Clarke Quay is lined with Restaurants and great place to spend time on the River. Ras is good with food and service was prompt and courteous

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: ...fancied a curry! RAS in Clarke Quay was our choice and we were not disappointed! Food excellent, service excellent, would highly recommend this restaurant.

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: The Clark quay is a hang out zone which is mushroomed with Pubs and restaurants which serves cuisines from the world. In such places it becomes difficult to manage vegetarian food. Being an Indian We feel safe when we get some Indian Restaurant. I Found “The RAS” a restaurant at least 15 years old in this locality. both the vegetarians and non vegetarians foods are delicious here. The service were really fast . The Hindi speaking staffs are very prompt and helpful to select any dish.

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: We liked the food so much that we ate here twice during our few days in Singapore. The food is fantastic - packed with flavour - the best Indian food I have ever had. And the service was excellent too (thank you Raj). Highly recommended.

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Great service by nice people. Told us clearly what was gluten free (about 4 curries) in perfect English. And the food was really nice.

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Ver good Indien food, freindly service and cold Tiger bear from Tab. Enjoy the view of the river in a friendly environment with excellent food. I enjoyed spicy Chicken Jalfreezy with safran rice..good spicy curry sauce with tender chicken and garlic nan bread...phantastic..enjoy it..please make a reservation for the evening because it´s always a very busy place

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
