Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: The Ras restaurant is located on Clarke Quay which is a very nice location, especially in the evening. It is very pleasant to sit by the water and enjoy very good Indian foo

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Really bad quality food , very expensive and poor customer service . Wanted to occupy table and as soon as you seat wanted to finish it faster. Wasted 124 dollars for dinner of 2 adults a child.

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Fast and friendly service in the vibrant Clarke quay distric

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: We had our 2nd visit to this amazing Indian. The food is delicious, staff are delightful and the venue is beautif

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: For the last few years, I’ve tended to frequent Curry Culture on Cuppage for my Indian cuisine - it’s never let me down. On this occasion, I was staying at Clarke Quay and wanted to eat in close proximity to the hotel. Ras is on the waterfront, and you certainly pay for the privilege because the prices are higher than other good quality Indian restaurants in Singapore. However, the quality didn’t disappoi

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Without simply repeating previous reviews, my thoughts are exactly the same. You are paying premium prices to sit over looking the river and enjoying the city ligh

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: It’s easy to bleed money in Singapore, especially in restaurants, and here’s no differen

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: You pay for the location and all the tourist

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Indian food is one that all 5 of us agree on. We’ve had a lot of Indian food and this one is a total 10 out of 10. Rajeesh was our waiter and was amazing at recommending dishes. We ate so much we can barely move. My kids all had butter chicken because they don’t eat spicey. My daughter had the vondaloo which was very awesome. We could not recommend this place more.

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: After a nice walk around Clarke Quay we came across this lovely restaurant on the waterfront. The staff, especially Raj, were very friendly and attentive, and assisted us in selecting some delicious courses. I recommend the cheese filled Naans, and the chicken biriyani, both of which arrived hot and quickly. Our simosas and chicken tikka entrees were also excelle

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Fabulous foo

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: What ever we ordered was tasty and well cooke

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Loved our visit. Enjoyed a lovely Sunday evening on the banks of the Singapore river in Clarke Quay. The restaurant offers a good selection of beer, wine, cocktails, mocktails, along with a big selection of vegetarian and non-vegetarian food.

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Great butter chicken, great dal makhani, great kebabs and great rotis / naa

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Would definitely recommend restaurant for quality, quantity and service. Meals were very generous and the waiters were attentive.

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Fabulous food, fresh ingredients and friendly service. Excellent location on the riverside. One of the best curry’s we have ever had !

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Right along the Singapore river at Clark Quay, nice outdoor spot. Service was excellent and the food was very good. Butter chicken really exceptional and the saffron rice and naan was very tasty. Strongly recommend!

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: The food was nice and the service very good but the cost extortionate for what is just a curry. I think you pay just for the venue which is lovely next to the river but I feel the costs aren’t warrented for this level of cuisine

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: I went there with my wife and kid to recall our last year family trip, just at the entry I realized that I left my mobile in taxi. I talked to the person attending he assured me not to worry. He took pain and called taxi customer care and followed with them to finally get the pho

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Any venue in Clarke Quay attracts a "tourist premium" and this venue is no exception. Food no better than home (Australia) but around 20% to 30% higher due to location. By all means celebrate a special occasion, but not the kind of venue that would attract "regulars".

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Visited alone and the majority of dishes seem to be aimed at couples or 2 portions and are priced accordin

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: It is the most delicious Indian restaurant in my life. The service is good and price is reasonable..

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: The food and service at Ras in Singapore was excellent. The lobster masala curry, the garlic naan, dhal makhani and the butter chicken curry were delicious and I would highly recomend this restaurant. They are also open till late! If you feel like eating fabulous Indian food in Singapore, visit Ras!

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Food was good. Service was good. Friendly staff. Prices are bit high but acceptable compared to rest of clark Quay.

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: I had Indian food allover Singapore but I think it is one of the best North indian food i had it here,loved it,its a sure visit,located at river front in Clarke qua

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Authentic North Indian food right at the heart of Singapore. Food was simply delicious and service was very qui

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Great service and even better food. Already went there twice in the last 5 days, the masala kulcha is to die for. Say hello to Mr.Senthil and Mr.Ajeesh who will greet you with a smile and will help you choose from the extensive menu.

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: I visited Ras twice in my recent stay in Singapore. The service was excellent particularly Mr Ajesh who remembered what I had in their restaurant in my earlier visit. The food was good. Would surely recommend this place

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: At least Dick Turpin work a mask! Charged over 30 dollars for a Bloody Mary and a small bottle of beer! Avoid drinks here, so expensive, didn’t eat here so unable to comment. I suppose that you are surcharged for the location, right on the river.

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Had a great time with family at Clarke Quay and had food at Ras. The food was very good and the service was excellent. Ajeesh and his staff was very friendly and accommodating. Recommend to everyone who wants to taste good Indian food.

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: I agree with other reviewers. The food is good, but very expensive. I was also overcharged: S$52 for drinks we did not order or receive. I have emailed the restauarant, but no response yet.

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Ras is a brilliant restaurant. As you walk through Clarke Quay the smells lure you in. The staff led by Ajeesh Nair are so friendly and accommodating. We wanted a table by the window and they did everything to find us one even though it was extremely busy. The food is gorgeous. Great flavours and so much to choose from. We will definitely be back before we leave!

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Had a beautifully fragrant prawn biryani here. The rice was soft, and the spicing was perfectly blended. Even though I'd asked for the hot version, it wasn't overpowering in the least. The portion was huge: five large shell-on-prawns and a mountain of rice. I couldn't finish it. The meal came with poppadums and a freshly made raita. Be aware though that a meal here isn't cheap: you're paying for the waterfront location and a chance to escape the incessant traffic. Adding on a couple of drinks and tax, it cost upwards of $65, worth it though as it was my last night in town.

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Amazing location and ambience, variety of dishes and cusines, authentic taste and above all very courteous and polite staff and also the Manager. All in all a wonderful dining experience. A place that is a must visit in Singapore for all the foodies!

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: After having cocktails in Altitude we had a craving for an Indian and headed down to Clarke Quay to Ras. This restaurant was excellent got us a very good table quick and it was looking over the rive

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: The location o fthe restaurant is excellent - by the river. The night views are dramatically different form the afternoon on

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Didn't realise until we got home and checked the visa statement that we were overcharged for our meal.

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: I'm quite sure this is a nice place considering the number of people who dine there. I'm not into spicy food though and could have ordered food that doesn't suit my palate. Hah

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: On my recent trip to Singapore we happened to visit Ras at Clarke Qu

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: We were looking for a place to eat at Clarke Quay and were invited in by Ajeesh. Our first reaction was maybe not but went in because of his pleasing personality and assurance of the quality of the food. There were some offers on the beer which we took and asked Ajeesh for recommendations on the starters. He recommended a mushroom starter for my vegetarian friends and a chicken malai kabab for us. He followed it up with some delicious prawn koliwada and succinctly juicy lamb chops. The food, the ambience and the staff at this place are all really amazing and together they ensure that you never leave without a smile.

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Stopped here for a curry by the Riverside with my wife. Great staff. Fantastic food. Good ambience. Highly recommended. Not sure what else to say really. Cheers guys!

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Stopped for a curry and were not disappointed, great chicken masala and dhal,big portions, nice naan and poppadoms with chopped tomatoes chillis onoins on t

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: My wife is a vegetarian and this is the first time I’ve been to a non-veggie restaurant and she’s had more choice than m

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: I understand Restaurants in Singapore are expensive and then especially at Clarke Quay but still RAS I found to be overly priced. The food quality was just ok. I ordered some bar b que, butter chicken, and a soup. I have eaten similar dishes at other restaurants much better than here and at much cheaper price even in Singapore. The space inside the restaurant was also too congested which didnt make the dining experience comfortable.

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: We like Indian food and this restaurant lived up to it's reputation for very good food, efficiently served by friendly waiters. They catered for gluten free options too. From the food point of views I'd go again, but (at least for us) it was a tad expensive- one shared starter, 2 main meals and bottle of wine for $180 (£100 sterling). Fortunately we kept to our own choice of wine and was not persuaded by the waiter then suggesting we change it for a bottle at twice the price. A bit unnecessary pressure really.

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: The food was really tasty, it was slightly hot though even if they say it’s mild. Good gluten free options. Good view but tables very close together. Service sometimes was excellent and sometimes average.

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Have dined here now a number of times over the years and our recent experience (twice during our 10 day stay) has shown that the quality of their food & service has been maintain

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: We visited this restaurant last week, and I have to report it was one of the best I have had, the mix of spices was very tasty inde

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: I love their Kebab Platter and Lamb Biryani. Both are a must try. Service is quite good even during busy hours on weekends. When the whether is not too warm, it is good to chose outdoor seating.

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Table for 2. We both ordered lamb dishes. Melt in the mouth ! Exceptional. We have eaten Indian god throughout the world and this was probably the best

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Had paneer kurchan, which was absolutely fantastic. Also a mango margarita, which seemed like an uncommon choice. Service seemed hit or miss - my server was thoroughly disinterested, but another waiter walking back and forth to the outdoor patio was very friendly (and more helpful than my server

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Nice view, nice people working there, nice food. A bit expensive but really delicious. One of the best restaurant in the street

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: The Indian food served here is excellent and at par with any of the good restaurants back in India. Whenever am in Singapore love to eat here

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: we had a butter chicken and a Vindaloo with saffron rice and a couple of side narn breads e

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: We were a group of 12 people. We ordered North Indian vegetables and breads. The food was decent enough and service was average.

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Service and food were excellent. Very happy with the wait staff, their recommendations and attention were first class. Even when dealing with a challenging table near us, nothing was too difficult. We’ll definitely be back!

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: The best India food I ever eat! I recommended that restaurant to all who want to taste real flavour of India, omnom :)

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Had our first taste of a Singapore Sling here and it was very nice as was the Cucumber Mojito - at buy one get one free! Chose restaurant as reviews seems ok and husband wanted Indian. Wouldn’t really rate the food, a lot spicier than we normally have and no options to choose preferred heat, taste also a lot different to what we are used to and double the price too

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Wanted Indian food and found this plac

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: This is the only Indian restaurant in Clarke Quay. We dined at RAS on multiple occasions during our stay at Novotel and were pleasantly surprised by the overall quality of food and service. Kudos to manager Ajeesh and his team for their excellent service despite the usual rush most of the time. Must try butter chicken, shahi panner and lachha parantha!

Name: RAS  The Essence of India
Location: Block 3D River Valley Road #01-05A Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: As expected in a tourist hot spot, the food was average and the price high. Was close to our hotel so made the mistake of going here one night when we didn’t want to venture too far. It’s perfectly fine if you want ok food and to be ripped off at bill time but I wouldn’t go back here, we really didn’t like the dishes we chose.

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: My husband and I hail from Karnataka. So basically this is home. Always smiling faces, clean food and spic and span kitchen. Fast service, quality food. Please visit.

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: Stopped in last night - hadn't been there recent

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: Excellent service by every staff. Special thanks to Chiru for serving. Great job and continue to strive!

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: The Masala Dosai and Vadai I like so much served Quickly service excellent and friendly the whole experience was good we will visit again 👨‍👩‍👧‍👦

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: Very tasty preparations which are clearly a class above the other South India restaurants in Singapore. Authentic Karnataka dishes like Masala Dosa, Neer Dosa, Sagu Masala, Akki Roti, etc can only be had he

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: We had dinner here based on Trip Advisor reviews. We ordered the Rava Idly, Uddina Vada, Bisibele Bhath, Masala Dosa and a Mango Lassi. All great, but we really enjoyed the Dosa! Great service. The restaurant is very clean and has some nice photos with English writing about the families background on them.the staff was very helpful...

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: Food here is decent but little expensive for a South Indian, not a fine dining restaurant. They are no where closer to the authentic food that they serve at Bangalore in India. MTR is well known for their masala dosa, bisibellebath and filter coffee but here it is pretty average. Waiters and cashiers are rude as they rush you to finish your food and leave quickly. It’s a place where you can eat once in a while, not a place to go frequently.

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: Its my first time at this restaurant. The place is clean, food is good. I tried the masala dosa and its really good.the food was really amazing The service was fast as well.

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: The food is very good but the cashiers are rude. Sometimes I feel as though I am having the food for free. We need to place the order in hurry. They do not even allow us to take a breather after finishing our food. My family was waiting for me at the table, keeping a watch on my bag, while I had gone to wash my hands. The cashier checked with my family if they have completed the meal, in a tone signaling my family to vacate the place immediately. My friends have also experienced rude behavior by the cashier when they visited the restaurant. The waiters on the other hand are extremely polite and well mannered.

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: Love the food here. The best part is that the quality is consistently maintained and they seldom disappoint. Today we ordered BisiBele Bhath and Pudi Idly. Both tasted great with the right amount of spice

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: The food is very nice , though waiting time is long but it worth waiting for this. Very authentic cuisine.

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: Definitely the best place for vegetarian food. I loved the podi dhosa, Puri and filter coff

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: I have been to MTR from 1984 when there was only one main restaurant in Bangalore, India & no other branches. Had coffee in Silver cups those days. Open Kitchen. Separate waiting hall was there. I was amazed at their cleanliness for a kitchen, storage room, floor cleaning etc. The store room when i saw was full of fresh corianders, chillies all in clean plastic bags even puffed with air inside to allow not crush each other. Visited in 2019 & had lunch with same quality as befo

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: Recently, I visited this place and was glad to taste some delicious delicacies from Andhra Pradesh, one of the southern states of India. It truly is the right place for people who prefer vegetarian food or would like to try an authentic meal. I also loved the cleanliness and the precautionary measures taken during these COVID times. I felt very reassured.

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: This is my first hand experience in MTR Singapore where i can find the indian food. My favt. food was indian dishes. Food quality was outclass also they have excellent services..!

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: What a estatic,aromatic,hot,fresh wanting for more were every dish we tried here.best service as soon as you order it's on your table.very clean.. don't miss if you like south indian delicacy.thank you MTR.

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: We visited here 3 times during our 5 days in Singapore. Amazing dosa at a fantastic price. One of the culinary highlights of our time in Singapore.

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review:
We always love the MTR food😊
Hygiene, food quality, and hospitality is excellent. We specially like puri, Dosa and curd rice from this hotel

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: Delicious food. Great customer service. Keep up the good work. The perfect place for a happy meal. Highly recommend to all!

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: Authentic taste. Incredible cleanliness. Brilliant service. The best restaurant in Singapore. Way ahead in all aspects.

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: The food was fantastic. Lots of flavours and a bit of everything. Service was great. The food came very fast and the environment was lovely.

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: Today I went alone to try out the much renowned MTR restaurant in Singapor

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: Food is amazing, the best..very authentic. The staff os super friendly,Service was very good.We crave for MTR sometimes! 😊😊

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: This great little family run restaurant tops the list of Indian vegetarian places to eat in Singapore. Food was brilliant and I mean every dish we ordered. Quite possibly the best dosa I’ve ever had and if you are lucky enough to go, make sure you order the pudi masala dosa! Simple decor but neat and clean and the staff friendly and efficient. A must visit for locals and visitors to Singapore!

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: Very clean & hygienic atmosphere. The food is genuinely authentic test of Karnataka. Service is unbelivable, loved the food every time visited the place.

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: OVERHYPED. Well, like everyone else , after seeing review I went to this shop. I am calling it SHOP because thats what it is. The staff here will snatch your plates away while you are eating your food. While I was having my drink , the staff came twice in 2 minutes to ask if I completed even when he can see that I am still sipping it .Angry on this , I asked him to call his manager . To my surprise , manager himself was saying “enough time given to you“ haha really. Now he will decide within what time I should have my food and drinks . Am I writing some exam paper or what ? Then I told I am going to write a really bad review on this . He is like “ you want to write review right , pls write it :

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: I'm not a vegetarian, I have friends who are vegetarian and I always have trouble finding places to bring them for meal

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: I have been wandering up and down Serangoon Road for the past two years and until today, I had never been north of City Square Mall. Today, I finally made it past that invisible barrier and found a gem of a restaurant. As soon as I saw the line of people to get into MTR Singapore, I knew it must be good. Once I took my first bite of button idlis sambar, I was hooked. The idlis were soft and fluffy. The sambar had the perfect balance of spicy, sour, and subtly sweet notes. I also ate a masala dosa that came with a small side of sambar and mint chutney. It was heavenly and I felt a bit sad as I finished the delicious potato and onion filling. I ended my lunch with a masala chai that was piping hot and had all the right spices. Now I have one year to get through the entire menu!

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: Around Little India there are quite a few restaurants serving south Indian staples like idlis, dosa with variations. MTR stands out as being consistently good. Try their daily specials. They have a few variations on the dosa which I don't think are available elsewhere. Good filter coffee. We also appreciate that they provide 'real' cutlery and plates. Drinks like 'lassi' do come in single use plastic however. We now try to avoid restaurants using disposable cutlery. MTR is closed on Mondays. Weekends are crowded, you have to wait. Service is quick, polite.

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review:
Not sure what the hype is about this restaurant!!
We queued for over 30min, the worst masala tosa, the Podi tosa was ok, the coffee was very ordinary. The Kasari was excellent. We have had delicious meals in other Indian restaurants in Singapore.

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review:
the most beautiful food, so clean and friendly, the staff is wonderful 
would recommend the dosa, its just like being in india

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: The food is great, the service is fast and very professional.Uddin Vada and Pudy Idly are really amazing.

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review:
Improvisation with Masala Rava Idili 

Excellent idea on the Masala Rava idili - always great service, clean, hygienic and friendly staff. Hope we can see more innovation on the menu

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: I have been a regular at MTR Singapore for years now. In my recent trip had the opportunity to order Kesari Chandrahara dessert. Perfect sweet to have it with coffee any time! Have a bite of it and two sips of coffee. Loved it!!!. cannot wait to have again. 5 star experience!

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review:
Super food
Wonderful hospitality 
Enjoyed Masala Rava Idli
Kesari Chandrahara... and Super veg Dosa.... now I feel fully satisfied of having authentic food

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: Authentic Pudi Masala Dosa, Masala Rava Idli, Kesari Chandrahara made with pure ingredients and tasted amazing. Had a great time at MTR with friends.

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review:
What a delight! 

I walked in without doing any research and am pleasantly surprised with the hygiene, cleanliness and good food here. 

Straight forward and a simple menu makes it authentic. 

The most noticeable thing is the quality of food preparation here. Keep it up!

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: Best dosas ever! Food is delicious, there are many options for Indian vegetarian.  Very clean, great service. Excellent value.

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review:
Authentic and very tasty food, superb service - friendly and fast. 
It’s my favourite idli/dosa place in Singapore. A must visit for newcomers to Singapore and once you’ve been there once you are hooked!

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: Amazing food and good service! My family loves going to MTR whenever we go to Little India. Khali Dose, Sambhar WaDa, Masala dose, Rawa Idly and lassi/coffee are my family’s favourites! Food here reminds me of the taste of my hometow

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: love the food and the beverages especially the tea and the coffee. Also all the food recommendations from the waiter is excellent, and very clean.

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: Had visited MTR several times with and without fami

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: A very surprisingly good food and service. It’s a small joint just opposite to Perumal temple. The food is very good, hygienic and very tasty. A must visit place for all vegetarians travelling to singapura. The place is little small though. But, the food tastes amazing. Also, it is very reasonably priced.

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: Before I came to this restaurant I truly did not care for Indian food-- MTR Singapore immediately changed my mind! We had no idea what to order, but the staff was extremely helpful in suggesting not only what we should get, but also how much food could feed 2 people. The food was so amazing that I am still talking about it nearly a year after my trip! Please make it a stop on your trip to Singapore!

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: This is the top choice if you want to have South Indian Food. I went here twice and both times there is a waiting line which moves quickly. They offer the seat after you place your order, so the waiting line directs you to the order counter which is pretty good as no time is wasted in finalizing the ite

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: Awesome authentic Indian food. Lots of choice, not spicy and very friendly accommodating staff. It’s busy though, may have to wait a while.

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review:
So good! Now I know why they call it one of the best Indian vegetarian in Singapore! My friend and I ordered their specialty dish.

The lines are pretty long at times, and most people eat here quickly and don't linger

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: Authentic mamma bengalooru in spore .....excellent taste ..exactly same as bengalooru....even the ‘thuppa’(ghee).....

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: Excellent delicious South Indian breakfast made with original ingredients. Warm staff and clean, hygienic premises make it an experience worth repeating . We did 3 days in a row!

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: We had lunch here on a recent trip to Singapore. The reviews had set our expectations high but they were not met. The food was ok, not particularly tasty and pretty unmemorable

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: Undoubtedly the no.1 Indian vegetarian restaurant in Singapore. Great Bangalore/Udupi food with highest level of quality and hygiene makes Namma MTR the NO.1 in Singapore.

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: This south-indian vegetarian restaurant is great, food is tasty, often crowded but quick turn around (we showed up at 9pm, perfect timing, got a table right away and food served super fast). We used to bring our guest from Europe to Din Tai Fung only as the typical local/Asia delicacies, now we have added MTR to our list, keep it up !!!

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: Love that I stumbled across this gem on my first day in Singapore! Delicious food, kind service, reasonable prices, credit cards accepted. I’ve been working my way through the menu and everything I’ve gotten so far has been fantastic. Always crowded, it’s that good. No wifi, closed Mondays.

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: I visited MTR multiple times during my stay in Singapore and I must say that the food was simply amazing. I did tell the owner that the taste is better than the one in Bangalore. My kids simply loved this place with the mouth watering dosas and didn't want to go anywhere. It is also clean and hygienic.

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: found this on google and decided to try it; we were very happy with the food. when we first showed up there was a crowd of folks waiting outside and we didn't really understand the system of how things work. basically you have to figure out what you want, order it, then they assign you a table. the gentleman working the ordering computer was very nice and gave us some great recommendations. honestly i can't remember the names of the dishes but we ordered several and they were all packed with great flavors. would definitely go again!!

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: MTR has great food and fast service. I have been there many times and the standard of food and service has been the same

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: Had our dinner during a short trip to Singapore. We had pudi dosa and pudi rava masala dosa. Both were very good and reasonably priced. I will visit this place again if I am in Singapore. Coffee was decent but dosa was much better.

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: We go here every time we come to Singapore. Doesn’t fail to impress every time. Food is awesome and true to its taste. Not a long waiting time. Delicious dishes. Perfect for all meals or just a mid day snac

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: MTR never disappoints you and the one in Singapore is mo exception. If you want authentic South Indian Vegetarian food, don't miss MTR in Singapore.

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: Superb masala dosa and idly. Would absolute recommend this restaurant for the quality of food, service was prompt and pleasant

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: we came here for the first time and we were astounded by the food quality. Would recommend for Jain people. 10/10 food

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: Excellent food at MTR. I would recommend the Pudi Masala Dosa. Definitely worth a visit (or several)!

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: First impression, very clean & hygienic atmosphere. The food is genuinely authentic test of Karnataka. loved the food every time visited the place

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: We were told that MTR had the best vegetarian Indian food in Singapore and this is tr

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: Love to share the difference im cultures & cuisines. Simply great in service despite being packed. Highly recommend this place.

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: Having been to India multiple times, was recommended to visit by an Indian friend. Absolutely fantastic, the onion masala dosa was so light, crispy and delicious I might come back tomorrow!

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: This is the absolute one, it’s the best Indian food I’ve ever eaten, and I’ve actually been to India.

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: Restaurant is spic and span, service is very polite and unobtrusive, very very balanced food , NO OIL in most , but offcourse some pan dishes its needed , filter coffee is probably the best. Very creative in blends of spices .. very very rare that you have everything 'So Perfect'. Keep the good work up guys. Excellent value for money .. Note: PLS do not compare this restaurant to any Singapore or Malaysia based South Indian Restaurant ! This is a unique concept and weathered through time. Replicating the same quality here would have been so difficul

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review:
The restaurant was clean and provided good service.
Food was tasty and we really enjoy the meal. But a little bit expensive for that portion of meal.

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: Friendly staff explained what to do to order. Food came quickly and although it became busy we weren't made to rush when finished. There are two menus; one has the pictures of the meals, the other has the prices and the daily specials. Order at the counter. If you don't know what you want, you can sit down first and look at the menu before you order.

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: No worries. Straight away go inside and order your food . Food is traditional but too tasty. Prices are absolutely perfect. No issues with cleanliness. 10/10

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: We always visit Saravana Bhawan for south indian food such as Dosas Sambhar Idli Vada. A friend recommended to try MTR and i am glad we did. We totally loved the hygienic clean place.. the yummiest fingerlicious lipsmacking fo

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: Excellent food. Excellent service. We enjoyed delicious dishes and more particularly Pody Masala Dosa. Very reasonable price and great hospitality.

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: Each time i go, i always order the different assortments of foods; the Masala Dose, uttappa, Chow Chow bath, Ragi Dose, idli vada ,Tea etc. Eat dish is seasoned with it's own spices and herbs which come out smelling savory and appetizing, unlike other places that use the same seasoning for all dish

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: MTR Restaurant was an extraordinary delight to all my senses! Pure pleasure eating there! The food was delicious! I hope to be here again and again for many years!

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: MTR is very conveniently located. If you want to have good authentic Karnataka cuisine, then this is the place to go. Bisibele bath is rich and delightful as are dosai varieties and the 'baths'. Mini tiffen is a good option for a meal. The place is crowded usually and waiting time can be 30-40 mins during peak hours. But the wait is worth it. The staff are courteous and helpful. The ordering process can be smoothened a bit since many customers decide their menus upon reaching the counter only and this takes up lot of time.

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: Staff at the counter was friendly and explained the contents of the menu on my first visit and provided recommendatio

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: My friends bought me here for dinner and the food is awesome! Must try the Tomato rice which is the special dish on wednesday. Everyday has a different special dish.

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: We had mini meal and the quantity is just right for a working lunch. Taste is authentic and superb, very much satisfying. Service is very good.

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: Recently we are visited the this restaurant and enjoyed the good south Indian food like idli dosa etc, and items are very tasty and service is as also excellent and we felt that we are in India

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: Excelent service andI would definitely recommend coming here AWESOME food. My favourite things to eat here are the Masala dosa and the mango lassi. Would definitely recommend coming here!

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: Best south Indian food in Singapore. Authentic food at extremely friendly prices. The food is always fresh and made from great ingredients.Exspecialy dosa variety is good crispy and spicy. Try their recommendations 👍they are really good.Good Environment and clean restaurant.

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: It was a pure piece of crap. I dont mind paying 7-8 dollars for a dosa. But the dosa should be good enough. Yes I get it is kannadiga style but still for the money that you charge have a good quantity. Extra charge for additional sambar and chutney doesnt make any sense. Waste of time and money.

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: Lively atmosphere, with an abundance of affordable, delicious food. We tried lots of things which were all good, but we particularly enjoyed the dosa and the savoury donut. The service was fabulous. we left very full and very happy.

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: We went yesterday for lunch to this restaurant. We had mini thali for our lunch.. Quality of the food was excellent. Very good service. Lot of tourist visit here. This restaurant is very convenient, Just outside the Farrer Park MRT station. For Indian tourist eating here is a like having a home food. Good value for money. We will definitely visit again.

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: Our first night in Singapore will forever be etched in our mind and taste buds! We found MTR on TripAdvisor and we stumbled upon Little India quarter - we sat in the restaurant section where the service was wonderful. We are visiting from Denmark and didn’t know what to try off the menu. The waiter was very helpful and helped us pick some great options (not too spicy!). The food was authentic and absolutely delicious. MTR was a great experience! We will be back!

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: Excellent service and food does not disappoint!!! Really happy to have chosen this option while walking in little India

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: The initial impression may not be inspiring but do not be put off the food and the service are exceptional. It may be simple but the MTR serves up some of the best south Indian vegetarian food in the area and at cheap prices. It was so good my wife and daughter demanded a re-match the following evening.

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: Very good quality Indian and vegetarian food for an even better price. Definitely a must-go if you are close to the Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple in Singapore.

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: Great place for a breakfast. I tried dosa as they were suggested by the manager, one spicy and one with coconut. Dishes are fresh and looks exactly as in menu. Very kind service.

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: Had breakfast here today with family. Restaurant opens at 8 am is clean, well laid out and has large seating capacity, but was full within minute

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: I loved the MTR foods. It was just like I was eating at home (Except in S$ and GST :

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: 8 of us went early on Saturday Evening for Dinner. The staff were most welcoming and advised us on what to eat and what quantity to order. All the vegetarian food was delicious, as were the soft drinks. The service was very fast and efficien

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: Authentic south indian Karnataka tiffins. They use ghee instead of oil which gives that aroma and makes you feel at home. Healthy breakfast menu to choose from.

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review:
Simple, cozy, inexpensive restaurent, frequented by Indian families. The food was great, fresh and delicious. I had spicy Puri Dosa which I recomend. Vegetarian dishes.
The place is very clean and  the service is  exellent.

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: I ordered Masala Dosa to takeaway, it came promptly even though the queue was out the door. It was so flavoursome and excellent value too. Could not fault this place.

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: Authentic South Indian food..Genuine taste and excellent service.Check their combo meal plans changing on daily basis.TRUE VALUE FOR MONEY!!

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: If you are craving for Dosai or Idly, this is the right place to go. We tried the masala dosa, rava idly, plain idly and it was delicious.

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: We visit this place quite often and the food never disappoints. What you get is flavourful food straight out of South Indian cuisine with heavy influence of South Canara way of cooking. The service is quick and the portion sizes are go

Name: MTR Singapore
Location: 438 Serangoon Road Opposite Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore 218133 Singapore
Review: I love coming back to MTR. Great selection of food, generous with ingredients and fresh flavour. Rao the manager is so kind and attentive, as well as other staff. Feels like home. great place to bring friends and family.

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: (Actually went to the outlet at CineLeisure which isn't on TripAdvisor but I'm sure the system is the same and thus the feedback equally applicab

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: The staff is very attentive and courteous. Their Americano is probably one of the cheapest in town. Apple Crumble is nice but a bit on the expensive side.

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: Service is good, but the food really soso, and the food range not a lot to choose from, the heibihiam pasta too spicy, love thier apple crumble dessert tho

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: Tried the new outlet at Cineleisure on this visit in November 2020. Just for some beers before dinner, making the most of their happy hour pricing. Decent craft beer at reasonable prices (albeit a limited selection).

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review:
Service was good but the food was not.

I had lobster pasta from the seasonal menu.

It was not worth the price.

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: Went with a burple 1-for-1 pasta deal (which i believe is available regularly on weekdays) -- tried the umami pasta & spicy crab pomodoro. The crab pasta was super delicious and all of my friends agreed! The spicy kick was the perfect amount of spice. On the other hand the umami pasta was a little underwhelmi

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: Returned here for lunch last week with a friend. I chose the scallop pasta which was really quite good. Friendly and efficient service.

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: Nice cafe with pleasant environment, the Cathay not so crowded during CB phase 2, can dine in comfortably.

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review:
Cute place! Nice pastas, with very decent portions! 
cozy environment, and service was very good! 
Good for a casual lunch

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: Atmosphere is pleasant. Service is good. But the tables are abit dusty as i tried to wipe and my tissue became black. Most importantly the food is so good especially their truffle carbonara. so well cooked!

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: Dinner is really nice and quiet when you come during the weekdays, both food and desserts are reasonably priced! :) hope to have more variety for desserts~

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: Good place to dine. Perfect ambience to chill! Will come next time with my family and friends for dinner again!

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: We shared a pizza (mushroom truffle pizza,$24), a pasta (crab pomedoro pasta, $24) and sides (calamari rings, $1

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: Came to The Assembly Ground for a get-together with my girl friends. Place felt homey and cozy. Everyone enjoyed our drinks whether it was hot coffee, tea or the milk shake! We also ordered the crispy mac and cheese to share. Delicious! Definitely coming back for more chill sessio

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: I came here in the late afternoon and ordered the baby scallops aglio olio and a hot macha latte. The baby scallops are indeed “ baby” ... the entire dish costs sgd20 . To me it is just plain pasta with olive oil and a two halves of a small tomato. Ingredients were small indeed! If you want pastas here. Stick to the tiger prawns . From the photo on its menu; the tiger prawns pasta seemed more substantial.

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: Good proposal if brunch dishes and drinks, very quick served, mac and cheese worth’s it even without chicken

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: The mac and cheese is a must try. The dish is loaded with beef and a thick layer of cheese. You would savour every single bite without feeling sick of the meal.

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: Ordered the set lunch with grilled pork and it was tender and juicy. For the price it’s definitely worth a try! Recommended!

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: my friends and i decided to eat here since we had the Entertainer app and we were pleasantly surprised with the food. it was really delicious and yummy! we all tried a little of each other's food and agreed that it was all tas

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: Restaurant serves great pasta. The spicy promodoro crab pasta, herbs de Provence beef pasta as well are recommended. Also, the coffee is fantastic.

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: Yummy truffle pasta and breaded mushroom starter. Enjoyed the meal with my family. Restaurant had a nice atmosphere.

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: the good think about this cafe is that it does not have service charge and there is only gst. food was alright nothing fabulous or wow

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: I enjoy the food and ambience very much. Prices are affordable too. Overall, it's a great hang out place with friends in town.

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: Tucked in a corner at Cathay Cineplex. Didn't think much of it cos the name of the shop does not stand out. Also,bfound out that is part of the Benjamin Barker business, so I was a bit sceptical how well a fashion business can extending its reach to cafe business. Ordered the Iberico pork and the Poulet Champignon. To our surprised, both dishes were very tasty. The chargrilled pork was well executed, crispy. The mushrooms with the chicken was yummy and paired fantastically well with the chicken. We were full of be praise for the food as we were eating them. Definitely will return for more and will also go try out the sister cafe. Th cappuccino is good too. Thumbs up for this cafe.

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: One of our favorites brunch place in Singapore. Good food and location. We recommend the assembly brunch and truffle mushroom.

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: Centrally located and the food is good. Good crowd even on weekdays! Ambience is awesome even if you are coming in a group.

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: Worth it with Entertainer 1 for 1. Good ambience and food. Ordered crab pasta and salted egg chicken.

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: The assembly ground, ordered pizza with laksa sauce and miso pork. At the Cathay  2 handy road singapore

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: Nice place to chill at. Nice food and good service. Second time here and will come back again. Pizza is recommended.

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: Good service and food tasted very good. Coffee was very authentic and the dishes were very nice like the pasta

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: The food is amazing and the staff service was great. The place was also clean and quiet. Overall, it was a great experience

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: Hello! The lunch set with sirloin steak was so amazing! Also the staff was so kind to explain the whole menu to us. Thank you

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: Great place to have coffee with friends and family. Interior decor is on point and place is family friendly too

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: Awesome coffee, super chill place to relax on a Sunday afternoon! Highly recommended to friends and it's family friendly too.

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: Good and quiet ambience service & food, conveniently located near dhoby guat mrt, just across the road.

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: Poor service poor food quality. Pasta over cooked and cold. Would not go back would not recommend. Not value for money.

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: Provides wifi and the space is comfortable. Many options for brunch. The cake can be improved as it doesn’t seem fresh.

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: Food is always consistent with good coffee. Love the deco with great ambience. Service is pleasant too.

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: We (a group of 6) had dinner at The Assembly Ground base on friend's recommendatio

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: I'm always here for a cup of coffee & truffle fries. If you ever need a relaxed place in a busy area, this is the place to go

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: Love their matcha latte + espresso shot! The cafe ambiance is great for friends and family gathering.

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: This cafe is always a go to for me~ Enjoy doing my work there during low peak hours because of the ambience and of course, the truffle fries! Only thing is you keep having to log in to the wifi every so often because you occasionally get logged out. Apart from that, will def recommend this cafe :)

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: Great place to have coffee and chill in between shopping trips The salmon benedict I ordered a few months back was really good too. I left out 1 star because the waffles was out of stock during my last visit. Will be back next time I’m in the area.

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: Was there with a few friends and we enjoyed the food and coffee there! Staff was friendly too and the atmosphere is great!! :)

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: I had the Assembly Brunch. The portion was worth the price. The restaurant was also very clean and service was good.

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: Enjoyed the atmosphere and food here highly recommend. Had an umami sphegetti and egg Benedict with salmon

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: The salmon eggs Benedict was great and the brioche toast was crispy yet fluffy and soft! The ambience was also really nice and chill

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: Nice environment for lunch. Recommend rossti benedict & buttermilk chicken is nice! Got great deal with HSBC entertainer.

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review:
nice quiet place to chill at on a weekday afternoon 
cappuccino coffee was good
food items looked good too but i didn’t try them

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: Food was quite expensive but it was really awesome. Loved the truffles fries and the matcha drink! The ambience was really cosy, intimate enough for small groups of friends. Staff were attentive. I will come back again for the food and drinks but once in a while due to its steep price.

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: Buttermilk chicken burger and truffle carbonara are very good! Truffle fries is splendid as well! Coffee is recommended.. Great place for families and kids!

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review:
Very nice place and very friendly. I like the atmosphere and the cafe. I will definitely come back.
Thank you.

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: Love the food, service and ambience at Assembly Ground. Good variety of food that are fresh, hearty and nicely presented.

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: Loved the awesome pizza flavours such as Laksa and Smoked Duck. Service was also great. Highly recommended!

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: I loved the service and the food. Thank you for everything. I am sure I will recommend yall to my friends

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: Came here after a meal to get coffee so didnt try the food. The coffee is solid. No issues with that. And the place tries to go green by not giving straws with its iced coffee and giving a $0.50 discount if you BYO cup for takeaways. Noticed no vegan or vegetarian options in the food menu, though.

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review:
Food here is nice! Love the atmosphere.

A must try for salted egg calamari, and their burger and Chili lime seafood aglio olio

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: Love the comfy, laid back ambience, music and cafe food. The Rosti Benedict was good too. Crispy and tasty.

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: Food was good. Had the laksa pizza and spicy pomodoro crab pasta. Ambience was great as well. Good place to hang out with friends and loved ones!

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: the food was of decent quantity and quality. no service charge incurred. food are decently priced, similar to cafes.

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: Nice ambience at a central location with friendly staff. Interesting menu with local fusion. Nice coffee

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review:
Lovely setup, great food and nice coffee :) 
Food had great presentation, value for money, overall a great experience.

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: the ambience here was really nice for me to do work and not only that, i felt really productive!:) Nice service here which is a plus!

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: The drinks here are nicely priced (though wished it could’ve been cheaper by a dollar or two!), but other than that, it’s rly great!:)

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: Have been a fan of assembly ground for their great coffee and recently tried their new kopi C brew which was pleasantly yummy too!

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: A great place to meet up with friends. Great service. Ice lemon grass drink and their teas are just great with the cakes they serve.

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay

Thank you for your email on today at 18:40.
Love Pasta
Love Truffle Carbonara, a very  delicious meal at The Assembly Ground.

Review: Happened to pass by The Cathay and dropped by this cool cafe. Nice deco too! Using the coffee break App to buy coffee or home made coolers will save you couple of cents which is totally worth i

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
