Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: It has been couple of years since I’ve last been here. The food here has improved a lot since then and the matcha latte is spot on too. Plus, the customer service is immaculate. Will definitely be back here again! Cheers

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: food and was good. price was reasonable. we ordered a pizza, pasta and fries. ideal place for small gathering with friends

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: Food was great for value for the dollar with generous servings. Esp their signature burger. Service was splendid as well. Staff was friendly and approachable. What I love about this cafe is the ambience of the cafe which is pleasant for dining.

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: Scrumptious food + Pleasant service staff. Overall, had a good time here! Would definitely recommend.

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: I really ejoyed the time there with friend over yummy food and drinks. Will definitely be back again!

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: I had brunch with my husband and we really enjoyed our food. We didn't have to wait too long. The location was great.

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: Food is good, coffee is good t

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: nice place to chill out with friends and enjoying dinner together. The foods are nice and worth the $$

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: Nice quiet place nested in The Cathay. Definitely worth the visit. Staff are friendly and coffee's good too.

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: Decided to take half day off and chill with Best Friend for some good coffee and hearty me

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: Good food and even better coffee. Convenient location and nice ambience. Personally got the carbonara and had no regrets!

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: I always enjoy getting the executive lunch set which changes every day and is priced reasonably ($15-20). The pasta options are always tasty and I like their Green tea matcha too (a bit sweet though)!

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: I love getting the lunch sets from Assembly Ground which is easily accessible in the Cathay building near the MRT (price is super reasonable). Their pastas are especially tasty!

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: Lively and vibrant atmosphere, establishment was filled to the brim during the evening we visited, the customer service was within our expectations as well, no long waits

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: really love the coffee there and perfect ambience be it catching up with friends or working at a cafe

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: They have power points available at two of the tables so that helps if you need to charge your laptop. The coffee passport is excellent value

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: I always look forward to seeing new food items on the menu, always good and super worth it especially with the entertainer app!!!!

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: Good food and nice place to chill with friend or have a dinner date. 1 for 1 mains with the entertainer

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: Was invited by friends to come and try the menus and I like it! Nice place too. Yummy foods, love the drinks. Friendly staff!

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: Lovely place with a great ambience :) Especially love the truffle cream pasta, as well as the iced latte which comes with a scoop of ice cream!

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: I like their food, nice food 😁😍 their environment is quite ok also yet not much place to sit. But overall  consider not bad ...

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: rly friendly staff members, pretty decorations and aesthetics. pasta is nice as well, rly loving the 1 for 1 pasta on tuesdays!

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: I came here last month to grab a beer after work with a friend. The selection is very limited, but the prices are quite reasonable and the beer is cold and good. On this visit we didn't have any food. Might come back for another beer though.

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: Came here for a birthday celebration and managed to pull off a surprise with the help of the friendly staff there. Food was great. We ordered truffle carbonara, surf and turf, laksa pizza and some truffle fries. The Laksa Pizza had a really unique flavour while the truffle fries was simply delicious.

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: I was looking for nasi goreng and sateh kambing but was to tired to look hard enough so I setteled for fish and chip instead. It was fine, fish very okay.

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: I had lunch here and the food was great!  The staff were friendly and it’s a nice setting to chill.  Will be back soon!

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: I live 15 mins away and this has always been my go-to for good coffee. Met with the founder 4 years ago, loved the story and the attention to detail especially when it comes to acidity of coffee. The food over the years has gotten more Creative and aesthetic too.

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: Excellent hangout place for friends and couples. Service was prompt and food were excellent. Free flow of water is available and is self-service. Will not hesitate to come here again.

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: Both food and coffee were good. Been here twice and standard has been pretty consistent! Waffles smell amazing and I'll be sure to try some during my next visit!

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review:
The beverages like coffee, mocha is good.
As for food, i have not tried any. So i cannot comment. Overall it is a good place for drinks.

Name: The Assembly Ground, The Cathay
Location: 2 Handy Road #01-21 the Cathay, Singapore 229233 Singapore
Review: Reasonably priced food and drinks, fast and attentive service.  First visit, and won't be our last for sure.

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: For what was a pretty long wait time (30-35 mins), you would expect the food to be served piping hot and to taste great. However, the Squid Ink Risotto and Homemade Tagliatelle we ordered both come lukewarm and bland, which was a huge disappointment. If you like authetic Italian food, go to a proper Trattoria. Supply and Demand is more like a casual hangout for drinks - great atmosphere and vibes as it overlooks the bay area. However, its food is extremely below par.

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: The food here does not disappoint, maybe except the pizzas. But the pasta, clam soup and others are simply delicious! It is also priced affordably so you will not break the ban

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: Thank you for making the birthday lunch of my sister a super easy, breezy and fantastic one on 3-Jan.

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: Reservation for 8 pax and request for indoor seat but was given outdoor upon arrival. And told by staff if indoor seat will be seated separately then what is the point of making reservation.

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: Food and service was good. Music was  not too loud for conversations. Overall happy with the ambience and service. Will be back again !

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: Nice food and friendly service. There's so much on the menu and we can only take that much. The coconut mint cocktail is refreshing!

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: We had a birthday lunch for our friend there and the staff were very friendly. Great service!! We love it!

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: The food was good and the staff delivered great service. The ambience and decor of the place was clean and cosy as well. Pleased with the experience and would recommend a visit.

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: The place was nice and cozy, and the service was good. There is good safe distancing measures inside and perhaps next time we can try the rooftop area.

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: We were celebrating our daughter's 19th birthday and we were all very happy with the food and environment. A little disappointed cos the restaurant should have arranged something like a small birthday cake or a special drink or a discount for the birthday person. It was her actual birthday that day when we were at the restaurant.

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: Food was good, prices are reasonable. Ingredients were fresh and high quality. Ambience was great for gatherings.

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review:
The food that we ordered were nice. The restaurant is with great ambience and view.
Most importantly, the staffs that served us are really friendly and nice.

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: Food was unexciting and uneventful. It was humid but not all the fans and coolers were on. Staff tried their best to be helpful and responded timely. However, not a place I would visit agin

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: The ambience is nice and the food is surprisingly good and well sized portions. Good family outing especially with hungry kids

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: Reserved a slot at Esplanade outlet a weekly before going, asking for indoor seating with a view. We were pleasantly surprised when we were given a cozy corner that has full panel glass windows giving us an unobstructed view of the bay outside. Service crews are friendly. Food presentation and taste was good, but on the pricier side. Beer selection is quite limited even though we heard raving reviews of the drinks selection. Wine list is decent.

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: Made a reservation for indoors for 6pm but was informed that they are fully booked. We took an outdoor table and throughout our meal, there were so many empty tables indoors (including afew near us stating that reservations were at 8pm). We left at 7plus, perspiring all over (especially the baby girl). I only realised the ceiling fan above us was at lowest speed (compared to the other fans) after our main course.

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: 5 of us sisters had a wonderful time. Although there was a power trip upstairs, it was lit by lovely lamps. Those who served us were very polite too. We will return surely 🥰

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: Service can be better. Atmosphere is nice except table behind was a little noisy. Food was good too.

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: Always a pleasure to spend dinner with the family at the restaurant. Great food, good ambience and excellent service!

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: A very cosy place and nice service sta

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review:
Visited Novena LKC Demand & Supply. 
Semi self service dinning concept, perfectly fine. 
Good value for money. 
Pizza topped with generous amount of seafood.

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review:
Terrible Place, avoid at all cost. 
The cocktails aren’t to good but the service is the worst, especially if you are traveling alone. Unfriendly staff, slow and no service. They made me move because they want to reserve the “good table” for more ppl.

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: Visited here on New Year’s Eve and it was fairly busy when we arrived. Was seated promptly without a reservation but was rushed through the meal and asked to pay almost as soon as our desserts were finished. At $83 per person (one child) I would expect better service and a more relaxed atmosphere. We would have spent more on drinks if we hadn’t been pushed out of the door too. Food was ok - cold but fairly well seasoned and tasty. Certainly not rushing back and would go elsewhere next time.

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: Place was quite cooling however the upstairs bar does not allow for restaurant food to be served. Didn't know they do have live band on Friday & Saturd

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: Long time didn’t visit here . pizza is great , arrabiata fries too , pasta too . hope the vibe is there

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: #NAME?

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: The Supply and Demand branch at LKC Medical School in Novena is a great place for lunch and dinner, so I assumed the Esplanade branch would likewise be the same. But I was really surprised at how bad the service was. We had a party of over 30 pax and sent over to the restaurant our exact main course orders weeks ahead. But yet the dishes took forever to come - the timing from when the first person was served the main course and the last was more than 30 minutes apart - so while some finished eating with nothing to do, others were still wondering if their food will ever come. What is the point of pre-ordering? Again, I chalk it up to poor management at the kitchen. No thanks, I am not coming back. Avoid this place for any business or staff function. One thing good about the restaurant is the location and view.

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: Awful pizza and very poor management. Returned a pizza to the kitchen, and the management did not replace it and still fully charged us.

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review:
Had dinner at the main dining hall
before moving up to the rooftop bar for some thin crust pizza and wine, while enjoying the awesome view of the Singapore skyline! Food was good overall.

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: Interesting place in Esplanade. Stay downstairs. The smell of the roasting pizza is heavenly. Upstairs, the 4 bar keeps won’t if they had to.

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: Calamari, squid ink risotto and vodka e gamberreto penne are all very good.  Atmosphere is nice for lunch and dinner.  The live music at dinner is perfect, not too loud but enough to add a good vibe.

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: Looked great in the photos and menu looked very good. Roof top bar to start with is pretty good, but there are better in Singapo

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: Food is great as usual. We ordered 2 types of fries in tasting size but the portion came huge. Pizza was good, pasta was fantastic. The Asian delights exceeds expectation and it is more oomph than the main

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: This was a good place to have some "bar" food and spend time with friends. A good atmosphere for having some fun. Our group reserved the space upstairs/outside. The staff was attentive and the food was good -not great but good. Nothing spectacular about the menu. Good selection of general food fare - pizza, etc. If you want something more indicative of Asian cuisine, this would not be the place. But, if you are in town and are looking for something similar to a standard American menu, this would be a good alternative.

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: We visited as walk ins and were seated promptly. There was a good choice of both food and wine on the menu and it was a pleasant atmosphere inside.

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: Stumbled across this on a walk back to the hotel but pleased we did. Very good pizzas and pasta. Service was great with a lively atmosphere.

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: Been here for a lunch and for dinner, both were excellent. Very young but friendly and accurate staff, helpful if you have questions. The food is good, done like it should be. Waitingtimes are ok even when its crowdy. Prices are ok for the food you get.

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: Finally been here for the first time after wanting to come here many times before. Love the setting ambience, definitely a hidden gem within Orchard Gateway, deco resemble home-cafe library, perfect hidden corner for a couple or simply dinner after long day of work. They have happy hour too and food choices is excellent at reasonable price point. Will be back again.

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: Floppy and greasy frozen pizza, calamari that gave me the sh*ts, cocktails that you could tell were pre mixed and located next to a construction site (if it wasn’t for this the location would be 10/10

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: Kids loves the pastas and pizzas. They serves nice salads too. Nice ambiance and great for watching fireworks.

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: Pleasant dinner at Supply & Demand Esplanade branch. Was seated outdoor at the rooftop with my friends. Food was good, really love the truffle fries. Portion was quite big though. Drinks were good as well. Was hoping that we could watch the NDP fireworks rehearsal while eating. However, there are some trees blocking the way. Hence, couldn't really catch a good view of the fireworks

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: Glad that the restaurant does tasting portions for the food, the pizzas and pasta were really good! Live bands every now and then on their rooftop bar, service was excellent every time I visited :)

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: They have the tasting portion, which is really good because I like to try a variety whenever I’m at a restaurant. Their pasta and pizza are delicious, their restaurant has a nice ambience too!!

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: We celebrated a birthday there and our group was large. The staff was accommodating and polite. Food was above average but portions were rather small. Ambience was warm, and nautical is the theme I believe. parking can be costly tho.

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: Price slightly on the high side considering the portion given (pasta). The coffee (flat white) was a bit too small.

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: A family relative raved about this swanky cafe some time back and we decided to patronize Supply&Demand for a celebratory dinner. Service was prompt and efficient, staff was friendly. The atmosphere was very cosy and the cafe wasn't so loud that we can't have a good conversati

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: AVOID. Terrible service! Management needs to sort it out. Worst service I have ever experienced. Will never be back.

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: The ambiance at the rooftop in the evening is great for bonding with friends over a drink and fringed foods. I like the coconut with mint. It blended well. The pizzas are good too.

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review:
Really love the pizzas as they were well-made, especially the crust - thin and nice.
Pastas were average.

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: We are vegetarians and there were a few options for us, so no problem there. Food is decent. But despite requesting several times that we would not like our pasta Al dente but well done, the pasta was on the very chewy side and didnt seem cooked too well.

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: Stopped by for dinner. Both main course and desserts were very good.  Efficient and friendly staff. Maybe on the expensive side for the category, but still recommended.

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: We went for celebrating anniversary with friends. Food was decent but was over priced. Service has improved but still some room for improvement. Nice place with good view from rooftop

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: We had a variety of salads, pizza, pasta - all were very tasty. Wine was good too and reasonably priced.

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review:
Excellent Italian food, cooked authentically.
Good standard of service despite the staff apologised for being short-handed when we visited.
Worth a return.

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: Just had lunch he

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: a restaurant to visit if you are at esplanade. menu is extensive and food good quality. portions are decent. try their pastas.

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: My husband and I stumbled across this bar and restaurant by accident and were so pleased we had. Had a lovely cocktail on the rooftop bar to start, felt very lucky to have such a good view, as there were fireworks that night. Ended up ordering food and drinking wine the

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: My wife and I visited 3 times during our stay, as we loved the open air roof top bar. It is only 1 floor up (short flight of stairs), but had a lovely view of the harbour and surrounding buildings. We went for early evening drinks to do a bit of people watching and see the skyline change from day to night. We also ate downstairs one night - food was good, reasonably priced and the staff very helpful.

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: This place has a open air roof top bar with a great view of the river and a pleasant place to sit and watch the world go by over a couple of drinks. We also ate down stairs and the food was tasty, my husbands pizza was particularly yummy and the service was good.

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: Location is nice, especially after a concert at esplanade or annexe studio. Good to enjoy a drink at the rooftop but never order food there... takes a while, mix up orders, service is just soso and great live music with football screen behind. No identity no spirit just cash machine for tourists

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: Regretting our decision to come here. Waiting for over 1h for our food here and starving. Started arriving after 1h and it’s tomato mozzarella with unriped tomatoes 😭

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: Situated at the ground level of the Lee Kong Chian of Medicine, near Tan Tock Seng Hospital is an Italian restaurant that deserves a thumbs up for their fried chicken and ambience. Pricing is alright on the whole but the deserts somewhat pricey. Service was prompt but the main counter staff could be better if they knew the menu in depth to recommend the less common items. Nonetheless, still a worthy Italian restaurant in Novena to try.

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: We were at Supply & Demand for a leisurely Saturday dinner, the service was as leisurely as we wanted the dinner to be! Right from cleaning up to taking the order to getting us the cheque, things proceeded in slow motio

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: We were uninterested in eating here due to the horrible service. We. Amen on Saturday night 10/6/18. We sat for 15 minutes outside while a girl puttered around rearranging chairs. I thought maybe she was a bus person. Imagine my surprise when she finally came to take our order. I was so off put that I didn’t want to eat there. We ordered wine; which was brought by a nice young man. So this girl needed do nothing more than take our order and enter it into a computer! The reason for the 2 stars is the rapid delivery of our drink and another girl working outside who was extremely kind (an Indian girl but I may have gotten her name mixed up with the horrible one so I won’t write it). Whoever she is, she knows who she is dealing with and she can’t do anything about it. I feel bad for this place being stuck with this other person.

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: I visit Singapore quite regularly for business, and always visit this restaurant. The pizza's are great and never disappoint.

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: We enjoyed a performance at the esplanade but where to eat afterwards? most places already seemed closed for fo

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: We found this place completely by chance, while out for a late walk, admittedly to get food. However the boardwalk was very busy, as people were waiting for the light show to start and with a rehearsal going on at the stag

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: This place is well located on Raffles place on the bank of the river (close to the Merlion) . We ordered vegetarian Italian food. Sweet potato fries, Thin crust Veggie pizza (the best pizza in town!), Penne alfredo, Truffle and wild mushroom penne, Spaghetti olio aglio. We loved the food and service was good.

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: This is my fourth time at Supply & Demand in Singapore and it did not disappoint. We usually go for the live music upstairs at the bar (which has amazing views of the bay and marina bay sands!) but we decided to try the restaurant out this time. Prices in Singapore can be quite outrageous but S&D’s prices were quite reasonable (mains range from 16-25$ on average). Lots of classic Italian choices with a Singaporean twist. As a table we split a regular sized pizza, risotto, and their salmon rice bowl. All were very good and priced decently well, the pizza was the smallest size and it turned out to be much bigger than we thought. As the restaurant closes earlier than the bar upstairs, we went up for a drink after dinner. Will never get tired of the view from the rooftop! Definitely check out Supply and Demand if you’re looking for a reasonably priced sit down dinner with amazing views of the city.

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: Salad ham and rucola was very good... ice cappuccino poor..great place to sit. Nice view. Friendly staff

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: enjoyed dinner here with friends before concert. Service was very prompt and food was really good. We had Truffle fries, Smoked salmon salad, ribeye steak and a lovely pizza. Wanted to go again this week for lunch but they open only for dinner.

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: A really good place to chill with a group of friends over some pizza and drinks! Waiters are friendly and willing to cooperate when we were planning to surprise one of our friends for his birthday. Food was definitely high quality and generous in portions!

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: Very basic pizza but the place is nice and cozy. It is a good place if you want to chill with some friends and have a drink. You have a great view of the Marina Bay Sands.

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: Good location and the drinks we had were good but the food only so and

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: Went there for coffee during a sunny day. Really nice ambience, not too crowded. Latte is surprisingly pretty good, not like some places which normally put too much milk I barely can taste the coffee anymore.

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: Went with friends before a show, we arrived early evening. Service was slow even though they were not busy. They only serve bar snacks and pizza prior to 6pm. Overall average service, didnt know their wine list. Good food but not enough to mask the poor service.

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: It was thursday evening and we came around 22 pm and there was a little chaos going on in this restaurant. Our waiter didn’t gave us enaugh time to think what we want to order(he came to ask our orders, we said ”we’re gonna need two more minutes”, he said ”you need to hurry”, we asked ”are you closing”, he answered ”yes” AND 50 minutes later there came new customers in and they ordered food!

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: Service was appalling, after one and a half hours we left without our pizza ever arriv

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: The location of the restaurant and the view out to MBS is really spectacular, but don't come for service or good food... Service is slow, a bit unorganized... The food is far from Italian and they try to mix weird ingredients into classics (i.e. Pizza Salsiccia had so much garlic on top it was actually really weird, ceasar salad is funny - basically they throw several ingredients on a plate separately and one should do what??). So go for a view and perhaps a drink, spend money on food somewhere else.

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: No dishes or settings on table.Food was OK but lukewarm when delivered. For the four of us, food came over time, last dish delivered 10 minutes after the first o

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: we just had a company event on the roof top, and the nights views and light show over at Marina bay sands are great. pizzas and finger food was nice and tasty, service staff was efficient and drinks keep coming qui

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: Cosy ambience, delicious truffle fries (chips, if you will). Great venue for pre-show dinner or post-show drinks for those attending something at the Esplanade. Rather pricey, but worth the visit.

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: We were there on a Saturday evening. We didn’t have to wait to be seated but it took awhile before we were waited on and drinks brought. I had the 9” Hawaiian pizza which was good. My husband had the full size pasta carbonara which had good flavor and pasta was cooked just right. He had a pint of beer and I had a glass of wine and the total bill was $77. Don’t know how that compares to other places as the only other meal we’d had was at Maxwell hawker center.

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: Just a regular Italian restaurant that we were passing on our way to the Marina and it looked busy

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: The food was lovely, a bit pricey but personally I believe it was worth it. However, we were sitting inside and the music was too loud. Almost impossible to have a conversation between the 4 of us. Other than that, lovely setting.

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: I had always loved the food and it's in a great location.  Making pre show drinks/dinner easy breezy!

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: We came across this restaurant which faces the Marina Bay when the heavens opened and we needed to take shelter from the heavy downpo

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: A nice place to chill with friends for dinner. A wide variety of foods and food served are all yummy

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: Where to begin.. The restaurant looks good and is in a nice location, thats about all the positives we had from our experience. It was a Sunday evening and after seating us outside which was what we wanted, the staff didnt come back to take out order for drinks or food for 15 mins - after having to wave the wait staff down from outside the window. It seemed like all the wait staff beside two of them were new, they had no idea what was what and cleaning tables all over the place - it wasnt even busy. When we finally got to order it was another 20 mins before our entree of bruschetta came out, the bread was stone cold and half were burnt. One main pizza came out straight after the entree while the rest of us sat and waited for our main pastas which the first one came out 20 mins later and the waiter didnt know what pasta it was nor who ordered it. After he walked it back into the kitchen to find out what it was he returned. The other pasta arrived 10 mins late

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: We chanced upon this restaurant after an event at the Esplanade Annexe studio, which is just next door. As we were not very hungry then, we only ordered 3 items to share. We had avocado and strawberry salad, chicken satay and Thai taro cake. All were delicious but the standout dish has got to he the chicken satay. The meat was marinated and grilled to perfection, it was highly recommended.

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: First meal in Singapore spent with friends at this place. The location was perfect, not only for the vibe but also to view the light show flashing across the water. The server, Sunshine, was delightful as well as helpful in guiding us through the menu. It was a great way to begin our visit.

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: First time to dine at Supply and Demand and didn’t know much about this restaurant. Location wise, was abit difficult to find and got lost until friend came to meet

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review:
Parma Ham salad is good! Served with slightly salted balsamic vinegar.
There are real salted egg in the salted egg drumlets, although it is not heavily sauced, but every bite has the real salted egg taste.
Seafood risotto is as awesome as the last time.

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: We ordered 2 pasta and 1 pizza. very good, will visit again definitely. Very nice atmosphere and environment.

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: Love the ambience and service. Everyone has a smile on their face and accommodating to requests. Such wonderful service and body language, I hope this don't change.

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: Strolling along the esplanade on another balmy, humid Singaporean evening, an outdoor meal seemed unappealing, so we opted for this venue. It did not disappoint. The meals were delicious (we had a split pizza - two choices of toppings and a selection of 4 sausages. The pizza had a nice, thin, crispy crust and adequate toppings , the service was good and the bill was affordable.

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: Long story sho

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: I went to supply&demand (esplanade) with a couple of friends. The ambience was nice and cosy for groups. The trufle garlic fries was really good (we had the salted egg yolk fries but didn't like it as much). The signature pizza was good too, however we didn't enjoy our chorizo and minced pork pasta as much.

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: Went there for a date night, great view of marina bay. A pity they do not serve mains in the rooftop

Name: Supply and Demand
Location: 8 Raffles Avenue Esplanade Mall Esplanade Mall #01-13 Annexe, Singapore 039802 Singapore
Review: Came in on a Sunday afternoon to have some Prosecco and starters. The burata was delicious as was the avocado dip. The Prosecco was also good value. Service was ok. Great location though.

Name: Publico Ristorante
Location: 1 Nanson Road Intercontinental Singapore Robertson Quay InterContinental Singapore Robertson Quay, Singapore 238909 Singapore
Review:
During quarantine this was our salvation. 
Great taste, good selection and right size.
Thank you Publico for being there for us.n
We definetely recommend their services.
Enjoy.

Name: Publico Ristorante
Location: 1 Nanson Road Intercontinental Singapore Robertson Quay InterContinental Singapore Robertson Quay, Singapore 238909 Singapore
Review: Mr Bala attended to our every need and made the experience one to remember, food and drinks are a must try for everyone.

Name: Publico Ristorante
Location: 1 Nanson Road Intercontinental Singapore Robertson Quay InterContinental Singapore Robertson Quay, Singapore 238909 Singapore
Review: Abdellah and Sara was both great in their service . I am personally very very overwhelmed having them serve me . The best service ever . Super patience and kind .

Name: Publico Ristorante
Location: 1 Nanson Road Intercontinental Singapore Robertson Quay InterContinental Singapore Robertson Quay, Singapore 238909 Singapore
Review: Good place, good service, good ambience, good food, good lighting! I love the proscuitto the best, highly recommend it.

Name: Publico Ristorante
Location: 1 Nanson Road Intercontinental Singapore Robertson Quay InterContinental Singapore Robertson Quay, Singapore 238909 Singapore
Review: I visit Publico often with friends and family ! Great ambience great Food and excellent service ! The staff is very good ! they have a good drinks menu and the staff are ever willing to help you choose the food and drinks recommending the best on the Menu. Ms Anne was very kind to guide us through the drinks menu and the food menu. her colleague JC was also good attending to all our requirements. Nadia is another staff we bump into often when we are there and she goes the extra mile to make us comfortable and ensure we are being served well. A big thanks to all of the

Name: Publico Ristorante
Location: 1 Nanson Road Intercontinental Singapore Robertson Quay InterContinental Singapore Robertson Quay, Singapore 238909 Singapore
Review: Thank you Thines, Ginny and Haziq for hosting us. Great food specially the burrata pizza and garlic food. Must try pink as hell cocktail. Loved the presentation for chocolate ecstasy. Ravioli was bit sweet but definitely recommend to try it.

Name: Publico Ristorante
Location: 1 Nanson Road Intercontinental Singapore Robertson Quay InterContinental Singapore Robertson Quay, Singapore 238909 Singapore
Review: The set lunches were such good deal - at sgd 20 for two course or sgd25 for three cour

Name: Publico Ristorante
Location: 1 Nanson Road Intercontinental Singapore Robertson Quay InterContinental Singapore Robertson Quay, Singapore 238909 Singapore
Review: Amazing food and wonderful service, especially the burrata pizza and Tartufata! Nice atmosphere as well

Name: Publico Ristorante
Location: 1 Nanson Road Intercontinental Singapore Robertson Quay InterContinental Singapore Robertson Quay, Singapore 238909 Singapore
Review: My boyfriend and I went to Publico las weekend. We had a great time. Our server was Bala he was so much fun and very professional. He recommended us great dishes. Braseola pizza with arugula was amazing!! Smoked Negroni with olives is a must try

Name: Publico Ristorante
Location: 1 Nanson Road Intercontinental Singapore Robertson Quay InterContinental Singapore Robertson Quay, Singapore 238909 Singapore
Review: Enjoyed dinner in publico, atmosphere food and service were amazing. Definitely visiting again. Thank you Anne and Tharma for great service.

Name: Publico Ristorante
Location: 1 Nanson Road Intercontinental Singapore Robertson Quay InterContinental Singapore Robertson Quay, Singapore 238909 Singapore
Review: Service was specially good, especially by Ginny :) They were helpful with birthday requests (written alongside the tiramisu)

Name: Publico Ristorante
Location: 1 Nanson Road Intercontinental Singapore Robertson Quay InterContinental Singapore Robertson Quay, Singapore 238909 Singapore
Review: Celebrated my birthday with my friends here, service was good and food was not bad too, slightly on the pricier side but the ambience make up for it!

Name: Publico Ristorante
Location: 1 Nanson Road Intercontinental Singapore Robertson Quay InterContinental Singapore Robertson Quay, Singapore 238909 Singapore
Review: Had dinner with friends for my bday and we had a lot of fun. As always, the place is lovely with nice ambience and the food was great. Sophie, who attended us, was extraordinary.

Name: Publico Ristorante
Location: 1 Nanson Road Intercontinental Singapore Robertson Quay InterContinental Singapore Robertson Quay, Singapore 238909 Singapore
Review: Service was great! Our server KC was really nice and attentive. Good was amazing. Will definitely be back again.

Name: Publico Ristorante
Location: 1 Nanson Road Intercontinental Singapore Robertson Quay InterContinental Singapore Robertson Quay, Singapore 238909 Singapore
Review: Amazing food and service! Ambience is great in the night too. Definitely recommend coming here for all kinds of occasion.

Name: Publico Ristorante
Location: 1 Nanson Road Intercontinental Singapore Robertson Quay InterContinental Singapore Robertson Quay, Singapore 238909 Singapore
Review:
Food was amazing especially the beef carpaccio. Recommendations were on point from Serafina and service carried out by KC & Bobby were amazing.

Cheers to you Publico

Name: Publico Ristorante
Location: 1 Nanson Road Intercontinental Singapore Robertson Quay InterContinental Singapore Robertson Quay, Singapore 238909 Singapore
Review: Our server Sheila was excellent and the other staff were great. The food was also very well executed. Pizza and pasta were perfect.

Name: Publico Ristorante
Location: 1 Nanson Road Intercontinental Singapore Robertson Quay InterContinental Singapore Robertson Quay, Singapore 238909 Singapore
Review: It was our first time today at Publico. I must say that my wife and I really enjoyed the whole experience. The food was amaaaaazing (we ordered Burrato with avocado, 4 cheese pizza and some salads). Simply delicious. The wine was great. And the staff and service was very very nice. Typically my experience at Robertson Quay when it comes to service is not great. But I must say that the Publico is an exception. Serafina, Bala and Ann - all of them were extremely attentive, friendly and very helpful. No doubt, I will come back again and again. And next time, with lots of friends. Thank you Publico

Name: Publico Ristorante
Location: 1 Nanson Road Intercontinental Singapore Robertson Quay InterContinental Singapore Robertson Quay, Singapore 238909 Singapore

Great Place! Thanks Serafína for the great care and the amazing food.

Name: Publico Ristorante

Name: Publico Ristorante

Name: Publico Ristorante

Name: Publico Ristorante
Location: 1 Nanson Road Intercontinental Singapore Robertson Quay InterContinental Singapore Robertson Quay, Singapore 238909 Singapore

Food, as always, was amazing - we ordered the Iberico Pork Secreto, Lobster Spaghetti and for dessert, the Tiramisu is not to be missed. Thanks Serafina for making our night memorable!

Name: Publico Ristorante

Review: Really good food and service, def good place for dates :-) highly recommend!! Kenneth & Jason have really good customer service. Burrata & carbonara were both superb, calamari a bit too oily to my liking.

Our server, Bala, was very attentive, prompt, and provides great suggestions on what to eat as it was our first time dining there.

Review: Had a delightful experience at Publico; Was attended by Pavin, who was very friendly & attentive without being overbearing. Thank you Publico & Pavin for allowing us to have an enjoyable time! :)

Review: Was here for a friend's birthday celebration and had the tiramisu as the cake which was so good. On top of that, we had awesome brunch food and cocktails complimented by excellent service. Slightly pricey but worth it !

Review: First time and top marks, will surely be back!  Exceptional service from Pavin which set the tone for the evening.  Super service, food, wine, ambience and music.  Really chilled and a wonderful evening out - lovely weather to sit at the patio!

Review: Great ambience and service. The staff were polite and friendly and the food was great. My friends and i had a great girls night out thanks to the attentive staff and great experience at the public

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: Had family birthday dinner there.  The Alaskan crab in the seafood set was not so fresh - other items were good. Steamed perch was excellent. Happy with the service from the wait staff.

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: Been coming here for years - since Jen was Traders. It's a little bit of a shame that the hotel doesn't invest in this restaurant a bit more. It's really large but it's never more than half full. It deserves far more patronage because the food is consistently good. I've had Chilli Crab at stalwarts such as Long Beach, but Ah Hoi's is always better somehow - and the mantou is always better. Their satay is always excellent as is their chicken with ginger. The restaurant is also unusual in that it's indoors yet has an outdoorsy feel.

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: Restaurant is very open with nice outlook. Tried chilli crab and steamed Bass, and both were to an excellent standard

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: We had the $49++ CNY 6 course meal promotion for 2 pax. The portion was very big - enough for at least 3 people. We had to pack away the extr

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: The Huat set lunch is for than sufficient for 2 paxs. The Lo Hei portion is large enough for 3 paxs. The smoked Norwegian salmon is tasty contrast to the crispy cracker

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen

Review: We went there for a lunch with family and friends, we ordered a lot of different food !!! Everything is really delicious, especially the chili crab... omg!! Definitely will recommend this place!!!

Review: ok, let's get straight to the point, food and ambiance wise, not b

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: The restaurant is nicely located by the pool at the Jen hotel. The food is nice and the atmosphere is relaxing. Good place for a local bite in Singapore

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: We booked this restaurant because of their national day promotion that's supposed to run until 31st August. We ate on 10th August and they had run out of crab and had no backup plan for substitutions. We were there at the start of the dinner service. It made their promotion seem like a bait and switch.

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: We wnjoyed just one meal here.  Served by an efficient Englsih speaking waiter who understood my wife's gluten-free needs.

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: Customer service was very good. The staff attended us as and when to check on us and make sure our experience there was good. Love the food over there, fresh and good. Ambience was very nice as well!

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: We tried the set lunch that was on promotion.  Good portion and value.  We tried 4 different set lunches and they were all good.

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review:
This restaurant is based in the hotel Jen 
A very good restaurant with pleasant staff & quick service which is what you want at lunchtime. The set menu is great at $12.95
And comes with a soft drink

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: We only tried their crab dishes, but the salted egg yolk crab was definitely one of the best things we've ever eaten. We also went to Jumbo Seafood, and we agree that Ah Hoi's was significantly better.

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: A small friendly restaurant, with a relaxed and authentic feel. It has a feel of street dining as all the food is brought in bowls so you can share. I am a vegan dinosaur which is often problematic whilst travelling, but I am always open to try new things as I do travel with carnivores. The claypot beancurd with mixed vegetables is to this day the best thing I have ever eaten! (mainly for the fresh ginger in it). The staff even made me a noodle dish which was not on the menu but equally as delicious. I cannot fault this restaurant in any way, due to the free water, 60 pence bowls of rice and free appetizers with some amazing spicy dipping sauce (sadly I have no idea what it was, but it was great with carrots!). The carnivores just loved the honey glazed ginger chicken too! If you are staying around Orchard Road or Tanglin, definitely pay this restaurant a visit! (For a more in depth review, please feel free to visit my blog!).

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: The only place that I would go for a good crab dishes in the city that can be catered to my likings. Always like chilli crab but most places are too commercial but at Ah Hoi, they can cook to my specification of spiciness like most other dishes. Another dish that I like is the Fish Maw Soup, Sweet and Sour Pork, and the Kam Heong La

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: Ah Hoi is still the same old place since my last visit nearly 20 years ago. I found it again in Chope, the forgotten restaura

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: The salted egg prawns is the best and chili crab is Sri Lankan Crab big size worth eating at $75. We also had fish maw soup which is very tasty. Highly recommended food and will sure to return but Chope customer only entitle 15% discount whereas some bank card are offering 20% discount.

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: Staying at Jen Tanglin Hotel tried Ah Hoi’s as only just checked-in and getting la

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: good honey-glazed chicken, orh nee and black pepper beef. the others not so. about 140 for 5 dishes and 3 desserts, 2 drink

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: Cozy location by the outdoor pool of Jen Hotel, the place offers Singaporean Cuisine. The whole crab is too much for one person, but the dishes in general are very big... too big? The quality is good, service not so exciting but fair, the bill did not surprise: fair as well.

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: For an absurd SGD12.90 you can enjoy this exceptional value of their "Value Set Lunch", inviting you to enjoy a soup, a main dish with side and vegetable, and a non-alcohol drink (barley, chin chow, calamansi, orange or apple). As you'd expect the main dish emphasises pork, rice and chicken, but there was also beef and seafood - plus two vegetarian! The sides includied spring roll; chicken satay; beancurd and deep-fried mantou. The vegetables - all with a choice of two sauces (mostly garlic or oyster) - included spinach, broccoli and bean sprout. The setting - overlooking the huge pool and all those market umbrellas - invited relaxation and enjoyment. The service was prompt, efficient and professional. Of course they have a wider selection in the a la carte but that $12.90 was unbeatable!

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: I thought I needed to go for a dip before my dinner! Then the waiter told me that was excluded from the menu. My guest and I other a sampler of local dishes and some of their seafood dishes. Relaxing leisurely by the pool and having a beer by the side. How life turns to the better. All dishes came on super fast. The waiter was courteous. We had lots. Enjoyable dinner.

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: Nice open atmosphere by pool. Friendly greeting. I liked the food - Black pepper steak on hot plate. Sign shell crab. Beer. Kept me happy. Jazz music was my only complaint. Surprised to see this nice Chinese/Singapore food place hidden in hotel. Met me Ah-Hoi. Nice guy.

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: Loved the casualness of this restaurant! This time we had the deep fried sea Bass with Thai chilli sauce and it was really good. Loved the sri lankan crabs with salted egg yolks-very well done. Kudos to the chef. Should try the cereal prawns, beef hor fun, Kenya beans.... all simply cooked but delicious. Service from Venice and Nikki was very good and attentive.

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: We had quite a few dishes tonight but forgot to take pictures of the food as we were too hung

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: Had casual dinner this week at this establishment as one of our friends was staying at the Hotel Jen. Service staff were excellent, better than most high end restaurants here. Kudos to them! However the food quality was relatively mediocre at best. The menu also has a strange combination of offerings and is very limited. Our party shall not be frequenting in the future until the offerings on food are dramatically upgraded.

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: The staff are very quick and aim to please you. We enjoyed our meal and the fried rice was delicious.

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review:
Easy quick inexpensive meal for dinner.
Very Chinese style of course. would have liked to see a little more choice on the menu.

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: This restaurant adjoins the swimming pool at the Hotel Jen. The food is Singaporean, with a lot of seafood. We had prawns and a chicken and ginger dish - both very good. It is essentially a pool-side cafe under some trees with good service and a relaxed feeling.

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: The set lunch menu has a soup, starter, main course and drink - all for S$12.90.  It also has a decent range of items to choose from.  It is by the pool and not air conditioned.

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: Good local food. The sri lankan chilli crabs are good. Sambal fried rice and kway teow also quite tasty. The staff provide good and cheerful service. Special mention and thanks to Venice, Ice and Nikki. Must try the durian cendol.

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review:
Lovely setting at Hotel Jen... Sat outside by the pool.

Food here was lovely and there was quite a good choice and we'll priced.

Would recommend

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: Sit under the stars beside the pool of the adjacent Hotel Jen and enjoy local fare at very reasonable prices.  Access via the Tanglin Mall shopping centre lift. Definitely one of Singapore's hidden gems.

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: Visited the restaurant cos of friends staying in the hotel. The restaurant located at the 4th level beside the swimming po

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: Ah Hoi's kitchen was my go to restaurant when in the Tanglin area and needed a Chinese food fix. But my last visit was less than impressive. The satay sauce was a bit tasteless and the beef satay was full of gristl

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: Having arrived late to the hotel we chose to have a meal on site. Big mistake, no wonder it's empty and we were the only ones in there. If you like fish and lots of ginger and spice it will suit you. We don't and it was the worse meal we have had in Singapo

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: After traveling a long flight, I just wanted to relax and have a nice meal.  I came across Ah Hoi’s Kitchen.  Not fancy, but really tasty food.  I had the stir fried prawn with leman sauce served over crispy noodle. Just a perfect simple dish.

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: Food was good and decently priced, especially when it’s located in town. It also has a nice open air atmosphere located beside the pool, with the recent cool weather in Singapor

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: Set at the side of the open air pool at Hotel Jen, the setting is lovely. The service is average as is the food. I ordered the chefs special starter and main course and both were just average. The starter was very greasy and the main course was ok but nothing special.

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: 新年明けの土曜、予約無しでしたが、18:30の開店と同時に

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: Food was a shadow of what it used to be - flavorful and good value lunch sets with a spread of choice. Now, it’s one flavor profile: just salty from the soup to noodles and fried rice. If you need the sambal belachan (which was good) to help you get through the meal, you know there’s something sorely missing!

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: Heard about the restaurant from friends years ago and decided to tried out but the food is so so and the service is really disappointing.  I don't think I will go back ever again.

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: Went here on good recommendation. Ordered the chefs special entrees. They were so deep fried they were inedible. The service was slow and we thought we must be invisible even though there were not many in the restaurant. I did express my disappointment at the checkout but he wasn't interest

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: Food was overall better than average for the price paid. A lunch for 4 relatively big eaters plus drinks was only slightly more than 100 dollars.

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: The food portions are quiet good compared to the cost for the food. THis restaurant is located at the inside the Jen tanglin hotel, the location is quiet nice as it is next to the pool.

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: Our friend recommended this restaurant, especially for its chilli crab. We enjoyed the food very much. It was all very tasty and well cooked. Service was also excellent. If you want your starters served first , you need to be clear of that otherwise all your food will arrive together. Our only disappointment was that my husband did not get the chilli crab because you can only have a 1kg crab , which would have been too much for him. If you want the chilli crab you are better to go with a few others who you can share with.

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: We had a wonderful dinner at Ah Hoi's Kitchen on last week. It was a great treat and obviously the food was extremely delicious especially the Salted Egg Crab! To be more frank, I never tried salted egg before but an Indian staff (muthu, very attentive and friendly) suggested us to try. He said "try salted egg crab and you will ask for more!" Indeed!! Believe me, it was super delicious taste!! My plate was full of crab and prawn shells. We really enjoyed our dinner there!! All of us really satisfied with the food as well as the service (friendly staffs). Will be coming in again to try different food! Hungry go where??? Let's go to Ah Hoi's Kitchen!! 5 stars for this restaurant!

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: Situated at the back of the hotel, in the same grounds overlooking the outdoor swimming pool, lovely restaurant, where you can either sit inside or out on the terrace, again friendly staff and my goodness decent food. wish we had a couple more meals there, it came to us fresh and also hot as in cooked heat, not spicy unless you asked for it. and definitely value for mon

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: It was a famous restaurant once and thought we should give it a t

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: We had a lovely catch up dinner with friends at Ah Hoi's with every meal we ordered spot on. Never been disappointed here.  Love the deep fried buns that come out with the Chilli crab. Delish.

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: We called in here for Friday night dinner and were very impressed. The crab, which is their specialty was outstanding. Lovely atmosphere near the pool, there are plants that provide privacy for diners at the restaurant as well as anyone using the pool. The staff were lovely and very helpful. Really enjoyed dinner here, our only surprise was it wasn't more crowded but we were there early in the evening. Put this on your list if you like sea food and crab

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review:
The crab is nice.  The fish is fantastic fresh. The soup is OK only 
. The restaurant is not air conditioning.

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: Had not been here for many years and it has lost its flare . Used to be packed with great atmosphere . It seems to have lost its appeal .

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: Normally when in Singapore I go to East Coast to enjoy my Black Pepper Crab. Now I have somewhere so much closer to the city and it is fabulous. Casual dining at it's very best. Highly recommended for a visit any time you are in Singapore !

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: paper wrapped chicken and satay yummy , so are the beef and seafood horfun, nice place for a simple lunch

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: One of the few restaurants that disinfect the baby chair for my gal proactively, much appreciated! Food was average (Claypot mee tai bah was pretty tasty though). Be warned that It can be pretty hot as there's no air conditioning.

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: The kampong set lunch is good and tasty,  the value for the price is cheap and worth it.  Great place for new stuff to try

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: One of our favorite seafood restaurant. We celebrated the Mother's Day lunch at Ah Hoi's and always an excellent experience. But I just want to share that the Chili crab taste has gone down. Chili crab is always the highlight of our meal but not this visit. Hope they can still cook the same old taste coz it's totally incomparable to other chili crabs in town.

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: Ah Hoi's Kitchen is situated in Hotel Jen Tanglin (formerly known as Traders Hotel) is all about alfresco dining with authentic Singaporean flair. The interior is a large dining hall with vintage Asian furniture whereas the alfresco area offers poolside dining. Famous for its Singaporean and seafood dishes and many other classics, all the dishes that we tried were awesome such as Nasi padang , Ayam Penyet (Fried Chicken with Spices) , Tahu Telur (deep fried beancurd with egg), black pepper fried kway teow , Kaki Babi Masak Cuka Hitam (braised pork shank in black vinegar), and of course we had to try a crab dish which was Crab Bee Hoon, The meat of the crab are thick and filled the shell ,The superior stock was a little subtle but you can feel it absorbed in the bee hoon and cabbage. Excellent Crab Dish. All the meat and seafood that we tried were cooked to perfection. They are all tender, juicy and succulent The dining experiences I had at Ah Hoi's Kitchen was awesome.., although I must say it's a little pricey,. Overall, Ah Hoi are very creative with their new crab dishes. If crabs are not to your liking, make sure you try their BBQ selections. I truly enjoy it. A big plus for The Staff are very professional the service is excellent and very friendly and attentive.

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: Lovely setting on the terrace next to the pool. The prices were very affordable for a hotel and the varied Asian menu had something for everyone. Food was very tasty.

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: This seems to be a forgotten restaurant . We were one of the two occupied tables on a weekday night

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: Pleasant and inexpensive lunch at tanglin area. The portion is good for one big eater. The achar wasn't fresh and they changed it.

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: As part of the Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore this worked well for as rather late evening arrival and lunc

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: Good value food we had four mains and was suggest we also get a extra veg and rice to share, this wasn't necessary as the main meals were quite large. The Ah Hoi's Combi is a must. Not sure if desert is on the menu it wasn't offered in any case. Open plan dinning onto the hotel pool, didn't appear to have good air cond, but it wasn't hot that night either.

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: There is a fixed menu, which means you don't know what you're getting. Since our group was very diverse, not everyone could eat everything that was served. Additionally, we had specified that we had 2 people who were allergic to shellfish on the trip and one person who needed Halal preparation and they either didn't get the message or forgot to accommodate.

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: I was not given the 10% CNY set lunch discount though it was stated in their website.  And also state in my reservation through Chope

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: If you would like to go back to traditional Chinese style cooking with no frills, this is a place to dine. Its menu offerings consist of a good and decent seafood fired rice.

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: It's a simple unassuming non aircon restaurant beside the pool at Hotel Jen Tangli

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
