Review: We dined at Ah Hoi's twice during our stay and enjoyed the food, particularly the wok fried vegetables (okra, petai, beans and eggplant) with dried shrimp and the kung po frog legs.

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: My wife has to have Gluten free food, the cheffs here double made sure all off my wife's food was Gluten free. The food is of excellent quality of a high standard with a great taste

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: I was here with a group of 12 with children -- I liked the sett

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: Given the weather in Singapore, it would have been more conducive if they improve the air conditioning especially during lunch time. Food is not bad though.

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: Keep your expectations moderate when dining here. Meals served on time for a group gathering. Try their home made stuff.

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: A nice restaurant situated by the pool in Jen hotel the fresh fish and crabs are delicious well worth a visit by day or night

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review:
I find that the style of service and food are more like Indonesian. They serve free flow keropok / crackers with sambal. 

We ordered kway tiaw, bun mantau with chili prawn, honey chicken and a coconut soup. 
All except the coconut soup are nice.

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: Ah Hoi's is next to the pool area at Jen Tanglin, very nice to hang out in the evening for a laid back dinner. Food is fantastic and service the same.

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: We did not wish to go outside our comfortable Jen Hotel, and found great food pool side in a pleasant setting..but this was not just pool food...an excellent ala carte menu and the food delicious and well presented.

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: Overall food not too bad especially the salted egg yolk crab. But service was slow. Recommendations by restaurant staff were good, thus enjoyed the food.

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review:
The buffet here is good value for money. Cheap and lots of variety....
Recommended if you want to try many local dishes...

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: We always visit Ah Hois Kitchen when we stop at Singapore and as usual we were not disappointed.The service was good and the food as usual was excellent. We shared the following. Chicken satay's, soft shell crab, ginger chicken, whole deep fried sea bass (which was so fresh), wok fried vegies and nasi goreng. We were happy to ring the bell on our way out.

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: We have heard great things about this restaurant from many folks and had high expectations...maybe too high? It wasn't as good as it was said to be. We went for the Singapore chili crab amongst the other Singapore fair but although the food was OK...on a value for money and taste I would say find another place to get your chili crab because it is overpriced for quality and taste you get. Ambience however is good from its roof top location next to Hotel Jen pool area.

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: I have eaten here on several occasions sometimes with business guests and out near the pool is a very pleasant atmosphere.

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: We were staying at the Jen Tangling Hotel, and this restaurant is on the 4th floor next to the hotel's swimming pool. We thought it would be a typical expensive hotel restaurant, but we were wrong! This place offers good food at reasonable price!

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: We ate here one night and the sweet and sour pork was delicious! It's great to be out by the pool with a cold drink and yummy food.

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: Was staying at a hotel down the road and happened to find this place by chance whilst in Tanglin Mall. Don't be put off by the fact that it's a hotel restaurant. If you are after some good 'home' cooked dishes with rice then try this place out. There's help yourself prawn crackers and iced water to get you started. All the dishes we ordered were excellent, especially the chicken satay. The bill was cheap too which was a surprise. Only downside is that it is open plan dining so without the aircon it can be a bit warm. Other than that good service and good food. Came on a Thursday night and it was half empty so food arrived quite quick.

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: True, good chinees cuisine. You will be able to see a lot of locals there which means that is is really good restaraunt. Good selection of real chineese dishes including seafood. Traditional round tables where you can move plates (again very traitional)

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: Large and unattractive as a place to eat.  We were told that the food was excellent but each time we were told that there was a lengthy wait for a table so we went elsewhere..

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: Waited very Long, close to 45 mins, for food to be served. Self service for water and condiment. Food is of acceptable standard but definitely not for foodies. The restaurant is located next to the pool and on the roof TOP. It was very hot, open door concept, be prepared to perspire.

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: Tried their 12-12 menu for a family lunch on a Sunday. The service was cold - things get done but without any warmth. Robotic. The 12-for-12 menu was not bad - warm - and portions were generous. Unfortunately, the restaurant was HOT! As in the temperature. Ventilation was just inadequate. Dinner will likely be better.

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: I hosted my daughter's birth announcement party for a 100 pax and booked the entire outdoor and indoor venue. The staff was absolutely fantastic! They catered to all my requirements and provided great service. Our guests loved the food and the experience. I would recommend the venue to anyone looking at hosting a family party or a corporate event.

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: We came in just as they were about to close the lunch hour but the staff was gracious enough to still serve us. The food is good but not too great and the service is great. Will recommend

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: Dinner here with a couple of friends on a Saturday evening, service was great, restaurant was busy and the food lovely. we had a selection of noodles, rice and finished off with their speciality of chilli crab. great value and a very enjoyable meal.

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: There is a wide selection of Chinese cuisine and the best part is sitting outside with a pool view drinking a cold beer.

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: We stayed in the adjoining hotel and had dinner at this restaurant, food was beautiful and fresh and every meal was enjoyed! Staff were more than accommodating and helpful, especially being we were traveling with 2 infants! Thank you for such a wonderful night...

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: The atmosphere was so so, and most of the food are also maybe just above average, but I give it 4 stars because the char kway teow is really really good. Coming from a local used to paying 1/3 the price for char kway teow, that's saying something!

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: I have stayed at the hotel for many years and finally tried the restaurant. My colleague and I had a sampler, with two different sides. The food was quite good. The service was nice. The price was quite reasonable as wel

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: Walked in for a late lunch. Restaurant is on 4th floor of Jen Tanglin Hotel; indoors but poolside. Extensive local style menu. Staff very helpful. Food absolutely delicious. Large fish tank!

Name: Ah Hoi's Kitchen
Location: 1A Cuscaden Road Hotel Jen Tanglin Singapore Level 4 , Pool Side, Singapore 249716 Singapore
Review: We got a lunch there and although the food was acceptable, we didn't really find anything to write good comment about. The service the place, the food, the environnement, everything is just average, not bad but definitely not great neither. it is probably The kind of place you go when you are staying at Jen hotel and lazy to go somewhere else.

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: Great peranakan food. Great service too. Staffs are very friendly. Will most definitely come back again.

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: Had a nice meal with the family - ambience was spacious and quiet, Elisia also helped to bring out the birthday cake! Would recommend for family meals!

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: Came to use the 1 for 1 chope voucher. Had the rendang chicken lasagne and cheeseburger. Asian twist to the lasagne was pretty good, substituting the usual tomato sauce with savoury rendang sauce. Could be better if there was more cheese. The cheese burger on the other hand was plain boring. A thick beef patty, cheese, lettuce tomato, onion. As the beef patty was well done, it came out more on the dry side which made it harder to stomach. This may be elevated if there was a sauce or better toppings on top of the burger. Slightly mixed experience foodwise but interest in other offerings on the menu may be what will bring me back again.

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: Great food and excellent service in a historical setting that’s part of an increasingly trendy part of town. Definitely worth a visit.

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: Great food & service! The beef rendang, char Siew rice bowl and crab cakes were amazi

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: Great ambience and service, food was just ok ... and cocktails/wines were a bit too pricy for the amount they charged.

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: Highly recommend Baba Chews- it’s our local go to for a romantic date night and great choice of food and wine!

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: Nice ambiance and quality food. Will be back again to try out different dishes. Good for small group gathering too.

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: Amazing place, great ambience, delicious food and fantastic service. Thanks Rosa for your prompt and ever smiling service and for making it an amazing experience for u

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: We decided to have lunch at Baba Chew's upon a friend's recommendation. We were greeted warmly by Elisha who remembered taking my reservation and eagerly advised us on their specials/popular dishes. We decided on yutiao otak, beef rendang, coffee pork ribs, rice and kueh durian. My friend had highly recommended the buah keluak but we didn't have the capacity to include the dish. Since I am not crazy over durian, I took a slither of the kueh durian to try - durian lovers would probably love the kueh durian as it was redolent with durian scent. We liked the food and ambience. Elisha and her colleagues very conscientiously but in a non invasive fashion cleared dishes as we finished and quietly refilled our cups with warm water. No one chased us and we were able to enjoy the ambience As the afternoon shifted to teatime, we ordered hot chocolate to round off a languorous Sunday. It is so wonderful to share an afternoon in a place where everyone is welcoming. Elisha's service was excellent- she is such a genuine and obliging person. We will definitely return

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: Worth Value for Mon

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: Very delicious food and friendly staff. We would like to thank Elisia and Annie for their warm assistance. Its definitely worth a visit!

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: My husband and I went back to Baba Chews for Christmas lunch and we was not disappointed lovely food with lots of choice and amazing service from the staff as always. The atmosphere was brilliant

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: First visit, it was a great experience. Cozy and warmth ambience. Excellent crew especially Elisa, with her bubbly personality! ;) Enjoyed the Peranakan Fusion food but I must say, the food is lukewarm while served. Chef is personal with good customer skills, spoke to us and we gave him a genuine feedback. Kudos! We’ll be back ...

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: My friends and I were here for our Christmas gathering dinner. Enjoyed the creative peranakan fusion food and most of all I love my customer experience here.

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: The food was awesome especially their beef rendang, chicken rendang and blackened fish and chips... adding on, thumbs up for Elisia’s service! Very friendly and chirpy, hypes up the mood! Kudos! Thank you!

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: Excellent food and service by Elisa, Christian, Annie and Venna!!! Will come back again for sure for the beef rendang and chilli crab pasta. Gula Melaka cake was to die for too and not too sweet!

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: Had an enjoyable time attended by our friendly waitress, Rosa. Will b back for more good Peranakan food!

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: 25 Stars in total so far. Since June, we have been there 5 times and each time it was a 5* experienc

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: Been a few times here now and each time the ambience is nice, food great with a mix of local fusion food and international, and the service is really superb. There is something for everyone here and well worth a try if you have not been. Reasonably priced too.

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: Nice place and nice fo

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: Very friendly and helpful service. Great environment for couples or friends to chitchat . Food  are good and very vegan friendly .

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: The ‘Kopi C’ Flavored BBQ Pork Spareribs was very good (will definitely recommend). Surprisingly good for meat that is coffee flavored, in fact. Even better than the food was the service. We were tended to by Rosa, who was simply amazing - so attentive, polite, and patient.

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: We had great food (kopic c ribs and pulled pork burger with wine and cocktails) and amazing service thanks to Ro

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: Excellent service! Friendly and engaging staff! Never expected engaging service such as to check if the steak is to our liking before proceeding to eat them. Going the extra mile to help us take pictures. Elisia was attending to us throughout our lunch session. So impressed by her energy and willing to share how she is coping in Singapore. Definitely a place that I would come back to as the service is superb. Very welcoming! Elisia is an asset to the company.

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: First visit to the restuarant. A pleasant surprise that the restuarant has a homely feel and with the warm and friendly service by Rosa,Christian & Elisia, we had a great time. The food is unique and tasty. We will be back to try the other dishes.

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: Good customer service, very friendly, elisia is approachable. I like the sweet potato fries. Chilli crab can use linguine instead of tagliatelle pasta

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: Great service and food. The ambience in the restaurant is good. Do give the pasta and pull pork burger a try.

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: Great place for celebration. Love the coffee ribs, it’s really tender and flavorful (not really the rojak slaw). The black pepper crayfish Horfan is also a winner.

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: Excellent peranakan food with a western twist. Ribs, both beef and pork, are excellent. Recommended.

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: The pork ribs were really succulent and flavourful. The chicken rendang lasagne was an interesting take on the traditional lasagne. Amazing food and great service (especially from Rosa)!

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: Recommended Rosa，Christian，Nick， Viena and Elicia are friendly staff☺️ Nice food，delicious and yummy

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: Love the menus whereby they offer modern Singaporean dishes with a fusion of Peranakan and Western cuisi

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: Baba Chew’s is located at one of our favourite areas in Singapore - Katong. It has a contemporary take on Peranakan food and is done well. Together with attentive and very responsive service staff, would definitely recommend!

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: I had a very enjoyable dinner at Baba Chews, the food was very nice and the staff were very polite and attentive to our needs.

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: Food was good, service was great :) Thank you to Christian, Viena and Rosa for making the night so special!

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: I live in the area, but I haven’t been here before - it’s in the old Joo Chiat police station building along the main strip across from the old shophouse

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: I really enjoyed my dinning experience there with my friends. Rosa, Christian and Nick are really professional and service orientated. I would like to especially point Rosa out as her outgoing and cheerful personality really make a huge difference. Keep up the good job everyone! =)

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: Thanks Rosa for your friendly servic

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: Enjoyed the food, service and ambience of the restaurant. Will definitely be back to try more dishes.

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: Love the ambience for a nice dinner coupled with wine to end the night. A good selection of wine and if you are unsure what to get, the friendly team there are very helpful with recommendations. Xmas deco brings the festive vibes to the restaurant too!

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: My girlfriend & I had a great lunch At Baba Chews today, we liked the atmosphere , Christmas decoration food and service !! We will definitely return back with friends . Keep it up you are doing a great job !!!

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: Just been here for breakfast this morning food was lovely and Elisia who served us was so friendly and welcoming had a great Christmas feeling about the place, we actually reserved table for their Christmas eve buffet, I recommend trying the food here. It also has A hygiene rating which is important to me.

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: We visited Katong this week and stopped at Baba Chews Restaurant for lunch. This is the best Modern Singaporean food in Katong. We were greeted by the staffs at the entrance, they gave us good recommendations on the menu. Restaurant shows case good selection of wine , and the Christmas decoration was superb, make us feel Christmas is around a corner... I would like to give compliment to Annie , Venna , Christian for taking care of us and looking forward for next visit to celebrate Christmas at Baba Chews .

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: Had dinner with my friends and we enjoyed ourselves! Friendly staffs with excellent service! Chicken Rendang Lasagne, Kopi C Pork Spareribs and Chendol are my favourites! Will definitely visit again!

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: I love their food n services. I was attended by services staff Elisia, Rosa & Venna. They are polite n helpful whenever I need help. Well recommend by them of the foods. I will go there again although is a far distance from my home

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: Excellent service! Staff will take them out of their busy schedule to engage with you. Very polite and jovial. I particularly like their kopi Tarik.

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: Love the menu selection in this restaurant. The staff here are friendly and smile always. Their beef rendang and Kopi C pork ribs is a must try items!

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: Love the burger! The brioche buns are well toasted and really buttery! And the bottom bun wasn't soggy! Generous amount of flavourful pulled pork and caramelised onio

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: Having dinner and chill out with friend. Excellent service especially to Christian and Alisa, nice food and good enviroment. Definitely will visit again.

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: Venna and Rosa are very friendly and warm in customer service ! Extremely helpful and ensured that we are comfortable and our food was well serv

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: The service was great!! The pulled pork burger and chendol was really good! The ambience and decor of the place is also really nice. The staff was super friendly.

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: Food and service was great. Annie and Christian served us with great attitude. Loved the beef rendang with rice, will definitely be back for more!

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: Enjoy our dinner at BABACHEWS. Thumb up for excellent service especially Ms. Rosa and Venna. Keep it up.

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: Workers are motivated whenever someone else see their work as being important to the company. I would like to specially compliment your manager Ms Annie on how she leads the team. She has good leadership in handling her staff, set good example to the rest with her professional service towards customer. Having her in the team makes a huge difference. Another staff I also grateful his name is Christian very prompt service, attentive throughout our dining. Good job team. Excellent.

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: Had a lovely dinner for 2 here. Ordered a few entrees and an appetizer. The kopi c ribs were delicious. Unique fusion dishes that bring Peranakan culture forward to Western palates in a tasteful and authentic w

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: Rosa was absolutely delightful, friendly & helpful! The food was amazing & ambience was great. Would definitely come back!

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: Chicken rendang lasagne was fantastic. Nyonya fried rice and chilli crab pasta were very delicious as well. We visited when there was a 1-for-1 so it was very worth it.

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: This is the many times I visited Baba Chew’s , each time I’m there I must say the service is super excellent, all of the server are professional and attentive. The atmosphere were so welcoming like returning to a familiar place again. I must compliment the restaurant manager, Ms Annie for being so accommodating to our needs and request. She makes the night dinning there so relaxing and enjoyable. Thanks! I will definitely keep returning till I’ve tried everything on the menu.

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: I came here for an event on one weekend and brought my family back the next day; that was how impressed I was with the service and fo

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: Highly Recommende

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: When we arrived for Sunday brunch we were greated by a few tables that had not been cleared from half finished meals. These tables were only cleared an hour later. The only two staff around did their best, but obviously grossly understaffed. None of the five main courses we ordered were memorable, very ordinary, and the wait from the kitchen was long. The last two dishes were served 10-15 minutes after the first. Huge selection of spirits in the bar, but half of the displayed bottles were empty. Not recommended.

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: Unique dishes that combines western cuisine with Peranakan cooking style, cozy ambiance and friendly staffs, this is definitely a place that I will visit again!

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: Delicious Peranakan inspired foo

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: Great food and ambiance - really like the otah on a black bun. Wide variety of dishes to choose from local and western and a mix of both.

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: Living in the eastern part of the island, the cuisine of choice is Peranakan. In fact, there are a number of eateries around the East Coast area that can lay claim to serving this wonderful cuisin

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: I’d lived in the area around East Coast for almost 2 years before I visited Baba Chew’s and I wish I’d been earlier! In the midst of lots of current changes and upgrades to this area, Baba Chew’s is a little food and ambiance oasis in the midst of it all. The food is great, the service friendly and the staff very accommodating. I was back a second time very quickly after my first visit.

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: Beautiful classic Singapore setting for lunch, dinner, or a celebration. Some might say Peranakan is the original fusion culture, and this would be a great place to experience both more traditional and modern interpretations. Restaurant staff is friendly and more than happy to explain. The (more traditional) char siu rice bowl hit the spot, including a surprising hint of lemon grass in the beautifully flavoured rice. An absolute must-try!

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: Dined here with some friends. Food was good. We had the vegetarian friendly char kway teow and arrabiata linguine. Our friend had a chicken satay, salad and salmon for the main course. Good ambience and fantastic service! Especially from Rosa, whose cheerfulness proved to be infectious. I have never met a happier staff at a restaurant. See you again!

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: Lovely surroundings, very different from the heritage part of Katong. Food is also different from traditional peranakan fare. The Ayam buah kulak and beef rendang were good. Duck soup was disappointing. Durian kueh was a surprisingly good “fusion” dessert. Quite pricey though.

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: Stay at Hotel Indigo Katong so the obvious choice was to dine at Baba Chews since it is attached to the property. We had our breakfast and dinner ther

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: Local dishes in a friendly and nicely decorated setting. Service good. Prices moderate. Otah in charcoal bun really worth having. Very tasty crab soup. Good beef rendang. Lots of choice.

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: Classic little place with authentic local delights of the recent past / old Singapo

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: We stayed at the Hotel Indigo and this was our default venue for breakfa

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: This was a family meal almost perfect but spoiled by some poor service. The food was delicious and well presented. Shared starters of fish dishes and main courses of salmon and ribs. Almost perfect apart from the staff bringing the main course before the starters were finished and removing the plates. Generally the staff were good but this simple action spoiled my enjoyment

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: Food was good but service level was appalling. We have been to this restaurant a few times and don’t remember the service level being this poor. Could have been because we were using Chope 1-1 Mains voucher. The waitress had a constant scowl on her face every time she served us. Make the whole visit rather unpleasant despite the good quality of the food.

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: The chili crab cake priced at $15 for 3 pieces was an epic fail. Tasted like reheated processed food bought from some supermarke

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: Generally love the restaurant, the food selection is pretty interesting fusion. Service is top notch and environment is very nice.

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: The serene setting, friendly and attentive staff and great food makes the eatery a place any visitor to Katong may wish to drop by for a taste of Peranakan food. However, the place may not be very suitable for wheelchair users and the menu may be a little limited. Otherwise, it is still a must try for first-time visitors.

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: We went with some friends for a brunch, the peranakan dishes were very good.Some of my friends were less amazed with their occidental dishes (steak sandwich for example). The place is very nice, staff friendly.

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: Decided to patronise the restaurant for the first time after reading online reviews; was intended to be a celebratory occasion. The place is easy to locate and there is ample parking nearby. Not very public transport-friendly thou

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: Attended a wedding tea reception Hee and was impressed with the quality of food and the excellent, efficient , smiley staff. The restaurant has a great ambience with delicious food.

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: This resturant sells quality Peranakan food! It has a touch of fusion with Western cooking and also sells burgers too! Tried the Ayam Buah Keluak dish and was most impressed. The beef rendang was tender and nice too. The chap chai mixed vegetables a little too salty for me though. Ambience is nice and quiet, service is prompt though it does take longer time for food to come. I will come back to try other dishes too.

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: Got caught in a thunderstorm on our night in Singapore so decided we weren’t going to go out to a restaurant with being shattered and ready to get up early to travel home. Ordered baba chews room service through the room telephone and received a call from reception about 20 minutes later so say that the order was ready to colle

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: Baba Chews is linked to Hotel Indigo and is the easy option for breakfast and main mea

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: It would be easy to be put off by the menu which adds several Western dishes to the staple of local and Peranakan fare. There's a strong potential to end up excelling at neither. But everything is done well and being able to offer pasta to my picky son is a boon. We started with kueh pie tee which was presented well and tasty. Then had beef rending, ayam buah keluak and a lovely salmon in laksa sauce. All were some of the best Peranakan I've tasted.

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: Menu looked interesting but the execution was very sadly lacking. Way too much chilli; possibly to disguise the lack of other flavours.

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: A unique culinary experience in Singapore. I prett much stumbled into this gem. A shout out to Chef Alvin Leong for a quick lesson to the ingredients and to Marivel who keeps us comfortable.

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: The dinner menu selection is varied compared to many in-house restaurants; staff is very attentive and friendly. I would recommend to others

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: Every single dish we ordered was worth it! The Assam Fish and Soft Shell Crab Pasta has well cooked seafood completely without any strong fishy taste. The chicken satay has a nice char and Smokey taste and the peanut sauce had a lovely texture and just the right amount of spice. The otak buns were unique and a must-try! End off with their special chendol which has popcorn bits - absolutely yum!

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: We didn't go for nice cuts of Aussie beef. We wanted to test the Nyonya muscles of the restaura

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: We were there on Sat 6 jul, ordered their tiramisu ($12) and boozy chocolate mousse ($12) both tasted terrible. Barely any chocolate taste for the chocolate mousse.. it’s like we eating 2 big scoops of cream. And the tiramisu is the worst I’ve ever tasted.. the expresso in the cake tasted kind of weird too. You can get better desserts from coffee bean and tea leaves or even Mac Donald

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: Visited for the 3rd time since since middle of 2018. The food is great! Staff are friendly and ambience is great (maybe a bit dark). Only reason I have not visited more often is cause it’s a bit pricey. But well worth a visit for that special occasion.

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: Baba Chews is a standard chain style restaurant with Asian/Singapore food. Service was fast, food nice and prices reasonable. The wine list was woeful but unsurprising in Singapore.

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: Nice ambience, friendly staff. Will go back for the Chicken Rendang Lasagne and Chilli Crab Tagliatelle - the latter has a great spicy kick. For lovers of spice, you might want to up it a notch though.

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: I visited the restaurant on 6 Apr at 11am and no water was served to me even after being seated for close to 20minutes. Restaurant was empty with only one other occupied table but the service was lacklustred. Food was cold when served and overly pricey. It was such a disappointing experience as compared to my first visit back in 2017.

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: Service - TOP NOTCH - the serving staff are fabulous. They were attentive, prompt to rectify the issue with the shaky table, courteous

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: Highly recommend Chicken Rendang Lasagna, It was recommended by Annie and we trust her taste to recommend us such a wonderful dish, excellent service , follow by chendol, first time we use chopsticks for chendol, it was fun. overall our dinner was nice, good ambience, we will visit again .

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: The XO Pork Belly Char Siew Rice was not ready when we placed our ord

Name: Baba Chews Bar and Eatery
Location: 86 E East Coast Road Katong Square Katong Square, Singapore 428788 Singapore
Review: My BIZ partner recommended this place with Nonya COOKING. Unfortunately COOKING was bland and need belachan to make it somewhat tasty! Prices are very high ( SD127 for 2 for lunch INCLUDING SD30 corkage for half bottle of wine ). Totally pointless place and NOT recommended...

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: In this covid climate you want to make your outings worthwhile when you finally catch up with mat

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: We booked for New Years Eve and had heard wonderful things about the food etc. Luckily the food is delicious as the service is atrocious, food coming at all different times and I had finished my main course before my husbands pizza had even arrived! Complained and the pizza was deducted from the bill and free drinks were offered, but I am afraid the experience had been ruined! The Italian running the restaurant should know that food should be served together or not at all! Unless they increase their staff will not go back

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: They have charcoal and woodfire oven, must try, and so we did. I have to agree the Pizza Capricciosa has a wow factor, very delicious and crispy while hot $25. The Iberico Pork on the other hand while cooked right is kinda hard, hence chewy. At $39 for slightly more than a 100gm, would expect it to be tender. Taste ok though.

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: Cugini’s new location in quaint Joo Chiat Place is a magnet for Italophiles in the East and beyond! Book early! The “ cousins” and Team are still tops! My favourites are still - pizza; truffle ravioli; squid ink pasta ( so fresh); grilled lamb chops; chocolate lava cake; and the wines...

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: Been here since more than 10 years ago, everytime the food is awesome. Authentic Italian cuisine, with a touch of richness in each serving.

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: We were a table of 6 people, and while we all liked our food, each dish came out about 20 minutes apart. I got my pizza first, (NY style and pretty good!), but by the time the last dish came out, almost 2 hours had gone by. We ordered everything at the same time, and it's not like the food is family style so we could share. We all ate at different times. Even the water and our drinks took over 30 minut

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: We were a party of four and all of us enjoyed our meals, all delicious and served by friendly staff who made us welcome. We started outside but with threatening weather the managed to fit us inside where we could see the kitchen in operation.

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: We dined on a Saturday night and patronage was poor. The food was good but fully priced. The main complaint was the gouging on the wine. Paid $S69 for a very average Australian Sauvignon Blanc which we had not heard of (there were no options) but which I have subsequently learnt sells for $A10 in Australia. One of the owners is stated to be a qualified sommelier and if so he should be ashamed to be selling this wine at this price. If we ever go back we will be won't be drinking. Waiters were efficient but too eager to keep pouring drinks (assumably so we would order more)

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: Nice Italian in the popular Club Stret area of Singapore. Friendly attentive staff, but could do with a bit of coaching on who to serve first and how not to pour wine across the front of the person next to you ( if you see what I mean). Good choice of pasta and pizza dishes, nicely cooked and presented. The meat platter for starters was excelle

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: My husband and i are avid lovers of Italian food and all I can say is that Cugini offers authentic flavours of the cuisin

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: Second time we visited and the pizzas are just great! Have not tried any other dishes but if you love pizza this is the place in Singapore

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: We went on a Sunday and Club Street was dead, which should have told us something already, but since we were there and we only wanted a quick bite, we thought we'd try this restaurant, Maybe the chief chef was off duty? Anyway, expensive food for very, very average cooking. Expensive everything, but it would be, this being Club Street. Don't think we'll be back.

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: Seriously! Best carbonara in Singapore. Absolutely NO cream! Done the Roman / Italian way. Guanciale (Cured pork cheek), eggs, parmesan and black pepper! Totallly reminisce my time in Italy! Extremely authentic and wonderful!

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: The food was fine not something special but the ambient is nice and also the service.  The price was a bit high comparing with the quality of the food. anyway, we quite enjoying our time there.

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: I had a business dinner at Cugini's with a colleagu

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: Shocking. We had some work in the city after which we decided to dine out and headed to Club Street Singapore known for its bars and Restaurants. The place was not busy. we took a table outside. We looked at the wine list and we ordered a glass of wine to begin with. The waiter brought us the wine but the wine had turned to vinegar in Singapores heat as the wine was not stored properly. We complained and they opened a new bottle and brought each a glass of wine. Meanwhile a lady ( maybe the owner) came and dragged a chair which made a terrible noise from our table without even having the courtesy to ask us. Needless to say the food was terrible. Next came another customer with his beautiful wife who sat on the table next to us. we were shocked to see that the spoilt wine which we rejected was served to them. They looked disappointed but did not say anything. The attitude of the owner was shocking

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: It’s located in Chinatown, with a lot of competitors, as Italian food is rather popular in Singapore. I just had a simple pizza, therefore I can’t elaborate much, but staff was attentive, place clean, service quick, and my pizza good enoug

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review:
My friend recommended this highly so we both went there 
Very good pizza and excellent wine menu 
Cosy with friendly staff 
Will be back

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: Italian owned trattoria with Italian chef serving you authentic true blue italian food. i came here with my girlfriends for a birthday dinner and am totally in love with the burrata cheese, the bottarga pasta (al dente), the squid ink pasta, vongole pasta and the tomato based seafood pasta. the desserts after including panna cotta (white chocolate based with berries) is so addictive and the tiramisu that came with the hippy birthday song was so appreciated. thank you for making our birthday day a special nigh

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: Theyre open on Mondays!  after work. Had a huge serving of the grilled chicken “polleto” and cheese and ham platter. Their complimentary bread selection is fresh as always. And still the only and best bottarga in Singapore. Special dessert ricotta mousse is good too.

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: Had a little dinner here. Somewhat expensive but, yeah, that's Singapore. The food and service are good.

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: Visited twice, for pizza, pasta and risotto. Very nice food, highly recommended. PS: Try the white chocolate panna cotta. Only negative remark: its too small!

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: Very Good Italian Food, if not The best in Spore, for its price. The ambience is very cozy and mediterranean. We started with a large serving of fresh burrata cheese. Really good. Then ravioli for mains and sharing as suggested. IT IS THEEEE BEST! Flavorful! We also had pizza and homemade gelato. We will definitely comeback for the ravioli!

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: If you like Italian food, with more than a hint of Italian feel about the place, then Cugini is somewhere to head for. In the middle of Club Street, it's the perfect location to experience the hustle and bustle of Singapore's bar and restaurant scene. The white and blue decor also adds a nod to the Mediterranean, with only the crystal blue waters missing as you sit outside on the deck whilst you sample a wide variety of Italian dishes. Service is excellent, which is by no means a given in these parts, and prices are on the sensible not silly side. Good selection of wines too if you happen to be eating on a company expense account.

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: This certainly seemed the most popular restaurant in Club St for a Sunday night so we went in as it was a nice atmosphere. Food was ok, but small portions and really expensive for what it was. Calamari was slightly on the rubbery side but bruschetta was delicious. Pasta was al dente and again small, expensive portions. Staff are attentive at start and friendly, but as the restaurant got busier it was a bit of an effort to grab their attention. If you are happy pay high prices for Italian then go for it but it's unlikely we would return here.

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: On a steamy tropical Sunday night, when many restaurants and bars are closed, Cugini was open on Club St doing a decent tra

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: We were looking for open restaurant around CBD and ended up at Club street.. luckily this resto was open and it was just amazin

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: After loading up on happy hour wine and fries my friend and I needed some food. We ended up at this place. My friend’s pasta was good. I took the Parma ham and melon which tasted great, but as long as good ingredients that one is easy to do

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: We were back to exploring Ann Siang and Club St on a Sunday evening after our last outing to this area on National Day 2017 where we tried the food at Jerry's B

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: i end up at the Cugini necause i was in Chinatown and the atmosphere looks like so n

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: We stumbled upon Club Street on our final night in Singapore. It was a Sunday evening and as such, many restaurants and bars were closed. Cuginis however was open for business. We really enjoyed the beautifully prepared food especially the Bruschetta which although a simple starter was delicious. The food, wine and the balsamic vinegar of great quality. We are just disappointed we didn't get the chance to visit Club Street on a busy night- it has a different feel to China town and has a diverse range of bars and eateries. Recommend to the Brit tourists.

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: Well, I know Singapore is an expensive city especially on entertainment and fine dining side but here the bill impressed me.

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: Our last family dinner in Singapore after staying 10 nights was at Cugini Trattoria and Pizzeria, and it was a lovely dinner that we all enjoyed. My husband, myself and our two teenage sons stayed 2 nights at the nearby The Club Hotel and we were craving familiar non-spicy food. Cugini is located at 87 Club Street, a narrow street filled with restaurants and bars. There are a few tables outside but we chose to dine inside in air conditioned comfort. We loved the white and sea blue decor, it felt very comfortable and relaxing. We really enjoyed our meals - authentic Italian pizzas, handmade Truffle & potato Ravioli, and Squid Fettucini. We couldn't resist dessert - two Panna Cottas and a Chocolate Lava dessert. Service was quietly efficient. Whilst not a cheap dinner out, we thoroughly enjoyed it and I would most definitely recommend Cugini for a memorable Italian meal.

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: Took 10 work colleagues here and we had a great evening. This is a simple authentic Italian restaurant, nice friendly staff and an approachable appealing menu, full of lots of dishes you actually would enjoy eating. The pizza is terrific. A word of warning: the food is delicious and reasonable, but the wine is diabolically expensive

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: Well, that wasn't pleasant. You know, I sometimes look at back at my Tripadvisor reviews and think I err too much on the side of caution when reviewing restaurants, but this place has allowed me to be very candi

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: It's a lovely place, characterful and attention to details. We had the Spaghetto Bottarga (mullet roe, prawns, olive oil, garlic, chili) which was delicious! Great service, ambient and music in the background  - highly recommended!

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: Urgh! Handmade fetuccini that tasted like cardboard. And served the colder side of lukewarm. No excuse!! I was the only patron in the entire place. No fault of the wait staff, who were attentive and very pleasant. The only other saving grace, the white wine was go

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: My wife and I came on a weekday night and the place wasn't busy. I ordered the seafood risotto and it was excellent. The seafood was fresh and flavours were good. My wife had pizza, thin and crispy. Nice!

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: Had a lovely dinner with my girlfriends on a friday night. Felt like we were transported to Santorini or something. What amaze me is the evening dinner service. Love the pizza and will remember  to come back for more.

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: Found this little gem with a colleague looking for quaint relaxation and vegetarian cuisine  options.  Lovely, unhurried service and an excellent meal.

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: The highlight of my experience here is the unique taste of the Vongole. Best i've had in Singapore, where a lot of restaurants do an average job with the dish. The clams are already lifted out of the shells, so it saves you the hassle of peeling them out yourself. This doesn't compromise on the flavou

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: Cugini has a wide and varied menu of both classics and slightly unusual dishes. An antipasto starter for 2 was generous and offered a few different types of ham and salami, olives and roasted vegetables, and all were goo

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: Went here on a Thursday. Club Street was very busy but this place was not too crowded. Enough people to have atmosphere, but not heaving like a lot of places. Has a couple of tables outside, and a nice bright interior. Rustic furniture - blue and white, almost like Provence (although this is an Italian). I had a pizza, which seemed to have been fire cooked and was tasty. Just a couple of types of beer, but a reasonable wine lis

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: We had dinner with friends here on a weekend evening. The food was OK but without any real wow factor and portions were definitely on the small side. We experienced good service and there was a good selection on the menu for vegetarians. Reliable choice for Italian food while in Singapore.

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: Looking for somewhere to dine on a Sunday in Singapore but without it involving a w

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: Honestly, Singapore is bereft of good, authentic Italian pizza. There is a lot of misunderstanding here of what a pizza actually i

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: I have a friend who loves food and swears that the carbonara here is the best in Singapore, if not the world. We opened with calamari, deepfried and crisp, along with the standard burrata on a bed of cherry tomatoes. Both staples were solid and well done. He went for the spaghetti for his main, I opted for the pizza rucola e parma, which was very tasty with a thin and light base, fluffy around the edges. Delicio

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: The restaurant has a rather interesting setup with an Italian atmosphere. I would believe that the taste of the food would be the same. Well reality was a bit different. Rather average taste, small portions and very overpriced. The neighborhood is quite nice and worth walking around but i would not pick the same place again for dinner

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: Got there by chance (and hungry !!) and didn't regret it !! Tried pasta AND pizza and felt like in a real, local pizzeria/trattoria in Italy ! Very nice staff and of course as in Italy very family friendly !!

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: Food quality was ok, but the amount does not fill my 2-year old son. We ended up paying $77 for 5 ravioli pieces, 1 small plate of spaghetti and 1 Coke. Insane!

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: Located at Club street, at walking distance from China Town (which is actually very much overrated). Club street is a very nice street and Cugini's is a very friendly place with surprising good food (great truffle ravioli) and winelist.

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: If you really crave Italian food, that's the option on this street. But you have so much more choices...

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review:
Ok italian Food with a friendly service , a little on the expensive side but good.
We had Pizza and a tomato / Mozzarella salad . I do not think that they have Italian imported products but still good.

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: Came highly recommend by a friend. Was not disappointed at a

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: Went to Cugini's with five colleagues. Drinks arrived fairly quickly, but the food took awhile to come, and my order of a Pacchero Pesto Genovese did not arrive at all. We informed the wait staff twice (one of whom looked like possibly the manager), but all we were told was that they will check on it. By the time I was informed that the dish was being prepared, the rest of my colleagues had already finished their meals, so I told the waiter/manager to cancel the order. No apology or service recovery was made and they still attempted to include the dish on our bill. A pretty disappointing level of service for a seemingly established restaurant.

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: We were here in a group of 6 this evening & ordered pretty standard pizzas, pastas and a risotto. My partner's pesto pasta never arrived, and it took us several attempts to wave a wait staff down, who said she'd check but never came back to u

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: Went there with friends Sat night. Location is amazing and tables outside are on the stre

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: I was staying in Singapore for the weekend in the CBD, on the edge of Far East Square. I now know that the very many restaurants there don't open on Sundays. I wandered around looking for a place to eat a late lunch. I had spent over a week on business in Thailand, Malaysia and Singapore and, while I love Asian food, I needed a European break. I was walking down Club Street looking for some specific restaurants based on a TripAdvisor search. The ones in question were closed but I came upon what appeared to be a very appealing Italian - Cugini - with nice tables outside. Being from Ireland, eating outside is a novelty and essential when the weather allow

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: A warm summer's night found myself and friend on Club St. One of the few restaurants open on a Sunday was Cugini's, a very laid back and chic Itali

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: We had a dinner on sunday. We ordered one salad to share and one pasta each. We waited over an hour for pasta, when we checked one of waitress(guessing supervisor or someone who in-charge) i told her we're waiting for so long time and she just ignored and passed by. Taste was terrible too, the pasta was line a rubber band and some more It was not a reasonable price too, it was just terrible meal ever in singapore.

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: This was our default Italian restaurant and we came here every time we craved some comfort food! I personally loved their house red - a Chianti - as well as their pizzas, pastas and starters. Never really got around to trying their main

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: The restaurant has a lovely feel at the outside tables with blue and white chairs. We sat 5 minutes before opening time and the staff refused to serve us. When we did get service we had some delicious bread, a pizza and the lobster and apple risotto - interesting but not a lot of lobster. An easy meal after work but I probably wouldn't come back

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: Came here to celebrate family member's birthday. We ordered mozzarella, vegetarian pizza and linguine vongole. Mozzarella - stingy on basil and tomatoes, in fact, no basil at all though it says basil on the menu. Pizza - was good size for 2 pax, fresh and authentic dough, love the crust. Vongole - tiny portion with very little clams, but perfectly al dente (like this very much), a little too salty. Surprise birthday song was nice, they turned off the lights and put on the birthday song, though the staff team didn't look too enthusiastic about it. Wines were $16/glass. Relatively good selection of Italian wines. Nevertheless, it's a chill hangout dinner spot before pub-hopping the street.

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: Ordered black angus beef that's absolutely delicious. My friend helped to order red wine for all of us that's also perfectly compliment my me

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: Good location & atmosphere, attentive staff, and above average food, as are the prices. Would I go again? Yes.

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: I was forced to go there again as I was invited. But I was still hopeful for a better experience a couple of years after my last one. After all, they must've improved to stay open that long, you would think? Wrong! This place is terrible! Horrible food and horrible servic

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: Went there for pizza as we were passing by. Atmosphere is very welcoming and charming. Pizzas were ok only, nothing special for the high price ( close to 30 dollars). Will I ever go back: no as really nothing special!

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: We went to Club Street on Friday night around 10pm... it was busy. reminded me of a 'high class' lan kai fon

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review:
I go there for their fried calamari and burrata! A pure delight!
Their pizzas are not the best you will try in Singapore, but they are decent.
Service is good, the staff is kind and attentive.

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review:
It was Ok, if not a little expensive, but enjoyable food.  A glass of wine was small and very expensive. 
Nice surroundings.  Service was OK, but felt a bit rushed, despite the restaurant being nearly empty.

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: calamari fritti: very little dough, minimally fried - a pleasure to

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: Landed there by coincidence last night. The atmosphere brought back so many Italian memories! Family owned and run, kitchen smell in the main room, decoration a bit outdated etc... Service was friendly and we found the food very tasty and authentic.

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: We are regular guests of this Italian restaurant in Club Stre

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: We were visiting Singapore from Tokyo. Spent a few days around the most popular attractio

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: We were a group of six friends, after a very hot afternoon playing football. We were in need of plenty of carbohydrates (and beers) to regain some ener

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: We are not sure if the food is any good because we walked out after an hour. The staff were rude and neglected us. Such a shame, the venue is good. The staff regularly claimed they were "busy". They weren't. We could see 5 empty tables and the big tables weren't overly full. The staff were just rude and incompetent. It was also obvious they were used to complaints. They were not surprised when we walked out after waiting over an hour for our meals. Avoid and go anywhere else.

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: We found this Italian Trattoria more by coincidence on a Sunday evening as one of the only restaurants open in Club Str. The choice of food was good. Very good super fresh burrata and excellent carpaccio. we had pasta and pizza and all was very tasty and came timely served. Good choice of wine. bit pricy, but most probably average for Club street.

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: First off, i find all the dishes a bit too pricey especially for the quality of dishes served. I genuinely believe I make better pasta than them. The servings were small and none of the dishes ordered were memorable. Ordered a squid ink pasta, a seafood risotto, a seafood marinara, 2 miso fritto, a mozzarella, a chocolate soufflé that looks more like a lava cake than soufflé, one bottle of sparkling wine & 1 bottle of red wine. All the food items weren't impressive but the chilean red wine was good though. Service was not that great, being server was not too happy to explain when we asked why the soufflé looks like a lava cake. Anyways, not worth visiting. Will not return for sure.

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: it's not the first time I've been to this place. I've been here many months before and was greatly impressed by the quality and authenticity of Italian food. on recent visits, the pasta is still done al dente, exactly the way I like it to be; but don't bet on the portion size as it has shrunk terribly and their ingredients are just lacking or just missing from the plate. for the price you way, you should be expecting a lot mor

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: We had pizzas and 1 bottle of wine plus water, shared desert. Total was approx 40€ each but my pizza was quite overcooked so that the lateral crust was not edible as black and too hard. The desert is ridicoulous as for approx 9€ you get a superminimal desert which will never satisfy your idea. Don't buy it. My friend pizza was ok. The wine at 40€ entry level was good. Atmosphere and staff nice.

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: We were staying close by and looking for a lunch sp

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: Just don't go! U have to wait 1 hour for your meal and it's not even to the standard! Expensive meal and sucks! All sucks! Pasta was cold and cheated in clams! ordered clams pasta and believe me I picked out 20 empty shells out of my plate of cold pasta. Price wise do expensive really not worthy. Not all but I must say one particular one is do rude! Hello,,, we are not eating for free here We are actually paying and plus 17% on top of price list as well! Never ever are we going to go there again.

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: I went to Cugini for dinner with my Dad and my husband, all three of us LOVED i

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: Great for veggies and meat lovers alike. Love the desserts - the chocolate lava cake and the Sicilian pastries are beautiful. Good pasta, I have never had a bad meal here. Authentic, delicious.

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: We have enjoyed their pizzas for a while now ... always ordering as a take away. Recently, we decided to try the restaurant itsel

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: Completely average. Service was attentive but not warm and friendly. Food was mediocre and the pasta portions are small. Overpriced and don't forget to add on the service charge (what service) and GsT.

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: First the good news: .The pizzas although expensive are well made and taste authentic.At lunchtime it seems there is more attention paid to decorating,folding napkins or haulin sacks of stuff around the place.Customers seem to be a nuisance and are treated as such.The wine list proved inaccurate with wrong vintages brazenly offered.Pizzas ok at25 dollars each!I wonder what they open at all at lunchtime.

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: Avendo mangiato solo la pizza non posso giudicare il resto (per il momento) ma posso affermare con decisione che era ottima. I proprietari sono italiani e tutti i prodotti sono autentic

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: This was my first experience eating in an authentic Italian pizzeria and I loved it. Located on the chic Ann Siang hill's Club Street, this joint has an elegant, lively ambience. The staff were gracious enough to allow me to watch the Italian chefs at work and even allowed me to take pictures. The vegetarian pizzas and lasagna we ordered were delicious. They also have an excellent wine collection. The restaurant is a little bit on the pricier side but all in all good value for money.

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: Having been here for dinner a few times, it was rather surprising to read about the negative experiences by our fellow reviewers here on TripAdviso

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: Really good authentic pasta. Asian tastes probably prefer it softer, but the al dente style is much more authen

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: The location in Singapore's lively Club Street near Chinatown is great, the decor of the restaurant lovely and the pizza really good. It is not cheap, but given the location that is to be expected. The problem of this restaurant is...their service. In general the staff does not come across as friendly or service-oriented. Hardly any smiles. If you are coming with a big group and you want to pay separately, this seems to be a problem. This place could be great if the service was better. Would I go back? Probably not. There are better options for Italian restaurants in Singapore.

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: First time I've ever given a bad review on Trip Advisor, but I want to warn people away from this pla

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: Last weekend, a large group of friends and I went to Cugini's to celebrate a girlfriend's birthday. We had a fantastic time! The staff was extremely helpful while we adjusted the reservation (about 100 times as people joined/unjoined the party). And the restaurant itself is super cute and super conveniently located on Club Street so it was easy for us to organize things before/after in the area. The best part for us was how attentive the staff was! They were excellent! And, in addition to that, the food was gre

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: I'm writing this review having visited this establishment without having previously read any of the reviews on here which paint a picture of average food and poor service. We were taken by friends on a Saturday night at the busiest time (9.00pm) and had a storming pizza with drinks and coffees to finish. Cost us $175 per couple with food, 2 beers and bottles of prosecco and pinot noir. Pizzas were great, fresh, hot and the wait was fine for a homemade pizza. Service was attentive and not as previously recorded. Maybe they have a new waiting team ? Atmosphere was good and we will go again.

Name: Cugini's
Location: 87 Club Street, Singapore 069455 Singapore
Review: When I studied in Melbourne, one of my favorite pasta is penne amatriciana. Was searching for years back in Kuala Lumpur and Singapore until I found Cugini's. So here is where I go to satisfy my craving. Love the vegetable soup as well. Whenever, I go back, I always order the same thing because this is so good (for me) that trying new things is just going downhill.

Name: Cugini's
