No one ask if you want to drink something els when the glasses are empty for 30 mins 
No one reacts when you talk to them

Name: RENNthai
Location: 3D, River Valley Road #01-05, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: I visited this restaurant for dinner. It is right next to the river in Clarke Quay. They weren't very crowd

Name: RENNthai
Location: 3D, River Valley Road #01-05, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Had a Nice Dinner with my wife, friendly and helpfull staff. Had a Nice Table right next to  the river.

Name: RENNthai
Location: 3D, River Valley Road #01-05, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review:
I had a lovely dinner at rennthai with my family .
They black pepper crab is amazing and delicious. I highly recommend it.
Our dining experience is good we have been serve nicely by rachelle and Anna.
Thank you so much for awesome service!

Name: RENNthai
Location: 3D, River Valley Road #01-05, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: The restaurant staff is awesome! We ate late night of Saturday but they are still happy and energetic... padthai tastes authentic and the prawn with cereals are really big... be back here... thanks to rachelle and anna...

Name: RENNthai
Location: 3D, River Valley Road #01-05, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Food was served in less than 10 mins. Staff are very attentive especially Rachelle and Anna. Very accommodating. Food serving and taste are okay. And the view is superb. Will come again.

Name: RENNthai
Location: 3D, River Valley Road #01-05, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Its a perfect place to have quality time with your family . this restaurant have a nice view and nice waiters

Name: RENNthai
Location: 3D, River Valley Road #01-05, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: One of the best Thai meals I have ever had. Putting aside the nice view and Atmosphere along the Singapore River. The restaurant also has a good team of staff to look after you. Nevertheless it is the food that really stands o

Name: RENNthai
Location: 3D, River Valley Road #01-05, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Truly a dining worth recommending....... great food and great service with a smile from Anna. Highly recommended and worth coming back for more. Just along Clarke Quay..... dining with a view. 😎👌

Name: RENNthai
Location: 3D, River Valley Road #01-05, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: This was the final dinner of our holiday before we set off on our different journeys home. We were drawn to the Clarke Quay area which we had used several times over the past week. We walked around looking at menus and talking to staff from the various restaurants before deciding on the Renn Thai. It was busy and we were unable to get a table overlooking the water (if you want a a particular table you need to reserve it). However we were happy with the table assigned to

Name: RENNthai
Location: 3D, River Valley Road #01-05, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Returned after 2 years to enjoy another meal of Red Curry Duck and BBQ King Prawns with shredded green papaya Salad.  Very enjoyable but quite expensive for three prawns.

Name: RENNthai
Location: 3D, River Valley Road #01-05, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Not enough food for a meal that costs $24 , low quality and way too spicy. The waiters never knew which food was ordered by whom. The bill was very high for the little food we got. --> DO NOT GO!

Name: RENNthai
Location: 3D, River Valley Road #01-05, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: After the boat ride on the river we were looking at a place to eat with cuisine we know and as we had tried most other tastes we had not had Thai fo

Name: RENNthai
Location: 3D, River Valley Road #01-05, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: We decided to use our only night in Singapore to eat at Clarke Quay. OK, it's a tourist trap, but the riverside offers great ambience. We settled on RhenThai as a culinary compromise: my wife wanted seafood and I wanted meat, and we both normally like Thai cuisine. Problems: They brought my dish and then my wife's nearly 10 minutes later, and only then after we complained. The restaurant had no bathroom of its own, and the one used by customers of RhenThai was several hundred meters' walk and tucked away in an alley. The price for two baby Tiger beers came to the cost of my dish. A really lousy choice for our only night in Singapore.

Name: RENNthai
Location: 3D, River Valley Road #01-05, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Tasty Thai on the banks of the Singapore River, indoor seating or sit outside undercover. Great food, not badly priced and generous servings. Food is fresh and tasty. Great service and atmosphere... recommend sitting outside

Name: RENNthai
Location: 3D, River Valley Road #01-05, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Having just flown in to Singapore we wanted something simple and relatively quick for dinne

Name: RENNthai
Location: 3D, River Valley Road #01-05, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Janna was the best! She made the night for us with the first night out with mom! She takes care of everything we need. She’s naturally amazing! That my mom decided to travel more because of Jannas service and her experience. Made our night!

Name: RENNthai
Location: 3D, River Valley Road #01-05, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: I came to this place with my family for a meal and I had an amazing experience. Food was really very delicious and I enjoyed my time there. All the staff there was too polite and professional. I really would like to thank JANNA for her great service which was provided to my family. She is one of the staff who makes the difference.Thank you so much Janna. Whenever I’ll travel to Singapore I’ll come to this place for su

Name: RENNthai
Location: 3D, River Valley Road #01-05, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: we have a dinner with my business partner here. We took a seat next to river, the site was fantastic and relaxing. The food was nice and to top it all, a very warmth service from Ms. Ana and her colleague... definitely, I will come back here on my next trip!!!

Name: RENNthai
Location: 3D, River Valley Road #01-05, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Memorable stay in Singapore and, eating here with the great service of your staff Ms. Anna makes my exprience enjoyable. We will recommend your place to our friends.

Name: RENNthai
Location: 3D, River Valley Road #01-05, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Overall the food was good, especially the Tom Yum Goong. Service was a bit slow at times, mainly with the first and last drinks. Probably better Thai around, but location is very convenient.

Name: RENNthai
Location: 3D, River Valley Road #01-05, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: We went for dinner at the Clarke Quay restaurant and met the worst service imaginable. Our soup was hot. Our main course when it eventually arrived was stone cold and inedible. I then realised it had been sitting in a table for more than 20 minutes while the "waiters" just walked past and ignored the plates of food. I complained but all the rather bolshy waitress would agree to was not charge us for service! I could not judge the food. Avoid at all costs.

Name: RENNthai
Location: 3D, River Valley Road #01-05, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: We decided to dine on Clarke Quay because we had fond memories during a previous visitti Singapore. We understand that dining on the river comes at a premium but that should not excuse an indifferent attitude to patro

Name: RENNthai
Location: 3D, River Valley Road #01-05, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: We ate here as it was on the way back to our hotel, further up river. The restaurant was busy, but being just two of us we were able to be seated quickly, although initially placed right next to one of the supports for the outdoor shading. We were moved before our food arrived to a waterside seat, which was probably the best thing about the restauran

Name: RENNthai
Location: 3D, River Valley Road #01-05, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: The most amazing thai food! The menu is very extensive and we couldn't choose what too order.The location of the place was a really Strategi and relaxing..All the staff was so friendly and helpful..The staff who took our order was Rakish was a guy was so friendly and helpful. Will recommend tonmy friends Nd fly..will come again ..cheers

Name: RENNthai
Location: 3D, River Valley Road #01-05, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: The ambiance by the river is pleasant and the food is good but unfortunately the service was very slow. We were twelve and some had finished eating while others hadn’t their dish yet!

Name: RENNthai
Location: 3D, River Valley Road #01-05, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Clarke Quay is always busy even on a Tuesday evening. This restaurant was moderately busy and the service was a little slow. The location by the river is very good and helps keep it a little cooler. I had the Lemongrass Steamfish which was a good choice as my wife was disappointed in her crispy soft crab. As it transpired we could have shared the steamfish which was a very generous portion with delicious flavours. Sensible pricing (by Singapore standards) the drinks.

Name: RENNthai
Location: 3D, River Valley Road #01-05, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Staff really nice and always in act

Name: RENNthai
Location: 3D, River Valley Road #01-05, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: This restaurant is in clarke quay which is where a lot of bars and restaurant are located next to the river/canal. We were fortunate to have our meal right next to the river in the night. It was amazing and romanti

Name: RENNthai
Location: 3D, River Valley Road #01-05, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Came in this evening, fantastic service from Amber - Trainee Manager. Trainee? She is management quality, amazingly friendly, engaging and friendly with everyone at our table. Top marks, great service. Will definitely be coming back. Thanks

Name: RENNthai
Location: 3D, River Valley Road #01-05, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: This was an extremely busy place. However, we received excellent service and reall enjoyed our food and drinks. We all had a great dinner.

Name: RENNthai
Location: 3D, River Valley Road #01-05, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Had dinner here overlooking the river, well worth it. Staff OK and food came in good time. Very presentable meals and good location.

Name: RENNthai
Location: 3D, River Valley Road #01-05, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: I had a dinner there in the last week end... The provided me and my wife a good sit by the canal ... The lady who was there at the counter was very courteous.

Name: RENNthai
Location: 3D, River Valley Road #01-05, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Staff were rude. Not interested in service. Kept my Camera bag on the vacent chair at the table, the chair was taken way and bag kept on the ground. Imidiately got up and said I am leaving. Staff showed no concern at all.

Name: RENNthai
Location: 3D, River Valley Road #01-05, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: We were greeted and catered to by the lovely Ms. Anna and was lucky to get a table by the river side of the restaurant despite the heavy crowd on a Thursday night. We opted for a light meal but the servings were pretty good so we still ended up feeling full. Food is excellent and presentation is tops. Their Sticky Rice w Mango is an absolute dream!!

Name: RENNthai
Location: 3D, River Valley Road #01-05, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: The restaurant has a small indoor dining area which is comfortable and an out door dining space directly adjacent the river. The area is vibrant with people, music and lots of activity on the river with small river cruiser boats passing taking tourists for a 40 minute experience along the river and to Marina B

Name: RENNthai
Location: 3D, River Valley Road #01-05, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Great location riverside with wonderful views. Food a tad expensive, very few of the Mains include rice, which is a side extra. Wine particularly expensive at around 15 dollars a glass! Disappointing that the restaurant doesn’t have a toilet! Bizarre that diners must use the Public one down the street. Quality of food served is good though. However, there’s a lot of competition here and I would suggest trying others along the riverside.

Name: RENNthai
Location: 3D, River Valley Road #01-05, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: We had a very enjoyable meal here. It was quite busy but we were seated straight away. When a table by the water became available, we were invited to move there which was very nice.  Waitress was very helpful, and the food was delicious.

Name: RENNthai
Location: 3D, River Valley Road #01-05, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Thai being one of my favorite cuisines ,I keep trying it wherever I travel ,around the glo

Name: RENNthai
Location: 3D, River Valley Road #01-05, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Stopped here after a day out at Sentosa as we are staying near Clarke Quay. Staff were very attentive and the food was excellent. Probably the best Green Curry I have ever had. They also had nice kids meals.

Name: RENNthai
Location: 3D, River Valley Road #01-05, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: My husband’s meal was fine but mine was the worst ever. The fried rice came out cold. My husband’s complaint was that the Sauvignon Blanc wine by the glass was not included in the S$5 happy hour only a Chardonnay.

Name: RENNthai
Location: 3D, River Valley Road #01-05, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Look this place is okay. None of the food was bad and the waitress was clearly a nice person. However, the food came out in weird dribs and drabs. My main arrived before other people’s starters for example. The food was fine but not exactly earth shattering. There were quite a few vegetarian options which is why we chose to go there and I was pleased that my wife had something she thought was okay. My father in law really enjoyed the beef massaman curry so I’d go for that if you go.

Name: RENNthai
Location: 3D, River Valley Road #01-05, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review:
After 6 weeks of travel we were presented with the worst meal of the entire time
Asked for Spivey got bland. Service atrocious, price was exhorbant. Entire and main meal received before drinks arrived 
Would not recommend to any one

Name: RENNthai
Location: 3D, River Valley Road #01-05, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: We had a great culinary experience but the crew was obviously overwhelmed by the number of guests. The management should seriously think of mixing experienced waiters and newly engaged staff.

Name: RENNthai
Location: 3D, River Valley Road #01-05, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Great Thai food and good size portions. Friendly service, went for a few seafood dishes and services were very generous. Would recommend this restaurant if in Clarke Quay. Has outside next to the river or pleasant inside air conditioned seating.

Name: RENNthai
Location: 3D, River Valley Road #01-05, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review:
Really good Thai food....
And the waitresses are really kind and helpful...
We come here every month and still love it

Name: RENNthai
Location: 3D, River Valley Road #01-05, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Renn Thai is lively, with fast and friendly service, and an extensive menu. Five of us shared dishes, starting with the terrific pineapple fried rice, and then progressed to a nicely presented seafood platter, tasty curry crab, assorted vegetables prepared assorted ways, and several other entrees. Our group agreed that a second order of that pineapple fried rice would make a great dessert.

Name: RENNthai
Location: 3D, River Valley Road #01-05, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review:
Extremely disappointed! Surly and inattentive waiters coupled with excruciatingly long - 40 minutes - mains waiting time((((
Given all the restaurant choices in the area - please do yourself a huge favor and find something else....

Name: RENNthai
Location: 3D, River Valley Road #01-05, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Surly waiter and extremely long wait; I inquired about the food after 30 minutes... had to wait another 20 minutes for food to arrive... given the choice of restaurants-I highly recommend to stay away from this place

Name: RENNthai
Location: 3D, River Valley Road #01-05, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: This Thai waterfront restaurant is always full, a good sign and rightly so, because the food is delicious. We had springrolls, satays and green papaya salad for starters. Then several dishes for main course, including a huge chili cab, which was just perfect in texture, flavour and size (1 kilo, setting us back 80 SGD). Staff are friendly and provide excellent service.

Name: RENNthai
Location: 3D, River Valley Road #01-05, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: The Thai food was poor, though the location was nice. High tourist pricing. We expected a higher standard. Cannot recommend.

Name: RENNthai
Location: 3D, River Valley Road #01-05, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: The set up of the waterside seating is confusing and the fact that they didn’t open till 6pm didn’t help matters. But our meals were adequate and reasonably priced for Clarke Quay standards.

Name: RENNthai
Location: 3D, River Valley Road #01-05, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Really amazing chilli crab !!! Amber was really friendly and her service was 1st class. Really enjoyable food with an amazing view of the singapore river and passing ferries. Would recommend this place as it was an unforgettable experience for myself and my family.

Name: RENNthai
Location: 3D, River Valley Road #01-05, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Good food, not brilliant and not poor. Standard really but ridiculously expensive. It’s a tourist spot so pretty much what we expected. Wouldn’t go back as there’s better in Singapore.

Name: RENNthai
Location: 3D, River Valley Road #01-05, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review:
A nice place in boat quay to enjoy delicious Thai cuisine .. plenty of vegetarian options.. Superb services..
Very good food freshly made and served promptly.. reasonably priced..
Outdoor sitting by the river is nice..
Seems to be very popular..

Name: RENNthai
Location: 3D, River Valley Road #01-05, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Three of us went for dinner. We received a salad only then they forgot the rest of our meal for an hour and forgot one dish completely. Poor value. Don’t go there

Name: RENNthai
Location: 3D, River Valley Road #01-05, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: As my girlfriend is a Thai lady we could not go past this restaurant while staying in Clarke Quay. The food was authentic and fresh. The service was also very good. The location also made for a pleasant experience.

Name: RENNthai
Location: 3D, River Valley Road #01-05, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: We had a set of excellent meals in this restaurant outdoors at the side of the river. Extensive menu. Well recommended.

Name: RENNthai
Location: 3D, River Valley Road #01-05, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: We ate outside and it was buzzing. The service was good and the food even better. I had a giant prawn hotpot. Others had soft-shell crab and green thai curry with rice. Overlooking Clarke Quay was magical. A definite recommendation from me! The bumboat stops along here and you can get it round to Marina Bay. The service stops about 9.30pm.

Name: RENNthai
Location: 3D, River Valley Road #01-05, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: We wanted to have dinner along the riverside & we walked through the whole stretch but found this place inviting. I like thai food to begin with & was familiar on what to orde

Name: RENNthai
Location: 3D, River Valley Road #01-05, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: i went to Renn Thai at night with my dad and his family who live in thailand. if it's not raining and the temperature isn't too bad, it is very nice atmosphere to eat out by the river. the food however was very mediocre (good, but not memorable thai food). more importantly, the service was incredibly terrible. it was severely understaffed (i think i saw two wait staff for the entire patio). they brought our food at completely separate times and also forgot to bring one of the appetizers we ordered. it was also a bit on the expensive side considering the service and food quali

Name: RENNthai
Location: 3D, River Valley Road #01-05, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: We chose this restaurant as many others do. Just by chance while walking around. BIG MISTAKE!!!

Name: RENNthai
Location: 3D, River Valley Road #01-05, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: This place like a joke.!! Ruddiest staff ever seen.!! Bad attitude.! We went there with friend for couple of drink. Couldn’t believe the attitude never been  such situation in my life .!! Worse service ever been.! If you don’t like your job don’t do it.!!

Name: RENNthai
Location: 3D, River Valley Road #01-05, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: We ate twice at the Clarke Quay location and were never disappointed. The servers were efficient and super friendly and the food was delicious. The happy hour two-for-one beers were welcome after a hot day sightseeing.

Name: RENNthai
Location: 3D, River Valley Road #01-05, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: It is one of the best thai restaurant i visit in Singapore. They cater for every type of diners, one of my colleague were vegetarian and gluten free. The service staff were running and still able to serve with a smile. Green curry and tom yum is one of their best dishes. For the dessert they have rice with mango and it is so good. The price is reasonable compared to other restaurant around the area.

Name: RENNthai
Location: 3D, River Valley Road #01-05, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Our group dine in on this restaurant last night and surprisingly the food is superb. The service was not that fast coz i notice they have to get it from the back and we are seating at alfresco. The entree satay was ok but the sauce can be improved. Tom yum hotpot looks astonishing and appetising. The thai curry crab is a must try, it was pricey though but worth it. Beer got promotion which makes it more better. Definitely will come back again when i visit singapore again.

Name: RENNthai
Location: 3D, River Valley Road #01-05, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Don’t waste your time. In a city full of restaurants, it’s amazing this one still exists. Some of the worst Thai food I’ve ever eaten and they admit to using MSG. Please avoid

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: This is a lovely place for dinner. I’ve always enjoyed coming here for dinner, particularly in the past when they were situated on the top floo

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: We recently placed a order for Hai Tien Lo's bento sets for an important event. We had a wonderful experience with the BD manager, William, when we held our wedding at HTL the last year. We approached him to assist us with this and he was once again extremely helpful and provided top-notch servic

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: Believe this pandemic wouldn't be going away any time soon and Phase 3 is only starting 28th December, that said, only 8 per table seati

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: Great place to host a lunch or dinner. The service is excellent, the food is great and you’ll be well-looked after by the staff. We hosted our post-ROM lunch here and was not disappointe

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: I’ve been here a few times for business because of its central location, but the set menus have not changed a bit in the past two years, as far as I can remember. While the food is not sub-par, it’s a shame there isn’t any dish that is outstandingly superior nor memorable. The menu needs some help.

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: Our first visit here did not disappoint

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: Brought my mother here to celebrate her 56th birthday. We received very good service from Apple, Kelly and Wei Jian, who went out of the way to make us feel very at home. They were very helpful, for instance they recommended and explained to us dishes that we should try, when my mother was struggling with the e-menu. The portion that they recommended was just nice for the 5 of us. Food was fantastic too, overall a very enjoyable birthday celebration.

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: Held a wedding event here, both restaurant staff and our coordinator (William) were very accommodative to our various reques

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: I have visited this restaurant many times and I am always impressed by the food and service. Today, I really appreciate the attentive and sincere service provided by the team especially by Yiihang & Michelle

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review:
My first time there. The majestic red pillar greet me. 
Opt for the dim sum buffet.  Every item is quite tasty.  However , I am not sure the ala cart menu and buffet menu differs so much.

May come back for the ala cart menu

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: We frequent hai tien lo with our family and love the food and service. Specifically, Apple is always providing good service with a smile and attentiveness.

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: Intended to celebrate my wife's birthday but they ruined it. Restaurant opens at 11:30am but we were told staffs are on break when we arrived and food will not be prepared till they're bac

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: Family dinner on 3 October 2020, we have been very impressed by the fantastic dishes prepared by Hai Tien Lo's culinary team, it deserves at least 1 Michelin star from food presentation to tas

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: We had Combination of Pan-fried Scallop and Sliced Crispy Barbecued Suckling, Wok-fried Ribeye Beef Fillet with Red Wine Sauce and Steamed Silver Sea Perch Fillet with Preserved Vegetables. Excellent food. The service was good and the staff very friendly.

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: Great place for dim sum and Cantonese food . Price valuable and staff are friendly and attentive. Will visit again soon.

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: Superb quality of food and service. The dim sum are tasty must try. I enjoyed it so much with my friends. A wonderful weekend we ever had!!!

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: We had weekend buffet ala carte Tim Sum. There were plenty of dishes to choose from, a wide variety of dishes than Tim Sum. We love the buddha jumps over the wall soup and most of the items listed on the menu. The braised Tim sum chicken feet and the cute carrot Tim sum didn't meet our expectation. We hope they have more regular time sum item for the buffet. The service was prompt and lovely staff.

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: With the help from William and his Team, we are able to plan a small private wedding of 8 tables with family and closed friends with less than 3 weeks of wedding planning. The restaurant is able to fulfill our request eg. individual serving to all guests (not only to main table), temperature screening etc. Although there is no food tasting, the food served was delicious and well presented. Fish was very fresh and i love the desserts. The photos of the food were taken by our guests as they were amazed by the presentation and We occupied 4 private rooms, there are still room for kids to run around, private 2 piece band with all the speakers around and photographe

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: Me and my wife had our ROM at Hai Tien Lou on 1 March 202

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: It was really a nice treat for me. Very polished look yet delicious. many places have great looking food but taste is not up to it. On the pricey side but the pretty look and the refined flavors of the ingredients justifies the price. Will visit again to treat myself a good meal here!

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: We arrived at this restaurant quite late at night and were welcomed by staff. Staff were extremely helpful and happy to serve us. We had a variety of food but the duck was a standout! The skin was crispy and the meat succulent! The decor is beautiful.

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: We were staying in the hotel and decided to try one of the Prosperous Reunion set menu dinners for Chinese New Year. We chose the Meteoric Sucess menu. It was six courses including various seafoods, pork and duck finishing with dessert. The variations in the flavours and textures was a wonderful experience, with strong mushroom flavours in the soup. Subtle lobster and udon noodles. The first course salad was sweet with a touch of ginger, chilli and crunchy carrots, sesame seeds and wontons. Roast duck and pork had their own sweet and fruity sauces. The dessert refreshed the palate with mango dessert, lychees and jelly. The jasmine tea provided a lovely complement to the rich food. Lovely experience.

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: Was there with 3 other friends for a birthday celebration and we tried the weekday Dim Sum buffet. Nothing was done from the restaurant despite leaving a comment that the reservation was for a birthday celebration. (Not a negative point, but also no wow factor considering many restaurants these days have a lot of other value added specials for occasions like th

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: The restaurant overlooks the main atrium at the Pan Pacific Singapore. Be sure to try the roast duck, claypot tofu, fish noodles, and soup served in coconut. The staff were also very friendly and attentive! Will definitely be back again!

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: I ordered a mixture of dim sum dishes and ala carte ones. The result was truly yummylicious. Everyone enjoyed the meal. The dim sum was exceptionally scrumptious as the items were unique and tasty. The dumpling soup was also delicious. Truly an amazing gastronomic experience.

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: We eat very well, The chinese food was fantastic and Lisa , The waitres Director, was very professional, speaking english and served us nicely

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: The food created by Chef Ben taste great. Great taste comes with a price. It

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: it tries to be fine dining and it achieves that goal but not for everythi

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: Went for weekend ala carte buffet lunch on a Sunday. New improved menu from our last visit. Have some interesting pairing of black truffle infused Chinese buns, meat now. Service seems to be a bit slow during our visit (maybe due to weekend crowd). Overall a good experience once again at Hai Tien Lo. Go check it out.

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: Went to this restaurant for lunch and it did not fail. Started with some dimsum, a double boiled seafood soup (very rich - to my liking).

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: Hosted my wedding dinner on the 28 September 2019 here at Hai Tien Lo. The food was amazing and my guests give praises to the food. Not only does it does it taste nice, it also uses quality ingredients. Definitely worth the money. Hai Tien Lo is a sort of modern Chinese Cantonese cuisine with its own unique set of dishes that you can’t find it elsewhere. It was the main reason I pick this restaurant to host my weddi

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: First time back in many years. My last visit the restaurant was on the top flo

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: First meeting with clients over dinner. The food and service did not disappoint at all. Started with mix platter of 6 types of appetizers which included roast meat. Followed by soup, steam fish, baby abalone with veg and toufu, fried noodles and tang yuan. Had a beer to "clear" away the haze that was affected the weather in Singapore...:) The quantity was just nice. Hope there is no MSG in the thick gravy used for the abalone dish. Overall, the restaurant is quite good place to entertain and had a quiet and spacious environment for all the guest. I think our clients like the place and the food as well.

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: Love the dim sums here. Everything was very refined and delicious. But what surprised me was the charcoal bbq pork bun with gold leave. So soft and fresh.. we ordered another serving even though we were so full!

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: Organized a business dinner cum meeting at the private Ruby room. The Hai Tien Lo team of Apple, Carina and Kelly, led by William, did a tremendous job in ensuring that the dinner was served smoothly, with minimum disruptions and noises. Kudos to the Chef for helping with preparing special dishes for a guest who informed at the last-minute that he could not take shell-fish, as well as a special vegan meal for another gue

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: Im having an amazing night in Hai Tian Lo. The food was amazing, and the service was good as well. The environment was clean.

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: We came for the Weekend Lunch Buffet ($68.80++ w/o drinks) and it was an a la carte buffet. Chinese tea came at an additional $6++ per person. You can opt for unlimited drinks at a much higher co

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: We went for our wedding anniversary dinner, which I had specified in our reservation. However, no notice was taken. The food was excellent, but the service was mediocre.

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: Good food with nice plating, function room decoration was great, as well as nice service. Especially the dessert mango pudding with fruits were delicious.

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: Had the best dim sum buffet brunch with my family of 6 at Hai Tien Lo recently last weeken

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: Since moving from top floor to this level, I have been to Hai Tien Lo on several occasions, all dinners on weekda

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: Great service and tasty dim sum a la carte buffet! many options and freshly made, nice food and good environment, service team was very friendly!

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: Awesome food prepared by the chef. .best sea cucumber I have ever eaten...we had a sampler of prawn, crab meat and crispy pork, coconut soup with abalone, prawn and chicken then the outstanding sea cucumber and fried rice and as dessert lemongrass jelly...hell the food was good. ..just can recommend...thank you for a great experience!

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: Hai Tien Lou has some of the best dim sum in Singapore. On Saturdays there is an a-la-carte dim sum buffet brunch with a large menu. Items like har gao and siew mai are standard, but here the skin is thin with large fresh juicy prawn. Similarly the char siew bao is made with great skill with the smooth fluffy skin containing char siew which is not to sweet. Various stir fry dishes in the menu using thick fresh grouper slices, a very tender beef brisket, and authentic sweet and sour pork that is made without ketchup (unlike the typical local versions). Dessert is a custard with birds nest. For the birthday, they provided longevity buns served on a plate with a calligraphic 'shou' written with gold powder.

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: We usually visit the restaurant for lunch or dinner during weekends. We enjoyed excellent service from Apple Thong. She is always full of smiles and very attentive to our needs. She remembers our preferences in our next visit. Food is excellent and we like the dim sum and ala carte menu. Its one of our favourite restaurants.

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: Good and cosy corner for a meal with friends and families. Near Marina Centre and is adjacent to one of the high class hotels. Good location and able to visit the nearby drinking corner.

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: It’s my first night in Singapore on this trip and my friends took me to this Cantonese restaurant located at the Pan Pacific hotel for dinne

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: I used to really enjoy bringing guests and out-of-towners to Hai Tien Lo. They have a great all-you-can-eat a la carte dim sum buffet lunch. The food used to be very fine, but on our latest trip there today, I could tell that the standard had dropped. In the past, there used to be some standout dishes that we would order several servings of, but this time, we had no repeat orders. No dish in particular really stood out (although still decen

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: We had just arrived at the Pan Pacific hotel and wanted something tas

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: Had lunch here while in our staycation . We had some dim sum and vegetables . The food is quite good, although I don’t think it’s better than many other decent restaurants out there serving dim sum , and some of those are cheaper . Pretty decent ambience although we didn’t have a reservation so was seated inside , and not having the view of the hotel lobby.

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: Had dinner a couple of times whilst at the Pan Pacific Hotel and were impressed by the quality of the cooking, the presentation and the imagination use of ingredients. Staff are helpful and attentive if sometimes a little lacking in knowledge. Seafood was particularly good as was the beef tenderloin, wine was expensive. Worth a visit just for the quality of the cuisine.

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: We came here for mum's birthday and was worth the vis

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: Excellent service provided by Ms. Amy. She is alert and sweet to everyone. We were enjoyed the service and environment here.

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: It was our first time coming here for the weekend brunch after reading some reviews. It was Chinese New Year so they had a different menu which was more expensive - pretty much SGD500 for 4 people with tea. The 'all-you-can-eat' is really only for the dim-sum and everything else you had to choose 1 or 2 dishes from a list and that's all you could order for that section. The dim-sum menu was limited and some of it was really bland like the deep fried scallops which were meant to come with fragrant garlic but came out looking pale with a sort of egg tart pastry base which was just dry and a strange combinatio

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: William and his team (andrew, apple and alan) have been very supportive throughout the whole event. They took pride in their work and ensured that the dinner function went off without a hitch! Kudos to their effort and looking forward to organise similar function at hai tien lon again. Well done guys!

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: Celebrating my hubby birthday. My hubby always like Chinese food. So I bring him to have high end dim sum. And he loved it  . We are so full and satisfied!

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: We had a lunch banquet on 12th January.  The food was very good and we would like to thank Wei Jian and Apple for their attentive service.  Ken

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: We were seriously caught off-guard. As a couple, we have a tendancy to order for lunch, half a dozen dim sum and 2 or 3 a la carte dishes. For some reason, we cut back on our dim sum orders during this visit and only placed one a la carte order. A good thing we did cos it was plenty! Their dim sum portions are huge by today's standards. Sorry guys but maybe after this review, the restaurant might review it and reduce them. Guess we lucked o

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: For hotel meal it was fine. But for our last night we probably wanted a bit more than fine. The staff catered for my gluten free requirements. On the whole most things were available and they were proactive in suggesting changes so I could eat what my partner was also eating. Staff were pleasant, not overly friendly, except the manager at the end of the meal. I ordered the sweet and sour pork for main which was tasty however no pineapple which was disappointing. My starter was a weird one, prawns with mango and some other ingredient, It was all very sweet and I felt that the overall taste was a bit strange. My partner enjoyed his soup starter, but felt let down by his beef main course. Overall wouldn't rush back to this one.

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: We were a bit unsure before we booked but we were going to entertain some friends who happens to be travelling to Singapore at the same time (happy coincidence) and not being a local, we didn't want to take a chance with just any restaurant and opted for the one at our hot

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: Had a wonderful dim sum lunch buffet at this restaurant. It’s open from 1130am and last order is at 2pm. We stayed on till 3p

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review:
Restaurant ambience is good. Service is not bad. Ordered a roasted suckling pig, skin is crispy not bad but the peking duck is disappointing.
Expensive place to dine

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: The dimsum buffet is defenitely worthy of trying. Especially the spring onion cake which was just the must-eat among many other dishes provided.

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: Had one of our best chinese dinners here. Food was varied and delectable, service was great and the tables were arranged so that all had some views but were reasonably private.

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: Although there are some misses, the food is generally nice. Service is at attentive. However the second and third serving of foods took quite long. They could have been more flexible when we asked for just one serving of each dessert to try out before the rest decided.

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review:
Category: Cantonese Cuisine

Address: 7 Raffles Blvd, Level 3, Pan Pacific, Singapore, 039595

Dexperience Undercover Service Quality Surveyor Ratings:
Value 3/5
Quality 3/5
Ambience 3/5
Service 3/5
Experience 3/5

Verdict: Nothing fantastic. 😩😩😩

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: Excellent range and quality of food. Dim sum, traditional chinese dishes and desserts. Ambience could be better, especially the indoor seatings.

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: I have booked a birthday lunch weekend brunch this afternoon in Hai Tien Lo. Having waited for 20 minutes at our table with no apparent service from anyone for our meals or drink preference, we gave up and walked off. Do note that there is a time limit for the last order and if we are just sitting in one corner with no one to serve us with this expensive brunch, then I think the management would have provided a failing lunch service for customers. If I could give a zero star for spoiling my birthday meal, I would.

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: Went to dine in on lunch. The service staffs were exceptional. Reserving special praise to both Huivoon and Michelle, their professional service made me feel at eased and allowed both my partner and myself to enjoy our meal to the fulle

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: Ordered 6 dim sum(glutinous rice, siew mai, Prawn dumpling, banana Prawn roll, Prawn paste in beancurd skin, xiao long bao) in total, could taste the natural sweetness of the fresh ingredients used. The glutinous Salted Egg rice in particular had moist full pearl rice grain and not greasy like most other eateries. The banana Prawn rolls was so sweet within yet crisp at the skin. Restaurant had a wide variety of western and Chinese self concocted teas, we had their signature tea Hai Tien Yi Hao. It was served with the pot constantly fired up by candle beneath so we had piping hot smooth tea till end of the meal, detoxifying and stomach warming. Mains like stewed noodle and porridge however was medicroe. Definitely still worth the eat for its dim sum and tea especially if there's at least a 20% promo cos the price is on the steeper end.

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: The weekend dim sum brunch is our favourite. For starter, we enjoyed the rich and clear “Buddha jumps over the wall” soup & lobster sal

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: Here we back again to Hai Tien Lo for dinner. We are surprised that Alan was recognize us and he gave us a very warm welcome. We were so lucky that Apple is the one who served us and the other team member was courtesy and attentive too. Apple introduce us their newly launch claypot promotion which is only $38.8 for any two items! It was amazing and worth the price! We will definitely back again! Well done.

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: We book a table for 11pax on the 10 June for an Ala Carte Buffet Brunch. Services was really bad as when the kitchen porter came to take the order, but when the dishes was served many was missing and we had to beg them to check the order as it was my children lunch time,but instead of check and getting back to us. we were ignored. We had informed the server that my brother had to leave early as he was called back for Army and requested for the food to be expedite quickly, but as mention our request were ignored. We all felt that all the dishes was pretty salty, oily and cold when served as dishes were place at the side table for a long time before serving to us. When we ask if the food was ours, the kitchen porter said yes, but have to wait for the server to hand the dish to us as we were begging for food. When we ask for the cake we brought. the cake was taken and place at the side table, my mother had to settle and perpare the cake herself and ask the manager for side plates and fork

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review:
Staff was not attentive as I stood at the door for some time yet no one came forward to assist. 
 Food is average, a little too oily. Waited for long time for all dishes to be served.

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: The food was awesome and tasted very refined. My parents totally enjoyed it and the price was very reasonable.

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: I have hosted a few meals here and every time I was happy with the dishes and service. Lee Mee happened to attend to our table this visit. She was very attentive in taking note of all the food I am allergic to. She would check with the chefs the ingredients of the dishes and advised me what I could and could not eat. This is the main reason why I only dine at 5-star hotel restaurants. They take note of your request seriously. Oh yeah, UOB Visa Infinite card holders get 30% off here. That's another good reason to dine here!

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: I will never come again. First, the service was not prompt. Service were poor and staff were slow. The food were expensive and yet not as nice and not worth the price. Order some signature dishes but they would have taste better with the price and reputation. The prawn were overcooked, the food were tastelss and with the reputation of Hai Tien Lou, it really disappointing.

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review:
We were there for a business dinner on Saturday & liked the experience.
For Indian taste,we would have preferred more chicken & veg dishes,but our group had pre-planned the menu. The seafood lovers enjoyed their dishes very much. 
Classy decor & good attentive service.

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: An overdue review.. went to Hai Tien Lo for a couple of CNY dinners and the food was great! Innovative yu sheng and quality food. Service was generally good (especially Apple and Eva)with attention to detail, with the exception of one staf

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: If you feel like pampering yourself with a delicious Chinese meal in a nice cozy ambience coupled with outstanding service by staff, head for Hai Tien Lo. As it is usually crowded during lunch and over the weekends, advance reservations is recommended.The food served especially the dim sum and the doubled boiled soups are yummy.Food quality is fresh. Food prices are relatively high but it is worth paying the extra for the tasty food and excellent service

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: We went there to celebrate our Father's birthday. From the food to the service, we were not disappoi

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: Very refine Chinese food with excellent services. They even prepared a birthday cake for our celebration.

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: My second review for HTL... still exceptional in service and food after all these yea

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: I had the dim sum lunch buffet. However, the food served took as long as an hour. For example, the fish took 1 hour to serve and usual dim sum takes 25 mins. The service and ambience was good though.

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: Excellent food quality and unrivalled service. Service was so seamless, we didn't even notice when the tea cups and teapots were topped up. I was savoring the delicious XO sauce on its own; without any request from our table, we were served a full dish of this sauce! Such observant and friendly staff, we're most impressed! Highly recommended.

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: We celebrated our friend’s birthday at Hai Tien Lo on Jan. 6. Foods are great as always and staffs are very attentive. My favourite dish is the sweet and sour pork and roasted chicken. They are not stingy in providing us an extra serving of its luxurious X.O sauce. I also love their tea and they are quick to refill your cup. We will definitely come back.

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: Been to Hai Tien Lo many times, standard still there, within my expectation. The waitress was very attentive and professional.

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: Booked the Ruby Room at Hai Tien Lo for a special birthday celebration. Largest table that seats 27 people, very impressive! Largest lazy susan too! Service staff were very attentive and we felt well looked after and very comfortable in the private dinning room. They do impose a minimum spend but can be flexible which is great! Can also bring in own wines which is a added bonus for us if you have a special bottle to open! Overall a very positive experience.

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: Had my mother's birthday celebration at Hai Tien Lo. The waitress (sorry forgot to ask her name) was professional, knowledgeable, courteous and efficient. All other wait staff was polite and friendly. Food was good and made my mother, a picky eater, happy. A bit pricy, but definitely worth the expenses.

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: The service staff is incredibly well-trained. They were quick to seat us and make us comfortable with warm smiles and kind words. We held our wedding there 2 years ago and were back for our anniversary dinner. Wilson was still able to remember us. If that is not good service, I don't know what is. As usual, the food was really, really good. We tried out the buffet lunch at the staff's recommendation although we were just there for dim sum initially and we were not let down. Every item that came was better than the one before. We left with very happy stomachs and warm hearts. Will definitely be back again. Thank you for the experience, HTL! :D

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: For the price I’m paying , not really worth it. Food is average dim sum is average, most of the food are not made on the spot. You can pay much lesser for better quality dim sum if you are looking at their dim sum buffet.

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: I come here for my dim sum fix a few times a year, and the food has been consistently good. Nothing mind-blowing, mind you, but just solid, well-executed dim sum far

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: After reading some of the reviews. I realize I am not the only one who felt that the service was not up to standard. Although I had emailed the hotel regarding my feed back on the dining experience, the manager simply just replied that my feedback would be shared with the team necessary improvement would be made. However, judging from the reviews from trip advisor posted months ago and the service I received few days ago, I do not think our reviews/ feedback on tripadvisor would result in any changes. But I do hope that restaurant managers would mean their words and really look into the services of their staff. Anyway I doubt I would return to Hai Tian Lo as there are definitely better options in term of food, service, ambience available.

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review:
Service was good and attentive but a tad slow. Food was served luke warm not sure why. Only tea was piping hot. Was expecting some surprises on the food but tasted bland and one dimensional.
:(

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: This very good Chinese restaurant serves delicious food in pleasant surroundings. We have eaten there several times and each time the food is excellent. The restaurant is located on the third floor of the Pan Pacific hotel looking and you can look out over the atrium or sit in the attractively decorated interior room. Service is good, although staff seem a bit rushed at times. Great for dim sum or a la carte.

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: Had a great lunch enjoying the dim sum buffet here with my family. Menu item had a good variety but the price was slightly steep compared to other more value for money buffets at neighbour Ng hotel restaurants such as Peach Blossoms.

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: Was waiting at the front door, not being served. Wanted to make an order, cannot find staff around. The tea was regularly refilled after every dish. The environment is quiet and good for business. However, the food was mehh. The char siew was too tough, pumpkin sago dessert is not smooth, fried rice was dry. The only good was their dim sum, but it just seem average. Dont think i will go again.

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: Came to eat the hairy crabs and ordered some additional dishes to complement. Hairy crab was good and the other dishes (crispy tofu in spicy bean sauce, corn soup with beef, pork shoulder noodles) were equally of good taste. Only thing strange was not sure why the hairy crab was served last.

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: We thoroughly enjoyed the food at Hai Tien Lo, the soft shell chilli crab was particularly fantastic. The ambience is a little odd as we were seated on the balcony overlooking the hotel foyer and buffet restaurant so it felt a little like eating a great meal in a food court. Service was a little perfunctory and given the size of the bill could have been better.

Name: Hai Tien Lo
Location: 7 Raffles Boulevard Pan Pacific Hotel Pan Pacific Singapore, Singapore 039595 Singapore
Review: 7 of us went there on a Sunday for their dim sum lunch buffet to celebrate Granny's birthda

Name: La Forketta
Location: Blk 9 Dempsey Road #01-09 Dempsey Hill, Singapore 247697 Singapore
Review: Randomly selected this restaurant. First visit. Never read any review about it. As usual, Italian food is our first option for dinner. No reservation made and was lucky to have a table available. Browse through the menu and ordered. First, waiter did not asked if we would like to have our course of meals starting from Antipasto then followed by the rest. All the food comes together! We were wondering which one should we eat first! Pizza was alright. We had a wrong serving of pasta. Was changed after we made it known. Tiramisu was not bad but if you want the authentic Italian tiramisu, this is not it. Overall, I might return for their pizza.

Name: La Forketta
Location: Blk 9 Dempsey Road #01-09 Dempsey Hill, Singapore 247697 Singapore
Review: Best pizza available and service staff are friendly and nice drink quite reasonable price and enjoyed the place there.

Name: La Forketta
Location: Blk 9 Dempsey Road #01-09 Dempsey Hill, Singapore 247697 Singapore
Review: very professional service which made the entire dining experience very enjoyable as the servers working there are always there to provide their assistance which made everything more comfortable. The ambience was very delightful, setting the mood right for the night. Overall, La Forketta is a place worth a visit.

Name: La Forketta
Location: Blk 9 Dempsey Road #01-09 Dempsey Hill, Singapore 247697 Singapore
Review: Great venue, good service, starters, etc, etc.  But the pizzas - which is really the whole point of the place - were a real disappointment.  Soggy centre of the base and really insipid flavour.  Genuinely disappointing as had been expecting a lot more.

Name: La Forketta
Location: Blk 9 Dempsey Road #01-09 Dempsey Hill, Singapore 247697 Singapore
Review: Pretty good selection of authentic Italian food and desserts.the place is ideal for a dinner outing with friend or family.All fantastic!

Name: La Forketta
Location: Blk 9 Dempsey Road #01-09 Dempsey Hill, Singapore 247697 Singapore
Review: Great Italian food,good wide options,Nice place to relax and take your time. Definitely worth a visit!

Name: La Forketta
Location: Blk 9 Dempsey Road #01-09 Dempsey Hill, Singapore 247697 Singapore
Review: This Italian restaurant has amazing food, ambiance & drinks. Organic tagliatelle wagyu stew and wooden pizzas are awesome!. A very authentic Italian restaurant

Name: La Forketta
Location: Blk 9 Dempsey Road #01-09 Dempsey Hill, Singapore 247697 Singapore
Review: Best wonderful Italian restaurant. Great atmosphere.great service and a top notch menu..highly recommend!

Name: La Forketta
Location: Blk 9 Dempsey Road #01-09 Dempsey Hill, Singapore 247697 Singapore
Review: I refer to the review my sister made below, which was left in all honestly while we were still in the restaurant. We were about to leave the restaurant, when the aforementioned owner (named Gracie) blocked my sister’s way and suddenly threatened my sister saying “If I see your review and it’s bad and not true, know that I will come after you

Name: La Forketta
Location: Blk 9 Dempsey Road #01-09 Dempsey Hill, Singapore 247697 Singapore
Review: Came here tonight with my family for a Friday dinner. While the food was acceptable for an Italian taste and ambience was pleasant, we had the most off-putting experience with a staff, who turned out to be the owner herself (Gracie, I believe, wearing a blue dress). My brother left his work bag on the floor, admittedly a little in the way of the staff. The staff didn’t seem to have an issue with it though, as our food was delivered with no trouble. Gracie, the owner, suddenly came over and asked if she can move the bag, and my brother just said yes as it was rather abrupt and she was already holding his bag. That was fine, though a little strange, however it got worse as she dropped the bag roughly on the floor with a resounding bang (there was a work laptop inside). My family and I just looked at each other and when my sister confronted her, instead of saying sorry, she simply stated that “It’s protected right?” which was beyond rude as that was a valuable personal belonging and we honestly would have just let it go had she just apologised in the first place. We called for her again to clarify the situation as she initially just walked away, however we clarified that she was the owner of the restaurant and it was clear that she will not say sorry and only reasoned that we said it was fine and denied any fau

Name: La Forketta
Location: Blk 9 Dempsey Road #01-09 Dempsey Hill, Singapore 247697 Singapore
Review: I have been coming here for years, and each time is always a delight. Expect great Italian meal prepared with the best best ingredients and served in a friendly atmosphere. Go for the hearty meat dishes in particular.

Name: La Forketta
Location: Blk 9 Dempsey Road #01-09 Dempsey Hill, Singapore 247697 Singapore
Review: Having a lovely evening alone in the restaurant. Friendly and helpful staff. Delicious pasta and pizza. Definately will come again.

Name: La Forketta
Location: Blk 9 Dempsey Road #01-09 Dempsey Hill, Singapore 247697 Singapore
Review: Nice concept with open kitchen, downside are some smells floating into the diner's area. All dishes freshly cooked, though nothing special. Servings a bit undersized (or rather pricing on the high side). Even charging 1$ per carafe of ice water.

Name: La Forketta
Location: Blk 9 Dempsey Road #01-09 Dempsey Hill, Singapore 247697 Singapore
Review: Four of us had a delicious dinner in a relaxing environment at La Forketta. We started off with some beer and bread basket. I was looking for a vegetarian option and had Pappardelle al pesto Genovese. It was delicious. I will surely go back there again.

Name: La Forketta
Location: Blk 9 Dempsey Road #01-09 Dempsey Hill, Singapore 247697 Singapore
Review: The pizza I got there were so amazing, such a friendly staff! You should definitely go here if you er looking for some real Italian food!

Name: La Forketta
Location: Blk 9 Dempsey Road #01-09 Dempsey Hill, Singapore 247697 Singapore
Review: Great place to eat with  Excellent service ..Best Italian authentic food and amazing ambiance ..Decor is really high class..I would love to come again and again

Name: La Forketta
Location: Blk 9 Dempsey Road #01-09 Dempsey Hill, Singapore 247697 Singapore
Review: Wonderful place and view with an amazing staff and owner,Best food in every way. Love to visit soon again. 😊👌

Name: La Forketta
Location: Blk 9 Dempsey Road #01-09 Dempsey Hill, Singapore 247697 Singapore
Review:
Awesome place!
Nice service!!
They followed all guidelines about this panadamic..
Keep up good work..

Name: La Forketta
Location: Blk 9 Dempsey Road #01-09 Dempsey Hill, Singapore 247697 Singapore
Review: Made a reservation on Saturday evening and got an email confirmation. Drove around for a few rounds before we found a parking spot and walked a distance to get to the restaurant only to be told they didn’t have my reservation and they don’t have a table. Not a problem, these things happen. But what was bizarre was they had a young guy manning the reception who was just rude, uninterested, disengaged, hard of hearing and when I was discussing with another staff about the reservation, he looked into the distance and disassociated himself from the situation. Excuse me, why is he there? Just a complete waste of space and an irritating presence on an already disappointing evening.

Name: La Forketta
Location: Blk 9 Dempsey Road #01-09 Dempsey Hill, Singapore 247697 Singapore
Review: La Forketta is an authentic & home cook Italian Restuarant. Love the cosy & warm atmosphere with friendly staffs at yr service. Burrata n sour dough pizzas r my fav. They also serve fresh seafood as well. A place I will recommend any time if u feel like eating hearty Italian food!

Name: La Forketta
Location: Blk 9 Dempsey Road #01-09 Dempsey Hill, Singapore 247697 Singapore
Review: Went there over a lovely quiet afternoon. The restaurant is located in an old barracks. Love the chill vibes. Staff were friendly. Will definitely go back!

Name: La Forketta
Location: Blk 9 Dempsey Road #01-09 Dempsey Hill, Singapore 247697 Singapore
Review: First time here and the place was cool. Friendly staff was serving in a polite manner. Properly will come again with friends along. Keep up the good work!

Name: La Forketta
Location: Blk 9 Dempsey Road #01-09 Dempsey Hill, Singapore 247697 Singapore
Review: In this reataurant their have a good staff because when i ask i want to suprise my friend in their restaurant they just ask that world and they arranged a wonderful decoration cake for my firend and all the staffs came and sang the happy birthday song around our dining table.it was a suberb night for all of us.and foods also superb.

Name: La Forketta
Location: Blk 9 Dempsey Road #01-09 Dempsey Hill, Singapore 247697 Singapore
Review: What started off well started going downhill with the tiny Burrata at $28, miser

Name: La Forketta
Location: Blk 9 Dempsey Road #01-09 Dempsey Hill, Singapore 247697 Singapore
Review:
Best service we’ve had in a long time! The food was delicious, nice and hot and the staff were friendly and helpful. We will definitely be back!
Thank you for a lovely evening!

Name: La Forketta
Location: Blk 9 Dempsey Road #01-09 Dempsey Hill, Singapore 247697 Singapore
Review: Great food and lovely service from Arnell. Enjoyed pizza crudo and the house red. Maybe the spritz was a touch bitter or maybe I'm not used to them. Will visit again

Name: La Forketta
Location: Blk 9 Dempsey Road #01-09 Dempsey Hill, Singapore 247697 Singapore
Review: Great Italian food, original variations, very friendly service. Love the virgin cocktails - gives the kids something to ‘adult’ during the starter

Name: La Forketta
Location: Blk 9 Dempsey Road #01-09 Dempsey Hill, Singapore 247697 Singapore
Review: La Forketta was a regular stop for us but have not been back for a while. Since COVID, we thought we'd support our 'local' but surprised to experience the poor customer service - inexperienced staff, not rude but just a poor experience. Cocktails arrive after the starters, when requesting for basic condiments, we were told to wait, while they take an order at another table, while keeping us wating, staring at our meals! Again another example of no effort needed because the food is good and I can confirm that the food is goo

Name: La Forketta
Location: Blk 9 Dempsey Road #01-09 Dempsey Hill, Singapore 247697 Singapore
Review: The pizza here is delicious and all the staff were  kind and helpful. I will be coming back with my family soon!

Name: La Forketta
Location: Blk 9 Dempsey Road #01-09 Dempsey Hill, Singapore 247697 Singapore
Review: Lovely place, great food and warm service. Ambience is nice and cosy, perfect for a chill weekend date.

Name: La Forketta
Location: Blk 9 Dempsey Road #01-09 Dempsey Hill, Singapore 247697 Singapore
Review: Booked at 6pm, arrived at 540pm thinking we can have a cocktail prior to being served at table. But no, they said "they're having meetings and discussion" so can only come back at 6p

Name: La Forketta
Location: Blk 9 Dempsey Road #01-09 Dempsey Hill, Singapore 247697 Singapore
Review: Delicious seafood. Excellent service. Thank you team. Arnell was the waiter and we really enjoyed his service, highly prepared to deal with demanding clients.

Name: La Forketta
Location: Blk 9 Dempsey Road #01-09 Dempsey Hill, Singapore 247697 Singapore
Review: We love the food, but why is the service so s.......l.......o.........w????? We waited 15 minutes before we were asked for a drink order (we took advantage and ordered food when they eventually came). It’s 45 minutes later and we are still waiting for our pasta. Disappointing, given that we love the food.

Name: La Forketta
Location: Blk 9 Dempsey Road #01-09 Dempsey Hill, Singapore 247697 Singapore
Review: The restaurant is nice and the food that we ordered was decent. The pizzas were good! Not happy with their service, especially considering the expensive food! We were charged for tap water too, that also per person and my children had got their own water! Ridiculous! They did not even inform us that it is charged just because of a slice of lemon in it! They ordered a large margarita for us assuming we wanted a large, they should ask us the size if we haven't specified. When I noticed the sizes and went to clarify they did change it!! Good I saw it. No one came to our table once the food had come. Not sure if I'll be going again!

Name: La Forketta
Location: Blk 9 Dempsey Road #01-09 Dempsey Hill, Singapore 247697 Singapore
Review: Fantastic evening here - fresh, homemade Italian food. The only problem with this restaurant, is what to choose from the menu! Great selection of authentic Italian food, lovely atmosphere, clean and fresh restaurant.

Name: La Forketta
Location: Blk 9 Dempsey Road #01-09 Dempsey Hill, Singapore 247697 Singapore
Review: Came here to celebrate an old man’s birthday (97). Ambience is fair, perhaps lighting is too dim. Location is convenient and easy to find. Ordered a seafood salad, risotto with mushroom, wagyu beef, grilled calamari and spaghetti vongole. Food was nice but a little less sea salt will be perfect. The waiter attending to us was very good and professional. However we were unable to consume a wonderful birthday cake for my old friend as the management charged $40 for cake corkage! Stupid idea and crazy price. In view of the price and quality of food served as well as the cake corkage, it should warrant only 2 stars but I gave them 3 just because of the young waiter. Not my cuppa tea!

Name: La Forketta
Location: Blk 9 Dempsey Road #01-09 Dempsey Hill, Singapore 247697 Singapore
Review: I visited La Forketta last August when visiting Singapore and the pizza's were great. The whole family enjoyed our meal and would recommend it if you are looking for authentic Italian food in Singapore!

Name: La Forketta
Location: Blk 9 Dempsey Road #01-09 Dempsey Hill, Singapore 247697 Singapore
Review: La Forketta is a new Italian restaurant to the Dempsey village. We went to have dinner with some friends midweek. The restaurant looks very warm and welcoming, the decor smart and sophisticated without being OTT. The staff were very friendly and professional. The menu has lots of choices - starters, salads, pizza and pasta. We had a couple of pizzas, pasta carbonara and lasagne all of which were very tasty although nothing special. In terms of cost it’s quite punchy. The pizzas were $44 each and the pasta c$28 - all definitely on the high side vs. some of the other restaurants in Dempsey that are a lot cheaper. Overall a very nice meal with friends but the restaurant is nothing special, there are definitely better options up at Dempsey. Can’t say we shall be heading back in a hurry.

Name: La Forketta
Location: Blk 9 Dempsey Road #01-09 Dempsey Hill, Singapore 247697 Singapore
Review:
La forketta
9 Dempsey Road, Dempsey Hill
I recommend this place for the people who looking for good taste food on Singpore, there I saw very best food that I ever had as well as good service.

Name: La Forketta
Location: Blk 9 Dempsey Road #01-09 Dempsey Hill, Singapore 247697 Singapore
Review: I had a birthday celebrate at lafoketta restaurant last night, That was a amazing celebration I have ever tried. Beautiful birthday cake, great decor, perfect taste of the food. I’m really impressed with the staff and very nice service here. Especially the staff made me very surprised when they sang a birthday song for me while restaurant abit busy but they still took a time and sing for me. That was a great experience. I’ll come back next time with my family. Thank you for your good take care of me and my friend.

Name: La Forketta
Location: Blk 9 Dempsey Road #01-09 Dempsey Hill, Singapore 247697 Singapore
Review: The best experience i have ever tried, Staff did service very good, and friendly to me , With my observe, They have a good take care of their customers. The restaurant’s decoration look very cozy, make me felt comfortable, For the food I had impressed with their pizza, pasta, meat, and fish. Their chef have a special combination between all ingredient, and elements of dish, I really love the taste. That is great dish i have tried before. You should come there and try their food and service I sure You will have a the best satisfaction. Hoping restaurant more and more develop and keep on your great service. Thank you

Name: La Forketta
Location: Blk 9 Dempsey Road #01-09 Dempsey Hill, Singapore 247697 Singapore
Review:
