Review: The place has lovely ambiance and I have been there many times. The food is pretty good but there is room for improvement in customer service orientation. I was a little disappointed during this visit - attention was to our food orders and requests were cursory. We were assured that the finger food would come first but it arrived after some of us were having our main course. We ordered dessert to share and although there were 7 of us, only 4 plates were given to us and we had to help ourselves to extra plates in the end. We finished our meals and were waiting for coffee and desserts but no-one took the initiative to clear the table until we asked a couple of times. And this was not for lack of staff. There were even some resting in the lounge area outside the cafe. This is a club to cater to military officers and this slackening of good service (relative to when they first opened) is not healthy.

Name: Spize
Location: 131 Rifle Range Road #03-04, Temasek Club, Singapore 588406 Singapore
Review: Always loved to visit this place because of it's ambience and service. The food is good and delicious! Good place to meet up with friends or colleagues!

Name: Spize
Location: 131 Rifle Range Road #03-04, Temasek Club, Singapore 588406 Singapore
Review: Love the high ceiling and full window panels. A bit hot in the afternoon as the sun comes in. Food is excellent!

Name: Spize
Location: 131 Rifle Range Road #03-04, Temasek Club, Singapore 588406 Singapore
Review: A friend recommended me to eat at this restaurant and so I did went to try it. I have to admit I had the best food i ever had. The Burger was delicious..

Name: Spize
Location: 131 Rifle Range Road #03-04, Temasek Club, Singapore 588406 Singapore
Review:
Food was great with very reasonable price! We personally love the cod fish bok choy noodle. The kida meal are great too! 

Ample parking for those who are driving!😁

Name: Spize
Location: 131 Rifle Range Road #03-04, Temasek Club, Singapore 588406 Singapore
Review:
Just wait for someone else to complain.
We need to visit there regularly.
So, we don't like to comment too much.
Good Luck to Spike@Rifle Range.

Name: Spize
Location: 131 Rifle Range Road #03-04, Temasek Club, Singapore 588406 Singapore
Review: Have always love dining there. Service have nvr been disappointing. Prompt service but staffs need to smile more.

Name: Spize
Location: 131 Rifle Range Road #03-04, Temasek Club, Singapore 588406 Singapore
Review: We had a great time at Spize for our farewell lunch with a colleague. Good variety at reasonable prices!

Name: Spize
Location: 131 Rifle Range Road #03-04, Temasek Club, Singapore 588406 Singapore
Review: Nice ambience for a relaxing dinner. The place was filled with families and office workers on the Friday night. Price of the food was reasonable.

Name: Spize
Location: 131 Rifle Range Road #03-04, Temasek Club, Singapore 588406 Singapore
Review: I was there recently to celebrate my Parent's Birthday & both my parents really love the place there. My parent don't eat western food that much, so they ordered Asian foods. I can say the foods are all delicious. including the massive spaghetti I have ordered, this dish serve 02 to 04 pax. the waffles come with a candle if you request for it & also there is a bday song when it is being serve. I am satisfied with thier service.

Name: Spize
Location: 131 Rifle Range Road #03-04, Temasek Club, Singapore 588406 Singapore
Review:
love the service... especially the peramah (socialable) staffs.
love the food....
love the atmosphere...

Name: Spize
Location: 131 Rifle Range Road #03-04, Temasek Club, Singapore 588406 Singapore
Review: Food and ambience was really good! Worth the time driving to Temasek Club. Service was abit laggy but understandable due to the lunch crowd.

Name: Spize
Location: 131 Rifle Range Road #03-04, Temasek Club, Singapore 588406 Singapore
Review: Cosy cafe that sells many variety of food! Western and Asian cuisine. Good chill out place and esp there is a portion that is pool facing

Name: Spize
Location: 131 Rifle Range Road #03-04, Temasek Club, Singapore 588406 Singapore
Review: Food is good quality, nice ambience and worth the money.  Highly recommended.  Reservations are a must!

Name: Spize
Location: 131 Rifle Range Road #03-04, Temasek Club, Singapore 588406 Singapore
Review: I love the ambiance and the food. Thank you for the visits. I tried the barumundi and it was lovely. The mushroom soup was awesome.

Name: Spize
Location: 131 Rifle Range Road #03-04, Temasek Club, Singapore 588406 Singapore
Review:
A great place to catch up with friends with good ambience, lush greenery around the cafe, prompt service and a great selection of food. 
Will be back again!

Name: Spize
Location: 131 Rifle Range Road #03-04, Temasek Club, Singapore 588406 Singapore
Review: Located in Temasek Club, this gem of a find served up delectable local favourites for a very good price. I liked the fact that it was overlooking the pool, and it was a pretty romantic dinner experience at that.

Name: Spize
Location: 131 Rifle Range Road #03-04, Temasek Club, Singapore 588406 Singapore
Review: Since my friend 1st brought me to Spize @Rifle Range, I have been going back there a few more times because I like the food and ambience there. However my last visit there was disappointing. After waiting for more than half an hour for my order of Morrocan Chicken to be served and the majority of my colleagues (there were 12 of us) has gotten their order and almost finishing their meal, I was presented with a charcoal black chicken. Shocked, I ask the waiter if this dish is meant to be this way, he agreed that it was "bit burnt" and took it back to the kitchen. Another staff then came over to advise that I need to wait another 15 mins or so for my order to be cooked and any other western meal will be the same - at least 15 min waiting time!!! If I order Chinese, it is faster. So I have no choice - as I cannot make the rest of my colleagues wait for me, I had chosen the Penang Char Kway Teow and it was awful. It was a bit too sweet for my liking and the colour (which comes from the dark sauce) is not the Penang kway teow that I am accustomed to. Hence it is an understatement to say I did not enjoy the food that lunch.

Name: Spize
Location: 131 Rifle Range Road #03-04, Temasek Club, Singapore 588406 Singapore
Review: Visited the spize restaurant during the weekday evening. It was pretty quiet with only a few tables of guest

Name: Spize
Location: 131 Rifle Range Road #03-04, Temasek Club, Singapore 588406 Singapore
Review: Nice venue to celebrate a team milestone. Highly recommended to make advance booking.  Good food, good company and we also got a nice view of the pool

Name: Spize
Location: 131 Rifle Range Road #03-04, Temasek Club, Singapore 588406 Singapore
Review: We were there for breakfast on a weekday, it was quiet and nice. We were given a table with pool view. My baby loved it! The place is very nicely done up and service was good. Food was average though, we ordered American breakfast and the croissants. Highly recommend if you want a quiet, relaxing meal.

Name: Spize
Location: 131 Rifle Range Road #03-04, Temasek Club, Singapore 588406 Singapore
Review: The staff was fabulous in making our group of 30 comfortable during our dining at the restaurant. Fabulous service and food!! Well done!!

Name: Spize
Location: 131 Rifle Range Road #03-04, Temasek Club, Singapore 588406 Singapore
Review:
Full height windows overlooking lush greenery. In love with the view! 
Friendly service staff too. Will definitely drop by again.

Name: Spize
Location: 131 Rifle Range Road #03-04, Temasek Club, Singapore 588406 Singapore
Review: I love this place, the food's amazing, service and atmosphere is fantastic too, definitely value for money - highly recommended!

Name: Spize
Location: 131 Rifle Range Road #03-04, Temasek Club, Singapore 588406 Singapore
Review: Spize offers great variety in the menu to cater to different preference. The briyani is simply perfec

Name: Spize
Location: 131 Rifle Range Road #03-04, Temasek Club, Singapore 588406 Singapore
Review: My family and i love the ambience. The foods served were awesome too! Great services and convenient location for the people living in the West sides.

Name: Spize
Location: 131 Rifle Range Road #03-04, Temasek Club, Singapore 588406 Singapore
Review: A very intimate place with a good ambience. The furniture and decor are inviting. Wldnt mind coming again.

Name: Spize
Location: 131 Rifle Range Road #03-04, Temasek Club, Singapore 588406 Singapore
Review: Wanted to get family members to have a nice dinner with great ambience and SPIZE @ Rifle Range did not disappoint. Food quality was great. Waiters could have been more attentive to clear dishes when required but other than that, great experience!

Name: Spize
Location: 131 Rifle Range Road #03-04, Temasek Club, Singapore 588406 Singapore
Review: Spize (Rifle Range) is perfect for anyone who loves their food yet in an atmosphere perfect for any occassion. This was our 2nd visit in 3 months.

Name: Spize
Location: 131 Rifle Range Road #03-04, Temasek Club, Singapore 588406 Singapore
Review: Sp

Name: Spize
Location: 131 Rifle Range Road #03-04, Temasek Club, Singapore 588406 Singapore
Review:
I love the atmosphere and the great service plus good food. Great for meet ups and chit chat. do make reservation especially for dinner and weekends.

Downside, its out of reach. you need to drive in. Choice of food as much as their other branches.

Name: Spize
Location: 131 Rifle Range Road #03-04, Temasek Club, Singapore 588406 Singapore
Review:
Dinner date for 2 at a cozy place which was not so noisy on a weekday.  
Was a bit disappointed because not many choices for noodles. Perhaps adding Laksa or soup noodles would be great. Otherwise, food portions was just right.

Name: Spize
Location: 131 Rifle Range Road #03-04, Temasek Club, Singapore 588406 Singapore
Review: I booked the table for 8 at 6:30 expecting to spend a really nice evening with my colleagues one couple of whom had recently got married. When we arrived we were told we had to leave the table before 8:30pm as there was another booking for the same table. We rushed dinner and left by 8:15pm. It was not a great experience. If I knew we had to leave within two hours, I would honestly have booked somewhere else.

Name: Spize
Location: 131 Rifle Range Road #03-04, Temasek Club, Singapore 588406 Singapore
Review: The restaurant has a great ambience with a good choice of food. They plate it up so pretty with flowers and such :) Reasonably priced and don't miss out on their ever so good desserts. Although it's a little out of the way, you may want to catch shuttles from King Albert's station to Temasek Club (learnt this from one of their chefs) ... not to sure on shuttle timings though.

Name: Spize
Location: 131 Rifle Range Road #03-04, Temasek Club, Singapore 588406 Singapore
Review:
Trip with family & daughter in law.
Pleasant experience. Prompt service. Food was served very fast after ordering. Food ordered was delicious. Exceptional for Hokkien Prawn noodle still very salty.
Special thanks to service staff Azlan for his prompt service and attentiveness.

Name: Spize
Location: 131 Rifle Range Road #03-04, Temasek Club, Singapore 588406 Singapore
Review:
It was so dry n burnt 
Though brought it to the staff 
He did not feel he still to get a replacement simply said will relay to the chef .. disappointed as I propose this place as a birthday venue.

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review:
Awesome and blissful environment. Food experience is on average note; probably both of us are Chefs background. Cheese cake scored the top marks, unfortunately we didn't take photo. 
Definitely will visit again to try some of their  winning dishes. 
Service was excellent and friendly.

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: First time here for lunch with colleague. Ordered Har Cheong Kai burger, and crispy fish burger. Food was good but not wow. Enjoyed the rose gold latte. The Strawberry Yakult Soju was delicious but expensive at $10. Burnt cheesecake was $9 - also expensive, and I wouldn't say that great. What were important - we sat indoors, nice ambience, great greenery being situated in Bishan-AMK park, and most of all - AMANDA our server - she was cheery and welcoming, and if I own a F&B business, I would hire her! We spent $83 for 2 people - a tad much for lunch, but great for that important catch up. Definitely recommended!

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review:
Service staff was attentive 
Quality of food is so-so 
Price is acceptable
It was less crowded because we came at 5pm,Sat

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: They removed 3 previous meat free dishes and replaced them with 3 more, this time with mushrooma- a soba, pasta and burger (burger is not vegan as the bun has french butter). We tried the pasta and soba. Oasta was tasty with a generous amount of mushrooms but it was not at all spicy even though it was promoted as such.The soba was well marinated and with a good range of accompanying ingredients except that it could do with more mushrooms. Overall, we found these new dishes better than the meat free ones they replaced, so well done!

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: Came for a weekend brunch. Arrive early and was able to get seats without reservation. In the middle of the Bishan park which is surrounded by lush greenery. Good place to have a relaxing weekend away from all the buzz. Place can get crowded during lunch. The service is good and the food were serve quite fast after ordering. Not particularly impressive but the food is tasty enough for me. After brunch can also enjoy a short stroll in the park. Will come back again if I am nearby.

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: This place is a delight to head to with the family as it's cosy and its extensive menu caters for all the various tastebuds. I've tried alot on the menu so far and nothing has fallen short of my expectations. The price-point is, in my opinion, value for money and is almost always full during peak dining hours. Despite that, the wait staff are all very professional, polite, smiley and i really appreciate that. I was served by a nice girl whose name starts with a "C" (sorry I can't remember your name :( ) and she was super genuine and sweet to my kid and my parents the whole time. Thank you :)

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: Great and friendly service and yummy food! Just that things gets a little slower as crowd builds up and drinks take a little longer than expected to be served. Overall still a great venue to chill and catch up with delicious food.

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: This is a nice and quiet cafe within the garden setting of Bishan-AMK Park. To avoid the weekend crowds, we visited it during tea time on a weekday for a light meal and coffee/tea. With the surrounding landscaped greenery and the convenience of a nearby car park, Grub is a very relaxing venue to spend some time

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: Waffle chicken is yummy! First time visit leaves good impression. Environment n food, all good. Will come again!

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: Nestled in the greenery of Bishan Park is this bistro that serves eclectic fusion no

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: Went here for lunch last weekend whilst taking a nature walk in Bishan Ang Mo Kio Park. It’s midway through the park and is an ideal place to pause if your walking the whole park or following the circuit ma

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review:
Many interesting dishes here such as satay chicken burger, mala meat burger...

Ordered Soba salad, pasta bacon carbonara and waffle with prawn paste chicken. All were nice especially the waffle with chicken. Having dinner outdoor after a rainy evening in the park is so enjoyable.

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: value for money. we ordered calamari,  burgers, truffle fries and churros and waffle with vanilla ice cream. everything we ordered was tasty. will definitely coming back and recommend to my friends and family. 😉

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: We came on a Saturday for brunch and it was crowded. Had to wait an hour for our table. Ordered the burger, brunch plate and burnt cheesecake. All good! Drinks (iced coffee and yuzu) ok. Nice ambience and friendly staff. Area for improvement, - introduce vegan items on your menu please, cos there are none.

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: GRUB is a bistro located in Bishan-Ang Mo Kio Park, with air-conditioned indoor seats and al-fresco outdoor seats. Serves meat and fish from sustainable sources. Vegetarian options include mushroom cheese potato croquette, cauliflower and mushroom fritter, duo of dips with garlic bread, garlic bruschetta with tomatoes and olives, portobello burger, as well as mushroom, cheese, and rocket pasta. Kitchen staff can accommodate special requests to modify menu items such as removing meat products, as well as customise plant-based dishes if given a week's noti

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: Offer large varieties of food, a relaxing environment as it’s located in bishan park, however they limit diners to complete within certain time during busy hours. kaya burnt cheesecake is really good but price is steep.

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: This place had quite a few good reviews. However, unfortunately found the mushroom burger just average, perhaps a bit below average. Patty was overdone and dry on the outside. And my matcha latte had this kryptonite green, which looked totally artificial, rather than the pale green standard. Customer service was okay.

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: Great enjoyable dining experience. Always love their Cheese burger and 10 times better savouring it then via delivery.

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: It was a Saturday nite dinner. The food and services were good. One main setback is the environment of outdoor seating. A lot of mosquitoes, my girl got badly stung (although restaurant provides insect repellent spray). Her feet was full of bites and swollen, went to doc and was given antibiotics and other meds. Shall not revisit.

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: I booked 2 tables for 6-7 pax on sat morning for dinner at 8pm. The response was fast, confirmation from the email was amost instance. About 2 hrs before the dinner. A staff from the restuarant called again to confirm the final nos of ppl attending. The caller was very polite and professional. When we arrived at the place crowded with ppl. We saw only 2 tables was empty. Wondering really is for us. Soon the staff received us with a warmth welcome. I wanted to compliment the whole team for efforts & their excellent customer service.

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: Always enjoy the yummy foods prepared and awesome service rendered by the staff @ GRUB (Bishan). Perfect ambience for a quaint little setup amidst the picturesque park setting!

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: We were there on a busy Friday evening. The bespectacled server seemed impatient and stony faced when taking orders and having to wipe up water that was spilled inadvertently by someone at the table. The food took a long time to come, about thirty minutes. But the pesto chicken pasta and burgers were all good value and tasty. Put plenty of insect repellent or dress appropriately when dining in the evening! Nice live singing band present too.

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: Went to Grub for a quick bite with my family. Great place, good location, fantastic service.  Will definitely come back again!

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: It's inside Bishan-Ang Mo Kio Park, evironment is nice. The burger was so nice and I like the salad also. Suggest you sit indoor table

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: Children friendly cafe with high chairs, toilet with child height sinks. Food is served fresh and warm.

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: Nice ambiance. Outdoor is full of greenery. A great place for dining. Variety of foods. Great place for gathering.

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: Its was a busy Friday evening and yet the service was fantastic, the food was really good and the live music just made the experience perfect.

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: Will definitely visit again when i'm in the park! Reasonable price with great ambience! Crew was helpful when it comes to what to order.

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: my family and i totally loved it! fantastic stuff and staff! we went for the conventional food choices but we will return for the more exciting ones

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: The staff were friendly, the food came quickly. The kitchen was able to make requested changes to a dish to suit my daughter. The place was simple and brightly l

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: Good place to hang out at with friends. Laidback setting with friendly service. Average to decent quality food and a little pricey though.

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: The restaurant situated in Bishan Park had a great ambience, whether seated inside or outside. Service by the staff was good and the food was of decent quality too. Will recommend the Har Cheong Kai Chicken with Waffle and the Mala Xiangguo Burger.

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: Went on a Thursday rainy evening and it wasn’t crowded. Sakura Ebi pasta and the salmon steak was nice. So was their dark chocolate cake with gelato. Ambience was nice and quiet. It was good that the restaurant has a note on their table offering insect repellant! We only noticed it much later after feeling itch on our legs. If you’re there, remember to put on insect repellant before going!

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: Visited on a Sunday afterno

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: Deffo try this spot if in the area or via delivery apps. Standard cheeseburger is excellent as are the appetizers. 100% recommend Grub burgers to anyone!!!

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: Enjoyed the food a lot. Outdoor seating is a bit prone to mosquitoes but they offered repellent. Pretty interesting location in the middle of the park!

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: 1st time here and I must say I am impressed by the food and the service. Grilled Chicken Salad was wonderful, Burgers were fantastic. Mentaiko Fries are soooo good.. Reasonable pricing with excellent food I must say. Keep it up cos I am coming back again!

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: Nice ambiance cafe with great foods. Especially for my keto diet meal. Definitely will go back to this cafe again.

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: Grub is known for its quality burgers & chill Vibes. We went there in the evening, staff were friendly & thoughtfu

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: I had ordered food from Grub several times via delivery apps and had always loved the Grub Cheeseburger. This time, I decided to get Chope vouchers and dine at the restaurant itself. Weekday evening (before 7pm so there would still be some daylight) would be the perfect time to have dinner at Grub so we could enjoy the nature scenery of Bishan par

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: If you're planning a nice evening in the park with your family and dog, forget the dog. They don't want to see dogs at less than 50 meters from the joi

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: Grub has an excellent location nestled inside the Bishan park. It was a nice walk from the carpark to the restaurant and we caught the wild fishes swimming in the “river” before we reach Grub. The food was good and priced reasonably, menu was quite extensive.

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: We had a great time with the kids and our grandfather. It's a family friendly place and was nice to have a walk around BIshan Park after an early dinner too. Staff were polite and food was yummy!

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review:
Placed reservation via Chope for a booking. It was fuss free.
10 minutes before booking time, someone from the restaurant called to confirm if I was on my way.
Nice service!
Food was ok, the decor has changed a little from some years ago.

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: Having looked at this small but perfectly formed restaurant online before visiting the country, we were not disappointed when we visited in pers

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: Great service, awesome food, live band was good too! Do try the churros and mentaiko fries! Definitely will come back!

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: We were there for bru

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: I like the choices of burgers, the creativity and innovation on food menu, food tastes good but the coffee is really need to get some improvement.  Staff is friendly tho.

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: Uncooked Dough.  Coffee was so so.... other than a good location can't say i will be back. Blah blah Blah ....to make 100 words :).

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: Really nice Mala Burger and environment. Enjoyed my meetup with my friend. Definitely coming back again!

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: Welcomed by the staffs with politeness and we were ushered to our reserved seats. Ordering of food is simple and seamless. But I would appreciate if there are more pictures of the food items on the menu thought there are highlighted recommendations. Food taste really good especially the mentaiko fries! Love it! Salmon was good too, as tasty as the previous time we visited the outlet. Keep up on the consistency. Overall the place is clean and neat. Would go back again! Cheers!

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: Service was very disappointing. We made reservations but they called and simply changed the timing of our reservation without our approval. When we arrived, they insisted our reservation time was changed, but they made it like they did us a favor by giving us a seat. They seemed reluctant to give out more cutlery even though there wasn't enough. They would look at us and our table questionably when we asked for cutle

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: We tried their breakfast on a Saturday morning. The food was not disappointing though a bit expensive. However having the park and nature literally at your doorstep was worth it.

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: Great value for money, variety of burgers, appetisers and drinks. more brunch menu addition would be preferred.

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: The food was delicio

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: Food was great and service was exceptional! We were well taken care by the friendly staffs even though the place was full. The food was abit of a wait but worth it.

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: Good foodie, environment and atmosphere. Price reasonable. Just that indoor abit warm. Maybe can plan event or Deejays to attract more customers.

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: As it was our first time at Grub, besides our mains, we also ordered small plates to share. Nice selection of small plates but I felt they were priced a tad higher than I expected (they're really small plates!). The next time I come, I'll skip the small plates and just get main

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: Famous for their burgers and pastas-- this was what the waiter told me as he gave me their menu. After spending 200 dollars and one hour at Grub, I can say this is true. I loved their burgers, and for a party of six persons having a main each, drinks, and six appetisers, the price we paid was reasonable for the quality and serving size of the food. Service was fast and polite, and the ambience was lovely. I will definitely be back!

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: Saw the service crew touching the dustbin in the kitchen. Without cleaning their hands, they continued serving... Complained the chair was dirty, staff simply switched it with the chair of empty table without cleaning it...

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: Enjoyed the food- completely revamped menu just last week. Service could be a tad bit better as they may be short on staff.

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: So frustrated that I’m actually writing a review. Sat down at noon with my husband and our 2 small kids, and ordered by 12:15. When we asked a waiter to check on our order when we had still not received any food by 12:45, they told us it was the next order up. Asked again 10 min later with no response. Asked again at 1:00 and were told that the kitchen missed our order and “I’m sorry about that.” Meaning first no one noticed that we were sitting there with kids going crazy waiting for 30 min initially, and all the way up until 45 min from ordering even when we asked them to check our order, no one actually did. We told them to cancel the order and we left. They gave us no further apologies and did not offer to rush any food order, comp any part of the meal, or anything. Never even tried the food, but we won’t be going back.

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review:
Amidst the heat of Singapore, Grub provided the best setting to have a simple good food, casual catch up with friends and family. 
Menu is innovative without trying too hard, while keeping the flavour. 
Place of choice.

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: Food was delicious and ambience was great on a Sunday afternoon. We had a relaxing time and enjoyed the food very much.

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: Grub truly lives up to its reputation of offering delicious food at affordable prices. Some of the fusion dishes we had were: Har Cheong Kai Chicken with waffles, Sakura ebi shrimp pasta and portebello salad. It was a great place to enjoy a good meal with friends.

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: Booked and had our usual favourite meal at GRUB. Had mentioned it was to celebrate my wife's actual birthday in my booking and again before I paid for the meal. Was hoping that they could give the slide of cake we ordered as complimentary, but was told they don't. Slightly disappointed on that. Perhaps the management can consider this in future. Will still go back for our favourite food though.

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: It is a challenge to classify a food outlet in Singapore as the best as there are so many choices, but I have to admit this is the place that serves the BEST burgers.. take a bite and the flavours just explode in your mouth... i had the delux burger at medium well. The servings are massive and there is value for money. This is a place I would go again just to have that burger...

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: Situated in Bishan Amk park, this place gives the cozy vibe. I Had dinner with a friend and she suggested this place. The staff are very accommodating and attentive. I went out for a while but told the staff to keep the table for me and when a group was getting my table the staff politely offered them another space. Food arrived in time, looked good, smell good and was flavorful. Their portion was generous too. With come back soon!

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: Food was excellent, good service and the atmosphere was awsome. Will definitely recommend this restaurant !!!

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: Spirit of new generation is felt in Grub. Staff is friendly and we have always received good recommendations and prompt service. Prompt must be understood as not being time measured, but comparable speed referenced to amount of patrons

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: Nestled in the midst of Bishan Park, GRUB provided an excellent ambience and mains fit for the view. Would recommend to book early as the seating size of the place isn't the largest and it is always packed on weekend nights.

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: Well, if you love the experience of dining in the park, then this place is for y

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: Food was served timely, very relaxing environment with activities for kids. staff is very friendly and thoughtful. would go back there again for brunch with family.

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: Food was not bad , slightly different offerings from usual brunch menus . But ... strangely no flat white on menu ! And BEWARE how you get there — it’s actually not accessed via AMK ave. 1 & the staff can’t give proper driving / parking directions . Took my driving along AMK Ave. 1 for 34 blinking minutes & making several u - turns to finally find the correct car park access !!

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: Good food. Good service.Been here many times.Love the mushroom pizza.The new ebi pasta is nice too.

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: The shop is open at the park but the food is like precooked and not hot at all. So kindly improve and the food selection can be more besides of burger (we know is a main seller but more food selection will able to get more customer)

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review:
The location, overlooking Bishan Park is superb. The burger was excellent, and the service was attentive and helpful. 
It’s a nice place for a friendly brunch.

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: Food was sumptuous. Warm ambience. Was not too crowded for a small group. Friendly and efficient staff.

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: I always bring my friends and family to grub! Good quality of food and good service attitude! Worth to come again!

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: The location is very charming – inside Bishan Park. Brick walls and simple furniture help give it an almost self-effacing look that helps it merge with the environs. You can sit in the al fresco area on cool pleasant evenings. But it being a warm day, the air conditioned interiors pulled us in. An all-glass wall gives a clear view of the verdant greens outside. And that’s the best part of Grub. You can spend time taking in the lush greenery of the park. A sight for sore eye

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: So wanted to like this place, great concept and setting in Bishan P

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: The service was good, staff were friendly and pretty attentive. However, the surrounding was really dirty. Table was dirty when I cleaned it with tissue. There were fruit flies everywhere and some weird stuff/dead insect was found on the table too. Food wise, can really be improved. Their so called signature pasta didn't taste good at all. Super blend. Steak was good though. Earl grey lemon tea tasted just like ice lemon tea. Ice cream was okay... Live band was quite disappointing. We ordered so much that I thought it'd be only logical for them to change tables for us. We literally had to combine our food into same plates because they just kept serving orders when there's already not enough space and they didnt try to make space for us too.

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: Visited Grub at Bishan-AMK Park on a Saturday morning for brunch and was pleasantly surprised at the serene vibe of the cafe. It wasn't hard to find via car and bus and the interior was nicely decorated, spacious, albeit quite chilly for a sunny morning. I tried the Rose Gold Latte - wow! Upgrading to the rose gold latte was a no-brainer; as opposed to having a standard latte. My friends and I shared a burger, the truffle bacon eggs, and a breakfast set. Overall, the food was excellent and lightly seasoned which is perfect for those looking for a healthy morning brekkie. The burger and patty was simple but excellently grilled to medium donenes

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review:
Within Bishan park. 
1st visit. Like the chicken salad. The burger is good.
Overall, can consider for repeat visit.

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: Food was great. A kids menu would be a plus since its marketed as a family bistr

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: Booking for seats is convenient. Was pleasantly surprise with the discount vouchers promo on Chope - purchase was simple and can be used immediately.

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: Situated in the middle of bishan park, customers are prone to insect bites if seated outdoors but service crews were thoughtful enough to offer insect repellent to make the dining experience better. The food is pricey but the portion justifies the price!!

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: Presentation of food was glamorous but taste was okay. Customer service was amateur-ish. Iced Yuzu drink was made using the Korean Citroen mix🙄

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: Food is mediocre, nothing too special. Alfresco dining available, outdoor area nice to sit down with friends and hang out. Won’t revisit if not in the area though.

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: Their burger (double cheese) is fantastic! Juicy burger along with fries! Very nice environment too! Remember to get free Ice water! :)

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: Might have been over a year since I last visited, and the place sure has changed. You order through an ipad now, and the bloody thing doesn’t really work and kinda ruins the whole experience to be honest. However the service more than makes up for it. Everyone was nice and prompt. Special kudos to mark for being really friendly and helping us with our orders. The chilli crab pasta was excellent, and I love their green beer. Highly recommend this place

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: Love Grub! They never disappoint! I've been coming here for years and the menu is always evolving. Love their burgers and mentaiko fries! Nice ambience set in Bishan park. Good music too. They even have live performances on the weekend. Nice little resturant that feels like you are out of the hustle and bustle of the city. Use your GPS to locate. Can be confusing to find with all off the MRT construction going on in that area. It's near the Buddah college near Sin Ming Ave. Good grub at affordable prices.

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review:
Stumbled across this place on a Thursday evening when it was taking the last order. Had a grilled chicken salad. It was surprisingly good.

Will definitely be back to try the other dishes on the menu.

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: Our family favourites are the burgers and the pasta. Great quality food at fairly reasonable pricing. Prior reservation recommended due to limited seating at the restaurant. We came during CNY and restaurant was serving a limited menu but still we were spoiled with choices. Service was friendly and prompt. The restaurant boasts of a view of the park which adds to the relaxing atmosphere. Grub is also family friendly.

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: Great burgers and pasta. We especially liked the atmosphere and the relaxing environment in the park. Good service from the crew too.

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: The bacon carbonara was very tasty, with fragrant smokey bacon chunks and topped with egg yolk.  However the har cheong gai burger was too strongly flavored with the prawn paste. Fries were average.

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: Back to Grub for a few times and the food quality has always been good. They have upgraded their ordering to self service on iPad system.

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: Had the breakfast plus mocha and fries, overall the food is average and would not make you want to remember to come back again, but environment and scenery is nice.

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: Not sure what happened to this place since the last time I dined here but things sure have changed.

Name: GRUB
Location: 510 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1, Singapore 569983 Singapore
Review: Had the bacon carbonara and the Thai pork salad. They went surprisingly well together! Will go back and get those again.

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Being a sucker for Mexican Food, we ended up going to Senor Taco yet again when we couldn’t decide what to have for dinner

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: We visited Senor Taco for a second time and the tacos are amazing as always! Slightly messy but always full of flavour. Didnt need to add the provided hot sauce to fully enjoy the tacos. Alcoholic beverages are slightly pricey but come in fairly big servings sizes. There are quite few service staff even at peak hour but they are efficient and friendly. Only downside for us was the buffalo chicken wings - 6pcs were $14 so were expecting bigger wings but it's actually 3 mid wings and 3 drumlets. All in all, still a great place to visit for good tacos and chill vibes.

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: I will not be back to this place. Food was expensive and not tasty, service was non existent. We arrived and were seated at 7.15pm, ordered and the food arrived slowly and there was a 20 to 30 minutes wait in between the dishes. Pork Carnitas were tasteless and dry. Tacos fared slightly better but overall tasteless as well. we ordered the tacos fiesta which was a mixture of tacos, service staff didnt even tell us which were which. I think for the price i could have gotten a much better meal else where with much better service.

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: The food was 3/10, among the most optimal I have had across mexican restaurants. To make it worse, service was terrible. Had to ask for things 2-3 times, and eventually had to go and get it myself.

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review:
Terrible. Expensive. Sangria $58 was like dirty water with an orange flavor. I spent $ 200 hundred on 4 people and passed in a Mcdonald's after.
The attending was ok.

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Spicy and tangy tacos best goes with some juicy pork belly. Mango margaritas is best combination with those tacos.

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Food is really bad. I've never had mexican food that I rate badly. Ordered a burrito bowl, nachos and 2 tacos for $70

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: We had an early dinner here before heading off on our bumboat ride. There was a mix up in our order, I put it down to a communication break down between us and the waitress, however another woman who seemed to be in charge came over and was extremely rude, basically telling us that we got what we ordered, when it clearly was not what we ordered. They did make us the food we asked for however we were made to feel like it was a bit of an ordeal. Average food and quite expensive for what you get. I would find somewhere else to eat next time.

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Great food, great location with room for children to run around and pla

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Bottom line- Margaritas were watered-down and way overpriced...bordering on ripoff. Going rate in Singapore is $15-19 for margaritas of slightly varying sizes. These are $16.9 (.9? Really?). We started with frozen margaritas and couldn’t tell if they mistakenly left out the alcohol completely. For the next round we tried “on the rocks”. It was all ice with a little margarita, which completely diluted when, shockingly, the ice melted sitting outside in the Singapore heat. Final round we asked for less ice, and got what amounted to a shot of margarita (see for yourself how it came to the table in the attached pic). Would you pay $16.9 for that? Very disappointing, but we should have known after seeing reviews indicating waitresses are giving free drinks for customers to write reviews. Any restaurant that engages in free stuff for reviews obviously needs to do that for some reason. The food was good so that raised it from one star. The $11 salsa and chips were idiotically overpriced but at least the chips were warm.

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Made a reservation but was told on arrival that there no places to sit inside. Upon insistence, was given a table for 2. All the reserved tables remained empty. Floor manager was pre occupied with friends table reservation. Was expecting Latin music but pop music was being aired on sound system. Band plays short periods of music to well trained dancers

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: The tacos were great! My erver was outstanding and quick. I will definitely come again. My server was dynamicin she showed continuity from 1v1

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Great place for hanging out awesome waitresses veery friendly give us a free drink and have us write this review so we take it

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Magnificent Seńor Taco. Amazing live latin music great service i love Al pastor and beef bistec. Habanero love love

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: I’ve been going to Señor Taco in Clarke Quay every week for about 3 years. I must say what a fantastic place this is. Very friendly staff, excellent food and an amazing live band. If you want to learn to dance they run lessons too. A great way to meet new friends.

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: I heard good reviews about the place but was disappointed with my time here. They have so little space and they prefer having salsa classes during evenings which means lesser space. I sat inside and liked the music and dance classes though the food and drinks was a let down. The beer was bad and the taco could have been better - I might give it one more try but would prefer sitting out and ordering a hard tortilla taco.

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review:
The food tasted a bit better than it looked, which isn’t a compliment. Save your money and go anywhere else.

There are thousands of really good restaurants that are much cheaper.

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Unfortunately the standard has dropped over the years, the food becoming more salty with lesser ingredients in the tacis. The Quesidilla grande was not big at all with only a thin layer of minced meat and not worth the price.

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: We stopped for some tacos and a few drinks when we were bar hopping in Clarke Quay area... Super vibe and great music as well. We opted to sit outside as the restaurant was full.

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review:
If you love some Mexican food, save your Tuesdays for some 50% off tacos :) the guacamole is also great but a bit more expensive!!!! 

Also, go for it and join the salsa classes

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Overall I’d say food & service is ok & acceptable. Food not che

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Check out my 18 dollar frozen margarita in a white cup versus a mojito. Mine drink looks like a tea cup but doesn’t cost like one. Should I have known it will come in this size. I would not have ordered

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Sizzling fajitas were awesome and me and my friend love our Hoegarden beer. We will definitely visit again. Great service was definitely a hit.

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: We come for the tacos and margaritas...both are excellent. Good chips and guacamole. We like sitting outside and just watching life roll by us.  Great place to come and get some latin food.

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: The pastor tacos are lovely but the prices are just so expensive but well is Singapore so cannot blamed them, the habanero sauce is lovely if you loved chillies food. Great Deal

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Best place in Singapore for live latin music. A must of you like dancing salsa, batchata and merengue.

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: My friend and I went to Senõr Tacõ 3 days in a roll to enjoys good drinks and great services. Zeuu and Katerina treated us very very well. We will come back again!

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Good drinks, good food, good service. Especially from Zeuu and Cathrina. We‘ll definitely come back again

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: The nachos were awful - cheese that came out of a can, the minced beef was sloppy and had no flavour which then made the nacho chips very soggy and unpleasant to eat. Same with hubby's taco - the beef was generous but tasteless and there was nothing else on the taco (where's the rest of the filling??) I've eaten Mexican in Adelaide and it's flavoursome and you can taste the spices and lime - the food from Senor Taco was nothing like that at all. Another downside - Clarke Quay is a smoke-free zone yet patrons were coming out of the bar area and smoking near diners. When we questioned this with the waitress, she said that its up to the police to fine them. I disagree - you need to ensure your patrons adhere to local laws which are in place for a reason. We will not be back to this place again and advise others to avoid it as well.

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: 14 of us celebrated the impending nuptials of a collea

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Great Tacos! Just as home, and the service is really complete. A good place for Mexican tacos in Asia

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: The food was beyond average, nothing really had flavour, nor did it look that appetizing. Although we requested the vege nachos we got meat in it, when we asked for this be fixed, the waiter rolled his eyes at us prior to offering to amend it. We were not fans across the board - vego's and meat eaters alike. Would recommend trying somewhere else instead. For the money its not worth it at all. Clarke Quay has so many other options.

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Food was very disappoint

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: We had a great time and Señor Taco. The tacos were really good as were the frozen margarita pitchers. Charlene took really good care of us and was just the right amount of sassy and a lot of laughs were shared. As with most other things in Singapore, more expensive than it needs to be but I don't hold that against the restaurant. Highly recommended.

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Hands down the best Mexican food in Singapore. I’ve lived in Mexico and this is as close as you’ll get to the real stuff. Great service from Charlene too!

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review:
I gave this a 3 mainly due to the excellent and friendly service from Katrina.

Unfortunately, the food served was just about average, with small helpings.
Don't plan a night out on this place!

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: 40 dollars for 4 tiny tortilla tacos via Deliveroo. We were two people and ended up having to go out for food after eating this "40-dollar-appetizer". What a joke..

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: After clubbing or bar hopping, you might get hungry. Visit Senor Taco for some delicious tacos. We met one of the waitress KAtrina and she was very nice and provided excellent customer service! The location is outdoor seating and you get to enjoy the nearby live music. We would come back aga

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: By far the best tacos in singapore (and the fish tacos better than in mexico :O). If you like the chill in clarke quay, this is the chilliest. Food good, drinks super, people super-nice and super-service (especially katrina, her spirit lifts the place :D), definately a keeper!!

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Great tacos, decent price too if you go on a Tuesday. Beer is served chilled. Good service is hard to find in CQ, but very good here (waitress was called Katrina and she did a great job). Only downside is that GST a 10% service charge isn’t included in the price and isn’t clear in the menu.

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: We went to the one in Chimes and the vibe is nice, and the Mexican staff are knowledgeable and charming, but the local staff are walking round like zombi

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Yami food, grate atmosphere, awesome live and Dj music. Definitely recommend this place for Latin music lovers and Latin-American Dancers!

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Awesome place to enjoy the latin live music and best Mexican food and drinks in town. You shouldn’t miss this place ...

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Been here several times and had good experience. This time I wanted to try my new app Sluggr with drinks offers. The app clearly mentions in the terms and conditions and FAQ: Are there any restrictions on day or time of u

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Disappointed by the food without savor, disappointed by the prices very expensive for the quality and the quantity.

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: All ratings are from scale of

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Great location in the courtyard of Chijmes! We went as a family and my husband's enchilada came first, and he was long done eating when our food finally came - about 15 minutes between dishes being served. I understand when not all dishes can come out at the same time, but it should be much closer together. So it was a lot of sitting and waiting and watching each other eat. Good food but not good service. No one ever came back to ask how the food was, but that seems to be the norm in Singapore. It is a nice place to meet up though. Cool setting.

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: The food and drinks here were excellent and the service was very good! However it is very expensive, as is anywhere in Singapore I suppose! We paid $54 for a cocktail jug, which probably works out as 3 cocktails and they do have different special offers everyday. The food was relatively small portions (tacos and quesadillas) but the nachos looked like a large portio

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: This place is great for a meet up. Singapore is Uber expensive for anything and everything. Especially on a night out with friends... my wife and I have been going here for years. It’s super quality food and affordable for a night out in Clark Quay. You just have to do it right. Buy tacos, quesadillas and a jug of margarita. Boom, $100 your taken care of!!! That’s unheard of in Singapore for a meal unless you’re in a Hawker center.

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: I could make better tacos with both my hands tied on my back. Meat was really dry, the tacos in general quite tasteless. Expensive and bad. Not worth the money at all. Their drinks (margharita two for one) qualifies to the worst drinks we’ve ever had anywhere. If you’ve had good mexican food before - do not go here! It will ruin your day. It’s a Mexican disgrace.

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Servers are great and attentive but the place wasn't ready or set up for the evening crowd at evening opening time. As it was my first time, I traded their mains for 3 different tacos - Al Pastor, Pork Belly Cartinas and Chicken Fajitas... though they were small, they were amazing!

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: This place has gone grossly downhill. We will never eat here again! $80 for 6 tacos and a bottle of wate

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Was craving for Mexican food on a Saturday night and we came to this place. Service was *TERRIBLE*. They were just looking at us like we didn't exist. A server cleared the table but left dirty glasses and water bottle. They took our order and we waited ten years before it was served. The first order was served after ten years and the other orders (including the drinks) never came. We followed up our orders and gave them the benefit of the doubt but it never came. We decided to walk away because the rest never came and we were super hungry. Even the drinks which was the easiest and should come first never came!!!! Next thing we knew,the server was chasing us because we only paid $10 for our fajita which we just had two bites. The manager tried to argue with us (define good service) They should be happy atleast we paid for their bad servic

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Portions were small. Food was overpriced. Spent $150 for 3 people. Waited long to be served. Bad experience in general. Once and never again.

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: The ambience is nice, the music is OK. It caught by suprise that happy hour is not applied when we trying to use entertainer. This is a rule that is not very clear at all on their listing. Knowing other places in Singapore, this is the first time I had this restriction. On top of it they don't serve ice water.

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: If you want to give away your money or are in a mood for charity please visit this place.They have two restaurants on the same street.I think they also provide free salsa lessons and that is the only thing which you can go there for.The server is least interested in serving you.The food is terrible.The prices unreal.Drinks are worst.Please avoid this place if you visit Clark quay.There are many good options around this place.I think this place should should be renamed Senor Worsto...

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review:
I’m Mexican and this place offers real Mexican food! It’s delicious and the staff is great!
I went to the Orchard location, it’s a hidden gem! 
The ceviche it’s incredible yummy!!

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Dishonest + Exorbitant Charges for Water1. DISHONEST - They have raised their prices for their food items but continue to give customers the old menu with the old pricing. We caught them out on this but only after we have paid and they were unwilling to give a refund. Suggested nicely to them that they should get rid of the old menu with the old pricing as it's not representative of their actual pricing but their response did not indicate that they were going to do so.2. EXORBITANT WATER CHARGES - They do not serve drinking water here. Cost is $5 for a small bottle of water. I had lunch at Prego (a proper restaurant in Fairmont Hotel) earlier and they charged $3 for free flow sparkling water. If you go to Wine RVLT @ Carpenter Street, they offer you free free flow sparkling or still water - That's what good customer service is about. Stop profiteering from your customers for something like water that costs next to nothing in Singapore.3. DO NOT get Chope vouchers for Senor Taco - We made a mistake of buying the vouchers from the Chope App and found out that if you are using the Chope App, you are not allowed to enjoy any of the Happy Hour drinks. This was not stated in the terms and conditions. Their alcoholic prices are already jacked up so that their Happy Hour prices look ok so without being able to enjoy Happy hour drinks, you are subjected to paying a lot more of what you would pay anywhere else for alcoholic drinks.

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Latin dancing held there regularly, friendly staff, and their happy hour prices are quite reasonable and also include food items as well as drinks. The food itself is quite good too, located near Clark Quay.

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Great service by a staff named Shar, very welcoming! She's always making sure we all having a good time, Sangria jugs tasty and lethal.. Came with complimentary Tequilazz!! Well done Senor Taco!

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: I especially loved their sauces. Its as authentic as it gets. Their tacos are fresh, crisp and the meat is succulent plus the waitress, Shah, is so accommodating and pleasant. Amazing service and food!

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Amazing food, amazing service! Best tacos in Singapore :) great service by shah! Love the ambience! 💗

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review:
Friendly staff with good service with smily face,very good attitude...nice place to chill around..
Staff name: Sha

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Great place to go to dance salsa, bachata and merengue with live music! They play live music every night; great band, great staff and good food! Don’t have to know how to dance to have fun at Señor Taco

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Came early for dinner on a Saturday, just me and the kids. They were craving for Fajitas hence decided to come here. We chose a nice spacious table inside by the bar. The decor was nice with the mural paitings on the wal

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Great food! Awesome staff! Renzel Washington is amazing. Very friendly and helped with food and laughs!

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Visited for cocktails...it was good and service was excellent....was good experience...would recommend visiting here for food or drinks...

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Great place and service with awesome  happy hour which lasts all night long......strong cocktails....awesome!!!!!

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Great tacos! Gluten free soft tacos are so good plenty of vegetarian options too which I loved. Great atmosphere. Can sit outdoor socially or indoor for dinner restaurant type styl

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Went in the evening and there was great music;  live inside and good party music outside. Great service and tasty food. We got to know one of the staff people who was very knowledgeable on Mexican food and really attentive. Will definitely come back!

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: love the live band. love the food! the dancing is great especially for salsa and bachata!!! great DJ as well! :D <3<3

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Thanks Ms Jolly for the lovely service with smile and the awesome food. Thoroughly enjoyed with family.

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Great food and awesome service!! :) had amazing nachos and the service size was huge!!! Will be back for sure!! Be sure to ask for jolly when you're here! She is great!

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Good review best food. Awesome food. Everyone should come here. Cheap and free n easy. Friendly waiter especially rezel.

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Always love this place. Happy hour and their Tuesday tacos, 50%..........Service is great and friendly.  Margaritas, cocktails....fantastic....

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: This place has the closest to real tacos in Singapore. The corn tortillas are authentic and not like the "Australian" Taco places in Singapore with no idea of what Mexican food looks like. The "Orange" habanero salsa is authentic, and the Tortas really remind me of growing up in Mexico... The best in Asia. The Mexican community is a regular her

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: I live in Singapore for quite sometime now and I must say that Senõr Taco is a great place in the heart of Singapore nightlife. The famous burritos and the excellent margarita never fail to please me. The staff is courteous and professional. If you like Latin music, there is a live Latin band that will play your favourite songs 6 days a week. Will definitely go back regularly to enjoy myself with my friends. Must try

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Good sauce ! Please try all the sauce available .... guarantee will blow ur mind . Food at the right portion and good service

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: My 4 friends and I had taken a table outside and were having our food and our drinks. Three of us girls decided to go inside and dance a bit. We went inside and started having a good time. One staff walks up to us and asks if we have ordered anything- in the middle of our dancing! Like she stops, taps our shoulder and asks us. Essentially asking us whether we were just three Indian freeloaders. I didnt see anybody else being asked this question. As Indian foreigners we are VERY aware of how differently we are treated compared to fellow white foregners but somehow it was unexpected in this setting because this was not Attica with its 18-20 year old patrons and openly racist staf

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Great deals on for taco Tuesday, whilst being tasty(the fish/pork were our favourites), good atmosphere outside and lots of people dancing inside which was nice to see! Would Recommend

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Drinking here, especially outside, is a good place to people watch but our food was mixed: my tacos were tasty but dry; my friend’s chicken went down well but my other friend was not at all impressed with her veggie fajitas.

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: If you are traveling to Singapore, Mexican food might not be on the top of your list but if you want a break from the usual Singapore fare this is a really good option. The Mexican food is really quite good. In fact, the pozole is excellent as are the tacos. The staff is friendly, and efficient and the prices are not that bad. Go for the bucket of beer as that is usually a good deal. I've been there twice on two different trips and both times resulted in a good dinner with a fun atmosphere.

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: This place is in Clark Quay. A good place to have Mexican food. However the restaurant was bone chilling cold. We sat outside where it was pleasant. Corn chips and salsa was good but quantity of salsa was too small. Fajitas was really good. Water at $8 a bottle is way too pricey.

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Service was extremely slow and not good. The menu was disgusting - it was damp and strands of hair sticking to it. Order fish taco and the fish was a little dry. Only thing I enjoyed was the happy hour margarita.

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Señor Taco is a nice Mexican joint at Clarke Quay. They serve good Tex-Mex inspired food, mainly tacos that make for nice snacks. I'd go dining else where.

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Staff are weird, creeps close to listen to conversations. Service was poor and they were not helpful at all. Staff also not aware of ongoing promotions and we had to wait for them to consult their manager. And worst was, she took my hand phone which showed the promotion without permission,and walked away to find her manager

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Food is good and it tastes authentic as compared to the standard over seasoned Tex-Mex food you find at Chili’s. Though it’s best to go during happy hour in the later part of the afternoon as it’s a better valu

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: The food tastes good. There are some options for people with Vegetarian diets. The staff is not so friendly, otherwise this place would have got an excellent rating.

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: We were here on a Friday night. To have some food, but especially to have a beer with a friend. The girl how helped us, didn't really know what she was doing, I think it is very irritating because you pay like 10% service charge everywhere and some of the places just don't deserve it. The food was okay, but the Senior Taco across Ochard towers is way better. At the end of the evening we needed to pay full price, for the Corona. 15++ each but the neighbors had buckets and I didn't see it on the menu. So I asked the manager if he could arrange something for us, because the price difference is just huge. He didn't have to think about it and gave us a special price. It was a quick solution and we were very happy with it.

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Been living in the city for 4 months and I have tried many mexican places, but this is the one with the worst service by f

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: The staff was incredibly rude without any reason,crazy high prices like you spend more for drink a beer then eat your me

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Good Mexican Food with a nice selection of tacos and tex mex variety. Location is perfect for us and thank you for your warm service! We loved the ambiance and good value for the price!

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Only open at night. Tiny kitchenette turning out quesadillas and tacos soooo greasy as if to help slow down the impact of booze, of which there are lots. The Entertainer offer includes two BOTTLES of tequila for the price of one - not the place for a quiet evening or a fun night with the kids. Their orange-colour salsa is numbing.

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Loved the 'Tacos al Pastor' & 'Nachos & Chili-Bea

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: If some one want to enjoy Tamil song please visit this Mexican place. All good and amazing because of location however all staff is Php and Tamils so basically you don’t get the feel of Mexican ba

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
Location: 3 D River Valley Road #01-12 Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Always a good taco time at señor. Great service at the Clarke quay outlet. Get the fish taco! Super yum

Name: Senor Taco Clarke Quay
