The black sesame tart unexpectedly good and the filling is really smooth and tasty and not sweet (feel like can make a really good filling for a snowskin mooncake ).

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review:
Pretty good food but service was not impressive. Coffee was up to standard.
Will still come back and see how their service quality fare.

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review: Spending our late brunch there after shopping at Samadi market.. Enjoys the food especially the smoothies! I still miss their smoothies now.

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review: Great food, and very friendly staffs! Good for gathering of close friends and family, enjoyed my time here!

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review: A casual and cosy place perfect for gathering of close friends and family. Good food, hospitable staff members and simple ambience.

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review: Always enjoyed the foods in Lola's. Our All time favorite Ultimate croissant, Honey paprika wing & pull pork Egg Benedict!

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review: Absolutely love this place for our regular coffees and brunch. The team there are doing a great job and I wish them the best!!

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review: I ordered the Miso Salmon Grain Bowl, truffle fries & the Lola’s breakfast. portion sizes were good! the truffle size portion was very very decent for $10. struggled to finish the above for 2 people. the miso salmon grain bowl was seasoned perfectly and tasted amazing. service was really good, friendly & prompt! i went at 2 pm and the crowd was good!

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review: The dishes were very unique and yummy. Purchased a chope voucher before going which made it more affordable. Otherwise it’s just like cafe price

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review: Good food, Nice Ambiance, Friendly and fast Service staff. If the tables could be a little further from each other would make it perfect

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review:
Pulled Pork with avocado is too salty.  Plate too small for the ultimate croissant.  Felt a little “jelut” after a couple of mouthful.  Cozy ambience and friendly team members.  
A little pricy for a family of 4.

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review: Went Lola's for brunch. Great little cafe. Lovely food and we totally enjoyed the quality of the food. I still want to try the other stuffs on the menu.

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review: The food was affordable, especially for students with limited budget like me. Moreover, the food was really good as well.

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review: Here for the first ti

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review: My group and I were late for 10 min but we were still attended promptly. The foods are awesome! The staffs are attentive too. Cosy place to hang out although a little squeezy. :)

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review: Service was prompt and food was good. Cafe was cramp and the atmosphere wasn’t the most ideal. But the good food made up for it

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review:
Enjoyed the breakfast. Wide variety to choose from. Coffee and tea selection was ample. And the cakes for dessert was very tempting. 
Table seating was rather close to one another. Loud chatting was a little annoying from other patrons.

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review: This cafe is have so many dessert, is so delicious like tiramisu, chocholatte and various kinds of bread.

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review: Service was top-notch, advisable to make reservations via chope or you might have to end up waiting 30-40 mins in line for walk-ins.  Must try: Honey Paprika Wings

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review: The dinner bowls may look small, but they are very filling and we left extremely satisfied. The staff were also attentive and friendly. But of course, we visited before the crazy dinner hours, so that could be why as well.

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review: My friends and I had a great time at lola's. We had wings & truffle pasta. The wings hit at the right spot, it was crispy on the outside and very juicy on the inside.

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review: I made a lunch booking for V-day and was not disappointed! From start to finish everything was great! I arrived 10 mins early from my booking time and we were immediately seated at a reserved table. Even though the cafe was full house there were just the right amount of staff to ensure we had enough attention and the cafe does not feel cramped but rather it was co

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review: First of all, its super near my home. And best thing is that my original booking was for 330pm, but my friends and i needed to be early and brought forward the meeting time to 1pm. Staff called me at 1230pm to confirm my 330pm booking and i told them the change. Immediately, staff said she will assist me to get the next available tables around 1pm. My friends reached at 1pm and gotten seats, which was awesome. But i guess, for those who drives and from a distance away, may wanna get tips on where to park before visiting.

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review: Their eggs benny is really amazing, its worth the travel to Kovan. They also have interesting desserts for one to try.

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review: Food was great and healthy tasting. Crowd do build up during lunch time. Place is kid friendly and they love the food as well.

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review: the queue was pretty short, making it easy to get a seat. service was fast and the good was great! would definitely recommend people to go there

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review: Love their burgers and pork eggs Benedict!! Still plate and serve really nice desserts. Will always go back to Lola’s for some good ol’ cafe food.

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review: Not my first time visiting and definitely won’t be my last! The grub served is really good, and the service staff were friendly and polite.

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review: Great food and service consistently. Only drawback would be to provide more options for vegetarians.

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review: The place has good ambience but overall the food was average wouldn’t say that it had a wow factor to it. The cakes were average too. But it’s convenient as it’s located near kovan mrt

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review: Great place to hang out with your buddies, the chicken wings are a must try but overall experience and ambience is pretty average.

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review: Got my sofa seat request fulfilled, great food and great service. Highly recommended to everyone to dine

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review: Went to Lola with a friend to celebrate her birthday. The wings, once again, were awesome! It's my third time trying the wings, and it has been consistently delicious. The other two dishes we had, Truffle Mushroom Linguine and Pulled Pork were okay. Not too bad, could do with more truffle on the first dish and though I loved the taste for pulled pork, wasn't a fan of its texture. The chicken wings still set the best standard. I had the tarts before, they were delicious. The sponge cakes (we had Earl Grey Banana and Salted Caramel Popcorn) however, were disappointed. Really dry sponges. Only the middle part of the cake was moist. Probably left out in the open for too long and dried up.Another thumbs down was the service staff. We were served by this tall guy with spectacles who came to take our order. I wanted to ask about the dish, and I guess because it was really noisy around, he couldn't hear it the first time. Instead of politely asking me to repeat, he raised his voice and went "HUH??? WHAT??" It was very so rude. I think he noticed the look on my face that I was unhappy. It's really disappointing.

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review: Good cafe in the neighbourhood, cheap and affordable! Food was on point! Will definitely visit again!

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review: The food serving is big and we made some special request and they are happy to prepare for us! The atmosphere is wonderful. A great hangout place.

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review: We’ve tried couple of things - pulled pork, apple pie. Food is ok just too much sauces and mayo in my view. Prices too high for quality of food.

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review: A great service, lovely staff and and  very enjoyable types of food and beverages... What could we ask more? I highly recommend the lemon meringue tart. The piccolo latte is worth trying too! Overall, I highly recommend this place.

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review:
Good food, delicious pasta, salmon, yummy n crispy chicken wings. 
Caramel sea salt cake is very special.  Coffee is great too.  Overall good dining experience

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review: A trip to Lola is always enjoyable. The food quality is always guaranteed and the waiting team pleasant and polite.

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review: Food was nice compared to few years back. I have been there for twice this months and both visit are happy with thehot and fresh food. The cake was also nice. We have fish and chips, honey wings, salad, pasta, chocolate cake and lemon tart(not sure whether is it call lemon tart).

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review: The atmosphere and ambience is incredible with extremely friendly staff. The chicken wings are to die for!!!!

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review: Food was decent enough for the price paid. Could see why there's always a crowd there. However, the T&Cs were confusin

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review:
I Tried the breakfast menu here!!Its was nice!! tried the chocolate cake also nice!!
The queue is quite long during dinner time!! The ultimate croissant was nice!! Too bad they only have 1 branch in Singapore!

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review: The fish and chips was terrible it’s so bland. Enquired about the tasteless fish and chips and the staff did not get back to me. Maybe it’s just my tastebuds or today’s batch of fish was bad, but I suggest you order other things except the fish and chips.

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review: I must really compliment the excellent service provided by their service staffs every time I visit their cafe. But one of their staffs, Norman, is exceptional. He pays attention to every single detail. For instance, after we were asked to moved to the other side of the cafe, he noticed that we do not have any water and gave us without us asking for it. He even noticed that my glass of water has mint leaves in it and asked if I would like a new glass of water with mint leaves. Being in the service line as well, I would say his service level is comparable to a 6-star hotel like Ritz Carlton. I sincerely thank him for making my time at the cafe enjoyable.

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review: brunch menu is great but not available at dinner time. a little pity. croissant is the most recommended.

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review: Wow. What a great little cafe in kovan. The outside does not look promising, but the inside is cool and well decorated. The food...ridiculously good. Unbelievable. Try the pulled pork with avocado, egg and hollandaise on toast. The sprinkling of paprika sets it off. The ham and scrambled. egg croissant is delicious - the eggs so buttery and rich. This place is worth traveling to - but the secret is out, be prepared to queue on weekends.

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review: The return of this dish has been a big joy to my husband. The dish is very tasty and value for money. It is also served with mash potatoes n onion sauce n truffle it is simply delicious

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review: After reading a few good reviews of the place, I felt that the food did not live up to its price tag.

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review: I love the selection of dessert here - and they are so reasonably pric

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review: Little surprise saw a placard written my name on the dining table when arrived the restaurant. Simple place, served good food, portions were just right us.

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review: Attentive and polite staffs, food was awesome. Suitable for any occasions. All time favourite cafe!!

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review: The staffs do give good recommendation on cakes. We love the cakes, wings, and salmon stew. We will be back again.

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review:
I came across this cafe one afternoon and they serve very delicious cakes. The cake i ordered was the lychee rosewater cake. It smells very nice too. Rose and lychee fragrance.

Will definitely go back and try other food.

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review: Was amazed at the speed that they serve the food. And the aglio olio was very nice. Truffles fries as well!!

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review: Food was great. Lucky we made the booking as the queue was really long despite a raining day. Wings was awesome.

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review: This cafe is rather small but cosy. We went with a group of friends plus some kids too. The food is yummy and price is reasonable too. Service level is above average. So, we were all impressed with this place. Would we return? Definitely!

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review: No sign of the avocado in my breakfast. And I kinda forgot that I ordered that till after finishing the meal. So too late to tell the nice server.Very small portion and with the missing avocado it’s less filling too, and that’s when I realized that I was short changed ;<

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review: I love the cats they feed outside the cafe. So I love this cafe now. Food’s good, atmosphere’s good. Just park at Heartland Mall open space carpark then walk over (2 mins) because it’s too tough getting a spot along the cafe during dinner time. Would love to visit the cafe and cats again!

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review: Been there many many times. Getting more expensive than it was 2 to 3 years ago but for the price and food quality I will still give it 5 stars. I love the honey prapika wings and the mushroom cream past

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review: would always find cafe food a little on the pricey side but lola's is different! affordable and located at a heartland location, it was easy to find and also the vibes were good. staff were friendly and patient. food arrived quickly

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review: A reservation was made for brunch and we were directed to our table as soon as we arrived. The cafe was getting busy as we were taking our orders. Most of our food arrived promptly. However, one order took more than 20mins to arrive. I checked with the servers for my order as the neighboring tables who ordered the same dish had theirs while arriving later than me. Upon checking, the servers were apologetic and admitted that there was a mix up and my order was missed. They even offered a free dessert on the house as a apology. Kudos to them for their service and willingness to make amends. I would come back agai

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review: The place is very child-friendly, staff is polite and attentive. Food's fantastically-plated and taste was above expectations. Perhaps the cakes looked too tantalizing, we were very disappointed when it tasted average. Overall, a great visit. 1 point short of perfect score because of the difficult parking (limited lots outside the cafe; carparks a big junction away) and the cakes that should have tasted as good as they look.

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review: Lately, getting seats here is quite challenging. Waiting time can be as long as 45’ to 1 h

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review: Short walk from kovan mrt exit b. This place is rather small. Come before 1230 on weekend to secure a table. I had the crab cakes benedict. This was ok. Not fantastic. However my friends’ scrambled egg crioss

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review: Went to take away a matcha latte. It was $4.50 for a relatively small cup. I thought the ambience of the restaurant was nice, but haven’t really tried the food. The matcha latte was quite good. For someone that like something sweet, this latte was sweet enough, and bitter enough. But it was too small a cup. Not worth for $4.50.

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review: I really like the atmosphere of this cafe. The seats were quite unique even though I feel that the tables were a little close to each other during crowded times, making me feel a little uncomfortable.

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review: What is Lola’s winning formul

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review: It is located near Kovan MRT. just a few minutes walk. It is usually packed during peak hours but it is totally worth it. The chicken winggs, cheese fries, pasta and burger. Don't forget the desserts. We usually have lemon meringue tart for dessert. One of the best we have tasted in Singapore. This is as well a great place to have desserts after meals. They have a lot of choices of tarts and cakes. It has an affordable price. They only accept NETS and cash by the way.

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review: We tried their dessert and both was delicious, we had lychee rose cake and lemon meringue, goes well with our ice mocha for me and hot tea for my friend. Will be back to try other food they have and other dessert too. Friendly staff and nice place but a little noisy as it was enclosed.

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review: Finally came to thiscafe after so many years. Reserved table through Chope. We went there during weekday and it still full house. We did order honey paprika crispy wings, grilled chicken & brocolli cheese burger and swimmer crab and lemon leek linguine.All foods taste nice especially the crispy wings. Finger-licking!

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review: I live closer and I use to go there once a whi

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review: good coffee, good wings, food is generally quite okay. meat can be more tender. burger can be softer. some light music will be nicer.

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review: Used to be better in terms of food. Truffle fries was better last year. But service was good. Was hoping that the Brunch menu can be extended to dinner timing.

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review: Food was presentable and tasty. Staffs were very heart warming and friendly despite long wait for my lychee cake due to system error missing out this particular item.

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review: Always had dessert and coffee here. One night my Friend and I decided to have dinner here and was left in shock. The Nachos Cheese Fries was great! A tad salty but nevertheless yummy! Eat it while it’s hot! The mains however fell short, slow cooked pork with truffle mash was a microwaved bowl disaster. And their fish and chips although it looked appetising the batter was completely tasteless. I was curious what others thought about the food here and went to read up on reviews and concluded that we came on a very bad day. Chef was probably down with the flu or somethin

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review: It's not a chilled place. The noise inside is constantly loud with chatter and high turnover as it is crowded. There's mostly, a queue but not a long wait to be seated. Not recommended if you want a quiet and relaxed me

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review: Meal: Ordered a long black and Crab Cake Egg Benedict. It is a perfect brunch combination. Flavourful and deliciou

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review: love the desserts here. n nett prce with water! nice staff and cool decor. i would highly recommend this place for family or friends.

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review:
Excellent in food...
Excellent in service...
Excellent in atmosphere...
Excellent in all ways...

Highly recommended to all...

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review: Good place for gathering on weekdays. Food and ambience are good. Convenience place in heartland. Service is good!

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review: Visited lola’s More than 5 times now. Be prepared to queue but they have since expanded their cafe so the next door unit is for seating as well. Food served fresh and appealing!

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review: Perhaps they are good for brekkie. The food we ordered, none of us really like it. Would say the price is slightly cheaper compared to the usual Cafe, that’s it.

Name: Lola's Cafe
Location: 5 Simon Road, Singapore 545893 Singapore
Review: Very nice food at acceptable price and atmosphere was great and friend staffs were friendly. We went for brunch and though my reservation was 3pm which was the timing they end brunch, they even called me earlier to ask me to come earlier before their last order for brunch closes at 3pm.

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review:
I booked a dinner reservation at Zafferano to celebrate my wife's birthday. The staff was very helpful and responsive in catering to my request.

We had a great experience there,  the service was great and the food was delicious. We will definitely come back again!

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: This is only my personal preference. I tried out the restaurant to bring some people for work Christmas dinner. Saw that the view was good base on some research and also recommendation by someone. I expected as much when it comes to fine dining that serving would be small but didn’t expect it to be that small given it’s my first visit. I’ve been to other Italian places and personally I’d say good quality wise you can get same level for lesser price. Be careful with the meat order as it has a minimum weight order but it’s was honestly quite good. Overall I would come back maybe more for drinks and the view but certainly not the food. I would have hope the staff also was attentive enough to give out suggestions or information about their food.

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: Selected this restaurant to celebrate our anniversary, and we are not disappointed. Initially reserved the outdoor and didn't realise that it not a good location for dining. Thanks to the friendly staffs to find us a tab

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: I am a bit sad while writing this review about Zafferano: my expectations were so high, that at the end of the dinner last night I was feeling overall disappointe

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: Zafferano has its spectacular view going for it - but what about the food? I made arrangements for our party of 3 to celebrate a birthday. Looking at a copy of the Chef's Menu online, the offspring agreed that it was the kind of food we would enjoy. The execution of the menu exceeded the simple descriptions. From the well made amuse bouche right to the final course of 3 delectable petit fours (sorbet infused strawberry!), we enjoyed every bite. In these lockdown times, it evoked for us memories of our last trip to Italy, 2 years ago. The Chef’s Menu offered tastes of fresh prawn, an autumnal fish, pasta cooked simply with sweet crab meat, culminating in top grade Miyazaki wagyu strip loin, cooked perfectly. The “forest” inspired dessert was an outstanding execution of contrasting textures - the crunch a wafer, the bite of top quality chocolate, a smooth mousse. Each plate was beautifully presented and explained clearly, though unobtrusively. Most importantly, it was food you actually enjoyed eating. What sealed the evening was the outstanding service. Thank you! Highly recommended! It’s a not an every day place but delivers outstanding value. I am surely going back.

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: Nice ambience, located high in the CBD district with an almost 360 glass panels , the whole restaurant looks amazing during the day with natural light. Food was good, had a try on this place during the restaurant week. The only concern is maybe the seatings. Some tables are less attended to. I remember requesting for an extra bread that came very late into the main course, and the table wasn't cleared off after the appetisers, crumbs were visible on the white table cloth. Although it has to be raised twice, the waiter eventually cleared it off.

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: Great staff, amazing food, superb view. We had an outside seating which is not standard but highly recommended ! Better view than inside the restaurant. Price/value; Good! Wines of course make the bill raise of course but that’s a personal decision. Food/value for sure very good. Thanks to the staff; keep it up!

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: Good sunday brunch spread with impeccable service! Number of slightly mains could be increased. Overall a good experience and will return.

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: We had a pretty good lunch here, and the views were superb as the weather was good. We started with the best dish, I thought, which was the heirloom tomatoes in cream. It was light, tasty and refreshin

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: What a wonderful evening at Zafferano's! My wife and I enjoyed a beautiful evening of great food, good wine, attentive and amazing service with a spectacular view! From the moment we arrived it was professionalism in service from the seating and throughout our meal, truly an enjoyable experience from start to finish! Thanks to the staff for making our night out a memorable one!

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: I was here few times for lunch few years ago and was not impressed. I mean food was OK so never thought of coming back especially it is located at CBD area. Since CoVid, we like to have a nice dinner once a week and partner says Zafferano, I said ok go book then. He went online and disappointed they need pre-payment before you can have a table. I know resto are hard hit these days and with CoVid measures, less tables and less revenue. But to ask for pre-payment doesn't sit well with many customers. So we said NO! We won't go then. Friday came and suddenly we thought lets ring Zafferano, if they're not fully booked, we walked in! We did and I was impresse

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: We'd been meaning to visit Zafferanos for a while and finally decided to book this week. Based at the top of the Ocean Financial Centre with views out over the Marina from the outside terrace.... its not cheap but the food and experience was excelle

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: Great service but dining there is slightly pricey! Had a set lunch during restaurant week which brings the prices down. Good thing I have just discovered that they are also part of Burpple Beyond which offers 1-for-1 dining on their mains. Will definitely use that in my next visit on full priced menu. (P.S: Try using promo code WOW30 to get 30% off Burpple Beyond subscription on premium plan- you're welcome!).

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: I had dinner with my friend yesterday 25th March in Zafferano. My friend and I were really impressed by the restaurant team. They are very polite and very attentive.The moment we step in, Lobby one reception girl address us my name, she remember us just because we went there once for a drink during Jan 2020. I am not the person who like to write reviews, but after dine in the restaurant, I have to let everyone knows that there is a place where is safe and make you feel like you are at home, additional with beautiful Marina Skyline View. There is monitoring temperature facility outside of the ocean Financial centre to check our temperature, there are hand sanitizers are available in the restaurant. On the top the reception lady bring us to the table with warm smile. Once we sit down, the service team greeting us by name again. The Manager came to us when we had the 2nd course, he talked to us regards to the situation and make us feel that we are in safe place. During main course time, chef Andrea also came to my table asking for the feedback about the food, all the food are delicious. Overall, we enjoyed very much last night. Definitely, we will come back again. It is really an amazing place for us to dine in.

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: I just returned from a visit to your restaurant on Saturday, 21 March 202

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: Cosy atmosphere where nice scenery. Service staffs are excellent. Polite and friendly, their service are great. Every staff will greet us. Food are nice. I definitely will come back again.

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: The staff was excellent in their service. They were attentive, prompt and were more than happy to answer any questions by guiding us through the menu. Furthermore, they made the dining experience more enjoyable by accomodating to our food requirements by making vegetarian-friendly food which was not necessarily on the men

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: Tonight I surprised my boyfriend for his birthday with a dinner at Zafferano and we were simply amazed by the everything! From the moment we stepped in, the view was amazing & service was top notch. I work in the service industry myself so I place service standards above all. Our server, PK (also known as Kumar) was very forthcoming & engaging. He took the time to explain the dishes & wines and we had a lovely conversation with him. The dishes he recommended were to our liking as well! At the end of the meal, my boyfriend was surprised with a birthday dessert as well. I was very amazed because PK and the rest of the staff remembered my requests & my wine choice for the night as well. Also, they made sure to check on us throughout our dinner. Overall, Zafferano is a perfect place for one to bring their dinner date to because of their great views overlooking Singapore city and for their impeccable service as well. To the managers / front of house /servers & chefs in the kitchen, a great job done to making our night a terrific one. Thank you for the excellent job well done! We will be sure to come back for sure!

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: Beautiful view. Elegant and fancy. The food quality is fine and the menu is interesting. But the service is funny for a pricy place. Super kind waiters but they have no idea of the order of the food in a real Italian restaurant. Examples: We had our starter without getting the wines (until reminding them). And the coffee came before the cheese platter. Now.. nothing horrible, ok, but please don’t call it an Italian restaurant :)

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: My experience the moment I step into the restaurant and until my departure was impressive and memorable. My guests and I were treated like VIPs by the greeting staff right up to the Head Chef And

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: I'm going to the restaurant quite frequently, the quality fluctuates, the location is great and the service very forthcoming

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: From the moment I made the booking the service was fabulous, all the staff were very friendly professional and knowledgeable, we were greeted at the door with a very welcoming smile and this smile and warm hospitality continued throughout our visit our waitress and the assistant manager Ivan were excellent and really went the extra mile to ensure we all had a wonderful time, this was our first visit but definitely not the la

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review:
A wonderful Italian Restaurant with spectacular views especially from the outdoor bar area which overlooks the whole of Marina Bay Sands and surrounding Marina.
Stunning menu and impeccable service from excellent waiting staff.

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: (I decided to re-submit this review as the earlier version, I wrote our server's name wrongly, and I feel it deserves to be correcte

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: With breathtaking views of the city, Zafferano lures you with good food, excellent service and a nice ambience.

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: If you are looking for a magnificent view, need some italian/mediteranian precisely prepared food in the middle of Singapore and spotless service - highly reccomended. Start with some pre-diner bubbles on the terrace in front...

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: First-rate hospitality, professional and trained staff, excellent location, well-appointed and clean room. Dishes carefully chosen and well prepared. Excellent service with right timing. Adequate costs.

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: We had Chef menu, and every dish was so balanced, flavourful and beautiful. The chef serve our main course and it was a special touch to our night. Has been nice to chat with h

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review:
Every dish was well presented, elegant and very tasty. Kudos to Chef! 
Service was good too. 
The view is incredible, we will definitely visit again.

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: Perhaps like me u can choose this restaurant for entertaining a guest. But even for that there r far better choices in Singapore. The service is robotic and the food so bland and contrived that u think it may have been prepared by a robot too Italian food is my favorite cuisine... hearty, fabulous combinations and freshness of ingredients; Zafferano has none of that. Forgettable.

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: We came here for the new year eve dinner and it was extremely good. The food was delicious and looked like Michelin. The service was more than amazing, everything was quick and delicate. I really recommend it.

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: The service was abit slow because there was a lack of staff but the guy who had attended to us gave us a really good service experience.

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: Company event held at Zafferan

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: Was there for dinner and served by Prasoon. He was most attentive and spot on with all his recommendations. I would suggest you keep space for their desserts like molten lava cake or their fresh sorbet which comes with preparations by the table side. The show is very entertaining.

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: Ordered two sets of Degustation menus. Pleasant service . Ivan , the assistant manager who was serving us was extremely professional and attentive. Happy night .

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: My family had a great experience at Zaffera

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: Loved total atmosphere with great friendly staff. View was astonishing and it was one of the best moments to spend with precious friends.

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: The cocktails were great, the food was excellent but more than that the staff are just so good and so friendl

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: I went with my friend and we really enjoyed the view in the restaurant. A bit disappointed with the food taste and the beef was tough. I feel is not worth the price for dinner (not sure if my expectation was too high after reading so many good reviews). However, I would highly recommend to go there for view and some drinks.

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: Great food and excellent service! The staff were attentive and friendly. Visited for my anniversary and a complimentary dessert was given as well! :) Not to mention, the view was really impressive. Definitely enjoyed my visit!

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review:
I like the food.  They were very nicely presented and were delicious!
The staff are well trained and very attentive to details. 
One of the better experiences I had in a fine dining restaurant.

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: All of us had a fantastic time at Zafferano's, for a business dinne

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: Thank you for attending to our team: Risk & Analytics on the 18 Sep 2019 for drinks from 6:30 pm to 8:00 pm. The team were very happy with the team bonding session; despite the ha

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: It was my wife's 50th Birthday celebrations and I came and met Jennifer the Events Manager at Zaffarano while scouting for a place. The restaurant has an outstanding location and we booked the entire restaurant and outside Bar area with the spectacular views. I researched a bunch of restaurants in Singapore but Jennifer with her hands on client servicing was by far amazing. She was most accomodative on many requests including getting our DJ, having a large team serving at the party, the menu selection, alcohol availability and finally the overall quote. Friendly reminders from her as the event came nearer helped the planni

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: Delicious tartufo pizza and great view.. Good for social business drinks and finger food kind of dinne

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: Enjoyed the spectacular city & Marina Bay view from the 43rd floor of an office building in CBD Singapore. Well-mixed beef tenderloin tartare with 25yrs aged balsamic vinegar (could have more of it instead of 5 dots); followed by perfectly cooked house-made ravioli with guinea fowl stuffing; and the plat de resistance was the charcoal-grilled lamb rack, lightly seasoned with Middle-eastern slices. The wonderful dinner was appropriately finished with a chocolate & hazelnut tart. The only regret was that the quality of the service did not match that of the food.

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: Came here for a late dinner with my friend. We decided to have some cocktails and food at the lounge area. The terrace has the magnificent view of the city. The ambiance of these place is something what most of us seek after a long day of errands. A perfect place to end the day with a glass of champagne or martini. The food was amazing. Both my friend and I been here for few times and we always look forward for that good homemade pizza and pasta! A traditional, simple and authentic Italian meal! I think the price of food and drinks are very reasonable for the quality and service that you will get from th

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: A party of 8 celebrating my birthday and we had little one with us so we dined in the private room. The food was amazing and the service was outstanding. Yaro was very accommodating with us and provided excellent suggestions for sharing. The food was artfully displayed and tasted wonderful. He is also very well versed in the origins of the food and drinks and regaled us with the interesting stories of the dishes when asked. Would highly recommended if you are looking for good food, awesome view, great stories and a laid back atmosphere for dinner!

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: This restaurant (and bar) on the 43rd floor of the Ocean Financial Centre in the heart of Singapore's CBD (Central Financial District) offers sensational views over the Marina Bay and seashore - made all the more remarkable by the presence of a lush tropical garden surround. The restaurant itself is stylish, modern and classy and, like the food it serves, has a light touch. The two kitchens and their staff are also on open displ

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: Had lunch here with several people. The views are quite spectacular and the service is quite good, but the food itself is largely unremarkable.

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: We had a drink in the outdoor lounge before our dinner where you can have panoramic view of the city. The restaurant offers less view but the food and service are excellent. The oysters were very fresh and the radish sorbet added to the taste. Then we had their signature porterhouse which was done perfectly. A very nice place for a special occasion.

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: The food here is outstanding and so is the view. We went here for a surprise dinner and it was one of the best places I've been to. We can really recommend the tasting menu and their chocolate lava cake was to die for.

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: We love Zafferano's - I highly recommend sharing it friends who enjoy good wine and delectable food. The service is top notch, the food is fabulous (they made the most lovely gluten free / dairy free pasta dish for me - a touch of chili, garlic, olive oil ... omg, to die for!) and the oysters were fabulous. Let the servers guide your plates and you can't go wrong. Not to mention, ladies night (used to be on Thursdays) is sooooo much fun :) If you go, be ready to dance and let loose and meet some great people!

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: I met a colleague for a business lunch. We both had the 2-course set lunch ($42). We both chose the escargot in thin pastry (1st course) and lamb (2nd course). The service was prompt and timely with bread and the water being served as soon as our orders were taken. The escargot in thin pastry was interesting - not the best escargot I've had - but still nice enough. The lamb was very good and the portions (3 cutlets each) was impressive. We had an after-lunch coffee there as well. Our meal came up to about $65+ per person, which I thought to be a bit much for a 2-course set lunch meal.

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: I was in town on a work/social trip staying nearby. My friend has some peanut and soy allergies so figured Italian was a safe choice. The view is amazing! 43 floors up opposite Marina Bay Sands. The semi outdoor area was closed for a private party, but we still could see a lot. The service was attentive and the waiter was very knowledgeable and accommodating to my friend’s allergy requirements. The food was absolutely delicious! We were not going to have dessert, but really couldn’t resist and it was just as good as the rest of the meal. Absolutely recommend.

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: I have been to Zafferano many times with friends on a Thursday evening for ladies night and there has never been a time we haven’t had a great night. Drinks are good, the view is beautiful, great atmosphere,music and vibe but best of all the staff are amazing! Highly recommend this place to anyone wanting a fun night out, you will not be disappointed!

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: We booked the rooftop area at Zafferano for a farewell party and had a really lovely time. The views from the rooftop are to die for and one of the best in Singapore. The staff are super friendly and very professional.. they took very good care of us and we were a large group. Special thanks to Ian and Jennifer... will be back for more!!

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: Extremely commendable service, especially Faiz, who made our visit there super memorable! Food was great with good portions. Would definitely patronize again!

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review:
My friend and I came here to do lunch.  Executive lunch, priced at S$42 for 2-course and S$52 for a 3-course set.  
View is spectacular, service was good.  Food-wise, personally I feel nothing to scream about.

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: Excellent food quality, had the cheese-potatoe truffle as a starter. Top marks, the flavours from the truffle infused with the cheese and potatoes made this an extremely satisfying starter. Had the spicy pink pasta with prawns... wow! A must try! And of course top marks for the service and friendliness of the staff! Well done Zafferano

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: For a foodie like me, I was seeking a high end Italian restaurant with some flair and creativity, unfortunately Zafferano is not that. Apart from the stunning view which is unquestionable, the food was very average, starting off with the salmon tartare which was dry and unflavorful, however the mustard sorbet was one to commend. The mains of ravioli and spring chicken were awful, plain, not aligned with what the menu says. A real shame for one who claims to be a high end restaurant. The bill was such and a real disappoint to pay when the food was so downbeat.

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: The food quality (as per the new menu) was quite poor. It wasn’t tasty and very oily, the set lunch also presented limited options. We waited 40 mins for the mains and had to rush through it. Two courses took us 1 hour 40 mins. Disappointing

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: We went for the terrace experience, which included a bottle of wine or prosecco, 2 pizzas and 2 desserts.The food and service are excellent, and the splendid views at level 43 makes for a wondrous experience that makes it a choice location for that special date.

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: Read reviews that the steak here is a must try and possibly the best in SG! It is! We enjoyed everything thoroughly!

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: A nice hidden gem in the CBD area of Singapore, pretty surprised it wasn’t packed due to its location and amazing vie

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: I haven’t visited the financial district in Singapore with my previous visit. It’s a good excuse to find a good restaurant worth visiting with a view of MBS in this area. The restaurant is busy during the lunch time. I was able to walk outside to see the view while waiting for the food. This is a good place to catch up with friends, business meeting and what not. The staff are polite and attentive.

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: Was welcomed warmly and given great service from start to end. Was nice to take in the views by taking a walk at the outdoors bar area even though it wasn't open during lunch. The lunch however was underwhelming compared to other Italian food I've had in singapore. We had the mushroom and fish soup, beef carpaccio, arrostino beef and pennone. It's focus on deep and/or contrasting flavours left me thirsting for wine which if you are willing to invest (>$20 per glass), may pay off multifold. Unfortunately, overall the lunch set meal felt uninspired and confusing at times for a non-wine pairing meal.

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: Went there for a business lunch meeting. Staff are friendly and professional. Set lunch menu is diverse and good portions.. we had 2 course though there is a 3 course. They provide tea n coffee after plus wine selection by the glass against dishes so easy to choose...overall a good lunch choice with great views over the marina which if you have an out of town client will make for a great talking point.

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: Located on the 43 level of ocean financial center, the view of the marina bay scenery is jus amazing. The service was excellent, very meticulous Waiter. The food potion is not very big, for those big eaters might not be the best option. Happy hours available at the outdoor bar.

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: Yesterday had a lovely evening with my friends. Great hospitality, delicious food, excellent wine selection, incredible view. Overall unforgettable experience.

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: We have had dinner and drinks here.  The view of Marina Bay Sands is great. We enjoyed the free flow special on wine, beers and Prosecco and the food was tasty. Great atmosphere.

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: If you are looking for gourmet food in a nice setting then Zafferano is the perfect restaurant to go to. The food was delicious, the service was both professional and friendly. After dinner we went for a last drink outside, at the lounge bar ... the view is exceptional ! Great place for a special celebration !

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: Nice restaurant located on 43rd floor with view. Soup taste good. Fish dish is good. Cheese platter is nice. Ambience is nice and friendly. Servers is ok but can be better.

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: Hello there!It was a superb lunch which we and our guests thoroughly enjoyed. The cuisine was outstanding, so was the service. We didn't get the name of the young lad who provided us with the lovely service. Please thank him for us. Hope to see you again in the near future. Keep up with the excellent job

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: We are impressed with Choana’s good service. She regularly came to check on us if we were enjoying our dinner. She is friendly and warm. Thank you for making our dinner enjoyable.

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: My friend & I had a great dining experience at your restaurant on 21 November 2018. The food was yummylicious. The ambience was fantastic. Indeed, we enjoyed ourselves in the comfort of your premise. That’s for sure

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: My company took us out for dinner at this spot the first night after a workshop. It was a selected menu for us, so we were limited in what we could order. Suffice it to say, I wasn't completely blown away by the offerings and the food was just ok. Not bad, but not great. The location is fantastic however, and the restaurant is up on a high floor (46th, I believe). There is a great outdoor bar / patio area that has an unbeatable view of the marina area. This was a plus for this location, as it was a great spot for after dinner drinks and just getting a lay of the land and the surroundings. I went in with very high expectations and while the location is fantastic, I expected more from a culinary perspective. Perhaps things would have been different if I wasn't in a large group and could have ordered off the menu, but my experience is what it was.

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: From the simple delicacies of the Italian cuisine to the hospitality of its employees, this place brings a new and an unmatched ambiance to people seeking to have a great time. Whether you are looking for a nice brunch with the family or an exuberant night with your friends, this place is the epitome of both. Just when you think it cannot get any better, the music enhances the overall atmosphere of the venue, only making you wish that the night was still young. Honestly, from a collective opinion, and a regular customer, I try to come here every weekend. Lots of love for Zafferano and its eminent employees.

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: Came here to celebrate our anniversary, and I loved every moment of our meal together! The view is spectacular and the service, thoughtful. We shared the lamb, the ravioli, a bottle of wine, and two desserts. Quiet expensive, but worth it for the quality of the food, which will melt in your mout

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: I hired the outdoor area of Zafferano's for my retirement party. The place has fantastic views over Singapore. Lots of seating and a bit of cover which is good to have with the unpredictable weather. The covers light up giving a nice ambiance. The bar staff were friendly, quick and responsive to my guests needs, really above what I have seen at other venues. The canapés were excellent and we also hired a DJ via the event planner and he was also responsive to requests and had a large play list. All in all a really lovely evening enjoyed by us all. Highly recommend going there and taking the free flow package.

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: Came here for birthday celebration. Atmosphere is great with quality food and affordable value (Considering this as Fine-dining concept). Some of the service staffs that attended to us are friendly and attentive. I could have given 5 stars rating for everything but one thing that disappointed me was a private event that wasn't notified to me beforehand during the table reservation. Don't get me wrong that this should be an obligation on their side, the main issue wasn't about the private event but rather on how one of their guy staffs handled the situation.The private event occupied their entire outdoor lounge and since this is our first time visiting this place, one main attraction would be their sky lounge (do note that the only area that you see the full city view is at their lounge and not within the restaurant itself). As a form of courtesy, I requested for a small favour from a lady staff and it was a ‘green light’ given that we could visit the lounge for a short while to take few photos of the beautiful city view (under the escort of the lady staff). So, what happened next is while we are taking photos at the lounge, one guy staff came over and called us to leave immediately. I’m ok with that because after all is a private event that they paid a lot for it, but his engagement is quite rude and react as if we are like tourists looking for free stuffs. My bill might not be huge but is a reminder that I’m also a paying customer here, if you feel that customers should pay more to receive a better treatment, then I advise you stating a minimum spending amount. If today my main purpose was to visit your sky lounge and I wasn’t aware that the lounge was closed, am I right to receive a 50% discount since it didn’t fulfil my objective? This is definitely unfair to the business right.. so what I just hope to see is some empathy shown to us when disappointment happened, NOT come straight to our face and said ‘Please Leave Now’. Might still come again in future but there are few other choices of the similar concept out there, so not necessary to make this as your permanent hangout place

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: We booked this place as conveniently located. Despite is quite central took a little bit to figure out where is it. (I guess because it is in an office building). Restaurant is very nice and very good service. Good food and menu. Only real problem vegetarian choice is a little bit limited.

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: First of all, the view is awesome! City view, overlooking the Singapore river.Service is excellent as well.The only down part would be the food. Not the kind that you would eat a mouth and stop, but definitely not the kind which you would die for another plate. And of course, the price is really pricey.

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: We came to Zafferano and chose the 3 courses lunch at 52 SGD. Quality and taste of the food was very inequal. My starter, described as "Salmon carpaccio" appeared to be just smoked salmon on a frisee salad quite bitter in taste (supplement 8 SGD), very bad choice. Then, Beef ragout pasta was good but portion tiny as a main dish. Finally I opted for the almond cake with mascarpone mouss and chocolate sauce. It was not a cake but a very hard biscuit which took me some enery to break in my plate, chocolate sauce was almost unexistant. I found very unequal the quality of food served. Plus they are doing some work on the terrace and instead of a nice view you can see the guys working with their ladder, not nice to pay that price for that food and view.

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: Come diner and drink, food is so delicious, and the price is average. Environment is excellent, space between table is not that close, which make us feel very comfortable. The bar at the same floor having a nice view which can see the F1 race. All the staff are very friendly and helpful, definitely will come back again.

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: The service was excellent , attentive and on hand . The small private dining room is perfect for quiet lunch meetings . The food has been consistently good - the set lunches are good and have gluten free and vegetarian options. I had the mushroom soup and the sea bass which were tasty. Overall a very happy experience and will be there again .

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: Celebrated my 14th Anniversary & booked this place for dinner on a weekday. As planned, they gave me a corner window seat where u can see the entire restaurant. Great service at this establishment. Had the Raw Hokkaido Scallops Caviar & Burrata with olives for antipasti for Mains, we chose the Ravioli with Stracciatella & the seafood pasta with clams and mussels. My fave is the Ravioli. Absolutely delish the pasta was a bit too thick and hard for me. Love the desserts we chose.. Tiramisu was light and fluffy.. not too heavy or sweet. Perfect!❤️ also had sherbet with watermelon a pity the bar outside is under construction at this time. May visit again next round with friends to check it out after it’s facelift.

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: we opted for the pasta, portion is just right, food presentation was good. Oysters also, delicious. Very good environment and services.

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: lovely food with a lovely view and ambience, the courteous staff is an added bonus. Spent a lot of time here.

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: We're very pleased to book Zafferano for the second time, for our client's corporate welcome dinner on 24 Jul

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: I'm not sure what else I can add about Zafferano's that hasn't been mentioned in the reviews. The restaurant is definitely high end on a high floor for an elite crowd. The service was quite impressive without being over the top. The menu options were 'fine Italian', vs. spaghetti and pepperoni pizza... as you might guess. This is really a business meal destination, and a safe one at that, with guaranteed service, food and ambience. Unless you have something special, I'd suggest another place... but if you need to impress, this is a reliable choice.

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: Lovely ambience high floor of Ocean building with excellent views. Service staff are attentive and friendly but the food falls short of our expectations. We have friends raving about the Florentine style steak but the meat quality n seasoning is disappointing compared to Bistecca etc. There are some hits and misses to our order so it would not be a consideration if you crave for gd food. Just another expensive n average restaurant.

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: Nice food and stunning view in Singapore CBD. The Marina Bay Sand is just opposite and you can see the top of the building clearl

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: This is a great largely unknown spot for drinks and dinner with a superb view of Marina Bay and MB

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: I came to Zafferano on Jul.19. It’s the second night of their special food promotion. I heard the guest chef this time flying from china, and I’m from China as well. Also his name sounds a bit familiar, I heard Bruno Ferrari a few time

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: Ate a buffet style here as it was for a large group of about 80 people and we hired the whole place out . On offer we had a selection of pasta, steak, salads , fresh seafood eg oysters and it was really good. You have many options for gluten free , vegetarian , meat seafood lovers etc but the view is what was the standout !!!!! Wow!! All glass panels surrounding the place and beautiful greenery insid

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: We went for dinner on a Friday night. The service was impeccable and good attention was paid to detail. However, the pasta dishes which we tried were tòo salty for our liking though the desserts (tiramisu and lave cake) were delicious! The view was great!

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: Great view over the CBD. The food, while good, is less creative or exquisite than some other Italians nearby, like Osteria Arte or Braci. Good-value set lunch.

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: Had booked the outdoor terrace for a party of 50 and it was simply amazin

Name: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
Location: 10 Collyer Quay Ocean Financial Centre Level 43, Singapore 049315 Singapore
Review: Highly overpriced. Good service but the quality of food does not match the exorbitant prices being asked. Atmosphere is hopeless.

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: Were there on 2 Feb for our son's birthday dinner. Love the food, ambience and services rendered. Would love to come again.

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: Always a pleasure going to Shabestan, love the kebab platters....always consistent in food and service. Its our go-to for Middle Eastern food!

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: A staycation in Robertson Quay means a chance to try various cuisines available in the area. Chanced upon Shabestan while walking along the river. Noted the Persian cuisine but was cautious about trying out the food as there were not many customers compared to the surrounding pubs and eateries. The photo of the lamb shank wooed us into the restaurant. We ordered that plus the eggplant appetizer. The lamb shank tasted as excellent as the photo portrayed! The meat was tender and it just falls off the bone. The stew was very flavorful too. The staff were attentive and helpful. Worth a visit!

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: Our family favourite for Middle Eastern cuisine. Hope you guys can add more vegetarian options to the menu.

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: Best Persian food with family,the lamb was simply amazing!!! Strongly recommend this restaurant with family and kids!! Great service too!!

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: Good food and ambience. we ordered a whole lot of starters. the bread, muhammara and humus were very good. for chilli fans, do ask them for their special chilli!

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: By far my favourite Middle Eastern cuisine restaurant in Singapore. This is our go-to date night spot - delicious food, wonderful service and al-fresco dining by the river ... what could be better !?! They have a Gluten free menu which I really appreciate as I am coeliac. By the way, the best Hummus !!!! And the eggplant stew is amazing!!

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review:
Good food, good portions and great people! I was very satisfied with their service :) 
Little expensive but good ambience. 
They took really long with the billing towards the end (even thought it wasn’t crowded). But overall I won’t rate the experience bad.

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: Was looking for a place to have a get together, and this place was recommended. It was my first time at Shabestan, and I found the place has a nice ambience and food. Certainly worth a repeat visit, especially for the food.

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: Thought about supporting the restaurants during these though times. Visited the UNCABUNCA restaurant which was as delightful as always. We then headed to Shabestan which was empty with only employees seating down and 2 tables at the terrac

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: We came across the night a buffet was set up. Multiple choices, lamb, chicken , hummus, bread and grape leave rolls were excellent quality. Service was great. We will return here for sure

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review:
The location is very pretty, the good it’s just average, prices are midrange but the food isn’t great...  :( 
I was expecting better!
Rice has a very strange flavor 
And for a glass of you hurt they charge 14!!! It’s a lot!

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review:
Great ambiance by the Singapore river to have an alfresco setting. 
This restaurant offers great selections of vegetarian menu.
Friendly staff and were very attentive to guests needs.

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: Great location of course by the river. Fabulous menu choices, great flavours and really super service.

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: Honestly didn't expect such good Persian nosh sitting in Singapore. Spacious interiors with a small outdoor seating area as well. Helpful and courteous staff. My 7-year old boy definitely liked i

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: The food that we ordered was really good! The amount of food that they give is really value for money. I went with my two friends and we each ordered 1 plate of food, and we found not finish it! Not many places have this and my friends and I agree that it was refreshing. I just wish that they had a little more vegetarian options. But otherwise it was really good! I will really recommend!

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: Been to this place 4-5 times and absolutely love the food. They've decent range of vegetarian dishes as well, which is great. They hummus is one of the best! The dishes are reasonably priced for the location and the quality of food & servi

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: The food was good ,specially the main dishes and the appetizers. the atmosphere was excellent and calm.

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: Mixed feelings about this restaurant, starter great, main a little blah and bill large especially for a bottle of wine I can get for a quarter of price at home

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: Considering the average prices for restaurants in Singapore, the Shabestan was the best cost and quality balance place we visited. Also we had great service from its staff. Recommend the lamb kebab and the falafel.
