Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: We went there for casual dinner on Friday evening as their menu has several vegetarian option

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: Excellent quality of food, good service by staff, lovely view - excellent packa

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: Great quayside location and the food here is cooked to perfection.  The waiters were attentive - we ate here twice and couldn't fault it.

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: The restaurant was empty when we arrived at around 3.45

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: We had a lovely meal here. They have a BIG gluten free menu and food are delicious!!! Staff and manager are professional and very friendly. Definitely recommended!!!!

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: The lamb cutlets were as tender and good as I have taken. They were excellent. The chicken and fillet beef were ok.

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: I've visited Iran before and had the best kebabs. Located along the Singapore river, this place hands down serves the best Kebab in Singapore. Chicken is so succulent and the rice so fluffy and savory. My friends picked up this restaurant for my birthday and the head chef gave us special treat. Thank you Chef Hosseini :) Will definitely visit again.

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: My husband is Lebanese - we are always on the lookout for good Middle Eastern cuisine. We had walked past Shabestan a number of times, but never quite managed to get ourselves inside. Last Saturday we finally did - why did we wait so long? The food is very, very good. We had a duck dish with a pomegranate / walnut based gravy - outstanding. Various grilled bits - beef, lamb, chicken and an aubergine vegetable dish. There are more vegetarian options, mostly in the starters section. Everything we had was good. Shabestan also has a selection of classic cocktails and a decent wine list. Service is polite, competent, attentive. The ambiance inside is a bit on the functional side, but outside seating is very nice. We plan to come back many times.

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: Come here for the chill vibe & wide choice of Middle Eastern Fare. Alfresco is best, we even braved the moderate haz

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: Persian cuisine as an amalgam of Far East and Middle Eastern accents, with some eastern Mediterranean inspiration (credit: Garin Pirnia - The Takeout's Guide). I think this is a good summation of what Persian cuisine is to the uninitiated. We had Shah Pasand Chicken (like chicken kebab) and Prawn kebab. Both were delicious (a tad salty but overall it was ok) which was a meal by itself with basmati rice and side salad.

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: This is a worthwhile experience in Singapore. Persian food is not on the top of my list, but here is ho the food is cooked rather than the dishes themselves. he meets and seafood ae cooked so they ae tender and tasty. The presentaiton is excellent and the service superb. Try the Dips, which were delicious.

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: I have been in Singapore for the last 17 years for business and if i want a perfect meal combined with perfect service i always go to this restauran

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: Very nice unpretentious place. Enjoyed ourselves very much. The waitress was very helpful; she made really good recommendations and the dishes were all spot on! Thank you for a lovely experience.

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: We visited this place and its location by the river is very nice. They serve authentic Persian food. The kebab sultani was exceptionally good the kebab koobedeh was average the appetizers and dough drink were nice. Finally for desert we ordered Fallodeh and it was superb.

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: We had a nice meal here with a good range of vegetarian options.  Restaurant was nice and the price was reasonable.

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: An excellent Persian restaurant with very tasty and delicious food, located on the side of Singapore River at Robertson Quay area. We enjoyed our dinner and the mixed grill with rice and kebabs were very good selectio

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: We live in London which is the king of Persian food in my opinion, there are several Persians in my family and we have it all over the world - especially Cello Keba

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: We had the prawn kebab & Appetiser Platter - delicious! By far the best Middle Eastern food we have eaten in Singapore - great service, and without the hustling experience & rude service in some of the restaurants in the Arab quarter!

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: The service was excellent and the staff were friendly and informative when we enquired about the food. The starters are delicious - we had the appetiser platter ($35) which is a selection of 5 appetisers. For mains we had the Shandiz ($48), Shah Pasand Chicken ($39), Kebab Barg ($45), Mix Kubideh Kebab ($34), and Baghala Polo Mahicheh ($47). The Shah Pasand was amazing - the breast was moist and well-seasoned. The rice served with the dishes is also great. For desserts, we ordered the Persian Ice Cream ($8) and Baghlava ($10). The ice cream was nice but the baghlava - which we were looking forward to the most - was a real disappointment. It was hard and unevenly cut and very, very dry.

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: Had a wonderful evening here. The location and views are magical being right on the water with boats passing by. The entire area is adorable with an active scene of restaurants and bars. The wait staff were very friendly but a tad slow and we weren't always sure they got our order rig

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: Food and service are the reasons you will go back to a place, Shabestan adds ambience to the mix. Every dish I ordered was flavorful and fresh. Every dish had it’s on flavor. And the staff was extremely attentive, keep in mind that this place is empty at lunch time on weekdays.

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: The restaurant is situated amidst the buzz of Mohammad Sultan Road, but has a decent indoor and outdoor space. The ambience is pleasant, less noisy and has good lighting. The menu is very good (even for vegetarians) and the service pretty good. Above all, prices are reasonable.

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review:
Delicious food, friendly service and great vegan options - very good value. 
Hummus was divine and so was the okra dish!

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: The food and ambient is terrific. Good choice of food for Vegetarians is also available. A big plus!

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: Our party of three ordered from their vegetarian selection and my top picks are their Hummus and Muhammara which come with Iranian bread. We also loved the Khorest-E- Bhamieh which is like an okra curry that is flavourful with plenty of ground tomatoes forming the foundation of the mildly spicy gravy. We also ordered the all-vege Sabzi Kebab and Ceaser Persia salad, both of which were not memorable taste-wise but came in big portions. The baklava was tasty and one order has two pieces; we all gave it a thumbs up. Interestingly this is a halal restaurant that also serves alcohol and they do pour their wine generously, which is great. Service was decent - you can get the attention of wait-staff easily and they are quite obliging.

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: Wow wow wow!!! I have enjoyed middle eastern food in the Gulf on many occasions, Shabestan is up there. Great menu selection, helpful staff and great service. Food is just unbelievable. Fresh, tasty and plentiful. Price isn’t to bad for Singapore. Great atmosphere and located on Singapore River.

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: Our fav Arab restaurant in Singapore , my family love the food, great ambience nice staff , overall best

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: We had read good reviews & the menu reads well. The dining room & location are super. While we found the several dishes we ordered to be reasonably tasty, their presentation & the service was unsatisfactory. The staff were very nice & eager to please, but the amateurishness & clumsiness of our servers were often embarrassing. The desserts were not enjoyable. We would not go again.

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: Excellent food and service. We had a lovely time. The atmosphere of the restaurant is also lovely. Great experience

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: This was our fourth visit to the Shabestan which we sorely missed this time around. Not only was there a perceptable deterioration in the quality of food - being creatures of habit we usually order dishes we've tried and liked before - but the service was borderline indifferent. It was almost as if the restaurant is in cost management mode and is hiring below average wait staff and chefs. For a fairly expensive meal we left a considerable amount of food uneaten as it was either wanting taste or plain unpalatable. For example this was the first time the rice had little or no butter in it. The browned Tahdig bits were soggy, the kebab portions were smaller, and the chicken dish was sweeter than dessert - which was delivered at the fag end of the meal and for which the chef offered an implausible explanation. They did however replace this dish with another lamb dish which was passab

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: Service was first class. Located beside the river in Robertson Q.but has an indoor section with ac.Good locati

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review:
This restaurant has a good reputation and recommended by Iranian friends and we were not disappointed. Food was excellent and authentic with great service and a very personal and attentive manager over looking his team.
Highly recommended for genuine food especially the rice.

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: Cleanliness of the dining table was compromised as there was a spec of dirt on the empty plate as well as the table cloth.

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: the food was good!  will definitely recommend to my friends/colleagues.  a must-go back restaurant to dine into.

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: Our dinner here was fabulous. We shared the grilled combo...lamb beef chicken shrimp. Fantastic. Great atmosphere and loved the view of the river.

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: We had a really outstanding meal here while on a short trip to Singapore. The service was prompt and warm and the location is lovely, by the river. We enjoyed the stroll along the water from our hotel. The food was great, tasty and well cooked. I really recommend the noodle soup, another level of deliciousness! There was also lots of choice for vegetarians, always a bonus.

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: Looking for a nice Persian Restaurant, seeing the reviews, we landed up here, food was overpriced with poor quality, when we complained and asked to replace just one dish, which didn’t taste fresh and was very oily, they simply refused, we were so shocked with their couldn’t care and be bothered attitude, it was so poor, we left the restaurant having ordered 4 dishes, left all the food and paid the full bill and went to dine at another restaurant, you would be so surprised that no one even bothered to come up and speak with us.

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: As an iranian myself I wouldnt call this an iranian restaurant, its more like a middleeastern one. The waiters werent iranian which was a new experience for me. The food was overpriced and didnt really taste righ

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: The food scene is amazing in this restaurant! We went on a Friday night to have some yummy Iranian dinner after having heard a lot about this place & it didn’t disappoint at all! It was easy to get a table reserved online for 4! The variety of food option for both veg & non veg is a lot! We tried a bunch of vegetarian dishes and they were simply mouthwateringly tasty! The Chef’s special appetizer platter was just too good, my favorite was the cheese & hummus dips! The falafel wrap was huge for a person & made very well! Everything we ate was very tasty & well presented! The decor is very Persian and the open kitchen concept is also very cool. The service was tad bit slow but it didn’t bother us as we enjoyed our meal with some Prosecco! Next time we would love to try some meats & preferably get an outdoor seating.

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: Big menu card can make it difficult to choose, but if you go with the chefs recommendation you are in for a treat. Order for sharing. Good food at reasonable prices.

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: First try at the restaurant and a very good experien

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: We ordered the appetizer platter which was indeed excellent!! Loved it. We ordered curry lamb- which was great- but a bit heavy for us. Guess we were already full from the platter! Definitely going again to try the orher stuff.

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: Went here after wondering if they served any persian food here. Saw the ratings and decided to give it a try with my family. We were all impressed with the service and quality of food! It’s very likely we will go back again. Beautiful ambience as well.

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: Lured by the enticing ambience and great photos of the food in the menu we were expecting to have our tastebuds tickled. Unfortunately, our choices were bland and tasteless. Just a mains, one beer and one glass of wine came to just shy of 150 Singapore dollars (about £95). Beware, they charged for water we did not ask for. Great work by the photographe

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: Had dinner here tonight, the koobideh, chicken and rice were all fantastic, moist, tasty and just like you would have in Iran. A few dissapointments thou

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: Staff here were very polite and accommodating, we enjoyed share plates of dips and meat. Was a great meal, slightly pricy but very nice.

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: The food was a hit and miss (kebabs were a bit dry and the Muhamara was a tad too tangy but the hummus hit the spot). The mains are definitely overpriced. Service was ok and the decor is quite nice. Overall, I wasn't too impressed during my first visit. However, I do see a lot of positive reviews about the place and so maybe it is worth another visit.

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: This was our first Persian meal and it was wonderful not cheap but well worth it. Drinks quite expensive but you don’t go there to drink the food is excellent and service very good

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: Awesome! Very delicious and tasty food. Since we like that cuisine for us the food was outstanding. The ambience is also very good with the outside sitting. Prices for this kind of establishments in Singapore are normal, maybe the wine prices are a bit on the high side. Overall great evening and delicious food. Already been there 3 times and more to come.

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: Along the bank of the Singapore river, with outside tables. The mixed starters platter to share was delicious, with lovely hot Persian flatbread; our main course choices were not quite as good, but that might have been our selection, as the meat dish was not as tender as we might have liked. Not a cheap venue, but not extortionately priced either.

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: People there were friendly and caring! The food was good and their drinks were goood too! Will recommend to people who looking for good ambience and Arabic food in the Clarke quay area!

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: We had lamb and chicken marinated in joghurt and persian  spices, cooked on a charcoal grill, served with basmati rice and  salad . The taste was wonderful.

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: Finally, I tried this restaurant before I leave Singapore to my way back home .. i dish I ordered was very nice .. the portion of food provided was more than enough for us .. the tea was normal ..

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: The food and service were of a very high standard, I highly recommend this restsurant for a meal. The meal was expensive, but I felt it was good value.

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: We are visiting from Western Australia and staying in a nearby hotel. Each night we visit a different restaurant and tonight we thought we would try some Persian cuisi

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: I order chicken wings and a mix grill platter that came together with rice and some salad. The rice was quite bland, but the meat was sooooo good, juicy and well seasoned! Loved it! Didn't find anything of my taste from the dessert menu. The food was very good, but I find it quite expensive.

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: We went to try the food as it was the last day of their month long green month promotion. The vegetarian menu was extensive. They were also flexible in modifying it to vegan. We had the platter of 5 appetizers and 1 main. And that was a lot for 2 of us already. We really enjoy the food.

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: Few customers but took eternity to get food served. Hummus with overpowering(bad) aftertaste (Old garlic or onion). Overcharged for items not served, when highlighted they offered to return the difference in cash, however not including service charge and GST.

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: The appetisers are really good. The main meals lack flavour. Good teas. Didn’t try any desserts. Good service and ambience

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: It was a good experience to have dinner by the riverside with a great ambiance and less noise. Soothing music with in between belly dance performances. Good food that caters to the Asian Palate. Right in the middle of the city yet not noisy.

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review:
I've been to the restaurant several times since its opening and will visit again.
The belly dancer was missing this time unfortunately. 

See you next time

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: I ordered platter and it was 65% fish and remaining 35% lamb and chicken. I ended up eating fish out of Platter order. AVOID PLATTER . Otherwise the food is good.

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: We are glad to dine  at Shabestan Singapore! Truly enjoyed food and hospitality, Thank you Shabestan team... keep it up.

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: Shabestan offers good quality Persian food, much of which is charcoal grilled - a particular favourite of mi

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: Visited over the weekend. Our table (outdoors) hadn't been cleaned properly - bits of food scraps at 3 different spots. The local waiter almost placed the menus on top of some food bits until I pointed it out - he then just casually flicked it off the table with his bare hands and proceeded to lay the menus out. I had to interrupt this and ask for the table to be cleaned first as he had no intention of doing

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review:
We were there for dining again yesterday . As usual the combination of Persian herbs, spices , fresh ingredients and good quality of meats do not fail to meet our expectations of Shabestan...
Great job to all smiling faces at restaurant...
See you again.

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: In Europe, more specific the Netherlands, I did not find yet a Persian restaurant. The menu showed good looking dishes and the selected duck was a good mixture of exotic and balanced flavours. The home made curry finished the total spectrum of flavors very well.

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: The food was fresh and had a few unusual options. Everything we ordered was good. However the staff were unable to explain what each dish was nor were they able to make suggestions for vegetarians. Also, it took a REALLY long time for them to bring the meal, dessert and even to accept our credit card. And the restaurant had only two tables with customers. Dread to think what the service time is like when the restaurant is full?

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: We went to this finest restaurant and it was our first time...Food was great...we had lamb chop with meat flatters and Gormeh Sabsi...The place was good ambience and their hospitality was impressive...We will definitely coming back and good recommendation with friends as well 😊

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review:
We love Shabestan. The food is so authentic in taste and they have good varieties of mouth watering kebabs .The staff are great,well trained and very engaging.
Great place to have pleasant time with food and drinks.

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: Service was fantastic amidst a mildly crowded restaurant and food was of great quality. I've never really been to a middle eastern restaurant before and this left me with a good impression. The only gripe I have here is looking for the place as it is quite well hidden away and google maps didn't really helped much. Other than that, will recommend.

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: Had a nice meal here, the setting is lovely. It's in Robertson Walk which is less busy than Clarke Qu

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: I had been to this restaurant a few times and never dissapointed with their food. Very good choices of appetizers and the main dishes, portions were very good. Staff were very polite and attentive, specially the manager. Food and drink prices were reasonable. Location is very good too.

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: We we're exploring the area and found out this restaurant is still around. It uses to have good reputati

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: What do you expect from a Persian restaurant? Great meat dishes. We had great meat dishes. Tasty, to the point. Makes you forget what you had as starters :) The highlight: the dessert "Faludeh Shiraz", made from Vermicelli noodles, mint, wild cherries and rose wate

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review:
Great food
Great service
Great ambience
Expect to pay for the good food, service and location.
For 2drinks and a meal with couple of sides, 100 sing dollars per person.

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: I tried the Koobide Kabab it was delicious and number one .a bit expensive though this restaurant. Also didn’t like that much the zereshkpolo with chicken .

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: Delicious food - had the shebestan platter for 4 which included prawn , fish, chicken, two different lamb portions which came with spinach rice . The mince lamb kebab was excellent and so was the prawns

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: I just love to keep going back to this place again and again. Great taste and variety of food and very nice staff. Must visit.

Name: Shabestan Finest Persian Cuisine
Location: 80 Mohamed Sultan Road The Pier At Robertson #01-13, The Pier At Robertson, Singapore 239013 Singapore
Review: This is one of the best restaurants we have been to and would definitely recommend to anyone . Now Persian food is my favourite.

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: Our family came here for my dad’s birthday. My family loves Nyonya food so they decided to come here upon recommendations given by family friend

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: A local friend took us to this place to try all the Singaporean specialties at a buffet - Satay, Laksa, Mee Siam, Popiah and lots of Nonya desserts. Their mains included large prawns, beef rendang, assam chicken and sticky rice or jasmine rice to go with them. There were also some dim sum on the buffet. Too many things to try! They have a discount for children and for seniors (over 55).

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: It has been 9 years since our last visit here and so we decided to return to try. It was weekend and so the cafe was having the weekend high tea, from 12pm - 4

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: Always a place in mind for gathering or celebrations for birthday, etc. Weekend high tea choice for long seating and good spread of variety of foods choice.

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: Food was better than at my last visit. Pleasantly surprised that the popiah has improved so much. Will certainly go again

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: If you crave peranakan cuisine as well as desserts, this is the place to be! Pleasant ambience, comfortable seating too.

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: During our first visit to Singapore in December 2016-January 2017 we were recommended to have the Singapore Flavours buffet lunch at Spices café. It was one of the many highlights of our visit and so we returned three years later to find very little had changed, indeed it was almost déjà vu to be greeted warmly by Rita as we were in 2015 and see the one of the same chefs appear from the kitchen. The diversity, quality and quantity of food on offer was of the same high standard and the prices remain, particularly for those classified as senior citizens, very reasonable. While so many things change so many times and so quickly, it was a really lovely experience to return to a place where the high standards and quiet, welcoming atmosphere have not changed at all. We hope that will remain the case so that we may enjoy another buffet lunch at Spices when we next return to Singapore.

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: Excellent service and delicious food great variety as well. Located in the Concorde hotel it is easy to get to by public transport from the airport.

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review:
First time here for dinner buffet and i really like their food selections and the place.
but it will be more awesome if there's more ice cream selection to choose.

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review:
Very good spread in terms of variety dessert main course. 
I paid deposit in advanced so there is no service charge n gst

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: My family and I had a wonderful time at spices cafe as the ambience was delightful and the services from the staffs is definitely commendable.

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: Very good buffet and excellent dining off the a la carte menu.  Very friendly staff and good atmosphere.

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: Ate here three or four times when staying at hotel - excellent buffet and very good a la carte menu.  very friendly staff and great atmosphere.

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review:
Food quality was comparable to other dinner buffet restaurants that we've been to.
Food variety was less than other buffet resto.
Service was excellent.

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: I was searching for an appropriate place to celebrate my son’s graduation on 3 Dec 2019 and after comparing other places I decided to use Concorde Spice Cafe. What made me choose this cafe was because of the Chef Sunny Goh whose expertise in local and international cuisine is of a very high standard. I am Glad to say my party of 10 was not disappointed with the variety of dishes laid out and the highlight of the dinner was the bake lobster done to perfection. There were lots of local and Japanese cuisine as well and I say it’s value for money inspite of this festive period where hotels usually raise their price

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: buffet food was good except service was slow as there was only 2 service staffs serving for the whole night despite there was 2 big groups of dinners . crabs was served cold too

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review:
Not worth it. Spread is miserable. Food taste below average. Malay male staff rather chit chat than to get me a spoon upon request.

I rather starve than to revisit in future

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: Food spread is good. Overcrowded event goers. Coffee machine for espresso with no clear button indication though LCD has, that's only after pressing button. flow very small, I need to press 2 times to get my espresso. anyway, the taste of espresso is good!

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: Can’t get to try chili crab but felt surprise to see “abacuses stir fry minced meat” which is rare find neither in restaurant nor any buffet, spices cafe should keep this dish for every session :) petai udang also delicious and deep fried fuzhou oyster cake and laksa are our favourites!

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review:
Good food & entertainment. Love the laksa and the Ayam buah Kaluak. 
Nice songs too. Happened to go on one of those days (twice a month) where they had oldies songs in diff language

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: Love the good size , fresh and juicy shucked oysters they served here. The steamed whole fish dish is also excellent and is replenished frequently . Crab dishes are served ala carte and we had the chilly crab , salted egg and black pepper version . Salted egg crab is good . The black pepper version is too salty whereas the chilly crab misses the mark altogether. The crustacean highlight , the lobster with mentaiko sauce is yummy . I love the flavorful clam chowder soup pot, chockful of clams & potatoes , so thick and soul filling he

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: A friend recommended the restaurant and decided to bring mom and god-parents for lunch. Heard better to make reservation so did it through Chop

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: Was my 1st visit to this place last weekend with my family & I asked for their dinner menu to have a feel what kind of food will be in the dinner sprea

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: What a major disappointment! It seems that either there is no F & B head or the management could not care less about the cafe's customers! PLEASE WAKE UP & DO SOMETHING about the frequent complains of the replenishment of the buff

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: The food was good, oyster was fresh and juicy and the complimentary lobster was a nice touch. The senior discount swing the decision point to choose Spices over other hotel buffets.

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: Had dinner on 23rd August at spices cafe concord

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: First visit on late Aug 2. were lovely as we had two wonderful staff taking care of us and we got to choose both of Asian Menu and Late night sta

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: Valuable and comparable buffet in Singapore, especially on weekdays. If u r a crab lover, u must be there.

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: This is my 3rd visit in spice cafe. Had tried their high tea n dinner.Mus say both r with good value. Ambience was perfect for gatherin

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: Nice and good buffet cafe.  With good tasted foods and well selected items and very happy with the fruits and cakes offered, will recommend for good lunch buffet

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: This is the first buffet which doesn't motivate me to go back for more food. Very disappointing spread, quality and taste! Sad to say, the sliced watermelon and (softened) lime sorbet were the only things that I find nice there.

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: Go early because the kitchen has limited supply of crabs. Although it is a buffet, it is a request basis and you will not be able to order once the stock finished. Salted egg crab was the best. Chili crab was abit too sweet and lack Unami. Crab is not the freshest, but can do with it. The grill section was quite disappointing. Meat was tough. Not the best ingredients. Laska was good.

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: The staff at Spices in the Concorde Hotel Singapore provide outstanding service and are always ready to help. The food is of a high standard yet reasonably priced. I always enjoy eating there alone or with friends. A great place.

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: Good supply and quality of buffet spread, especially durian mous

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: Visited Spices Café frequently for weekday lunch or weekend Tunch (12-5p

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: The seafood buffet was fantastic and good value for money.  The staff were very polite and attentive.

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: Happy to have senior citizen promotion. But hope it could be cheaper or nett pricing. Food is good. But standard of food drop. Previously I went there, the food seem to be nicer. Staff are attentive, courteous and friendly.

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: For breakfast, the restaurant is mostly not crowded. Food selection is decent, but doesn’t seem to change from day to day, so should improve a little bit on that aspect. Service is decent, almost had a problem on the 1st day, but they managed to resolve that immediately.

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: Not many variety of food. Food quality was average too. Perhaps can consider to change the menu to a better quality of food. Service was not too bad.

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review:
Time wasted;( 
There is no free flow of crab. 
It was out of stock.
And I only manage to order 1 plate only.

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: The theme of the buffet was harvest of the sea

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: Our group went because we heard about the peranakan spread included in the buffet. Wide variety of local fare from satay to popiah, laksa, rojak. otah as well as ayam buah keluak, assam pedas, and pig stomach soup. We received excellent service from Rita. The bonus was the discount given to senior citizensaged 55 and above.

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review:
We have a wonderful time together at the cafe.
Ms Rita service was Excellent.
Should have more variety we missed the chilly flower crab and black vinegar pig throttle

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: Great services from the team at Spices. Spread of the buffet is pretty decent. Highly recommended. Will visit again

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: Good food and excellent service especially from Rita. Will come again. I wonder why you all are asking us to put in at least 100 words. Feedback need not be that long. We are also very busy people and we cant write an essay on our experience. Please amend your requirement otherwise it is tiring to give feedback.

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: Visit this cafe since 2016 Jan whereby you get to choose different cooking of crabs. Last visit was May 2019. Tried the chilli and salted egg crabs. Crab size were small, many parts were not cleaned properly and worst the flesh were mushy. Very very disappointed.

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: Food was decent and service was excellent. Wait staff cleared soiled dishes in a jiffy and food was replenished fairly quickly too.

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: Brought my family there mainly because of the "unlimited" order-to-cook crab. However, the crab were not that fresh. Note that small size mud crabs were used instead of Sri Lanka crabs. But the one-time order half lobster was great. The oysters and sashimi were just average. The hot plate station had sotong, stingray, prawns and shell types, but they did not taste good mainly due to the oil used, as everything tasted the same as the oil used. Variety of other dishes available was not fantastic but the freshness and variety of fruits and desserts made up for it.

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: Oyster very fresh. Sashimi also. Good variety of dishes. Special price for Seniors a great incentive for a family event.

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: Called me up to 5 times for confirmation of reservation, and the first call got my name and timing all wron

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: Food quality has dropped significantly since the last time I was there. Some corners were cut of drinks offering (i.e. tea is now in pots and not a variety of teabags, cut cheeses is gone from the spread as well, etc.). The taste of the oyster omelet has dropped to a level that it does not resemble one anymo

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: some of the sashimi selections were not up to standard and did not taste as good as before. Service was a bit slow this time as well.

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: My third visit with my family. Good food spread, fresh oysters and basic sashimi. Complimentary foie gras tasted good.

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: Value for money, staff are all friendly and food is good. The only problem is the seats are too near to each other, making it a little difficult to move around in the restaurant.

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: Good locations, services are good, food are fresh (espically on the cold cuts food). No time limit we had a great gathering chating till the cafe is closing.

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: We have been here several times and never fail me.  Nice food, good service and pleasant atmosphere.  Rita is very friendly and sociable.  She makes you feel so good that as if she is an old friend of yours.

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: The menu said Sri Lankan crabs but what we got instead was measly flower crabs. So that was a good trick this restaurant played.

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: We enjoyed the one-time order of the lobster and the laksa during the dinner buff

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: I was there with my 5 girlfriends for Chinese New Year Lo Hei celebration on 18 Feb. It was my third time at Spice Café, having Harvest of the Sea dinner. Recommended my girlfriends and they all enjoyed the spread and the service provided. Everyone found the raw oysters fresh, the lobster mentaiko was yum and the laksa authentic. What made the difference was Manager Ross and her team namely Clarke, Alvin, Emily, Susan and Dash. Everyone served with a smile and passion. Manager Ross was exceptionally thoughtful, friendly, approachable and proactive. Thank you Ross and team for making the difference for our Lo Hei 2019 celebration.

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: Excellent buffet done by this team of chefs for valentines day..! Great oysters, foie gra, durian and chilli crab! All at $45..? Keep up the good work!

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: This is a buffet spread that you can bring your in-laws and parents; and get the thumbs up. You'll be spoilt for choice over which food to go for and probably limited by your stomach space. Service is friendly and warm; they treat you like family.

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: Food is fresh and nice, have a lot of selection. Like sea food so much, only expensive during new years

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: This is my 2nd time celebrating Chinese New Year at Spices Cafe. Apart from the “not-so-fresh” crab used on the chilli crab dish, the food quality is maintained and is as good as normal days. Food replenishment is prompt, too. Service staff is helpful and friendly.

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: My sister recommended me Spices Cafe, I live overseas and misses Peranakan food which is not easily available. Super delicious food and your wait staff Rita is awesomely friendly. I will definitely come back to Spices Cafe.

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: Perfect food and treated by staff smiling and helping.Seafood buffet is the best on weekends, full of variety.

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: Oysters served were fresh and crabs were cooked to order. Many options for desserts and portions just right to have a taste of everything.

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: I chanced upon SpIce Restaurant on FB advert. But when i finally had the food, it was underwhelming. The food selection wasn’t fantastic. The free flow of, black pepper crab, salted egg Crab & chili crab was tasty but cold.I think the saving grace is the crab n the one time complimentary half- lobsterOverall its an average buffett eatery

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: Wide spread of food and varieties. Service staff Rita was fantastic. Value for money. We have enjoyed.

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: Disappointed with the spread and the Food refill and especially BBQ station cant handle the big crowd (DanielFoodDiary Promotion event). Service is good though from the staff.

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: Food is nice and service by staff is good. The buffet food selection is quite standard but the food are always refilled promptly which is a plus point. Only felt that tables and chairs looks old when first arrived but the service and food quality superceded. There was also a short performance of a Japanese lady playing harp. Nice touch to the NYE dinner.

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: Quite disappointed with this visit. It was for my mothers birthday. Making a booking was already a horrendous chore. Because the staff isn't even coordinated. Called and emailed several times and they cant give me a definite confirmation. Was promised a cake and birthday song but that didnt happen either. As for the buffet, spread was very very little. As for the crabs once we ordered we had to wait 45 mins to get what we ordered. So my the time we are done with dinner we already cant afford to order a second round of crabs because it was taking too long. Oysters and seafood isn't fresh you can literally smell the seafood and there was so much sand in them. Overall very very disappointed to have spent my mums birthday here. Will definitely not be coming back. But glad to say their customer service is really good just that most of the korean staff dont even understand what I was saying in english.

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: Went for the weekend afternoon tea. Lotsa of ppl already inside but we were being attended to our table very soon when we reached the entrance of Spices Cafe. For afternoon tea, the spread was considered very nice. Maybe the cakes selection and taste can be improved. Overall, we had a nice lunch and feel impressed.

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: Overall experience is good. But noted that the replenishment of certain dishes were slow, such as the laksa soup and the stewed ox tail. Also, just 1 lady making the soft balloons for the kids was just too slow. 2 would have been better. Lastly, do provide soft drinks too, and not just ice water. Understand probably dinner will have, but it is a festive season, so do be a bit more generous,

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: We went for the seafood buffet but the seafood (unlimited crabs and lobsters) weren't fresh at all. Other buffet items such as the soup weren't cooked properly (either too diluted for the cream soup or too starchy for the crab meat soup). Slow service might be due to full house on a Sat night.

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: Service is great, food are fresh. Food replenish fast, good variety. Me and my family enjoyed dinner at Spices Cafe. Look forward to visit here again.

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: 1) Service was excellent2) Food was fresh and delicious 3) Must try food, Fish, lamb and their crab.4) Last but not least, the replenish is fast

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: Maybe being a senior, I get to pay around $47 for a dinner buffet with fresh oysters, sasmhi, Sri Lanka crabs (unlimited), desserts including durian pengat, etc. makes it really worthwhile. The buffet line was not very widespread but everything seems to be fresh and replenish in time. I like the ambience as well and staff are helpful. Will definite go again.

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: plain grille lobster meat was hard.chilli and salted egg crab were not that fantastic. crab size seems very small.

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: The Mentaiko Lobster was delicious, so was the salted yolk crab and the fleshy oysters. On top of that, the chefs put in effort to refill the oysters when it is running low, on contrary to what other buffet restaurants practice. The sashimi was good as well and the grill section was exceptionally tasty! The list of good food there is just too many to list out one by one. All I can say is, there were just too many good food there that you would wish you have two stomach!

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: Yummy food. Love the cheese lobster if can get a whole lobster it would be nicer. Chilli crab and salted crab best. BBQ too many people and once the food is out it was gone in the next min

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: Great Spread, value for money, strongly recommended. Will visit again at a later date with my family.

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: Good service. Value for money buffet with the promotion which allows you to choose between lobster or abalone.

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: We had our mother’s 80th birthday celebration at Spice Café’s Sunday high-tea buffet (Concorde Hotel Singapore) on 18th November 2018 and we must give commendations to the Spice Café team for their prompt services and most importantly, the integrity of calling us when they found a gold ring left behind by our 82 years old aunt (can Spice Café let us know the name of waiter/waitress who found the rin

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: Went to this cafe at Concorde Hotel (Orchard) for their Sunday afternoon tea buffet and left a very pleased m

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: Specially came here for a birthday celebration for my loved ones. Arrived at the café at 8.30pm. However, upon arrival we have found that some of the food at the buffet counter is empty with just the remaining of bones and garnishing. The dishes were emptied and not replenished when it was not even near the closing hour. Requests have to be made for the food to be replenished. Unprofessional remarks were made loudly by the Chef, claiming that they have to cook up more food just to fill the stomachs of a few people that requested top-up.I am deeply disappointed byy the service.

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: Nice local food with lots of variety. Ambience was good. Comfortable and good service by the crew. Will strongly recommend.

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: All cultures catered for in the breakfast buffet, lots of cosy corners to relax in whilst you eat and catch up on news and family/

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: For a small hotel with an unassuming facade, the "Flavours of the Sea" buffet at Spices Cafe in Concorde Hotel sure packs a punch! There was a wide spread of hots and colds as well as unlimited orders of crab. Each diner is also entitled to 1 order of baked half lobster or 1 order of abalone and broccoli. While the lobster was the highlight of the meal, the crab and abalone were very avera

Review: For all the publicity for the crabs, service for the crabs were slow. In the two hours we were there, each of us could only have three crabs. And that is with repeated reminders of the order.

Review: Breakfast buffet is good but I belive that dinner buffet is even better. Service is good too. Look for Antonio & Jenna both are amazing servers. Rita, the supervisor is very friendly.

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: 5 hours to leisurely while away a relaxing afternoon. Mainly asian fare. Fresh prata and laksa were excellent. Pity the fish and dahl curry were way too salty. Local desserts. Polite service and comfortable environment.

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)
Location: 100 Orchard Road Concorde Hotel And Shopping Mall, Singapore 238840 Singapore
Review: Good local cuisine in a wonderful ambience.  The dessert was so so though. Staff was overall quite helpful.

Name: Spices Cafe (Concorde Hotel)

Location: 49 Circular Road, Singapore 049404 Singapore
Review: First time here and truly wowed by the quality of their food and service. Portion wise is pretty huge too. Highly recommended for people who loves Italian food and wants to explore a new place.

Name: Positano @ RP
Location: 49 Circular Road, Singapore 049404 Singapore
Review: Great Food ... I’m a fan. Well thought on the menu varieties. The service was excellent. Not to mention the food were amazing... Well done and definitely recommended!

Name: Positano @ RP
Location: 49 Circular Road, Singapore 049404 Singapore
Review: Calamari was grilled to perfection, pizza crust complemented the filling well and the beef ragu pasta, as always, scrumptious!

Name: Positano @ RP
Location: 49 Circular Road, Singapore 049404 Singapore
Review: The ragu here never disapppoints. If you love seafood, try the calamari (deep-fried and grilled versions, absolutely delicious) and spicy seafood supreme aglio (with succulent prawns and scallops). The truffle vegetarian pizza is very unique due to the addition of figs. Only don't order the lasagne, which was very ordinary. As for desserts, the tiramisu is pretty nice without being overly rich, and the sticky date pudding was even better.

Name: Positano @ RP
Location: 49 Circular Road, Singapore 049404 Singapore
Review: Love the beef ragu, calamari 2 ways and truffle vegetarian pizza! We thought the signature lasagna was so-so though. Had a good wrap up for the night with the tiramisu and sticky date. Not too sweet. Will return for other dishes! Great service too.

Name: Positano @ RP
Location: 49 Circular Road, Singapore 049404 Singapore
Review: Had the squid ink seafood spaghetti! Its deliciously nice and spicy. The prawn, squid and scallop is so fresh. Thank you!

Name: Positano @ RP
Location: 49 Circular Road, Singapore 049404 Singapore
Review: Amazing service everytime we come for a visit! Food is consistent as always too! :) would highly recommend to everyone

Name: Positano @ RP
Location: 49 Circular Road, Singapore 049404 Singapore
Review: was lucky to get a last minute reservation here for christmas lunch, we tried the squid ink pasta and pesto chicken pizza & they were really really tasty! good value for money as well. merry xmas :•)

Name: Positano @ RP
Location: 49 Circular Road, Singapore 049404 Singapore
Review: Food and service are great. Had the saffron risotto, calzone and Godfather milkshake - they didn't disappoint!

Name: Positano @ RP
Location: 49 Circular Road, Singapore 049404 Singapore
Review: Amazing food.. amazing people.. kudos for their great hospitality especially naufal, ain and the boss Mr Isyak.. would love to dine in there again..very soon.. thank u for having us at your beautiful resto!!!

Name: Positano @ RP
Location: 49 Circular Road, Singapore 049404 Singapore
Review: We stumbled upon this little gem of a restaurant by accident. To be honest, we were a little hesitant at first as the facade of the restaurant looked a little underwhelming. But as the saying goes, the proof of the pudding is in the eating and the pudding exceeded our expectations. We ordered the eggplant parmigiana, beef ragu fettuccine and the short ribs to share. Every single dish was delicious. Personally, my favorite was the short ribs - the beef were perfectly cooked, and the meat just fell off the bones. The excellent food was also matched by the warm and friendly service. The restaurant owner even took the time to come up to our table to have a chat even though it was clearly a busy evening for the restaurant. I am a bit ambivalent about “adding publicity” for this restaurant as the selfish part of me wishes it would be hidden. But credit should be given where it’s due.

Name: Positano @ RP
Location: 49 Circular Road, Singapore 049404 Singapore
Review: Tonight was our first time eating at Positano and there will hopefully be many more as there are so many other dishes on the menu we want to try. The food was excellent, like REALLY delicious! I had the short rib and my girlfriend had the wild mushroom truffle risotto. We didn't mind not being able to order alcohol as the mocktails were lovely. Good service from all the staff, particularly Ain who confirmed our same-day booking via WhatsApp and checked where we wanted to sit. It was really nice to meet one of the owners too - very genuine and funny.

Name: Positano @ RP
Location: 49 Circular Road, Singapore 049404 Singapore
Review: This restaurant is shown as one of the best Italian cuisine restaurants in Singapore, but the cuisine is not typically Italia

Name: Positano @ RP
Location: 49 Circular Road, Singapore 049404 Singapore
Review: Best dinner I had in month

Name: Positano @ RP
Location: 49 Circular Road, Singapore 049404 Singapore
Review: Well yes and no. Overall it is good, ambience, service, cosy place, fair price. Would have been 5 stars if the lobster we ordered is not slightly overcooked. Ah, perfection and consistency, and, balance, the bane of cooks. Balance was great. The lobster bisque sauce is to die for, noodle al dente, prawns fresh and crunchy and springy, the scallops, tender and juicy, the mussels, ok but alas the main attraction, the lobster slightly overcooked. Overall it is still a great dish. Could have been greater. Truffle mushroom soup was awesome except for the bread, somehow it taste off to me. But these are little tweaks that can be corrected. Still kudos to Positano.

Name: Positano @ RP
Location: 49 Circular Road, Singapore 049404 Singapore
Review: Went for lunch and was a truly memorable experience. Thanks to Ani and Khai for their great service.

Name: Positano @ RP
Location: 49 Circular Road, Singapore 049404 Singapore
Review: Great ambience, food and service. Nothing to complain about, tbh. The restaurant even provided a complimentary slice of birthday cake (tasted like yummy warm english pudding) for my family member. Two thumbs up!

Name: Positano @ RP
Location: 49 Circular Road, Singapore 049404 Singapore
Review: From the appetisers to dessert, everything was fantastic. We love the quiet ambience. Our food was served by the owner of Positano RP, Mr Ishak. Mr Ishak was attentive in serving the dishes accordingly. It was a pleasant dining experience like no other. The quality of the food was beyond satisfaction. Thank you for the warm hospitality.

Name: Positano @ RP

Review: Really good food, great ambience, and great warm staff that are attentive and professional!! Would definitely come again!

The server came to us to apologise and explained why they had a delay for 5 minutes in coming out with the Truffle Fries, which we were actually okay with it. I had the Striploin Steak and requested for a medium rare doneness. One part of it was a little undercooked but it was understandable as it was quite difficult to cook it properly and it was one the thick side of the steak. The mocktails were also good as it was not too sweet and not too fiz

The food-i got Supreme Calzone- was also served freshly baked and the mocktail - Scarlett O'Hara- was the right kind of sweet. Kudos to the staff, recommend this place to those seeking a little more relaxed ambience.

Thank you for the great customer service experienced with you!

Name: Positano @ RP

When our pizzas arrived, our expectations continued to be exceede

We looked through the menu and were tempted to try most of the irama. Settled for pasta, steak & Pizza. Every one of us enjoyed the meal, including the dessert which was creme brulee. Taste of the food reminded us of our trip to Italy, authentic and taste. Polite staff & efficient service which was fantastic. Will definitely make a comeback.

Name: Positano @ RP
Location: 49 Circular Road, Singapore 049404 Singapore
Review: We called in for a last minute reservation and they kindly accommodated us which we appreciate tremendous

Name: Positano @ RP

Name: Positano @ RP

Name: Positano @ RP
Location: 49 Circular Road, Singapore 049404 Singapore

Name: Positano @ RP
Location: 49 Circular Road, Singapore 049404 Singapore
Review: Good risotto dish, clean and nice ambiance.. overall it’s good place to eat w friends.. keep it up

Name: Positano @ RP

Review: An extremely cozy and comfortable setting. Had my anniversary lunch here with the wife, definitely enjoyed it. Highly recommended.

Name: Positano @ RP

Review: Today’s our anniversary and we chose Positano for our annual dinner. The ambience is great and chilled. The music was perfect, humming to the wonderful tunes while dining with my husband. Definitely returning here with my family next! 10 stars for me!

Name: Positano @ RP

Name: Positano @ RP

Review: Great ambience and good service as well. Food was delicious. Ordered the squid ink pasta and the sea food was very fresh :)

Name: Positano @ RP

Review: Had wagyu beef burger with lychee mock tail. Burger is rich and cheesy! It comes with fries on the side which are nice and crunchy

Name: Positano @ RP

Review: The food and the ambience were great. Definitely recommending beef lasagne and drink called “the godfather”. Amazing service too.

Name: Positano @ RP

Review: Good italian food, good atmosphere, just a very nice place in general. would definitely come here again for special occasions.

Name: Positano @ RP

Review: The ambience is great. Staffs were friendly, food was served fast and tasted great. Pls come & try..

Name: Positano @ RP

Review: The food is delicious and portion is great. Staff were friendly. Overall a satisfying dinner for a special occasion.

Name: Positano @ RP

Review: Food was delicious.i dont remember tasting gd tasty dishes when i was in italy. Hahah our waitress,ain, recommended us a wide range of choices! Gd one we had truffle mushroom linguine , squid ink pasta and grilled calamari!

Name: Positano @ RP
Location: 49 Circular Road, Singapore 049404 Singapore
Review: The food was delicious and reasonably priced. Presentation on point. Our server Ain took the time to recommend the top favourites in the menu and was constantly making sure our experience was smooth. Would definitely return!

Name: Positano @ RP
Location: 49 Circular Road, Singapore 049404 Singapore
Review: Excellent italian restauraunt in the CBD area. Food is nothing short of delicious and the service provided is top notch. Great decor and value for money as well.

Name: Positano @ RP
Location: 49 Circular Road, Singapore 049404 Singapore
Review: Friendly service, great food, warm ambience and cool music. Good portion for price paid as well. Was recommended by a friend and will definitely pass on the recommendation as well after this experience.

Name: Positano @ RP
Location: 49 Circular Road, Singapore 049404 Singapore
Review: Its a nice cozy place.. the food is superb and the service is really good.. shout out to staff Ain..

Name: Positano @ RP
Location: 49 Circular Road, Singapore 049404 Singapore
Review: Wild Mushroom Truffle Linguine a top pick amongst a comprehensive menu. Appropriately priced, halal and generous portions! Large dining table a plus point.

Name: Positano @ RP
Location: 49 Circular Road, Singapore 049404 Singapore
Review: We had a lunch today. Highly recommended are Squid Ink Seafood Spaghetti, Grilled Parmesan Stuffed Chicken, Wild Mushroom Truffle Linguine and Grilled Calamar

Name: Positano @ RP
Location: 49 Circular Road, Singapore 049404 Singapore
Review: Unfortunately this restaurant is highly overrated. There is no way that it deserves the No 1 spot in Singapore. The food is average and there is no alcohol served. But the service and the people are excellent. Nice neighbourhood place but no top restaurant by far.

Name: Positano @ RP
Location: 49 Circular Road, Singapore 049404 Singapore
Review: My husband and I had a lovely dinner date at Positano @ RP. Although this outlet is rather small compared to the Bugis outlet, it had a more intimate setting w a calming ambience. The food was great and the staff were polite and attentive to our needs. We’ll be back for sur

Name: Positano @ RP
Location: 49 Circular Road, Singapore 049404 Singapore
Review: The place has a nice ambience, and food was great too! I would also like to commend the lady who served me, Ain, who was very nice and helpful! I will most definitely come here again (-:

Name: Positano @ RP
Location: 49 Circular Road, Singapore 049404 Singapore
Review: Arancini and squid ink pasta was good. Service was great and personable with staff checking in on us. Would be coming back again soon ☺️

Name: Positano @ RP
Location: 49 Circular Road, Singapore 049404 Singapore
Review: The food here are amazing.I can’t describe how good it is.It really amazi

Name: Positano @ RP
Location: 49 Circular Road, Singapore 049404 Singapore
Review: Always leaving Positano with full tummies and feeling satisfied. Special thanks to Ain for her recommendation!

Name: Positano @ RP
Location: 49 Circular Road, Singapore 049404 Singapore
Review: Staff was friendly and welcoming, food was great. The ambiance was great and perfect place to chill with a couple of friends. Definitely will returm.

Name: Positano @ RP
Location: 49 Circular Road, Singapore 049404 Singapore
Review: Went there on the recommendation of a colleague and my entire family was not disappointed! We had 2 pepperoni pizzas, truffle fries, an eggplant parmigiana, a wagyu burger, an Impossible burger, a fettuccine and a slice of burnt cheesecake and tiramisu for desser

Name: Positano @ RP
Location: 49 Circular Road, Singapore 049404 Singapore
Review: We had a lovely dinner at Positano@RP. The ragu fettucine was fresh and well made. Service was great with staff checking in on us, ensuring we were comfortable :) We enjoyed the experience!

Name: Positano @ RP
Location: 49 Circular Road, Singapore 049404 Singapore
Review: Staff are very friendly and warm, attentive to our needs. Had a birthday celebration for a friend and they arranged for a cake to be sent out specially for her, very tasty as we

Name: Positano @ RP
Location: 49 Circular Road, Singapore 049404 Singapore
Review: The restaurant felt cozy and the staff here are friendly. They made sure the food was alright and asked if we needed anything else. The food was great too ! Would definitely come here again :)

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Love the outdoor seating here overlooking the Singapore River. Superb views. But for those who prefer air conditioning there is the option of indoor seatin

Name: Hooters
