Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: I've been here twice recently for lunch as they have a great deal at only $10++. No problems getting a table as Clarke Quay is just not busy on a weekday lunchtime. Friendly and efficient service and the food is better than might be expected, especially given the low prices at lunchtime.

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Had the Smothered Chicken Sandwich which was juicy, generously topped with green peppers, mushrooms and sliced cheese accompanied with a Chocolate Hootie Shake that was pretty rich and finished off my lunch with their Chocolate Brownie that's to die for. Customer service provided by the dynamic duo; Victoria and Erni was nothing short of amazing. As a fellow customer service personnel, I always believe that a smile goes a long way. It was a pleasure to have dined in while they were on shift. Kudos to the management for fighting through this pandemic by bringing great product to the table paired with well-trained staff on the floor and behind the b

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Hooters has re-opened in Phase II with social distancing measures in place.  It is still the same great service with even better deals on food and drinks!  They still have the set lunch specials that cannot be beaten by anyone down in Clarke Quey.

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Me and my friends went to clarke quay today, we were assisted by Dona and Lina. They were very accomodating and attentive. At the same time informative with regards to best seller items and the happy hour promotion. Food tasted great especially the Burger and fries plus the midly Spiced Chicken Wings. Clean and nice place. We really had a good time. Definately will come back!

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Hooters at Clark Quey was very good and great set lunch special from 12-3. Cannot beat the price and the river view.

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Nice views of the river, good music, excellent chicken wings and above all: amazing service by Charmen, Amaris and My.

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: A pleasant experience at this restaurant with good food and staff. Ema, Aura and Erni were helpful and attentive staff.

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Famous for beautiful & welcoming Hooters Girls, this is the place where to go for a cool beer while munching smoked wings or a Taco, while enjoying fabulous river facing view in Clark Quay, Singapore. Been there many times to try Tiger or Corona bucket (5 bottles) as well as Heineken & Tiger tower (which comes with nuts or samosa as free snac

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: We went there 2 days ago for drinks and we were going to eat there, we had just been on a wonderful river boat cruise and met some family members the

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: We went to this place mainly because my husband wanted the fried pickl

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: We had dinner at this place at the Clrk Quay. The place is amazing and the American Food is excellent and value for Money. They also serve very exciting Mocktails and Cocktails.

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: I visited hooters few years ago as a tourist and can say standards have not been maintain

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Pretty hard to get a bad meal in Singapore but we found one. Waitress was surly and almost robotic. Service was slow. Food was okay but nothing flash for the price. Wings were disappointing. Onion rings and satay were good. Would not recommend going when do many better options.

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: was raining and we didn't find another dry spot outside by the river. so we joined this venue. what should i say. food was good and service so too....

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Hooters is a pubbing area in the Downtown of Singapore. Surrounded by water body and Clarke Quay Central Mall, this is a covered sit out for food and drinks. I liked this place very mu

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Had a soft drink and share platter for lunch. Very overpriced. Huge sting in that every eatery charges a service fee of 10% plus a gst of 7% on top of all listed prices.

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: We chose to sit outside by the quay for a couple of drinks. We enjoyed watching the world go by, with the hustle and bustle of the nightlife around Clarke Quay, but this didn't have the same sort of atmosphere we are used to at a Hooters, and seemed to be lacking in something compared to some of the other bars close by. Drinks I thought were a bit on the high side price wise, but I guess that's what you pay in an area as popular as this.

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Oh myyy. This was the worst Hooters I’ve ever ‘enjoyed’ a meal. It was barely busy during lunch hour which was a bit of a concern, and the ladies... well, I felt sorry for them. They didn’t seemed pleased to be there. As for the food, it’s really standard bar food fare. They served the main dishes before the appetizers and with a group of seven, we received our meals over a 20 minute period. Then, when we said let’s just make the most of it, one of my colleagues bites into a piece of plastic in her taco. We were told it was the top of one of the condiment bottles. Well, they apologized but not all that much and it took several attempts to get some sort of compensation on the bill. I don’t want to be mean but something was just wrong here with the management, the staff, the food. With all the options in this part of town , I really don’t know why anyone would want to go there. We went there as a novelty for a colleague’s 22nd birthday- but the joke was on us.

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Visited Hooters tonight and asked for a simple order of two beers and five chicken wings. We had to wait over ten minutes for the beers to be served. The chicken wings never made it to our table as we gave up after a 45 minute wait. The waitress that served us was very rude and tried her very best to ignore us so we could not even enquire on the progress of our food. I would not recommend this restaurant unless you have over an hour to wait for snack food!

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: We don't have Hooters where I'm from but guessed an American themed bar could cook a good steak, right. Wrong! It was quite small (maybe 200grams) and advertised as rib eye but looked more like sirloin and my medium-rare was cooked medium-well which made it as chewy as an old boot! The waitress didn't even ask why I only ate a third of my meal so maybe she's used to seeing that happen. Maybe I was expecting too much after all the brand is renown for its buffalo wings not steaks. But my wife ordered the mixed grill which wasn't much better. The prawns were OK but you can't trick her when it comes to marinating and cooking on a bbq. The chicken thigh wasn't a slow cooked job, it had been boiled in the marinade and then just finished on a grill to get the bbq look. Least that's our opinion without checking the kitchen. My advice is to come here for light food and beer only and don't even think there's going to be any eye candy, this is Singapore after all.

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Like it sooo much chicken wings, went there for business trip. And we love the crudites. My partner was really enjoyed the beef BBQ

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: We went with high expectations and were pretty let down. hopefully they can improve. the service was okay but the food was a bit unsatisfactory.

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Customer service could be better. More waitresses need to be on at the same time and the clothing needs to be more revealing like in the USA.

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: We visited as walk ins. It was a quiet day but the place was under staffed. The waitress we had put three menus down for us but when she returned she seemed determined that I order from the set menu. When I made my order not from the set menu the service seemed to be lacking. She came back with drinks and I asked for the guest WiFi password and she wouldn't tell me what it was. Instead she pointed out another businesses WiFi which I thought was poor customer service since I had to continue to wait in prolonged silence for my food which was luke warm when it came out. The cost was overpriced considering the overall experience.

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Came for cocktails and they were alright! It was quite late on in the night but it was nice sitting next to the Quay for a couple of drinks. The Tiger Margarita is quite a sight; definitely get yourself one of those if you come :)

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: well, going to HOOTERS shall be fun for your stomach and your (male) eyes - thats the whole concept and thats how to measure

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: I like to write positive reviews. Unfortunately, in this case, it's a hard ask. The staff were disconnected, every item we ordered, didnt arrive without us asking twice for it, even the bill needed asking for more than twice. When I expressed how disappointed we were, the waitress said "we're busy". I looked around to see no patrons on the inside and half the tables were empty outside. Poor excuse for bad service.

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: We were on a bar hop and stopped for a few drinks. It is not the traditional Hooters nevertheless we enjoyed it!

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review:
Don’t bother just a rip off. Now a children’s bar very disappointed over priced for what you get
Poor service not what you think any more.
Now a children place.
Soz about this try another place.

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Enjoyed the happy hours with some great seafood starters. They also had a few vegetarian options which was good but the view is the best part about the place. Right by the river and you get to experience the night life in Singapore as it is open until 3am

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Had lunch here during the week. Food was fine, service was very good. It's just something different to try while in Singapore.

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Having eaten here a few years earlier and having a good experience I tried agai

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: This had nothing at all to recommend it. The wings were extremely bland with almost no sauce even though we asked for hot. You used to get your wings with two sauces and celery sticks now all of those are extra. The service was appaling slammed plates down all clearly an effort and don't even think they will smile!!! Used to have good wings but will never ever return.

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Specialty is the chicken wing that come with varieties flavors. I am more into the environment which we seated outside. We are there for thanksgiving and my Americans friends are enjoying their food too much!

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Went to hooters for lunch in Clarke quay Should have known things would be a challenge when it took 15 mins to get a seat Six people in the restaurant Food was a mush of chicken with grease Fries with grease Buffalo source evaporated by grea

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: I have been to Hooters in Atlanta and thought then the wings were the best I have ever had.... so I was real keen to have some while in Singapo

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: I went to have dinner on Saturday around 8.30 pm. this has two parts. outdoor section by the river. it was full so we were asked to go insi

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: We visited Hooters as we have done many times over the last 10 years. We ordered buffalo chicken wings and beers. The drinks arrived 30 minutes from the time we arrived and the wings another 15 minutes later. When the wings did arrive, after eating 2 of them I noticed that they weren't cooked (photos attached). I had literally eaten raw bloody chicken and didn't notice because it was disguised by the sauce. I gave them the benefit of doubt, deciding it must have been a one off, then my husband found that his wings were also bloody and uncooked. We promptly left our unfinished food and drinks, complained to the manager who subsequently brought us our bill for the drinks. Now you don't visit Hooters for the service but it is not unreasonable to expect for our bill to be cleared (we had only eaten 3 of 20 wings and had not finished our drinks) This did not happen and neither did we receive an apology. What kind of person does not even apologise? I tell you who, so called manager Emma who not only didn't apologise, but had a stinking attitude. I am now sick from the food which is not only an inconvenience but a potential disaster for my baby who I am currently breast feeding. Please avoid avoid avoid, unless you want to end up sick like me.

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Good place besides Singapore river.very close to Clarke.service was very slow.drinks were not server until main course.

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Worst experience. Food not good. And unfriendly staff. Asked then to change a dish as the preparation was bad and they said it's like this only. Very unprofessional.

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Popped in  for a quick dinner.  Service was good. Chicken wings were good.  Beer and wine were good...what more do you need.  Good location on the river,  weather was lovely so we sat outside watching the world go by..perfect

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: There were three of us that were tired after a long night tour and it was getting late, Most of the places around the water were very loud and not what we were looking for. We figured we could just get a hamburger. Even though it was a little quieter than the places around it , it was still very loud with terrible music. The food was mediocre but the service was terrible with very rude servers

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Average food and service. Waited a bit longer than we expected. Location is very nice close to the river. Hooters Singapore is not so "hooterisch" as Hooters in USA. Witch is perfectly

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: An amazing location on the beautiful Clarke Quay. Relaxing, views of the water, and a very good menu on offer. For me the oysters, chicken wings and beers made for a good afternoon. And of course very good service, I will be back.

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Lousiest service by service staff Erina. Went there for lunch today, not only was she Rude, doesn't smile and we were appalled by the way she spoke to us. She came to our table "yes what do you want?" With a straight face, watels

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Well just ok food. Nothing much to say. Not quite sure if it is actually living upto its name. Would have expected something better on the river frount for that price

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Lovely evening on a river cruise so wanted a nice meal close by. We should have been put off immediately by the way we were told we couldn’t sit by the river despite seeing empty tabl

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Well Hooters is known that you get served by very sexy girls, this is not the case he

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: On Dec. 4th 2018, I and five co-workers went for dinner. Shortly after being seated and food started to come out, the waitress assigned to our table was missing. Our table was outside and we could see our waitress inside taking photos with other customers and waiting on other tables. Because all our food had stopped coming out and our drinks were empty, we asked the manager, Doreen Soh, why our waitress was not helping our table. The reply was she was told to go on brea

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review:
Singapore was like 24hrs live city, went there after my long journey business day
And stop by at Hooters for a supper and I would love so much the chicken wings with fresh crudités!

Love to be back again!

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review:
Love with chicken wings with incredible sauce and accompanied with crudités.

I was there for business trip and found this place so nice and chic.

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Clarke Quay is a manic noisy live life to the full place. And Hooters is just one of scores of restaurants delivering ethnic and fusion food. We had western style fish and chips and salmon main courses served by a friendly waitress and apart the noise enjoyed the food and the sights including the picturesque bumboats plying the river.

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Lunch after strolling around the river and Clarke Quay.. as aleays good food and salad drinks with river side view dinner... we all enjoyed our lunch by the river side good scenery... pleasant set up and a walking distance from our hotel

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Was missing my Buffalo Wings & was looking for an alternative site to take in Saturday Night Footba

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: the staff were very helpful and courteous specially Rose, food offered is good. drinks are also good. liked where we were seated - we could see the water from our seats. had a great time. Thanks for a good time.

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: There was once a time to visit Hooters, it was called the 90s. Went along for a cocktail and some buffalo wings, what we got was a glass of alcohol free syrup and some chicken that did just taste of chicken and nothing el

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Popped in here for a light lunch and sat outside. Most of the restaurants at Clarke Quay offer lunchtime specials 11am-3pm at $10SGD/£5 for one of 10 mains, a soft drink and ice-cream. We had a chicken in spaghetti and fish and chips with a soft drink and one large beer ($5SGD) all for $30SGD with taxes. Lunch is amazing value – but the Hooters are rather flat!

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: We were greeted with friendly staff from the minute we walked in to hooters. The meals were very quick to come to the table and very yummy. It was also good value for money.

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: The service was slow and the atmosphere is not like other Hooters restaurants. It is requiring further attentions to keep it.

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Understand Hooyers set lunch served sirloin steak and understand their doneness always miscalculated. Order Bleu doneness but end up get Medium Well instead. Bleusteak eventually cooked momentarily at a very high temperature so that it is charred on the outside yet raw in the centre. Throw away 90% portion of steak. No service recovery yet no initiative to attend guest satisfaction. Final visit for repeated guest.

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Nice view sitting along the Clark Quay and river front.  Ordered buffalo wings with beers.  Good food and nice ambience to hang around.  Would be good to improve on the service.

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Had to post this here because they keep deleting my google review. This franchise is so cheap it's embarrassing. Curly fries are $5.90. Curly fries with cheese is $6.90. That's a $1 difference. When you ask for a top-up of cheese sauce, they charge you $2.30... completely irrational, moronic and greedy. The measly amount they give you will only last you half of the fries. You could get away with a $1 top up even though that's still ridiculous. It would make more sense to STATE ON THE MENU the cheese sauce top-ups are $1 and then give it to the customers for free as it would not cost the establishment a dime in the long run, so that you would secure guaranteed revisits and positive word of mouth. This isn't about cheese sauce, it's about management and morale. This place even forces you to buy bottled water even though Singapore has drinkable tap water. The food is average. The waitresses are friendly but the service feels inconsistent. It's clear this franchise survives only on the Hooters brand name and the location. I'll personally buy the franchise owner an F&B management course and throw in a free math lesson. Now that's generous.

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Was so excited to try out this famous america restaurant. Left very disappointed. Staff were not friendly and didnt really pay attention to us, food tasted bland with no flavour and we didnt feel very good after eating

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: We ordered wings as a starter and some starters and mains for the main course for all the family. We explained what we wanted and when we wanted it. Out came the onion rings and fries first sent them back. Then came the kids quesadillas so sent them back but the manager just handed them to a waitress to return. Very simple instructions but very poor seevice. Let the brand down. And they still charged the service charge. I shall be emailing their head office.

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Yes you read that right - I ordered their signature burger over lunchtime, took the top bun off, looked down and saw at least 3 green ant-looking bugs crawling all over the lettuce. This was at a time when the restaurant was practically empty (it is located in a nightspot after al

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: We went there so we could see what all the talk is about going to Hooters. We were really surprised at how great the food was and the service was great to

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: We have visited many Hooters but this one was very disappointing; mainly due to staff lack of interest. We sat at the bar and after a very long wait I had to ask the bar tender to serve us, we requested menus but again no service to take the order so give up on food finished our drinks and lef

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: We got a good deal. At Clarke Quay, don't expect things to come easy on pocket. You are probably on one of the most expensive part of the town. Plus, you pay for location. The experience was good.

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review:
The food was just ok...however, the service was good - friendly staff. 
It’s overpriced for the quality of food.

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: We went to Hooters on a whim one day and I fell in love with the "Original Buffalo Chicken Tacos." A few weeks later we went back just for those and "sorry, not available" (but they were still on the menu. The third time we visited, they had the tacos but there was lettuce on them instead of the fresh cabbage slaw that made them really special. And yesterday evening we found out that the tacos are still on the menu but the menu has changed and they're no longer the "original" with cabbage." Lettuce has replaced the cabbage permanent

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Our first ever visit to Hooters and our family of four took advantage of the $10 lunch special (Which is actually $12 after taxes etc). A good variety of dishes to choose from and excellent sized portions. One waitress was cold and the other very friendly! The regular menu prices looked a bit on the high side for the food it is. Definitely worth worth the lunch deal but I don't think we're go there for dinner.

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Nice location. Ordered the Tower Beer and was offered Free Snacks. We were there just for an easy night-out anyway so could not try thr food menu. Cool breeze on the River Bank. Took a while though to seek for someome to get us our cheque.

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: While my friend wanted to have beer, their offers were only on cheap local beer. Further they had very little veg options. While the lady who was catering to us was nice, she would simply disappear. The other waitresses were simply at odds to our request. Would have appreciated a more cordial approach towards guests especially since lots of competition around.

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Since there is a service charge included staff does not care at all, waitress are moody and food very average...beer is good.

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Since it was a rather warm night and football season is on, we had our dinner inside Hooters Restaurant while watching the games being play

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: A good place to go for a quick bite. Good variety offered on menu, fair prices, and good portion sizes. Service is good and friendly.

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: We have been to many Hooters in the USA so was so happy to see they had this is Singapore. Clarke Key has lots of restaurants and bars, Hooters in located in the middle of

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review:
Awesome place  very friendly staff great food 

Husband wanted to go there just because and I thought why not

Girls were very nice looking

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: We have never been to a hooters, even though past many in US. We had chicken wings, a Diet Coke and 2 hooters slings , lush a chicken sandwich each. We thought the food was very good, especially the coating on the chicken. We most certainly will visit a hooters again

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Really poor. Not enough staff. Waited 10 minutes for my bill. Overpriced standard food with 16% of service charge and GST.

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Went in with my wife afew days ago..on a friday night..ordered beef fondue and my wife had tiger prawns olio..food wise was not bad..came in hot n tastety...had afew happy hours stout which was going at hour (buy 2,1free).. staffs were well mannered..overall was happy that i chose to dine in at hooters that night..afew more main course could be introduced..great job HOOTERS

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Previously a beacon of hospitality, good service and good food, but now an assembly line-like joint with no character and staff who seem like they could not care les

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Good location in the heart of Clarke Quay, they cooked my burger very fast, the young waitress wasn’t very friendly but it’s just a fast food. However, you can just sit there, relax and enjoy the view!

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: After a few weeks eating Asian food,  saw the Hooters at Clark Quay. I ordered grilled  cheese sandwich. It was the worst grilled cheese sandwich ever. Ther server was very nice, though

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review:
We visited here last week for dinner and enjoyed the food especially the wings. 
Sally was very helpful and very polite, although very shy but she definitely made us feel welcome so Sally if you are reading this - thank you!

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: We tried their Singapore Slings, a lot more sling than Sin as we couldn’t detect the alcohol. The servers were very pleasant with well presented uniforms, however it didn’t make up for the poor quality of the drinks. It sits by the river in Clarke Quay in what I think is one of the best nightlife areas in Singapore.

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review:
Singapore has so much amazing food to offer - no need to come here. We only came here because it was pouring with rain and needed cover and something to eat.

Don't go here unless you want poor quality, greasy food. End of story.

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Hooters is an American style restaurant filled with beautiful women waitresses.  The restaurant is best known for their chicken wings.  Great atmosphere and sure to be a fun time.

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: I'd say I've been to many Hooters world wide. The Buffalo Chicken sandwich was probably the largest in size I've had anywhere. However, we ordered the curly fries and both our dishes were absolutely terrible...over friend and soaked with too much oil. Price is fair esp for the si

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Decided to have a quiet day after two hectic days at Sentosa and dropped in here for lunch. Ordered off the set lunch menu and were not at all disappointed with the food - chicken wings were delicious, NZ sirloin steak was just right, fish and chips were simply great, all washed down with Singapore’s famous Tiger beer. Good service and quick enough too.

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: What do you expect? Wings, girls and beers. The wings, burgers and tacos we shared were decent enough, and drinks were cold. Service was efficient.

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: We enjoyed that food very much. It was awesome experience. very delicious. We love that food much...

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Found this by accident during an afternoon visit to Clarke Quay. Was impressed with their advert for the $10 lunch. Decided to try. Managed to sit overlooking side of river. Girls very pleasant and ordered the NZ Steak plus Tiger Beer. Fantastic value and speedy service. Great to sit and relax watching the river activity. Returned more days choosing different menu and each was excellent.

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: I was here with my bestfriend. We were on a birthday weekend getaway XD And this is the first time I tried Hooters. One of my friend keeps saying how he loves the Place, so I thought, I could gave it a t

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: I had one of their favourites chicken wings with curly fries but it doesn't even come close to Nandos.

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review:
Chicken wings with crudites and ranch dressing was superb.

The ambience from clarck key so beautiful.
Singapore was the best place to transit place for business trip.

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Hooters is what it is with good value food and right on the waterfront. We indulged in the $10 lunch menu and were all happy with what we got. Drinks were reasonably priced and service was good. The girls were cheerful and willing to pose for photos with our gro

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Have been to Hooters a few times in the past, but just recently is seemed to have lost a bit of its Ho

Name: Hooters
Location: Blk 3D River Valley Road #01-03 Shophouse Row, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: hi y'all r you board in Singapore and want to try something new? well give a try for this hooters at clark quay, it its a good place to eat and it is a reasonable price. if y palling to go boozing make sure u don't don't do it at 11:00 PM in Singapore local time, because according to the new Singapore gov. law, you r not permitted to buy any alcohol drinks in Singapore because the Singapore government want to lessen the hangover proble

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review:
Food is fresh and tasty.
Selections of drinks are not a lot, but is still sufficient.
The service is alright. The staff just need to be a little friendlier.

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: we like the dungeness crab in a bag  but will order medium spicy and omit garlic the next time. The seafood is fresh, big and value for money. Service is very good with unlimited flow of homemade iced lemon tea.

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: This is my second time at The Boiler. Brought me mom there for the first time and she loved the it! There were selections for those who didn't want to eat the bags too!

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: Nice place for couples. A different seafood dinner experience. It's expensive though. Ample parking lots in the industrial buildings.

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: We went for our son's birthday and ordered the BomDiggity bag and he got a lobster free. His lobster tasted like mud. We might be spoiled by lobster in the US, but this did not taste like a fresh Boston lobster. The flavour of all the seafood was similar: tasted frozen, not fresh. For the price, it was quite disappointing. Also the sauce was too overpowering; perhaps to try to cover the taste of the seafood. We did really enjoy the crab cakes and the onion rings. Service was good and the atmosphere was relaxing. But for the price and the seafood, we will not return here.

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: We have been frequently and Boiler is our favourite. Love it! It is a definite restaurant to book, any day of the week it's always busy. Make sure to book and enjoy one of our favourites!

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: The crab here was at par if not better in some aspects to the a lot of bigger places. Amazing food and very nicely dressed deserts. A very open floor plan leads to a very well serviced. This was everything I would have asked for from a Monday family lunch.

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: Staff was very friendly and patient to guide us through the ordering process including recommendation on the sauce to use

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: Very happy with the food and service there. Celebrated 3 x birthday there. Will continue going there. Thank you so much.

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: The seafood was very fresh and the chef cook the food just nice.  Well done!  Keep it up.  Thank you very much.

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: Fantastic service from Sharon and “The Boiler” team. The food came quickly and was fresh and delicious. Unique “food in a bag” dining experience. The place has a nice ambience and is family friend

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: Was pleasantly surprised by the menu, the portion size (we had the Duo) and the relaxed ambiance. Would like to see a stronger wine list (and a cider option) but beer on tap was fresh and well priced.

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: Nice concept - food being served on the table in bags, without plates, works just fine for this kind of food.  Delicious seafood, good service.  Atmosphere could be a bit warmer  - Luisiana style.

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: nice and quiet ambience; huge portions; friendly and excellent service; however, not impressed with flavor of seafood; prawns, crabs and lobster tasted blend with little 'sweetness'

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: I am disappointed in my latest visit to the outlet. Just been there in September (a month ago). I guess they just got the separate venue 2 doors down and the logistic is not working out properly. The seafood bag was diluted, not much sauce can be seen/tasted. Quantity of the items seems to be reduced. Clearly, there is also short of manpower. We wanted to order more as the food was not satisfying and couldn't get the waitress attention. had to wait quite long for the bill as well. I hope they will improve as this has been one of our top-choice.

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: Food is superb! Fresh seafood! There are are so many choices from their menu. We will definitely be back. Almost the same back in US!

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: Food was amazing and i would totally revisit. service was also fast and inefficient. Table was already set up for us before we got there. Food came in less than 10mins

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: Visited The Boiler in Nov with Birthday Lobster, Ordered Bombdiggity Beg (The Works flavour) and garlic butter for Lobster, it taste really good for “The Work” and so strong that we wouldn’t really taste the garlic butter, overall the taste is good and make you feel like going ba

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: Was there to celebrate mum’s birthday. 1st visit to the place. Well hidden from the busy street. Interesting setup.

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: Reservation for 8pm, but could only be seated at 8.15pm. Many alcoholic drinks were sold out. We ordered the Premium Set, which included items like coleslaw and crab cakes, but no plates and cutlery were given. Neither were we given the tools for cracking crab. We had to ask 3 different waiters before finally getting them. The 2nd waiter even told us that the style of the restaurant meant that we were supposed to eat food from the tabletop and with hands. Are we supposed to eat coleslaw with our hands? Furthermore, this was not the 1st time we were there. The previous visit, we were given plates and cutlery without askin

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: We have spent so times in Boiler and always take there for friends. It's a favourite. We always our place for birthdays. Only issue is that it's full everyday, and we have to make a reservation, which is great for them. The boiled bag is brilliant, and the kids like the fish and chips, but always get stuck into the bag as well. Such a beautiful meal.

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: The food was very delicious, value for money. We enjoyed the meal very much! Would definitely go back again

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: Food was really good! Ambience was nice as well. My friend and I really liked the food. Will be back again!

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: We booked for a lunch for our family for our Birthdays and Wedding Anniversary which their promo offer $75 off with promo code and a free lobster.  Our family enjoyed the lunch and all the staffs there are very friendly and helpful.

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: The seafood here is perfectly cooked, it taste fresh and succulent. We have order 2 sauces, the garlic butter was good with nice garlic flavour. The other we have the mild spicy sauce, not like the normal chilli crab type of sauce but it taste ok, was expecting a richer sauce. Good services from friendly and polite staff.

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: Everything in the bag was excellent. freshness of the crabs and prawn were great too. However as we claim the free lobster due to the birthday month, we find the lobster meat to be too chewy and harder to peel off.

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: Nice food, but the service must be improved. I love the chilli crab, it is very special.  Next time i will back again, but i hope the service must be good, thanks

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: A fun idea with good friends, probably not the safest thing to add during Covid. Fresh seafood, clams, mussels, shrimp, crabs comes in a bag and shared by all 4 of us. Great sauce which I ended up asking to take come! Finished with a couple of orders of fish and chips and a round of beers. Fun evening.

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: Delicious and fresh seafood. Received a big lobster free as birthday treat. Safe distancing was practised

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review:
we unfortunately were served by an unpleasant waiter with a very unfriendly attitude who answered our questions quite rudely. A total buzzkill on a night for celebration. 

Food 5/5
Service 4/5
Atmosphere 3/5

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: The service was top notch. Responsive and polite services was provided. Food arrived shortly after ordering.

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: In-attentive waiter. Food sauce spill on the floor, still keep walking till we highlighted to him. No thank you or a word.

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: It was our 2nd time here and our last visit was 4yrs ago. Booked our table using Chope like the last time. Could hardly remember how/what the food was like and was pleasantly surprised by the quantity of food. We ordered the $89 seafood bag. The seafood was fresh and nicely flavoured! Would have rated 5 stars for the food if not for the soft shell crab salad that we ordered. The veggies were practically swimming in the dressing and there was too much peanut topping Salad quantity is good for sharing among 4 people, do not recommend for 2 pax to order it. All in all we had a wonderful meal!

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: Excellent food. It was first time for us visiting this place. The sea food is fresh and served promptly. Must tr

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: Have informed on booking to pre-order cake for birthday surprise but it was not prepared even though it was double confirmed on the day itself before reaching the restaurant. Have selected birthday redemption of lobster on the booking but was not informed only certain items have the redemption until i asked the staff. Apparently they DO NOT see your booking details. Disappointed experience.

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: Food is soo delicious! Had the duo bag (The Works sauce is amazing and wonderfully spicy) with cajun fries, sweet potato fries, onion rings, cajun chicken. The fried oysters were also a big hit. Ordered delivery for a birthday and they went above and beyond with the cutest birthday aprons, a delicious chocolate fudge cake and a handwritten card. Delivery was right on time, effortless and incredibly friendly. Will absolutely order here again. Special thanks to the manager Linda who has been nothing but great.

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: Good for big group so can get to enjoy different varieties. Well recommended and die die must try!! We will be back

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: Best offer under TGIW. Need reservation in advance. Went for the basic package of seafood and too good to get one more prawn bag. Service was awesome from Amos and seriously worth the visit!

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: The food was good, however one of the waiter makes us angry. When we have finish our food, he asked us to settle the bill first as someone was waiting outside. But we have not finished our drink and we told him off supposing we should have 1.5hour of eating time. Please not we have not seated even for 1 hour!

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: Thank you for maintaining the food quality and service standard. I bring two friends who try your restaurant for the first time and they love it! One even compares that The Boiler is way much better than similar competitors. Thanks for continuing the free lobster during birthday month promotion and the complimentary piece of cake. My friend has an awesome birthday celebration dining at The Boiler.

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: Thank you for all the Boiler staffs. We do have a enjoyable dinner especially celebrate my son's birthday. Thank you for the complimentary birthday cake. Cheer !

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review:
Been here some times before, was OK. But this time ordered a take away at 7.30 PM and got my  food until 9 PM.
Food is good though +⭐️
Free drink while waiting +⭐️
Total 3 stars.

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: This is probably my fourth time at this place, thoroughly enjoyed the meal with my family here. Celebrated with the lobster promo as it was my birthday month. Would add however that the floor staff could have been more attentive. Upon clearing our table to enquire about the cake or bill next. Kind of awkward that I had to ask for it to be taken out haha. Overall great experience!

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: Our food arrived shortly upon ordering. The sauce of garlic butter was a good choice, not too garlicky nor buttery. Plastic aprons were given and even plastic bags for the handphones! When we finished the food, it was already over the lunch hour but staff were nice enough to wait patiently for us to leave. Only minor small issue is the air con was too cold.

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: Good food with good experience.  We will definitely visit again as the staffs there are very polite and friendly.  I enjoy the shell out experienced.

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: I went to Boiler with my friend and it was a great experience. We ordered the beef burger and the spicy chicken burger (new). Both burgers tasted good and the staffs are polite and fast in their service.

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: The "birthday" lobster was really good! it's big and meaty! However the dinning experience wasn't so nice as we were told there was a 90mins dinning time. The way of staff explanation was saying they had to serve 2 rounds dinning which like we would be chased out. This 90mins dinning hours is ridiculous especially when you have a big group of friends and birthday celebration is going on. This is something needed to be looked into. Wouldn't be ridiculous to have a this rule in a bar?

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: It was our first time having boiled bag of seafood and the food was great ! The staff were attentive and helpful. Only thing is not much of meat choice for one of my sons who'is not wild about seafood.He did enjoy the shared side platter .We ordered extra karage chicken for him.Enjoyed the mocktails and lovely iced lemon tea.Will come again!

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: Our periodic visit to this restaurant and the food is bgreat! I must admit that service is superb and constantly good. Especially, Cati that made our evening great! Looking forward to next trip to Boiler!

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: Went there knowing the price of the food beforehand but when the food came. I sigh at the price i paid for the big bag. However birthday promo for a free lobster when you order the big bag was good. Able to choose 2 flavour. They also gave a free slice of cake for the birthday. Hence, still a little disappointed at the price. Thanks!

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: BIRTHDAY LOBSTER- yes free with the Bomdiggity Bag. The bag is a no brainer. Filled with delicious crab, prawns, mussels and oysters. It’s fantastic. It’s the signature dish. We had ours steamed with 2 side sauces. Delicious. Our waitress Linda was FABULOU

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: Popular with locals and ex-pats and nice simple but well prepared food. My soft-shell crab salad was really tasty and my wifes salmon was cooked to perfection. Dishes range from pasta, seafood and ribs.

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review:
For chatting n relax or birthday
 It is very delicious food n beer 
👍👍👍👍👍
We will come again in Dec ( birthday)

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: I saw my relative's facebook post of her birthday celebration at The Boiler and I liked it. Hence, my family and I went to the branch nearer my home to celebrate my son's birthday. The food was fresh and the meat was succulent. The service was good too. We enjoyed the experience!

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: One of the better restaurant managers, she guides her staff and at the same time rises to the occasion when called upon. Well run restaurant at affordable prices.

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: The food is good. Got a free lobster as part of the BIrthday promo. The staff is friendly and service is great.

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: This is our families 4th visit over the last 6 years. Food and experience is as good as my first visit here. Strongly recommended for seafood lovers. My personal favorite after trying all the 'baggies' restaurant in S'pore. Still keep coming ba

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: Maybe ok for boiled crustacean, but almost everything else is greasy deep fried. Even after peeling batter, calamari was so oily it greased whole paper napkins. Sampling plate eas all deep fried. Disappointing. If this is best seafood in Singapore, turn to meay or veg. Better seafood at nearby street food(Gluttons)

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: We went there 2nd time to celebrate my birthday and I was gifted with a lobster with the purchase of the Bombdiggity Bag as well as a free cake! I am surprised by the size and freshness of the lobster and the alaska crab. Both were very delicious. My kids loved them so much that they were linking their fingers. Also thumbs up for great service from ZK and Merwin.

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: Fresh seafood. Love the prawns and crab. Garlic butter crab is tasty. Value for money via Chope. Will go again

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: Garlic butter is good, goes well with beer. Nice selection of dessert. Service was great. LX deserves a raise.

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: There is quite a varieties of food choice. The fish and chip is good. The butter garlic combo is good too. They have free refill for Ice Lemon Tea.

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: It’s our 2nd time to had our dinner with friend and it still I love the seafood! This time, had the crab!

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review:
Generous in the potion, the $145 bag is more than enough for 3 and possible 4 if small eaters.
Free Lobster for birthday month.

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: Went last Sunday for dinner as it was for my Wife birthday celebration. Ordered a bombdiggity bag & duo bag & a kid meal - cream mushroom past

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: Food was good although slightly on the expensive side.  But we received a complimentary lobster due to the birthday and the meal we ordered. Like the environment. Spacious with high ceiling.

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: Was there for my wife's birthday with the kids.  A complimentary cake was a nice gesture. Service was prompt and good. Have been there multiple times and will be back again. Thumbs up!

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: We go pretty frequently but usually just as a couple without the children. We brought the kids in our last visit and we were so glad they also enjoyed eating there. The staff remembered us and as usual, had a great time dinning there.

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: This was my 2nd visit for lunch with some friends. We ordered the Spam Fries, Chicken Wings and Calamari for appetisers with Duo bag as the main course for the 3 of us. Other than the Calamari, which was very chewy and the batter rather oily, the food was goo

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: Great ambience, great seafood, great price, great service! Loved the free refill of homemade iced tea as well.

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: I had a great time in this seafood restaurant and there was lovely service, especially from Bryan and Ying Xuan.

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: Come to celebrate the birthday. Got a free lobster and birthday cake. The service here is excellent. Seafood is fresh and tasty. Will definitely come again！

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: Good dinner with the birthday lobster promo. Crab, lobster & prawns were fresh and yummy. Portion is heavy for 4 pax. Good deal the the birthday promo.

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: My son had his birthday lunch here during which we fully enjoyed the lovely seafood combo. Mo

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: the seafood was really fresh, second visit in two months. portion is good too, flavourful sauce, will come back again.

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: Discount for weekday promo was not reflected on our bill after a Staff took our order when we specified that we’re using the promo and purchased vouchers. Manager came to explain but wasn’t apologetic at all. Had to pay the whole bill without the discount. My family weren’t happy since we had verified with staff who confirmed with the manager when we placed our order. Note to other diners: check and double check. The female manager at boiler Howard street wasn’t that dependable or service-oriented.

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: Guess it's my 3rd visit. Never been disappointed. The seafood in bag are fresh and delicious with their special sauce.

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: I was on business from New Zealand and was taken to The Boiler for the second time in several years. It’s such a fun, unique way to eat and eat we did! There was a fantastic array of crab, prawns, shell fish, corn on the cob and sausage bites in a wonderful gravy (coconut perhaps?), all served in a plastic bag in the middle of the table (stay with me here). Diners wear a plastic bib and just get hands on with the food, leaving all the scraps in a pile on the plastic table cloth. At the end, the serving staff roll up the mess and take the tablecloth away and you’re done! Really delicious and novel if you don’t mind getting a bit dirty.

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: 1st time visit the restaurant nice place to gather with friends and family. Food is tasty and choice of sauce suitable for kids, as well p

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: Was at The Boiler end of April 2019 celebrating my sis-in-law's birthday. This was my first time there and we were there specifically for the lobster special. We told the staff that we were first timers to The Boiler and was pleasantly surprised by the service extended to u

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: Ordered bomdiggity bag with free birthday month lobster. Had a free cake too. Seafood is huge and fresh. Sauce compliments very well (had bomdiggity bag with sauce of the month which is Assam. Had lobster with butter sauce). Drank sogurt and it’s yummy too. Friendly staff. Second visit to this restaurant and still find the bibs and plastic bag for phone so adorable (and of course useful). Will be back again soon.

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: Have fish and chip. It is served in a lightweight basket and the tartar source in a disposable small dish. The fish are good and also the fries. But it will definitely taste a lot better if they can serve it on a normal plate. Nice hide away environment. And over price drinks.

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: Had a great experience dining in The Boiler for my birthday. A unique hands-on concept of dining on fresh seafood out of the b

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: Seafood at The Boiler has always been the most fresh & delicious, what makes us keep going there is the warm hospitality extended by staff John, who is always there to welcome guests with his sincere smile, we are indeed impressed by his excellent services. Of course, not forgetting the charming gorgeous Manager Linda, who is the great leader for the wonderful team at The Boil

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: Food was delicious and fantastic. Definately Will return for another round good seafood..  thumbs up for the lobster..👍🏼

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: Went there to celebrate my wife’s birthday with her family. Ordered two Bombdiggity Bags and some sides. Overall great experience and excellent services from the staffs. Especially ZK ! Keep up the good work! Will be back for more !

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: Very good service by the serving team especially Cita. Fppd was awesome and atmosphere is great. Cita surprised my gf and I with a cake for our anniversary. Greatly recommended and thank you!

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: The staffs are very friendly.. and the Serving time is good. Portion are right. Thank you. Thank you . Thank you. Thank you

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: Absolutely value-for-money to celebrate your birthday here! Us two finished an entire Bombdiggity Bag which serves 4. The seafood is fresh and awesome with the tasty sauces. Love it!

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: My family of 8 had a birthday lunch at the Boiler@Howard Rd. The ambience is casual and simple. We ordered the birthday lobster promotion coupled with Bombdiggity Bag, house chopped salad, Boiller's sampling platter, calamari rings and drinks. They are all very yummy. Parking is at the building itself and along the roads. Service is helpful and prompt.

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: Fuss free sit in though was early. Food is great and service is prompt! We chose garlic crab so kids can eat.

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: Me and my partner went here the second time around for their Bomb Diggity..paired with a bottle of white wine... and again we had an awesome... the staff were attentive..will definitely go back!😉

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: Dinner for four. Went there on a weeknight. Service was great. Ms LX was very attentive to all our needs. Service was prompt. Food was great, seafood was fresh and we had seconds. Skip the starters, go for the main courses and deserts! U won’t regre

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: Well, this was my 2nd time to Boiler and the experience was great...service was even better than the previous round. The seafood is fresh and ambience is great...abit pricey but overall worth it!

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: Our favourite restaurant by far. Brilliant food, good service. Important to book a table. Even in the week it gets surprisingly busy. But the wait will be worth it! We love getting the Bomb Diggity Bag and get stuck in. Love it.

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: Second time patronising Boiler which never fails to satisfy our cravings for seafood!! Free Lobster too for Birthday month and was  simply delicious. Staffs are friendly and helpful. Will recommend this restaurant to my friends.

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: Although disappointed by one of the staff as she didn't provided the correct information to us, but the overall experience at the restaurant is quite good.

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: Waiters forgot that we’re here because of the promotion item and charging us with actual amount. However, after clarification, we got our discounted price.

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: The lunch was good, very fresh, large prawns and good sizes crab. Servings was generous. Boiler is also generous in offering a Boston lobster free if it’s you birthday. It’s value for money. Service staff awere courteous and attentive.

Name: The Boiler (Howard Road)
Location: 18 Howard Road Novelty Bizcentre #01-06, Singapore 369585 Singapore
Review: The food here is great. There’s basically one thing to get here. And that’s the seafood bag. It’s their speciality and if you’re getting something else you’re doing it wrong. The sriracha chili fries were also great. We will go back. I wish we had been in a larger group and could have gotten the “bombdiggity bag” instea

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: Nice food , fresh sashimi and delicious Maki! It is worth of the $! Will definitely come back for another visit !

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review:
Excellent food. Always like it here :)
Keep up the great service and quality of food. 
I'm a repeat customer.

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: Food were decent and some hot stir fry surprised us with exceptionally nice flavour and texture! However service is not prompt and I would say bad.

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: The waiters and waitresses are extremely polite. We tried out the ala carte buffet and the service was fast and we got to enjoy our food almost as soon as we ordered it. Great food and fresh sashimi. It was such a nice experience that we immediately made another reservation.

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: probably one of the best japanese buffet restaurant you can get in singapore. food came really quickly right after ordering, waitress refill our drinks constantly, empty plates were cleared away really quickly as well & the view is extra amazing for dinner. lunch and dinner cost the same. you can pick between cold and hot green tea for drinks. for everything they offer on the menu the price is absolutely reasonable! will visit as often as possible.

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: It’s ala carte buffet. Great ambience and friendly staff. Spoiled by choices. Freshly cut sushi!! Worth the price. Totally recommended!!!

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review:
food as usual ..good ,fresh n premium .
customer service is prompt , efficient n friendly.
excellent window view.
must try to kw the excellent ratings .

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: Food is great. Thick sashimi slices, fresh and juicy. Has 1 for 1 beer promo also. Superb food. They also serve a wide range of authentic jap cuisine. Can't have enough of the sashimi.

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: Good food, variety of selection, soft lighting, child-friendly, roomy, efficient service, and scenic view (window seat).

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: The atmosphere was fantastic with the portion is bite size so we can try different dishes but we spam on sashimi and they give thick and reason portion. The service no doubt is fantastic

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review:
Good sushi. Standards increased, must eat. The sashimi is good and thick, the eggs are sweet, and the beef and fried stuff are all good

Service is excellent too, but the call server button doesn't really work.

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: Food was delicious, the sashimi cuts were really thick! The service staff were very friendly and efficient despite the crowd. They were even nice enough to note down a special request for a cake with candle to celebrate my partner's birthday. Overall, highly recommended!

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: We managed to get a private bench table. The food was fresh and serving were as per the quantity ordered. The first order food quality was better compared to the second and the third, the roast meat was over cooked. But overall we had an enjoyable time with delicious food.

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: Food is great and food are served promptly unlike other japanese ala carte buffet where the food took some time to serve

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: We went there for the buffet and was elated with the freshness and timely serving of the food. Portion was just right per order so customers can really have tasting portions and order a quantity that they can really eat. Staffs were attentive and friendly.

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: Thick & fresh slices of sashimi, sushi. Grilled pork and beef slices also nice, so was the heavenly chawamushi. Can skip the roast pork belly cos it was too hard and didn't taste nice.

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: Overall good experience and although a little pricey, the sashimi was fresh. If you have a group of sashimi consumers, it's money's worth. Positive feedback from the other diners with me as well that they would go back. Service was a little slow and they sent a couple of wrong orders plus it was quite difficult to get the service staff attention to refill our green tea.

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: Good quality sashimi and sushi dishes. Service is great and food arrive very fresh and quick. It has Unagi!

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: The restaurant food portions are very generous. I would say this restaurant not only have the great quantity, it also have excellent food quality. Every bite makes me want to go for one more!

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
