Review: We had a farewell gathering lunch for our colleague. Food was excellent, service level can be improved

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: Food is not bad. Requested a quieter seat as it was a wedding anniversary celebration but did not got it. Requested for a window seat but was rejected. Ambience so-so, was crowded. Food was not bad though

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review:
All the sashimi(thick slice) and sushi is oishii.
Beef was good also.
Too bad the desert ice cream is not free.

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: Good selection and variety of food/dishes on menu, and most important of all, the elderly waitress that served us was very pleasant and friendly. She kept refilling our hot tea, cleared the empty plates promptly and made small talks to engage us. Thank you

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: Nice place but food is badly prepared. sushi rice is loose and not done properly. Sloppy presentation. First visit definitely last.

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: 2nd time visit. Nice staff with good service, wider range of food to choose, cosy environment to enjoy food. Will be there again...

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: The servers are without smiles and seem irritated when ask to refill tea. Will not visit again and food are so so only

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: Excellent food, good view with my date. We enjoyed the food and atmosphere. We had the best assorted sashimi.

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: Excellent foods and ambience! Friendly and helpful staffs. Willing to go the extra miles even though it was a busy dinner time. Highly recommended!

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: With such an attractive price for a Japanese buffet boasting an extensive menu of dishes, we were prepared for a few hits and misses. But we were surprised that every single dish we ordered was really good! Very nice sashimi, but other highlights for me included bifu yakiniku, hotate mentaiyaki, tamago, smoked duck and chilled buckwheat noodle. And the new dish, sliced grilled wagyu beef, was so good that we had a number of reorders. And the service was excellent - friendly and fast. My food came practically within 3 minutes after ordering. Amazing. We came away feeling great, which is how all good dining experiences should be. My family is looking forward to our next visit to Mitsuba again!

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review:
Fresh and Chunky Sashimi, good variety of menu.
90 mins dining is suffice. Worth and value for money.

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: Had the buffet lunch for 4 pax. With the "1 dines free for 3 paying" promo, the bill came up to about $1

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: The sashimi are fresh, a lot of varieties. Good food and good ambience.  Will definitely dine there again.

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: Went with 3 other adults, and 4th person eats free. good deal esp. with quality of sashimi. service staff were also very attentive. overall extremely pleasant experience. I would recommend window seat by the river :)

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: Buffet spread was nice and sashimi are thick and fresh. Nice atmosphere and service was prompt. Would wish that fruits are included in the buffet. Would certainty visit again soon.

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: Apart from the sashimi, the rest are average or even not to standards. Chawanmushi and unagi is okay. Grilled dishes are on the saltier side and drier side, yakitori was too burnt to eat. Fried items are just okay. Rice and noodle dishes are also very average and not worth calories. Buffet did not include desert. Will specially commend the service of this staff (elderly auntie with short hair).

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review:
The food served is fresh and nice especially the salmon!
And the staff here are friendly and giving excellent service!

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: Very friendly and helpful hospitality services, refill of drinks never been delay ...foods are taste well and sashimi were fresh , great environment to chill out  ... Hope the standard will keep maintain and certainly to pay a next visit 🙂

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: Best food, service and atmosphere. Even with the social distancing and all, we still enjoy the food. Keep it up Mitsuba!

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: Suggest Mitsuba may add a variety of food selection and may limit order for desserts, ice-cream instead eaters need to pay for it.

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: Highly recommend this place for their great service! With the ipads found on every table, one is able to order efficiently without worrying about calling servers repeatedly. (A great addition!) Sashimi and sushi is fresh and served in thick slices. However, personally, for the other options (cooked food etc) are somewhat quite lackluster. Overall, come to this place to enjoy with your friends and fami

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: This is not my first visit but it is still as good! Monday is ladies night with 15% off the Ala Carte Buffet. Sashimi is so fresh and cut is generous. Temaki comes with seriously fresh and crispy seaweed! A One-time Mentaiko Scallops on shell will be served for each patron with generous amount of mentaiko slightly torched... this is really good! And with this we ordered the mentaiko spaghetti! Perfect! Anything on the menu that you ordered is definitely worth the calories. You only live once! So enjoy good food like this from Mitsuba!

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: I was here 2-3 years ago, back then I had issue with the sashimi being not fresh. However this seemed to have changed when I brought my folks along for the recent visit. My only complaint is the soy sauce used with the wasabi is sweet... instead of sal

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: The cooked food were relatively fast, slow for sashimis. Best to order a few sashimis at one go. For the price, service and atmosphere,  it was a good experience overall. The network signal was weak.

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: I have been to Mitusba few times, The recent visit, I find that their standard of food have dropped.

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: fresh and good quality sashimi and generous servings too! The century egg tofu is a must try!  Window seats recommended to have a good view of fort canning  and Clarke quay

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review:
There is a long Q but staff was polite and ensure orderly entry to restaurant.
Restaurant was full but staff kept their cool and is excellent in rendering their services.
All food was delivered and not a single missing item.

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: Food and ambience were ok, can get crowded during lunch hour, service can be improved with more smiles.

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: Food was tasty especially the sashimi. The rest went downhill. iPad system was broken. Food was not served promptly. Waited 15 minutes for a sashimi set. 30 minutes for cali maki. When asked why did it take so long, they said the kitchen needed time to prepare (lol. there was only one other table that was occupied). Manager was rude and snarky. Staff was clueless. Avoid at all cost.

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: Not the first time there. Not sure if they changed the ordering system but food quantity was disappointing (for example if you ordered one portion of saba shio, it arrive in one piece. If you ordered three, three arrive. This is similar for most food on the menu). Food quality not bad, some can be improved (chanwamusi was quite bland, ramen basically was served in a very light soup base, chicken wings quite salty) but sashimi was good. Considering we reached at 7pm on a wednesday evening with only 4 other tables occupied, food delivery was way too long. Will consider going other place to try new experience

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: Mitsuba is a great place to dine with family and friends. The sashimi are fresh and the service are excellent.

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: Will definitely be my first visit my last! Nice entrance but was led to the back of the restaurant and decor looks cheap and smell so bad. Food quality was one of the lousiest I hv tried! Plates are mostly chipped and food was 3/10. jap food in foodcourts serve better quality! Planned it for bf’s birthday and It was such a disappointment! Worst dining experience eve

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: Cosy restaurant tucked on level 3 of Central mall. The alarcarte buffet was worth it as we had loads of sashimi which took awhile as they had to slice the fish but the wait is worth it as the fish served was good and fresh! Portion size could be improved to be honest as they are tiny so we ended up ordering multiple time

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: We had the 4 pax for the price of 3 so that's quite good value for money. Spread is one of the best and sashimi is thick! Overall a wonderful experience.

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: We have enjoyed the New Year Lunch. There is no price increase even it is the new year day. We still get the 25% discount.

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: The sashimi was good & service staff were

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: We had buffet while dining here. Food was great and sashimi was fresh. Love how small the portion was so that we can try most of the variety esp carbs all came in 1 small serving so that you don’t feel full that fast and easily. Worth the value while dining here. About $49.30/pax which is the same price or even cheaper as compared to other jap restaurants.

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: The buffet menu seems acceptable n majority is nice , however I’m wondering what is buffet n Is not include dessert?? The price not cheap but still acceptable though can’t the restaurant include the dessert ?? How much would it cost for ice cream ??

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: unimpressthe food was so-so..  should be more fresh n vibrant.  overall it was not a good value for money. only the view was nice ...

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: Environment was ok.. service by staff was bad. Not attentive. Never smile.. food taste barely even meet the normal standard. I think sushi express is better than them.. not worth the price. There are better ala carte buffet prices w better quality of service and food

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: Sashimi is too thick and it gets too gelat after a few pieces. I know mitsuba prides itself with thick sashimi but this is really exaggerated. My family and I went a couple of times and it seems that the sashimi are getting thicker and thicker. Other food is good though.

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: Everything is ok except the rice this time round was very mushy and I suspect that the rice might have been kept too long.

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: The window is dirty, compromising the view of the restaurant + the sashimi is too thick, making it hard to chew. On the plus side, service is prompt if you arrive early around 6pm to 7pm and the food is definitely value for the money spent.

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review:
they served cooked dishes first, which is not really ideal in a japanese restaurant.

we wanted our sashimi fix before all the grilled delights.

nonetheless it was a great experience.

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: The food is nice, service is prompt and efficient. The ambiance is cosy, nice and quiet enough for small talks over the dishes. There is a wide selection of dishes to choose from. Overall, the experience and food are good enough for a second visit.

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: Thsi was my 1st time eating at Mitsuba and it lived up to the good reviews that I read online. My only grouse was that I always find it hard 2 navigate my way around Central@CQ, the layout of their shops is v confusing -- at least to me.

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: we thoroughly enjoyed the meal, fresh sashimi, tasty dishes. however, quite inflexible that guests taking non buffet meal can’t sit with those who are taking buffet.

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: My first visit to Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant. Initially we were grumbling the portion served was too small but what they did was right. There were too much variety of food to choose from & we enjoyed greatly. The garlic rice, unagi and unlimited flow of sashimi was awesome. Service by the servers was fast and always with smiley face. Had booked another 2 visits to Mitsuba in Oct. Can’t wait to visit Mitsuba again.

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: Compare to my last two visit, the varieties of the menu is lesser this time, overall quite good but price slight expensive due to lesser choices.

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: The food at Mitsuba are all excellent.  The sashimi are thickly cut and very fresh.  Service staff were very attentitve.

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: Staff service was okay and the food was small in portion. Had to order a few times if you have a big appetite. Would recommend the restaurant to only have 3 time slots for reservations for weekdays and weekends since there is limited time to eat the food and they were inflexible in extending the time if you are late.

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review:
Have been to Mitsuba for the fourth time and I am Glad that they have maintain their service and food standard.
Sashimi slices are thickly cut and freshness is good.
Will return again.

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: After seeing many good Google reviews, decided to visit this restaurant. Only the baked scallop and sashimi are good. The rest of the food tasted average. Food is overrated by local guides under Google. Given the price, it should be more well spent on ala carte food at other authentic Japanese restaurant.

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: Compared to similarly priced Japanese buffet, the following differences were not

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: Our family visited the restaurant on a Sunday after a Facebook recommendation. The variety is not as much as the 150 type of Japanese dish choices that Facebook review claimed. Service is extremely good, one bell press and the staff appears within 10 secs! Perhaps we are the only few customers on that Sunday night. The staffs are all very friendly too. By the way, we are only allowed 2 hours 6pm to 8pm to have our dinn

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: went to Mitsuba for a Japanese food cravings and this restaurant did not fail us. Went for the Ala-carte buffet. The selection was wide. the food quality is good. You will find every usual Japanese cuisine items here plus their Chef’s version of their own recommendation. Overall, it is a very pleasant dining experience. Ambiance is also good. we got a table overlooking Clarke Quay. Highly recommended.

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review:
The staff are attentive and they even call the day before to confirm the reservation and accommodating my request.
The sashimi is fresh and the food is of decent portion.
The pricing is reasonable for for a nice Japanese restaurant.

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: More varieties of food would improve the quality of the buffet. Would like to include some deserts in the buffet list.

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: Great food, ala carte buffet style. Good view outside of Singapore river. Come 4 pay 3, worth it. 25% discount, reasonably priced.

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: Very poor quality sushi. I understand that being a buffet rst i wont expect their raw fish to be of the standard of top sushi rsts. But we were served Tai that was tasteless and we have to tell them to bring it back and not served other custs anymore. I will not come back again

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review:
Mitsuba has gained popularity with locals for their great value ala-carte buffet.
As we were not big eaters, we just opted for their ala carte menu.
Overall, it was a good dining experience.

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: I love the ambience especially sitting beside the window, awesome view. Pricing are reasonable. Good food!

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: This is my 2nd visit to the restaurant. Made a comeback bcos the 1st visit was good. It’s turns out that this 2nd visit was disappointing. The raw swordfish is not fresh and has a smell, the raw salmon has a weird colour but still edible. As for cook food, it is below expectation. Service wise was not pleasant too. As we went for buffet and as more and more food is being served, the waitress keep pushing food on the table without clearing the empty plates first and instead they expect you to make space for them to place the cook food on the table. As for tea refilling, need to call the waitress and then it will be refilled. This will be my last visit to the restaurant.

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: Atmosphere is great and the food is always fresh and refreshing. Will definitely come again. Recommended if you like fresh sashimi :) cheers!

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: Service quite good and waiting time for the foods quite fast.. all come in small portion. The foods choices still on but if got more additional choice will be good

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: This is the worst service that I encountered after visiting this restaurant for 5 tim

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: Salmon sashimi was really delicious. Pretty good variety of sushi and other side dishes. Good value for money!

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: Really only decided to give the store a try because of the media ravings and beautifully plated food, despite it being a buffet. But in all honesty, i wouldn’t pay such a price again for the quality of food served. Ambience really went below expectations. Have been to better places, albeit pricier. Also, do note they have strict reservation and seating timings. Not too friendly for those who want to enjoy a long and slow meal.

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: The sushi are of petty size except for salmon. Grilled Shishamo was served warm and not grilled well.

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: Tried out the Ala Carte buffet. Some hits & miss

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: All the sushimi not bad, portion just nice can order many times. Quite money worth. Will revisit again

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review:
$41++ for all you can eat Japanese buffet is really worth it.

You can order whatever you want from the menu and it reaches your table fast.

The staffs are quite friendly and will constantly help to refill your drink.

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: Fresh sashimi, nice prawn tempura also good quality. service was excellent, nice sitting at sushi bar, all was excellent I wanna be back one day !

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: Food is just average. Service is good. Not too sure why the area that I am seated is so badly lited, very gloomy atmosphere that affect the mood for us celebrating father day.

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: Service was very poor. We were sitting across the Sushi Bar and yet we had much difficulty in getting the staff’s attentio

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: food quality was good for the price, portions are small so we could order more for the buffet. overall, good deal! quite abit of variety too

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: Have been there many times. The standard is still good! The sashimi is very fresh. I love the prawns tempura! They are having 1 for 1 beer promotion now.

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: It was my 2nd time there and I would say that their service had been superb and food was just really good!!! It would be even better if there were more varieties in their don. Overall a very pleasant experience!

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: Staff is very friendly and attentive and nice atmosphere should have more promotions to get in more customers.

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: Enough food varieties to choose from. Waiters were quick to serve and friendly. Nice dining environment. Overall experience is good.

Name: Mitsuba Japanese Restaurant
Location: 6 Eu Tong Sen Street The Central #03-88 Clarke Quay Central, Singapore 059817 Singapore
Review: Love the atmosphere there. Nice Food and is served very fast. Have gone back to this restaurant a few time.

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review:
Good food reasonable prices nice ambience 
Polite and obliging staff Cléan and virus proof with safe entry

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: This is the only restaurant that comes to my mind when I want to have something outside for my lunch or dinner. My husband and I are regular customers for their Fish Briyani for lunch and Naan(butter/plain/garlic) with Paneer butter masala and Mutton Mysore for dinner, which I would recommend trying at least on

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: Price is affordable. Friendly staff. Nice enviroment. Located 15 mins walk from Tekka MRT Exit E. Suggest order "small" to share as portion is good for 3-5 people and you can order more dishes. A wide selection and choices for your taste bud.

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: I write to convey my experience and unhappiness for my deliveroo order made on Saturday, 17th October for dinner about 7pm. I had just been discharged from hospital and we had decided to order in Gayatri's since I wasn't feeling too good to visit the outlet. Therefore ,my family and I, 4 of us had ordered to have a feast at home instead. Although there are tonnes of options for South Indian cuisine listed everywhere on Deliveroo,Food Fanda and Grab Food, with relatively affordable pricing, we still stuck with our decision to order from you'll as its one of our fav restaurants to frequent. But the experience we encountered via our delivery definately made us reconsider this decision. Firstly, we ordered all the dishes we liked but couldn't find White/Basmati Rice. I scrolled top and bottom but only could find Rice Set that comes with 2 vegetables. But that wasn't what we wanted. As an Indian Restaurant, and rice being a staple, we were puzzled on how there would be no rice in the menu. Nevertheless, still being keen to place the order we called your race course outlet directly informing of this dilemma. A lady had answered (I don't have her name as she was adamant on not providing it) and told me should we like to place an order for rice, we could choose the option for Papadam instead and they will replace it accordingly. So anyone in the right state of mind would assume, should I want 4 packets of rice I should choose 4 packets papadam and they would edit the order accordingly as spoken. And that's exactly what we did, placed an order for 3 packets of papadam at $1.95 each and called the lady to alert her of this special arrangement. We even mentioned please give us 1 papadam and 2 rice as the amendment for 3 packets papadam as previously discussed. This was confirmed and we prepared to enjoy our dinner to celebrate my disharge. Although it was a true hassle firstly to get the rice sorted, we didn't want it to get to us so we can get the food we like. Annnd the food arrives, with an overload of papadam and 1 packet of rice. Here we are hungry and excited to eat but there's only 1 packet of rice for 4 people. A little ridiculous considering all the effort put in to explain the order to the rude lady whom answered. I therefore call and try to find out why there is only one rice and the same lady says she could only give us 1 packet rice because it is $4.50 for each packet and our previous discussion with her to amend our 3x papadam couldn't cut it because $1.95x3=$5.85 would only entitle us one rice and papadam.Seriously?! we had ordered a variety of dishes amounting to about $60 and you could have added a packet of rice out of goodwill or even explained this to us when we called for the amendments. How were we to know the rice charges if it weren't even in the menu?When we called to ask the lady rudely passed the phone to a man I assume is the manager called Maniam whom also wasn't sorry at all about what had happened. He kept insisting we can only give what was paid for but how are we to pay for something that is not even on the menu or we know the price for?If we can order all the variety dishes, you think we can't order another packet of rice? Already I was not feeling too well and all we wanted was a good family dinner but no, it was ruined. We didn't have rice or even the fish gravy we requested for. We put in a special comment to request for fish gravy because we do not want the fish curry with fish since we already had fish varuval and fish cultlet, just the gravy would have been all we needed.But no, Maniam said tit needed to be ordered they don't even give complimentary fish gravy.How do I order if it doesnt exist in your menu?And considering we've been there to eat umpteen times I'm honestly appalled by this. I mean if i did a small order and you couldn't give me some gravy I may understand, but I did quite a substantial order but you can't provide some gravy?And to make it worse, we even heard the manager Maniam telling the lady on the phone, why didn't you just tell them we ran out of gravy thinking we couldn't hear and understand. It was so disappointing, and honestly a huge dampening of spirits for the family dinner we had looked forward to. I mean we had only asked for amendments for items not found in your menu and unimaginably rice not found for an Indian restaurant is absurd!And having to charge for a little gravy (non-existent in the menu as well) for a substatial order is penny wise, pound foolish. It has been time consuming to type this out to you but I would like to convey the bad and unexceptional service provided. As you are aware there are several restaurants available in the stretch of Race Course, please do not be over confident and lose long term customers for foolish reasonings. Keen to hear your reasoning.

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: Came for a dinner with family. Food was great as usual, and was fresh and hot. Good customer service and nice ambience. Will definitely visit again. Thanks.

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: Great food & great ambience. Good service by staffs who are very attentive. Taste of food is above average.

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: Wandered past this place looking for the Mustafa Centre shopping mall and went back because it looked good, the food easily surpasses the look of the place. Tried a mutton dosa, a butter naan, butter chicken, pepper prawns and mutton mysore as a sharing platter between two. Each dish was better than the last but hard to pick the nicest, for me it was the mysore, for my companion it was the butter chicken but no morsel of anything was left uneaten. The staff were pro-active and helpful, altogether a superb experience and we will definitely go back for more. Great place, fantastic food.

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: Terrible experience, I reserved a table and instead of being led to a table with reserved tag (several reserved tables empty as it was early at mins past 7pm), was showed to table near the entrance. Told the staff I had a reservation but he insisted I take the table near the entrance and he simply walked away, so I was left to decide to take that or leave as the restaurant was fully booked for the evening.

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: Excellent service along with equally excellent food. We were there with the lunch crowd, and most appeared to be local office workers. That’s a good sign, in our view.

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: gayathri restaurant is one of my favourite indian restaurants. i love the good service and food served. would definitely come back here whenever i’m craving for indian food

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: food was really nice and service was excellent ! the food was also served very fast and i’m impressed :)

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: We ate briyani, the mutton dum briyani was very tasty. Good ambience. Good service. Will recommend Gayathri Restaurant.

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: Food quality was food , but service was bit dealy due New Year and salt was less on few items...over all good experience...

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: Great food. Will come again :) have the mutton Dum Biriyani. You get free ice cream with gulab jamun . Enquire within

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review:
Great food. Great locations
Came here with a family
Of 7 and the service was good would recommend to to friends s

Name: Gayatri Restaurant

Review: The food was extraordinary....especially the mutton biryani combo.. which has unlimited rice! The menu is well designed and managed

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: Awesome food and very good service. Had Butter naan, mysore mutton, Chicken biriyani, Squid sambal. Staff are good.

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: We had a nice dinner at this restaurant, food was good and tasty, served quickly. We stayed on the outside terrace, inside a/c is very high. The server was very kind and smiling.  Recommended

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: Prawn curry was awesome...biryani raita also nice. Staff sonia is really excellnt server. Nice south indian restaurent. You will get spicy food

Name: Gayatri Restaurant

Review: Good restaurant to eat! Very friendly service staff and I had a good time with my spouse! Will definitely recommend to visitors

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: Great price great service great food great people great great great Amazing awesome wonderful fabulous everything

Name: Gayatri Restaurant

Review:

just drop by serangoon road....saw this restaurant and the menu outside. nice food selection.

Name: Gayatri Restaurant

Review: Nice restaurant, good staff and service, good prices, eat inside or outside, very large choice and good meal quality...

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: Don biryani is the main dish that I always comes back for. Other like fish head curry, naans, butter chicken, tandoori chicken are all good. Service are good.

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: Excellent service, delicious and tasty food. Comfortable and nice environment. A good place for dinning.

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: Mysore mutton, butter chicken, pickles, naan, sweet lassi, briyani. All tastes good.. Not too crowded.

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: The food at Gayatris is delicious. Even though it lacks in spice it is quite tasty, the portions are decent, and the staff is very friendly and helpful. I would highly recommend this place.

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review:
Good Biryani for good mood.

Nice Ambience.

Menu is exclusive with lot of varities...service is awesome but can be improved more.

Name: Gayatri Restaurant

Review: Nice place to have Indian food and good for family and friends. Grate place for Non-veg, one of the best restaurant in little India place

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: Love this place. Good food and great ambience :) Came here with my family and staff were so prompt and polite.

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: Good food great service thanks. Place was clean and nice cosy environment. Fish cutlet is a must try.

Name: Gayatri Restaurant

Name: Gayatri Restaurant

Name: Gayatri Restaurant

Food to try Biryani...
Serving guys are friendly and responsive.

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: Food is nice and ambience is excellent. Great place to get together with family and friends. A good selection of wines. Bon Appetite!

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: The food is nice and the ambience is good. The mutton dum briyani is delicious. The fish cutlet is hot and spicy. It is cooked on the spot and served hot. The bru coffee is a must.

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: Great dine in restaurant and they do fantastic catering services as well. must try for Indian food in SG

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: The food is always amazing and the staff are always so pleasant and helpful:) whenever we need to get our indian food fix we always head here!

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: Food is good. Service is awesome. The food was delivered on time without delay. The crew served us well. Cheers!

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: We have lived and traveled widely in India, the food here was on par with our experience and expectations. Butter chicken was delicious. Uniquely Indian experience outside India.

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: Visited the place with family, ordered chicken dum biriyani and got a plate with one chicken, egg and very little Rice... I am seeing a biriyani portion like this first time in my life. Cleanliness was bad, and very bad service.. please never visit this place.,.

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review:
Fine dine restaurent in Singapore 
Specially dosa are good compare to any restaurants in india too...
Loved it...

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: The Fish Briyani here is a must try!!Generous servibgs.Will be back for more. Highly recommended for any taste buds.

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: Staff recommendations on madras chicken and mutton mysore were spot on!! Definitely worth a trip back!!

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: Nice authentic North Indian food with nice decor and friendly service. In the heart of little india, great for a stroll around the area after.

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: I am extremely pleased with the service of Gayathri’s restaurant and the food here is amazing. I really would like to come back here and enjoy the variety of food which is still needed to be tasted.

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review:
Very good taste and free space for family get together. Friendly people 
I like the restaurant and want to come again

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: Best Indian food in town!Food tastes authentic and home-cooked. And the ambience is fantastic too! 😊

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: Love the food here, especially the naan. Location is okay, price is super affordable and restaurant is well air conditioned. Thumbs up!

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: This is my second visit here and so far, I've not been disappointed! On my prev visit here I tried the naan and briyani along with dishes like butter chicken, aloo gobi and gobi manchuria

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: Had a wonderful time eating here. Friendly service and yum food! Mango lasso is thick and full of flavour.

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: Food was yummy and service was very good! Great place to bring your family and friends. Good music's playlist.

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: This has been my favourite restaurant for many years I love the all the food varieties here definitely when u come to singapore come here to eat

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: Curry fish head portion is big! You get a whole fish head for just $27. Fish cutlet is crispy and yummy too.  Service is good and food is promptly served too.

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: Food was yummy and service was very good! Warm people (: Its an easily accessible location and its a must go if in tekka area!

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: Very delicious foods and peaceful environment with musics. Staffs are friendly. Nearer to farrer mrt station. Had good meal with elderly parents and kids.

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: Great food taste and huge variety. Love the ambience. Staff are friendly and serve you well. Overall a great experience!

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: The service was prompt, and the wait staff and server was courteous and friendly. THE food was excellent, in particular the butter chicken and briyani rice. The chicken was tender and the rice was flavourful on its own without any accompaniments. Highly recommend!

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review:
Service was excellent - Staff members are very friendly
Food was fresh and tasty! Try their Chicken 65! Fried upon order and is extremely yummy!

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: Awesome food and great hospitality. Vegeterians can always count on this restaurante.The service is extraordinary and people are served wholeheartadly.The quality of food for both nonveg and veg is just delicious.This place is worth a visit.Varieties of Indian food availble. Ambience is well maintained and you always feel at home.

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: Really good ghee dosa, good food in general, and great interiors! The service is good and prompt as well.

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: Really loved their chicken tikka, butter chicken masala, the butter naan, and the sweet lassi!! Will definitely come back!

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: The poori was very oily and thin; the appum was flavourless and the coconut milk was bland; the chicken tikka was full of spicy masala and lacking in taste, the biryani was average and the accompanying curry was full of pepper and lacking in taste. Very poor quality food overall which is very disappointing given the high prices. We ordered the tea which never appeared. Staff was at a minimum and seen to take an order but then never execute on it. Generally, not a good dining experience. Disappointing.

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: This is my first time at Gayatri, recommended by my colleagues. Totally enjoyed our time here. We ordered fish head curry, gobi manchurian, fried bindi, fish cutlets and briyani set. The service was good and the food was excellent. I'll be sure to bring my friends and family here for makan.

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: Took some family who is visiting to Gayatri for Indian food and we were not disappointed! The service was friendly and prompt ! The food came out very quickly as it was all already pre prepared but the garlic naan was made to orde

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: Nice food, but the briyani rice is dry. The staffs are pleasant. The tea tastes good. Papadam wasn’t fried well.

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review:
A good restaurant with good ambience
The waiters are very friendly providing a good service. Tasty and delicious food. Worth visiting again.

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review:
Really good food in a nice (also Aircon’d) restaurant. Atmosphere nice with lots of local Indians eating here, which is a signpost the food is good.

Service could be improved, but overall would recommend to those looking to taste India away from India.

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: The food tastes very good and I had the opportunity to try something different from the Indian food I am used to. The service is quite quick and simple; the dishes are really good and the prices are chea

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: Great food with great hospitality. Enjoyed the briyani with garlic fish, chilli chicken, and metti prawn. Nice place to dine in 👍

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: Nice food. Good ambience. Will come again for family gathering. The fish briyani and mutton briyani is good.

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: Have been visiting Gayatri at Race course road for awhile. Serve authentic and fresh Indian cuisines and waiters are all approachable and friendly. Worth Visiting for tourist who is coming to Singapore

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: Food was good and tasty. Service was good. Would recommend to friends. The mysore mutton and egg sambal was especially good.

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: Excellent service, delicious food, beautiful ambiance. Tasty food performed beautifully on banana leaves. The fish curry was exceptional!

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: Good food, great ambience and affordable price. :) Applaudable service standard. Multiple visits is a must.

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: Superb service. National day special: Lobster Tail Briyani is value for money. Portion is huge. For 2 pax but able to eat up to 4 pax. 👍

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review:
Good food and ambiance! Lobster Bryani is nice. Bring your friends here. 

Good for family and friends. 🤘👍

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: good food and place to dine with family and friends; good deals and yummy food during this national day period 😋😋😋

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: Really great food at great prices!! Great place for families! Try the tandoori platter.... value for money and delicious!

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: What more can I say, the service was excellent and the food served promptly. The food was delicious. I am leaving Singapore tomorrow, so wont be able to return in a hurry, I would be a regular if I was a local. Well done.

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review:
Awesome mutton dum briyani. The basmati rice was so fluffy and flavourful with every bite. Raita (yogurt with onions) complemented so well with the spices of the briyani.

Highly recommend to come :) cosy atmosphere, great for families and friends!

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: Went here for lunch after a work event. Tried the naan and butter paneer masala. I love the scent of the bread. It smelled fresh from the traditional oven. The taste of butter paneer masala was divine. I enjoyed every bite.

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: Lovely food. They serve vegetarian meat dishes like mock chicken and mock mutton dishes. They also serve non vegetarian dishes. They serve liquor, moderate pricing.

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: Great Indian food but service could be a little faster. Overall a good restaurant to enjoy some good food

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: Always go here when I really feel like eating lamb briyani. Good service as well and reasonable pricing.

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: Best mysore mutton I've ever tasted! Worth a visit. Posh setting too. Servings are a bit small but it is very nice! Fish head curry was okay. They are having a promo 85 dollars for a tasting menu. Not bad.

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: I had my lunch today and not surprisingly, it was good as usual. This time I tried their Chettinad Chicken and Pepper Prawn. It was fresh and delicio

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: Amazing food, we always come back for the mutton mysore and the briyani. Love the experience and will def recommend.

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: My colleagues and I love coming here for the dum briyanis. My favourite is the mutton dum briyani. Good service and friendly staff.

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: My kids loves the appam jalla. But the chicken is quite spicy. However you can have it with tandoori chicken

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: Must try, food is good esp the butter chicken, naan & fish head curry. Excellent service and the  ambience is lovely and clean. Nice place to dine with family n friends

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: My friends and I had dinner at the race course outlet. The staff delivered good service. Also, I really loved the chicken briyani. Would definitely recommend this restaurant to others! :)

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: The food as well as the customer service is good here, the restaurant has a clean and welcoming ambience.

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: Gayatri serves one of the best Briyani rice in Singapore. Its soft and fluffy and not oi

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: Good experience and good service, reminded of home in Singapore. The place has a good mix of Cousine

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review:
always a pleasure coming to gayatri
excellent service 
have to comment Sonia for her hospitality and great service  
food served was hot and tasty .

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: The food is really amazing! Im so in love with the mutton briyani. The meat was very tender and juicy. The staff are very friendly too.

Name: Gayatri Restaurant
Location: 122 Race Course Road, #01-01, Singapore 218583 Singapore
Review: Excellent food quality and service! one of the best restaurants serving authentic indian food with delicious taste. we keep coming back.

Name: Waterfall Ristorante Italiano
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road Shangri-La Hotel Garden Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: Good food, great ambience. Thank you Paul Roy for your hospitality and good service despite us coming so late for dinner.

Name: Waterfall Ristorante Italiano
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road Shangri-La Hotel Garden Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: One of the best Italian restaurants I have tried. Paul Roy served us well, make us feel like home! My daughter is so happy!!

Name: Waterfall Ristorante Italiano
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road Shangri-La Hotel Garden Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: What a great experience, Paul was excellent with our son, really went the extra mile.  Liz, was wonderful, and Roy rounded out a thoroughly excellent lunch.  Top marks team!!!

Name: Waterfall Ristorante Italiano
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road Shangri-La Hotel Garden Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: amazing food and Paul was great! Will definitely come back again. Thanks for the great experience  :))

Name: Waterfall Ristorante Italiano
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road Shangri-La Hotel Garden Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: Paul, Liz and Dinesh were great!! Definitely coming back here again. Service excellent and food delicious - would reccomend this to a friend.

Name: Waterfall Ristorante Italiano
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road Shangri-La Hotel Garden Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: It’s our first time dining at the Waterfall and I wanted to surprise my fiancé with a nice Italian cuisine since it’s his birthday ... the staff were all very friendly especially Paul and Liz who were very attentive. Both of us had a wonderful time and were given a surprise birthday cake from Waterfall ... thanks so much for the pleasant experience and surprise!

Name: Waterfall Ristorante Italiano
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road Shangri-La Hotel Garden Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: Excellent service by the team! Dinesh, Gwen and En Wei took care of our needs and we had a delightful dinner. Wine selection was good and reasonably priced. Food serving size was good and we particularly loved the starter.

Name: Waterfall Ristorante Italiano
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road Shangri-La Hotel Garden Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: The pasta and pizza is worth a try! Esp the seafood pasta. So yummy. Paul is very attentive and customer service oriented! 5 stars for his service and 4.5 for the food!

Name: Waterfall Ristorante Italiano
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road Shangri-La Hotel Garden Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: Paul served us and he was brilliant! And the pizza was delicious. Highly recommend this restaurant. Thanks!

Name: Waterfall Ristorante Italiano
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road Shangri-La Hotel Garden Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: The seafood stew was great,most of the food served taste good too. Came with family and seated outdoor, it was breezy and we love the alfresco dining experience! Servers were great too!!

Name: Waterfall Ristorante Italiano
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road Shangri-La Hotel Garden Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: En Wei, Andrea and Dinesh were perfect host to my wife's Birthday dinn

Name: Waterfall Ristorante Italiano
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road Shangri-La Hotel Garden Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: Outstanding flavourful food with excellent ambience. Very friendly & super accommodative serving staff (Paul, Tommy, Roy & Tharu) with excellent service.

Name: Waterfall Ristorante Italiano
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road Shangri-La Hotel Garden Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: Partner called in advance to book a table. Restaurant helped with arranging side by side seats and a birthday cake for my birthday t

Name: Waterfall Ristorante Italiano
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road Shangri-La Hotel Garden Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: Thoroughly enjoyed the appetising food and excellent service! It made my experience staying at Shangri-La so much more memorable and entertaining.

Name: Waterfall Ristorante Italiano
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road Shangri-La Hotel Garden Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: there was a slight miscommunication but was solved very quickly. Food was good but appetizer’s portion was quite large. tommy was very kind and friendly and helped us packaged our unfinished dessert to bring back home

Name: Waterfall Ristorante Italiano
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road Shangri-La Hotel Garden Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: We love the food n the person who serve us. Paul is very friendly and knows the menu well.. He assist us through out with menu and even prepare something which was not in the menu. Mushroom soup and it was delicious. Thank u so much for youe service and we enjoyed it so much

Name: Waterfall Ristorante Italiano
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road Shangri-La Hotel Garden Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review:
Enjoyed dinner at this cozy restaurant. Love the burrata cheese and tiramisu. Perfect servings and dining experience. 
Staffs ( Dinesh, Liz and Gwen) were attentive and made sure we had a pleasant meal.

Name: Waterfall Ristorante Italiano
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road Shangri-La Hotel Garden Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: Staff is polite, food is decent and nice for the price. Good selection for the buffet. Paul was very helpful, and environment is very nice, doesn't feel like we were in Singapore!

Name: Waterfall Ristorante Italiano
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road Shangri-La Hotel Garden Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review:
We recommend this Italian restaurant
Special greatings to Paul for his kindness and professional service

Name: Waterfall Ristorante Italiano
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road Shangri-La Hotel Garden Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: We had a beautiful evening with excellent food and outstanding service by Roy, Tommy, Andrea and Dinesh. Will definitely come back for more!

Name: Waterfall Ristorante Italiano
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road Shangri-La Hotel Garden Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: Food was good, prompt and efficient service thanks to Paul, Aoi and Roy. Poolside table had a great ambience. Will come again!

Name: Waterfall Ristorante Italiano
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road Shangri-La Hotel Garden Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: Our waiters, Andrea, Tommy, Roy and Dinesh were really helpful and friendly throughout and made us feel very at home. Food was really good and we were stuffed! Burrata is excellent. Thank you for a great meal!

Name: Waterfall Ristorante Italiano
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road Shangri-La Hotel Garden Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: Made an unplanned visit and was surprised by the delicious authentic Italian food. We ordered the lamb ragu pasta, veal appetiser and octopus capacious and all turned out to be good. Thank you to Andrea, Dinesh and the team for the amazing evening.

Name: Waterfall Ristorante Italiano
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road Shangri-La Hotel Garden Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: The food was good, I recommend their foigrais pasta and their rucolla pizza. Great service, wonderful view. Paul Roy staff was so kind!

Name: Waterfall Ristorante Italiano
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road Shangri-La Hotel Garden Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: Amazing ambiance, food quality and staffs!!! Will definitely return for more! Highly recommended!!!!

Name: Waterfall Ristorante Italiano
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road Shangri-La Hotel Garden Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: Thank you very much Paul for the lovely dinner experience. We enjoyed ourselves and had a good evening

Name: Waterfall Ristorante Italiano
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road Shangri-La Hotel Garden Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: Extremely suitable for families with kids! Food is nice and waiter(Paul) is very tactful with kids! In my opinion, it’s the best out of the 3 restaurants in Shangri-la.

Name: Waterfall Ristorante Italiano
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road Shangri-La Hotel Garden Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: The food is good but for us it’s the service that makes this place a restaurant we return to. Paul has served us several times and is always very attentive, friendly and smiley and is also fantastic with our two kids. Paul is also very good with recommendations and introduced us to some new gin and wine

Name: Waterfall Ristorante Italiano
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road Shangri-La Hotel Garden Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: Wonderful dinner. I would like to take this opportunity to thanks Chef Leslie, Aoi, Dinesh, Lis for their professional and excellent service. Food was great and atmosphere is superb. Their personal touch and positive attitude add extra point to this review. Once again keep up the good works and keep safe during this pandemic period.

Name: Waterfall Ristorante Italiano
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road Shangri-La Hotel Garden Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: We discovered the antipasti a la carte lunch buffet (not sure why it's not advertised on the website?) but found it to be very good quality and value. We arrived late (closes 2:30pm) but our server Paul did a great job getting all our dishes out and took really good care of us. I've been really impressed overall by Shangri-La's service, amenities and food offerings. A great place especially for young family staycations!

Name: Waterfall Ristorante Italiano
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road Shangri-La Hotel Garden Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: Came by with my family for my birthday celebration and the experience was so lovely. The service staff were so patient and kind and the food was so good. Give the truffle tagliatelle and the tomahawk steak a try! We’d also like to give special thanks to Dinesh for making our dining experience so memorable (-:

Name: Waterfall Ristorante Italiano
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road Shangri-La Hotel Garden Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: came here for a birthday dinner with my family. really delicious food and customer service was great! menu was good, they had food to cater to younger children too. great atmosphere as well . Recommended :)

Name: Waterfall Ristorante Italiano
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road Shangri-La Hotel Garden Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: Family Lunch. Fusilli with truffle/foie gras beautiful, seafood spaghetti very rich, octopus carpaccio good, pizza focaccia fresh ingredients. Negroni well done. Service is above average, Lise is always nice and careful with patrons and management very attentive.

Name: Waterfall Ristorante Italiano
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road Shangri-La Hotel Garden Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: Visited Waterfall for a birthday dinner by recommendation of a friend and the experience was amazing. Andreano was fantastic and took great care of us. He also recommended a gin that I've never tried or seen before dining there. The pigskin gin was great and definitely worth a try! Panna cotta was amazing and the seafood stew was delicious. Thank you to the team for the memorable dining experience

Name: Waterfall Ristorante Italiano
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road Shangri-La Hotel Garden Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: Good food and excellent service.  Paul was a breath air in Singapore F&B scene.  Passionate about his job and ensuring that we had a wonderful time.

Name: Waterfall Ristorante Italiano
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road Shangri-La Hotel Garden Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: Excellent service from the staff! Was here for a family staycation and we were very impressed by the service and attentiveness of the staff, especially Paul Tharu! Will definitely be back!

Name: Waterfall Ristorante Italiano
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road Shangri-La Hotel Garden Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: tkq Paul for being an amazing host :) insightful recommendation of Ripasso that pairs really well with the meal. shawl was offered to my missus at a casual remark that the aircon was a bit cold. tkq and will see you back here soon!

Name: Waterfall Ristorante Italiano
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road Shangri-La Hotel Garden Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: This is one of our favourite restaurants where we can get impeccable pastas (especially handmade and homemade ones) and good cheeses. We celebrated my daughter's birthday and the staff helped to sing a birthday song for her during the surprise celebrations. Thanks Dinesh, Paul, Gwen and Kent for helping to make my daughter's birthday dinner a memorable one!

Name: Waterfall Ristorante Italiano
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road Shangri-La Hotel Garden Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: Lovely time at our special date. Would like to compliment Paul Praba who waited our table. Wonderful thing was he recommended us a red wine which was actually cheaper than what I had ordered earlier. The wine turned out to be brilliant. It’s amazing to see a staff not lured by profit but by the spirit of caring for their guests. Great food. Great ambience. Sit outside near the pool if it’s windy, the experience is awesome!!!

Name: Waterfall Ristorante Italiano
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road Shangri-La Hotel Garden Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: Fantastic food and even better service by Paul, Dinesh and Andreano! Great atmosphere as well. Bellissimo

Name: Waterfall Ristorante Italiano
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road Shangri-La Hotel Garden Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: Very good Italian food with superb servers! Paul was so sweet and attentive to our 2 young children and it was such a nice lunch by the poolside!

Name: Waterfall Ristorante Italiano
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road Shangri-La Hotel Garden Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: was served by andrea, kent, praba, dinesh and roy. The service throughout the night was excellent and so was the food : )

Name: Waterfall Ristorante Italiano
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road Shangri-La Hotel Garden Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: Was served by Andrea, Kent, Praba, Dinesh and Roy. Excellent service throughout the whole night and throughly enjoyed the food. Special mention to jodie for being so sweet and reserving the table for us! Would definitely come back again soon! Thank you waterfall :)

Name: Waterfall Ristorante Italiano
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road Shangri-La Hotel Garden Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: It was an absolute joy to dine at here. Food was amazing, service was incredible. I would like to especially commend Andrea, kent, praba, dinesh and roy for the pleasant night. Thank you guys 10/10 give this place a visit

Name: Waterfall Ristorante Italiano
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road Shangri-La Hotel Garden Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: Amazing service and ambience . The service members ; Praba,Kent, Andrea,Dinesh and Roy provided excellent service and were very swift and nice . Overall food was amazing and the ambience was great as well. A nice cozy environment for family and friends to gather and have dinner and even great for a romantic date . Definitely recommended to give it a try .

Name: Waterfall Ristorante Italiano
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road Shangri-La Hotel Garden Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: Celebrated a friend’s birthday at the waterfall and the service was top notch. Shoutout to andrea kent praba dinesh and roy for the excellent service! Food didnt disappoint too! Special mention for jodie for being a sweet staff and reserving the table for us. Will definitely come back again

Name: Waterfall Ristorante Italiano
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road Shangri-La Hotel Garden Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: Cam for a friends brithday party. Food was excellent! Highly recommend the parma ham and rocket pizza and sausage pasta! Would recommend to anyone celebrating a special occasion

Name: Waterfall Ristorante Italiano
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road Shangri-La Hotel Garden Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: The food was absolutely delightful and the staff were all super approachable and friendly! Would recommend!

Name: Waterfall Ristorante Italiano
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road Shangri-La Hotel Garden Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: The meal was lovely. Both my wife and I enjoyed the  ambience, as well as the wonderful service given by Dinesh & team. Would definitely come again to enjoy the experience, as well as to try the other dishes they have to offer.

Name: Waterfall Ristorante Italiano
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road Shangri-La Hotel Garden Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review:
Great Italian food in a relaxing setting and fantastic service. 
The Tagliatelle al tartuffo is simply amazing.

Name: Waterfall Ristorante Italiano
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road Shangri-La Hotel Garden Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: Had a lunch with my friends here on a quiet weekend. Food & Service were top notch. The antipasti lunch had a nice spread. Nice interiors and the ambience was perfect for an afternoon catching up with friends. Staff were welcoming and attentive. Thanks to Liz & Adriano! Will come back again for sure.

Name: Waterfall Ristorante Italiano
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road Shangri-La Hotel Garden Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: Had a great time with my friends for my birthday celebration. Adriano, Roy, Liz, Jodi and the rest of the staff are very hospitable and really render a great service. Thank you for a memorable birthday celebration.

Name: Waterfall Ristorante Italiano
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road Shangri-La Hotel Garden Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: The service provided by Gwen, Roy, and Chef Lesliewas excellent. The food and services that were provided by them were one of a kind and kudos to Roy and Gwen for attending to our requests . Will be back soon

Name: Waterfall Ristorante Italiano
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road Shangri-La Hotel Garden Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: Love the amazing authentic Italian pasta, and attentive staff (special mention to Tommy & Roy). The music, ambience, and cosiness of the restaurant makes the dining experience very homely, warm and private. Special shout out to the amazing service staff for going the extra mile for my wife and our friends. Thank you! :)

Name: Waterfall Ristorante Italiano
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road Shangri-La Hotel Garden Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: Nice dinner at the pool on a cooling evening. Delicious food and top service by Kent and Denish! The zuppa di pesce is a very generous serving for two. And the dessert platter for two may as well go for 2-4 pax. The complimentary birthday cake rounded up a nice evening!

Name: Waterfall Ristorante Italiano
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road Shangri-La Hotel Garden Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: Our server Aoi as always is very nice. Second time coming back here, and the food is still good, and the staff are nice. Recommended for people who likes buffet.

Name: Waterfall Ristorante Italiano
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road Shangri-La Hotel Garden Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: From the moment my partner and I set foot in the restaurant, we marvelled at the staff’s level of attention, anticipation and timing. Busy as they were, not once did anyone rush past and left us trying to catch their attention. Everyone chipped in to serve, clear the cutlery/crockery and attend to our needs, including the manag

Name: Waterfall Ristorante Italiano
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road Shangri-La Hotel Garden Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: I attended a wedding dinner here not too long ago. The food and service were good, but nothing to scream about. Recently returned for lunch, when I had the festive menu. The main pasta dish was very good, but the Caesar salad or the dishes ordered by my lunch mates were quite meh. Prices are not exorbitant, but there are LOTS of restaurants in Singapore that serve better Italian food. Convenient for guests of the Shangri-La, but definitely not a gastronomic destination.

Name: Waterfall Ristorante Italiano
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road Shangri-La Hotel Garden Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: Thank you Gwen and Kent for the attentive service throughout lunch today! My daughter thoroughly enjoyed her birthday celebration.

Name: Waterfall Ristorante Italiano
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road Shangri-La Hotel Garden Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review:
Highly recommend Simply Awesome Food and great ambience.Me and my family really enjoyed it.Was well served by the team.Thank you and big thumbs up to Mr Dinesh,Roy,Kent and Gwen for the great hospitality and awesome service.

Kind Regards,
Simranpal

Name: Waterfall Ristorante Italiano
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road Shangri-La Hotel Garden Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: One of my favourite Italian restaurants in Singapore. Excellent service and delicious food - wide range of pastas, pizzas and other mains on the menu.
