Review: Kudos to her excellent customer service during our dinner session. Appreciate her assistance for her extra mile service in assisting in the membership points even on the next day of visit! Will be back!

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: For the Peking Duck an advance order is required. Therefore we made a reservation and got a private booth. The service was great and attentive. Also the quality of the food was very high and we had quite some fun there. Clearly a thumbs up!

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: Good service. Very pricey as we ordered the lobster, caviar and Peking duck. But all tasted delicious. Will visit again.

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: Overpriced menu with bad customer service as a group. Waitresses get commission for selling certain dishes. We were served mutton stew at 68++ without informing us the price in advance. 8 chunks of meat came and it was unsightly and disgusting. We rejected another prawn dish that’s probably gonna cost us the price of gold, same waitress was disappointed and quiet. Contacted customer service for refund of dish but got a reply that basically says, if you don’t raise it at point of sale, you’re dumb?!?! I guess a public feedback serves the restaurant better. Overall a terrible experience.

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: We have been coming here for dim sum, since the closed down of the Takashimaya Imperial Treasure. Most of he servers here are very attentive, I felt especially so yesterday, with 宝凤. It felt like I was home, being "pampered" by my M

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: I have been here on many occasions. This was a Tuesday evening and it was crowded! Which means you must make a reservation, even on weekda

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: Just from the name you can tell they specialise in Peking duck. And honestly it is really a must try he

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: My friend had always raved about the Peking Duck and that I must try it myself. True enough, this evening was my first visit and I was really impressed from the presentation of slicing the duck skin to serving it to us, the skin was crispy and the meat was also tender, could felt the juiciness that dispersed on the palat

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: Very good Peking duck. The rest of the dish are all good. Price is as Michelin 2 star 😅. Service are all good too.

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: This is by far one of the best Peking duck I have had. The skin is crispy and without layers of unnecessary fat. The meat is soft and tender, goes perfectly in a pancake roll and housing sauce. Ask the restaurant to fry the remaining meat in noodles or rice to wrap up your perfect meal.

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: Our friends treat to sumptuous dinner we brought a bottle of champagne and had five dishes. The doubled boiled fish stomach soup thick and nice. Of the four of finished the the entire fat duck. Plus black pepper fried duck bone.

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: An unnecessarily pretentious restaurant, the Peking duck was easily the worst we have ever experienced. This place is pricey and in terms of value for money you come away feeling cheated. Guaranteed to give you an upset stomach, all three of us suffered after an awful dinner at this restaurant.

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: An immensely popular restaurant in Singapore for really superlative Beijing duck. We had a Saturday lunch with friends here and it did not disappoint. The lunch started with an assortment of light dim sum which were all very good across the board. A large steamed soon hock fish followed and this was superbly done as well with a hint of intriguing orange peel. Even the fish liver was offered, and this was superbly done and to die for.....meltingly smooth and rich and luxurious all at the same time, but not overtly heavy. Really perfect. What a tre

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: Super food and affordable prices. I have mostly been to either Crystald Jade or Banana Leaf restaurants in Singapore. This was my first time recommended by a friend to the Imperial Treasure Restaurant. I recommend you try it!

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: The service was excellent as well as the food.. order the Peking duck! It’s a must! We were also lucky that they had the Chinese New Year Menu

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: Unfortunately my hope of enjoying the best Peking duck in Singapore was disappointed by this experien

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: Had dim sum at Imperial Treasure on 24 Nov, the dim sum quality is really good as compared to other restaurants.  Loved the Peking duck, the skin is really crispy and the meat is yummy.

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: The Beijing Duck was delicious. Succulent meat, crispy skin. Cooked to perfection and presented well! The fried gindara or cod with light soy was equally good. The Toh Miao fried with garlic was perfect. The clear tonic soup was also good. Overall cooking and service was great. Price on the high end! Environment is great, many rooms to entertain guest but with reservations one should get one!

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: Whenever we go to Singapore we always go to this place. Once you tried their Duck, you won’t like the others anymore. This is also the favorite of my daughter and my son, not too much fat on the skin and the taste is something else! They also serve crab claw noodles and chicken with bitter vegetable and its also a “must order!”. However, food are a bit pricey.

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: Steam boat / hot pot restaurant very traditional and very good if you like Chinese or are Chinese cons

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: The Restaurant is quite large. They serve great Chinese food. However they had very slow service but it was made up by good food.l

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: Awesome DUCK ! Must Try here the best duck in town and second helping of the duck make it crispy noodles.  That’s my delicious meal of the day !

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: This place serves the best peking duck. The crepe they serve it with is the right density, not too thick. The skin is super crispy and so delicious. The duck fried rice was just as delicious. Definitely worth going back

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: Can't count the number of times I've been here and the duck has always remained consistent. The best peking duck in the world, it is simply unmatch

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: Superb food! The duck was simply delicious. Loved every morsel of what we had. The service could be better.

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: after waiting for an hour for the pre-ordered Peking duck , we finally got it ... and were offered desserts, which we did not or would not have ordered ... well, unfortunately not the experience we expected and on several times asking the question what had gone wrong not being given a proper answer ...

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: The food we ordered were really good with the Peking duck and the shrimp with truffles egg white the two highlight. What kept the restaurant from a perfect score though is the pace of service which was a little slow and that some dishes were too salty.

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: Hosted a dear friend from HK to dinner. Have not been here for a while but i recall the last time the food and ambience was really go

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: We were able to be seated without a reservation which was appreciated. Food is excellent, particularly the duck and the broccoli mushroom dish. Service was prompt. Busy restaurant so a bit of pressure to know what you want from a vast menu. Limited cocktail offering and a bit of a language barrier to discuss options. Overall worth the visit.

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review:
The food is good despite it is very expensive. The service is very poor and the waitress are rude and barely speaking English. 
Overall I’d not recommend.

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: I am glad that I had booked this restaurant for our family's 20 years anniversary back in Singapore. The dishes and service were great - and of course the Peking Duck was right on the spot. But for a Chinese restaurant, I thought the lighting was a bit dark and could have been brighter to see all the great dishes. This is not a cheapo restaurant that you can come weekly (at least not me) and I saw most the people around us were there to celebrate some kind of special occasion. I would like to come back for another special occasion.

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: This place is expensive. Why do we need to pay a service charge for no service. The duck is so expensive. Sweet and sour fish, medium serve, 42 dollars. This was far from medium size. What a price for a bill, with no alcohol.

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: Heard many good reviews of this restaurant and decided to give it a try during mother and sis' birthday lunch on 10 Aug. At point of booking, restaurant was able to arrange for complimentary lotus buns for the birthday ga

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: Do not miss out, this place is amazing. Incredible service, the best Peking Duck I've ever had. I mean it, this place is absolutely by far the best restaurant in Singapore.

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review:
Excellent service once again 
Duck is still my favourite,followed closely by the prawns 
Relaxed armosphere 
Good ambiance

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: During a 5 day visit we ate here twice. This is a very busy restaurant and deservedly so - all of the food is excellent. The duck was spectacular and carved tableside. The dim sum is excellent with stunning flavor. The cubed pepper beef is wonderful, soft as a pillow, perfectly medium rare inside, and bursting with flavor. Can't wait to go back as duck anywhere else will just pale in comparison.

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: I dare say this is the best Peking duck one can eat in Singapore. Crispy skin, not too fatty, carved and served with the juicy and tender meat, yums! You can dip into a bit of sugar and their house sweet sauce to enhance the flavor, but I find it delicious even on its own. By the way, they only serve the Peking duck whole!Equally delicious is their roast duck, which you can order in half or quarter. Try their roast chicken too, if it’s not sold out alrea

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: We’ve been going here since it first opened. It’s even better than the other ImpTreas Super Peking Duck outlets. Other roasted meat dishes (especially pork and char siew) are also delish. Our fav second dish for the Peking duck is just deep fried meat on bones with garlic - so yummy lah. Staff turnover is low; after you have gone there a while, they even remember you by name (without mistreating new customers, which is great)!

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: Went there with a group of 10 people. We had duck and dim sum and other main dishes. The Peking duck is by far the best in Singapore, everything else was authentic and delicious (try the salted egg squid). Service was fast, but could be more attentive (but pretty standard across Chinese restaurants). Definitely a don’t miss if you are a fan of Peking duck.

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: We were a family of 10 and dined during dinner, celebrating a birthday. Place looks pretty good but for some unknown reason they dimmed the lights in the main dining room halfway through the meal. Staff members who took our orders were impatient and unhelpful. They rattled on with the options without any pauses or checks to see if we understood what they were saying. When we asked for opinions on portion size for our party (eg. if we should order M or L portions, or if they reckon we’ve ordered too much etc.), the lady gave me an answer to which she might as well have shut up. She answered “it depends (on each individual)”. I have never been to a Chinese restaurant and be spoken to like this. Most restaurants would give suggestion and inform you that you may order more later if you deem the food are insufficient for your party. More over her eyes were roaming, she was unfocused, and didn’t offer to give any suggestions whatsoever (I’d appreciate even if she was upselling). Food was not special, pretty average. Could easily get the same quality at any other Chinese restaurant. We asked for chillies and soya sauce and the China Chinese lady asked for exactly how many portions we require, and gave us measly portions. When we needed more (this is Singapore, everything we eat goes with chilli), she pointed out there are some left on our lazy Susan. WHAT!?? Would I not know how much chilli I need or are the chilli from your personal stash that’s why you’re reluctant to give me more!?!! Did I mention they forgot to key in one of the dishes into the system so we waited and waited but it never came. When we asked, she said she forgot to key in and DID NOT EVEN APOLOGISE. End of meal, we got them to serve our cake. They cut it ruining every piece served. I should have taken some photos. Every time we tried to get some service, we were ignored. Being busy doesn’t mean you can ignore your guests. An acknowledgment and informing me to wait a moment would be much appreciated. Didn’t happen. But we noticed the table beside us had a dedicated server throughout their dinner as though someone was on standby for them throughout. Maybe it was a regular customer but aren’t we all paying the same price and we could have become a regular customer as well, no? Anyhow, you lost my vote. Whole experience was ruined by the crap service, seeing how we were excited to try this place. Never coming back here. And urge all not to.

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: Our family dinner with Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck was terrible. Staff was unprofessional as they give you the impatient loo

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: The Peking Duck is fantastic. Served (fast) to the table and professional cut at the table. Great taste, really perfe

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: When I was first introduced to this joint 2 years ago, I was amazed by the quality, fragrance and freshness of its Peking Roast Duck. Fast forward to the present: I finally managed to get a reservation (it’s a must to enjoy the duck, mind you), came here with great expectations and an empty stomach, only to depart somewhat disappointed. The duck was still good, but it no longer stood out from the other duck dishes in this region, where good roast duck is hard to come by. On top of that, we had to wait for ages for other food that we ordered to come, by a good 45 minutes after the duck was served! Whilst the attendants were super polite and professional, I would no longer consider this to be a must visit when in Singapore.

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: Peking duck is one of the dishes which present a range of execution levels. The expert chefs can slice the crispy duck skin off so finely and the rest of the meat is also sliced very evenly and beautifully. At less accomplished establishments, you sometimes find the duck meat in all shapes and sizes and, God forbid, sometimes even with pieces of bone still on th

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: Usually I love imperial and the staff impeccable service. The ones at Marina Bay sand, paragon and ion is fantastic and luxurious. Steamboat outlets is good too with its freshnes

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: All the dishes were exquisite. Fine dining Chinese cuisine at its best. The Peking Duck was crispy on the outer skin with the most succulent of meat. The rest of the Duck was used for friend flat noodles which were super delicious. The other dishes of pork and chicken were no less in style taste and standards befitting of this Michelin star restaurant. The name of the restaurant befits the specialty dish. The Duck was indeed an imperial treasure.

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: Delicious roast duck, pork belly, and pig trotter. We had those duck and pork with Hongkong veggie called “kaylan”. We also had the rice dumpling just because of our curiosity. Delicious. Good service too.  $$$

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: We had dinner here and this restaurant seemed to be very popular.  We had a cosy booth for our family of four.  We had to order the Peking duck before the meal.  I liked the cod fish and the tofu dish.

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: This is a reputable restaurant and a flagship branch of the imperial treasure group. What do you expe

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: In my opinion, the ImpTreas Peking ducks are easily the best in Singapore - so luscious! For the second course with your duck, our favs are either minced and wrapped in lettuce, or deep fried with salt and pepper. A meal at this original location at Paragon is more satisfying than the one in the CBD, not so much in terms of the food, but the service is more personable. It’s so popular that you’re unlikely to get a table unless you book in advance, by as much as ten days for weekends. And you risk having to eat out in the open lobby, or sitting in stools in front of a wall.

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: If you truly want the best Peking duck in London there is one place to go. Expensive but worthwhile. Book the duck In advance because it takes at least 24 hours to prepare properly. Other dishes all meet the best expectations for excellent Chinese cuisine. Ambience and service of the highest quality.

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: The Supertree Grove is amazing to see in daylight, but it’s truly breathtaking at night when it’s two light shows happen. The light shows occur every evening at 7:45 and 8:45 and last about 15 minutes. The shows are free all year round except around Christmas when there is a nominal charge (about US$5 per person) as there is a large holiday-themed display under the trees. The light show consists of flashing lights in the “tree tops” coordinated with Various types of music. It is quite a spectacle and well worth a visit.

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: Nice ambience and friendly staffs. Food were excellent especially their famous peking duck, Japanese wasabi prawn and panfried diced black pork from spain.

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: We had dinner with our overseas friends. The Peking duck was very goo

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: They were able to seat us as a party of 4 from a walk in, which was very helpful. They have a great menu and the food was delicious. We had peking duck pancakes and some dim sum which were perfect. To finish, I had the best hot and sour soup I've ever tasted and the bill was very reasonable. We all said we would come back to this place.....

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: Great place for Chinese food and dim sum. Good choice of top quality food,especially Peking duck, sharks fin soup and designer Dim sum dishes..

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: Excellent chinese cuisine specializing in peking duck. Unfortunately I did not tried because whole duck was too much for us. I saw it was prepared on next table, the skin was crispy and the juice was flowing when the meat was cut. It is a must for next visit. Steamed cod fish with mushroom and lily bulbs was terrific. So were the dimsums. Greenbean with crispy garlic was simple yet tasty & elegant.

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: It was just me and my wife. There was a 30 min wait for a table. We ordered Peking duck 2 ways, hot and sour soup for me and fish moe soup with abalone for my wife. Wow the soup was so tasty and the duck deliciously done. We came out as highly satisfied diners and had a great time at the restaurant. The peking duck is their house specialty and every table had one. You should not miss this restaurant when in Singapore. A must try.

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: Everyone comes here for its famed Peking Duck and it is easy to understand why! Succulent, properly served, moist, crispy skin, aromatic - AND super as it is then cooked with noodles and bean sprouts. Definitely qualifies for a Michelin rating.

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: The Peking duck is probably the best in Singapore if not in most places in Asia. The meat was succulent and was served both Beijing and Zhong Kong style. Pancakes were quite thin and enjoyable, the menu is great and service friendly and efficient

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: My family celebrated my birthday here tonigh

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: It’s pretty pricey but find it worth it. They are one of the restaurants that serve nice Peking duck. It’s not oily but juicy. Also had the frog leg in ginger and Chinese wine sauce which was also pretty good. Service was good. We actually sat at the table outside of the restaurant which I felt was good because the ventilation inside the restaurant was not that good. Will be back again.

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: Had lunch there in Jan 18 and ate best duck ever. Haven't found anything comparable since then. Both in terms of presentation and taste. Tried Peking duck in dozens of places since, both 5 star and "ordinary" but nothing compar

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: This famous restaurant lives up to its reputation. We had their legendary Peking Duck which is reputedly the best in Singapore and it was really good. The skin was crispy and the meat tender. We also had the sharks fin soup which had to be ordered in advance. This dish was delicious - the soup was made from chicken ( we were shown the thoroughly boiled chicken ) and a big piece of Yunnan Ham . We also had very nicely cooked lamb , and stir fried broccoli. The meal was very expensive but well worth the splurge

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: Don't be thrown off by its location in Paragon Mall. Imperial Treasure is a must-try if you want Peking Duck. The food and decor is fantastic. I took family here for Christmas Dinner and it was perfect!

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: I had the most delicious Peking duck at this restaurant. We were lucky, we one had to order in advanced, however they do have some of them made in advanced for tourists like us :)! The food is delicious, the service is excellent, tea selection is great, and they have a bubbly selection t

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: This restaurant never fails to deliver superb Peking duck. We love every dish we order, every time we go. Service is also consistently very good. They serve delicious dim sum for lunch as well, and not too expensive.

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: We decided to go Chinese for our Christmas Dinner and definitely a good choice to dine here. Needless to say their Super Peking Duck is definitely cooked to perfection and the reasonably big in size. The roast chicken is very good too. Have to mention the black pepper beef cubes and the szechuan mala fish head where the sauce was used to mix with noodles at the end is simply delicious! The roast pork was also yumm

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: Been here several times and of course the peking duck is the star. Pre-order if you can as they may run out during dinner. Ditto for the roast pork. The service is surprisingly good and friendly

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: We came here for dinner. The duck was tasty, as was the fried rice. Service I felt was a bit hurried but this could be the norm in Singapore. Bizarrely they kept asking us which desserts we wanted, but each time we made a selection they would come back and say the dish had run out! Still, the ambience was nice and the staff polite and friendly.

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: The freshest and juiciest duck I have ever had. You can't find duck like this anywhere else. Just by looking at it, you can tell it's top qualit

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: One of the best Chinese food places I’ve eaten. Fresh, tender and juicy roast duck and roast pork. Extremely tender black pepper beef although I prefer more pepper. Spinach tofu was tasty but a bit too much to ea

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: This is the restaurant that I visited each time I visited Singapore. The Peking Duck was still good as expected, but the services were very disappointing this time. The 2nd duck recipe was a dish full of duck bones. I was so embarrassed to check whether I ordered a wrong dish in front of my friends. Then they brought a wrong dish to my table and I was looking at it trying to recall what I ordered. They overheard my comment and took it away without apologising. I saw them taking it to another table. Then my third and fourth dish came slowly. The food was awful except the Peking duck and the staff was just too busy to take notice of my table, even asking for the bill took a while.

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: Giving friend a birthday treat. The Peking Duck still as delicious as before. Great service and good ambience. We ordered a Peking Duck, a appetizer, 3 soups, a vegetable, tofu and 2 glasses of red wine. Bill S$280. A slightly on a high side but worth it. As one of the reviews mentioned, eat the food ASAP when served. If not, will turn cold fast due to the super aircon lol!

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: Pricy but good quality and nicely cooked. Portions can be tiny so ask exactly what you get and how big e

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: A very grandeur Chinese Restaurant famed for its Peking Duck, this place really spells glamour & high class with its decor. We were seated in one of the rooms & I’d say we’re lucky as the lighting is definitely better compared to the common area. The definite must try is the Peking Duck which is juicy and fatty & we ordered the noodles with the remaining duck meat and it was so good! In fact the noodles is what I remembered most from this meal. And I would like to commend on the server who took very good care of us, and my parents are already planning what to order for our next visit. A really awesome place for a family dinner!

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: Super restaurant. Amazing peking duck! Other dishes were so tasty too. Seafood was fresh. Portions big. I didn't do the ordering or looked at the menu so can't say what the prices are like. Service is good. They have a wine list. I would definitely go back.

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: Me and my family were invited (by our friends) to this restaurant to try sea food and Beijing duck. The food, atmosphere and enviroment were excellent. We spent great time and had fantastic dinner. We strongly recommend this restaurant to everyone.

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: We had a reservation for dinner here and when we arrived, the host just ignored us. We were finally seated 20 minutes later after multiple follow ups. Our reservation was for 7 people, yet the size of the table given was more for a party of 4. We were told by multiple staff that there are no other tables available so we decided to leave and eat elsewhere. As we were walking out, there was magically a table available.

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: We visited as a large group and were seated in a private room. Service was top and the food was excellent. If you come here you have got to have the Peking duck.. possibly the best I’ve had!

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: We booked one week in advance for lunch on a Sunday. They have several seatings - so the timing is rather fixed, around 11am, 12:30pm or 2pm for late lunch. However, once you are in the restaurant, you don't feel rushed. The ambience is relaxing with muted lighting, elegant deco and quiet conversation. Lovely atypical Chinese restaura

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: Went there for lunch with extended family. Ordered a duck and some dim sum. The duck was nicely done, just as it should be for a Peking duck. The dim sum were nicely made and delicious. The staff were attentive. We spent close to SGD300 for a duck, plenty of dim sum and a fried duck vermicelle. We probably had ordered a bit too much as we had to take away some food. It was not a cheap meal but the price was reasonable for what we had and the excellent service.

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: Right next to the Crowne hotel this little gem serves the best duck, we had vegetable fried rice which has honey toasted walnuts through it,delicious twist and garlic steak, which had big slices of toasted garlic with it. After travelling this is a fabulous restaurant if your in Singapore airport.

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: Went back to Imperial Treasure after long absence and was reminded just how good their dim sum is. All items prepared with quality ingredients and cooked to perfection.

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: Had a family dinner there. The peking duck is as I remembered from previous visit. Really delicious. All the others dishes were good. Attentive staff. Will go again.

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: Best Peking duck ever! Epicly delicious. And don't forget to try the mushroom dumplings. Absolutely awesome. Awesome hospitality from Tracy Ng and Olivia (love her "Singapore New water"). Must pre-order your Peking duck. Will be back!

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: First of all we really enjoyed the tasty food in this restaurant from Peking Duck to beef to Dim Sum etc. All food was very well prepared and timely serv

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: With a six hour stopover at Singapore airport I wanted to go into town and have a Peking duck meal. Googling I thought the Imperial Palace Super Peking Duck seemed the best. Arriving there at 9PM I was told they don’t serve Pecking duck unless ordered in advance. What’s more they didn’t have any duck of any sort. How can you operate a restaurant in Singapore called duck and not have any duck!!! What a hoax - and they were even rude about it. I strongly recommend you don’t go there because you won’t enjoy the experience whether or not you know to pre-order your duck (and try finding that instruction on the website)

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: Recently my relatives and I got together for a dinner at this restaurant. It was exactly what we were looking for: a fancy and decadent eatery but also low-key with a gentle buzz for conversations. The food was excellent. The special duck with the sticky rice melted perfectly in our mouths. The servers were attentive and checked often to make sure we were happy. The complimentary desserts were lovely. I absolutely would return in the future.

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: My wife and I were treated to a visit to this great restaurant for my birthday dinner. We were 5 diners including our 5 year old granddaughter. We have visited a couple of times in the past few years during our visits to Singapo

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: Peking duck here is always great - juicy duck with a soft warm pancake. We also pre ordered the chicken with glutinous rice which took a long time to be served and when it was, the chicken was quite dry. The dish was tasty overall but the chicken could have done with less time in the ov

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: We visited this restaurant in late May, and had their signature dish “Beijing Style Roasted Duck” which is one-day advanced order is required. The duck is really “Superb.” Chef demonstrated the chopping performance at the tableside, and then the duck was served with green onions, cucumbers and steamed crapes for wrapping the duck and make it like burritos. As Asians as well as frequent flyers, my friend and I experienced Peking duck in Peking, Shanghai, Hong Kong, Singapore, and California or even in Sydney, this restaurant’s duck is the best ever, and the price is quite reasonable and affordable if we consider its quality and taste. And the rest of duck – the meats were used for fried rice. That fried rice was also superb taste and quality. Every single rice grain was coated with oil and duck flavor, the fried rice itself is a top quality for su

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: Ate here for a lunch sitting on a national holiday, and was blown away. Loved the duck of course (had to order in advance) and everything else we got. Incredible service with very attentive staff in a nice booth that was quiet and away from others. Will definitely go back when I return to SG.

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: Called to make a reservation more than 1 week in advance and pre-ordered the Peking Duck. Do note that the restaurant requires you to order the Peking Duck at least 1 day in advan

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: With a Michelin Star, one expects a certain standard of service. This evening, we booked this restaurant to celebrate Fathers’ Day. We arrived on time, and found that there was no orderly system for seating guests, so we were met by a crowd of irritated guests who had obviously been kept waiting for some time. We had to wait for over 30 minutes, with constant reminders to the receptionis

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: This restaurant has two seatings. If you are given the 8.30pm seating, don’t bother to come here. By this time, most stuffs are out of stock, restricting our ability to enjoy what the restaurant has to offer. This alone has destroyed the reputation of the restaurant, no matter how good the food is.

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: Wanted to try some peking duck while in Singapore and this place didn't disappoint. The duck was great. Service was good. Drinks were go

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: Second time here. Couldn’t wait to return with my family. Exceptional service amazing food and some of the best Peking Duck anywhere. Not cheap but amazing quality.

Name: Imperial Treasure Super Peking Duck Restaurant
Location: 290 Orchard Road The Paragon #05-42/45, Singapore 238859 Singapore
Review: We love to come and enjoy the Peking duck and dim sum in Imperial Treasure Peking Dick restaurant. As you all know, there are not many restaurants serve the authentic Peking duck in Singapore, especially the type of duck and the Chinese spring pancake, but ever since this restaurant opened, we come here whenever we miss the Peking duck in Singapore. Their dim sum have high standards as well.

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: You can get free parking, simple food (East & West) in a cosy environment at budget prices! However, please be prepared to pay extra for drinks (cold and hot)! Further, they can be slow in serving! sashimi is not fresh!

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: If you like soup, meat and sushi, The Square offers quite a good deal for the selection. The laksa was served with crayfish but was too saltish. Extra charges were levied for bottled water and ffree flow of drinks - fair enough but the dessert of 3 sliced fruits and 3 slices of cakes served was nothing if missed.

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: You have an excellent service during our buffet session!! Would like to compliment both Mr Lucds Tan and Philip Chua. They have been very helpful to calm us down when we are rushing over and nervous over ordering as no more self service due to covid-19.They have well introduced to us the signatures and matching of food and soup. A d also efficiently helped us with qty when comes to closing late. Both staff are very dedicated to their job and dining service. They made a difference to our dinner night :) will be back with colleagues a d friends in Dec. Cheers.

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: When I had dinner with my family at this restaurant on 28 November, 2020, we found Mr Lucas very friendly and helpful. His service was excellent. When my pasta was served, I found it very spicy (chilli hot)! When I made it known to Mr Lucas, he was so helpful as to change it for me (arranged with kitchen). When I told him that I could not stand too cold the dessert (pudding), he served it to me before I had finished my main dish, with my request. He service was really excellent. My family and I really appreciate it.

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: Most of the service team are attentive and although the buffet spread has limited variety, the ambience more than make the visit a comforting warmth for a birthday celebration, especially with complimentary tasty cake.

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: Well, I have reviewed this place before (March 2020 and before) but decided to pen again as the restaurant has introduced a new ala carte buffet (due to Covid19) and will mainly focus on the food, skipping the ambience as it remains relatively the sa

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: We dined at The Square a day after our Anniversary and enjoyed the wonderful food and the attentive service. We were presented with a lovely slice of a delicious fudgy chocolate anniversary cake when we told them that we just celebrated our anniversary yesterday. We also had a special Furama momento photo taken for us to bring home. Thank You to the managers and staff of The Square for making our visit a special moment for us.

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: I checked in Furama a month ago and due to COVID-19 there were not so many custome

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: I had a wonderful lunch buffet here with my parents on the 27th of August, 2020. We tried almost every item on the menu and they were all delightful. The staff were polite and attentive, kudos to the affable Mr Philip Chua and the management team for their professional waiting staff. To top it all up, the bill came to less than twenty four Singapore dollars per head, a very good value for the enjoyable buffet lunch with no strings or cringe attached.

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: Visited on 31 July 2020. While the food variety and quality was fine considering the price, what made this experience unpleasantly unforgettable was their servic

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: It is a disappointment for the service in THE SQUARE FURAMA. I came in 25/07/2020 Dinner time 6pm. The order has made us waited for 30mins-1hour, and still not served yet. We have asked the staff over and over again, what they reply us is “It is coming

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: Had both breakfast and dinner here. Variety is average, for dinner they have this lobster laksa which is also average. Their Sashimi is free flow and thickly cut. Overall, average food, nothing fantastic.

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: We used to dine in this restaurant regularly, once or twice a month but it has been 3 years since we last visited (we stopped coming back here to try other and new restaurants/cafes) and so we decided to revisit the restaurant. It was weekend and headed for the buffet lun

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review:
Reasonable and service is good, although location a bit inconvenience.
The laksa is nice and the lobster is also fresh.

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: Food selection good... mix of local fare and fresh seafood. also had a self service station tonmake your own kopi. Geneal service okay and there is a super friendly Auntie behind the roast meat and laksa counter. But lighting dull and overall feeling sombre. not vert welcoming.

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: Went last Saturday (14th Dec) for dinner buff

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: Glad we chose this buffet for Xmas lunch. The ambience was cosy, music selection was right, sitting arrangement was good. The spread was good too. The usual seafood, Jap station, hot station are there. very homely and well prepared chicken rice, Christmas turkey, ham, pork colar, potatoes, cheese, porridge. The highlight would be the laksa...very lemak and topped with abalone or lobster...your choic

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: The SQUARE RESTAURANT Has always been one of my favourite restaurants. Visit it whenever I am in SINGAPORE. the location is GOOD as it is easily reached by most mode of transports; SOME PUBLIC BUSES even run close to the hotel. The service is GOOD , and the staff and management are very helpful and friendly. The BUFFET food spread is GOOD and Fresh, and there is a frequent change in the spread. The seating are well spaced and NOT like some places, whereby the guests are crammed like sardines!!! AMBIENCE IS ACCEPTABLE. The prices are Very reasonable. Currently the lobster laksa (local fare of white noodle with coconut milk and curry sauce !) is a STEAL for the price !!! A MUST for food lover at reasonable price !!!

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: Enjoyed the Crayfish Laksa and also Friendly staff was attentive to our needs with a surprise cake....

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: Brought my whole entire family for a SAT NIGHT buffet at the restaurant named : THE SQUARE at FURUMA HOTEL. Food is generally nice and tasty with a substantial spread of food variety selectio

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: A local restaurant for hotel.Lunch & Dinner can be had here.Free WiFi.Buffet & a la carte available.Menu has soups/salads,main courses & dessets.plus all drinks available.Service can be slow,food is ok average ,but overpriced.Menu has a variety of options.

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: The restaurant initially is stuffy due to the ongoing hotel renovation. However, the good service from Philip and his team really made up for it. The restaurant has a "Claw machine" which got the children very excited and Philip dishes out 1 coin per child for them to have a try at the machin

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: Enjoyed my lunch especially their Laksa.  Food choices and varieties are good.  Also love their coffee  which you can take away.  Staff are quite attentive.

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: Buffet was great and plenty of options including different types of sea food and deserts and Susi of different types

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: went as a party of 8. Very good service and good selection of food. They have western and asian selections for food and dessert. One thing that stands out is they have very unique crayfish laksa - a piece of rice cake was added into the laksa which tasted really good and also made the laksa gravy texture and taste nice. However, i would prefer the chilli (for people to add onto their laksa on their own) to be more spicy hot instead of swee

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: Staff was very attentive to our needs, clears our plates promptl

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: Food quality was good, fairly wide choice, but a strong asian focus in terms of dishes and not a lot of rotation from day to day.

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: Yummy and wide selection of food for old and young.  Love the special seafood dinner and breakfast too!

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: Great buffet spread. Food was delicious. Great ambience. Service was excellent as well. Would recommend.

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: We stayed at the Furama hotel as we stayed at the Riverfront one last time and it was really good. This one isn’t quite up to the stand if the other one but suitable for our needs. The staff are friendly and helpful. I found the bed very hard and did not sleep well because of it And needed to use massage, tiger balm and my portable tens machine through the night. My back and hips were constantly sore. The views from the window were great. Our travel agent booked us into a twin room and the staff were helpful and changed it to a king room. We had breakfast a couple of times but tended to go to Starbucks as there wasn’t much we liked and couldn’t get a decent coffee. Far too strong for us and couldn’t get milk for tea. It’s a good location central to everything and with the Train 5 min walk it was great easily accessible to all attractions.

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review:
Food variety was a shadow of it's former glory, especially desserts.
Don't go for celebrations, go somewhere else.

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: This is my third time coming here for the dinner buffet. We were served with a complimentary pot of curry fish head too. Overall, the buffet dinner was great. Will come again.

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: staff were great and very welcoming ,nthe guy at the counter was having his lunch and dropped everything to assist us

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: We had dinner at The Square on Mother's Day and received a one-for-one buffet dinner special dea

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: Friendly staff and amenities for kids (kids dessert corner). Good place for family parties! Also space for a large group of friends as the table sits up to 10!

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: The staff are friendly and helpful. The food is quality whether it’s breakfast or Dinner. Such a range of quality food.

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: Was taken by a knowledgeable Singaporean who loves to eat and this buffet is of very high caliber. The local Malaysian dishes were excellent. The sashimi was very fresh. There was an awesome salmon in chimichurri that surprised my palate. There really is so much to chose from and everything I tried was of high quality. Highly recommended.

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: Food was bad and quality of seafood wasn’t nice. Definitely overpriced. Air con at the restaurant was also faulty on that day.

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: The Square is an ok place to have some diner, or any other meal. The menu is a bit limited for people staying there for a longer time. This restaurant is located on the 2nd floor of the Furama Riverfront hotel. Staff is friendly and the desserts are delicious!

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: I had diubts about the buffet but it was excellent. As in house guests we got a reduction in price. Great range of food . Allowed me to try thinks Id never order at home. Staff were extremely helpful.

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: Celebrated my 69th Birthday with lunch @ The Square/Furama Riverfront again. Usual Promotion at $78++ (1 for 1) with Abalone Laksa (1 serving ). Reserved a table for 6 with Ms. Mariam at $38 net / pax by redeeming with Fave vouchers - Cheaper! Restaurant quite packed on arrival at 12 pm and was given a round table (marked with reserved sign). As part of Chinese New Year Celebration, a "Cai Shen Yeh" (God of Prosperity) goes around taking photos at each table with the diners. The Desert Spread is much less than our last vis

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review:
ordered some room service for us as we arrived late at night with hungry kids.

Ordered 2 bowls of pasta, 1 chicken rice and 2 bowls of chips .... $155.00

ridiculous price

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: We enjoyed the buffet spread which are both international and local. There was an area for kids as well. Also, there's a playground within the buffet area which parents can enjoy the food while watching the kids play inside.

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: My wife and I whilst staying at the Furama Riverfront felt a little peckish after wandering around the nearby Clarke Quay and so we decided to visit The Square, for a snack. As we entered I noted that there were 2 couples seated within aside from the Entertainment and us that's all that there appeared to be present. Not busy is my message. My wife secured a Table close to the Bar and the "Snack" set-up. Apart from about for items it was virtually empty so I approached the Bar. I was approached by a young man. I advised that there appeared to be not alot on offer from the "Snack" thingy and asked for a Menu. I was given it but told to take it to my/our Table where a person would accept our request. Approx 15 mins after being seated a lady approached, we gave her our choices and waited, and waited, and waited! 40 mins later I approached the Bar, (same bloke) and ascertained the status of our request. I was advised that it was coming. It did, a good 10-15 minutes later. It was old and cold. I noticed that the lady who had brought our ":food" to us was standing talking to a group of 3 males. I attracted her attention and when she came over she couldn't have been more disinterested if she tried. She left with no offer of replacement etc. So I went to the Bar counter and asked for my Bill I was told it was added to my Room. I advised that I preferred to pay in cash. I was told that it was done! So I said, undo it - I'll pay in cash. The request was complied with. I paid and gave a $10SD Tip! The $10SD was returned! So I took it and said,"You're right - a Tip wasn't deserved"! Not a pleasant experience. Sorry - perhaps it was a bad day.

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: Had lunch 3 days in a row as I was kn a conference. Wide variety of food. The staff are attentive and polite.

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: Good food varieties, even have porridge choice for dinner. Make-your-own milk tea and soup are cold, dishes are not replenish often, slow to clear used plates

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: My friends and I celebrated a birthday here and without even having to request anything, Chef Jackson Goh offered to arrange a birthday cake immediately for my friend, and it turned out really well! The “Happy Birthday” note was also beautifully written. Chef Jackson Goh also introduced to us those food that is a must-try such as the prawn noodle, which is really fantastic, and they also had salted egg crayfish! There was also mashed potato with a tinge of truffle, which I absolutely loved. This place is recommended and if you’re lucky, you’ll be able to meet this wonderful chef who’ll try his best to give you the best service! Thank you Chef Jackson!

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: No changes ever since the last trip I went somewhere 2 months ago. The food is lousy, Water formaking tea is cold. Seafood not fresh at all. I wonder how come no Head of chef to take chargeof the good/bad of the food. That's why when I have arrived at the cafe, is so little of the guest around.

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: The breakfast buffet had a lot of options to cater to various dietary needs.  There were a lot of different breads, fruits, etc.  The coffee was excellent.

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: Something's amiss here. Even though they got all their bases covered, salad selection, carvery, sashimi station, reasonable desserts, even a dedicated kids play area with free cupcake decoration for kids. Maybe it's the hordes - this hotel caters to many tour groups. During dinner, it's jam packed with long queues. Maybe it's the food quality. Bland mass produced food. No signature dishes. Coffee machine only dispenses black coffee, no latte etc Maybe it's the tired old decor. Somehow the visit was not enjoyable and the only saving grace it's the one for one buffet. Perhaps that's the reason why it's one for one.

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: The food quantity and quality is average. It is good for a gathering with family over the weekend. Saturday buffet lunch was SGD91+ per pax . I consider it expensive as compare to what is on the buffet belt, No crabs and lobsters.

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: we had the buffet breakfast every day as it was included in our room charge. The food was quite good, with a good variety to be had, but the coffee was strong and bitter. Had dinner there one night. Chose al a carte as the dinner buffet was very expensive. Food was OK, but nothing special.

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: Range and qualtity of dishes available was very good.  rage of health options available from Fresh fruit, through cooked meals to cake.

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: The layout of the food is very strange. The dishes were mostly empty and this is by 7:30pm The Beef Cheek Rendang was cold -taste ok. The cereal prawns once over were replenished with sweet potato!!! The lobster in the laksa was slightly tough probably undercooked. The papaya salad was awful. Pasta when over took more than 30mins to repleni

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: Have a pleasant experience.  Spread was fine and they replenish it constantly with the exception of green tea.  Chilli Crab i think should be frozen cos it was tasteless and tough!

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: Had a dinner while staying in the hotel.  The spread of buffet was good.  Quite a huge variety of food available.  Food was also rather tasty.  My kids mentioned they would love to come back again to eat at the restaurant in future.

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: Highly recommended although it was my first visit.Nice atmosphere,food and service.Pictures are some of their signature food(soft shell crab,laksa,sea cucumber with mushroom)which taste awesome.Will definitely visit again!

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: This is my first time to the restaurant. The restaurant has dining offers, as long as you have a credit card. The buffet spread is good. There's a range of Asian and Western food to choose from. The food is also topped up frequently. The desserts are fantastic, and there is even a children's area for children to play. Service is prompt as well. The price is slightly on the high side: $78++ per pax before discount.

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: An impromptu birthday celebration for me.I must say that the buffet is very scrumptious with the premium abalone laska and the list goes on. I would highly recommend this restaurant to anyone who wants to have their food and the price is certainly worth it. Chef Jackson is very unassuming. He even surprised me with a birthday cake.

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: Stayed in Furama Waterfront Hotel for a night prior to our flight out through Changi Airport to Stockholm. Decided on the buffet dinner at The Square and we did not regret it one b

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: Came here for dinner when staying, it’s an all you can eat buffet plus a small al a carte menu. I don’t eat large amounts so the excellent all you can eat didn’t fit for me. I chose a de-boned baby chicken with vegetables and a beer. The beer took around 25 minutes to arrive, water took 15 minutes and the meal arrived after around 40 mins. As soon as it arrived it became clear what the delay was, they were cremating the chicken, it was around 35 minutes over cooked. Mash was good though and veg

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: As I stayed in a group booking for a company organised seminar for 3 days, I had breakfast on all three morning and buffet lunch on 2 days he

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: Worth a visit. Good value too. Great selection of Indonesian, Korean and Chinese food plus salads and all the usual stuff!

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: We stayed at the Furama for a week and went to The Square each day for buffet breakfast. Great range of breakfast goodies to suit a wide range of tastes. Typical continental and cooked western breakfast fare, dim sums, fried rice, noodles, Indian curry, rice and ibli, miso, congee, breads, pastries, cakes, salad, deli meats, fruit and more. Very busy spot for breakfast as it is a popular hotel for flight crews as well. Good quality and tasty. Well worth it for around SGD$18 pp.

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: We went for our staycation and had our dinner here at The Square though it was almost full but still not very crowded. The range of food was quite nice though I won't say the best I have so far but pretty good.

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: Decided to come here for our birthday dinne

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: The main attraction of the buffet is the laksa. You choose one serving of either lobster or abalone laksa. The laksa is quite nice but the meat of the lobster is a bit tou

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: Range of food was impressive and quality was excellent. Sometimes buffet meals can be lacking but the food wAs lovely. Busy restaurant though, not for quiet meals.

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: Just celebrated my 68th Birthday with lunch @ The Square/Furama Riverfront. My family is a regular of this Restaurant for many years - most Birthday Buffets here because of the big (buffet) spread (2nd to Carousel @ Royal Plaza on Scotts). Reserved a table for 6 @ $28 net / pax with Platinum Passion Card Promotion -ending March '18 (great value for money). Another promotion is at $78++ (with 1 for 1) with Lobster Laksa (1 serving eac

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: We had the buffet breakfast every day during our stay at the Furama. The choice was great, western style eggs, bacon and breads, Indian curries and chinese poridges, all lovely.

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: Spread may not be much but food is tasty. Soup was tasty as well. There was lobster or abalone lasksa to choose from.

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: Hotel called me to confirm my reservation on day of dinner. I thought it sounded weird when she mentioned I need to go ballroom for the dinner. So true that the dining was really at ballroom instead of the restaurant. A bit disappointed though. Food quality was average. But there was shark fin soup. Ambience was average. A good surprise was the balloon sculptor who went every table to make balloons for the kids and he had unlimited imagination to fulfil every request such as chicken drumstick, a diamond ring, superman, elephant, monkey on a tree...e

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: The choices range from East Indian, Asian, American, and European cuisine. Delectable and scrumptious are the courses with your choice of porridge, noodle, curry, waffle, boiled and fried egg, potato wedge, fruit, yogurt, and many more breakfast treats. Diner is a special meal with such selections as Turkey, Beef, and a variety of vegetables freshly prepared.

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: Food is delicious.if it gives senior citizen rate think it makes wonder. One for one is worth it.Their service is good

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: The ambiance is good, the staff is friendly. But the food doesn’t Taste good. The variety is also very limited.

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: Prawn and crab were dry and difficult to eat. Range of food was quite small especially for the seafood sector that was disappointing.

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: nice ambience, service not bad, nice choices, had free lobster laksa but too small portion single helping, value for 1 for 1. pity no wifi and prawns uncleaned. five stars near miss.

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: Food was average. Salmon sashimi was fresh, beef stew was good. The crab was not fresh and the desserts were average. The laksa was average as well. Was quite disappointed with the selection.

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: Food spread was good, so was the service. Enjoyed the coffee very much, you have both the western and local coffee :)

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: Great value for buffet dinner when book with room. Place was great with kids play area and kids pancake design corner. Server also prompt with request.

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: I love my Indian or Chinese based breakfast option....plenty of choice, good quality food and the buffet sye means you eat what and how much you want. VERY reasonably priced

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: Was rather disappointed with the buffet spread- not much choice for chinese food and non beef eaters. Service was good thanks to the obliging staff which made celebrating my daughter’s birthday a breeze :) the playarea for kids was a good break for kids who cannot stay at the dining table for long

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: The food was top notch, the selection was amazing. I chose the buffet which I cannot even describe, It was a feast of my taste buds. They literally had a party...my taste buds...lol

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: Not a wide spread of food selection. However, some notable dishes to try if you are there. The fresh steamed prawns, roasted pork belly and the char siew.

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: The buffet spread was sumptuous and varied and the quality was great!  The staff were courteous and very efficient, cleared our plates the moment we left the table to get more food.   Will recommend to my families and friends and will definitely return !

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review:
Quite place, various of foods, drinks and seafood.  Waiter & waitress are polite and fast response.  Sadly not crowd maybe is weekday (Monday), 21/8/2017.
Good place for gathering and go for food with big eater.  Will come back for more.

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: Variety wasn't much but for a 1 for 1 deal it's still worth it. The staff was quick in helping to keep the plates whenever we were done.

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: Decided to bring my girlfriend here to celebrate our anniversary. We were looking forward to having a good dinner, however we were disappointe

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: Food tastes alright, but limited food selection. Not worth the original buffet price of $70++. Ambience was good.

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: So very crowded. We didn't have the buffet but ordered a la Carte. Food was so-so. Service was good. But just too crowded !!

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review:
Staff very friendly and helpful.
Food is average only, however not very international.  there are chinese noodle but should have a more international food like spagedi, bake rice etc.
the cake are good.

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: Had the misfortune of celebrating my good friend's birthday he

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: I tried this place for both breakfast and lunch when staying at the hotel. So I got to try many different things, I thought the range was excellent and I really liked the sashimi. The staff also made me a cappuccino when I asked nicely, which was a lot more to my taste then the automachine at the buffet. Do look around properly, there was a very nice cheeseboard tucked around the rear of one of the buffet displays.

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: The SQUARE Restaurant at Furama Hotel, Havelock Road is doing their very best to attract diners. They have regular promotion tying up with various credit cards companies and offer very good deals for both their buffet lunch and dinner. The location of the restaurant is good and can easily be reached by most transports; moreover it is near the ChinaTown area. The ambience is good; layout of tables are acceptable and not too crowded. The service is good though it is buffet style, as the staff are very helpful. The choice and quality of food is acceptable relative to the price charged for the meals. GOOD VALUE for money! GUTEN APETTI !!!

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review:
very little food selection. 
service is good. very attentive staff.
luckily have credit card promotion.

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: Quality of food was poor. Most in fact. Meats are tough. Beehoon too minced. Dessert...so so. Variety was limited. Had to re-eat what i have eaten. Got times where i do not know what else to eat. Service overall was ok.

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: I had my buffet here. Hospitality and attentive of staffs is at the top level. $70++ for buffet dinner.

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: couldnt find a food that is good enough for a second serving. left the place with a half filled stomach. felt so sorry for the people eating with me because i chose this place for the birthday celebration.

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: Came across this promotion with Diners card 1 free for 2 paying adults at $70++ Came with my friends for dinner to celebrate her birthday yesterday. Very disappointed with the quality of the food and there wasnt much varities, no laksa, no oyster, no cold crab legs, etc which are common in hotel buffet. Food were not refilled, trays were left emptied for a while. not refilled till much later where most diners have left. Soup was very diluted. Braised items which were meant to go with white porridge were very hard. Service staff were not friendly. Totally disappointed and feel bad for my birthday friend as I have chosen this place for our celebration. This will be my first and last time dining het at The Square @Furama. Even its a promo its not worth.

Name: The Square @ Furama
Location: 405 Havelock Road, Singapore 169633 Singapore
Review: The food was only average, the variety not great and the crab was crappy. I will not recommend this restaurant.

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant
Location: 442 Orchard Road Orchard Hotel Singapore Level 2 Orchard Hotel Singapore, Singapore 238879 Singapore
Review:
Excellent Amy, the waitress is friendly and nice
Amazing services and good environment
Having good dining experience here

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant
Location: 442 Orchard Road Orchard Hotel Singapore Level 2 Orchard Hotel Singapore, Singapore 238879 Singapore
