Review: Excellent Amy! ❤️always heartwarming and good service. Thanks for the good service and awesome food! ❤️❤️❤️❤️😊

Location: 442 Orchard Road Orchard Hotel Singapore Level 2 Orchard Hotel Singapore, Singapore 238879 Singapore

We had also ordered the mini longevity bun presented on golden tree. Overall, the Food is Wonderful , service is excpetional.

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant
Location: 442 Orchard Road Orchard Hotel Singapore Level 2 Orchard Hotel Singapore, Singapore 238879 Singapore
Review: We had the set menu.  Manager willing to accommodate our allergies and made some minor changes.  Great tasting food, great service.  Highly recommended.  But need to book early, as its very hard to get a table.

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant
Location: 442 Orchard Road Orchard Hotel Singapore Level 2 Orchard Hotel Singapore, Singapore 238879 Singapore
Review: Amazing dinner and fantastic service! Kuak Ming and his team were absolutely fabulous. We had a truly great dinner

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant
Location: 442 Orchard Road Orchard Hotel Singapore Level 2 Orchard Hotel Singapore, Singapore 238879 Singapore
Review: We had such a lovely time at Huating. Ah Moon was a fabulous host, making sure that we are looked after, that the cake and photos turned out well, and that we had a great time! Thank you!

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant
Location: 442 Orchard Road Orchard Hotel Singapore Level 2 Orchard Hotel Singapore, Singapore 238879 Singapore
Review: Pleasantly surprised with the quality of food! We loved the XLB, Cheong fan with prawns, XO carrot cake and chicken feet! We miss the Cheong fun with dough fritters tho. Please bring it back! Aunty Meng And Amy who served us were also really nice and attentive. Prices are slightly more expensive so it would be good if you pay with their partner banks.

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant
Location: 442 Orchard Road Orchard Hotel Singapore Level 2 Orchard Hotel Singapore, Singapore 238879 Singapore
Review: Service received from Yong Zhe and Catherine is very pleasure and comfortable.  They were warm and friendly and accommodating to our every need.

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant
Location: 442 Orchard Road Orchard Hotel Singapore Level 2 Orchard Hotel Singapore, Singapore 238879 Singapore
Review: All the staff where were great especially Amy and Meng Chiue I had an super enjoyable meal and they were very attentive. The food was great. Will totally come back again!

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant
Location: 442 Orchard Road Orchard Hotel Singapore Level 2 Orchard Hotel Singapore, Singapore 238879 Singapore
Review:
Very good food and service from Amy.
Ambience and nice place for birthday celebration...come back again

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant
Location: 442 Orchard Road Orchard Hotel Singapore Level 2 Orchard Hotel Singapore, Singapore 238879 Singapore
Review: The guy serving us provided very nice and friendly service with clear explanations to our enquiries about the food and Im satisfied with the service he provided. The food was good, I really liked the crispy roasted duck!

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant
Location: 442 Orchard Road Orchard Hotel Singapore Level 2 Orchard Hotel Singapore, Singapore 238879 Singapore
Review: order set course meal. food is delicious and service is very good. will recommend friends and family to come.

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant

Review: Had a great night here at Hua Ting! The service was impeccable, food at top-notch quality, and I loved the staff here. Thank you for the amazing dining experience. Shout out to Sophia for recommending us nice dishes~

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant
Location: 442 Orchard Road Orchard Hotel Singapore Level 2 Orchard Hotel Singapore, Singapore 238879 Singapore
Review: Good service and good food at hua ting. Their staff provide good service esp staff who take care of us named Moon is very attentive and take care of us during the whole dinner there. Will definitely visit hua ting again

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant
Location: 442 Orchard Road Orchard Hotel Singapore Level 2 Orchard Hotel Singapore, Singapore 238879 Singapore

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant
Location: 442 Orchard Road Orchard Hotel Singapore Level 2 Orchard Hotel Singapore, Singapore 238879 Singapore

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant

Review: Food was excellent! A must try. Pricing is pretty decent too for this price! Had the dim sum here. Every dish was unique in its own way. Service was also very up to standard.

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant
Location: 442 Orchard Road Orchard Hotel Singapore Level 2 Orchard Hotel Singapore, Singapore 238879 Singapore

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant

Review:
Experienced a great spread of dimsum and ala carte dishes with superb service.
Enjoyed the  beautiful ambience and decor

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant
Location: 442 Orchard Road Orchard Hotel Singapore Level 2 Orchard Hotel Singapore, Singapore 238879 Singapore
Review: It was a nice Sunday brunch here. The service from Sophia was very good, she’s very bubbly and recommended to us a special dish which is the claypot fish with vegetables that is not on the menu. The duck is good.

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant
Location: 442 Orchard Road Orchard Hotel Singapore Level 2 Orchard Hotel Singapore, Singapore 238879 Singapore

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant
Location: 442 Orchard Road Orchard Hotel Singapore Level 2 Orchard Hotel Singapore, Singapore 238879 Singapore
Review: Had lunch here on a Sunday afternoon. Food and service was impressive! Staff were very attentive to our table, and the dim sum and duck was really good! Staff by the name of Meng Chue was especially friendly and attentive. Will be back again! Thank you!

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant
Location: 442 Orchard Road Orchard Hotel Singapore Level 2 Orchard Hotel Singapore, Singapore 238879 Singapore
Review: Mainly ate dimsum and enjoyed it very much , the service here is excellent as well making the experience very pleasant.

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant
Location: 442 Orchard Road Orchard Hotel Singapore Level 2 Orchard Hotel Singapore, Singapore 238879 Singapore
Review: Had a lovely breakfast with my family at Hua Ting at Orchard Hotel. The food was good with excellent staff service! Highly recommend to those who want a good experience.

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant

Review: Thank you Meng Chue for the good service :) I had a great time here with my family for my birthday :)

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant

Review: Hua Ting is a reknown restaurant located at Orchard Hotel that has won many accolades and food awards for its quality and innovative Cantonese cuisin

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant

Her tea and menu recommendations were spot on and she kept coming back to check in on us. Overall all staff paid a lot of attention to us and we'll be back soon.

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant
Location: 442 Orchard Road Orchard Hotel Singapore Level 2 Orchard Hotel Singapore, Singapore 238879 Singapore
Review: Had a great meal and enjoyed the service of Meng Chue and Amy! Delicious food, lovely ambience and staff were friendly and attentive. Would recommend and would come again!

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant

Food excellent.

  This is where you are assured of a memorable meal beyond any doubt.

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant
Location: 442 Orchard Road Orchard Hotel Singapore Level 2 Orchard Hotel Singapore, Singapore 238879 Singapore
Review: My favorite place for dim sum. Can't go wrong with here. Good service, quality food. I will recommend to have chinese cuisine here.

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant
Location: 442 Orchard Road Orchard Hotel Singapore Level 2 Orchard Hotel Singapore, Singapore 238879 Singapore
Review: Nice atmosphere, nice food and very friendly staffs, especially Sophia and Ming Zhu. Love the food and will come back again. A nice birthday dinner

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant
Location: 442 Orchard Road Orchard Hotel Singapore Level 2 Orchard Hotel Singapore, Singapore 238879 Singapore
Review: Had an enjoyable experience here! The food was delicious and the staff were attentive. Would recommend!

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant
Location: 442 Orchard Road Orchard Hotel Singapore Level 2 Orchard Hotel Singapore, Singapore 238879 Singapore
Review: First time here..apart of the location was a little difficult to locate.. Food and service is good..good atmosphere..sophia is very friendly and very attentive..   Will definately bring my friend to visit again.

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant
Location: 442 Orchard Road Orchard Hotel Singapore Level 2 Orchard Hotel Singapore, Singapore 238879 Singapore
Review:
Friendly staff and delicious food.
Reasonable pricing. Worth trying all the chief recommendations. Nice!

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant
Location: 442 Orchard Road Orchard Hotel Singapore Level 2 Orchard Hotel Singapore, Singapore 238879 Singapore
Review: We have been to Hua Ting before and Sophia, as usual, always makes extra effort to make the experience excellent. This time, she helped plan the menu in advance and it turned out not only delicious but perfectly balanced. The crispy roast duck is a must-have. Great recommendation by Sophia. And the abalone lo-hei platter, our first for this coming CNY season, was excellent. Meng Chue took care of our private room and her bubbly positive energy really gave us the best possible experience for our first lo-hei dinner.

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant
Location: 442 Orchard Road Orchard Hotel Singapore Level 2 Orchard Hotel Singapore, Singapore 238879 Singapore
Review: Good food all-around with interesting and proficient use of ingredients. Truly a venue worthy of celebrating an important occasion at as long as you’re willing to spend more.

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant
Location: 442 Orchard Road Orchard Hotel Singapore Level 2 Orchard Hotel Singapore, Singapore 238879 Singapore
Review: The food was very well made and were a testament to the chef’s capabilities. The service is also outstanding and the staff are always looking out for customers

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant
Location: 442 Orchard Road Orchard Hotel Singapore Level 2 Orchard Hotel Singapore, Singapore 238879 Singapore
Review:
Great restaurant.  Small menu but everything executed very well. Service staff impeccable!

Will definitely make this a regular spot

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant
Location: 442 Orchard Road Orchard Hotel Singapore Level 2 Orchard Hotel Singapore, Singapore 238879 Singapore
Review:
Great food great service from Sophia.
The fish promise to catch your taste.
The service standard is there without doubts.

Review: Sopfia is very friendly. Very happy she serve for us. 提供和介绍的食物都不错，特别是鲍鱼非常的好吃。而且能和我的老板们很好的交谈，能够与他们与非常轻松的方式说笑。

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant
Location: 442 Orchard Road Orchard Hotel Singapore Level 2 Orchard Hotel Singapore, Singapore 238879 Singapore
Review:
Sophia is very friendly and her service is good. 
The tobort fish and 鲍鱼 are nice and yummy. Good choice.

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant
Location: 442 Orchard Road Orchard Hotel Singapore Level 2 Orchard Hotel Singapore, Singapore 238879 Singapore
Review: The Peking duck isn’t the best in town, but otherwise Hua Ting serves excellent Cantonese dishes. The overall style is conservative, but there are some innovative and yummy creations, usually off the menu. Service, while friendly, does have lapses and is not top-of-class as it lacks warmth. For a private group Chinese meal, this is one of the best venues in Singapore, especially if you work with them to design the menu.

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant
Location: 442 Orchard Road Orchard Hotel Singapore Level 2 Orchard Hotel Singapore, Singapore 238879 Singapore
Review: Nice place with nice food and nice & friendly staff named Debbie. Fast & alert to our request when we called her to help. Keep it up the good job.

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant
Location: 442 Orchard Road Orchard Hotel Singapore Level 2 Orchard Hotel Singapore, Singapore 238879 Singapore
Review: At HuaTing, you can expect a large variety of food. Recommendation from Sophia is good, poultry and Dim Sum were well cooked and delicious. Overall a good experience at HuaTing, I will recommend it.

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant
Location: 442 Orchard Road Orchard Hotel Singapore Level 2 Orchard Hotel Singapore, Singapore 238879 Singapore
Review: Food is really amazing, and the service is great. Thank you Sofia for the amazing service and recommendations. Will definitely come back again for family meal.

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant
Location: 442 Orchard Road Orchard Hotel Singapore Level 2 Orchard Hotel Singapore, Singapore 238879 Singapore

The dim sum is delicious. The staff is knowledgeable and friendly. 
色味俱佳、回味无穷

山的味道、海的味道
芳香扑鼻、香飘十里

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant

Review: Favourite Chinese restaurant. Food is well presented and delicious! Great service too. Special shout out to Kok Meng for the outstanding service

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant
Location: 442 Orchard Road Orchard Hotel Singapore Level 2 Orchard Hotel Singapore, Singapore 238879 Singapore
Review: The food here was just as great as the service here. Came for some light dim sum lunch and left very satisfied. Relatively good price for the environment too. Overall 5/5.

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant
Location: 442 Orchard Road Orchard Hotel Singapore Level 2 Orchard Hotel Singapore, Singapore 238879 Singapore
Review: My husband and I love coming to Hua Ting for lunch. Mostly because the food is amazing. The menu is quite creative. You have your regular siew mai but also Kurobuta wrap with crispy bean curd. This shows how much the chef team is open to trying to new things with their menu

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant
Location: 442 Orchard Road Orchard Hotel Singapore Level 2 Orchard Hotel Singapore, Singapore 238879 Singapore
Review: Went here for my boyfriend's birthday along with my mom and ordered the dim sum lunch. Will definitely recommend their mango chicken and the XO carrot cake! Left the place with happy tummies and a happy boyfriend too :) Will come back here!

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant
Location: 442 Orchard Road Orchard Hotel Singapore Level 2 Orchard Hotel Singapore, Singapore 238879 Singapore
Review: My favourite place to visit for authentic Chinese food. Unlike other places, the chef’s menu is very unique.

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant
Location: 442 Orchard Road Orchard Hotel Singapore Level 2 Orchard Hotel Singapore, Singapore 238879 Singapore
Review: The food is very delicious. Staff is very friendly and attentive. Went for dinner and it is very worth!

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant
Location: 442 Orchard Road Orchard Hotel Singapore Level 2 Orchard Hotel Singapore, Singapore 238879 Singapore
Review: Went for a birthday dim sum lunch. Ordered the mango chicken tartlets on a whim and didn't regret it one bit. Their pastries always deliver. The Peking duck is a definite must. They slice it with the duck meat but you can ask for just the skin to be sliced if that's your preference. Great service as always as well.

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant
Location: 442 Orchard Road Orchard Hotel Singapore Level 2 Orchard Hotel Singapore, Singapore 238879 Singapore
Review: The food here is very delicious and the staff here are all very friendly and really approachable!!!!

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant
Location: 442 Orchard Road Orchard Hotel Singapore Level 2 Orchard Hotel Singapore, Singapore 238879 Singapore
Review: A Michelin-starred food place to have special food fusion dishes with nice ambience. Great to hang out with friends and families.

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant
Location: 442 Orchard Road Orchard Hotel Singapore Level 2 Orchard Hotel Singapore, Singapore 238879 Singapore
Review: Good food quality and services. Hua Ting is a good place to gather with your family and friends for any occasion.

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant
Location: 442 Orchard Road Orchard Hotel Singapore Level 2 Orchard Hotel Singapore, Singapore 238879 Singapore
Review: Every dish we ordered was very delicious, and we particularly enjoyed the roast duck, steamed mushroom dumpling and 泡饭. Sophia was also very helpful with recommendations and stopped by to give us more informative context about the dishes we were having.

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant
Location: 442 Orchard Road Orchard Hotel Singapore Level 2 Orchard Hotel Singapore, Singapore 238879 Singapore
Review: Our family really enjoyed our lunch here at Hua Ting! The food is exceptional - one of the standout dishes was there 泡饭, the roast duck, the truffle and mushroom 水饺 and the crab claw in egg sauce! Sophia recommended some great dishes and her service was excellent! All in all, would highly recommend.

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant
Location: 442 Orchard Road Orchard Hotel Singapore Level 2 Orchard Hotel Singapore, Singapore 238879 Singapore
Review: The food was very good as well as the service! Worth the trip. But abit on the pricey side. Need to spend $100 to get

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant
Location: 442 Orchard Road Orchard Hotel Singapore Level 2 Orchard Hotel Singapore, Singapore 238879 Singapore
Review: The Stone bowl horfun has wok hee. The chef recommended of double boil soup was exquisite. Simply delicious. Overall a very pleasant dinning experience

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant
Location: 442 Orchard Road Orchard Hotel Singapore Level 2 Orchard Hotel Singapore, Singapore 238879 Singapore
Review: Great food at Hua Ting as always. The service is great and you can't miss out on their carrot cake. Great for dim sum

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant
Location: 442 Orchard Road Orchard Hotel Singapore Level 2 Orchard Hotel Singapore, Singapore 238879 Singapore
Review: Pleasant lunch, exquisite dim sums and great service. Pretty attentive serving staff even when we were seated at the foyer.

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant
Location: 442 Orchard Road Orchard Hotel Singapore Level 2 Orchard Hotel Singapore, Singapore 238879 Singapore
Review:
Served yummy Dim Sum and food.
Like especially the roast meat. Very crispy. 

Staffs was friendly.
Need to make reservation before going.
Will be back again.

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant
Location: 442 Orchard Road Orchard Hotel Singapore Level 2 Orchard Hotel Singapore, Singapore 238879 Singapore
Review: Excellent dim sum and service by staff! Recommend the prawn dumpling and chicken mango tartlets.  Do make a reservation before heading down!

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant
Location: 442 Orchard Road Orchard Hotel Singapore Level 2 Orchard Hotel Singapore, Singapore 238879 Singapore
Review: Sophia was very attentive to our needs and we are impressed with the food quality and recommendation. We will definitely be back again!

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant
Location: 442 Orchard Road Orchard Hotel Singapore Level 2 Orchard Hotel Singapore, Singapore 238879 Singapore
Review:
KC was our waiter and he was great. Topping up our water and his recommendations were spot on. The crispy duck was superb. 
We will definitely be back

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant
Location: 442 Orchard Road Orchard Hotel Singapore Level 2 Orchard Hotel Singapore, Singapore 238879 Singapore
Review: Best food, best service, best experience.  Exquisite and quality food. Been to many Chinese restaurant, but this has to definitely be my favorite! Do come and try if you’ve never tried before!

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant
Location: 442 Orchard Road Orchard Hotel Singapore Level 2 Orchard Hotel Singapore, Singapore 238879 Singapore
Review: Great service and the food was amazing! Highly recommended. The roast duck is probably one of the best in Singapore

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant
Location: 442 Orchard Road Orchard Hotel Singapore Level 2 Orchard Hotel Singapore, Singapore 238879 Singapore
Review: Came here w my friend to celebrate birthday. Food is amazing, especially the wagyu beef and their signature Tofu. Servers are very attentive and friendly. Thanks to Nelson for this amazing experience here. Will def be back again!

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant
Location: 442 Orchard Road Orchard Hotel Singapore Level 2 Orchard Hotel Singapore, Singapore 238879 Singapore
Review: Food served hot and nice. Very yummy, fresh ingredients, definitely recommended. Came with complimentary appetizers. Organic tomato served on lemon jelly, very refreshing with a tinge of sour and sweet. Crispy duck is yummy. Decent waiting time. Very polite staffs. Prompt service given throughout the meal. The place is surprisingly packed for a Monday evening. Reservations recommended to avoid disappointment. Came with my kids. Definitely a kids friendly restaurant. Thank you for the lovely meal.

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant
Location: 442 Orchard Road Orchard Hotel Singapore Level 2 Orchard Hotel Singapore, Singapore 238879 Singapore
Review: Visited as a guest in this restaurant for lunch just today. We were entertaining friends from Hong Kong. I just want to say that, in addition to a nice meal, we had a delightful waitress, Poh Yee. She had just the right balance of friendliness and efficiency. She and other staff members made certain that we had everything we needed. Kudos!

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant
Location: 442 Orchard Road Orchard Hotel Singapore Level 2 Orchard Hotel Singapore, Singapore 238879 Singapore
Review: I was honestly a tad disappointed by the size of the dim sum menu, as we are usually used to a larger array of choices. However, the quality of the food that came was above any reproach. It was exquisitely made. The roast duck (from the ala-carte menu) which was recommended, was indeed up to its famed reputation. To top it off, the service was excellent and attentive, while the ambience was very conducive for a family gathering. Apologies for the lack of photos as we attacked everything before we remembered to take any

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant
Location: 442 Orchard Road Orchard Hotel Singapore Level 2 Orchard Hotel Singapore, Singapore 238879 Singapore
Review: The food and service at Hua Ting was excellent and I would definitely recommend this restaurant if you visit Orchard hotel! The waitress Amy was especially friendly and helpful!

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant
Location: 442 Orchard Road Orchard Hotel Singapore Level 2 Orchard Hotel Singapore, Singapore 238879 Singapore
Review: Celebrated our wedding anniversary at Hua Ting for dinner. Met with such excellent service and food quality that I had to put in my review. Food portions were just nice and taste was exquisite. Memorable was the starter-crispy frozen vegetable. Refreshing with a zesty twist. Roasted pork was simply nicely torched and had a crunchy touch to it. The scallop in my udon was pan-fried to perfectio

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant
Location: 442 Orchard Road Orchard Hotel Singapore Level 2 Orchard Hotel Singapore, Singapore 238879 Singapore
Review: The crab dish is superb and unique. It was egg white along with very soft white crab meat. The desert is very unique and delicious. The service of the waitress and restaurant manager is superb. They were very friendly and offered great recommendations for our dinner.

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant
Location: 442 Orchard Road Orchard Hotel Singapore Level 2 Orchard Hotel Singapore, Singapore 238879 Singapore
Review:
Nice food, esp the roast duck, luo han veg,old cumcumber melon soup, crabmeat fried rice..etc. 
good ambience! Very good service!

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant
Location: 442 Orchard Road Orchard Hotel Singapore Level 2 Orchard Hotel Singapore, Singapore 238879 Singapore
Review: Food and service  was good as usual. Do book early if you would like to enjoy your lunch in the main restaurant.

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant
Location: 442 Orchard Road Orchard Hotel Singapore Level 2 Orchard Hotel Singapore, Singapore 238879 Singapore
Review: Not too busy on a Sunday afternoon. Dim sum was delicious. Be sure to try their roast duck and roast pork too!

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant
Location: 442 Orchard Road Orchard Hotel Singapore Level 2 Orchard Hotel Singapore, Singapore 238879 Singapore
Review:
Great food and staff. The vegetarian options were plenty for one of our guest.

The staff was very accommodating and knowledgeable. It made ordering very easy.

Had a special lotus bun on tree for a birthday treat!

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant
Location: 442 Orchard Road Orchard Hotel Singapore Level 2 Orchard Hotel Singapore, Singapore 238879 Singapore
Review: We were there for dinner to celebrate my mother’s birthday and Nelson took great care of us with his wonderful hospitality, friendly service, food recommendations and helping us take photographs. The room and ambiance was amazing. The food was indeed Michelin quality like they all say. Nelson helped make our experience an unforgettable one! Looking forward to come back again soon to try their dim sum!

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant
Location: 442 Orchard Road Orchard Hotel Singapore Level 2 Orchard Hotel Singapore, Singapore 238879 Singapore
Review: My forth time here, and counting! Nice food and nice service. I’m more a fan of their classics than the fusion options. Ha Gau and Siu mai are the must try.

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant
Location: 442 Orchard Road Orchard Hotel Singapore Level 2 Orchard Hotel Singapore, Singapore 238879 Singapore
Review: Been here more than 10 times. Great food every time. Their mango chicken tartlet is a must try dimsum

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant
Location: 442 Orchard Road Orchard Hotel Singapore Level 2 Orchard Hotel Singapore, Singapore 238879 Singapore
Review: Came to hua ting tonight for dinner. Food and ambience was good, especially the Peking duck. Was served by Sophia, great service

Name: Hua Ting Restaurant
Location: 442 Orchard Road Orchard Hotel Singapore Level 2 Orchard Hotel Singapore, Singapore 238879 Singapore
Review: We celebrated our wedding anniversary at Hua Tin. We had a great time. The food was great. The manager Ms Sophia was very forthcoming with her recommendations. She was friendly and easy to talk to.

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: You may get attracted to the lovely spread in the menu, but the service attitude of the people running the place leaves a massive gap in customer-oriented mentality. Terrible service. Ended up with an unpleasant experience. Will never go back! I'm sure there are other great Spanish restaurants in Singapore.

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Went to Octapas, in Clarke Quey for dinner. Outdoor dining on the waterfront. Advertise as a tapas restaurant and did offer several small meals. We had the baked tahong, BBQ pork skewer and a mixed green salad. We enjoyed their Carlsberg draft beer with our meal. Very tasty and enjoyable.

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Was recommended to go here. We had the Calamaris, Chicken dishes, various other tapas. Interesting take on some of the tapas, food was good service not so. In fact the table next to us got up and went as the young waitress seemed to be in a dream! It was not busy! Great Location. worth a try

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: We eat here in early February when we were looking for a change of menu. We ordered 5 portions of Tapas for 2 of us and the other person had a Filipino dish. We enjoyed our food but the music coming from inside bar was so loud it was had to hold a conversation even though we were outside on the quay side.

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review:
Stopped by for drinks at Octapas. Not particularly authentic Spanish Tapas - just small plates hence taking on the name.
A decent neutral place by the waterfront.

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: I suspect I had my CC skimmed here. Card machine was brought to the table but waiter "offered to help" place CC in machine. This was the last time I used the card before my account defrauded of considerable amount using online purchases. Travellers be wary

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: So this place is in a perfect spot; It’s located at Clarke Quay with both an indoor and outdoor setting. The service was pretty slow considering it wasn’t very busy at all, there seemed to be one guy working hard and darting between tables and then one miserable girl that kept making the odd appearance. Miserable is actually an understatemen

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Good and delicious food. One of the best Spanish restaurants in Singapore. Had an amazing time with my parents at this restaurant. Must visit here !!!!!

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Stay away from this lousy tourist trap. Food was terrible and expensiv

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: My wife and I ate here before a concert because she saw grilled octopus on the menu. The outdoor seating atmosphere was very nice but the food and service were average at bes

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Great location, good live band, middling service and middling food. Very nice website makes the food look better than it really is. Our garlic mushrooms were very oily, the garlic bread pretty dry, patatas bravas were tasty. They didn’t have the cheese croquettes. It proved $30 cheaper to buy 6 individual glasses of wine on the 2 for 1 deal than buying a bottle. We sat inside after the meal to watch the band - we were the only people inside- they don’t offer 2 for 1 drinks inside so we got stung $50 for a couple of brandies. Ouch!

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Me and my friends went over at clarquay and we found this bar wherby they serve authentic filipino foods. I was blown by the foods and service renedered to us! Plus theres a band and crowd was insane! Will definitely come back to this place! Octapas we'll definitey see you again!

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: This place is great for gathering with friends and families, either for dining, chill, and of course for a party, because of its lively music. If you dont like the vibes of the music, you can enjoy the pleasant view outside. Geat selection of food as well, its a fusion of spanish and filipino dishes. FYI, Spain colonized the Philippines for 300 years, so these 2 countries have some similirities in terms of tradition, and Food of course. Anyway, this restaurant is a must try.

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: We were there for dinner during the halloween period. All the waiters were dressed up but unfortunately that where the good part ende

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Well just ordered 3 dishes and it was crap spoke to manager about the food didn’t argue about bill the potatoes were dry and old steak was tuff as , garlic bread tasteless and dry as don’t waste your time waiting for drinks that are very expensive

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review:
Popped at lunchtime for a bit to eat. Drinks half price and the tapas very reasonable. Spanish omelette very good. Just enough to fill us for more afternoon sightseeing 

Recommend

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: What a great location for a tapas ba

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Whilst looking  for somewhere to eat along Clarke Quay, we were talked into going into this restaurant. Oh what a mistake. Wine very expensive, food poor,  average service !! Would not recommend

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: We never came here for eating. After walking around Clarke Quay in the night, we were lured inside by the music we could hear from outside. And we never regretted this choice. The resident band is amazing, does a good party and knows how to engage the audience. The next night we came here again. We saw them on a Friday and Saturday night, however the next day on Sunday we noticed that another band was playing. So definitely come here on a weekend nigh

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Clarke Quay has lots to offer but not usually until a bit later in the afternoon but we stumbled across Octapas and it was open for lunch so we popped in the other week. The location is stunning, we sat outside on a table adjacent to the river and happily watched the pleasure boats and tours go past. The drinks were quite pricey but as with most places there is a ‘happy hour menu’ so if you are willing to be flexible you can do it cheaply. The NZ Sauvignon Blanc was cheaper here than most places we found in Singapore. The food was decent enough, perhaps not completely traditional tapas but it did the job for a light lunch. There were no issues with the service.

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: It seems that the crews are just waiting for customers to get drunk and they will give you a bill that is 2 of 3 times more than what you ordered. I saw the bill and threw it on the floor behind me cos I don't intend to pay since they are so dishonest. The crew saw it and gave me another bill not too long after and pretended nothing happened. I've came across a few other reviews and apparently it's a common practise for them! Such a disgrace to Singapore tourism!

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Good food. Good fun. Good live music, band is amazing awesome... Friendly service staff. Highly recommended...

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review:
Small, lousy and expensive dishes together with poor and shabby service. 
My husband’s plate was ready and they served mine after 20 minutes. 
You can find plenty of better choice on the Quay.

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: I have always liked Spanish for for its taste and flavor. I went here with a lot of hope, especially since it had a great location, being right on Clarke Quay. Sadly that was the next thing, the food left a lot to desire. The dish I ordered was floating in oil, chewy and not exactly apetizing.

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: I have just been to octapas ,being a solo traveller I was ordering for 1. It was at least 10 minutes before I was asked if I wanted a drink,I ordered a water to go with my meal, waited another 10 for anyone to ask what I wanted to eat in which time my drink still hadnt arrived so I asked for it aga

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Located in the tourist area of Clarke Quay this restaurant offers quality at a reasonable cost. The paella was slightly over cooked ( for my taste, I like it to be more liquid) but the flavours were fine. Huge selection of dishes and of course the beers are wonderfully cold.

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Stopped there expecting a tourist trap, but the food was tasty and not too expensive. The music in the inside restaurant is way too loud though, maybe to make people eat outside.

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: I love anything Spanish, specially if its served on a plate!!! YES, I have had better tapas in Spain and in UK but this was quite nice for an easy evening. They serve a super Singapore Sling as well. We went on Friday evening, so the place had an amazing vibe with a live band performance. Service was pretty good. You can sit either inside or out, but most of the outside seats were taken.

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: The atmosphere is amazing being right on the water and mix with that the people walking around and this is a perfect spot. Now the food was great! The portions were perfect to accompany the cold beer.

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: If your a fan of real Tapas then avoid this place like the plag

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Stopped here for lunch during the week. Food choices were good, service very good. Great spot to sit and watch all the Clarke Quay taxi boats go by.

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: With 2 friends in Singapore ... just made the mistake to eat at this restaurant, attracted by the nice location: ordered a paella which took ages to land on my table, probably took ages because coming straight from valencia... and during the journey it lost all the taste... as horrible, as the octopus ordered and the rest taken by my friends: incompetent cook and unfriendly staff. Totally disappointed for the price they charged me even after seeing that all their disgusting paella was totally left in the pot... go to eat somewhere else, definitely every restaurant will be better than this

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Lovely ambience , good food and terrific music . We had a great time here and would recommend without hesitation . Live Music was terrific . Rest rooms are across the street , but convenient .

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Unfortunatelly we can‘t recommend that restaurant. We ordered three different tapas. The taste was quite ok but we got each of them at a different time. First tapas what was some potatos came even quick but then the Second after approx. 15 min and the third after approx 30 min. Our expactation was to get all three at the same time what is actually normal. The waitress did apologize for that but anyway we didn‘t get any discount or something else!

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Spain meets the Phillipines in this restaura

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: ... cool live music and good tapas. As the quays are full with entertainment for the tourists so are the prices. We would not go there again but it was good for the dinner and drinks for one night.

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Back in Singapore, we decided to have lunch at Octapas. We were here just over a year ago and, not only did we once again have a lovely, casual, relaxed lunch next to the river but on reading our last review we discovered that three of the four dishes we’d chosen were the same as last time! Once again the service was friendly and, hopefully, we will return again next time we are in Singapore.

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Another top location in the quay with some great outdoor seating makes this a lovely place to relax and I thought I’d try it out for a late night meal. Unfortunately I was left a bit disappointed compared to all the other nearby options. It took a while to get any attention from the waiting staff once seated and this continued throughout the meal. I ordered the pan-seared ribeye steak with potato, mushrooms and beetroot puree main which, although served in reasonable time, was a bit chewy and fatty. For the price the portion size also left a little to be desired. Drink refills took a surprisingly long time to arrive and unfortunately one of the additional drinks I ordered didn’t turn up, despite being charged for, but at least they were happy enough to remove it from the bill once I queried

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Visited on our arrival in Singapore in the evening. Well located by the river amongst other similar eateries. The menu looked very good but I was very disappointed with the food . my fish contained 90% bones !! Although my wife's whitebait was delicious. Drinks and overall Bill was very expensive and no way did it provide value for money .. maybe I just made the wrong choice??? Staff were very good , friendly and efficient

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: The spot is nice, on the river vut the food is not good and the service eith

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Sometimes you wanna try your own food somewhere else. So this was a so called good recommendation on Google and more sites. Well as a Spanish citizen I can say this food is really bad, and has not even hot. We ordered 5 different plates, from hot till cold and all are the worst Spanish food i ever eat in my life. They don’t know even to speak or pronounce it well. So a no go if you ever want to have a taste of it. I can understand Asian people who never been in Spain, that this is delicious. But believe me, it’s really bad!

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: So enjoyed going here,so lively.the band were amazing.we had a small meal garlic bread and fries both very good,drinks galore.we were looked after by Gabriel,what a lovely young man,we just loved him from the start,I hope we keep intouch .look out for me on Facebook Sandie Miller.truly you made our night .having great staff is so important !if the service is bad people don’t return its a fact.so hold on to Gabriel he is brilliant.the location is great,we just loved it ,our last night in Singapore,sad to go home

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: We ordered 10-12 different tapas for 6 people (children of 11, 13 and 16). The tapas was good and tasteful. Service was fine and friendly. A little bit pricey but it’s Clarke Quay so everything is.

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Went there for a drink 19th Jan at at 9.30.pm, ordered two beers and gave credit card to cover $42.35. Manager returns five minutes later advising card declined and asking for cash, which I gave. The 'till' receipt showed 'REVERSAL'. I had not seen that tern before so, feeling suspicious, decided there and then to call my credit card provider in UK who advised the card had NOT been declined and that the transaction had been approved! They agreed it looked like a scam and cancelled the transaction. I told the manager one of his staff is engaged in a double payment scam and that I would report it to the police. Promptly left. Be warned.

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Attentive whilst ordering and when we were nearly finishing our first drink but no one came near us once dinner served! Had to look to for staff to get bil

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Disappointing experience for our first night in Singapore. Food was poor and overpriced. Service was very bad. We asked to pay extra for a 5th serving of each of the menu items which came as 4 servings. They were unwilling to do so - if each person wanted some then we had to order two (i.e. 8 servings). There are better places to eat around the Clarke Quay area.

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Dinner for three with different tapas. Steak, Chicken and everything was delicious. The service was friendly and attentive.

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: A nicely positioned bar restaurant by the side of the water. Service was poor but friendly enough though everything had to be asked for 2 or 3 times. It was though very entertaining because whilst the food was fairly good it didn't bear any relation to Spanish tapas. It was as if an Indian chef was tasked with producing Spanish food but not given a tapas cookbook eg. the cherizo was a frankfurter and no tomato had ever been in the vicinity of the calemares in tomatoes. Also very overpriced even for the location.

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Food is good and staff were very flexible. Drinks are bit expesive. $18 for a bottle of Sol. One of the best bands you can find - Enigma with 18 year old vocalist. Seen them play in February and December.

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: We had our family new years eve celebrations at Octapas. The food, service and location was good and we had a great night. When the bill arrived they had overcharged us for extra food and drinks and had to reprint the bill twice until it was correct... we could have potentially paid a substantial amount extra if we hadn't have checked the bill correctly, would go back and would recommend but heed this advice!

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: 42 dollars for one mojito and a mocktail. And now it is likely I got sick from it too. Thank you Octapas.

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Terrible food. My knuckle of lamb was under cooked and just all fat and gristl

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Had stopped here for a beer and tapas but the sticky table and general grime simply put us off eating here

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Based on the water, this tapas bar in Clarke Quay was a nice place for a few drinks and food. Serving 2 drinks for the price of one made the alcoholic drinks affordable and the 6 tapas dishes for $35 was also great val

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: I found my perfect place to eat. They serve really awesome food and all the staff are helpful. Great! The place is by the river so its really a perfect spot for any occasions. I will surely recommend this place and I will surely comeback.

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Arrived late in Singapore ... stopped at whatever restaurant was still open on the river close to my hot

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Octapas has been one of my favorite hang-out place in SG and it has kept me coming back over the years. Why? Great homey food, booze besides the calm of the river and if you are in the mood to party, they will have you dancing thru their live band. The food here is really something, few of my favorites are Mariscos (seafood paella) and Champinones al ajillo (mushroom sauteed in garlic, simple but a must try!) The staffs here are amazing, so attentive, warm and friendly. Overall, Octapas is a gem in SG. Thank you again Octapas!

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Was expecting good things as in popular location, but service was terrible. He waitresses looked miserable and didn’t pay any attention to us throughout the meal, also brought over the wrong drink at first. Tapas was nice but didn’t come out all together. The paella was awful.. overcooked and dry with no taste. However the manager did refund us on the paella which we were grateful for.

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Our visit to Octapas was pretty average. I’ll admit that I had high expectations given the location, which was probably the only redeeming quality of the night eating on the banks of the quay. The food was average (although the olives starter was delicious and we ended up using the juices from that to flavour the rest of our meals), service was very slow, and the manager continued to discipline the staff in front of the customers which really killed the vibe. $100+ for an average night out - I’ll try somewhere else next time thanks!

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Located in the heart of party central, Octapas is a must visit if you're looking to enjoy some great live music and great food and drinks. They take sangria to another level. The ambiance is fresh and welcoming, no matter what age group , I believe octapus appeals to all. Can't wait to go back.

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: This waterfront restaurant gave us a warm welcome. Staff we happy and friendly. Had promotions on and guided us to them. Tapas starters were excellent unfortunately the paella was a little overdone and dry. Good selection of drinks especially cocktails. This restaurant does not have its own bathrooms but a public one is only 45 seconds away. Would go back if in Singapore again.

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: We love the paella valenciana. Their wines are worth it too. Thank you to the staffs the service was great and ann for taking care of us! Will definitely come back and recommend this wonderful restaurant. Cheers!

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: There’s nothing worse than a restaurant where they get you in there, give you menus then proceed to ignore you! We did eventually order and the food was good, but tonic in the gin was flat and when we complained they didn’t do anything about it. Drinks were slow to come and when we asked for water we got two glasses for the four of us. The seafood paella was delicious. Didn’t want to wait around for desert. Lovely spot on Clarke Quay.

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Fantastic location, average food and pric

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review:
Buzzling location on the.Singapore river and skyline behind makes this restaurant worth going.

Food not bad, but also nothing exiting. Staff is 'Singapore' friendly. 

Prices, as to be expectes, quite high.

When hoing here its about location

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: as others have said, wonderful location, watching boats and people. we spent 2 hours here, which was possibly an hour too long. the food was good as noted by others, but the service was...i cannot describe. 3 times we were asked if wanted a drink, and it took so long. ordering was difficult, but when the food arrived it was well priced and enjoyable.

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: My partner and I went here for dinner. Best Spanish food in Clarke quay. Paella and sangria was faultless. Friendly service

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Lovely setting sitting outside watching the boats pass by. We enjoyed a range of dishes and a couple of drinks. The food and service were very good.

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: My family and I came here a few times and we loved it. So of course on my birthday, we would come here...aga

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: One of the few places that can make a traditional paella that is nicely toasted on the bottom and not overcooked seafoo

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Had a pleasant evening here with friends after a long day exploring Singapore. Great service with the 1 for 1 drinks making them reasonable. Went to full price after 9:30pm and better to drink cocktails than beer. Food was all very good with good range including less spiced options and even Paella which was ok for an Asian attempt. In the Clarke quay precinct which gets pretty busy as the night goes in.

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Great setting beside the river, watching the boats go back and forth and the sun sets. Very picturesqu

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Great spanish dining next to the singapore river. Situated at the best nightlife area, clark quay in Singapore. Try the vegetable Pealla with side dishes of beef cubes in olive oil and garlic and prawns. Paella preparation takes about 30-45 mins so be ready to wait for something good.

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Service was crap and food was also very average. The beef honestly tasted like it had been repeated twice. Would no recommend

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review:
We went to enjoy the views and really liked the place.
The quality of the food was very good, the sangria not that much.
Service can certainly be improved...

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Had a great table near the river so had a great view of the passing boats and lights.Was in time for the happy hour so had the Cava which was good and nicely chilled! Not that hungry but managed a couple of tapas which were tasty.Reasonable pricing as near the river and was not hurried up to vacate the table.Very relaxing evening!

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: When at Clarke Quay, usually stop in for a great red sangria. The tapas however are average, and can be hit and miss. A few we have found very good, most about average, and a few just not good...for our palette. Always very good service, which you dont always get at Clarke. Pricing seems a little high, but the sangrias have a nice buy one get one happy hour.

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: We wandered around Clark Quay in the late afternoon and found Octapas,a Spanish restaurant featuring tapas and sangria, with out door seating, right on the Singapore River. We ordered up some sangria to start, some tapas (Croquetas y queso) more sangria, more tapas (jamon iberico y accitunas), more sangria, and finally, camarones y tostadas (our favorite). Everything was very good, if not a bit pricey. It was dark by the time we left and the place became very crowded with the dinner folks. All. in all, a very good and satisfying late afternoon meal!

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Another disappointing place in Clarke quay. Busy and noisy but the quality of the food served was average indeed, lacking Spanish authenticity, and not che

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: trying to find a restaurant on the very busy clark quay , found this tapas and it was good , had a choice of 6 tapas and all was great and tasty , maybe just a bit too much olive oil but that was fine . the happy hour offering sangria was great too .

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Very nice restaurant on the banks of the river. Great views, lovely food, friendly service, child-friendly.

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: The live band plays a great music, the singer have been accommodating to our song request. Pricey “yes” definitely but we enjoy ourself on that night.

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Octapas is one of the many restaurants you'll find at Clarke Quay in Singapore, an area famous for its active night life with live bands, flashing lights, thousands of tourists roaming around, and so forth. We chanced upon this place while we were looking for a new restaurant for dinner. The place has both inside and outside seats. We opted for the outside seats overlooking the river. The inside seats were in the main restaurant where a live band was playing. Too noisy for

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Great place to eat or drink and watch the boats go by and the terrapins swim in the river. Only negative was long walk to public loos as none of their own.

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Located at the Clarke Quay end of the Read footbridge this is a very easy establishment to find. We stopped for lunch after having taken a bumboat trip around the river / mari

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: The place looks nice from the outside. Once inside it just lacked atmosphere. The food was okay at best, but we expected better.

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: The restaurant had all my favourite classic dishes and tasted great. A nice change to Asian cuisine. Restaurant is riverside and located in the heart of Clarke quay. Highly recommend

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Loved this restaurant on the river bank at Clarke Quay. Good service and wonderful food. Had to go back for another serving of the seafood paella. Great location and food.

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review:
Good tapas and great service.

Two for one drinks during middle of the day and special deals on Tapas.

This Spanish themed restaurant is worth a visit.

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Stopped here for a bite to eat when sight seeing at Clarke Quay. Very quiet but we didn’t mind. Good service. Had a lovely Singapore sling which was freshly made. Not terribly hungry but enjoyed Patatas bravas  and meatballs. All very tasty and hot.

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Wanted to have a light dinner after Aperitif. This is the best place I found in my trip. I reccomend grilled squid and melon Jabom. The staff are excellent and the location is great with good ambiance.

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: We almost didn't go in because ir looked closed from the outside. We ended up having a selection of tapas which were totally consistent with that I have eaten in Spain. Not cheap but nothing is in that area and the service charge adds up. However if you feel like Spanish food this is a good option.

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Beautifully situated on the river at Clarke Quay, the tapas menu at this restaurant was exactly what we were looking for in a light lunch. Four dishes were more than enough to share - we enjoyed the patatas bravas, garlic prawns, Spanish tomato bread and sea bass with olives and dry sherry. The service was efficient but casual and friendly. We would certainly choose to come here again.

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review:
First off the drinks were expensive...  i had Octopus which was cooked to death!   

The highlight though was the duo that were singing, they were superb!

The services was good, food mediocre especially for the price.

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Food was great. Authentic spanish dishes. We love the paella. The churros was really good! Reminds me of the time when i stayed in ciudad real Spain. Atmosphere was great. My wife loves the river view while having dinner.

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: It used to serve awesome Spanish food. The prawn Tapas and sea food Paella were some of the best I ate in Singapore. I used to go there almost every time I was in Singapore. But looks like its glory days are behind it. Now the food is reasonable without being delicious. There used to be another fantastic Spanish restaurant called Catalunya - pricey but superb - unfortunately, it has shut down.

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: We came here after seeing the Quay advertised on our hotels TV and came across this restaurant. Very quick service, we wanted to change one of the dishes in the set menu which was done without any fuss, would recommend the Singapore Sling & Chorizo with honey & red wine. Excellent food & drinks with a lovely view.

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Went there a bit late and we were glad that we found the restaurant open. We ordered the Valenciana paella and it was very good. Tinto de verano was average. Nice view but a bit overpriced

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review: Very pleasant bar next to the water. Situated adjacent to the bridge we visited a couple of times. Didn't eat here though plenty did and the main bar was very busy.

Name: Octapas Spanish Tapas Bar
Location: Blk D, #01-08 Clarke Quay River Valley Road, Singapore 179023 Singapore
Review:
Great priced authentic tapas served in Clark quay. 

Nice service and friendly staff serve here.

Great view of the quay and cool place to chill out and watch the world go by. 

Recommended, nice for couples, business or family

Name: Delhi Restaurant
Location: 64 Race Course Road, Singapore 218569 Singapore
Review:
We ordered sizzling mixed grill and the presentation was good; flambe. 
All the meat were fresh and succulent. 
Lamb kebabs were awesome.

Name: Delhi Restaurant
Location: 64 Race Course Road, Singapore 218569 Singapore
Review: Went with 9 of my colleagues, whom are from the different part of the worl

Name: Delhi Restaurant
Location: 64 Race Course Road, Singapore 218569 Singapore
Review:
Overall 3/5, very salty
Location: 3/5
Environment :3/5
Service: 3/5
Food: 3.5/5, fresh food, we had lamb and chicken curry, and a lamb fried rice , suggest!
Drinks: 3/5 masala tea and mango lassi

Name: Delhi Restaurant
Location: 64 Race Course Road, Singapore 218569 Singapore
Review: One of the oldest restaurant and still serving awesome North Indians dishes. Very consistent in portioning and taste. Love the authentic North Indians dishes served here. Ambience kept simple and cosy.

Name: Delhi Restaurant
Location: 64 Race Course Road, Singapore 218569 Singapore
Review: Not ben here since lockdown and nice to be back. Great selection of authentic Indian cuisine. Love the chicken marlai tikka for starters, and for mains I had the Delhi special - a chicken curry complete with eggs on top - celebrates the whole chicken I guess. It was very large and we didn’t manage to eat it all. The tandoori prawns were excellent - nice and juicy! Nice naan bread to dip in the curr

Name: Delhi Restaurant
Location: 64 Race Course Road, Singapore 218569 Singapore
Review: The quality of the food was good especially the sizzler. Butter chicken is a must try. Service was commendable. Great experience overall.

Name: Delhi Restaurant
Location: 64 Race Course Road, Singapore 218569 Singapore
Review: Love the food , especially mix grill sizzler.excellent service.must try chicken malai kebab and garlic naan.

Name: Delhi Restaurant
Location: 64 Race Course Road, Singapore 218569 Singapore
Review: Visited Singapore with my family for 7 days. Out of which 4 days we ordered food from Delhi 6. The dal Makhani, paneer makhani , mutton biryani, butter chicken is out of the world. Awesome food. My entire family loved it. Highly recommended

Name: Delhi Restaurant
Location: 64 Race Course Road, Singapore 218569 Singapore
Review: Was suggested by our cab driver and guide to go for lunch to this place. We ordered chicken tikka, prawns tandoor,prawns masala and butter chicken. Food was delicious and service was good. We visited this place 3 times during our holiday in Singapore. Loved it.

Name: Delhi Restaurant
Location: 64 Race Course Road, Singapore 218569 Singapore
Review: Indian waiters who according to the restaurant manager don't speak English but pretend to do so. If a customer has some specific requests for the food they are not able to execute but will always say yes to everything you request th

Name: Delhi Restaurant
Location: 64 Race Course Road, Singapore 218569 Singapore
Review:
We were hungry and tired and although it didn't look promising we sat down.
For the price charged the food was below par. Sorry guys we won't be back.

Name: Delhi Restaurant
Location: 64 Race Course Road, Singapore 218569 Singapore
Review: Their taste is great, ambience is okay. The servers are not that great, they are busy with their work. Telling this because, I went to this restaurant during lunch time, I was the only one in the restaurant, I called the servers thrice to take my orders and water they served after my request.

Name: Delhi Restaurant
Location: 64 Race Course Road, Singapore 218569 Singapore
Review: I have been going to this restaurarant since it opened so I guess about 30 years. I love their Indian food. The Bhuna Gosht is magic and the standard of all thie rother dishes are high. You want good indian food, good service and a fair price. This is your go to restaurant. You will go back!

Name: Delhi Restaurant
Location: 64 Race Course Road, Singapore 218569 Singapore
Review: After reading the other reviews in 2019 there is a common theme that our experience validated. We enjoyed the food. But, disinterested and inattentive service really degraded our experience. This seems to be a common feedback that management is not taking action on. We won’t be back and when in this area of town will go to the place three doors down the street.

Name: Delhi Restaurant
Location: 64 Race Course Road, Singapore 218569 Singapore
Review: The food at Delhi is fantastic.  Just like India!  Butter Chicken, Dahl Makhani, Mushroom matter and garlic naan.  WOW.

Name: Delhi Restaurant
Location: 64 Race Course Road, Singapore 218569 Singapore
Review: The food was too expensive and not worth the money paid. The food was just OK. Non vegetarian options were better than vegetarian.

Name: Delhi Restaurant
Location: 64 Race Course Road, Singapore 218569 Singapore
Review: Me and my friends went to this restaurant we took a sit and waited for the waiter..he came out and just stood there doing nothing he didnt even came to us and took our order!! He looks young and short just standing there using his phone..it wasnt convincing!

Name: Delhi Restaurant
Location: 64 Race Course Road, Singapore 218569 Singapore
Review: We were looking for a late lunch on our arrival to Singapore. We were staying at the Hilton nearby and walked up for some beer and food. The waitress was so rude in serving us as she was having a meeting with her friends and did not want to be bothered by us. She must be the owners daughter because the service just sucked. Bad attitude towards customers will be the end of this restaurant.

Name: Delhi Restaurant
Location: 64 Race Course Road, Singapore 218569 Singapore
Review: I visited the Delhi restaurant for dinner and had veg biryani. The food had tiny rock particles which probably came for uncleaned vegetables. The rice was half cooked and taste was blan

Name: Delhi Restaurant
Location: 64 Race Course Road, Singapore 218569 Singapore
Review: I always visit this place whenver i had a business meettings. Yummy and delicious food. Love this restaurant aa

Name: Delhi Restaurant
Location: 64 Race Course Road, Singapore 218569 Singapore
Review: We strongly recommend Delhi Restaurant.Warm welcome and pleasant service by Vipin B. Butter Chicken is excellent.

Name: Delhi Restaurant
Location: 64 Race Course Road, Singapore 218569 Singapore
Review: Delhi resto is superb.. Delicious food, amazing service... Miss Helen attends very well.. Must go.. Best in Little India for Indian food

Name: Delhi Restaurant
Location: 64 Race Course Road, Singapore 218569 Singapore
Review: Talking about this restaurant gives me the feeling of utmost satisfaction. Beginning our day with resto's 'Masala Tea' and Indian Omelette was the best part of our tr

Name: Delhi Restaurant
Location: 64 Race Course Road, Singapore 218569 Singapore
Review: The customer service was good and the food was tasty! There is also free wifi and the view is relaxing when you eat outside.

Name: Delhi Restaurant
Location: 64 Race Course Road, Singapore 218569 Singapore
Review: It took them a bit more time to serve. however the food was good in taste.they serve papad without any charge which is good to pass time till the food is served to you.

Name: Delhi Restaurant
Location: 64 Race Course Road, Singapore 218569 Singapore
Review: Visited Delhi Restaurant many times and find the quality / taste is same "GREAT"! Staff is so nice, Especially Helen is so nice and welcoming , always ready with help. We always enjoy the delicious food. We also ordered catering for our Son's birthday (at least for last 8 years) and we always got the same best food and our guests also liked the food very much.We would like to visit Delhi Restaurant again and aga

Name: Delhi Restaurant
Location: 64 Race Course Road, Singapore 218569 Singapore
Review: Visited Delhi Restaurant to redeem my Fave coup

Name: Delhi Restaurant
Location: 64 Race Course Road, Singapore 218569 Singapore
Review: Being from Delhi though to try this restaurant  ,No complaints about the food the Service is really terrible and we were not the only one complaining about it

Name: Delhi Restaurant
Location: 64 Race Course Road, Singapore 218569 Singapore
Review: The place doesn't look great but the food is really nice. The staff is very good. Wouldn't mind going again.

Name: Delhi Restaurant
Location: 64 Race Course Road, Singapore 218569 Singapore
Review: I usually don’t like writing bad reviews. I ignore most of the times. This place used to be our favourites now has stooped to the lowes

Name: Delhi Restaurant
Location: 64 Race Course Road, Singapore 218569 Singapore
Review: We chose Delhi from many restaurants in this strip as the staff were helpful but not pushy out the front. We had a very tasty Chicken Jelfrezi, Aloo Baingan, Chicken Biryani, Roti and Paratha. The food was very tasty and reasonable size portions. The staff very friendly and service efficient. We had eaten at the Banana Leaf Apolo a few nights earlier and enjoyed the Delhi much better and it was cheaper.

Name: Delhi Restaurant
Location: 64 Race Course Road, Singapore 218569 Singapore
Review: It's our first visit. We love the food and  Great Service. Must Try the Butter Chicken and Chilli Prawn.

Name: Delhi Restaurant
Location: 64 Race Course Road, Singapore 218569 Singapore
Review: A very good place for trying authentic Indian food. Good service and staff are very friendly. Good selection of signature dishes like Mix grill Sizler, Butter Chicken and Mutton Rogan Josh.. Highly recommended...

Name: Delhi Restaurant
Location: 64 Race Course Road, Singapore 218569 Singapore
Review: We went here for Friday night dinner with friends,the place was packed but we squeezed into a corner table.The service is a little chaotic but the staff do try and are helpful and smil

Name: Delhi Restaurant
Location: 64 Race Course Road, Singapore 218569 Singapore
Review: I went for dinner only to find out the fave voucher can't be used for dinner. Even before this I wasn't comfortable, the beer I'd ordered was sour, the waiter couldn't assist with menu advice and the staff are generally distant and unfriendly. Thus was before I'd asked about using our vouch

Name: Delhi Restaurant
Location: 64 Race Course Road, Singapore 218569 Singapore
Review: This is one of the better restaurants in Little India maybe as it's coming up to the annual festival they were packed and rushed off their feet still they were polite and courteous so it was really noisy which distressed my Wife. The food was average and could be improved. We had the mushroom matter, plain palak that arrived full of cheese, lamb Seth and chicken tikka. We will return in future

Name: Delhi Restaurant
Location: 64 Race Course Road, Singapore 218569 Singapore
Review: Went here with three colleagues, of which one local who insisted on this pla

Name: Delhi Restaurant
Location: 64 Race Course Road, Singapore 218569 Singapore
Review: If you are craving for naan, look no further! We had ordered a few dishes to share for both of us and it turns out great. Service was good too. I wish I know this place earlier.

Name: Delhi Restaurant
Location: 64 Race Course Road, Singapore 218569 Singapore
Review: Ate here for the first time almost 15 years ago. Came back again and I must say that the food quality is still very authentic and delicious. Service is good and price is reasonable.

Name: Delhi Restaurant
Location: 64 Race Course Road, Singapore 218569 Singapore
Review: This northern indian restaurant has been here for a very long time as I have patronised it since 1995. Good service, nice ambient, great good likt palek paneer with extra methi, butter chicken, mix grill, and many others.

Name: Delhi Restaurant
Location: 64 Race Course Road, Singapore 218569 Singapore
Review: Dinner and birthday celebration at this restaura

Name: Delhi Restaurant
Location: 64 Race Course Road, Singapore 218569 Singapore
Review: There is a lot of choice in Little India - indeed in all of Singapore - but I make a point of visiting Delhi Restaurant whenever I have a chance because the food is invariably first class. The prices are very reasonable - and there is an extensive selection of dishes available. I also like the fact that very cold beer can be purchased to go with the hot curries. You know this place does a good job because many locals eat there. To be clear: this is a relaxed family run business with a casual atmosphere. Highly recommended for a fun experience.

Name: Delhi Restaurant
Location: 64 Race Course Road, Singapore 218569 Singapore
Review: The food was delicious at this place. It was very busy at the time I went on a Sunday, so will have to take into account the service was not 5 star. There is a restaurant immediately next to it, but I liked eating inside at a floor level above the one next door!! Will return here next time in SGP.

Name: Delhi Restaurant
Location: 64 Race Course Road, Singapore 218569 Singapore
Review: Loved the food here but will probably never visit again due to it's terrible service. The starters and main course were served almost together. The staff didn't even bother to get our dessert after the meal, had to wait ten minutes to get their attention to remind them of it.

Name: Delhi Restaurant
Location: 64 Race Course Road, Singapore 218569 Singapore
Review:
We ordered palak paneer and butter chicken and these were delicious but even the very mild was too hot for my dining partner. 
I really enjoyed the meal and the cold beer was especially refreshing. 
Loved it.

Name: Delhi Restaurant
Location: 64 Race Course Road, Singapore 218569 Singapore
Review:
I went there with family for breakfast . Nice food , good service, very clean. Must recommended. Try pindi channa with poori.
Very good taste .

Name: Delhi Restaurant
Location: 64 Race Course Road, Singapore 218569 Singapore
Review: Had their lunch buffet at $15++. The Punjabi guy working there showed a disgruntled face and passed us the menu selection to choose and asked us whether we knew terms n conditions. Out of 2 starters, 1 came towards end of our meal.Kashmiri fish wasn't fresh. Chinese lady server was always on her phone. We were not entitled for the one for one masala tea as we had lunch buffet. What crap!!!

Name: Delhi Restaurant
Location: 64 Race Course Road, Singapore 218569 Singapore
Review: My wife and I enjoyed another great dinner this past Wednesday and are return customers, having eaten at Delhi Restaurant over the course of more than 15 years.
