Review: Food: had the semi-buffet dinne

Name: Brasserie Les Saveurs
Location: 29 Tanglin Road St. Regis Hotel Singapore The St. Regis Singapore, Singapore 247911 Singapore
Review:
Service Was Absolutely Amazing And The Taste Of The Food Has Been Really Improved Than The Last Time,
Most Importantly Chef Niroshan was such a decent human being checking up on us Everyday Making sure we are satisfied I'm really impressed

Name: Brasserie Les Saveurs
Location: 29 Tanglin Road St. Regis Hotel Singapore The St. Regis Singapore, Singapore 247911 Singapore
Review: I would like to compliment Sous Chef Lai Yongjia for the excellent service and delicious - Hokkien prawn noodle provided. I am really thankful as Chef Lai personally came to our table and check and do recommendations to us. Although the selection of the buffet is roughly same as what other hotels are offering, Chef Lai specially cooked something special local food for us which taste so delicious that I never had before. I will definitely come back to St. Regis for this prawn noodle and also recommend it to others.

Name: Brasserie Les Saveurs
Location: 29 Tanglin Road St. Regis Hotel Singapore The St. Regis Singapore, Singapore 247911 Singapore
Review:
Fantastic service from today’s crew- Weichi, Angel (Angie) & Ben.
You guys made the experience a whole lot better and I love that there are such collaborations.
The food is amazing too.
Thank you!

Name: Brasserie Les Saveurs
Location: 29 Tanglin Road St. Regis Hotel Singapore The St. Regis Singapore, Singapore 247911 Singapore
Review: I was at the Dior high tea session. Ms Wei Chi, Angie and Mr Ben provide a great service. I enjoyed my tea time very well.

Name: Brasserie Les Saveurs
Location: 29 Tanglin Road St. Regis Hotel Singapore The St. Regis Singapore, Singapore 247911 Singapore
Review: We went for Dior and Ruinart afternoon tea with our baby gir

Name: Brasserie Les Saveurs
Location: 29 Tanglin Road St. Regis Hotel Singapore The St. Regis Singapore, Singapore 247911 Singapore
Review: I have always liked the excellent service of St Regis Singapore staff, and in this case, Mr Alex and Ms Angel took good care of my VIP guest and myself during a dinner at Brasserie Les Saveur

Name: Brasserie Les Saveurs
Location: 29 Tanglin Road St. Regis Hotel Singapore The St. Regis Singapore, Singapore 247911 Singapore
Review: We made very last minute reservations and were accommodated and welcomed with warm smiles. The food was divine, we had the lamb and accompanying buffet. Wow. Every dish was so full of flavor and left us wanting more, even when our stomachs told us to stop! All the staff were so lovely. We were looked after by Manish and Trisha all evening as they catered to our every need and almost intuitively coming to our table as we needed. The setting is so grand and regal in its beauty And the evenings ambiance was added to so perfectly with a dapper man playing eloquent piano. Highly recommended for an evening of incredible service, breathtaking decor and delicious food. Five star on every level! Thank you for a wonderful evening. Great team effort.

Name: Brasserie Les Saveurs
Location: 29 Tanglin Road St. Regis Hotel Singapore The St. Regis Singapore, Singapore 247911 Singapore
Review: Was our first visit with my family and we were struck by the ambiance of the restaurant which was ornate and beautiful without being stuffy. We loved the semi-buffet and the wide range appetisers/desserts did cater to a range of tastebuds, although we felt that there would have been a greater range of desserts as well as the cheese and charcuteri

Name: Brasserie Les Saveurs
Location: 29 Tanglin Road St. Regis Hotel Singapore The St. Regis Singapore, Singapore 247911 Singapore
Review: I have so many experiences in many restaurants and hotels in singapore.but this hotel is an unforgettable place in my life.very delicious foods and loving staff.i met a great guy the chef mr.niroshan.he was so close to my family table sincerely.i love it...

Name: Brasserie Les Saveurs
Location: 29 Tanglin Road St. Regis Hotel Singapore The St. Regis Singapore, Singapore 247911 Singapore
Review: It was an amazing experience having my breakfast in this hotel.so clean and tidy place also the meals exactcly like european.and specially i must mention that the chef mr.niroshan,who personally came to my table and introduced all the meals according to my preferences.wooow.great.thanku.i really enjoyed with my family

Name: Brasserie Les Saveurs
Location: 29 Tanglin Road St. Regis Hotel Singapore The St. Regis Singapore, Singapore 247911 Singapore
Review: Went for the high tea, everything is wonderful. Specially thanks to Chef Lai and Chef Adrian for the knowledge on my food allergies.

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: Went for a weekday lunch here to try something different after seeing past reviews, but left unimpressed and disappointed. Food was pricey and over salted, a few popular options on the menu were unavailable and service was not that great.

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: The food was really good! We had the Kurobuta Pork Collar and Ribeye, and they were really grilled nicely. However, the service was quite slow although by the time we were there for dinner, it was already later than usual so the dinner crowd is lesser, and not all the tables were filled. We waited around 45mins for our food. Nonetheless, the service staff were really nice and friendly! I would definitely go back again for the food, but maybe on less busy timings.

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: Recently my wife and I had pretty nice lunch here. FYR, which is surprisingly to be pronounced like ‘Fire’ serves fusion asian & western type of food

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: Not sure why so so good about this restaurant by other comments. Paying too much for a piece of meat that doesn’t even taste good. The tomahawk is kind of average and the pork collar is so bad that I almost give up eating.. so hard and overcooked! The fried chicken wing is kind of average but grilled oyster kind of unique with sambal spicy sauce added. The paella is real disappointing as it just like eating your typical rice cook at home with added sauce. This is a Spanish paella and not the chinese seafood rice.. taste bland and the rice not cooked to the perfection as Spanish style... the drink is also expensive.. beer @$14 . Environment is casual but when walk to toilet, you can see the kitchen cleanliness and hygiene. The service is great but unfortunately the food quality and price not worth my visit again!

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: Nice and cosy setting with great food and a good choice of beverages. Food was amazing and super well seasoned that I really enjoyed it!

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: Had a few small dishes (pork belly, octopus, croquettes and duck foie gras) along with some mains (pasta and pork collar). The dishes are flavoursome and best to have after 1-2 drinks. There is also a good bar area for people to have a few drinks and small bites. Definitely a good place for a small group catch up.

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: Came for a birthday celebration on a weekday night, and utilised our entertainer 1 for 1 w sides and dessert. Have to say that the portions are pretty small. Our entertainer allows us to order 4 mains (3 meat dishes and 1 carb), 2 sides and 2 dessert but we were not quite satisfied after the meal, we were still hungry and have to head somewhere for more food.

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: Learnt fyr is called fire. We visited for seeking something new. We ordered three courses. No scallops for starter. Instead, they have Shimeji, cauliflower ,or watermelon. Main had a good portions. Taste was average. Main Fish and chips were huge but too greasy. Overall average.

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: Why didnt I find this out earlier!! An immense experience. Delight to the soul. The short ribs was magnificently done. Other dishes by my family were great experience too. Wide choices. We all agreed we must come back again!! Great job FYR!!

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: Had my anniversary with my girlfriend at this restaurant. The atmosphere was very comforting. I booked a reservation and the table that was reserved for me had my name and it was nicely decorated. My phone’s battery was low so they allowed me to charge my phone at their restaurant ! The waiters/waitresses were Super friendly as well as they attended to every of our need. I recommend trying their Lamb Rack & their Pistachio Malt ( dessert ) it’s the 2 things I enjoyed eating the most there ! I recommend this restaurant. Very hospitable as well.

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: I thought the food was good, nothing mind-blowing but the pork was well cooked, the oysters and foie gras were good and the pasta could have been better (sorry guys I'm just more picky about my pasta and I love the taste of freshly made pasta when I eat out). The standout here was truly the service, the staff was friendly, patient and kind and I thoroughly enjoyed my evening with them. Food was priced reasonably. Will head back again some time.

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: Food quality pretty good. Pricing is on the high side . Had medium rare Ribeye. Cut is above average and tend

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: The grilled dishes (almost all of them are) were perfectly cooked and delicious! The wine selection is limited and half of those on the list were not available. That was disappointing. The service is a bit all over the place, but they make up for lack of speed and attention with friendliness.

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: This is a great place to have guys quality meat and great beer eating / drinking session! To be honest, I over ate as it was too good! The ambience and service was friendly and the price reasonable.

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: ordered a takeaway meal box of ribeye and fries. wanted to order the foie gras ala carte but unfortunately it was not available. will be back soon to try others.

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: I loved the menu, and the food was really delicio

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: Great ribeye but mine was served with lots of fats... red wine was great pairing with the steak :) Used 1 for 1 entertainer for this.

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: Ordered snapper fillet and Ribeyes with small plate of Wagyu beef. Fish is very tasty but Ribeyes is over cook and not pipping hot Tables are small and seats are very close to the next table so quite uncomfortable. If there is no promotion, the food doesn't justify the price with the environment.

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: The medium rate lamb shank was amazing. My to-go order all the ti

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: Do not go to FYR for lunch if you are looking for a quick lunch in the middle of a business day. We waited for our food for a good 30 mins and all we ordered was a simple steak and chicken.

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: Waiter gave the wrong information. In the end the chope voucher bought is unable to use for set lunch. Had to fork out double the amount to use the voucher. Disappointed!!

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: We had the pork chop $48 and steak $40 for mains. Potato gratin and brussel sprouts for sides, $10 each. Also had a virgin mojito $1

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: My girlfriend and I were on date night after we both ended work on a Friday night. We were welcomed by very friendly and cheery staff of the restaurant. My girlfriend wasn’t too hungry so we decided to just go with 1 main. We ordered the Seafood Rice, Brussels Sprouts, Grilled Fresh Oysters and Paprika Fries with Truffle Mayo. We also ordered a bottle of Shiraz. The food and ambience was absolutely amazing, combined with the excellent service of the staff, I dare to say that it’s worth every penny. Thank you FYR for the perfect date night :’)

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: Ambience was warm and pleasant. Wait staff were attentive. Food was awesome though a lil pricey. Overall, wonderful experience. Am planning another visit soon.

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: Ordered grilled oysters, wagyu meatballs linguine and a dessert. All done beautifully. Service was excellent; the staff was able to attend to every patron quickly. The way she communicates also makes people feel relaxed and comfortable. It’s not easy considering she was the only one there juggling all the work. Overall, a very pleasant dining experience! Oh yes, do check out the vouchers that you can purchase via Chope. The savings was significant and everything tasted even better.

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: We visited the restaurant on a weekday night and ordered 1 small plate, 2 mains, 1 desserts and 1 cocktail. We saw reviews that the baked Camembert cheese was excellent and was slightly disappointed as there wasn't much of a taste to the dish. Mains were prime ribeye and pork tomahawk. Similarly the tomahawk was tough and disappointed. However the ribeye was cooked to perfection, right tenderness and marinated just right. Dessert was pistachio melt which is an innovative dish similar to the concept of chocolate lava cake! Cocktail was a different G&T, light and refreshing. Service was also attentive and prompt! I would definitely visit the restaurant again for other dishes!

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: The food was good, service was attentive. we had the oysters and the croquettes for starters, both were very good. for mains the bone-in short ribs was melt-in-your-mouth tender, rib eye steak and lamb were both flavourful.

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: Reasonably priced set lunch and food is quite good. Loved their fish and dessert, come here often with friends to catch up for lunches on weekdays and will definitely be back. My friend chose chicken which was unfortunately quite dry. Always packed during lunchtime so be sure to make reservations.

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: The waitresses were friendly and tactful in dealing with situations. thumbs up to them. The beef $48 I had however, was not good; hard and dry, did not look appetizing. I had since feedbacked this to the staff and I hope it will be worked on so it is good for future diners moving on. On the other hand, the duck leg was very good. $5 for free flow of papadums too awesome!

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: Managed to book a table for 6 on Chope for a friday night (which the restaurant is usually fully booked), only downside is the pre-authorisation on the credit card for bookings of more than 5 pa

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: Food is nice but good with entertainer deal. Kinda short of staff and some are not attentive, overall not bad experience

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: My friend recommened this place. The settings was great, the staff write your name on a stone indicating your reservation. We use that stone all the way to take photo of every dish. Ambience was superb, love the music they played (great song list chosen)

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: Second time I have eaten lunch at Fyr. Made my reservation on Chope, with a 50% mains Chope exclusive code. Greeted at the door and shown to table. Prompt to take order and top up wate

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: Second time back here, the experience was even more awesome. And with the entertainer app, you just can’t ask for more. Had the kurobuta pork and beef ribs, can’t decide which was actually better. Can’t go wrong with either. And the octopus leg....OMG

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: We had set lunch, the restaurant was packed; kitchen was slow. There was a group of more than 12 pax ahead of us, we waited for more than 30 mins for main course. Mushroom soup was yummy but cold, the barramundi was salty. The Ribeye my friend ordered was too salty and came as medium well instead of medium rare. Plus point was the dessert of the day, fruit tart. Overall experience was not pleasant as the wait was too long during lunch hours.

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: Took the FYR set lun

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: I found the Prime Ribeye very good! Highly recommend it for those who like a good steak. The garden green is quite a big portion so it’s good to share.

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: The wait team was a small one and mostly only talked to this friendly female. The food was superb with a suitable waiting time and the ambience and song selection was very apt, providing chill vibes that matched the theme of the restaurant.

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: Great service and cocktails. Grilled oysters are a must as well as baked camembert. Get the larger portion of each as you will finish it regardless. Reservations recommended. Close to Amboy and Club St afterwards.

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: Ordered the ribeye. Asked for medium raw, it came medium raw indeed with all the pink inside but it was dry, the surface was dry. The steak has no beef taste and you need to sauce else it is just chewing plain meat.

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: Was pleasantly surprised to see my name nicely written on the reserved table, food was hearty and good. Ambience chill and had a nice vibe for sure. Great for a weekend brunch or lunch for groups and family.

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: Excellent service, food and wine. T

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: What we ate tasted nice but nothing stood out. The portion size of the sides was tiny and given we were a large group, it would have been nice to get some suggestions from our server as to how much to order to cater for us all. We ordered platters as well as other smaller dishes and everything was delivered to one end of the table, meaning we had to pass large heavy platters along. One of our dishes was chicken and we sent it back to be cooked because it was raw. Our server was quite rude when she stated it was cooked sous vide but the chicken was bleeding pink so no, it wasn't cooked. It was taken back to the kitchen to be recooked and then rudely returned with an air of attitude. Not a great way to treat your paying customers. I doubt very much that I or my friends will return to this restaurant.

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: We heard wonderful reviews about service and food at fyr. So we specially took leave to visit this restaurant for lunch. Very unfortunately we were served by an unhappy Chinese waitress who made us feel we are unwelcom

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: I first stumbled upon this cosy lil place 2 yrs ago and I’ve been coming back sinc

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: Had a great experience at this place! The drinks were absolutely delicious and so were the mains. We ordered a variety of meats - lamb neck, pork ribs and pork collar. All three dishes were stunning to look at and tasted just as good. In addition, the staff was extremely attentive and friendly. Ambience is classy, but still cool and quite upbeat. Only complaint would be that the mains took too long to come our to us, but the staff did address our enquiries perfectly.

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: They write your name on a little stone tablet propped up on an easel if you've made a reservation. Cu

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: Made a call to tell staff that we like to come 1 hour earlier from our reservation timing, and service staff was agreeable and remembered upon our arriv

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: The service was amazing and food’s great. My medium rare ribeye was delicious and the pistachio melt dessert was not overly sweet, great meal altogether

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: Had a table reserved for two and arrived rather earlier than expected, but found ourselves happily surprised when the table was already ready. (it also had a cute little chalk slate with my name on i

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: Located along the busy stretch of restaurants of Boon Tat Street, the restaurant has both outdoor and indoor seating. You would likely need a reservation judging from the crowd here, and we were given a 2 hour dinner window to finish our food as we

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: This is near our office so we had set lunches here. The 3 course set consist of appetiser, main and dessert. At $25++, it’s pretty good value and v filling! The place is packed during peak lunch hours but service was still prompt and they made it a point to serve all at the table at the same time. I took pics of the desserts as they are so pretty!

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: Great food without melting your credit card! Set meal had lots of choice. All 3 dishes were tasty, interesting and good quality.

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: Service was great. The staff were always smiling, polite and helpful even though they seemed understaffed and were juggling requests from many tables. They never showed their frustrati

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: super waiting staff just that my table was a lttle hidden just a matter of getting the attention, food was good as always and perfect ambience.

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: Visited with my date on Friday evening. Had the duck foie gras, scallops, prawns & chirozo rice, bone-in short ribs, and pistachio melt with pandan ice cream. Every dish was well done, especially the dessert. Ambience and service were great as well. Will definitely be back for more! :)

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: Really tasty meat dishes and very good service in a funky environment. Not a huge wine list but ok. I will definitely go back!

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: Enjoyed a lot but in sg there are better steak options. Not good value. Suggest to consider other options.

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: The tuna belly and beef steak for starters were awesome! For the mains, the chicken was great but the fish was a little overcooked. The pistachio and pandan dessert is a must try! The chocolate cake and mousse is pretty decent too.

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: Totally love this place! The service was good and so was the food. We really had a good time there!!

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: Pork chop is very dry and food is overpriced. The dessert chocolate tart however is quite good, compared to main.

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: Try the short ribs are soft and juicy combine with brusell sprout, the dessert is okay.. overall we enjoy our dinner

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: quite disappointed that the servings are so much smaller compare to our order a few months ago. we used the entertainer app to eat but my experience using the app is that the serving size shouldnt be sacrificed. really disappointed as i had some friends with me to celebrate my birthday. there are also flies while we were having dinner which is annoying. servers are not that attentive too.

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: Booked via Chope for my father's birthday for 6 pax. The service staff were super friendly and we really enjoyed our time there. Foodwise, the steak and rice were great. The lamb was a little tough. Will return to try the tomahawk.

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: Had been wanting to go to this restaurant for some time. Found this place to have good ambience (quiet) and serves good food! The Steak & egg is very value for money given the quantity. The food quality is good too! Will go back again!

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: 50% of main course during lunch time but portion is average, the duck confit was good!! Recommend!!!

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: Love the food! The staff were friendly and service was good. Had a few refills without me asking. It was at a good price because of the 50% discount promo

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: Great ambience and awesome food. The Tomahawk Steak, Crispy Iberico Pork Belly and Duck Foie Gras are must trys! Brussels Sprouts and Asparagus sides are fantastic accompaniments to the steak. A good range of whiskeys to go along and wash erm all down.

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: It's a must try restaurant. We came here for a business lunch and I am amazed with the food.. the service is impeccable. We will surely come back to try the dinner menu soon.. Great job guys,keep it up!

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: Set lunch price is reasonable. Variety is good. However the place can be pretty noisy. So if you prefer a quiet place then might not be ideal. Other than that. All is good

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: Wanted to find a decent steak joint featured on the Entertainer app and came across FYR which seemed to have several good review

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: Not only did the owner not try to accomodate the customer's request, she also speak very rudely to customer. Not professional. The worst experience we have ever encountered

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: The food was yummy and the staff were super friendly! already booked for our next lunch! the portions were just right and price was reasonable as well.

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: Food was good, service was good. Reserved this restaurant, u are required to pay $10 per diner as deposit. I reserved for 6 but one of my friend can’t make it. We definitely ate more than 6 persons’ share, we have 5 sides, 4 mains n 1 btl of wine. I still being charge for 1 diner who didn’t turn up.

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: The ambience was great and the food was alright. Would recommend this venue for gatherings with friends.

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: Great food and great service as always. Been here numerous times and never once disappointed! Great job guys.

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: Steak was delicious, got the sear just right with the rare doneness the way I like. Service staff are polite and attentive. The menu may be being rather limited but if that means they upkeep the standards of the food, by all means!

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: We went to this place for my girlfriend's birthday. I went there earlier and was greeted by the staff. The table was set up already, with the name of the person who booked the table, and everything was in order. The staff were polite and welcoming, especially Sebastian, who was especially friendly. Sebastian also assisted in keeping the birthday cake which I brought alon

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: We had Foie Gras, it was different, had a local twist to it BUT didn’t disappoint. Flavours are excellent. The most unforgettable, the pandan and pistachio dessert! A MUST TRY.

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: My first visit to fyr was awesome, and the iberico pork is highly recommended. I’ve decided to celebrate my birthday there with my family but this second time round the atmosphere wasn’t fantastic. I was being reminded thrice that I had to leave at 8:30pm for the 2nd seating (I went at 7pm). In the end I was handed my bill at 7:53pm with the waiter saying that it’s time for the 2nd seating. I mean the servers were polite and friendly but I felt very rushed, especially for a birthday celebration, and of course I know there is a 2nd seating since I have been told from the moment of the reservation confirmation and reminded that few times throughout the dinner. I feel that the servers can cut down on the no of times of reminders since it has already been told during confirmation. The food was great but the portion for the small plates (bigger size) were still small, so bear that in mind it’s tapas siz

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: Been there a few times because they are part of the Amex love dining program. Every time I’m there, it’s always been great service. And I think I have gone there so many times that they probably recognise m

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: Great little space open on a quiet Sunday for lunch. Friendly service and a tasty scallop, prawn and rice dish that arrived promptly. Topped off with a crisp MAC’S wheat beer

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: Had a pretty unpleasant experience in Fyr. Waiter kept move my glass and forks to my left side (I’m a righty) for his convenience of placing other dishes. Another waitress spoke quite recklessly when we questioned about the coupon. She insisted to not be responsible for any promotion of the restaurant and most of her reply to our queries were “no Mdm” “ can’t Mdm”. We were treated quite badly. They sold $25 coupon worth $50 and noted that to only be “used” during 9-10pm. The waiter then declined our coupon saying we had to step in the restaurant after 9 and bill before 10pm. Waiter accused us of not reading the T&C. Asked them to show us in the T&C and they couldn’t actually find it. Then their language started to be a bit blunt that I felt like I was scolded. On TOP of all these, the food itself was quite mediocre. 2 half-sized starter and 2 main course, plus 4 glasses of bourse wine. We ended up paying $160. We were quite annoyed with the dining experience here. Won’t recommend at all.

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: Ordered their set lunch and I must say their food is really good! Appetiser squid and pork belly is a must try! Ordered their capellini and fish for lunch and while the fish is fresh and the mashed potato salad perfect, the capellini is a little too salty for our liking. Ended the meal with date cake with vanilla ice cream and it's yummy! Staff is very polite and attentive and service is great! A must-try place not only for drinks but food as well!

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: Staffs were friendly and helpful. Reserved a tomahawk steak before heading down to FYR. Super crowded but food was fantastic. Downside - provide very minimal sauce for the steak.

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: Enjoyed a wonderful Sunday lunch here with friends. The service was great – the staff were friendly, helpful and attentive. The food was excellent too. Will definitely be back!

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: Loved the food, loved the service. Lunch was delish, had the grilled oysters, scallops prawns & chorizo rice, steak, and pistachio melt. Appreciate the attention given to the presentation of the food. Would definitely be back again!

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: Get a main each and a couple of small plates to share. We had the baked camembert and crispy Ibérico pork belly from the small plates, which were both excellent. The scallops, prawns & chorizo rice was flavourful with the shaved bonito adding a nice touch. If you have room for dessert, go for the pistachio melt & pandan ice cream!*Do note that the "50% off' off-peak Chope vouchers cannot be used for sharing plates, but the "10% off" vouchers can.

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: We really enjoyed our brunch on 2Dec18.. The foods is really nice n portion is good.. will recommend my Frz and will be back again for the goods and drinks.. Comfortable n relax place for us.. Service is good and polite...

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: So, first things first... Shout out to my friend Sebastian who was spectacular throughout the evening - always attentive, kind and respectful. People like this make me really enjoy the Singapore service industry and want to go out and enjoy the fine restaurants it has to off

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: Good and bad i would put it.We asked for an additional chair for a table for 4 (but only 3 seats were occupied), and we got rejected. As we ordered champagne, we were asked to leave by 8pm due to the 2nd seating (we arrived at 6.30pm). Food for the sharing plates were good, mains were mediocre.Service from the staff were good just that we got rejected for requesting an additional chair.

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: Service was fantastic. The servers were very attentive and the food was good! More selection would be best.

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: Good atmosphere for group setting. The platter is recommended for sharing . Quality of food is superb too.

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: My wife & I walked in for an impromptu Sunday brunch at Fy

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: My Wife & myself enjoy the food very much. The staff patiently recommend us the type of food & the servicing size.

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: Excellent food but I wish the portions were bigger. The restaurant is crowded and one shd reserve a place before going.

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: This place is definitely worth a try, and continuous visits. I've visited this restaurant thrice in a month and has never been disappointed once. The manager Seb and owner Rosy are amazing personalities. That alone is sufficiently attractive for me to retu

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: We were aware that the promotion did not apply to Set Lunches. Four from a group of Six ordered from the ala-carte menu, but they would not honour it because Two ordered set menus. The promotion states that all ala-carte meals are subject to the promotion. Very disappointed, will not return. Food was average.

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: Thanks FYR.We enjoyed the brunch on Sunday because of the food and their warm hospitality. The food was yummy and I enjoyed how the restaurant had given our family a nice and quiet corner to have our meal :)

Name: fyr
Location: 19 Boon Tat Street, Singapore 069619 Singapore
Review: Just finished our family dinner, as wifee birthday. 6 of us had a great meal and being hosted by an excellent individual, M/s Ros

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: We were happy to see that this place was opened during the first day of Chinese New year. We did a booking via chope app for 8 pm. It was running full house. Staff members were prompt and tried to accommodate to everyone. We had the burrata with parma ham- this was a major surprise. The amount of ham was more than what we expected. It was tasty with the burrata and tomatoes. The duck confit was well done. The sauteed vegetabled at the sides was done well too. We opted for gluten free pasta, crab meat. That was a light tomato sauce base. Prices are reasonable. We spent a total of sgd120 for 3 dishes and two glasses of wine

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: Food ok, Service Frustratin

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review:
Amazing dining experience with authentic and fresh Italian food served.

Service was very professional and as per usual the manager’s recommendations were perfect. 

We will definitely come back 

Bravo

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review:
The food was good and flavorful. 
The aglio olio was amazing.
The service could be better and improved..

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: We have been going to Limoncello for over a year now. Everytime we are craiving for pizza and to have a relaxing dinner this is our place. Table always outside by the river, the staff is good and attentive, warm welcoming everytime we go there. Food and pizza is amazing. I have been racommended this place even to my client and all of them where delighted about the food and the good wine. Good job guys, very well done

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: Had a pleasant time with my partner as we ordered the Limoncello Pizza and Burrata Ravioli. They were also accommodating with my request of surprising her with a cake at no charge.

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: We were looking forward to our second visit and arrived after a very heavy rain. They could have offered us some extra napkins as we were obviously soaking but did not...then a waitress spilled our beer on the table and to our surprise provided no apologies. We immediately asked for a change of table which she reluctantly went to check the next booking to inform us that it was not available and started to change the table cloth without again any apologies... I thought I could expect better service here so was shocked and saddened by their standards.

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: Every dish we ordered was tasty and generously portioned. Prices are really awesome and service was fast for a packed Friday night. Me and my friends had an enjoyable meal and time there. Thank you!

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: Lobster pasta as always is great (I ordered 2) but service is pretty dismal. Booking was for 2 adults 1 kid (high chair requested at time of booking) but no high chair was provided, had to request for it 4 times with different staff before given the chair. Bread basket was not served (and I had to ask for one as a waitress walked by with 3 baskets) - so the bread basket was served 10 secs before my pasta arrived and before I could eat any bread it was taken away as the pasta was served! Very messy service - you could see the wait staff milling around but sometimes looking very confused or unclear what they are to do or which tables to serve.

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: It has one of the best pizza i've had in SG. Staffs' service are one point, helpful and always there but never intrusive. Ambience is fantastic, can even go for a nice long walk after your meals.

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: The food was great for the offer that the restaurant is offering. The service was friendly and attentive too! The only thing was that I was seated too near to the door and it became hot after a while since the door was open.

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: Everything was good except for the location of our table. Probably because we only could get a table for a limited fixed time for dining (7.00-8.30pm), we were allocate the table right next to the door to the kitchen, which made the already limited timing dining experience felt like a rather functional affair. It is a pity as the whole restaurant is actually nicely setup.

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: We frequent this restaurant every couple of weeks. Tonight, we were sat at a tiny table, just a few feet from the toilets. Not what you would expect for regulars customer

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: Their lobster pasta and squid ink pasta is fabulous. Service is excellent and plenty of bars nearby to grab a after dinner beer.

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: Nice place in front of the river with an area to walk along the river. The restaurant quite nice place, comfortable, white color with a nice light inside. Very good quality of food and very Italian flavor. All good, the pasta, the salad, the pizza. Very good and friendly service

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: Hygiene is an issue. The wine and food menu were so dirty I wish they wouldn't put them on our table. The restroom was quite scary. Only 1 toilet for the ladies and certainly make me want to drink less water. Read so much good reviews of this place but end up feeling disappointed. Asked the waiter for a good bottle of dry wine, he told me the SGD 88 bottle was good. Unfortunately, it taste more like a SGD 8 happy hour drink. As my partner eats fast, I was not even halfway into my whole fish, the waiter promptly took away the plates of my partner like in the Chinese resto. Our starter and main course are good but otherwise I really can't rave about this resto. I won't go back again till the restroom situation is better.

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: Absolutely amazing food splendid service and food comes quick, this place is one of the many Italian masterpieces. I recommend highly the Al Grancio pasta as well as the calamari. The ice cream melts in your mouth. If you get the chance to go here don’t turn it down.

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review:
Went for dinner with my family, everything was perfect, from A to Z. 

Professional and attentive service , nice recommendations from Managers and quality of food was over the TOP. 

We will come back soon 

Bravo

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: Best italian restaurant. the pizzas here are sumptous and delicious. Fresh air, river view and lush greens just outside the restaurant. Perfect for a dinner date or celebration. See you soon.

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review:
Food was yummy, service was impeccable & ambience was comfortably cozy! 
It's an excellent venue for family bonding & special occasions!

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review:
Amazing dining experience 

Food was delicious and extremely fresh, especially the Canadian Oysters, Pizza and Beef.

The service was very polite and friendly.

Highly recommended, most authentic Italian food in town with affordable prices. 

Bravo

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: A restaurant CAN NOT call a bread base with cheese a PIZZA! Extremely disappointed for the misleading information on the men

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: We ordered two pizzas and both my wife and I have spent the night suffering. I am still in bed the next day it’s so bad. They call their food a “pizza” but I call it overpriced misery. Absolutely will never eat here again.

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: I believe that first impressions do matter, and when I receive warm genuine smiles and pronto service as soon as I enter a restaurant (helping my mum in a wheelchair through the narrow entrance and adapting an appropriate space for her to sit), I am close to being sold; fingers crossed that the food meets up to expectation. The location of this restaurant along the Singapore River at Robertson Quay and its elegant white and grey decor make for an absolutely charming setting. We chose to sit at a big, bare wooden table, which contrasted with most of the more elegant white linen covered tables. It offered a lovely view of the outdoor scene through the glass wall. Service was very prompt as drinks and bread were served while we pondered on what to order. We decided to share a pizza for a starter and chose the Limoncello pizza with beef sausage, porcini and button mushrooms with white base, mozzarella and parmesan, freshly prepared in their own stone pizza oven. This turned out delicious with well-balanced flavours, something worth coming back for. For mains, we had two orders of the Veal Cutlet Milanese, one Grilled Lamb Chop (2 pieces) and two Grilled Angus Tenderloin. Although all dishes were tasty, we felt that more creativity could have gone into the sides to make them a little more unique rather than something one could easily whip up in a home kitchen. On the other hand, some people may be quite content with the simple vegetables offered with more focus on the quality and preparation of the meat. To round off the meal, we ordered Tiramisu, which was served in a glass. This was delicious, and one of the better ones we have tasted. We also ordered a portion of Profiteroles for sharing. This was also good, but could have been a tad more moisty soft. For private functions, there are two rooms to choose from, the B&W room for up to 24 diners and the Wine Cellar room for 10 to 16 diners. The restaurant, which fronts the Robertson Bridge and the shady tree-lined riverwalk, also offers alfresco dining. As it is separated from the row of cafes and restaurants further along the river, it has a quieter and larger private area that works well for us. My husband and I are looking forward to celebrating our 35th anniversary at Limoncello, and if dine-in is still not available by then (post circuit breaker), we will still order their pizza for takeaway.

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: As Italian I have to say that this restaurant serves a great quality Italian foo

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: My boyfriend and I spent our anniversary night at Limoncello - which was quite a good choice. We had such a fantastic dinner, having lovely pastas coupled with their in-house signature pizza. All's good, the restaurant manager was super accommodating and nice to our request to move to a private spot as well. Had a nice time, plus they surprised us with a cake - with happy anniversary written on it! Thank you Limoncello :) Would love to come back for the pastas again!! Definitely recommend the lobster pasta.

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: Walked in without a reservation @6.45pm on Sat 29th Feb 2020, able to accommodate but it was very busy, now know why. We ordered the Risotto (as good as can be made at home - no higher praise) and the Seafood Linguine. One of the most tasty dishes had in a long time. We only had two of the many dishes available, but based on this sample you should be more than OK.

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review:
Service was not too bad.
But cause it was really packed.
Pizza was amazing 👍🏻
Overall would recommend this place

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: Service excellent. Checked when we wanted wine, coffee etc. Food very good. Lovely outdoor seating area on walkway. We will return.

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: Only had beer and pizza but very good with wonderful customer service.  Group of 5 was quickly accommodated and offered a free dessert!

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: Fabulous restaurant, great setting, service and delicious food. Perfect for families and great outdoor area!

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: Visited this restaurant with family members for lunch on a Saturday. Ordered risotto, lobster pasta, pizza and lasagna, all of which were authentic and delicious save for the lasagna, which needed improvement as it tasted bland. Service was good. Very attentive staff. Keep up the good wor

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: Lovely restaurant situated close to the river. We were seated outside for our meal. My wife had the sea bream fillet and I had the calzone pizza. Both meals were excellent and so was the wine. Good friendly service with a smile. Well worth a visit.

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: I almost felt like I was in Italy when I ate the pizza at Limoncello, it was fabulous. The restaurant was awesome, the drinks were delicious and the service was excellent, what more could you ask for?

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: Pizza top, pasta top, appetizer top, location top ...all great! Best italian in SG and management very kind, all very good! Impressive place !

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: Top food, top service, top price... #1 Italian restaurant in Singapo

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: Best italian in Singapore! We often come for dinner to Limoncello. Definitely the best italian (and real) quality food in Singapo

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: Had dinner last night with friends! The owner Mr. Fabio and his Manager Alessio are really attentive of the business and we had a great italian pizza with fresh Antipasti. The fish in acqua pazza was amazing along with Portobello mushroom. Great place, great ambiance, all perfect!

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: Excellent pizza, great wine and great service. Thanks for a great dining experience! Will visit again soon.

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: The staff were very friendly and efficient. Our pizzas were generous in size and very tasty. The restaurant was busy and there was a pleasant atmosphere.

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: I've been frequenting Limoncello for the past 10 years and it has been consistently goo

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: Love the mushroom appetiser and fish main course. Had the room to ourselves and service crew is attentive.

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: I went a few days ago with some friends and all very well, the food very good and the excellent treatment especially of the waiter Carlos who was friendly and attentive at all times

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: Fantastic pizza by far the best made by Chef Emiddio. The crust and base - right chewiness and not dry. Highly recommended. Food is not salty which is great as it allows one to manage the salt quantity.

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: I really like parmaham pizza and also the rib eye, its taste so good, i will come here next visit to Singapore

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review:
Made online reservation and they called to check if we wanted in-or-outdoor. 
Very cosy and relaxed ambience. Great and friendly service staff. Food was really really good, from the starters to pasta and pizza and wine. Would definitely visit again.

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: There was a mixed up of booking but was quickly resolv

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: A very nice restaurant which is on the banks of the river, there is a good choice of food, service was good and the food excellent.

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: A beautiful location along the river. Relaxed atmosphere with friendly and attentive servers. I felt completely at ease eating my food on my own. I had the veal which was delicious, but after getting food envy from watching everyone else plates, I wished i had not been so conservative! A reason to return I guess. Fantastic place. Great value food.

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: This restaurant was just across the bridge form the Four Points by Sheraton hotel which we were staying in so was a convenient locati

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: Thoroughly enjoyed my time there.  Staff were extremely friendly. Food was awesome.  We even got there earlier than our reservation and they still took us in earlier.  Loved that they also played Italian must.

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: Great food, service and atmosphere. Service staff are always Attentive to kids’ needs and enjoyable dinner with family. Best calamari din town!

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: I had a wonderful dinner with my girlfriend in this Italian restaurant, the really good Italian food and the great service made us have a nice evening, I will definitely go back to this restaura

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: Nice restaurant in Robertson Quay, very quiet and relaxing area. We stayed outside with a beautiful view on the riv

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: If you want good Italian food in Singapore, Limoncello is the place to be. It’s always enjoyable to visit this place because the food is always made with the best ingredients and the food is always fresh! The people who work here are very polite, friendly and kind. I would visit this place anytime! I’ve brought friends, colleagues and family here and this place never disappoints!

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: Came to Limoncello for dinner with my friends as we were craving good and authentic Italian food. We had heard much praise for this restaurant, and our high expectations were certainly m

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: Matteo our Italian waiter was great and the food was amazing. Pizza, steak and seafood! Great to eat outside or inside with the waterfall effect wall! If you are nearby, definitely take a look and say hi to Matteo!

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: I didnt expect to have an amazing pizza in Singapore but Limoncello servied one of the tastiest pizzas i have had for a long time. Authentic Italian style crust with delicious topping and a lovely side salad washed down with the house wine. The bonus is the amazing waterfront setting and close proximity to the Copthorne Waterfront where we stayed

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: I was expecting measly portions in this quite upmarket Pasta restaurant so I was pleasantly surprised by the quite generous servings. Rather friendly staff in a nice ambience my family all had pasta and had good reviews for the taste. I on the other hand had the pizza and (like the pasta) the size of the pizza was very satisfying. I had to doggy bag it as I couldn’t finish i

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: We have eaten regularly at Limoncello, it has a great location and the core staff are friendly, food is pretty good although not cheap and the menu is very static and limited to Singapore Italian staples. Over the past few visits the ability of some of the staff to deliver what has been ordered has deteriorated badly. We have had to frequently re request items ordered at the outset including our wine order, main course dishes, water and have had the wrong items. If we go again I'll take a note pad and write the order out for them myself.

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: Have been here a number of times, very nice location on Robertson’s quay within walking distance of river valley. Lovely pizza and pasta, and the wine is also very good, but special praise has to be given to the profiteroles! Absolutely, hands down, best I’ve ever had! And that’s saying a lot!! Definitely recommend for either a casual afternoon lunch or nice dinner out!

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: Nice place and good food but a bit noi

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: My favorite was the 4 cheese pizza. It had a good portion of blue which gives it a nice lunch. The ink uni pasta was delicious.

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: Had dinner here on a Saturda

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: I was there for my very first time, in search of good italian food. I came across this restaurant in Chope and thought, why not try it since I was getting bored of my usual choices. It was located quite far from the area i usually venture around and finally found the place after some walking along the river at a corner. The restaurant felt extremely posh and I was slightly disappointed, since we didn't make any reservation, they could only place us in between two tables with customers rather than tables by the glass which were all empty. In terms of service, the servers were all male and paid good attention, not taking away our plates too quickly, and timed our meal perfectly. The wine was superb but on the higher end, as always italian wine are the BEST! I had linguine al granchio which blew me away, the crabmeat were really fresh and not too over-whelming. My partner has lamb which were perfectly cooked, partnered with mint sauce, which went really well with the red wine. Overall, I recommend people to visit the place to have great and fresh italian food, but maybe, make a reservation before hand since it seem pretty popular by the evening.

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: Menu had a great variety. We were 3 adults and 2 young adults and the food variety meant everyone's favourite Italian was available. Prices were reasonable and portions were perfect. My son loved his oven baked pizza and my daughter loved her lasagna. The adults also enjoyed our food selection of truffle pasta, lobster pasta and squid ink pasta. Good selection of wine as well. Great atmosphere. Service could be a bit more attentive considering it wasn't busy. Aside from that, we had a lovely meal and would definitely come back and also recommend the restaurant.

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: if i were born in Italy i would fly to Singapore just to eat here but thank the heavens im born in Singapore.

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: I' ve been at Limoncello last night and I had a really good dinner. I' ve been surprised because of the crowded place : the restaurant was lively and the stuff very efficie

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: This Restaurant is a really Top-notch and superb example of traditional Italian restaurant. Whenever we visit this place we get fantastic friendly service we love the meals which are perfect quality and quantity. Home made ravioli very nice.I think they have some yummy dessert. I ordered one mouth-watering home made Limoncello cake. It was delicious. Staff were great and we had a brilliant evening and we will definitely be back, thank again!

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: I always bring my family to Limoncello. The ambience is very modern and elegant, the food is very authentic and the service is welcomi

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: Excellent Italian food. We are very picky when it come to Italian cuisine, but Limoncello definitely hit the spot. They were very accommodating with our food restrictions (no dairy, no egg), and their sea urchin pasta was creamy despite the lack of dairy. Pasta was perfectly al dente. Hubs loved the bolognese (his all-time favourite). Lovely setting at Robertson Quay, family-friendly for those with kids as there is enough space for kids to wander around/play. Will come again!

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: Pleasant, convenient setting. Staff tries to be helpful. The entree I ordered and what was delivered was incorrect twice. Third attempt was accurate. The manager apologized profusely. The meal, lasagna, lacked flavor, as if the chef didn’t use salt, pepper, garlic, oregano or basil. Difficult for me to recommend given the wide selection of restaurants in Singapore.

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: You don’t only pay for the ambience but with not so cheap price you are expecting that aside from the food, the service is exceptional. This is not the first time I ate at this restaurant but this recent visit was a let down. Staff are not attentive, don’t know who is the other for and the food quality seems to be different as before. Not sure if they changed a chef but before was better.

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: very good pizza -  quality food and decent location. would recommend for a small family gathering. cozy place

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: We ordered the Limoncello pizza (crumbled beef sausage, 2 varieties of mushrooms, cheeses) and a bottle of the wine special of the month. We enjoyed our meal and wine while sitting on the restaurant's raised deck overlooking the Singapore River. We received good service that was polite but not especially friendly. We returned the following night after dinner at another restaurant and drank nightcaps on the deck. Service was friendlier since the waiter recognized us.

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: We have been going to Limoncello for a very long time now, and both the food and the service never let us down! The restaurant is managed by the kindest soul, Alessio who always makes you feel at home. I hosted an event here earlier in the year (a baby shower), and everything was done so spectacularly. Absolutely everyone from that party has gone back! Limoncello always feels like home to us! Thank you!!

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: Had a wonderful lunch visit with excellent service and on point precision to the freshness and taste of the food. Everything was lovely. Never miss the pizza, the wholemeal option adds that extra grainy punch to the taste and the tiramisu was just nice to end the beautiful meal. Can't wait to come back again to try others in the menu!

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: I feel a little harsh, as this was no worse than the service you find elsewhere in Singapore. It’s just a pity, as otherwise this was a great experience. The mixed starter (burrata, ham and veggies) was a delight, and the veal was delicious. It’s always just a little disappointing when the service lets down an otherwise good experienc

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review:
We didn't book a table. But were able to dine if out in an hour.
Food was good and service also good, we were out in time.
Fine by us, as we were flying home that night

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: Great meal here en route to

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: I had dinner at Limoncellos one evening as it was located right across the river from my hotel. It's located in a fairly quiet, low traffic area along the river, and has both indoor and outdoor seati

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: Lovely Italian restaurant right on the river, carbonara was delicious all homemade,  prices average for Singapore

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: Celebrated our 39th anniversary here, it was at the back of our hotel on the river. Great location & one of the best pizzas we’ve had since we were in Italy 35 years ago! Recommended!

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: well, the location is good, quiet and at the same time on a busy quay, wood oven make it real, pizza was better than I expected to get so far away from Napoli, though nothing exceptional, the Diavola I got, was not spicy at all, the burrata was good; prosciutto: they can do better

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: What a fantastic restaurant! As good as any in London or Rome come to that. The Cotello Millinasa with Spaghetti was excellent as was the authentic Tirrimisu. Lovely deep coffee flavour with a wonderful creamy topping. Expertly made - thanks for a great meal.

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: Service very good, excellent range of food and quality of food very good. We ate a steak (wanted and served blue) the veal and past. Plus entrée of calama

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: Great Italian Food with a nice outdoor seating next to the Singapore River. Enjoyed Pizza and Pasta. Lovely service and very dedicated owners

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: The location is nice, on Robertson Quay by the canal, & they have indoor & outdoor seati

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: Very good Italian food. Good prices and service. Very nice atmosphere - a busy place so would recommend booking ahead.

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: Traditional Italian dishes prepared with fresh ingredients. It's as close to being the as I've found outside italy

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: Visited Limoncello for a birthday celebration for my boyfriend. The reservation and instructions were all done via email. Minus a mix up on our order, the service was great and the staff were prompt. The cake was served shortly after we were done with our mains, and it was on the house! Love the ambience - very soft and low light setting. Though I'm not a lover of such lights, it did create a very cosy feeling.

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: Amazing pizza and it came so quickly and freshly made which made it delicious! The lemon sorbet was really good. Everything was really good. We recommend you to go to this restaurant.

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: This isn't the first and definitely not the last time we come back here! The Buratta cheese with Parma Ham as an Antipasti is the bomb. Their pizzas are huge in sizes and the tiramisu is to die for. Wonderful ambience, will definitely come back here as a couple and with friends!

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: Family dinner in a Sunday - it sure wasn’t crowded .. not 4 tables occupied including our

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: Sub par pizzas at expat prices. The dough is disgusting and toppings are scarce. Not sure why people like this place! Have given it a go 3 times now and I can safely say it never hits the spot. It's a shame as I really wanted to love it, and the waiters are so good!

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: Really tasty fresh pizza. The hazelnut homemade ice cream was great too and full of tasty hazelnut flavour! Nice view if you sit outside. Nice for a casual evening with friends or famil

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: Last minute visit for dinner. Reservation made for indoor seating at around 6.45pm and I was told to vacate by 7.45pm. I am fine with it provided they can served real fast. Ordered taken at around 6.50pm. Water was served first. Basket of bread was automatically brought to the table. Half Burrata was served at 7pm. Pretty fast. Anyway it’s an easy dish to make. Don’t quite like the taste of an older Parma though. Burrata has a nice milky taste. But would prefer greens with my Burrata. My Margherita pizza was served at 7.15pm. This pizza is not of my liking. Too salty and the base is too wet. If you like thick side crust, this is for you. I like the thin ones. The northern type. Next one served up was Spagetti Seafood linguine. Presentation was different. Plating looks messy but I guess the chef was trying to show the ingredients that were in the dish. It was quite nice except that you need to remove the shell from the prawns. I had Linguine Squid Ink. Find that the squids have been slightly overcooked. Tiramisu is not my style. They have more cream in it. The espresso soaked fingers are all found in the middle, very wet. If you like a tiramisu with more cream in it. You’ll like this one. At 7.35pm, waiter came by to ask if we knew that we need to vacate the table at 7.45pm. After awhile, another came by to tell us that we agreed to leave at 7.45pm on the phone when reservation was made. Yes, yes, we know. But using a little empathy and sense, gobbling down your food in less than 30 minutes? Honestly, I prefer a quiet dinner than get urged to get out quick! Servers were all polite. I think you need to be a frequent diner there to get big smiles from their personnel there!

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: Not my first visit here, but I chose to return because it was a special meal with an old friend, and I remembered the stellar service, lovely food and wonderful ambiance. We weren't disappointed of course. Will be back again.

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: This is a simple neighbourhood restaurant nearby the riv

Name: Limoncello Pizza and Grill
Location: 95 Robertson Quay Rivergate, Singapore 238256 Singapore
Review: Ordered the 4-topping pizza with ham, artichoke hearts, olives and mushrooms. My spouse said it's the best wood-fired pizza he's ever had! The pizza was about 14" and yielded 8 pieces. A filling me

Name: Beast & Butterflies
Location: 90 Robertson Quay, Singapore 238259 Singapore
Review:
Simple cocktail making with syrups of your choice.

Review: We stayed at M social for 3D2N. On the first morning, we came down at around 9am and the queue was extremely long. There were no indoor seating available and we were placed at the alfresco. The alfresco area had A LOT of pigeons walking around and almost attacking diners to scavenge for food. They were stepping all over the tables and plates of leftovers. The other diners and us were disgusted and many left without eating much. It was horrible. The food was cold at 9am too. On the second morning, we came down at 7am hoping to get a seat indoor and we did. The restaurant was clearly understaffed as our orders took some time to serve. And they kept getting our orders wrongly. The food choices was quite limited too. Overall a not very pleasant experience at beast and butterfl

Thankfully, Armando (one of their friendliest and accommodating staff) secured us a dozen. I like how they are very hands on with everyone. The overall vibe of the resto is also very chill and relaxing. We sat outside facing the riverside and I felt like I am not in Singapore. Highly recommended, we shall definitely be back. Thanks, Armando for the great experience!

Name: Beast & Butterflies
Location: 90 Robertson Quay, Singapore 238259 Singapore
Review: I and my wife check in on 28Nov 2020 to celebrate our 1 year wedding anniversary. Everything seems fine, the room was cozy and the decor make by the housekeeping team was fantastic. Only down point was the restaurant (Beast and Butterfly) where we had breakfast the following day at 9.30am, service was terrible and shocking! It came across that there was this associate name “Ma Qin” if I will to recall correctly treated her customer like a PRISONER and I’m serious about it! Upon she serving my table food, she slam the food on my table! And best of all, the food was place at the corner of the table where is not where I and my wife will seated! Furthermore, the item on the plate nearly flew off and she just walk off from our table! This is totally unacceptable and is kind of shocking! It made us felt like we are in some sort of prison Movie where prisoner food are been throw or left upon and this is not what millennium service standard are all about! Even nearby coffee shop server can serve their food with some form basic courtesy by placing the food nicely in front of the customer and not by slamming, throwing or placing the food somewhere else. On the other hand, Ma Qin seem to have a doesn’t care attitude and not a single apologise back to us. Even when I brought it up to her manager, still not a single apologise from her! Is kind of disappointing and it just got us a bad hotel experience and make us think twice if we will to celebrate any important day again at your hotel.

Review: Well I was deeply disappointed. Steak was not cooked to Rare and very fatty. Over priced poor quality food. Not as advertised or as reviewed on TripAdvisor. Service was ok until I was asked if my steak was OK, they didn't want to hear my negative comments and ignored me after that. I will not return after $65 SGD spent on a poor experience.

Name: Black Angus Steakhouse

Review: Had dinner with girlfriends.Some of us does not eat steak but there are other option available even for my friend which is a vegetarian.Service was awesome and was accommodating will be back definitely!

Name: Black Angus Steakhouse
