Review: Ambience was good, ample seating space. Choices of food wasn’t much compared to the price paid per head. There’s only 3 choices for live seafood. Staff greetings need to be improved but clearing of plates was fa

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: Ambience was good, food value for money & staffs were very approachable & friendly. Definitely will dine again with family & friends

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: Spacious and clean restaurant. Nice and relaxing ambiance. Food wise satisfactory but value for money. Affordable for working people.

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: I dined at the restaurant during the CNY festive period. The food was average, the selections were quite limited. Quite a number of dishes on the online menu were not present (even though it was already stated in the online menu itself that some food may not be availabl

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: The Mediterranean dishes makes it all worth while. 21onRajah is one of my favourite restaurant for buffet with my loved ones. The ambience is still beautiful even after many years and we will definitely come again.

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: Very happy and satisfied with the service Mr Vimel provided during my me

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: The food was good. Their service was fast as well in responding to our requests such as getting our chilled water cups refilled and getting us a finger bowl. It would’ve been better if the food were topped up during our visit there. We were there from 7 plus. My bf was looking forward to the cakes spread but the display remained empty despite the place closing at 10pm. During the birthday surprise, I received a delicious chocolate cake. The staff who brought it over, sang the birthday song together with my bf. Overall, it was a pleasant experience dining at 21 in Rajah. Will come back again!

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: Many varieties of food. Most important part, most welcoming attitude by the employees. Good environment.

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: Food quality is excellent with quite a good variety. Classy presentation and food was replenished timely. Waiters were prompt, polite and engaging. Pricing is reasonable. Will come back again.

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: Went to celebrate a friend’s birthday and they so generously offered to bring out a birthday cake without me asking. Service staff was also very friendly and proactive. Buffet spread may not be wide but it was just nice for is - we didn’t mind.

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: very nice food and good ambience. good for family as well. Best of all, it is a halal restaurant which cannot be found easily.

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: The food is tasty with local delights. Staff is friendly and helpful. Alot of dessert varieties. Design of the restaurant is very new.

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: Went with a group of 8 this time. Restaurant has good enough of spread to keep the group filled and engage in conversation.

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: Ambience is nice, bright and colourful. However, food not many variety. For gatherings and meetings will do fine.

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: Seafood range is good and good satay. Might need a bit more vegetable options. In general value for money and good for large group gatherings

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: We went on 1st Jan 2020 to celebrate my son's birthday with the rest of the family. For the price we pay, the variety of food was very few, nothing much to choose from. For the same amount of money we paid at the end, i could have gone to a better valued restauran

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: Nice neighbourhood cafe serving good quality food.Good Services. Will definitely be back again. Appreciate!

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: Really enjoyed my time with my family in celebrating my belated birthday here. The staff were friendly and kind and the food was up to my expectations. Will defenitely recommend this to others and most likely will come back again! :)

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: We totally enjoyed the juicy roast turkey - even the breast meat wasn't dry, in fact it was wonderfully moist! Everything else were totally enjoyable, especially the ambience. Service was superb.

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: Thanks for making our Christmas dinner so memorable. There is a wide range of buffet selection and all dishes are up to mark. Very attentive staff too!

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: We love going to their buffet lunch once a month. It is not too big spread but just good for some varieties yet not overly indulging. Recommended.

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: Was looking for halal buffet with reasonable budget. Good variety of buffet spread and ambience is great as well! Definitely satisfied and worth the price. Thanks 21 on Rajah for hosting us!

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: The spread was okay for the price we paid but the location was more what we paid for - because it was private and we are able to celebrate our event. Thanks 21onrajah!

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: their lamb chop are the best. assorted sushi and fresh sashimi, my kids love the chocolate fondue and the ice cream section. the best is they have the prayer room also.

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: The staff very friendly, courteous and helpf

Name: 21 on Rajah

Review: Horrible experience !!!!being charge at 55 ++ due to additional barbecue station with nothing big deal . Chef inside the Lasak station not helpful . Not pack during my visit but he show me face when I asked for a b

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: We went in a grp of 31. Had a pleasant experience and the food was good. Ambience is nice. Please check it out!

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: There was poor and limited choices today. As such the few reasonable ones like the baked fish was gone in a jiffy. But the replenishing was really slo

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: The staff are friendly and the food variety was modest with alot of dessert options. They even have a BBQ option.

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: Food was awesomely great, staff are polite, very helpful and alwayd willing to assist. The whole dinning experience was excellent.

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: Affordable and reasonably priced buffet with plenty of options for different dietary requirements and also lots of choices to choose from. This is my second trip and it did not disappoint.

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: Had a dinner gathering. It was the first for all of us. We enjoyed our dinner buffet together discussing about the food and around it. Good thing there were less crowd so we manage to hear each other talk while chomping down different delicacies until we were too full. The waitress was attentive. She ensured our glass isnt empty of plain water. The waiter..Syahmi was great too. Very accommodating from the start till we left the restaurant. Thank you and excellent service Syahmi. Will return again soonest with family this time round.

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review:
Though the spread was not overwhelming but it taste very good..awesome !!
Ideal place for family gathering or social meet up. Spacious basement carpark that link to nearby mall

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: My husband and I had a wedding package done at 21 on rajah. Mr Syahmi and Ms Nan attended to us and helped us with the organisation. Mr Syahmi kept us in the loop through all the details and was so helpful with answering all our question

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: I made a booking for a farewell lunch for my team members.The booking was at 2 pm as the apps suggested as only available time.Thus we only have half an hour to enjoy the buffet when the duty manager called me to inform.He is a malay guy whom i didnt manage to get his name,was so kind to suggest that we get the food on the table before the buffet closed. We still able to enjoy the lunch and memories together till about 3 pm eventhough I can see the staff were doing cleaning up after 2.30 pm.Well done on your excellence service.You make a big difference for us.

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: The buffet spread has enough variety and tastes great too. I like the relaxed atmosphere. The extra bonus is the 50% discount for senior citizens (aged 60 and above).

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: Food was so great! Felt like the best dinner in our lives. The buffet has lots of variety. From roast beef, fried rice, salads, desserts, to sushi.

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: From the moment we first visit 21 on Rajah during the Wedding Open House last year. We immediately fell in love with the place and we knew we wanted to have this place to celebrate a special moment with close family and friends. The ambiance and the setting of the venue was perfect for the wedding we envisione

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: Planned a surprise birthday celebration for my husband with Nan, one of the staff at the restaurant, and it was well executed. My family and I were also happy with the food offered. It was of good variety and tasted good too.

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: A decent spread but each dish is AMAZING! Worth the trip for the weekend dinner buffet. Would definitely come again. Good ambience too. Highly recommended.

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: Love the place there since it’s been halal certified and knows, Chef Faustino plus service is excellent.

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: Did a family wedding reception at 21 on rajah and Nan and team from the banquet department was really helpful and made the event a succesful one. Food was great and service from the banquet team was better. Thank you for the wonderful experience.

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: I have been repeating going to 21 on Rajah with family and they have always give the best service plus of course good spread! This time, we celebrate aunt's birthday and they give a delicious cake and sing a birthday song to her. Thank you so much! We will surely come and visit again! :)

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: We have been here a few times already, and every time, the quality of food is consistently delicious. We always love the carving station's beef rib-eye roast with a beautiful side of greens displayed - with gravy, mustard and horseradish creams on the sides! The salad bar is mediterranean inspired and so varied (eggplant! sundries tomatoes!) unlike most other buffets that make people think salads are boring. There is also tapas and antipasti. For its price, we personally feel it rivals the other higher priced popular buffets. Staff service is also good and pleasant.

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: The Snow crabs were awesome, and the staff were quick to replenish and make sure there was always more to go back for. The Roast beef, YUM. Only downside, the variety overall of all the dishes aren't that broad, but still worth the price, nice!

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: Easy to make reservation as it is online at their website. Food is nice too, vibe is good. Overall excellent would recommend!

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: We would like to express our heartfelt thanks to the staff and management of 21 on Rajah & Days hotel for making our stay and event a very memorable on

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review:
Dinner Buffet was sooo good! Range of food was just nice and quality of food is good too 👍🏼 
Would come back for more!

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: A few weeks ago, we had a memorable and unforgettable experience held the

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: not a lot of food and drinks variety to choo

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: Great family lunch ambience and Gelato!!! salted caramel and french vanilla !!! my daughters’ favoirite. Love the salad and the soup is very creamy and delicious This is our frequent restaurant since 2016!

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: Nothing so special with the food. Not much variety. The lamb was a bit hard. A little bit pricey. Although staff are friendly.

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: Our favourite place to go for buffet lunch with friends.  The food is just right and not too much.  Senior citizens like us get 50% discount.

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: My son birthday and Stephanie prepared the small cake. Thanks to 21 on Rajah for letting us use the room for prayer with abulation.will recommend to my friends and their families. Awesome!

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: for the price the food was good & delicious , very spacious seating arrangement. Staff were also friendly.

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: Variety and Quality of food was better than i expectation though is a Hala dining. Food was tasty and Service was good.

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: 2 days before i delivered my baby i was craving for their roast beef and dropped by for lunch with my bestie. To my dismay the item was not on the menu that day. I gave birth on 15 Aug and i called them 10 days later and attended by a gentleman named, Syahmi. I informed him abt my craving and intention to order the whole log of roast beef to be delivered to my home. They said they hv never done that b4 but bcos i was still under confinement they agreed to my request. On 31st aug donned with aprons, all 3 staff appeared at my doorstep to deliver the roast beef. I recognised 1 of the staff with the name tagged as Syahmi! Thank u 21 on rajah for the wonderful service and having a bunch of wonderful staff who are a real gems in the service industry!

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: where do i even start

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: Ambience is good. Food excellent and scrumptious. Staffs are helpful and attentive. Perhaps management could review to add or increase food selection.

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: It was a weekday and we were off and thus came by here for our lunch. This is a halal restaurant with a very nice and colourful design and decors, Mediterranean themed with relevant wall pictures arou

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: My family and I went to 21 on Rajah for a buffet lunch and we were delighted with the service and the food options. The restaurant is large and well-lit and the first thing that impressed me was the consideration shown by the service staff when she seated us at a table where my elderly mum-in-law would not be under the direct hit of the cold draft from the air conditioner. But what was even better was the fact that a senior citizen discount was given to all the seniors at our table, even though we had visited the restaurant on a Sunday. In our party of 6, there were 4 members who were over 60, and all 4 were only charged 50% of the buffet price. For the very reasonable range of food and the great service, this is one of the best places to go to for value for money.

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: If you love seafood, you can surely have a visit at 21 on Rajah which is connected within the Days hotel at Zhongshan Park!

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: Good spread of food and ambience. Service staff is also good and friendly. Food replenishes fast as well.

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: Firstly, the service staff was really good. The place was clean and variety of good food. I also like the relaxed ambience. Keep up the good work.

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: Service staff par excellence Vimel remembered a returning custom

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: Lots of food variety but hot beverage was limited. You get what you paid for buffet lol but can’t beat other high-end buffets. 21onRajah suitable for families.

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: Thank you for making my Dad's 90th birthday celebration such a memorable one. Special mention to Nan, Carrie, Syahmi and Exec Chef Melvin for the great service and sumptious buffet spread. 21 On Rajah is and will definitely continue to be my Dad's favourite restaurant. Thank you so much once again!!

Name: 21 on Rajah

Review: Hi Everyo

Review: Great food, great ambience, excellent service especially from Mr Syahmi who is friendly, helpful & always serves with a great smile. Will definitely recommend to others.

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: Great ambience with great food. would definitely recommend this food place to others. Would want to come again.

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: I like to mentioned Syahmi and Carrie for a great service. We are celebrating bday celebration and did not inform them earluer. Syahmi axcede to our request n even offer to take picture .Both Carrie n him is always smiling n helpful. I left my phone on the table, on realising this Carrrie quickly catch up with my group to return my phone. The food is tasty and the spread is sufficient.

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: food was great, staff was friendly and helpful. best of all, it provides prayer room for the muslim.

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: Family friendly as we have 13pax including 3 kids.  Wide selection of food variety.  Fresh sushi and seafood selection.

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: The place is conveniently located. Spacious enough to accommodate 18 of us. The food is good and they have quite a variety of spread which suits each individual's palette. The staff and crew are friendly and helpful. Lots of beautiful places around the eatery for a great photo-taking session afterwards.

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review:
Great place for gathering and makan. Great choices of food, great company amongst colleagues.And friendly staff that makes us welcome!!! 

Team OBS

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: This is review came a little late. We have a wedding reception there on 22 June 19, Nan and her staff provides one of the best service we had ever seen. They are quick to help us with any issues we encountered, one was when the groom's shoes' sole came off. Nan and the engineering team managed to get us a super glue that save the day! They are constantly asking us if everything was ok and making sure that we do. The whole experience is very smooth and fantastic. Thank you service staff, chefs and the hotel staff. Well done guys!

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: I've just celebrated my baby's first month at 21 on Rajah, and it was nothing short of amazi

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: Been here many times to celebrate birthdays and anniversaries, never failed to impress with their services and array of food. The food was the main highlight each time and arguably one of the best eating places I've been. Very delicious, savory, tasty and lots of variety. You simply have so many food to eat and every single dish is amazingly memorable and superbly made. My favorites were durian mousse, beef steak, dimsum, carrot pudding, seafood and cheese! It leaves lasting taste in your mouth till the next day! Food wise is fantast

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: It has been a memorable wedding reception at your restaurant yesterday night. This event would not be so successful without the great team at 21 on Raja

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: I was doubtful about the vegetarians options there but when I visited there, I found a variety of vegetarians dishes along with fresh juices and fruits. The best thing is that they offer both Uncut  and Cut fruits.

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: There were a lot of food to choose from.  Sushi, BBQ meat, seafood, local delicacies to name a few.   The dessert were awesome some hot churros are also available.  And the environment was very calming.

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: It was a delicious dinner. Wide selection of food and desserts. We were here last year and this year again for our Iftar. As the fasting month is coming to an end, hurry down for these superb dishes.

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: It's our 1st time here in Singapore it seems really hard to have vacation w/out experiences in SG, but because of the friendly Food Attendant and Chef we find our vacation easy and we are happy to meet the.They are very nice and they have a very good customer service . All foods are also delicious and there's a lot of choices to eat. A very good ambiance to eat so clean and nice. Everyone who go to Sg for a vacay must try to eat in this restaurant. Excellent and thank you. Surely our 2 weeks vacay here in Sg is really unforgettable . Thank you for your good service to me and my baby everyday! Nice meeting all of you God ble

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: The entire meal was great . Good and neat selection of buffet spread, excellent and attentive service ( plates were cleared regularly and the waiters were very personable and observant) but our ears took a beating with the horrible saxophone music blaring halfway through the dinner. One would expect softer easier listening music to keep the ambience cozy and comfortable but the management probably had other thoughts because the level and type of music played ruined a near-perfect experience.

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: There was a good variety of western and local dishes. The BBQ outside the main dining that does seafood and lamb was a welcome surprise. Dessert spread can be improved. The kids loved the ice cream and chocolate fondue table.

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: We had such a memorable and wonderful wedding anniversary dinner at 21 on Rajah. We surveyed their menu beforehand and were enticed by the plentiful array of international cuisine. The Mediterranean theme coupled with the Ramadan buffet promotion got us salivating all the way till Days Hotel doorstep. We were greeted warmly by the welcoming staff and led to a nice secluded couple seat near the window, just as we had requested during reservatio

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: Variety of foods is excellent, from seafood, local dishes, international options and desserts. The tastes are good although there is nothing which stands out. Good option for dinner with halal certification.

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review:
Went for lunch at 21 on rajah & it was a great experience!! Lots of food variety to choose from & helpful staff as well! Definitely worth a visit!!
Will Be back for SURE

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: Went for lunch with my bf at 21 on rajah on a weekend and all I can say it’s worth to give it a try as the food is awesome & service was great!! Keep it up guys

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: Wide selection of food and overall taste pretty good generally except for a few - satay too chewy, crayfish sauce too sweet and siput sedut gravy a bit too thick. Excellent service - prompt and friendly! We celebrated 2 birthdays and were given free slices of birthday cakes, birthday card and Polaroid pictures. Great ambience and would definitely recommend this place for family gathering!

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: Food wasn't enough, was not warm, there was no top up and very limited varie

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: The staffs were very very friendly. And it was a just nice buffet spread. However the carpark coupon was invalid! We just took the ticket and straight to exit. But the security or whoever in charge from the telecom told us that we exceeded the time limit. Which was ridiculous and ended up we have to pay for the carpark.

Name: 21 on Rajah
Location: 1 Jalan Rajah Days Hotel Singapore At Zhongshan Park Days Hotel by Wyndham Singapore At Zhongshan Park, Singapore 329133 Singapore
Review: Made a reservation online & got confirmation immediately. Food has lesser variety however they taste very good. Ambience is nice & calming.

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: We had 3 pasta dishes - crab, mushroom and lasagna. The crab pasta was good. The other were average. The restaurant was very crowded so it’s noisy. Service was good!

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: Real Italian in Singapore: feels like being back at home.... nice atmosphere, welcoming staff and very good pizza!

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: It is a place where food cooked with love is served by people with great hearts. It is my place of comfort, place for special occasions, place for celebration and also a place where I order delivery when my emotions are in sixes and sevens and I don't feel like leaving the solace of my home. I can eat the same pizza and the same calzone all the time. Its consistency in food preparation and service makes me feel so homely.

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: Food and service were excellent! It was pretty warm in the restaurant though. Stifling at times. Air con could be colder.

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: Food and service are both amazing in this place. My girlfriends brought me here to celebrate my birthday in advance and it was indeed a great one. All the staff were very accommodating despite a busy restaurant. The owner even managed to greet a few tables including ours to check if the food is to our expectations. Kudos to all the Chefs in preparing flavourful dishes served. We’ll definitely recommend this place to more friends and family.

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: For some reason the orders will arrive either very late (over 1 hour) or a mess. I tried all delivery companies including their own and if never fail, just look at the photo. There are other pizza places not worth the trouble.

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: I had trouble finding a good pizza dough in Singapore. It is for me the best pizzeria that I have eaten in SG, I have never been disappointed (4 times). I recommend the pizza with burrata and ham.

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: Peering through the door of the restaurant, I felt it was too crowded, so I chose to sit outside, where there were a few tables set up. The menu is available via a QR code, the norm nowadays given the present situatio

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: Had high hopes, having heard from someone that this is where the best pizza in Singapore is serve

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: The worst pizza / lasagna in the world. Never again. Low quality mozzarella (so bad it cannot be described) and frozen lasagna. Good luck.

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: Cosy, nice dining place that serve very nice Italian food. Love it. High recommend for anyone who like to try out delicious, authentic italian fopd!

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: We were recommended this place by family friends who swore that they did the best pizza. We went hungry for great Italian pizza and we got it!! My kids adored the pizza and I had the pasta which was wonderful. The restaurant had a great energy (Sun night) and you can tell it is a popular local haunt. We will def visit again.

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: Liked the food there before, so I ordered the delivery for Mother’s Day. We waited for more than 3 hours, called them many time but never picked

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: Amazing food and excellent service! Probably the best Italian restaurant on the East Coast. Would definitely visit again.

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: Made reservations but still had to queue outside when I reached. They should not have accepted reservations if they could not ensure there were sufficient tables available. Service was slow inside. Had to wait till 10.45pm for my mains and had forgotten to give bread when I had ordered sides. I was told that there was a minimum spending of $55 per person but there were tables which did not hit the minimum and because of that I had to order more than I could eat and had to takeaway 3/4 of my piz

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: Amongst all telhe restauramts alforno is one of the best rrstaurants ive ever been to. I tried their steak and it was off the charts. I give it a 10/10.

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: Service is bad. Food standard has dropped. Used to be one of the best Italian restaurant in the east but not so now.

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: We had dinner at this Italian restaurant at east coast area. This restaurant is famous for its pizza. The buffalo cheese pizza was something special. Service was good.

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: I gave a try on new year's eve and was able to reserve a table when I booked on that day. The restaurant was packed and we had a table without much waiting. After ordering it took more than 20 minutes before the waitress discovered the mushroom soup has not been served. This was rectified quickly and we enjoyed the mushroom soup which is thick with lots of mushroom. The maun course like Tuna steak and Lamb shank were enjoyable and on the whole it is a good dinn

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: The atmosphere, meal and service all contributed to an amazing experience. The food tasted authentic and genuine. I would definitely recommend my friends and family to go because they do not disappoint. The Burrata is fresh and creamy. The pizza crust is well baked, crispy yet the inside is still flavourful. i would also recommend the gnocchi pesto pasta as the pesto was really enjoyable too!

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review:
One of the best italian restaurants in Singapore. 
Authentic food that was top notch and service was great as well
A must to try!

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review:
All my guests were please with the food and wine.
The waitresses were attentive and helpful. 

Will return very soon.

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: The environment is cozy for kids and a great place to enjoy with friends and they serves wonderful food.

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: We’ve been loyal customers to Al Forno for many, many years now. The food and service is always top notch. Will recommend again and again.

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: Al Forno is our family's favourite Italian restauran

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: Usually, we visit Al Forno for dinner but we decided to do lunch this time. It was rather quiet and gloomy compared to dinner where the atmosphere is usually much vibrant and lively. We started with a basket of bread accompanied by olive oil and balsamic vinegar. The bread felt quite cold. I would have preferred for the bread to be a little toasty and war

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: Came by to have lunch with a friend over lunch and ordered the aglio olio. The plating of the dish was normal and it is hard to justify the price tag considering the ingredients used. Other competiting restaurants are able to offer more ingredients (e.g. eggs and bacon) but at much affordable prices. Service was normal with nothing noteworthy. Ice water is provided when requested.

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: Reserved a table online which was easy and hassle free. Service at the restaurant was good, orders were taken fast and efficiently and we didn’t have to wait long for our food. Had the Burrata Pomodoro - we found it a good starter including my kids. The salmon ai ferri was not bad. The fish was cooked just right. But the pizzas were excellent, we had the tutto funghi and con pera - no complains there.

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: Three of us had dinner which came up to $206. The seafood soup was bland. The calzone pizza and seafood pasta were also a let down. We did not even have dessert. Resolve never to visit again!

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: My son who for the last year decided he no longer liked pizza announced he really fancied some pizza. So went back to Al Forno for the first time in maybe a year. It was as busy as ever - most tables taken - but the food still arrived in a reasonable time and the service level remained dece

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: Enjoyed myself with my pal at the restaurant. Food is good and the portion is BIG - considering there were only two of us. Wld be good if the portion can be smaller cos we couldn’t finish the food in the end! When the portion is smaller, we can order more variety of dishes!

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: The best dish on the menu. Perfect for sharing as a main without heavy carbs. Too bad they don’t serve free bread anymore. A shame for such a nice restaurant. Not cool. But they did try to make it up w free dessert which was very totful. But we’d prefer the awesome bread! A neighbour gem in the East.

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review:
Had a birthday celebration, and the food was great. 
Food was served in an appropriate timing, and servers were attentive. ;)

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: It is always a joy to dine at Al Forno with friends or family. Food is always good and service is always seamlessly a piece of cake to the serving crew. Kudos and keep up the good work.

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: This has been our go-to italian restaurant. However, tonight's dinner was truly a BIG disappointment. They must have run out of pasta. There were barely any pasta in the Cartoccio (their most popular dish). Although it was suppose to feed two, it appeared that the portion has definitely shrunk. The seafood - prawns, squid were overcooked and hence came out chewy. Yet the whole dish was barely ho

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: Had a lunch reservation for 2+1 made for my husband's birthday. When we arrived, atmosphere was nice, cosy and smell of freshly fire baked pizza brought us back to when we were in Ital

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: we first went here for my birthday, and returned a few months later. the place gets busy early so make a reservation or expect to wait for a table. the pizzas are great - we love the thin/crispy crust............ the seafood and squid ink pastas are great, as are the grilled meats/lamb chops, but you need to come hungry as portions are large. good selection of wines available by the glass or by the bottle

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: Stumbled across this excellent restaurant and will be going back. The food was exceptional especially the Burrata Cheese and salad. Did read some mixed reviews on this restaurant, however, our experience was fantastic.

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: ate here after getting my a level results and it was such a nice night, the service was a little slow due to it being packed that night but i love it

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: I would give 3 ½ but I rounded up. This was suggested July my friend who loves their pasta and it was good. I had Oso Bucco and she had pasta with a nice white wine and a side of fries and meatballs. Totally filling and all good. Will definitely go again.

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: I visited this restarunt for the first time around 7 weeks ago and the pizza was marvelous and was good value for money. I had come on a monday night so the restarunt was fairly quiet and relaxed. I loved the food so much that 5 weeks later I brought my family with me on a friday. This is where the problems started. We ordered the eggplant parmeasn and it didn't taste fresh. The eggplant was chewy and it tasted like it was cooked days ago as opposed to fresh and for the high price tag on the dish that was very dissapointing. We also ordered the caprese salad and again was dissapointed as the mozeralla didn't feel fresh at all and was frankly mediorce. I decided to also order some pizza as the last time I visited the pizza was great. Sadly the pizza was just o.k, it tasted fine but was lacking in salt and other basic flavours. The ambience was alright but the lighting is very dim and made everything just feel a little strange. The service was alright no complains, the price was pretty expensive for just ok food. Its best you visit on a weekday night as they are not very crowded and the food is much better.

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: Great recommendations, friendly staff, tasty food set amidst warm lights and sweet pods of chatter. What else could a couple want on a Friday evening?

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: Highly recommended if you're craving for Italian food. Set in Katong area and walking distance to a few public parking. Food itself was main highlight with decent servings and quality ingredients. Service crew that attended to us were great. Will be back!

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: Great night out Excellent Food a Tirasamu to die for great friendly service on an exceptionally busy Saturday Night

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: Went there yesterday with my family to celebrate my birthday. Have to write a glowing review as from service to food to kid friendliness, everything was more than what we expected. Simply delighted with our meal and totally worth the price. We ordered mushroom soup, which our picky eater loved as well and pizzas were simply awesome, fresh ingredients with a great crust with nice smoky burnt edg

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: Was craving some Italian food and was lots walking along east coast road. Chanced upon alforno and going in was the best decision I made that day! Wonderful food, service and pretty affordable too! Would gladly go back again. Maybe the only downside is there is not much parking nearby so driving there may be a problem. Other than that it was an good experience overall!

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: Been here a number of times and they have never disappointed me. This time i brought my husband and 2 kids. We ordered a lagsana, carbonara for the kids and a mushroom with truffle cream pasta. Very rich and filling. Absolutely recommend. Do reserve a table in advance.

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: What’s not to like about this cosy restaurant that has been serving great Italian food in Easy Coast ? Very cosy interior and warm, friendly and very efficient service ! Chef owner personally served shooter glasses of liqueur to us ,nice touch C elebrated Christmas here in 2016 & 2018 and will be back !! Pizza is v nice and the crabmeat pasta in tomato sauce is amazinggggg !! Highly recommend this restaurant !!

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: Absolutely wonderful dinner for the three of us. Have been dining here for years and it has never disappointed. We always order the sauté vongole starters, a pizza and a pasta for a small group. I love their diablo pizza and the seafood one as well

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: staff ignored us a few times when we wanted to place our order. the food arrived 45 minutes later and it was cold and bland. we still are trying to understand how to justify the price we paid for the service and food. we requested for a side of salad but only received greens with no dressing, which we eventually had to ask for. lack of attention to details was a very upsetting mood for us al

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review:
Simply the best pizza in town.  The crust, the sauce, the toppings......all put together together perfectly.

I've been eating this pizza for years.  Dine-in or order out.  It never disappoints.  I'll devour a whole pizza and then get upset because I want more.

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: we just two of us, there is a limit on what we can order. we have enjoyed on the food there was served and decided to have a takeaway for our kids.

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: Great food with some lovely staff. Go to the East Coast Road restaraunt often and it has a great atmosphere.

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: We came here on a Sunday evening via reservation to celebrate my fiancè’s birthday with our family and it was buzzing with constant stream of peop

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: My lovely wife treated me to Sunday brunch @ tastefully Halloween setup dining atmosphere Good food with awesome advance Birthday cum Halloween celebration. Will be back...

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: My guest and I loved the melt-in-your-mouth cheese on the pizza , complimented by the aromatic mushrooms and the wonderfully crisp crust - Fresh and baked in a traditional wood fire. The pasta hit right at the heart with its delectable tomato base.Service was as usual warm and friendly.I can't wait for my next visit.

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: I visited this place when I first moved to Telok Kurau. More than 20 years later, it is still surviving at the same location. This must mean somethin

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: Love the settings, remind us of one of those neighborhood restaurants in Rome subur

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: It is one of the decent Italian restaurants in each. Very crowded but the quality of food is above average. Pizzas are pretty good. A bit pricey.

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: My husband and I went there to celebrate our 3rd year wedding anniversary. The food that we ordered were really delicious! We enjoyed the raw beef, folded pizza and steak.

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: Always wanted to try this Italian restaurant since moving into this area and finally tried it. Wouldnt say it was not good but food was mediocre. Though we booked a table but was allocated to a table which was cramped and we had a “good staring game” from the next table the whole dining session. The table was like 10cm side by side. Nevertheless the staff were attentive and polit

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: Chope worked well too....my first time to reserve thru chope ......i recommed the restaurant too for even vegetarians

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: it was a wonderful and much needed break from Asian for the family. we had pizza , salad and 2 pasta dishes. Service was top notch and we left nothing on the table. this is a great spot to have good thinner crust pizza and i suggest to make reservations

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: We were so greedy to order 3 mains and appetiser for 2 adults. But we finished all. Parking is an issue but there’s valet parking to extend their help.

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: We tried out Al Forno as we were in the neighborhood with family. We managed to park our car just outside the restaurant although it also has valet parkin

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: Sometimes you just want to eat out and know you're going to get good food, welcoming staff, reliable service, and warm familiarity. Favorites burrata, spaghetti carbonara, pizza, ravioli, penne arrabiata. Bonus: restaurant owner serves and talks to customers, regardless of how busy it gets; he always recognizes 'the regulars'. I agree that upgrading the lighting and addressing the acoustics factor would be welcoming

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: So I've been to the one in town and it is better, the decor and darkness in the East Cosst Road is tired and needs an update. But I guess the food is the most important thing and its good, not great but good, again I felt it was better in the other outlet. The service was very good friendly and efficient. This is authentic Italian food, quite rustic and all the more charming for it. I started with a simple salad, it was huge and lacked finesse, huge tomatoe segments masses of iceberg lettuce and cubes of ricotta, the dressing was tangy, I did eat it all but as I said rustic. Its aways great to see a proper pizza oven and my Al Forno was delicious, very tasty with a lovely crisp thin bake that was no hard on the teeth, a perfect crunch. The toppings were very well balanced. A great pizza. The bread basket had some nice breads, nothing to shout about and I do like to pour my own oil and balsamic! I will return for some pasta and probably have another pizza. If you like authentic rustic Italian food this is a great place to start, but I still prefer the one in town!

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: Service was quite fast and efficient, even though they  were full. We had burrata and pizza, and both were good!

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review:
The spaghetti carbonara and the pizzas were great but the grilled seafood was bland and a bit burnt. I had to ask for tobasco sauce. 

Overall, I had a pleasant experience.

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: Was there on Mother’s day with no reservations. We walked in and the waitress helped to arrange some seats for us. She managed to slot us into the 7pm slot and told us to we need to give up the table at 8pm. We went for the table of

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: I really enjoy eating her when I want to eat real Italian food. Good service but in my opinion most important: very good Pizza’s. Also great desserts and anti pasti.

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: Was there for Sunday brunch with friends. So disappointed. Not only were the brothers down at the other restaurant, the service was unorganised and quite frankly embarrassing. Nobody seemed to be in charge other than the guy pouring the wine, he did a great j

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: I actually didn't want to write this review, because I don't want you crowding into this restaurant and taking my table :). Honestly this feels like Italy when you step into the restaurant, the owner ia great and the food delicious (best pizza in Singapore!!!)... Top that with good wine for decent prices and you have a winning option for a dinner.

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: I’ve been coming here since 1997 and I still choose it as my go-to place for comfortable and familiar Italian food. Love the sauté vongole, four cheese pizza, seafood baked pasta, grilled lamb, osso bucco, squid ink pasta, and of course, the desserts - panna cotta and tiramisu.

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: The restaurant is like a real Italian restaurant. I strongly suggest to try it! The pizza is really good, the ingredients are fresh and tasty. The Location is good and service is professional. Personally I recommend it.

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: I started patronising this restaurant when they entered Singapore at Goldhill Square. It must be more than 20 years ago. I’m not sure if it’s still the same owne

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: Had a small family celebration at the restaurant and it was our first time there. Love the food and we will definitely be back again.

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: We live close by and had probably been dismissing it as ‘yet another Italian joint’ despite hearing positive reviews of i

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: First time trying out the Sunday brunch. Quality of food was superb. Refilling of food was prompt. Would definitely return again

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: Enjoyed the food, service desserts and wine.  Very consistent with their food and have been a repeat customer for years.

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: Al forno is an Italian institution for expats and locals alike who live on the East side of Singapore and the food and relaxed atmosphere makes the eating experience highly enjoyab

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: A very nice place for traditional Italian cuisine.Atmosphere is cosy and rel

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: After reading such great reviews about this place, I decided to go there with my husband for his birthday lunch. We ordered a Burrata to share which wasn't too bad though I have eaten better ones.. I ordered Spaghetti Aglio Olio with some veggies while my husband ordered Pollo In Padella and both turned out quite bad. The pasta was soaked in olive oil with no flavor whatsoever. The chicken that my husband ordered came with over-cooked and limp looking asparagus and completely runny white wine sauce. The mashed potato was also runny. Overall, it was a complete disappointment and let down. The only saving grace was their house pour Pinot Grigio. For a bill of $130 for 3 dishes you'd expect the food to be atleast decent. No complaints about the service though. Don't think will go back there any time soon.

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: Many Italian or European restaurants in Singapore offer either unimaginative food or mediocre service and sometimes both! On the contrary, Al Forno manages to deliver a good dining experience thanks to their quality of food and service. We had beef carpaccio for starters, then went for risottos and pasta. Every table had a pizza on it, therefore we decided to share a classic pizza which had fresh mozzarella and basil. The crust had beautiful wood fire charred bits which were amazing.

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: It was fairly crowded as I visited be restaurant on a Sunday. However, all the food items we ordered were pretty much average. Nothing much in particular to point out.

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review:
Good food, a little noisy as to be expected from a decent casual Itaian restaurant. Good porion sizes. Bring the children, not an issue. 
Strongly recommend that you make a reservation for dinner on weekdays and weekends.

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: Food good and service good.  Will come back again. Buratta is a must try and rest is up to you.  Wine is reasonable.

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: Visited Al Forno twice for dinner in last 3 weeks. Enjoyed the buzz and chatter of a busy restaurant. Service is consistently great, the servers are attentive without being intrusive, and always service with a smil

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: Arrived there earlier than my reservation time and was allowed to sit and wait for my friend. Ordered the squid ink linguine pasta & minced beef pizza. Their pizza was thin crust & super yummy, squid ink pasta was good but there is sand in the clam shells but still edible. The atmosphere is quite noisy and the place is quite packed on Sat night after 7.30pm.

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: Came here as couple. Enjoyed the al forno pizza and the pasta. Good size portion for the price and nice ambience. Pizza oven is a nice touch.

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: An Italian restaurant in the neighbourhood. If you are looking for good comfort food, this is the place to be. Perfect for families but not for couples as it tend to be very noisy. I can hardly hear my partner. It gets a very low rating for ambience from me. If you are looking for somewhere quiet to have a nice dinner, this is not the place to be. It is also a little pricy for a neighbourhood restaurant. Parking is also very difficult here.

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: Great little Italian place that does amazing pizza and pasta. If you are in the restaurant then you can watch your pizza being cooked in the oven. I've been to the place lots of times and always been a very good standard.

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: Ambience is very warm and welcoming. It is great for family meals or even solo meals. Price is decent and definitely value for money. The serving is large for a single portion.

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: Three of us dined. Two had pasta - spaghetti carbonara and a cheese-filled ravioli - whilst I had a diavola pizza. All were very good; defined tastes and I particularly liked the creamy sauce and bacon in the carbonar

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: Great food choices n yummy,too. Cosy ambience. Lovely helpful  staffs. We highly recommend this restaurant.

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: Authentic Italian food that was delicious with hearty portions. Wine was good too. Will definitely come back and recommend.

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: Had a beef carpaccio starter - very nice. Seafood risotto I had was very yummy, and very filling. Excellent portions! Keep it up!

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: Service staff was slow and rude. We had reservations but was made to wait for 30 minutes while they sat walk-in customers. When they were ready to sit us down, we informed them that we will fore go our reservations and left the pla

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: We've been to Al Forno on Sunday Brunch. Good value for money, great choice of food - seafood (fresh oysters, prawns, clams),  variety of pizza, pasta, meat, fish. Nice Italian homemade food and good service.

Name: Al Forno
Location: 400 East Coast Road Reddoorz Near Marine Parade Central, Singapore 428996 Singapore
Review: Food was excellent and authentic. Fire wood pizza was delicious, so are the pasta and tiramisu. Good place to chill with big group.

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: Always a reliable experience at Jim Thompson. Service is sharp. Menu is varied. Quality of food delicious. Prices are reasonable.

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: Great place for entertaining guests, celebrations . This is definitely aimed at being “ fine thai” . Not the typical simple casual thai eatery. A few thai staff on site making this place rather authentic.food is tasty. , each item averages 20+. Cocktail flavours are surprising. The crab with yellow curry was fabulous. This dish is not easy to find in Singapore and even in thailand . I love it!

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: We went here for our anniversary and the server was beyond strange. He was just staring at me the hole time. Even when I went to the bathroom to get away from him he was waiting at the door staring at me. It wasn't like he thought I was a celebrity or anything, he was just really odd. He paced back and forth in front of my table just looking me in the eye. I was weirded out completely. Needlessly to say the anniversary dinner was cut short and we went to have a relaxing time elsewhere. The food was not to the standard I thought it would be but I was so scared of the server that I didn't want to say anything. Although the environment looks nice, I would never go back there. The Thai staff I saw were very lovely, it was just this one weird male server. I can't be the first having this problem so I really hope management there does something about it. Even after I told they guy politely if he could stop constantly looking at me he continued to do it. So weird.

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: Have not been there for awhile but recent return brought back pass experiences and still so good. Great quality and high end food and  service . Keep it up!

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: Great experience.  Staff were attentive and quick to deliver.  Well presented, and enjoyable meal.  Would go again.

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: First time I dine here was about 10 years ago. This is the second time, and sadly my opinion hasn’t chang

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: Nice ambience and good tasting Thai food. From their fried prawn cake, Pandan chicken, to som tham( mango salad) were tasty. The Tom yum Kung is refreshing, while their green chicken curry and beef paneing were delicious. Their dessert of mango with glutinous rice, boiled yam with coconut milk and Katim Krop were delightful. Service is good and price is on the high end

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: I went to SG for around 8 days on vacation I ate a lot of national food from there till I miss our Thai food lol so we decided to went here for dinner and yes! It made me feel like I’m home that was amazing and all staffs are nice and friendly

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: Brilliant food (Red Curry chicken, Mango salad, green curry) in a fantastic ambience and perfect service. Worth the price every time!

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: Nice premium Thai restaurant with indoor & outdoor seating. You can visit here to shop JIM Thompson items, enjoy Thai dancing, visit Thai style house & have dinner. It is also good for Thais to get upscale quality of Thai fo

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: Best Thai vegetarian food in town with a tonne of veg options and a lovely ambience! The restaurant has a stand-alone Vegetarian à la carte menu and set lunch menu! The Veg set lunch was reasonably priced and just fantastic from start to finish. Their service was very warm as well. This is a def must-try if you are in Singapore!

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: So many vegetarian options, we took starters set,we tried yellow curry,olive rice, mango sticky rice

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: After reading all the Trip Advisor reviews, we had high expectations for this restaurant. We recently returned from a holiday in Phuket where we enjoyed delicious Thai food, and we were hoping to have a bit of the same in Singapo

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: had a very pleasant experience at Jim Thompson being my first time together with my family. had a good selection of vegetarian choices with specific requirements without shallots, onions and garlic - not on menu and restaurant is able to cater.

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: We ordered the 2 sets as starters. That was very good. Food was delicious and portion was huge too. Plus service was amazing. They sang the birthday song so beautifully. Also the decor was different from usual Singapore restaurants - high ceiling in a fusion colonial & thai style :)

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review:
Great atmosphere, excellent food and matching service!!!
An atmosphere of the old Thai, very relaxed atmosphere and a lot of space.
Great setting

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: From the outside of the resto theres already that wow factor ! The interiors of the restaurant completes the overall authentic thai experience . And what can i say about the food ... aroi makmak ( very delicious!!!)

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: True to expectations the spread and the quality of the food was outstanding - we were a family of four and everyone come away with their favourite - be it the crab cakes, salads, curries and even the a la carte morning glory. Also being my wife birthday celebrations, a message sent along with the reservation was attended - a small band with a birthday song and candle atop a tiramisu slide wa a perfect end to the lunch - the coffee at the end was perfect to end a lazy, late and fantastic lunch - dont miss the mango and rice dessert is the advice for all

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: An elegant seating , quick service, tasty food but pricey. Overall had a good experience of the restaurant.

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: Located at a corner of the city, Jim Thompson lures you with an authentic Thai experience all the way - a Thai dancer walking around, interesting Thai menu and a spacious, well-appointed ambience.

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: Great food staff and ambiance. The Thai dancers circulating around this restaurant provide a very authentic sense of Thailand.

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: after reading the great reviews we decided to book here for Christmas. We are vegetarian and the vegetarian menu was very impressive, even if it struck us that most if not all of the main dishes were deep fried. Some minutes after ordering and looking at the pictures of the suspiciously glazy food we decided to ask the kind waiter if in case they use MSG please not to cook for us. He went to the kitchen and came back saying sorry the food is ready but there is only MSG in the salt. This statement was absolute BS because there is no salt with MSG!!! It means they do not use salt, but just drench everything in glutamat! My wife only ate the rice, I ate all the rest and had a very hard digestion.
