We paid the pricey bill including the 10% service charge without being asked about the meal and left. They obviously knew that we knew. Let me remind the readers that MSG is used by lousy cooks who do not believe in their taste and specially by avid business owners who know the truth: glutamat is a very very addictive substance with lab-made chemicals that keeps people coming ba

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review:
Frequent customer to their Sunday Brunch, this time really left frustrated..
Cold food, bad service, no attention, very slow.. not sure will return..

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: Excellent service and food. My one complaint is that when we asked to take the leftovers home they did NOT pack the red curry beef - and that costed us $60.00. Would def go back again as the quality and service were good, but would order less and pack my leftovers.

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: We went there by accident and found a fantastic place, with good food and nice service. The set menu for lunch is more than enough and for a reasonable price ( 4 dishes) . Definitely not a cheap one, but you get quality food and elegant atmosphere. We will come back again.

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review:
Over rated. 
The place is nice and service ok. But that’s it. 
Thai food is basic and expensive for what it is.

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: Although there’s nice ambience and decor, there’s much better Thai food in town at more reasonable prices and the service is a letdown. One of our main dishes was served 30 mins after we finished the rest of our meal despite repeated reminders. Despite this, the restaurant insisted that we do not cancel the order and to takeaway if we don’t want to eat. This is unacceptable for a high end restaurant. We also booked a table for 10 for a family meal but were not told it’s a long table hardly conducive for a gathering. Our server was very friendly and helpful, but there’s nothing else commendable here. A big letdown.

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: I was really looking forward to eating my meal at the restaurant coz whenever we are in singapore we loved the food and was a must visit for us. But unfortunately this time it was a terrible Experience because the food quality has also really gone down and lacked the authentic flavors.

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: The menu choice was great and the food was outstanding - in terms of taste as well as presentation. Waiting time was just right.

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: One of my favourite restants, I love Thai food and this restaurant does not dissappoint. Great service too.

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: But great service really nice grounds and inside restaurant really upscale it’s just the food as you can see from TA ratings is average. Very high percentage average.

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: We had a very pleasant dinner at this beautiful restaurant in Singapore. The food was very good and the service was excellent. Our only complaint might be that we were given a table in a side room; it was near the window, which was nice, but it was isolated from the other tables in the main dining section, which would have been more fun (and was a more beautiful room). For most of the meal, we were the only couple in the room. So ask to be in the main ro

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review:
So nice to find a Thai place that does really thoughtful vegetarian food. Lots of choices too. Really tasty. Was hoping for some more intense flavors like more of Thai basil garlic or ginger flavors. And a little
More spice. But overall very good.

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: Our friends who had lived in Singapore, told us that this was their favourite Singapore restaurant. We love the Jim Thompson brand, the fabrics and handbags in Thailand, We have also visited Jim Thompson's house twice in Bangkok (1991 and 2012). The experiences have always been magical and this restaurant was no differe

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: Beautiful restaurant with a awesome ambience. Live dance and very very good Thai cuisine. It’s a wonderful complete dining experience. Would give my 100% recommendation to have a meal there

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: Jim Thompson sits close by to a number of great places to eat (Dempsey Cookhouse, Chop Suey Cafe) and doesn't disappoi

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: Jim Thompson has the most elegant & beautiful ambience with scrumptious meals that will have you filled up to the brim. They have a dedicated vegetarian menu with meals that will bring a smile to your fac

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: I really love this restaurant , very atmospheric and kind service; The Thai food is also very good and you can chose your " level" of spiciness which is very appreciable. It is just a bit too expensive considering the quantities so only for especial occasion.

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: Outstanding food, service and environment!  Jim Thompson is now my favourite restaurant in all of Singapore.

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: Atmosphere is great!  Service is generally good, but we ordered many prawn dishes without realizing, and the waitress did not highlight.  Also the seafood Tom yum soup order cake as prawn Tom Yum, although they offered to provide again the seafood Tom yum.

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: My second visit. What a wonderful time we ha

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review:
Beautiful location, old colonial house in a calm quiet hood, great ambience- but it was very disappointing to see how the food quality and taste has faded over the years. 

Try the soups, that's the only thing which still tastes great.

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review:
Back after more than a year and Quality, service and Taste keep at the highest level..
All of you can eat of delicious Thai food!!

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review:
Been here many many times! 
Always end up ordering too much but super satisfied! 

Love the betel leaves!

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: Located in an interesting colonial building near the botanical gardens, the decor is quality Royal Th

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: Incredible food and classy ambiance. Superb service but pricey menu. One of the rare Thai dinnings in Singapore. Location wise, hidden gem and needs a car to access. Definitely need reservations.

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: Went back there for lunch with some friends. This has been our go-to restaurant for anniversary and birthday dinners, but over the years the food quality has gone down. On this occasion, we ordered some appetizers (pandan chicken and golden triangle set), and some mains (veg pad thai, stir-fried fish, and some fried rice) followed by dessert. While the appetizers were great, the mains were anything but. We had to send back the pad thai, as it was watery, sweet and noodles were chewy. Surprising that a specialty Thai restaurant can not produce decent pad thai. Rest of the mains were nothing to write home about, and neither were the dessert. All in all a average experience, even though the ambience is, as always, great. Guess need to start looking for another go-to restaurant, eh!

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: P

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: best the scenery much more traditional Thai. Design on Bar is brilliant, love the crystal. Dancer beautiful! The location is great.

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: We came as a family of 5 and dined here during our vacation. Their menu is quite extensive and it was hard to decide what to eat. Finally we agreed on chicken satay, pad Thai and beef stir fry. All the dishes were good but didn't offer anything unique or something I had not had before. The restaurant itself is gorgeous with beautiful decor. It is right opposite the Singapore botanical gardens in case you wanted a bite to eat after strolling through the gardens. But don't show up in your workout clothes.

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: The building is beautiful and the interior design really nice too. Authentic artifacts, pieces of furniture et definitely contribute to a nice atmosphe

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: Jim Thompson is a good option for a change from restaurants in the CBD or Marina Bay. Only 15 mins by taxi from CBD, offers large menu and great Thai food. Building has good ambience, with a pair of Thai dancers floating around for that extra touch. Definately casual and very relaxed - plenty of families there when I dined with friends on a Wednesday evening.

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: The atmosphere is nice, the place is big, and there are two Thai ladies welcome you. The menu is rich but quite expensive. The service is sure needs to improve. That was one dish that once ordered and served looks very different. One of my friends who order it, ask to replace. The waiter just say no. We ask to speak with the chef or the management and got "cannot". We end up not touching the dish, and order a new on

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: A superbly atmospheric restaurant; colonial building and great staff. The food was good - but not terribly memorable - so go for atmosphere as opposed to a historic meal

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: We ordered tom yum soup, steamed fish, a set appetizer platter and everything was mouthwatering. The highlight was the delicious coconut icecream served inside a real coconut! The only downside was that while the food was great, it did not leave us with the feeling that the food was anything unique or special. It was definitely above average but the that came more from the quality of ingredients than from a blend of unique flavours.

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: If you want to eat high class Thai food in a very cool environment, this is the place for you. It doesn’t have the best Thai food in Singapore but the food is still amazing. The prices are steep but everything is amazing.

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: As usaual we g=had a beautiful time at Jim Thompson. food is perfect, the place is gorgeous and the atmosphere very nice.

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review:
My second visit to Singapore and my second visit to Jim Thompson restaurant 
Both visits have been fantastic 
The staff are extremely helpful and accommodating 
The food is beautifully presented and tastes delicious. There is something for everyone on the menu

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: Not the cheapest thai food around but definitely top quality in terms of decor, ambiance and service.

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: High ceiling and long Thai restaurant, cosy decor. Sunday lunch had a buffet spread for 68$ with drinks except alcohol, 98$ including. Very good spread of food from appetisers, salads to mains and desserts. Their satay, Kao tang na tang, prawn paste ball, som tam, yum neau were all great tasting. The mains from green curry, masamman curry, fried snapper, morning glory were all great tasting. Mango with sticky rice, cassava cakes were all wonderful desserts. Worth its value and taste.

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: I go to this place frequently. Food and the ambience is great. But in the last hew visits I got the impression that I am being short changed for liquor. Yesterday I.e 15 th March I ordered double rum( 60 Ml). I asked the waiter if it’s 60 ml. He called the bartender who confirmed its 60 ml. Then I asked him to get the measure. It was only 35 ml. I don’t expect a reputed restaurant like Jim Thompson to short change and take advantage of gullible customers.

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: We enjoyed this restaurant for its variety of food to fit many palates.  A little noisy as it has good attendance.  Had to work some to catch server's attention to pay bill.

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: Nestled within Dempsey Hill, this restaurant has both indoor and outdoor seating. Due to our last minute booking, we had to sit outside. I was worried about mosquitoes/ bugs at first, but it wasn't an issue at all. It turned out to be a beautiful night with a very comfortable breeze, and dining under stars couldn't be lovelie

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: Great thai food like and nice ambiant restaurant. A good place to chat with friend. Need to book in advance

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: I highly recommend it both for the food and the service. Make sure you book a table as it’s prestige makes it a very sought for restaurant.

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: Fantastic thai dinner in Dempsey Hill. Papaya salad (spicy) is awesome as a starter. Pad thai is to die for, slightly sweet but cooked to perfection. Any signature item is a must do, including drinks.

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: Beautiful  ambience. Great authentic Thai food. Fantastic service. Made the CNY eve dinner a lovely get together for the family.

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: Often found returning hee simply because the food, service and atmosphere are impeccable! The restaurant automatically transports you to Thailand with its look and fee

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: Loved the building, ambience, friendly staff and amazing food. Really like the fact that wine is linearly priced.

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: Service, ambiance, style, quality of produce is wonderful. The prawn cakes on lemongrass skewers with plum sauce are wonderful, green chicken curry is fabulous and the green mango salad is sublim

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review:
I end up going here once every other month. The food is amazingly tasty, everything from the curries, to larb, to the salads. Drinks are also well prepared and great service.

Pricing is on the high end but still worthed

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: Absolutely love Jim Thompson. The ambience, service and food all compliment each other. I go back solely for the green curry. It is truly a warm hug, always. Also highly recommend the som tam, vegetarian spring rolls, the red curry, olive fried rice and mango sticky rice and coconut ice-cream. You can't go wrong with Thai food ever and Jim Thompson perfects it, every time!

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review:
Reasonable Thai cuisine, not very spicy but enjoyable

Very attentive staff

The seating plan wasn’t conducive to ready conversation due to layout.

Toilets aren’t the best.

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: Still one of the best brunches money can buy in Singapore - quality has not changed and is still at a very high-level - staff are very friendly and courteous

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: My friends and I dined here and from the moment you arrive you receive a nice welcome. The building in which the restaurant sits is beautifu

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: Gr8 place n ambience..lovely food,lively thai ladies performing thai dance...expensive on the wallet

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: Food was ok. Expected more. Ambience superb. Service was forthcoming. But ultimately food matters most and it’s somehow missing the oomph that one would attain if dining in Thailand itself.

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review:
Love the chicken curry, steam fish with lime and chicken satay. It was delicious.
Ordered frozen margarita in a giant glass :-p, love love love

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: This restaurant has a truly brilliant and gracious vibe. It is elegant and the service is impeccable. The structure of the building is phenomenal and open and tastefully appointe

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review:
We enjoyed lunch course in this restaurant on Sat. The quality of this Thai Food is excellent. And, volume of the Lunch Course is good enough.
Sometimes, we had a chance to see the traditional dance in Thailand in this restaurant.

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: Had a quite corner for a group of twelve. The entertainment, food and service was very good. Everyone enjoyed the evening.

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: Overpriced Thai food...there's better out there for sure. Meal wasn't even spicy. My curry had a hair strand. BUT, the restaurant is beautiful.

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: We went there to celebrate my wife’s birthday. Nice environment and amazing fo

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: Highly disappointed in the quality of the vegetarian food at this supposedly high-end Thai place in Dempsey. The use of sugar is very heavy handed and over powered the Pad-tai and green curry, dishes that typically have amazing fresh flavors. All I could taste was sugar! The deep fried corn cakes had too much batter and not enough corn, they should have been much crispier and flatter.

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: Jim Thompson, Singapore has to be one of the best Thai meals I've ever ha

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: My husband & I invited a Taiwanese couple to dine at Jim Thompson. My friends would like to try Thai food in Singapore so we brought them to Jim Thompson. They were a little afraid of very spicy food so we had to be caref

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: Fantastic Thai dishes in an exquisite environment. One of the best food - if not the best - that I had in Singapo

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: Clearly Singapore prices - that part very different from Thailand! - but otherwise authentic and delicious. The ingredients are fresh, service attentive and overall experience very enjoyable. The soft shell crab pad Thai was a highlight, although the green curry was delicious too. Spicing is tailored to a western palette - don’t be afraid to go for a dish with 1 or 2 chillis next to it!

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: Probably one of the best Thai food I’ve had in a while. We ordered the soft shell crab, green curry, shrimp roll and the steamed lime fish. The soft shell crab and the green curry was astoning delicious, the sauce were so good I can get three bowls of rice just by mixing with it. The lime fish however was a little disappointing, we’re expecting it to be a little bit more acidic, nevertheless the fish is super fres

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: The food never fails to impress me. Thanks for a memorable meal. We had a vegetarian meal and the food was very good.

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: We hosted visitors to a dinner in this formal restaurant with high ceilings, elegant lighting and spacious rooms. We were greeted by staff dressed in traditional Thai attire. The service is helpful, prompt and non intrusive. We ordered some shared starters, Tom yum soup and green curry etc. ends with durian sticky rice. Everything from taste to ingredients to presentation was well prepared. No surprise is good for business functions. The menu is full of words making it hard to order for first visit. Fortunately the waitress was very helpful.

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: Been here few times and always happy with the ambience here - nice decoration, Thai dancers performance and good food and is a good spot to chill and chat with friend

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: Very good Thai restaurant in Singapore inside a colonial building. Nice environment, good food and good service

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: The restaurant never fails you. Great food (with a fully separate vegetarian menu which was a delight for 3 of our group members who are vegetarian) and great service!

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: This is probably the nicest looking thai restaurant in singapore. Housed in a colonial setting with high end furnishings, it certainly elevates the dining experience

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: By far the best Thai restaurant in Singapore located in the heart of dumpsey hills the place look fantastic with an unique atmosphere large menu they have the best curry I ever had . Just amazing

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: The restaurant itself is lovely and a great setting for a nice lunch/dinner and treat. However, service was a bit lacking and the food, whilst ok, isn't exceptional and seemingly made a bit "western" without the real Thai spice but with western pric

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: The meal was good, but it was the venue that stood out - an old colonial building highlighted by staff in traditional costume.

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: The restaurant has a very nice design. The atmosphere is classy and quiet. The menu has a very good choice of traditional Thai dishes, some that you don't often see on a menu, even in Thailand. A great number of starters and main dishes, also a choice of fixed sets. Service is very good and friendly. The prices are more or less mid-range, 500 Singapore dollars for four including starters and two bottles of wine.

Name: Jim Thompson
Location: No. 45 Minden Road Dempsey Hill, Singapore 248817 Singapore
Review: Loved the service, amazing service from Da and Lorna... great food.. these guys are located near Dempsey-Hill area. We ordered fried prawns, yellow curry and basil chicken. Prawns and chicken was yum. Coconut water was amazingly sweet... thanks JT

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: Lovely Pre-Valentine 5 course lunch. Chef Haikal & Zaini have amazed us again with a wonderfully woven tapestry of flavours that just unravels in our mouths. To top it off,  Manager Saravana and his team elevate the dining experience to a higher level with their warmth and personal attentiveness. Leave the wine selection to him. Cant wait to return.

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: 5 stars for ambience, food presentation and food taste. Very sophisticated flavours in every dish that blend in well with each other.

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: Alma lives up to its Michelin star reputation with its clever rendition of creative dishes that are tantalising to both the sight and the palate. Friendly service from Saravana and his colleagues adds further warmth to the restaurant’s cosy ambience. The price point, especially for its lunch course, makes Alma a steal-worthy Michelin experience for any culinary enthusiast looking to embark on their next gastronomic adventure.

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: Had our wedding lunch and dinner here. Food was excellent, service was great, setting was nice and cosy, manager Saravana was very attentive and put us very much at ease. Our guests also enjoyed themselves thoroughly. There were a few minor lapses in communication but we managed to sort them out or were still ok with i

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: What was once an awesome and enjoyable experience was turned into a highly overpriced mediocre place

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: Fine dining restaurant with well plated dishes. We had lunch with a set menu. There didn't seem to be much difference between the 3 course and 4 course menu If you're very hungry opt for the 4 course!The coffee and bread served as starter were excellent.

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: Went to Alma last weekend for their 5-course dinner at $198++. Made the reservation for Dec initially, then was told before our Dec date that the menu has been revised to over $300 for the festive menu and we could wait till after Jan 5 where it would be back to $178+. We waited and did as asked, and was even asked to pick our food options which I did (Hungarian goose

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: My heavenly experience in Alma began with the 100% Sangiovese red wine from San Felice Campogiovanni Brunello di Montalcino Riserva II Quercione – surely when I sipped the top 1% of all wines in the world, I knew I just had to savour the taste and let it linger, and forget about finding the words to describe the taste of this exquisite vintage. Next came Alma’s signature potato bread that oozed with aroma with its warm texture that is perfect for the spread of Bordier Smoke Butter, leaving me to crave for more, and yes, I did end up eating all three pieces served in the beautiful wooden box laden with coffee beans. My first course of today’s lunch was the popular Crispy Tofu – when my teeth sank into the tofu with the blend of wild mushroom, truffle and foie gras, it was ecstatic – the mix between hard and soft for the palate is like consuming sweet music to the ears. When the second course Boston Losbter was served, it was so picturesque I halted to admire the dish – the Angel Hair pasta and broccoli formed the mountainous terrain with the top flattened by the lobster boulders while the Hijiki Seaweed projected the source of multiple waterfalls cascading down the mountains. The finale of the 3-course lunch ended with “Poire Belle Helene” with Alma’s new dessert – with the unique pouring of passion fruit juice with (jin xuan) tea onto the vanilla poached pears, served with 72% chocolate, whipped cream and roasted almonds. I was mesmerized by the balance of flavours (the bitterness in the chocolate that contrasted with the sweetness of the pear and cream) and balance of textures (the soft juice with tea contrasted the crunch of almonds and the firm pear). If you want to experience how food could be served to titilate your palate and senses, go to Alma.

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: After trying out nearly all the fine dining places in SG, I would say Alma is by far the best restaurant in town, and excellent value for money. I just wish they had more vegetarian options to choose from so that we can visit more often. Currently the vegetarian options are a bit limited, especially with only one option for the main course for lunch.

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: Delicious food with consistent quality of food and service. The lobster angel hair pasta is always good so we have been returning every month! Their potato bread is also exceptionally good.

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: You have to trust a Michelin-Starred restaurant for this. Their freshly made signature potato bread from Alma by Juan Amador is outrageously good. Served as starter before the main course, the bread is served in a covered wooden box accompanied with coffee bea

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: We made the right choice to celebrate birthday at Alma. Great service from the staff. From amuse-bouche till dessert, every dish gave a variety of texture and surprise. Another highlight was the 2012 Z88.88 Napa Valley wine... lovely! Truly a memorable evening.

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: Awesome fine dining experience & ambiance! Attentive service by the staff from beginning to the end. With a simple One-Michelin menu, I had a 3-course lunch meal and the food was of good quality and delicio

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: Went for a birthday lunch today with 4 friends. The four course meal was superb and the different flavours of the ingredients was delightful. Appreciated the warm, friendly and personable service from Saravanan ... very attentive. Syed was also another staff who attended to us. He too was extremely service-oriented and made the birthday celebration extra specia

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: This is my 2nd time to Alma, I was very impressed with it the 1st time. All of the dishes were beautifully assembled & cooked. I like this modern European cuisine with an Asian twist. Especially the starters very creative and is like eating a piece of "art" wor

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: Went to Alma for a citibank dinner event, which also happened to be my bf birthday and the restaurant kindly arranged a birthday cake at the end of our dinn

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: I had 3 courses for lunch. Started off with bread and butter, yes could go for another portion if I wasn’t having pasta for mains. Then I had a kanpachi as a starter. For mains, I chose the Boston lobster pasta. And to end off the meal, I chose a brûlée for dessert. Overall a pleasant lunch and I would return.

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: If you all are looking for a lovely authentic Italian experience that is classy with good quality food, look no further than Alma. We were there in November and back again on Dec with friends. Won’t be our last tone. Impeccable service and they can do simple pastas for the children.

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: Love the pasta here! Super affordable lunch for casual dining. Love the appetiser. Great place for dining:) service was good too!

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: My first visit to this Michelin Star restaurant was about 5 yrs ago when they first opened. The dishes were extremely salty and the portions minuscule, I never came back - till n

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: Been here many times and their menu has improved. The seasonal Japanese beef is incredible. Would recommend that, their tofu, and the lobster pasta

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: Have heard about Alma’s Boston lobster angel hair pasta for a very long time and finally got to try it today. It surpassed all my expectations. The crispy toufu dish was excellent! Thanks to the team at Alma for the lovely experience. I look forward to my next meal here!

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: Haven’t visited in a while. The degustation is still tops. And the new dessert pears with chocolate wafers simply awesome. Consistent attentive service 👍

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: Alma never fails to impress me. They just rolled out their new seasonal menu. I went for the 3 course menu. The main dish grilled pork comes from Spanish pigs that are fed only with olive. The meat is succulent and natural sweet. The desert gives a fruity natural fresh taste to close the meal. Simply love the 5-star food and dining experience. I can understand why for lunch it is almost full house.

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: Alma restaurant offers excellent food with beautiful plating. Their service is good and the ambience is

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: Nice experience of 1-Michelin Star restaurant. Amazing by the whiskey room while touring around. The hospitality from Saravana and his team made us felt so warm and welcome. Hopefully could go back one day to dine in that whiskey room soon :)

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: Came here a few times and Alma never fail to impress. Impeccable service as well. Sara and his team are very hospitable and fun loving too. Keep up the great job.

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: Have been here a couple of times, recent visit is early Nov 2020, mostly for business lunch, good service, good food quality, reasonable price. They changes the menu frequently so its a new experience every visit. Must try their signature crispy tofu and boston lobster pasta. Tasty bread also. Recently had their new Victorian Lamb, cooked perfectly. Shoutout to Sara and team for the great service every visit.

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: Good Service from the Service staffs, the atmosphere is good. Good for Family Gathering and Couples dating

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: Went for the three-course set with colleagues and had a lovely time! Service staff were friendly and patient. They were also really kind and helpful in obliging our special request to store and serve a cake we had brought for a colleague’s birthday. Food was awesome - the bread and smoked butter were esp divine, the barramundi was juicy and the skin was so crisp, am not usually a fan of dried spaghetti but sampled my colleague’s order of the lobster angel hair pasta and absolutely loved it. I had initially thought I would not be full what with the small portion sizes, but I came away feeling really stuffed and satisfied! (Though I do wish the angel hair pasta portion was bigger!!)

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: It has been a long wait after the covid circuit breaker lockdown, my friends and I were for lunch. I had the 4 course lunch menu and was very impressed with the dishes and the plating. Overall i enjoyed the experience and my friends agreed with me. It is double thumbs up for me and also 5 out of 5!

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: Food 4 st

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: Alma is a nice and cosy place for special occasions and catch up with friends. I must compliment the restaurant staffs who were attentive to our needs and provided prompt service. Foodwise is delicious and their lunch sets stretch your dollar. Definitely worth a try.

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: We were really excited to try Alma after reading all the glowing reviews online. We were very impressed by the service quality. The wait staff was engaging, attentive and knowledgeable about the dish

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: I tried their new dessert made by Japanese anjou pear, jinxuan tea & 72% chocolate. It is refreshing and can taste the natural sweetness of pear.

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: Love the food, presentation, ambience and impeccable service. 👍🏻 Definitely worth more comeback trips!

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: Lovely setting, delicious food, great service. We all took the 4 courses lunch and enjoyed every bit of the experience in a delightful private area. I am intolerant to gluten and the chef adapted the dishes beautifully including desert. Nothing to say but praise...Thank you!

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: The restaurant service was excellent. The food was so delicious and it was a very memorable experience for me! I would highly recommend this restaurant to my friends!

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: Alma’s quality food offering and excellent service makes it a simple choice as our go-to venue for birthday and other celebrations. This time was our 30th wedding anniversary and it’s the third year in a row that we celebrated our joyous occasion at Alma. Many thanks to Saravana and team for a wonderful dining experience as always. And compliments to Chef Johari for the wonderful dishes. Even for regulars like us, we get to taste some new dishes for the first time. Many thanks again Alma team for a great evening.

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: First time they launched mooncake. With elegant box which is ideal for gift. Unique snowskin flavours to give taste bud more surprise

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: Nice ambience, attentive service, great food and beautifully presented, highly recommended and a must try

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: Celebrated my 14th wedding anniversary at Alma last night. Food was unique and sublime. More notably, the level of service was top-notch. Syed, the Restaurant Manager treated my husband and I with such care. We were given undivided attention and each dish was carefully explained. When I stepped out to go to the ladies, Syed promptly stepped in to start a conversation with my husband. As we were the last to leave, we were also given a tour of the exquisite Whisky Room, and even offered to use the room as background for some photo taking opportunities to remember the day by. Syed’s level of service was unparallel

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: My wife and I went for a set menu birthday lunch treat.  The food was delicious and beautifully presented.  The food portion in the set menu was just right. The service was good and the ambience was simple but comfortable.

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: We went there for our anniversary celebration and the food was so delicious (even their bread was so good). Coupled with comfortable ambience and excellent staff service, made us feel right at home. what more can I say? Go try out Alma too! I’m sure you’ll enjoy yourself like we did. :)

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: Came here on July 10th for my birthday, I had been waiting and thinking for years about trying a Michelin Star restaura

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: Had dinner here with my family and we chose their tasting menu. Interesting dishes although need to get use to the very small bites. Good choices of wine throughout the course

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: Very good food at reasonable price... worth the 1 star! Great service too! We had the $165 set menu and the iberico pork and wagyu short rib were very delicious... won’t recommend the Hungarian Goose though....

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: Our first wedding anniversary and our first date post circuit breaker. We really enjoyed our evening and the food gave us lots to talk about. There is no questioning the skill and attention to detail the Chef and front of house team put into their restaurant and it was good to see the restaurant getting busy again. I can’t say every dish was to our taste but that’s only a matter of personal preference and certainly didn’t detract from a very enjoyable evening. Thanks

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: The food was an awesome culinary experience. Manager Saravana’s excellent service definitely adds to the experience. 10/10

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: Wife brought me here for a birthday treat, where we had their 4 course dinner set. Each dish was carefully prepared and served, with the service manager carefully explaining to you each dish. We also opted to try the additional pastries prepared by the pastry chef, and my wife loved the berry tart. Service was extremely friendly and good. And of course, we masked up after the meal.

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: We had the 5-course menu at Alma and were blown away! The food, wine and service were excellent. In particular, Saravana the manager was exceptional, warm and friendly. We loved the Pork Jowl & bread with homemade butter. Will definitely be back :-)

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: Great food and wonderful service!  Loved the bread and tofu - the fois gras emulsion was fantastic!  So happy we went and will be back soon!

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: Wow! Amazing dinner! So glad they open at 5pm cos I like to eat early! Excellent service. Food wise,they only had delivery menu or father's day menu today because government suddenly announced phase 2 opening, but Alma was still great. Highly recommend! Love their value for money and great service staff!

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: I've been going to Alma since it opened and have always found it to be reliably fantastic value for very good food. Since restaurants closed for the pandemic, my dinner group has been actively ordering from restaurants we hope will survive this tough time, and Alma has been consistently the best of the takeout options to date. The weekend sets are delicious and come with clear instructions (including plating). Portions are generous and the dishes are curated to travel well. There are a lot of things that can go wrong with high end takeout, and Alma gets it all right. I hope the takeout continues even after we open up, because it is perfect for date nights.

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: I tried the hojicha tea-ramisu espresso. It is full of tea flavour yet keep the traditional tiramisu taste n texture. Wonderful dessert to sweeten my life n my heart during the circuit breaker period.

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: I was pleased to see that Alma pivoted during the lockdown to provide a takeaway menu. Pick up was super easy. I was asked to drive straight up to the restaurant’s front door and the sandwich was handed over without me getting out of the car! I had the cauliflower sourdough sandwich, which was rich and flavorful. If all vegetarian food tasted like this, there would be a lot of vegetarians around. The brownie was also a great hit with my sweet-toothed friends. Great value for money. Well done Alma!

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: The rack of lamb came with instruction on simple reheating which brought out the fragrance of the gulai spices crust and bouquet of herbs, without affecting the meat. It was done perfectly with just the right amount of pink and still juicy. The gulai spices added a very local flavour which surprising went very well with the smoked tomato rice! Yu

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: This is my first time trying this dish - take aw

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: It was covid partial lockdown - no eating at the restaurant. We placed our takeaway order with Gunawan via whatspp. He was prompt, responsive and extremely helpful. I must say I was rather doubtful initially that quality would hold if food were packed into boxes with delayed consumption. Once I tasted the food, I knew instantly they had somehow dispelled every of my suspicion. From the ease of collection to the satisfaction of an excellent takeaway dinner, we were totally blown away! We had the potato bread, celeraic salad, pumpkin soup, aglio olio and pork jowl (which was really fantastic!). Will certainly return to savour the rest of the menu, which my friends and relatives were raving about.

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: During this COVID19 shutdown where dine-in is not possible, I had the opportunity to get their takeout lunch special. Please see the review attached. It is amazing how they can put such value and and deliciousness in a take out b

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: Due to the latest Singapore covid-19 closure measures, we are only allowed to do takeaways and many eateries in sg are not convenient enough as they do not offer drive throug

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: We went for lunch, what an experience! I am vegetarian and the chef really did his utmost to make something special for me. It was delicious!!

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: Had the discovery set and there were 3 appetisers before the 6 course dinner started. Every dish was unique with different flavours and it was a very unique and a very good experience! Staff was also very attentive and polite :)

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: Fine dining at reasonable prices. Starter of Japanese white fish (Kanpachi Brandade) stuffed with mashed potatoes, followed by succulent Iberian pork jowl (strong flavor) with truffle and main dish of delicately roasted 7 days aged Hungarian goose (my favorite!). Dessert selection was a bit limited but the strawberries parfait was good.

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: Alma's a place I always go to for my business lunches whenever I'm in town - the set lunch's pretty affordable and you'll be sure to get a bang for your buck. The presence of ample vegetarian choices on the menu also ensure that my guest(s) get a splendid starred dining experience t

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: I am currently quarantined at home, having just returned from the United States, and decided to try out Alma's new takeout menu. The Angus Beef Burger was juicy and delicious, and the flavor of the freshly baked buns complemented the burger really well. It comes with a side of chips and a brownie for dessert - at only $29, I think it is worth it to have a Michelin-starred meal from the comfort of your own home! Part of the proceeds are also donated to help support our healthcare workers in this time of need, which is a bonus! Would definitely get it again!

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: Was craving for a good meal but didn't want to venture out. Therefore, I had a take away from Alma. It looked like any ordinary burger but at first bite, the beef was really cooked just right and so full of flavor. The cheese has multi layer of complexity. Plus fresh crispy salads, chips and a yummy brownie. Very satisfied after th

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: Amazing 10th Wedding Anniversary dinner here. Food was world class with great service and we were lucky restaurant was quite empty. Will come back. 6 courses plus amuses bouches. Stunning.

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: My husband & I went for the 7-course degustation dinner & had an absolutely delightful dining experience! Every single course (especially the Alma snacks at the beginning & piping hot bread served on hot coffee beans) was simply delightful! The chefs weaved in a mixture of flavours & textures into every bite, we absolutely enjoyed ourselves. Dinner was also made even more amazing because of the excellent service of Saravana & team. We were very well taken care of by the service sta

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: Wow! That is all that I need to say, but I’ll go on and say more. My wife and I went recently for our seventh wedding anniversary and we were amazed from the moment we went inside. The decor is excellent, the food amazing and each dish special, the wine list made my heart (and pallet sing) and the staff made the evening extremely special. Do yourself a favor if you want great value in terms of incredible dining and wine and visit Alma when you want to have a special night out. They also have two private rooms which can be booked for special occasions! Thanks everyone who was at work this past Friday!!

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: We wanted to try this restaurant for a while since it has a good number of excellent reviews, but sadly it wan't for

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: Great service & superb food quality!! We loved all the appetizers!! Thanks for making our wedding anniversary an awesome one!!!

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review:
I have not been in many Michelin starred restaurant but I have been really stunned either by the tasteful, colourful and textured dishes and by the service ! 
Everyrhing was right at its place

I deeply recommand this place

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: Service was excellent, food was great- especially the appetisers! Celebrated my brother's birthday, and staff was detailed!!

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: The lunch menu is a fantastic value for the quality and taste. We had the 4-course menu and did not disappoint. Crispy tofu and the Lobster Pasta were the highlight. You could add $12 Singapore Dollars for the Pork Jowl, which reading other reviews, may have to give it a try next visit. That being said, can't believe it took me this long to come here, hopefully will be back so

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review:
A wonderful tasting menu with elements of European and Japanese haute cuisine, and desserts with a decidedly exotic Indonesian and Thai flavors. Excellent food for a reasonable price. Highly recommended. Will visit again.
Lee, Singapore

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: Although the food is supposed to be modern European, we liked the use of Japanese ingredients such as the pear and 'june plum'. We also liked how some of the food, like the langoustine,was so fresh it was served sashimi style. The A5 Ohmi beef was also excellent. Without using chilli, the chef managed to add 'spice' to some of his dishes, with the use of ingredients like fresh radish. As expected, the dishes were beautifully presented - but what we found more important was the delicious blends of textures and taste, including the snacks served before the main course. The potato bread was also very delicious. The only negative point is that if you are hungry, you might need more of the potato bread. However, this was not an issue as the restaurant happily served more bread when asked - my husband took 6 pieces of the bread, which he enjoyed and helped to fill him up. I was full just eating the snacks, the main dishes, and the desserts. Loved the canele dessert (served as part of the petite 'ha') as it was made with smoked gula melaka.

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: Had the set lunch several times. Very good value for money but above and beyond that the quality, taste and presentation of the food is always extremely high .

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: We were pleasantly surprised by Alma. We expected great food (which there was) but also assumed the service would be "uptight". The staff were very professional but also very friendly, I nice change from many of the typical formal tasting menu restaurants.

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: Went to Alma on 5/12/19 for lunch to celebrate wedding anniversary. Both my wife and me enjoyed ourselves very much with the 5-course set lunch and the nice ambience of the restaurant. Also thanks Ms Chai Farng for attentive and very good service. Will come back again.

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: It's a great restaurants with seasonal menu and huge selection of wine and liquor. The service staff is friendly and attentive. You can go to orchard for shopping after a good meal

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: Went for a solo dinner during a business trip and they made my night. Great experience both visually and culinary. The staff was also amazing. The perfect combination of care and space to letting you enjoy your meal.

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: We dine here regularly and on special occasions and we have never been disappointed with the food and service. It is always nice to experience the different menus every time they change it. The nine course meal we just had was fabulous and most memorable. The staffs are also very pleasant, friendly and attentive. Great dining experience overall and Michelin Star well deserved!

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: An absolutely magical meal. The food was divine and the wine pairing was outstanding. I honestly believe this was the best dining experience we have ever had, anywhere. We live in Singapore and we will definitely return.

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: Spent my husband’s bday here and we really enjoyed the array of menu served. Excellent service from the staff too from reservation to food service.

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: Perfect meal, beautiful setting, attentive staff...what more could you ask for? Big thank you to Saravana who made our evening even better. We shall definitely return!

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: Amazing Experience ... we love it so much we had Michelin Star Chef Haikal Johari repeat our favourite dish ... Ohmi Beef on a fried bed of seaweed topped with fresh slice of Truffle ... Simply to die for 😋

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review:
Alma doesn't disappoint. The staff are competent, friendly and kind. There is a lot of attention given to details of the food.
Particularly love their coffee smoked potato bread and salty butter.

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: A warm welcoming followed by professional service with lots of attention to details to make you happy . Their service was first class and is always with a smile and very patient. No words to say that it is awesom

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: Celebrated our 3rd anniversary and the food was fantastic, not forgetting the service crew. Thank you Saravana and his team for the excellent service.

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: My experience at Alma by Juan Amador was great all around. The staff was polite, attentive, and friendly, the restaurant was beautiful, and the food was amazing. I particularly LOVED the Amaou Strawberry dessert! The flavors were greatly paired together with a little bit of sweet and a little spice too, a great way to conclude a delicious meal!

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: I visited with my grandmother for the dinner service and it was an out of this world experience. Not only was the food impeccable, but the staff were even better! The service 11/10, and can’t thank the team enough for making my grandmothers birthday so special.

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: Alma by Juan Amador is by far the greatest restaurant I have ever been to. The hosts are extremely polite and committed to their jobs. The food is amazing as well. I had the best pasta of my life here and the wine they serve is crisp and refreshing. Overall, everything was as perfect as it gets. This is a must if you are visiting Singapore.

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: This was the best fine dining experience of my life. The lunch course meal was superb, especially the lobster pasta. It had a perfect balance and a great portion. The wine pairing was also very intentional and good. The staff were extremely kind and also knowledgeable regarding the dishes and wine selection. The restaurant had an impressive room with drinks that are recognized such as the Hennessy 8. This was an unforgettable experience and I will be definitely going back in the future.

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: Came here with family and a dear friend as a thank you and celebration of the holiday season and enjoyed their creative 6 course tasting menu, which was both multilayered on the palate and beautifully present

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: I had lunch here today and the food was amazing. The crispy tofu with foie gras sauce is a must try - the homemade tofu is crispy on the outside and soft on the inside, goes really well with the sauce. The pork jowl was so tender it melts in your mouth. Be sure to order the apple tart for dessert, best apple tart I’ve ever had. Service is top notch, food is delicious, definitely will be back again!

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: Alma by Juan Amador was an amazing lunch experience. Every course was so well-balanced and unique that I was amazed every time a plate was served. What especially caught my attention was the appetizer. The mixture of green apple flavor with raw fish caught me by surprise but it was so delicious. Also, the staff were so nice at explaining certain dishes to us. They deliver the explanations and serve the food in such a professional yet friendly manner. Overall, Alma by Juan Amador was a lunch experience I will never forget.

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: I’ve had the wonderful opportunity to come to this restaurant through my friend. I was so amazed by the three course meal and the restaurant hospitality. The food was amazing! I had the Boston Lobster Angel Hair Pasta and it was so delicious. I will definitely come back here again when I come back to Singapore! 5/5!!

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: Celebrated my husband’s birthday with the 5 course set lunch. The kanpachi appetizer was very refreshing. Warm Potato bread was excellent with the butter. Crispy tofu was very well done. The main courses of barramundi(for me) and short rib( husband) were also very good. Overall a pleasant experience. The portions were just right.

Name: Alma By Juan Amador
Location: 22 Scotts Road Goodwood Park Hotel Goodwood Park Hotel, Singapore 228221 Singapore
Review: Good food, excellent service, good atmosphere for couples and ambience, top notch, creme de le creme restaurant

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: Dinner was good. Effort was made to plan the cny menu. Manager Reuel and team is attentive and provided good service .

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: Brought my godparents for a birthday lunch . Service is excellent by Ruel & his team . Ruel is so attentive to notice we did not bring any birthday cake , he offered the chef steam buns in a beautifully decorated plate .

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: Went for lunch to celebrate my mom's birthday. Good food, nice ambience, excellent service by Manager Ruel and team.

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: We visited the restaurant for dinner and the food was excellent. Staff provided outstanding service and were professional yet friendly. I will definitely recommend this place to my friends too.

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: Nice & yummy food. Nice ambience too. Thank you 🙏 friendly Manager Ruel & staff for the good service too😊.

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: Delicious food n very friendly staff n excellent service. Happy Dining experience n will be back again

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: Thank you Reul for his Enjoyed the dinner and service at Fu Lin Men and enjoyed the beautiful view of the golf course

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: Recommended by our friend,we visited the restaurant on 3 December lunch at fu lin man restaurant we have mok duck and dishes for lunch it looks good and taste great with fantastic presentat

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: Cosy ambience at Fu Lin Men (NSRCC) and courteous staff. Satisfied with the food at every visit. The crispy noodle and cornflake prawns are our favourites.

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: Had a wonderful family dinner at NSRCC branch and am impressed with the service here. Food is always good in Fu Lin Men so that’s no surprise. Staffs here are friendly and nice. In addition, ambiance is nice and quiet. Good place for family and business dinner. Will come more often.

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: My husband and I were looking to hold a small, intimate solemnisation together with lunch for 10 pax. Fulinmen NSRCC was the only restaurant that offered us a private room for this, with no extra venue charges or minimum spending. We also loved the scenic environment of the restaurant, overlooking the spacious golf cours

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: Always a dependable place for quality food and cleanliness. Try the duck and seafood. Worth the drive to nsrcc.

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: Nice ambient, good service and attention to delight your experience for a good weekend meals.... a great get away from the hustle and bustle regular meal outing.

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: The environment and food is really good! The staffs are very friendly and professional. Will come by more often!

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: The Peking duck was fantastic and definitely value for money with 30% promotion now. Really enjoyed it . The rest of dishes were very good too! You must try it for yourself !

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review:
Thanks for keeping the standard up everytime I come...
Food is nice n affordable. Food is very generous

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: Great service and decent food for a good price. Recommended to come here for a nice family dinner. Their 1 for 1 lobster set meal is definitely worth the price!

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: The fish is very fresh, service is good, the Peking duck was very crispy and tasty. They also timed the cake on time.

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: Food serves are good and nice ambience. Ordered 6 course meal and it’s good and affordable. Recommend to come with friends

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: The Peking duck at half price is a steal. The 1 for 1 lobster set is great value for money. The service is great. Ample parking space. The shark bone soup is not as good as peach garden’s. Other than that a great place for dinner.

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: This restaurant has a very nice ambience to eat in and the food is very tasty. Service is very good. Have come ample times. Defined would recommend this place.

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: Beautiful ambience and polite staff. Their peking duck is a must try! Ideal for families and friends.

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review:
Just had my lunch at Fu Lin Men. I have my lunch here twice a week 
The Food was very good and the service is excellent. 
The Manager, Ms May Lee is very forthcoming and recommend nice food to us.

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review:
Great value Chinese food with excellent service. Must go for dish: Peking duck and whatever ongoing promotion dishes/set. 
A-Mei is ever attentive and friendly.

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: Food quality is very good, for both dishes and dim sum. Staff are warm and provide excellent service.

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: Within a week, I felt that the food was so delectable that I went back to eat there. Service was great as well and is worth the visit.

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: We went for dinner yesterday at the NSRCC branch, and the service and food are honestly awesome. The steamed fish with minced garlic is world class, and the service for me and my little baby was extremely prompted. Will certainly come back in the near future - Derrick

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: Nice quaint place amidst lush greenery for a tantalising treat with loved ones. Servers were attentive and friendly while one of the managers, Ruel, frequently checked in to ensure that all was well. These combined with a reasonable price tag makes Fu Lin Men NSRCC a winning formula.

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: Both the service and food was amazing. It is definitely worth a visit especially if you enjoy great crab.

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: Ruel and his team made sure that my family and I felt comfortable from the point of phone booking till dessert. Dishes with premium ingredients, like the pumpkin sauce lobster and sharks bone soup, were worth the value, which was reasonable compared with other Brands of similar caliber. We would definitely return and recommend others to give a try. Remember to ask for parking voucher as it may be complimentary.

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: Nice ambience, good food, great service. Peking duck is awesome. It serves not only with the egg crepe but mantou as well. Tofu is very delicious. Price is also reasonable.

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review:
Perfect environment
Amazing decoration 
Superior service 
Delicious food 
One of the greatest day in our life

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: great food, peking duck is crispy and pleasantly surprised on being presented with the succulent drums and a novel way of stir frying the meats with salt and pepper. would definitely be bac

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: We are amazed by the food quality consistency and service.higly recomended. We always come here after golf

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: The food is superb and the quality is excellent. Im not kidding. Try the Peking Duck, the fish maw abalone soup and crabs, and you will know what I’m talking about. The promotion is irresistible, super value for mone

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: We went here several times. Food is consistently great and service as well. Right place to eat after the golf. Cosy and elegance ambiance.

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: Had a wonderful dinner with my wife at Fu Lin Men. We had chilli crabs, asparagus and shark bone soup. All dishes were yummy. We loved it. May and Roel provided great service to us. Thank you!!

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: Dim sum were fresh and tasty. We ordered a Peking duck and it was very yummy. Service staff - May and the rest of the service staff  were very efficient. Relationship Manager is courteous and helpful when I called in to make reservation.

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
