Review: It's the first time that I brought my family here for their dim sum lunch. The quality of food were very good and tasty. Service by Ruel & May were very attentive too. Will definitely be back for mo

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review:
Great service at Fu Lin Men! The relationship manager Ruel is very responsive. 
Must try the Peking  duck when u come!

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: Been there a few times since October, the quality of food never disappoints. The Peking duck and Dim Sum is a MUST!! And in terms of service, Ruel and team had done an excellent job!!

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: Food was good, we ordered dim sum and pekking duck. Service was top notch. Manager May took initiative and went the extra mile to cater to the our family of 5 pax. E.g. Dim Sum came in the serving of 5. Complimentary birthday bun.

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: Better food and great service. Highly recommended  ..will coming back for sure. All items must be try

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: Highly recommend the dim sum here. Food is delicious. Have been here a few times and always enjoy dining ambience here. Family friendly too! Only downside it is accessible by car...

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: It was a great dinning experience. All my friends were so happy and satisfied with the tasty food and excellent service. Peking duck is a must-try dish! So Delicious! And someone I would like to mention is the manager Ruel. He made us feel like at home, always attentive and talked with smile. Thumbs up!

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: My wife and I hosted our small wedding lunch there and was pleasantly surprised by the level of service delivered. We had a dedicated person helping us clear out plates and dishing out the food for our table. The Fu Lin Men team also helped us to prepare the tea for the tea ceremony even though they initially said they were not able to and help me with the washing of the cups. The food was also very decent and reasonably priced. My guest and us had a great time there. I would definitely recommend them for casual meals or for important occasions.

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: Was there for family lunch, the peking duck was very juicy and crispy and the service there was really great !

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: Brought my dad for dim sum lunch at Fu Lin Men at NSRCC on 8 Nov. He loves the food there. Especially the pecking duck. My girl and niece also like the place so much. Is a thumbs up for everyone. Definitely a good place to recommend. Food is super tasty and the services also the best. Keep it up team!

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: 1st visit to Fu Lin Men @ NSRCC. Food is great n place is clean n friendly! Excellent service as well. Good dining place for family.

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: The Peking duck is really crispy and succulent. We don't live nearby but worth travelling the mile to eat the yummy char Siew bao and other dishes like fried prawn roll.Unlike other dim sum restaurants, the dishes are really unique and fragrant. Highly efficient service as well.

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: Was there for lunch on 6Nov. The dim sum and shark fin soup were great. The restaurant manager, Ruel, and his crew were attentive and nice.

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: Staff were very friendly and service was good. Price is reasonable as well. Ordered the peking duck and it was delicious. Came with buns too which was a good surprise. Crispy chicken floss with fried brinjal was great too. Very aromatic. Requested for food to be less salty and everything came out perfect. Would go back again to try out their dimsum.

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: was at restaurant for lunch with 2 other friends, ordered quite a lot dim sum but finished everything!! The charsiew bao was particularly good: very soft with very juicy and tasty charsiew infills. Recommended!!

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: Great service. Reasonable price. Food is delicious. Good and cosy environment. Very friendly and attentive staff.

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: Situated in a corner at NSRCC Resort, this restaurant is a nice quiet place for after golf or just family dinner. The service staff are very friendly and attentive and prices are not exorbitant. Food wise it's what you would expect from a good Chinese restaurant. A must try dish is the Beijing Duck.

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review:
Great taste lobster and pumpkin sauce....
Just soso on the beijing duck.

Good service. No corkage

Theres 1 for 1 now for 6 course set.

Worth the money

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: Received really good service from Ruel! He was very attentive to our needs, and elevated our dining experience at Fu Lin Men. The food + presentation + service exceeded our expectations, and we will definitely be back for more! We had amazing Beijing Duck, and an impeccable Lobster set meal. This place is a hidden gem in the heart of NSRCC! Do check this place out if you can & spread the word! They definitely deserve our patronage!

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review:
Good Place for Business or family gathering, service are super, food are nice
and price are reasonable.

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review:
The steam fish is very fresh and tender. I also like the dessert it is very refreshing.

The service is wonderful. I will definitely go back again.

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: Great food! Amazing service! Servings are definitely worth every cent and beautiful atmosphere.Highly recommended !!!!!! The food is amazing and definitely worth coming again just for these few dishes that I have tried so far! Can’t wait to come again and try more new things! Doubt I’ll be disappointed!

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review:
Have a simple dinner at nsrcc fu lin men. Food is great...Service is even better...very attentive service especially their manager, Raul.
Have a great meal with great service from the team led by Raul.

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: Visited the restaurant for a birthday celebration. Delighted by the food and service here. Would definitely be back again

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: We had a birthday dinner for a friend at Fu Lin Men (NSRCC) on a Wednesday night. I was surprised that there were not many diners that night. This restaurant deserves a lot more customers for its really good food, and above all, great service! Perhaps being located at NSRCC on Changi Coast Walk may put some people off because of the distance but, for me, it was a trip that was really worthwhi

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: Reasonable pricing for good food. A must come especially during covid-19 to help local business to survive.

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: Was searching for a place with a private room for our wedding lunch and chanced upon this restaurant. When we went there for a discussion on terms, prices and a little food tasting, the first thing we noticed was the amazing hospitality the waitresses and restaurant manager, Ken and Ruel gave. They were patient in answering our questions on regulations and the restrictions in place for our luncheon. After booking, there were follow ups and initiative on their part on ensuring the finalisation of plans. Although it was quite a hectic day for us to clearly remember the nitty gritty during the actual day, the luncheon went smoothly and our guest raved about the quality and taste about the food (especially the prawns, a must try). All in all, had a wonderful experience with Ken and Ruel (who was attending to us on our actual day as well).

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: Had a birthday day celebration over at fu lin men. The staff were friendly and very accommodating, the restaurant is spacious and food was delicious! Will definitely patronise again

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: Wonderful experience with attentive service and the food is excellent. Will definitely visit again. Big thumbs up.

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: Food was excellent! Peking duck was on point and service was tip top! Definitely recommend anyone intending to eat chinese restaurant food to head on down to Foo Lin Men NSRCC after a round of golf or for dinner when staying over at the chalet.

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: may and ruel are extremely hospitable and friendly, and they always go above and beyond to serve their customers. the food was delicious and the peking duck is DEFINTELY a must try. the ambience was great and its suitable for all types of gatherings. definietly recommended for a superb experience!

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: Arrange for my wedding lunch reception in NSRCC fulinmen restaurant and Ruel approach us with overwhelming hospitality. The menus were flexible for us to choose. We also had dinner with family members for food tasting and the food was really good. Will highly recommend.

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: Amazing top service experience by Ruel. The view and food is quite decent too. We frequent here often so we can say for sure that it is always consistent!

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review:
Service is excellent.. May & Ruel are doing good job. Environment is relaxing and quiet

Will be back..

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: Food is great and service is excellent. Mei and Ruel provide excellent service. Will come back and recommend friends to come too !

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: Fu Lin Men specialises in Chinese Cuisine and has a grand decor befitting of a fine dining restaurant. While the food is good, what stands out are their service staff. Friendly and happy to serve. Together, the experience is worth trying!

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: Live Bamboo clam with garlic is definitely a must try! Notable dishes are also the fried baby squid and garlic prawns! Will definitely come back again!

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: Food Quality is superb and reasonable price. Not to mention the great service provided. Will keep coming back.

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review:
I had a nice birthday celebration at the restaurant.
Dim sum 20% off, free car park coupon for every table... Worth the effort to come!

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: Ruel is a very thoughtful & meticulous manager who ensures that his customers enjoys their visit to his outlet at NSR

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: Tried seafood(chilli crab and fish. Crab came hot which is a pleasant surprise. It is fresh and we enjoyed the flavor. Manager Reuel put effort to see to our needs and hence deserved compliment. Other waitress are helpful and attentive too.

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: Had a dim sum lunch today at the restaurant. While the dim sum menu is a tad limited, the food served was hot and good. In particular, the fish porridge was very good and so was the roast pork. The portion is good and the prices are reasonable. Very nice ambience for a nice family me

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review:
I’ve visited 3 times to Fu Lin Men and the good and service especially by Ruel never fails! They are always accommodating and attentive, while food is generally consistent. 

Will always come back for more!

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: Service staff is friendly and helpful and have a good time there. Food and atmosphere is awesome. Will come again!

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: Received extremely good service from Ruel and his team. Nice experience. Fresh and good food. Highly recommend

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: Ate dim sum at the restaurant. Although the menu is small, the food was great! Bought 2 Peking ducks and they were excellent! The place is clean and the service team was very good. Will definitely be returning customers!

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: Overall service is very good with very helpful staff who try to meet your every request. Food is good too.

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: This is my 3rd visit and this place still amazes me.  Ruel, the Manager, is warm and helpful. His team is awesome...and the food is great. Must-go! Try the Peking duck and lemon grass jelly.

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: My friend recommended me to try this place. Surely, she didn't disappoint me. They offer wide variety of food choices with great taste and value for money. The staff were accommodating and very courteous. Ambiance is superb. Highly recommended for singles, couples, families, group of friends, for all. Worth a try!

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: Went with my friends special day celebration. Everything looks perfect (food, ambience and service, special mention to Ruel and team for treating as like VIPs. 😅)....surely will come back more and to recommend the place with my relatives and friends!

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: Enjoyed the delicious freshly handmade MSG-free dim sum and good value peking duck with golf buddies at Fu Lin Men NSRCC today. XO carrot cake and century egg porridge was yummy. We were seated at the section offering fantastic views of the 18th hole. Thank you restaurant manager Ruel for the arrangement. Kudos to May and team for the warm hospitality, food recommendations and attentive service. We shall pay a return visit soon.

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: We visited the restaurant with my friends for a good ambiance lunch and we were not disappointed. The food was delicious and a real value for money plus the fantastic and professional service to us by Mr. Ruel Camu. We had a great weekend lunch on a busy Sunday. We will definitely come back again and I highly recommend the restaurant. I hope they will maintain and sustain the good quality they have now. Cheers!!

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: Me and my Friend were craving to eat some crab and my friend recommended this restaurant and we were not disappointed. The ambience was tranquil but pleasant. I love the high ceiling and the view of the place. Going back to what we really came here for, the food, we ordered a few items before we had our main dish, the chili crab. The food was really delicious and the Chili Crab was very succulent and juicy. Talking about the service, it was very exemplary that adds good experience during our dinner. From the time we came in, to the time we went out, the service was commendable. Thank you for a great dinner. Would come back again to try other dishes.

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: Great menu's something that everyone would truly love. Service was perfect and was very accommodating. Will be back definitely and will bring some of my friends.

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: We have a very satisfying lunch at NSRCC Fu Lin Men this afternoon with the fantastic and professional service of Mr Ruel Camu that too it all. Everyone enjoyed his food recommendations and will certainly come back again.

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: Visited with my parents and God Son and family. We were really well looked after by Ruel and his team of enthusiastic, honest and cheerful experienced hand

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: Had a great experience dining at Fu lin men with family today. Manager Ruel was accomodating and staff were polite. on top of that, the food served were delicious! Ambience was great as well.

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: Happen to have a meal after Golf at the club, unbelievable that they served a very good Peking ducks, even better than my that favourite old restaurant that recently has closed down, staffs were very attentive and polite, we had a great time and good meals

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: Been there twice & was really happy with the food & service by Ruel & his team. He’s really attentive & he remembers all the details despite just one visit. Which we really appreciate. Thank you & will definitely visit again for their Peking duck, fried brinjal, jellyfish and desserts, etc!

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: We had dinner at Fu Lin Men, NSRCC Changi last nig

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: A lovely and very nice restaurant The atmosphere is amazing and best customer service. Good food, must try their seafoods, no regrets its very delicious 😋 Definitely hope to go back there 😍🥰.

Name: Fu Lin Men (NSRCC)
Location: 10 Changi Coast Walk Level 1 National Service Resort & Country Club, Singapore 499739 Singapore
Review: Very nice food staff are accommodating. Very delicious. Our tummies are full. We are definitely going back

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: The beef is acceptable and although there's a lot of typical dishes one would expect from a rodizio, considering the distance it's alright. Nevertheless, the service is incredible poor. The waiter rush giving you the beef cuts, without consideration, and being rude. In various occasions the waiter would only "drop" the beef cut in the plate (or miss the plate, altogether)

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: Good service, frequency of servings. Due to Covid restriction buffet was not available however good portions brought to the table on small plates. Feijoada was good, well prepared. The meat offer , I felt limited but I guess the same of other Brazilian restaurants in Singapore....the meat quality was ok/ good. While the main churrasco course is similar all places around at 50 SGD, drinks and desserts were beyond expected. The traditional quindim, made with egg yoke at 14SGD was not exactly it. Stay with the meat and enjoy the course.Environment is good, you can have business meals and family gatherings.

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: Great ambience, excellent service. We were served by a friendly passador with good sense of humour. The young lady who waited on our table was very cheerful n efficient, filing up our water, asking if we needed more meats, changing our plates. Food was delicious esp the beef hump, beef ribs, lamb, sausage and chicken livers. Even the sides were good, loved the deep fried crispy Kai lan and sweet potato. They serve delicious soup of the day in small little cups, I’ve had the tomato n mushroom - both lip smacking authentic goodness. I had 2 servings of the beef hump - tender, fatty and melt in your mouth goodness. The chicken livers were crispy on the outside n oh so tender on the inside. I think I ate 6 livers! Advise if it’s your first time - go slow, ask for very small shavings of the meats the first time round to taste, then get a bigger portion of only the ones you like the second time round. And just enjoy!!

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: This restaurant is well known among many diners. We drove to this place and reached in time for dinner. The ambience of the restaurant is good. The food we ordered were lamb pieces. They were delicious.

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: great selection of meats and sides - but you need to be hungry to go there and do it justice. not the cheapest place to eat unless you can really "fill your boots". friendly staff and nice selection of grilled meats etc - more selection in the evening. we love the chicken hearts hear, but they don't come around often enough for us...........

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: We first visited Brasil Churrasco 25 years ago, and amazingly the friendly passador from Rio is still there! Homey atmosphere, with a good salad bar that includes heart of palm, feijoada, and you can ask for yummy farofa too. The cuts of meat are not nearly as varied as at the best rodizios in Brasil, but you still find delicious picanha, cupim, chicken hearts, etc. For me, the best time to visit is for brunch on Sunday. You can enjoy a nice siesta afterwards, whereas after a dinner here you might not feel good for a long time! Anyway, you would not want to eat meat for at least a while unless you are a sumo wrestler!

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: Been introduced to Brazil Churrasco 20 years ago. We were there as newly weds then and now our 2 boys joins us. It’s our favourite go-to place whenever we crave a good cut of meat and not to mention their extensive choice of salad bar. Great service and excellent food.

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: Great cut of meats, friendly staff which are more like friends to us. Maya Fizah, Tiki, all staff there are just amazing.

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review:
Absolutely recommend everyone to experience this fantastic place, great food and wonderful friendly, knowledgeable staff and awesome owner who all make you feel at home. 
Greetings from Zambia, Southern Africa. 
See you on my next trip.  
Cheers Nims.

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: Consistent quality of the meat and great, smiling, friendly service make this place the best Churrasco in town, by f

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: Been here a couple of times with family and friends.. It's one of the best so far. The meat selection is excellent. So is the salad bar. Good and friendly staff.

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: Brought here by friends . Amazing place with excellent meats . All types of meat Grill to perfection - from salad bar , grill beef , lamb , chicken etc.... until the grill pineapple !! Speechless just enjoy

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: This was my second time visiting and I can confirm this is the best Brazilian BBQ spot in Singapore. It's a little out of the way from the central hotels, but well worth the trip. All the meats were on point, the salads were good, even though we only had a few small helpings as we wanted to focus on the meat. But what makes the experience even more memorable is the servi

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: It was our second visit after 10 years. We are so glad we came. There was a good selection of meats including beef, lamb, chicken, duck and fish. Even the salad bar "put up a good fight" for our attention. The friendly service staff topped it off and made our family night out a pleasant and satisfied one. Will definitely be back.

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: Food was amazing, customer service was perfect. The meat was seasoned to perfection and my favorite the pineapple they cook!! OMG!!!!!!!! well worth the price!!!!

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: This is a great place for meat lovers, beef especially. We've been coming here since they opened in 25 years ago. Same consistent quality and friendly staff.

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: Brazilian BBQ: we know what was coming! The buffet with sides is more than enough choices. Try the potato salad for su

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: Great as always . Last time i was here was 5 years ago. Standard improved. The salad bar enough to make you full. Variety of meat, lamb soft and juicy, chicken, chicken liver, chicken heart, beef topside, ribs, pork sausage, all topped with red wine and smoked pineapple (never seen anywhere else). Will continue to come back.

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: This place is legit. I have tried many Brazilian restaurants in Singapore and none can beat this. They have been around at 6th Avenue for 20 years. The service staff is friendly and after all these years, the food standard remains excelle

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: As a Family of Meat Lovers, this was a place that took us 2 years in waiting. So, having my Wedding Anniversary dinner here was timely great with full compliments to Ms. Maya for making this event unforgettable (Wifey-very-Happy) and to their very friendly “Men-in-Black” (or Meat Servers, who make sure your plate is full of their meat

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: Very very satisfied with the service of the staff & quality of the meats at this restaurant! Visited here for my bf's birthday last week and we left with an extremely full stomach. We opted for the buffet which added up to about $61/pax after GST and service charge. Price is a little bit steep, but I think was quite worth it especially if it's for a special occasio

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: I was there for a dinner with friends, the place is nice, spacious, the number of servers are enough to cover even if the restaurant was full on a Saturday night. The staff follows with attention, asking if people wanted another round of meat type. The buffet salad has a good variety and is good. The variety of meat is not as much as in a real churrascaria, what is understandable however I felt it very limited, soon after the start, the service was all in a rush bringing meat after meat, while we were not able to finish on the servings, I would expect the servers to dose the timing, we had to ask them to slow down. Some meats were not grilled to the point I have experienced before, either too early, not hot enough/ warm or missing salt (and I don't like salty meat). It was the only churrascaria offering grilled chicken liver (what I felt interesting). The grilled pineapple that usually is good was very green, not sweet and not well grilled. At the end the final bill was around SGD70 a person (just the main with some drinks, no desserts and coffee). Disappointed for the quality of the food based on the price we paid for. For someone that wants to feast on meat from time to time, not sure if it was a bad night or if it may be good to try another place.

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: Just had another excellent dinner at Brazil Churasco and never fails to fulfill expectations of great food. Service is very good with staff pampering you with all the meats that you desire. For those who haven’t visited this place, it’s well worth your efforts and is highly recommended.

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: This is my third visit to Brazil Churrasco and it has never fail to keep up to its standards of satisfying my need for meat. The salad counter is also filled with an array of choices. Different parts of the meat were cook to perfection and the smoked duck is a definite must try! I highly recommend this place to anybody who loves beef like I do. Great ambience, great service, great food!

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: My family have been visiting this place for years and it is a special place for my parent’s wedding anniversary. Tonight we are back again but greatly disappoint

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: Brazil Churras is an average place, the food is not so good, and it is an OK meal. I went there only once and never got back again

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: Having worked in Rio and appreciated the concept that this restaurant offers, I was pleased at the food and service. The salad bar was awesome and the staff carving the meat very friendly. Just when I thought I was full, along came the barbecued pineapple which was amazi

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: I lived in Brazil for 13 years as a young adult. So my Family without fail would have Churrasco 1-2 a month. However we decided to try the Churrasco at Sixth Avenue, it was not good at all. It is more to suit the taste of Singaporeans. Sadly to say, the Cupin was way too salty and Meats were hard to chew. I would not go back to this place ever again.

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review:
I come here for every big celebration. The food is delicious and it's got a huge salad bar for vegetarians too. 

Looking forward to returning!

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: In the pure Brazilian tradition, you can sample several beef meat cuts, chicken, sausages etc and also have a few vegetables to give you good conscience

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: This restaurant has an amazing selection of meats... 5 types of meat (chicken, beef, lamb,pork,fish) and 14 cuts of meat. The servers come to your table very frequently with the different meats, which they carve off for you, as much as you like. You literally eat until you can’t eat anymore. The salad bar is very extensive and the best I have seen. The servers were very efficient and pleasant. I would like to mention Azza, who was particularly helpful in explaining the meats and making our evening more pleasurable. We had very good service overall. I would highly recommend this restaurant, especially to those who enjoy their meats.

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: The ambience is beautiful. The salad bar is great with many choices of vegetable

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: Let me just start by saying the service was impeccable. Especially from the hostess Maya and the server Briggs. Thank you both so much for making my birthday dinner an enjoyable o

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: Brazilian Barbeque Buffet Restaurant that serves a wide variety of meats, especially different parts of beef.  Pork, chicken, fish also served with a wide variety of salads.

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: If you like your meat then this is the place for you. Great salad selection, and as much meat as you can eat hand-carved at the table. Nice atmosphere, friendly staff, and great meat (try the chicken hearts!

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: Only for voracious meat eate

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review:
Great prices, very service focused

I took a group of 20 men there for dinner, fantastic evening, to really enjoy I highly recommend going in a group

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: Authentic Brazilian churrascaria in Singapore - great food and great service,Great place to go for meat lovers .Meat grills are great and unique and have great variety .5 different types of Beef ,lamb ,Chicken heart ,liver ,smoked duck,Fish etc etc .Plus Grilled Pine apple and a great salad bar .Would recommend this place and would definitely come b

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: Have eaten there quite a few times back in 2015-2016. Always been happy with the service and qualit

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: I’m came by this churrasco by the recommendation from a work associate, and it really is somethi

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: Me and my family often come here and this time i brought my Nephew and kids. Had a good time. Fresh cut of meats and very gd Service. There is a Valet Service as well and i do advise to use it as parking is minimal around there. Priced Reasonably and from all the Churrasco out there. This Restaurant is tge best of them all. Highly recommend it.

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: This place is the best Brazilian buffet style place I've ever been anywhere in my life. I may actually go so far to say it's one of my favourite restaurants in Singapor

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review:
This meat restaurant maintain their popularity for many years. 
Excellent grilled meat, very good service and nice atmosphere. 
Always great to come back.

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: Well I heard much about Brazilian food this evening friends wanted to take there son out for his birthday. Must admit as a meat eater from Louisiana it was not something I really really enjoyed. Would I eat here again? Only if friends wanted to come.

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: Visited this place with family for dinner buffet for S$50 each. The way it works is that you help yourself from the salad buffet which is good but not too exciting. Then the waiters come to you with different meats on large skewers and slice off pieces onto your plate. They bring tons of smoked duck, fish, chicken, a variety of beef and pork. All the meat items I have tried were really good. They also serve flambed pineapple, sliced off the skewer just like the meat - it's also very good, especially to finish off your dinner. Service was great and very friendly.

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: For those of us who have had Churrasco at restaurants a little closer to Latin America, the seasoning and preparation may seem a little off. However, it’s a genuine experience and the meat tender and flavorful. What takes it to a full 5 stars is the value, the service (best we’ve gotten in Singapore thus far) and a bonus for us in that, per the restaurant staff, the chicken and beef are halal (the restaurant itself is not as it serves pork, but if you inform them in advance, they won’t offer it at your table).

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: Have visited this restaurant since 2002 every year on an average of about 5 times a year. I think the record is ten times a year in one or two of those 15 years. Why do I keep coming back? The food is excellent, that is always important, but to me, especially through aging where I cannot eat as much as I used to, the staff are equally important. The staff treat you like friends instead of customers, and there is genuine warmth in them wanting to ensure you have the best possible experience. They get to know you and they often recognise repeat customers and great them like buddies. This is the restaurant which I often use to host friends as it has fantastic ambiance. They opened a branch at Gilman Barracks a few years back but that didn't work out. I have also tried other restaurants with this same concept but they don't measure up. So it will be, for many more years, me being back at The Original Brazil Churrasco at Sixth Avenue, because it is the best.

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: I have reviewed before and nothing has changed except perhaps got better. Fabulous Salad Bar, far more choices than usual. Staff are so very friendly (They need to be, their knives are so sharp!). The meat! Oh the meat! Here is not a suitable place for a vegan. Comes out on spits carved directly onto your plate and it keeps on arriving. Beef Lamb Chicken etc etc if you like meat you will most certainly enjoy, combine it with a selection of their very excellent wi

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: The Brazil Churrasco is by far the best churascaria in town. We love to eat there! If you enjoy meat this is the place to be!

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: Treated my husband to dinner at the restaurant. Service was excellent. Salad bar was well stocked and food was good. I like the beef short ribs and grilled chicken especially. The waiters also sang a birthday song in Portuguese for us. It was a great experience!

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: This restaurant is popular with local crowds and serve WESTERN food. The salad is BUFFET style, whereby clients choose the selections of veg from a round section os serving table. The quality of the greens is good and the choice acceptable. The dinners will be offered a small cup of soup of the day. The main course are mainly MEAT (CHICKEN, LAMB, PORK, BEEF, CHICKEN LIVER....) being served via waiters. The serving is repeated, and clients can eat as much as they want. The quality of the meat is acceptable. The wine list is acceptable for normal dinning. Service is good. Seating arrangement is a bit crowded; as the restaurant has limited space. Prices is acceptable. Location is slightly out of the city, but can easily reached by most type of transport. A good place for a mid range meal.

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: The location of Brazil Churrasco is a little far if you're staying on Orchard but it is well worth the cab ride, not so easy to get a ride back though. The staff seated us very quickly. The restaurant is very clean and not too noisy for the amount of waiters serving. There is a great salad bar but don't eat too much because there are so many meats to choose from. Don't miss the Caipirinha cocktail. Putting it all together; the ambiance, the staff, the delicious food we will definitely return.

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: The meat is cooked beautifully and with fatty, lean, spiced, plain all available,so depending on your palette, there is something there for y

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: We've been visiting these places from Brazil to Dubai and everything in between, so our expectations are usually hig

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: As good or better than any I have been to in South America. Huge salad bar and so so much meat how on earth anyone manages the complimentary ice cream for desert is beyond me. Make sure you are hungry before you go. Worth to visit. Sin $15 from downtown by taxi.

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: Servers were quick to fill your plate, and they were polite and professional, but it seems to me as they were being polite and professional for the sake of it. With regards to the food, except for the chicken and fish which i find it ok, the rest of the food seemed a bit salty. Even the mushroom soup tasted salty and the cup that holds it is only as big as a wine cup. I have been to neighbourhood western food restaurants and their soup is a lot much nicer then that. I have not tasted brazilian cuisine before, so i am not sure are they really supposed to be a lot more salti

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: We arrived very much earlier than our reservation had stated, but the manager welcomed us with open arms. The buffet of salads was a very pleasant surprise, and is bound to please any vegetable lover! The variety of meats was also another pleasant surprise, and the waiter who explained how things worked and the several meat cutters were very friendly and patient when interacting with a first-time customer like me. Just a little note - one should definitely visit this place with a very empty stomach... there are up to 14 types of salad and 10 types of meat waiting to be savoured. This is definitely a place worth returning to!

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: Authentic Brazilian churrascaria in Singapore - great food and great service. Welcomed by a lady staffmember and promptly seated. Went for the $49 all you can eat deal. The buffet has typical Brazilian dishes like aipim frito (fried manioc/cassava) and palmito (hearts of palm, nicely grilled instead of cold). Farofa, feijoada, and caldinho available upon request. Then the meats started coming, including the star cut - the picanha, perfectly salted and grilled Brazilian style with a nice, smoky aroma. There is a reason why churrasco in Brasil is the paixao nacional, national passion because there is an art to grilling the meat, turning it to achieve the perfect temperature. Other cuts were equally delicious - maminha/alcatra, costelinha de boi (beef shortrib), picanha com alho (picanha laced with garlic), coracao/chicken hearts, etc. Pao de queijo was served on the table and two sauces - vinagrete and a sweet mint sauce (presumably for diners who prefer it for their lamb). They even have Guarana Antartica! Excellent service by the passadores/staff including the carioca Brazilian gentleman. The music coming through the soundsystem started off with Spanish guitar instrumentals (including a version of Manolo Escobar's Y Viva Espana) when they first started the dinner service, gradualling changing to Brazilian music including bossa nova (we heard Agua de Beber). Highly recommended, o sabor do Brasil em Cingapura, the taste of Brazil in Singapore - imperdivel - not to be missed - as they say in Brasil

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: Was in Singapore to watch "Air" in concert on Esplanade with wifey. But we decided to go couple of days earlier and have some Singaporean dishes. Had an idea to have a nice "meaty" dinner, so we browsed the internet and found this "Brazil Churrasco" pla

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: We've been to this place several times over the past 11 years. It's probably the longest surviving and best Brazailian style churrascarria restaurant in Singapore. It's still reasonable value by local standards (the all the meat you can eat buffet is S$49), and they will overwhelm you with meat while you're there. The service standards are really good by local standards. The staff are friendly and very attentive. That's the good par

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: My partner loves meat, so for his birthday, I thought of bringing him for Churrasco. At first I made a reservation at another Churrascaria restaurant in town, which I've been to a few times. Yet after reading up on handfuls of average or poor reviews of them on this website, I found Brazil Churrasco and visited for the first time this evenin

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: I have been to many churrascarias, both in Brazil as well as in the US and in Singapore. This place is the best one in Singapore and beats Carnivore hands down. The meats are fresher and better tasting and the service is great. The caipirinhas were nice and the salad buffet had enough variety to complement the several meats that the servers brought to our table.

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: I'll start if by saying the service was really good. The majority of the meat however is just average, and over salted. Perhaps coming from a part of the world where the meat is of high quality my expectations were too high. The pork/ham came off a round processed roll not leg ham. Poor quality cuts of lamb and beef except the beef rib which was good and tenderloin was ok. Chicken was 90% bone and the fish was almost inedible. We have been to many Brazilian BBQs joints around the world and this falls well short unfortunately. Not bad just not great. Harsh but fair

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: If you like your meat and visit or life in Singapore, this is a must visit. They have a nice salad buffet. And the servers come ate your table with big pieces of meat and slice parts directly on your plate so you get juicy meat. Think of pork, sirloin, chicken, lamb and so on. The sugar pineapple is nice ending to a great meal!

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: This is a restaurant I can strongly recommend. The service, the atmosphere and of course the food. Excellent all of it. The price is what to expect, average Singapo

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: I went with my family of four after we had been recommended by my father's friend. A lovely ambience. Staffs were friendly. Excellent service. Location is a little far from Orchard Road. There were a variety of meat and were delicious. But, pork hams were okay and chicken livers tasted weird. The little cheese balls were great as well! Will definitely visit more! :)

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: Located In 14/16 - 6th Ave - about 10 min from Orchard by Taxi (only 7 to 8 U

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: The meat cuts are great choice and the salad bar with great selection of healthy fo

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review:
Was warmly welcomed when arrived, amazing food salad bar was good but the meat is the main and it was delicious. The wonderful staff are super attentive and always make you feel you're in a Brazilian atmosphere. 
Will definitely come back and recommend.

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review:
Such fantastic service, so well explained and looked after. It was really impressive. 

Food was GREAT! A lot of food..... but the variety was awesome.

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: Located away from touri hotspots, at 6th Avenue, we found our place for me

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: Being from southern Brazil I have had BBQ almost at least twice a month over my lifetime. Tell you: This is the closest to the real thing you'll get in Singapor

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: First time I have been to this restaurant for a long time and I was not disappointed. Service was good the food kept comin

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: If you are a meat lover like me, look no further... skewers of meat cooked to perfection. Well seasoned, char grilled and yet medium rare... Super scrumptiou

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: Generally it's a decent experience for the price. Obviously they start with a big piece of chicken first (you can't take a small piece, so it's best to pass). The beef comes later - they have five different types of beef, and it's best to take as much as you can as it won't come back. While they have to turn a profit, it would be polite for the beef to come back some of the time. Perhaps I was disappointed because I had high expectations but I have tasted better outside Singapore. There's a good salad bar though. The low ceiling makes it deafening when the restaurant is full.

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: My whole family has been a regular here at Brazil Churrascaria since 2009. Everytime we have birthdays or overseas guests, we bring them here. From then until now, this is still our favorite! We did try other churrascarias but they're not even as close as this. Even our American friends agree this is one of the best churrascaria they've ever tasted. Selections at the salad bar are HUGE, it can satisfy both Western & Asian tastes. Try the banana fritters, Mango salad, fried baby spinach & other spicy mixed veggies which we never found somewhere else. Beware though: the sald bar can fill up your stomach before the meats come! Picanha is still our favorite from the meat selections, but the chicken heart, garlic beef, smoked duck & tenderloins are AWESOME too! Keep up the good work!

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: Sixth Avenue Singapore isn't exactly where I'd have expected to see a Brazilian Churrascaria, but there it is and has been there for over 20 years (apparently

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: I always find that it is one thing for a restaurant to serve amazing food, it's another to keep doing it consistently. My first visit to Brazil Churrasco was 20 years back and my latest yesterday. The consistency in the quality of meat and the standard of cooking is what keeps me coming back. Never fails to disappoint.

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: Everybody knows Brazil Churrasco is one of the better Churrasco restaurants in Singapore. I would only like to suggest they train their servers to treat everyone of different races equally.

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: We had dinner with friends at this place, and it is a traditional Churrascaria. I have been to many brazilian restaurants, in Brazil, Mexico, the US and other LA countries. This is the good stuff, it has a salad table where you can balance your meal with vegetables and other kinds of food, on top of the different kind of meat served by the passadore

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: If all brazillian food tastes this good, I might be missing out in life. With Brazil Churrasco located at Sixth Avenue, it might not be necessary to hop on-board the next flight to Rio. Excellent variety of beef cuts and other choices of meat like chicken and smoked duck. Beef hump was very tender and beef topside was juicy and lightly marinated so you really get to taste the flavor of the cut. This buffet meal is inclusive of a salad bar. Pineapple was lightly seasoned with cinnamon and sugar glazed, very beautiful and enjoyable. Overall fantastic spread.

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: No matter how hungry you are or how much you like meat, this place will totally change your perspective about what "too much" means! With about S$40 per person you have unlimited portions of good meat (all possible kinds) and an ala carte buffet with complimentaries. For dinner, try around 6-7 o' clock, it's the best time!

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: True Brazilian environment. Great meat, great service and for Singaporean standards fair price. Their Picanha was especially good and so was the caipirinha.

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: 2nd trip here and just as good as first.  More than enough meat and a very decent salad bar too.  Ate far too much!  Friendly service.  Will be back.

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: need to go if you love meat. nice Brazil restaurant in Singapore. good service. have also a salad bar. and is al you can eat.

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: I've been coming here since I was 19. It still is the best of its kind of restaurants here in sg. The meats are delectable, the pineapples are always charred just right, and the chicken hearts are little salty charred explosions of flavour in your mouth. The service and excellent and friendly, and their Caprioska are perfectly made. I've been to some of their rival Churrascaria, and although the salad bar pales in comparison cos it's so small (who has salad at these places anyway??!?), everything else is at least 80% better quality. Choose Brazil, nowhere else.

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: Yes, of course they have a great range of meats sliced straight from the skewer to your plate (most delicious rump steak, smoked duck, chicken and more). But I was surprised by the quality and range of the salad bar; I could happily dine on that alo

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: A lovely night out, the food was simply superb and there was a lot of it. I would go back for the salads alone. Although the meat was superb and definitely the highlight. The service was fantastic, this is after all what makes a great meal a terrific meal and here it is done effortlessly and with a smile. We will be back the next time the carnivore in us needs feeding.

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: Having Brazilian friends, we tried all of them in Singapore and this is surely the best and most authentic one. So now we only visit them when in need of real meat and Brazilian food! They have the best tasting saucy meat, so much choice and coming no stop. The buffet area is also very nice and with much variety to chose from. The waiters: I think they're the best in Singapore, so friendly and smiley, they always prepare for me a more "well done" meat when coming to serve it, it feels so nice to be pampered in a restaurant! Thank you guys! The menu has a fixed price and includes the buffet, the meat, some super nice little cheese breads with sauces and a little cup of soup. Don't forget to leave a space in the stomach for their grilled pineapple which is absolutely delicious! Highly recommended!

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: #NAME?

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: In all I was quite happy, except that most of the meats were quite salty. Considering the price, the quality was quite good. Service fine. Best to try a little of each, then stick with what you like, since several choices are very salty. The fish was excellent!

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: Been ages never have churrascaria style of dining. Looking high and low at 6th Ave, actually specially came to Singapore to have brazillian style of meat serving..and we chosed the right restaura

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: Everything here is amazing. From the tender meat that comes off the skewer to the huge salad bar. The variety is fantastic and all the meat is seasoned and cooked so well. Always a joy to eat here. The service is really good too and you are never left waiting.

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: The ambience was noise but everyone in a happy mood. Service was very attentive and efficient too, different kind of meat was served one after another in a superb Brazilian flavour juicy & tender yummy we loved the bbq pineapples at the end. Must try Caipirinha & Caipiroska as well. The right place to have a Brazilian atmosphere and original flavour of Brazil. As a Brazilian I strongly recommend this place for meat lovers. We'll come back for more.

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: Visited on Sunday for brunch. They served us on all-you-can-eat basis at $42. Different kind of meat was served one after another and we could not eat them all and told them we are full and we give up... We were not very impressed by the taste of meats but the baked pineapple they served was very special and never experienced before. We lobbed it soooo much and we consider revisit this place just for tha

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: Friend brought me here. It was great. Beef was juicy n tender. Don't over eat others. Beef is really the best. Roasted pineapple was great to go along. Wine was fine too. Nice place for dinner. Parking was manageable on the weekd

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: This is my 10 times back to old Brazilian cuisine. The meat was so tender and juicy and very tasty. Been away for 2 years and I came back, the taste remain the same, good vibes and most of all, the service, top notch! If you craving for Brazilian meat, go to Brazil Churrascaria at sixth avenue. strongly recommend, is a must. You won't disappointed!

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: Family with grandma visited the restaurant. You take veggies at the salad bar and start waiting for the meats to come. And the flow is varied and abundant! All you van eat, but mostly great stuff. Down to earth atmosphere and surroundings, but you are convinced by the great food!

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: Very good place to eat a brasilian barbecue. There is a very nice brasilian waiter. I can recomend it.

Name: Brazil Churrasco
Location: 14/16 Sixth Avenue Bukit Timah Road, Singapore 276476 Singapore
Review: 5th time back here, made a reservation for 4 but in the end only 2 of us turned up. After all these years, the quality of the meats, salad bar and service are still the same if not better. Still my favorite Churrascaria. Missed the fish yesterday though :(

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review:
Amazing place, very attentive service and the BEST butter naan we have ever tasted. 

We recommend this to everyone in Singapore. 

Sadly we discovered this place on our last night i Singapore...

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: extremely poor quality of food. The customer service was very bad. Never book any occasion they can't manage properly.

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: We were a group of 96 people booked for our Dinner, Mr. Javed is a great man who provided sitting plan beforehand and arranged DJ music system to play our Songs along with lighting system. Food was great so was service

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: A typical indian restaurant, quality of food is good. Choice of food not available more. You can try once.

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: We had buffet dinner on one night and found the food quality and service was  average. However the size and decoration of the restaurant was good.

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: My wife, her friend, and I stopped in for dinner last week. As a group of vegetarians and non-vegetarians of Indian and non-Indian descent, we were blown away by the cuisine and level of service that we receiv

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: Beautiful Décor.... friendly staff...fresh and nice mouth watering food....a lot of variety to choose from..... thoroughly enjoyed the evening...

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: Perhaps the only bad experience in Singapore. Staff was very rude and was picking up fights with all the guests. Quality of food was very ordinary compared to all the other restaurants we visited in our trip.

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review:
One of the best Indian Restaurant in Singapore,
The food was amazing as well as service, only the interior is not that authentic. But overall is amazing.

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: This Indian restaurant is located in a building which was almost empty but for this restauran

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: Food was very normal since they cater primarily to large tour groups. The place is not well maintained or clean either. We had to wait for a long time for refills. Food was pretty much average.

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: Went with 45 guests for lunch, had pre-booking and saw that rice was not hot, dal pretty watery, vegetables also not good, bread were stale, raita was like buttermilk, sweet dish kesari rawa was pretty ba

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: Amazing place with warm people n the most delicious Indian cuisine. Their dinner buffet was a delight n we treated ourselves to it for the entire week we were there.

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review:
great food... The Kebabs and Chicken Tikkas with mint chutney are a must!
....& if you get to chat with the owner Sat Singh when hes around, he'll personally guide you for your food preferences...
Wirth the trip there!

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: I have been to this place many times. Food was really good and staffs were courteous and friendly. Mr.Javed and his team were very polite and gives the eaters a memory for long.Sometimes ,it was over crowded with Indian groups but it itself reveals their taste and service.

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: We tri

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: Our family had stopped here to taste the non veg buffet. The food was kept cold and the chicken tasted stale. The ice cream was melted and no one seemed to bother about refilling the empty dishes. Quality of service and food was poor. U can really avoid this place as there are plenty of better Indian food options near by. Really bad experience.

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: It is on the ground floor of Park Royal on Kitchener Road. Excellent Buffet with reasonable price. Good Service

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: Well this was one of the best restaurant I found in terms of Vegetarian food in Little India area. Restaurant is well decorated, well maintained, food quality and taste was also very good. Restaurant is situated in the basement of Park Royal Hotel.

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: The restaurant is just next to park Royal Kitchener road hotel , The food ,desserts everything was good . Mango lassi must try

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: We were taken here by our tour manager. The food is average although the decor is a bit better than other Indian restaurants in similar price range. The space outside, corridoor leading to the restaurant, is not maintained cle

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: Jewel of India Singapore located in Little India serve is very tasty food ( both veg and non veg). Good ambiance and staff. Also it is walk able from Mustafa center.

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: Located in the basement of Park Royale. We were starving for a good Indian meal. The service rendered by Kawan was excellent! Love the mango lassi! Ambience is ok.

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: Very friendly Manager and other staff. Very much suitable to South & North Indians.Vegetarian & Non-vegetarian items are available for lunch & dinner. Had lunch( Buffet & Ala Carte) for 2 days.All dishes are displayed with placards to enable visitors to identify and select as per your choices.When required one can opt for take away al

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: This restaurant serves Indian cuisine both veg and non veg and also serves Indian tour groups. It is a 2 min walk from Mustafa center.

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: Just behind Park Royal hotel and offer authentic Indian food. Service is very good and fast with lovely food.

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: Courteous Staff and good quality of Indian food as if you are in India. Clean and good ambience with prompt service

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: we had Buffet Lunch & dinner hear ...Indian food is good .....but standard quality .....lots of PPL there many time too much full have to wait for Roti 15 mints.....over all Standard experience...........

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: Jewel of India serves an excellent Indian cuisines with option of normal or Jain food. On the first day of our stay in Singapore, we just dropped and enjoyed delicious food with human touch services. We choose to have our lunch and dinner all the 4 days stay in Singapore.

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: A pocket friendly option for those yearning for indian taste. The dishes were authentic indian in taste and tasty.

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: they normally serve indian buffet.. not verxm spacious sitting .. a very normal restaurent.. rather looks like as mess or canteen..

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: Please don't even think to try to have food in such a disgusting restaurant. The buffet dinner was presented good but the food quality was most worst. The food was cold and when we approach to staff for the same they behave very rudely. They say this is what we have its your choice to eat. Never try this restaurant even if they offer at free of cost. :(

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: Its a best place for Indians who are on Holidays in Singapore,Food quality is good taste is as good as in India,Special Thanks to Mr.Javed For exellent service

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: I was in Singapore with a group of 31 pax and we had around 3-4 meal's in this restaurant. On the first visit we were about 30-40 minutes late than the schedule time and the staff was so rude to the guest for that reason. I do understand that we were late but instead of serving the meals and insulting the guest they could have just refused to serve. The same pathetic service continued for the next two meal's but I found this common in all the Indian restaurant during our trip. Maybe they should take up a lesson or two in basic courtesy and hospitality.

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: We stayed in Parkroyal hotel and on last day, we had tried indian food here but to our despair, the food quality was not good.

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: Thou it is easy asseccible place from mustufa market food and serving was not good.. We get jain option bt that to limited... Waiters wer very rude... On asking about somethng they ignore us... While attending big grp,, they dont attend small grp.

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: We stayed at Hotel Park Royal on our visit to Singapore......this restaurant is in the Basement of the Hotel......this place is accessible from the Hotel Lobby...........Quality and Taste of food was good.......they have both veg and non veg opti

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: did not expect such good indian punjabi cuisine in Singapore. Feel at home by having food here in a foreign country..

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: Food was just Fab. Very difficult to get a vegetarian food in Singapore. But this hotel serves amazing Vegetarian food. Amazing.

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: Indian Restaurant in Singapore, we had our dinner for three days in this restaurant, no menu change. Staff was very arrogant in answering our query. Food quality average.

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: This is a genuinely Indian restaurant in little India. Buffet dinner is economical and very good but for excellent experience go for on order basis.

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: it was a nice dinner with my family, great food, I feel like in india, but it was quite crowded when we were there.

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: Dined on 3rd Nov

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review:
This Restaurant located in Little India and opposite Mustafa shopping mall also in front of Ferrari park MRT.
Good Quality and quantity also very nice and yummy.Staff also Good and co operative .
A nice place for Indian lunch & dinner.

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review:
With a lot of variety and options for all. 
Good taste makes you feel at home 
Very friendly staff and at a good location in little india though a bit inside the complex. 
A nice place for family, friends or corporates

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: There are many items of foods for customer. And also it is full of varieties custome.Maximum peoples like spicy and Dosha, it is very much Feverate for Indian.

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: We have enjoyed lunch & dinner. Found everything like Indian food & recipes. Staff are very helpful. Sit where you like. Food was less spicy

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
