Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: You will not feel you are out of India while you are in this restaurant. The staff is great & you feel like coming time & again. Great Indian food in a foreign nation.

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: Staff are very helpful. Sit where you like. Food can be made less spicy, in our case cooked to order with plus or minus different ingredients. (I wanted chicken and white sauce and nuts so they made me a korma. More sauce than chicken, but cashew nuts were good

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: Had a great time there. Adorable hospitality. Well educated staff. Delicious Indian food. If you are to have Indian taste, you must visit Jewel of India.

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: On 24-06-2016 visited the restaurant's as our tour operator booked there for dinner. We reached at 09-45 pm . We were told that our tour operator Tourland Travel PTE LTD 11277 has not booked any dinner there than I requested the staff to call my tour operator which was done by the manager with courteous which prove the nice nature of manager. Thereafter our dinner was confirmed. We take the dinner in buffet. Food was just average. Prices are normal . No special environment. Overall good.

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: On our tour at Singapore, we had dined a couple of times at Jewel of India restaurant. This place, whether at lunch or dinner time is seen busy. I think, all those tour operators managing visitors from India travelling in a conducted tour set up prefer this joint. Mainly because, the price of food is not high. Taste of Indian food items, I think is average. One thing positive I noticed was their effort to maintain cleanilness; inspite of heavy rush.. The variety of food items spread at the buffet table was also impressive, so also the standard of service offered by the staff. But the heavy rush and related sound problems created by India natives together with the lack of discipline / manners force me to rate it as an average restaurant

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review:
they serve good Indian food. Non veg and Veg both were quite delicious. Place is bit crowded as lot of tour groups visit.
Overall good place and low rates.

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: Its Buffet Spread which is limited and basically for Tour Operato

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: Average food. We had our Lunch buffet scheduled by tour operator in this restro. the food was pretty avaerage and fewer options.

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: Kids love the food , service is bit rude,buffet spread is not much,they can add more items may be icecream for desserts

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: Unfortunately don't want to comment more because we lost full impressi

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: Buffet food was good but very crowded and service very slow and staff were very rigid. Had to wait too long for the rotis to be served

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: Food is amazing in taste. They offer variety of food. If you are vegan then you don't need to worry. Vegetarian food is also awesome. Worth trying.

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review:
Hi,its a good resturent in little india back side of park royal nd mustafa...

Easy to reach.good food,We got buffet dinner with our package..but nice food,easy location,all variety in food in budget u can get here...

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: It is a nice restaurant if you want to have Indian food. you will also have buffet option as well...

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: The food is tasty and staff is very friendly. The order arrived quickly and the food was good. The only problem we had was that the restaurant had some tour tie-up where in the tourist who have come through a specified tour operator would come there to have their lunch/dinner. Because of which it was noisy and crowded and hence we have to change our table also.

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: I love Indian food and eat it at every opportunity. Jewel of India offered reasonable food that was well presented. Malai kofta could have had more flavour but the butter chicken was good. Table service was slow and the waiter seemed to get his inspiration from Lurch from the Addams family. Food came quickly.

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: A very tasty and good quality of Indian food that to be in a very decent location. Their staffs were very co-operative

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: The food is indeed very good. Better to order a-la-carte. Its better tan going for the buffet. Cheers guys.....

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: delicious buffet lunch and dinner..very good indian dishes..service is slow but food is tasty.good for indian food lover

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: An unassuming restaurant situated in the Arcade at L1 of the Parkroyal at Kitchener Road building, the is a great place to get really Indian food in Singapore. The preparations are good and are as per the actual Indian standards. The staff are very courteous and quite helpful on the phone when you place the order. The prices are also quite reasonable and not out of whack! The portions are filling for two and you wouldn't feel cheate

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: Had visited after our visit to the Night Safari

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: we 16 group of people visited this restaurant & find food quality is good. serving good variety. our some group member ask for  ATTA Fulka that was also served.

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: THe food is great and the service is satisfactory. Family run place, one can spot all of family members in front line. If personalized service is not expected then to have a buffet, one will enjoy the receipies.

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review:
good food, smiling staff and above all quick refilling of dishes for a group.
cleanliness was also remarkable

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: good food..they serve buffet dinner..good indian dishes including desserts.but too much rush there so we have to wait for rotis..else nice restaurant near mustafa centre

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: they have a complete set of menu for Indian food but you need to wait a but to get your stuff served to your table - though it took some time for me to get my food but I enjoyed it later

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: Food quality is very good.We have taken the buffet so there is little restriction on choice of food.

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: The location is good just behind Mustafa market in Little India but the food and services is a big let down. The place is always crowded with group's from various travel companies which results in total chaos. I have visited this place 3-4 times in last couple of years but every time it is the same story. I would suggest you try various local food eateries near the Mustafa Center.

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: Nice place to have Indian food. Though there is not much variety with respect to taste in different dishes I've ordered for take away, still I appreciate the quality & quantity of the stuff served. They may like to review the prices of items like Dal, Veg Biryani which are bit on the higher end.

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: Nothing great, rather the taste was no where near the Indian food. Had been there with my friends. Average ambience.

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: If you miss the Desi Chinese food in Singapore, look no further. This place serves great food- both Indian and Chinese. But Chinese is what they are best at, especially if want the Indian varie

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: Had 1 dinner with family. It offers buffet meals catering both veg and non veg dishes.We had eaten Butter fish curry,chicken curry and biryani.All were good. The nans were good do were sweets.Restaurant is situated near shopping hub of Indian tourist Mudtafa! Its medium sized clean eatery.only negative thing I can say is Plastic glasses are used to serve water

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: I was there for 4 days in singapore and i visited jewel of india on my 3rd day for my dinner and was feeling like 'WOW". Food was superb and well maintained resturant. seriously i wasted my money on day 1, i had chinese, south indian, and indian panner tikka masala was awsome, and non veg. over all I enjoyed..........:)

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: Centrally located below the Hotel Park Royal on Kitchener Road. Food is good but there is scope for improvement. The buffet variety is very limited - taste wise very good . Usually there are lots of groups so it gets crowded. Dinners a strictly no no , during lunch time not so crowded. Ambience not very great. Overall an OK experience with no major complaints.

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: Under the Hotel Park Royal Kitchener, Kitchener Road, very closed to Mustafa Shopping Mall, just   opposite door of the Mall, we had our dinner on 22nd Feb 2015, overall its ok with verity of food, not so spicy, we enjoyed , closing time 10:30 PM

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: We went for buffet lunch, no starter no verity rice no fruits no ice cream for this they charged $18 for adult nd my doughter is 3yr old for her they charged 14$. Very bad nd rude service no good ambience.. total waste of money

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: Serves the tastiest Indian food in singapore. Dont go with package coupon. Go for al a carte for yourself. I tried dal makhani, aaloo jeera, tandoori paneer tikka,jeera pulao, masala papad and butter naan. It was just awesome. Please do not go to any other Indian vegetarian restaurant. Just go to Jewel of India.

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: We enjoyed Three Days Buffet Dinner at this restaurant and It is better. My Parents liked it hence i can rate it tastes back to home.

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review:
This restaurant located at shopping arcade ! 
I could definitely say that compare to all little India side restaurant ! 
This is best one ! 
Great !!

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: i have visited singapore from 31st oct 14 to 4 th nov 14 with wife. our tour organiser has given us 4 coupon of four different restaurant, one of them is of jewel of india and it was the best o

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: This place is a good choice for those who just want to dine after a long day of outing in Singapore. Don't expect any great ambiance. It's just like a simple typical restaurant in India. Just a regular spread of Indian buffet, taste good though. It's not a place to hangout for a long relaxed evening. Just for a quick buffet dinner.

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: Lot of people from India get the food coupon of this restaurant when they book their meal in their package. For those people they provide separate buffet lunch/dinner. Be it a la carte or be it buffet, it lacks in variety and taste. Do not book your meal in your package-this will save your money and will give you a choice too.

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: When four of us enterd the restaurant,we found a big crowd making lot of noice.We thought of going back to another restaurant.We enquired about it.The crowd left in few mts.Three of us opted for Buffet lunch and one for Ala Carte.We liked all the food-a very delicious.Indian Bread was served very fresh abd hot.Both veg and non veg were tasty and we enjoyed the restaurant,Staff are caring.We recommend this restaurant.

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: Was having very high opinion on this restaurant cos of the name tag of " park royal"...we went for dinner buffet. Soup, veg curries, roti, biryani rice was served. The taste was very normal. Later we realized that its more of " group tourist" restaurant. Groups n groups of ppl were coming in and gng out of restaurant

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: I am from Jamnagar India. I stay in Singapore for 5 days. I came to jewel of India restaurant 4 times. Food is very very nice. Staff is very cooperative.I recommend all Indian vegetarian people this restaurant.

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: This is a shabby restaurant with pretty bad food. They mainly serve to large large groups from India who come to Singapore for a few days and are forced to eat here because of the group arrangements. The food is limited and awful in taste.As an example, they will serve you TOFU instead of panner and I tried the most watery rasam in entire Singapore here. The food is worth less than 5 bucks he

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review:
Looks good but can't get the expected taste.          
Not at all gud experience either single group or family

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: things to understan

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: big no

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: I will not recommend to any Indian to visit this restaurant, because neither the food is good nor service and behavior of staff is good. The over all environment of restaurant is so bad ( Can't explain in words).

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review: The restaurant is just behind Park Royal . The food is ok but the staff is not co-operating . For groups the capacity is less and it becomes crowded . Keeping Indian Group in mind the Restaurant should not be so strict in their policy.

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore
Review:
I have almost tried all the restaurants in Singapore, but I still like to visit this restaurant very often, the staff is very friendly, they have a huge seating capacity and the food quality is indeed outstanding.

I highly recommend this restaurant

Name: Jewel of India Restaurant
Location: 11 Sam Leong Road Trio Trio Building, Singapore 207903 Singapore

Name: Colony
Location: 7 Raffles Avenue Ritz Carlton Millenia Singapore The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore, Singapore 039799 Singapore
Review: Excellent service and food with reasonable price on CNY eve lunch. Our 3rd time here for CNY reunion. Will be back again

Name: Colony
Location: 7 Raffles Avenue Ritz Carlton Millenia Singapore The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore, Singapore 039799 Singapore
Review:
Decent high tea, sweet desserts were on point, however the savoury items had some space to grow.

Would be back for the sweet stuffs but not the savoury

Name: Colony
Location: 7 Raffles Avenue Ritz Carlton Millenia Singapore The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore, Singapore 039799 Singapore
Review: Brought my husband to have lunch at the Colony for his birthday and we were so grateful for the excellent service and food options offered. Colony offers good range of food options from western to local delights. The food was generally good but service delivery was excellent. Staff were attentive, polite, respectful and warm. We enjoyed our dining experience at The Colony and would certainly return to the Ritz for another round of food! Thank you everyone who made this day special for us!

Name: Colony
Location: 7 Raffles Avenue Ritz Carlton Millenia Singapore The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore, Singapore 039799 Singapore
Review: I don't often write reviews but felt compelled to after my anniversary dinner at the colony restaurant. Food was magnificent, always a very high standard. The thing that was different in this visit was that the buffet was table service because of COVID-19. The service was exceptional, Jega was our waiter and he was amazing and we had a fantastic evening because of his attitude and service. There we many others helping about but i didn't get all their names. Thanks for a great dinner and the amazing service.

Name: Colony
Location: 7 Raffles Avenue Ritz Carlton Millenia Singapore The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore, Singapore 039799 Singapore
Review: Had a wonderful Sunday dinner at Colony with its impressive service standards and attention to detail. Special mention to Katherine and Jinju for serving us throughout. Kudos to the team in Colony for such good service. The food was equally impressive and was served to our table promptly. :)

Name: Colony
Location: 7 Raffles Avenue Ritz Carlton Millenia Singapore The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore, Singapore 039799 Singapore
Review: Beng Kuan, our lovely waiter and his team made our dinner utterly delightful and an unforgettable experienc

Name: Colony
Location: 7 Raffles Avenue Ritz Carlton Millenia Singapore The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore, Singapore 039799 Singapore
Review: My wife and I celebrated our anniversary here with a dinner buffet. I have to say, apart from the wonderful food, the service was excellent! We were delightfully served by a male staff (i sadly didn’t catch his name) and Angie, who went the extra mile to make our evening a most pleasant one. Thank you!

Name: Colony
Location: 7 Raffles Avenue Ritz Carlton Millenia Singapore The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore, Singapore 039799 Singapore
Review: Good service, good food & probably the best buffet I ever had. Thanks Oliva for the excellent service, much appreciated. My gf and I  had a wonderful time! Highly recommended and will be back in the near future👍

Name: Colony
Location: 7 Raffles Avenue Ritz Carlton Millenia Singapore The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore, Singapore 039799 Singapore

Location: 7 Raffles Avenue Ritz Carlton Millenia Singapore The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore, Singapore 039799 Singapore
Review: We had a wonderful meal at Colony. Mr Jega attended to our table and made the experience very special. He recommended dishes, and the order in which we had them so as to ensure that the portions and dishes we ordered were manageable such that we could enjoy a large spread of the buffet without difficulty or feeling bloated after. Thumbs up for service excellence! The food was also very good with the dishes individually plated and tasty all around!

Name: Colony
Location: 7 Raffles Avenue Ritz Carlton Millenia Singapore The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore, Singapore 039799 Singapore
Review: I visited this place with my girl friends for cosy lunch.. since couple of us were vegetarians, were delighted with the good veg selection/options., would highly recommend for a cosy lunches / dinners along with of course with business lunches here.

Name: Colony
Location: 7 Raffles Avenue Ritz Carlton Millenia Singapore The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore, Singapore 039799 Singapore

Review: We have our regular family lunch at Ritz Carlton , Colony today. We wanted to give A Special Shout-out to Phil, who is very attentive and super efficient in attending our needs! Phil is very professional and customer-centric when serving us our buffet lunch. He is very patient and attends to all our special food requests. Great food and best in class service ! Thx Phil for giving us such a wonderful dining experience ! Ritz Carlton Colony is lucky to have u :)

Name: Colony
Location: 7 Raffles Avenue Ritz Carlton Millenia Singapore The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore, Singapore 039799 Singapore
Review: Very Good food and good service by Phil! He has been very patient servicing our table despite our different request.

Review: Excellent n attentive service by all staff, esp George Mun. V good quality food. Not expensive for quality n ambience. Will come back.

Review:
Most of the food is very nice. And fresh crab as well. 
Jinju's service is very helpful and she always attentive to us.

Name: Colony
Location: 7 Raffles Avenue Ritz Carlton Millenia Singapore The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore, Singapore 039799 Singapore
Review: Went to visit the Colony at Ritz Carlton for the very first time yesterday for lunch through a friend’s recommendation. We were warmly greeted and welcome by their staffs and seated immediately where i received a surprise of personalised plate of desserts..it is very thoughtful and i feel valued. Lee Lee was the one who attended us. She is very friendly, attentive and always checking on our needs.. i love the ambiance and the food is great.. every plate is nicely set up like fine dinning.. the experience is really good and surely i will be back. . Special thanks to Chef Elvy and Chef Vincent for making our dinning extra special. Truly, this place is 10/10 and highly recommended.

Name: Colony
Location: 7 Raffles Avenue Ritz Carlton Millenia Singapore The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore, Singapore 039799 Singapore
Review: We’ve been to plenty of hotel buffets but this is our top notch. The overall quality of food and service is really excellent. The staff who always attend to us is Zoe and she makes sure that we are satisfied with everything and from time to time she checks on us. Thank you once again Colony.

Name: Colony
Location: 7 Raffles Avenue Ritz Carlton Millenia Singapore The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore, Singapore 039799 Singapore
Review: My family and I went to celebrate my mum's birthday on 20th January 2021. It was our first time dining in at the Colony and probably the first time trying out a buffet service in a hotel during Covid time

Name: Colony
Location: 7 Raffles Avenue Ritz Carlton Millenia Singapore The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore, Singapore 039799 Singapore
Review: My entire family experienced a lovely and extraordinary dinner over at Colony, where the food and service were astounding! My mum's 90th birthday dinner ended with a special surprise from the kitchen as well! Special mention to Gery, Chef Cheung, Chef Ling, Chef Kelly, Chef Kim Hui, Chef Ang, Chef Yeow, Richard, Wei Leh, Wei Qiang, Elvy, Deepak, Phil, Connie, Tessa, Regina, Elena, Ben and Firdausi who not only served us exceptionally throughout the meal, but also paid extreme attention to our needs. We are very thankful and appreciative to the team for their hard work and dedication in providing us with such an unforgettable dining experience. Highly recommended!

Name: Colony
Location: 7 Raffles Avenue Ritz Carlton Millenia Singapore The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore, Singapore 039799 Singapore
Review: We went to Colony to celebrate Grandma’s 95th Birthday on the 6th January 2021. As always we enjoyed our time in Colon

Name: Colony
Location: 7 Raffles Avenue Ritz Carlton Millenia Singapore The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore, Singapore 039799 Singapore
Review: My family and I have dined at Colony several times in the past. We have always enjoyed our meals there. Recently, we went for the Sunday buffet dinner and were so delighted to be back again. Everything was designed to be a seamless experience - from the booking of our tables to the ordering and serving of our foo

Name: Colony
Location: 7 Raffles Avenue Ritz Carlton Millenia Singapore The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore, Singapore 039799 Singapore
Review: Went for the buffet here, service was impeccable and attentive. Wide variety of food to try. Would like to especially highlight Carmela who was the service staff that serve us that day , Alfian who brought us to our table. And another Chinese lady who also took our orders. Thank you for making a seemingly ordinary day special. Keep up the good work, you guys are doing great!

Name: Colony
Location: 7 Raffles Avenue Ritz Carlton Millenia Singapore The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore, Singapore 039799 Singapore
Review: The choice of food seemed endless and was absolutely delicious! Service was impeccable and attentive.

Name: Colony
Location: 7 Raffles Avenue Ritz Carlton Millenia Singapore The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore, Singapore 039799 Singapore
Review: My husband and I were extremely impressed with the food and service at The Colony. The food prepared by Chefs Dee Pak, Wei Qiang, Richard, Andy and Yeow was exceptional. Every dish had very high standards. Special thanks to service staff Mdm Lee Lee. She provided 6-star service throughout our meal. She was extremely attentive to my needs. She knew that being heavily pregnant, I would have backaches and provided a cushion for support. This kind gesture really touched us. I would also like to thank service staff Connie for taking our orders repeatedly with a smile. They made us feel really comfortable dining at The Colony! Thank you so much. We appreciate the Team and their efforts!

Name: Colony
Location: 7 Raffles Avenue Ritz Carlton Millenia Singapore The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore, Singapore 039799 Singapore
Review: Probably the best buffet in Singapore (alongside Hyatt's Straits Kitchen). But this offers much more variety in seafood. Love the lobster (when available) and the alaskan crab. Laksa is good too. Juices are fresh and the live dessert station is a real treat. Service is good too and food is replenished quickly. No surcharge for non-alcoholic drinks which is grea

Name: Colony
Location: 7 Raffles Avenue Ritz Carlton Millenia Singapore The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore, Singapore 039799 Singapore
Review: It was lovely to be able to have a group of 8! A special mention is needed about our fabulous waiter, Phil, from South Korea. He was fantastic! Really attentive, quiet and subtle with everything. He managed to take orders from the 8 of us repeatedly as we ordered more of each course. We all enjoyed the wonderful range of local food from Chinese, Indian and western selections. Dessert was our favourite course as it was executed superbly. Often desserts disappoint at large choice menus like this in Singapore, but not at Colony! Lovely setting as well.

Name: Colony
Location: 7 Raffles Avenue Ritz Carlton Millenia Singapore The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore, Singapore 039799 Singapore
Review: The Colony has never failed to give me a good experience! The food quality is top notch, try the seabass, I loved it! Huge selection of desserts, I love the smores the most! Good service provided by everyone, I'd like to give a shoutout to Firdaus for his affable nature! He even offered me a birthday cake when I went on my birthday! I highly recommend The Colony for a great time!

Name: Colony
Location: 7 Raffles Avenue Ritz Carlton Millenia Singapore The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore, Singapore 039799 Singapore
Review:
Had a wonderful time at the Colony with great service from staff MJ and Lee Lee. A surprise birthday cake beautifully decorated by chef. Definitely be back. Exceeded our expectations.
Grace & Raymond

Name: Colony
Location: 7 Raffles Avenue Ritz Carlton Millenia Singapore The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore, Singapore 039799 Singapore
Review: Had a new year eve lunch. Was served by Wahida, and service was impeccable. Our orders were always taken quickly, food arrived promptly as well. Food were all good. When we were done with the main course, we were recommended to try all the desserts, and they were all very good! Had a surprise birthday cake at the end. Very memorable and highly recommended!

Name: Colony
Location: 7 Raffles Avenue Ritz Carlton Millenia Singapore The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore, Singapore 039799 Singapore
Review: Our visit was great. Ambience was good and the interiors are IG worthy. Alona’s service was exceptional. She attented to our needs promptly and cheerfully. Will definitely visit again.

Name: Colony
Location: 7 Raffles Avenue Ritz Carlton Millenia Singapore The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore, Singapore 039799 Singapore
Review: Staff alona was in our service inspite of the orders on the other table she still manages her time to cater for our needs and orders. Apparently i was shooked when i saw a mushroom in our steamed buns but it was a salted egg pao that looked like a mushroom, such a brilliant idea of whoever made it

Name: Colony
Location: 7 Raffles Avenue Ritz Carlton Millenia Singapore The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore, Singapore 039799 Singapore

Name: Colony

Review: It is our 1st time visit for the Sunday champagne buffet lun

Name: Colony
Location: 7 Raffles Avenue Ritz Carlton Millenia Singapore The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore, Singapore 039799 Singapore
Review: The best brunch in Singapore! Service is amazing..shout out to Mr. Jega, he went above and beyond and suggested the best dishes. A big thank you as he definitely made a special experience much more special!

Name: Colony
Location: 7 Raffles Avenue Ritz Carlton Millenia Singapore The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore, Singapore 039799 Singapore
Review: Serving staff worked very hard and chefs tried to keep up with demand. In the end , only 2 out of many dishes were praiseworthy in an a Al's carte setting

Name: Colony
Location: 7 Raffles Avenue Ritz Carlton Millenia Singapore The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore, Singapore 039799 Singapore
Review: Lovely ambience for a festive celebration. The staff Dunstan, Ben and Carmela provided 5 star service; they were warm, attentive and very professional. Food was awesome. Will definitely return.

Name: Colony
Location: 7 Raffles Avenue Ritz Carlton Millenia Singapore The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore, Singapore 039799 Singapore
Review: Jega was our server. We had a nice table that we could talk amongst one another. Jega gave us little plates of different appetizers, main courses & desserts to try which was so helpful.

Name: Colony
Location: 7 Raffles Avenue Ritz Carlton Millenia Singapore The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore, Singapore 039799 Singapore
Review: Since COVID 19 restrictions, the usual Buffet spread had been turned to similar to fine dining experience.   Food are served in small plates and lead by Manager Deepak, Elena offered attentive service to Chef Gordon, Elvy & Sharie Xmas pastry spread.  Enjoyable experience.

Name: Colony
Location: 7 Raffles Avenue Ritz Carlton Millenia Singapore The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore, Singapore 039799 Singapore
Review: Food is great, ambience is warm and cozy, wait staff are very attentive and helpful particularly Dunstan who went above and beyond to ensure we had a great evening.

Name: Colony
Location: 7 Raffles Avenue Ritz Carlton Millenia Singapore The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore, Singapore 039799 Singapore
Review: We dined here mainly for fresh seafood, for this five-star price point, lobster was expected, but absent. Salmon sashimi was thin and pale, and the rest was utterly unmemorable, except its well-cooked laksa. The following week, we went to Spice Brasserie at four-star ParkRoyal Kitchener Rd, and at almost half the price of Colony’s, we derived so much more utility from the former. All I can say is, never judge the book by its cover. So true.

Name: Colony
Location: 7 Raffles Avenue Ritz Carlton Millenia Singapore The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore, Singapore 039799 Singapore
Review: This was something we booked many weeks back and had looked forward to, it did not disappoi

Name: Colony
Location: 7 Raffles Avenue Ritz Carlton Millenia Singapore The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore, Singapore 039799 Singapore
Review: The food was good and I am extremely full. I am extremely satisfied by the service by our server Dunstan was very good. He was very responsive and assisted us a lot. He was chatty and approachable and had great attention to detail.

Name: Colony
Location: 7 Raffles Avenue Ritz Carlton Millenia Singapore The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore, Singapore 039799 Singapore
Review: Came here on a Friday afternoon to have afternoon tea i called to make a booking and the hotel called me again to reconfirm my booki

Name: Colony
Location: 7 Raffles Avenue Ritz Carlton Millenia Singapore The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore, Singapore 039799 Singapore
Review: Had a disappointing experience while calling in to book as they didn’t put me in their waiting list and only the 3rd call that I found out. However, we managed to get our seating after the 4th call and the server, Jega has done a great job serving us by making sure we tried 90% of the food. He has made sure that we have tried the signature dishes and given us the customised portion throughout dinner. He took great photos for us too.

Name: Colony
Location: 7 Raffles Avenue Ritz Carlton Millenia Singapore The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore, Singapore 039799 Singapore
Review: Excellent service and food - we dined at Colony during the Covid period hence buffet was ala carte style. The menu was put online and you can scan the QR code to access the digital version but a staff will still come to your table and take down your order. The service was very prompt and the staff very attenti

Name: Colony
Location: 7 Raffles Avenue Ritz Carlton Millenia Singapore The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore, Singapore 039799 Singapore
Review: Second visit to Colony for family member’s birthday. Food and experience were awesome! We were served by Dunstan and again was impressed by the service at colony! Will definitely come back again.

Name: Colony
Location: 7 Raffles Avenue Ritz Carlton Millenia Singapore The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore, Singapore 039799 Singapore

Lu family

Location: 7 Raffles Avenue Ritz Carlton Millenia Singapore The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore, Singapore 039799 Singapore
Review: Booked a table for 2 to celebrate my partner’s 29th birthday. Wrote an email to the restaurant on special requests and gotten a quick response! Had a very satisfying dinner with a wonderful spread (Festive Menu). Also, special shout-out to Dunstan - who was very friendly and provided excellent service. His food recommendations was also on point! Very lucky to have him to assist us that day ☺️ Will definitely recommend my friends and family to Colony. Money well-spent!

Name: Colony
Location: 7 Raffles Avenue Ritz Carlton Millenia Singapore The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore, Singapore 039799 Singapore
Review: Had a wonderful dining experience here at the Colo

Name: Colony
Location: 7 Raffles Avenue Ritz Carlton Millenia Singapore The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore, Singapore 039799 Singapore
Review: The service here is great, we are impressed with Candice who provided an excellent service to us. She was very patient with our requests and always gave us her full attention. My son and his girlfriend went back to Colony bakery 2 days later to get some bread and they were pleasantly surprised when Candice greeted them personally! She also gave them a good recommendation of bread. Keep up the great work, Candice!

Name: Colony
Location: 7 Raffles Avenue Ritz Carlton Millenia Singapore The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore, Singapore 039799 Singapore
Review:
Superb service - made us feel very welcome. Thank you!

Loved the array of food from ice bar (oysters, seafood, sashimi) to the grills and local delights.

Name: Colony

Name: Colony
Location: 7 Raffles Avenue Ritz Carlton Millenia Singapore The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore, Singapore 039799 Singapore
Review: Staff member Elena was very focus on us when she was handing us the bill. She suggest us use the credit card she saw in our wallet to get the maximum discount. Another staff member surnamed Song was eager to serve us well.

Name: Colony
Location: 7 Raffles Avenue Ritz Carlton Millenia Singapore The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore, Singapore 039799 Singapore
Review:
The staff are excellent, caring and able to response well. 
Food wise, some of the cooked food could be hotter rather than room temperature. 
Overall the staff and atmosphere compensate the food quality in some areas.

Review:
Great service staff who tend to the needs of customer. Thumbs up for Dunstan and Jessica. Food are great as well. 

Highly recommended.

Name: Colony
Location: 7 Raffles Avenue Ritz Carlton Millenia Singapore The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore, Singapore 039799 Singapore
Review: A cake i get from ritz bakery for my birthday. As I was on a keto diet. I made a request for them to make a keto cake for me and they did it. A beautiful and tasty cake. The most healthy cake ever which taste like any other cake !!!. And it's not too expensiv

Name: Colony
Location: 7 Raffles Avenue Ritz Carlton Millenia Singapore The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore, Singapore 039799 Singapore
Review: The service here is very good and the place is very peaceful and calming. The entire experience is made perfectly wonderful by a very patient and attentive Jega from arrival to end.👍👍👍

Name: Colony
Location: 7 Raffles Avenue Ritz Carlton Millenia Singapore The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore, Singapore 039799 Singapore
Review:
Mr Dunstan .
Service Excellence.
If we should come again, it is because of Mr Dunstan.

Keep it up!  Thank you.

Name: Colony
Location: 7 Raffles Avenue Ritz Carlton Millenia Singapore The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore, Singapore 039799 Singapore
Review: Sunday brunch at the Ritz Colony is the most delectable affair. We were lucky enough to have Sega - the best host ever - to take care of us both times we headed there. Rest assured that the menu is fit for royalty, and we enjoyed ever since bite presented. I actually love the post-Covid ala carte servings - it gives us a small taste of each dish without being overwhelmin

Name: Colony
Location: 7 Raffles Avenue Ritz Carlton Millenia Singapore The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore, Singapore 039799 Singapore
Review: Other than the delectable food of wide variety I have ever seen in Colony Restaurant, I would like to undeniably commend an outstanding service figure, Mr Dunstan, for his utmost dedication in his service towards his beloved customers, including not least me. I am profoundly impressed by his delicate meticulousness in paying attention to details, and his nature instinct in remembering my food preference without any repeats, as well as making constructive suggestions to bettering my meal experienc

Name: Colony
Location: 7 Raffles Avenue Ritz Carlton Millenia Singapore The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore, Singapore 039799 Singapore
Review: We had a great experience and the staff was lovely, especially Dunstan, Elena, Jenny and Gina. They were super attentive and made the brunch a great time.

Name: Colony
Location: 7 Raffles Avenue Ritz Carlton Millenia Singapore The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore, Singapore 039799 Singapore
Review: There to celebrate friend's birthday. Great ambience with perfect lighting! My second time during pandemic! What I must say is Ritz Carlton still keep their impeccable service intact or even better, with their a-la-carte service with good quality food. Oh the oyster a bit small but it's ok, it's free flow. Service Staff, Lee Lee and Phil has gone out of the way to meet my last minute request of a birthday cake though. Plus, Phil made it happen to get me swordfish sashimi, the medium beef steak and the cheese I prefer. It was peak hour and kitchen was busy too. Felt so taken care of. They are attentive to their guests. Thank you Chef Vincent and Chef Jason (though I didn't get the chance to meet them) for making such awesome plating! Price wise, totally worth it with such wonderful experience. $84/pax. With Citibank card, you get 10% off. With Gst and Service charge, that would be $88.97/pax. Moreover, if you drive, it's only $2.20 per entry after 6pm. Oh well, just get the free complimentary parking ticket from their friendly staff.

Name: Colony
Location: 7 Raffles Avenue Ritz Carlton Millenia Singapore The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore, Singapore 039799 Singapore
Review: Went to Colony with a friend last night and it was my first “sit down” buffet. Colony never disappoints! Loved the food and even though we were seated, the staff (especially Jessica) kept checking up on us, making sure we have our food and drinks all the time. It was pretty crowded but the staff made us feel like we were the only guests ther

Name: Colony
Location: 7 Raffles Avenue Ritz Carlton Millenia Singapore The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore, Singapore 039799 Singapore
Review:
1st time to eat the colony.I would to commend Carmela for the exceptional food service giving recommendation and making sure we have a wonderful experience.great ambiance on the hotel.staffs are very neat and smooth on the service.high recommended.Good stuff ! Thank you
-Jon

Name: Colony
Location: 7 Raffles Avenue Ritz Carlton Millenia Singapore The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore, Singapore 039799 Singapore
Review: The lunch spread at The Colony was ample and delicious. The waiters served the dishes to our tables due to Covid restrictions. The dishes were impeccably presented. It felt like fine dining instead of buffe

Name: Colony
Location: 7 Raffles Avenue Ritz Carlton Millenia Singapore The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore, Singapore 039799 Singapore
Review: Our first time over for dinner buffet, as my husband was craving for chilled king crab. We have been to other hotel buffets and wanted to try some place ne

Name: Colony
Location: 7 Raffles Avenue Ritz Carlton Millenia Singapore The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore, Singapore 039799 Singapore
Review: Thank You Colony's Chef and Service Crew for making it special for my wife's birthday. The food is decious and attentive service. They even specially customise a dish for us that is not available in the me

Name: Colony
Location: 7 Raffles Avenue Ritz Carlton Millenia Singapore The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore, Singapore 039799 Singapore
Review: Celebrated our One year Anniversary at Colony. The spread was great accompanied by excellent service. The crew were so sweet to congratulate us with a cake too! Had a wonderful afternoon. Special thanks to Mr Deepak, Katy, Regina, Jenny and LeeLee who was always checking on me knowing that I was pregnant. They ensured our needs were met and were very thoughtful. We enjoyed ourselves very much! While we hope to see such services often, we are definitely coming back here! (;

Name: Colony
Location: 7 Raffles Avenue Ritz Carlton Millenia Singapore The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore, Singapore 039799 Singapore
Review: Thank you to the team at Ritz. Had a birthday celebration for my dad and he was so happy with the food selection & champagne. Thank you Candice & Katherine for the excellent service. The team went out of their way to chat my parents personally. Truely a wonderful experience at Ritz. Will definitely be back again.

Name: Colony
Location: 7 Raffles Avenue Ritz Carlton Millenia Singapore The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore, Singapore 039799 Singapore
Review: Quality of food is superb. The service is top notch. Best service I experienced. Special thanks to Jenny and team for making the night special for my wife and i. Special thanks to Jenny who caught up with us after we left the restaurant without our cake.

Name: Colony
Location: 7 Raffles Avenue Ritz Carlton Millenia Singapore The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore, Singapore 039799 Singapore
Review: Great service & food, thank you for taking note of my birthday! Special thanks to: Connie, Rudi, Raj, all the chefs on duty & especially Lee Lee for the wonderful service, care & preparation during the entire dining experience I really enjoyed myself! Can’t wait to be back :)

Name: Colony
Location: 7 Raffles Avenue Ritz Carlton Millenia Singapore The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore, Singapore 039799 Singapore
Review: It’s my first time dining at colony and I had an enjoyable birthday lunch. The ambience was good especially during lunchtime as there are ample light for photo taking. The food served was also fresh and tasty. I would like commend on the team who served us that day that the service was really top notched. Special thanks to chef Sherri, Nicolas and Chuah, Lee Lee, Phil, Tessa and MJ. They even prepared a birthday cake for me and it was so well done! Would definitely recommend to anyone celebrating their special occasions to dine there!

Name: Colony
Location: 7 Raffles Avenue Ritz Carlton Millenia Singapore The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore, Singapore 039799 Singapore
Review: Wonderful lunch at the Colony this afternoon! A wide selection of food from seafood to Singaporean delights at a very reasonable price. Due to COVID19, diners are unable to get food directly from the counter and are served directly at the table in platters instead. Service was impeccable with quick food service and plates clearing. I mentioned in passing that it was my friend's birthday and they immediately prepared a birthday cake with candles! A wonderful personal touch with the best service. Shout out to MJ from the service team. Would highly recommend.

Name: Colony
Location: 7 Raffles Avenue Ritz Carlton Millenia Singapore The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore, Singapore 039799 Singapore
Review: Came here for husband’s birthday celebration at Colony. The food was amazing with wide range of selections and served hot or warm. The services were prompt and our attending server Jega demonstrated exceptional service attitude and he truly made our evening so much more enjoyable. Thank you Jega.

Name: Colony
Location: 7 Raffles Avenue Ritz Carlton Millenia Singapore The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore, Singapore 039799 Singapore
Review: Phil,Tessa and Lee Lee was very friendly staff. Lee Lee was provide a great service and good communication with us . Besides,thanks for the Chef sherie, Chuah, Farah and Kim hui make us a wonderful birthday cake.we also enjoy the delicious food cook by Chef Nicolas and the drinks was very appetite done by Symon. Sure will come back next time.

Name: Colony

Review: Another excellent time at the Colony,Ritz Carlton for their Lunch Buffet to celebrate my Birthday. Delicious food and tremendously great service .Special thanks to all staffs that looked after us - Chef Sherie, pastry , chef Chuah Chef Kim hui Chef Nicolas , farah, pastry , phil , tessa , lee lee and also symon. Thry have special make a cake for my birthday love it very much. I will highly recommend all of you to come to colony buffet. Will come again to enjoy the buffet again. Love thier excellent service and nice dishes.

Name: Colony

Name: Colony

Name: Colony

Name: Colony

Overall still lovely ambience and great experience with great service

Name: Colony

Review: Fantastic service from the staff @ Colony! Special mention to Ms Lee Lee . She was very attentive and friendly, coming over to check on our needs and providing us suggestions on the food selection and giving special treats to my little boy.

Name: Colony

Boston lobster are the best!

Name: LeVeL33
Location: 8 Marina Boulevard #33-01 Marina Bay Financial Centre Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 1, Singapore 018981 Singapore
Review: Panoramic city view is just a bonus. Warth service of the staff is what we loved most. Special thanks to Mr. Mike for being hands-on and entertaining with all the guest. He'll make sure you'll get the best experience here. He knows which menu and drinks to recommend depending on your preference. Chef's collection's absolutely worth a try! We'll surely come back here.

Name: LeVeL33
Location: 8 Marina Boulevard #33-01 Marina Bay Financial Centre Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 1, Singapore 018981 Singapore
Review: The food is good, love the view. And the service provided by Ate Mel. Thank you so much! Good for celebrating for a special occasion. Will come back to try their beer.

Name: LeVeL33
Location: 8 Marina Boulevard #33-01 Marina Bay Financial Centre Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 1, Singapore 018981 Singapore
Review: Ambiance of the place is very nice, specially the view. Our server Mhel is very friendly and accomodating. She even surprised us with a cake and wine since we are celebrating our anniversary.

Name: LeVeL33
Location: 8 Marina Boulevard #33-01 Marina Bay Financial Centre Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 1, Singapore 018981 Singapore
Review: Should have more friendly and cheerful staff so it will worth for the value and more returns. Food overall is good and it wil be great if more varieties.

Name: LeVeL33
Location: 8 Marina Boulevard #33-01 Marina Bay Financial Centre Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 1, Singapore 018981 Singapore
Review: The ambience and food were great. On top of this, the staff service was superb. They explained about the menu, and understood what was the occasion we are celebrating. Lastly they surprise us with little dessert. Such a personalized dinner. Thanks Mel

Name: LeVeL33
Location: 8 Marina Boulevard #33-01 Marina Bay Financial Centre Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 1, Singapore 018981 Singapore
Review: The view is amazing, and what is more important is the great hospitality we received from the staff. They are very helpful, and try their very best to accommodate to our request. Food quality is good, and not overpriced!

Name: LeVeL33
Location: 8 Marina Boulevard #33-01 Marina Bay Financial Centre Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 1, Singapore 018981 Singapore
Review: View was nice but only if you sit outside, limited to max 4pax. Food was average and not worth the price. Service was too uptight, felt uncomfortable.

Name: LeVeL33
Location: 8 Marina Boulevard #33-01 Marina Bay Financial Centre Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 1, Singapore 018981 Singapore
Review: We really love the place and the ambience. The food was great and the scenery too. Perfect for celebrating special occassion. The staff are very accomodating specially to Mheil.Kudos to her 👍👍 Thank you for the wonderful experience. I will definitely recommend you guys ❤

Name: LeVeL33
Location: 8 Marina Boulevard #33-01 Marina Bay Financial Centre Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 1, Singapore 018981 Singapore
Review: My friends and I had a great time at LeVel 33. The beer, food and service are excellent. The view is fantastic. Will definitely go back again.

Name: LeVeL33
Location: 8 Marina Boulevard #33-01 Marina Bay Financial Centre Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 1, Singapore 018981 Singapore
Review: We visited LeVeL33 for our wedding date and it was the most memorable and enjoyable experience. It was a recommendation by a friend and I remembered that it had a fantastic view of the Marina Bay area. The cherry on top of our evening was our server, Mhel, who was cheerful, pleasant and wonderful to boot. She congratulated us with complimentary champagne and dessert. She also went the extra mile with her service by offering to help us with photo-taking to commemorate our important day. Thank you,.Mh

Name: LeVeL33
Location: 8 Marina Boulevard #33-01 Marina Bay Financial Centre Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 1, Singapore 018981 Singapore
Review: Great ambiance, great food and great craft beer choices🍻 The whole staff are very accomodating, special mention to Mheil for the good service👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻 Will definitely return..Cheers!🎉

Name: LeVeL33
Location: 8 Marina Boulevard #33-01 Marina Bay Financial Centre Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 1, Singapore 018981 Singapore
Review: We decided to celebrate our anniversary here because of the view. To be honest, we didn’t set our expectation too high on their food. We were like “they are just a restaurant with a view”, just like what we experienced from other restaurants with a view as well. For our mains, we ordered their wagyu tri-tip and mushroom risotto and to our surprise, this is by far the best restaurant with not just a view but a delectable food. The wagyu melts in your mouth and the risotto is very flavourful. We also had oysters, seafood medley, pistachio ice cream and chocolate tart and we enjoyed every bit of it. It is not just the food that captured my attention but also their impeccable service. Your server Jayson did a very good job. He was very professional. We were also served by Joyce and she made our experience here very memorable. We felt very special they way she made sure that we will have a great night and she always check on us without being rude. She even volunteered to take photo of us outside. So sweet! She’s more than just a professional server. She treats every guest very special. She also invited us to try out their lunch, she described it more than what we can imagine so we will definitely try it soon. we might request her to be our server on our next visit or you can request her if you are planning to visit here. Your servers may be wearing masks but good job on training them to still show good emotions through their eyes. We really really enjoyed celebrating our anniversary her

Name: LeVeL33
Location: 8 Marina Boulevard #33-01 Marina Bay Financial Centre Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 1, Singapore 018981 Singapore
Review: This is my second visit to this place! Love the view, the food and most of all the service. Mhel took care of us this evening and she was just wonderful.

Name: LeVeL33
Location: 8 Marina Boulevard #33-01 Marina Bay Financial Centre Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 1, Singapore 018981 Singapore
Review: Upon entering the restaurant I was greeted by very friendly service staff who checked my reservation and showed me to my table. Water was also served while we were browsing the menu and there was no pressure to order asap. Throughout the meal the staff were attentive and provided great service. Would definitely revisit the restaurant and recommend it to others!

Name: LeVeL33
Location: 8 Marina Boulevard #33-01 Marina Bay Financial Centre Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 1, Singapore 018981 Singapore
Review: Mhel expressed professional service to us throughout our dinner and was super friendly towards our kiddos. She was helpful and always taking the initiatives to help us with photo taking. Kudos to Mhel! Thank you for making our dinner so much more memorable!

Name: LeVeL33
Location: 8 Marina Boulevard #33-01 Marina Bay Financial Centre Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 1, Singapore 018981 Singapore
Review: we are celebrating our 19th Wedding Anniversary in Level 33, we were place on the high table view. Food wise, it is average.

Name: LeVeL33
Location: 8 Marina Boulevard #33-01 Marina Bay Financial Centre Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 1, Singapore 018981 Singapore
Review: Great level 33 ambience with Singapore sky,  delicious Christmas lunch 😋 friendly and efficient staffs especially Joyce who had served our table. 💓💝thumb up for those who brew the 🍺 🍻 beer. Happy 2021 and God bless✌

Name: LeVeL33
Location: 8 Marina Boulevard #33-01 Marina Bay Financial Centre Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 1, Singapore 018981 Singapore
Review: Great view and very accommodating. Mhel is really helpful and accommodating... Highly recommend... must look for her if you guys visits level33

Name: LeVeL33
Location: 8 Marina Boulevard #33-01 Marina Bay Financial Centre Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 1, Singapore 018981 Singapore
Review: We ordered weekend lunch. Our appetizer, Asparagus and Minestrone, are both delightful. For Wagyu main, with slight marble and some tendon (so not too soft), we feel it’s better than some too-fat Wagyu. Staff are helpful, and the view from rooftop is awesome. Will certainly visit again!

Name: LeVeL33
Location: 8 Marina Boulevard #33-01 Marina Bay Financial Centre Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 1, Singapore 018981 Singapore
Review: It was my first time dining at Level 33 and I would say that it’s was an excellent experience. I make a call for last minute enquiries and booking and was wondering if I can make a reservation for 2 for dinner. Sadly, it’s was fully booked. Yet, they assured me if I don’t mind, there’s availability for 2 out in the open ( it’s raining week! ) that I can book for lunch and so, of course, I happily accepted and confirmed my booking! Upon arriving on that day itself, I was greeted by 4 beautiful ladies ( hostess) and was lead by Ms Birdie ( yup, that’s right, that’s her name for real ) to the table. They acknowledged me that the table in the open were still in preparation and will lead me to once it’s ready. Well, I don’t mind to wait. We checked on the menu and placed our orders. Waiters and waitresses were really helpful and attentive to our needs. When the table was ready, we went out but again, we were back inside as we were afraid for the rain sorry to trouble you guys. Last but not least, I would like to say thank you to everyone that had served us and the free flows of raw platters, I’m definitely loving it! I had too much! keep up your great work everyone! You all are AMAZING!!

Name: LeVeL33
Location: 8 Marina Boulevard #33-01 Marina Bay Financial Centre Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 1, Singapore 018981 Singapore
Review: Locat

Name: LeVeL33
Location: 8 Marina Boulevard #33-01 Marina Bay Financial Centre Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 1, Singapore 018981 Singapore
Review: The location, the view, the hospitality, the helpfulness of the staff, and of course the F&B - all were top notch

Name: LeVeL33
Location: 8 Marina Boulevard #33-01 Marina Bay Financial Centre Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 1, Singapore 018981 Singapore
Review: Although it was a rainy day, the service staff allowed us to have our outdoor seats (do book in advance!) once the rained stopped so that we could enjoy the view while having our meal. Shoutout to Mehl who was very attentive and friendly - we were also celebrating a birthday and she was very helpful with taking photos, and also threw in a complimentary brownie dish for dessert! Thanks for the memorable dinner :)

Name: LeVeL33
Location: 8 Marina Boulevard #33-01 Marina Bay Financial Centre Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 1, Singapore 018981 Singapore
Review: Food and service was excellent! Loved the views and fuss free booking too:) We look forward to going back again in time.

Name: LeVeL33
Location: 8 Marina Boulevard #33-01 Marina Bay Financial Centre Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 1, Singapore 018981 Singapore
Review: i love 33 level I am very grateful to the waiter. I really like the food and special wine at 33 level.

Name: LeVeL33
Location: 8 Marina Boulevard #33-01 Marina Bay Financial Centre Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 1, Singapore 018981 Singapore
Review: Had our wedding anniversary dinner and we did a couple thing without the kids. It was a good opportunity for us to focus on us for a while. We did the Beer Tasting Platter to discover which micro-brewed was suited to our taste. Be warned, the combination might be a bit strong for some

Name: LeVeL33
Location: 8 Marina Boulevard #33-01 Marina Bay Financial Centre Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 1, Singapore 018981 Singapore
Review: Excellent service, Wonderful view, good food. Mhel was very thoughtful and meticulous in her service. She answered our questions and request patiently and shared her thoughts to assist us in making better dessert decision (Especially the part where I would very much like to order a cake for my friend). My friend and I had an enjoyable time.

Name: LeVeL33
Location: 8 Marina Boulevard #33-01 Marina Bay Financial Centre Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 1, Singapore 018981 Singapore
Review: We celebrated our wedding anniversary her

Name: LeVeL33
Location: 8 Marina Boulevard #33-01 Marina Bay Financial Centre Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 1, Singapore 018981 Singapore
Review: Level33 claims to be the highest microbrewery in the world at the 33rd floor of the building. If it does not rain, the skyline views are amazing and night pictures with all the colors on the roofs of theatres by the bay, the new floating Apple stores and of course marina bay sands are exceptional. However the food is overpriced if tasty, and the drinks are nothing special. Interesting beer based cocktails which are however not greatly executed. Feels touristy (without tourists at the moment)

Name: LeVeL33
Location: 8 Marina Boulevard #33-01 Marina Bay Financial Centre Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 1, Singapore 018981 Singapore
Review: My partner and I had a lovely dinner with a very nice view of the city at Level33. Our first time to visit the place, and never disappoint. Mhel’s service was great, very friendly and polite. The beer paddle was a good choice, as well as the Chef’s selections (set meal). Food were all tasty. We hope to be back soon.

Name: LeVeL33
Location: 8 Marina Boulevard #33-01 Marina Bay Financial Centre Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 1, Singapore 018981 Singapore
Review: Firstly I thought that the phone calls requesting for confirmation of our attendance by just pressing a number in the reply was useful. Service from the moment we reached the restaurant was spot on, we were there for lunch and the place was bright and clean with good vib

Name: LeVeL33
Location: 8 Marina Boulevard #33-01 Marina Bay Financial Centre Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 1, Singapore 018981 Singapore
Review: We had a lovely time at Level 33 dining. Chose to go ala carte after a very informative explanation by waitress Meh

Name: LeVeL33
Location: 8 Marina Boulevard #33-01 Marina Bay Financial Centre Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 1, Singapore 018981 Singapore
Review:
The food was exquisite, the view is amazingggggg, the service was great, the staff were extra attentive and kind! 

One of my favorite places in SG! 

The only BAD thing was having PLASTIC straws

Name: LeVeL33
Location: 8 Marina Boulevard #33-01 Marina Bay Financial Centre Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 1, Singapore 018981 Singapore
Review: Our last visit in Level 33 was truly an experience. We were saying goodbye to Singapore as we were flying the next day to our home country. The food, beer and wine was exquisite and so as the staff. Our compliments to your staff Mhel who was in charge of our table. She was so courteous and accommodating. Seeing us toast, she asked politely if we were celebrating an occasion as she gave the mains and we answered we were leaving Singapore the next day. After enjoying the main course we received a Bon Voyage cake as a compliment. Yey to staffs like her. She didn’t have to ask but she did, and that cake was indeed an added value to the experience during our last day in Singapore at Level 33.

Name: LeVeL33
Location: 8 Marina Boulevard #33-01 Marina Bay Financial Centre Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 1, Singapore 018981 Singapore
Review: I came here for my birthday dinner. This was another restaurant that I had heard lots of good things about and we were not disappointed. Located on Level 33 of MBFC Tower 1, I guess one of the primary reasons to come is for the view of the Bay Area......it is exceptional (especially on a clear dry night like we had). The restaurant offers both inside and outside seating (on their deck area). A booking is essential if you want to sit outside. The ambience of the restaurant was “clean smart causal” - decorations all very tastefully done and the service was exceptional, the staff add to the overall experience. The food was extremely tasty, all freshly cooked and beautifully presented. I had the Raw Hokkaido Scallops and Sirloin Steak (with a few sides thrown in) - both highly recommended. Being it’s own Urban Microbrewery, the selection of beers is good plus they have a pretty decent wine and cocktail list too. All in - decent view, decent food and decent drink makes for a very pleasant dining experience. I was very impressed and will certainly go again.

Name: LeVeL33
Location: 8 Marina Boulevard #33-01 Marina Bay Financial Centre Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 1, Singapore 018981 Singapore
Review: Had a wonderful evening with great service and exquisite food and beers. A perfect place to get together with friends or even a date night. Nice view and ambience if you able to get an outdoor sea

Name: LeVeL33
Location: 8 Marina Boulevard #33-01 Marina Bay Financial Centre Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 1, Singapore 018981 Singapore
Review:
Went to LeVel33 with a friend. 
Very nice experience and location.
Food was OK, nothing super special for the special price.
Beer was excellent as well as the service - here I have to name Mhel in particular.
We will be back!

Name: LeVeL33
Location: 8 Marina Boulevard #33-01 Marina Bay Financial Centre Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 1, Singapore 018981 Singapore
Review: We visited for our Wedding Anniversa

Name: LeVeL33
Location: 8 Marina Boulevard #33-01 Marina Bay Financial Centre Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 1, Singapore 018981 Singapore
Review: Survives on the view - whilst lovely location and view, table staff were slow, my Prosecco was flat and when we politely asked for a replacement they gave me exact same bottle and sniggered behind my back when I was polite enough to ‘agree’ it was better. Oysters watery from too much washing under the tap rather than natural brine. First and last time there, so disappointed.

Name: LeVeL33
Location: 8 Marina Boulevard #33-01 Marina Bay Financial Centre Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 1, Singapore 018981 Singapore
Review: Level33 is known as the highest brewery in the world so you might expect good beer and reasonable food. In fact the beer is good with a wide range of styles to choose from, but the food was surprisingly good and nothing short of excellent ! I have eaten in some very good restaurants and the food here is exceptional. I started with the squid which had a trio of sauces which co-mingled with the flavours to make every mouthful tantalising. The main course of sea bass was cooked to perfection and the risotto was a perfect companion. I visited for the beer, but I'll be back foe the food ! Well done and thank you very much !

Name: LeVeL33
Location: 8 Marina Boulevard #33-01 Marina Bay Financial Centre Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 1, Singapore 018981 Singapore
Review: Had a birthday celebration at LeVeL33. The view and food were great! Service crew Mike provided commendable service. Will definitely recommend LeVeL33 to others!

Name: LeVeL33
Location: 8 Marina Boulevard #33-01 Marina Bay Financial Centre Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 1, Singapore 018981 Singapore
Review: Food was delicious and staff Mhel was very accomodating and welcoming. To top it off, the place has a great view. Will definitely come again!😋😋😋

Name: LeVeL33
Location: 8 Marina Boulevard #33-01 Marina Bay Financial Centre Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 1, Singapore 018981 Singapore
Review: Food were awesome! Steaks and Wagyu Burger are highly recommended. Great service by Mhel. We had enjoyed our first indoor experience at Level33! Would try to be back for the outdoor experience!

Name: LeVeL33
Location: 8 Marina Boulevard #33-01 Marina Bay Financial Centre Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 1, Singapore 018981 Singapore
Review: Celebrated my sister's birthday in this restaurant. The service was fantastic! Their staff mhel, was very nice. Definitely will come back again!

Name: LeVeL33
Location: 8 Marina Boulevard #33-01 Marina Bay Financial Centre Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 1, Singapore 018981 Singapore
Review:
We sat at the Terrance for dinner. Very nice view. But the balcony was wet due to the rain earlier. 

Steak is good and meat only. No other vegetable in the plate. Consider to order the side as well.

Name: LeVeL33
Location: 8 Marina Boulevard #33-01 Marina Bay Financial Centre Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 1, Singapore 018981 Singapore
Review: Had my birthday dinner recently over there. Views are phenomenal. Food was amazing. Service was great. Would like to commend Mhel for making the night more enjoyable by giving some food recommendations. Would certainly go back.

Name: LeVeL33
Location: 8 Marina Boulevard #33-01 Marina Bay Financial Centre Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 1, Singapore 018981 Singapore
Review: Amazing view, tasty food and awesome craft beers! Staffs are very accommodating! Special thanks to Mhel for her wonderful service! And for our complimentary wine! Awesome experience :)

Name: LeVeL33
Location: 8 Marina Boulevard #33-01 Marina Bay Financial Centre Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 1, Singapore 018981 Singapore
Review: Our fist time at the restaurant and the view is certainly very nice although to be honest it's not the best in Singapore for sure. I was warned by several friends that the service wasn't very good and they were right, it was awful. You had to literally go get someone to come take your order, it was brutal. The food was very average but for the price not worth it. Overall it's a place to take your friends visiting for 1 quick drink although you will have to remove the word quick as no way you'll get service quickly there. It was very disappointing to say the least. I would not go there again.

Name: LeVeL33
Location: 8 Marina Boulevard #33-01 Marina Bay Financial Centre Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 1, Singapore 018981 Singapore
Review: If you have 24 hours to spend in Singapore, go here! The panoramic view of Marina Bay Sands, the business district and the Merlion are superb at both day and night.

Name: LeVeL33
Location: 8 Marina Boulevard #33-01 Marina Bay Financial Centre Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 1, Singapore 018981 Singapore

Name: LeVeL33
Location: 8 Marina Boulevard #33-01 Marina Bay Financial Centre Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 1, Singapore 018981 Singapore

Name: LeVeL33

Review: Staff was friendly and attentive, I am overall very happy with their servic

Name: LeVeL33
Location: 8 Marina Boulevard #33-01 Marina Bay Financial Centre Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 1, Singapore 018981 Singapore
Review: Made a reservation for family of 4 to celebrate my son's birthday and wanted a balcony ta

Name: LeVeL33
Location: 8 Marina Boulevard #33-01 Marina Bay Financial Centre Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 1, Singapore 018981 Singapore
Review: The staff is really what has me coming back very soon, this restaurant has the most enthusiastic, wonderful and hardworking staffs! I would like to specially mention Allan and Joyce! These guys know what they are doing, going the extra mile, in a friendly relaxed manner. They have been constantly checking in with us and making making sure our dining experience is a fantastic one! Special shoutout to one of the most passionate staff, Allan for being entertaining that night! A valuable asset to the company, definitely! Thank you guys, service top notch! food taste amazing!! :-)

Name: LeVeL33
Location: 8 Marina Boulevard #33-01 Marina Bay Financial Centre Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 1, Singapore 018981 Singapore
Review: Made a reservation at 6.30pm on 6th April 20

Name: LeVeL33
Location: 8 Marina Boulevard #33-01 Marina Bay Financial Centre Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 1, Singapore 018981 Singapore
Review: 6 Star!!! A perfect restaurant and bar with a breathtaking view of the Singapore skyl

Name: LeVeL33
Location: 8 Marina Boulevard #33-01 Marina Bay Financial Centre Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 1, Singapore 018981 Singapore
Review: Its cool to be in a Microbrewery, 33 floors up looking over the Iconic Marina Bay and gardens. There are numerous menus and restaurants in a fairly small space. We only wanted a light meal and were very pleased with the food we shared. Beer was nice but not cheap - but the view is cracking- fun place to go for a meal or to meet friends in Singapore - would certainly revisit.

Name: LeVeL33
Location: 8 Marina Boulevard #33-01 Marina Bay Financial Centre Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 1, Singapore 018981 Singapore
Review: Nice setting, relaxed, nice drinks, food was great, risotto.... Very nice.  Staff friendly, super chilled.

Name: LeVeL33
Location: 8 Marina Boulevard #33-01 Marina Bay Financial Centre Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 1, Singapore 018981 Singapore
Review: Okay, let's be frank about it. LeVel 33's main attraction is the location and the sheer imagination put into the place. Imagine a functioning brewery in a fancy cocktail-bar kind of setting, 33 storeys up. In Singapore, overlooking eg. Marina Sands and mor

Name: LeVeL33
Location: 8 Marina Boulevard #33-01 Marina Bay Financial Centre Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 1, Singapore 018981 Singapore
Review: My wife discovered this on line while preparing our trip to the fantastic city of Singapo

Name: LeVeL33
Location: 8 Marina Boulevard #33-01 Marina Bay Financial Centre Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 1, Singapore 018981 Singapore
Review: If you're vegetarian and want to something to eat don't come here. You will go away hungry as I d

Name: LeVeL33
Location: 8 Marina Boulevard #33-01 Marina Bay Financial Centre Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 1, Singapore 018981 Singapore
Review: A nice view from the 33rd level and with the current hysteria, only a few people on the terra

Name: LeVeL33
Location: 8 Marina Boulevard #33-01 Marina Bay Financial Centre Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 1, Singapore 018981 Singapore
Review: Very bad food, poor menu and cocktails list. Very expensive in comparison of the price. Except the view the restaurant is very bad.

Name: LeVeL33
Location: 8 Marina Boulevard #33-01 Marina Bay Financial Centre Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 1, Singapore 018981 Singapore
Review: Really enjoyed this restaurant. The "tasting" beer plate - 5 very small different beers brewed on site - was an excellent innovation. Food was original, well balanced with good flavours. Service was impeccable. We were seated inside, but took our dessert outside when a table became free and to look down across the bay to Marina Bay was a treat. We would send friends and colleagues here happily.

Name: LeVeL33
Location: 8 Marina Boulevard #33-01 Marina Bay Financial Centre Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 1, Singapore 018981 Singapore
Review: Visited here on the recommendation of a friend and although we didn't stay and eat, we would love to come back and try it. Very cool place, oozes charm and has to be rated one of the best views out over Singapore, Marina Bay and the city surroun

Name: LeVeL33
Location: 8 Marina Boulevard #33-01 Marina Bay Financial Centre Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 1, Singapore 018981 Singapore
Review: This place is best for Sunday roast. And now they have an oyster bar also. Great roast selection, delicious beers. Great staff. Good view for those who don’t already overlook the Bay. And not bad value. Definitely one of my best for Sunday and highly recommended.

Name: LeVeL33
Location: 8 Marina Boulevard #33-01 Marina Bay Financial Centre Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 1, Singapore 018981 Singapore
Review: A quality microbrewery with the best views of the bay. What was not to like? It is not cheap with a paddle of 5 x 100mls of different beers costing $23.50 and a medium glass of sauv blanc $18, but it was definitely worth it.

Name: LeVeL33
Location: 8 Marina Boulevard #33-01 Marina Bay Financial Centre Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 1, Singapore 018981 Singapore
Review: From first contact at booking to leaving, this was a memorable experience. Staff was friendly, helpful and it made celebrating my birthday alone while on transit especially nice. They were helpful to take photos etc. Food was amazing too. Thank you for the attention team I love every minu

Name: LeVeL33
Location: 8 Marina Boulevard #33-01 Marina Bay Financial Centre Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 1, Singapore 018981 Singapore
Review: Nice view and ambience. Staff are accomodating and friendly. 5 star for Mhel (the staff) who gave us an excellent service. We will definetly come back and recommend to our friends.

Name: LeVeL33
Location: 8 Marina Boulevard #33-01 Marina Bay Financial Centre Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 1, Singapore 018981 Singapore
Review:
What a view!! Phew!! 
A micro brewery at that height, awesome fresh beer and a spectacular view of the Marina Bay and Marina Bay Sands.
Definitely worth a visit. Be sure to reserve a table in advance.
The food was great too

Name: LeVeL33
Location: 8 Marina Boulevard #33-01 Marina Bay Financial Centre Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 1, Singapore 018981 Singapore
Review: Excellent service, good food, pricy though, love their in-house made wheat beer, wish they had more vegetarian options in their main course

Name: LeVeL33
Location: 8 Marina Boulevard #33-01 Marina Bay Financial Centre Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 1, Singapore 018981 Singapore
Review: Nice food and great beers selection, super friendly staff and I would say it's one of the best dinner place providing perfect night city view, wonderful experience!

Name: LeVeL33
