Review: This restaurant will never fails to impress people. Nice x4 times visit here. Remind me when I’m at Brittany.

Name: Entre-Nous creperie
Location: 27 Seah Street # 01-01, Singapore 188383 Singapore
Review: Entre-nous is such a wonderful hidden gem! I've been going for over 5 years now, lured by the gluten-free buckwheat crepes and continued going based on how delicious they are, the wide range of flavours, lovely atmosphere and perfect servic

Name: Entre-Nous creperie
Location: 27 Seah Street # 01-01, Singapore 188383 Singapore
Review: Wonderful thin crepes. Salty one plus half of a sweet one were enough for a weekday lunch. A glass of cider was a perfect match for the food.

Name: Entre-Nous creperie
Location: 27 Seah Street # 01-01, Singapore 188383 Singapore
Review: I love the art of Galetterie-ism :) with which I have fallen in love with while living in europe. The Creperie offers an authentic experience in making good Galette's and Crepe's. Match it with a Blonde Britt and you will be delight

Name: Entre-Nous creperie
Location: 27 Seah Street # 01-01, Singapore 188383 Singapore
Review: Excellent crêpes and cider! Adults and kids loved it! We ordered in advance our menu for convenience.

Name: Entre-Nous creperie
Location: 27 Seah Street # 01-01, Singapore 188383 Singapore
Review: We are for almost five years in Singapore and just discovered this place. It was a very refreshing surprise. The resto is placed on a charming street, near Raffles Hotel. It was the perfect discovery after a Saturday stroll doing the tourist thing in own city. We were lucky to have a two persons table in, otherwise, a very high demand place. We enjoyed the crepes and the cider for our brunch. The cider and the cups it was served were the on top of the crepe, really. Highly recommended for a nice feel of France.

Name: Entre-Nous creperie
Location: 27 Seah Street # 01-01, Singapore 188383 Singapore
Review: The crepes especially the skins are awesome! Our friends are convinced by us that this is the best crepes we had across major cities in the world including SF, Philly, Santa Barbara. SHANGHAI... and Truly comparable, if not even better than the ones we had in Avignon, Fran

Name: Entre-Nous creperie
Location: 27 Seah Street # 01-01, Singapore 188383 Singapore
Review: Amazing crepes both savoury and sweet. I normally find it hard to finish an entire crepe by myself as the flavours get boring or overwhelming, but this is totally not an issue here I can do one whole crepe and more! The crepes here are fresh, crispy and flavourful. Adding to that is a quaint little store interior and cosy family run feel that I just lo

Name: Entre-Nous creperie
Location: 27 Seah Street # 01-01, Singapore 188383 Singapore
Review: Excellent crepes that after the savory crepe we just had to order the dessert crepes! 🤗👍🏼😋 I would definitely make another visit! The crepes are at just the right texture and the combination of the ingredients unique and tasty to the palette.

Name: Entre-Nous creperie
Location: 27 Seah Street # 01-01, Singapore 188383 Singapore
Review: Galettes and crepes are delicious, service is fantastic. Geraldine is very friendly. We had a great meal and dining experience. I would highly recommend and would definitely come back again!

Name: Entre-Nous creperie
Location: 27 Seah Street # 01-01, Singapore 188383 Singapore
Review: I had the tomato crêpe and maple syrup crêpe, and it's honestly the best thing I've ever tasted

Name: Entre-Nous creperie
Location: 27 Seah Street # 01-01, Singapore 188383 Singapore
Review: Hands down the best crepes in Singapore. So authentic and so good. I’ve been eating here for years and literally recommend everything on the menu, especially with twice delicious cider always a good time at Entres Nous! ‍♀️

Name: Entre-Nous creperie
Location: 27 Seah Street # 01-01, Singapore 188383 Singapore
Review: I love their traditional French crepes, which taste better than in many places back in France. The products are fresh, the service always with a smile, and the prices are very reasonable.

Name: Entre-Nous creperie
Location: 27 Seah Street # 01-01, Singapore 188383 Singapore
Review: Whenever I have a craving for galettes/ crepes, this is my go to place. Always delivers! Best in

Name: Entre-Nous creperie
Location: 27 Seah Street # 01-01, Singapore 188383 Singapore
Review: We had a wonderful, cheeky lunch here which was unexpectedly delicious..... We are not able to travel during Covid and we stumbled across this marvellous restaurant which transported me straight back to France. The crepes were amazingy, particularly the apple caramel dessert. But I loved the apple cider served in little mugs - it was refreshing, crisp and utterly delicious. Thank you Geraldine, we had a brilliant afternoon!

Name: Entre-Nous creperie
Location: 27 Seah Street # 01-01, Singapore 188383 Singapore
Review: Nice discovery 😍 I am a flight attendant and I love finding part of my country abroad.  The quality of the pancake (French crepe) is exceptional 💯 Thank you for your welcome and bravo for your restaurant, we feel good there 🤩

Name: Entre-Nous creperie
Location: 27 Seah Street # 01-01, Singapore 188383 Singapore
Review: I was thankful I called to make a reservation as weekends are usually busy, and whilst I was there; I witnessed a few potential customers being turned away. Do note that a deposit had to be placed to secure the reservation, a wise move on the part of the cafe, as it deters customers from not showing up. Indoor and sheltered outdoor tables and seats are availabl

Name: Entre-Nous creperie
Location: 27 Seah Street # 01-01, Singapore 188383 Singapore
Review: Always a lovely time when we visit EntreNous. Buckwheat savoury crepes are delicious, and sweet crepes are divine! Highly recommend to try La Glenan - sweet crepes with grated coconut, maple syrup and salted butter caramel ice crea

Name: Entre-Nous creperie
Location: 27 Seah Street # 01-01, Singapore 188383 Singapore
Review: A hidden gem by definition! Highly recommend this place for the authenticity of the dishes, as well as genuine and caring service. This has become one of our reliable/ go-to places given the quality and consistency this lovely Creperie has to offer. We’ll definitely be back!

Name: Entre-Nous creperie
Location: 27 Seah Street # 01-01, Singapore 188383 Singapore
Review: My friend said this place has the best crepes and he wasn’t wrong! If you want good crepes definitely come visit this place. Price range is good and there are many options to choose from. Also great service and nice ambiance.

Name: Entre-Nous creperie
Location: 27 Seah Street # 01-01, Singapore 188383 Singapore
Review: Top quality restaurant. Great service; clean and functioning facilities and reasonably priced food. No matter which product you purchase it’s always fresh and tastes so good. Even if we make it through this bad times and all is over, I’ll remain their customer.

Name: Entre-Nous creperie
Location: 27 Seah Street # 01-01, Singapore 188383 Singapore
Review: The ice cream and melted salted butter is like lava on brittany crepes. Worth the wa

Name: Entre-Nous creperie
Location: 27 Seah Street # 01-01, Singapore 188383 Singapore
Review: We visited for Sunday lunch and did a run through the menu from escargots to duck rillette, through the savoury galettes and sweet crepes, rounding up with crème brûlée - all of which were downright delicious and made with quality ingredients. Recommended for anyone looking for good unpretentious french food and/or an authentic slice of Brittany in Singapo

Name: Entre-Nous creperie
Location: 27 Seah Street # 01-01, Singapore 188383 Singapore
Review: This is a fabulous hidden treasure. We closed our eyes savoured every mouthful and pretended we were in France! Absolutely delicious food, warm and cozy atmosphere and true authenticity- this place is seriously not to be missed! We just loved everything about it and can’t wait to go back! Was spoilt for choice with the menu and really excited to share this delightful restaurant with all my friends and family.

Name: Entre-Nous creperie
Location: 27 Seah Street # 01-01, Singapore 188383 Singapore
Review: Pleasure to find authentic brittany crepes in Singapore! Feel like back home from the moment you enter the restaurant, the smell, the service and the decor. Highly recommend it!!

Name: Entre-Nous creperie
Location: 27 Seah Street # 01-01, Singapore 188383 Singapore
Review: Upon hearing rare reviews about this place, I visited this quaint little cafe for a Saturday brunch. I love their attention to details during this new norm and how they allowed for us to have the crepes without much waiting time as we had a reservation made earlier with our food chosen as well. The crepes were not prepared in advance but was served with minimal waiting time and I can tell it was freshly made with high quality ingredients. We enjoyed the savoury as well as the sweet crepes. Great hospitality, delicious crepes and prime location with easy access by public transportation. Can't wait to go back again

Name: Entre-Nous creperie
Location: 27 Seah Street # 01-01, Singapore 188383 Singapore
Review: Had a huge craving for actual crepes and finally went to this highly recommended place - loved both their savory as well as sweet crepes and will definitely come back again. Reservations recommende

Name: Entre-Nous creperie
Location: 27 Seah Street # 01-01, Singapore 188383 Singapore
Review: Loved the food and they are attentive to details! Although the waiting time can be a little long but the food is well worth the wait

Name: Entre-Nous creperie
Location: 27 Seah Street # 01-01, Singapore 188383 Singapore
Review: Delicious savoury crepes & we loved the escargots too! Restaurant had cosy ambience and the owner provided attentive and friendly service, will be back again!

Name: Entre-Nous creperie
Location: 27 Seah Street # 01-01, Singapore 188383 Singapore
Review: I have been coming to this place for years and I can tell you it never disappoints. From service to quality of food, I can only consider it outstanding. As lots of crêperie and galettes places are opening in Singapore, my galette lover self has had to try them, and I can guarantee you Entre Nous Crêperie maintains its first place on the podium with its authentic food, and excellent service. Go there to try it out!

Name: Entre-Nous creperie
Location: 27 Seah Street # 01-01, Singapore 188383 Singapore
Review:
Authentic crêpes bretonnes made with very fresh ingredients.
The service is perfect.
I recommend 100% !

Name: Entre-Nous creperie
Location: 27 Seah Street # 01-01, Singapore 188383 Singapore
Review: We visited Entre-Nous creperie just now, not entirely crowded with decent crowd but we waited almost 40 minutes for our crepes, one banana and another salted butter caramel to be served. I counted 3 chefs in the kitchen and one lady waitress servi

Name: Entre-Nous creperie
Location: 27 Seah Street # 01-01, Singapore 188383 Singapore
Review: A feeling about being in Brittany as you step in. The service is efficient and very pleasant. You can expect very tasty and light buckwheat galettes, like what you would get in Brittany and savoury crêpes! We had a fruity cider along which was sweet and pleasant with the meal. Will definitely come back and try other combinations. The whole family enjoyed it!

Name: Entre-Nous creperie
Location: 27 Seah Street # 01-01, Singapore 188383 Singapore
Review: Great tasting food - especially Stephan's Favorite (bananas, chocolate syrup, chocolate ice cream crepe) and the French onion sou

Name: Entre-Nous creperie
Location: 27 Seah Street # 01-01, Singapore 188383 Singapore
Review: Best crepes I have tasted so far which attracted me to visit again with friends. Ambience is cozy. Very very clean. Food is super tasty. Just too bad that I can't order all the crepes I want to eat, as we are very full will definitely be back ASAP!!

Name: Entre-Nous creperie
Location: 27 Seah Street # 01-01, Singapore 188383 Singapore
Review: Myself and my 3 kids had 4 different flavours crepes (sweet & savoury) and 4 portions of escargots and they all taste so good. Even the bread that comes with the escargots were just as yummy! Geraldine was very polite & pleasant while serving every customer. We will definitely go back again. Hardly taste such good standard crepes elsewhere.

Name: Entre-Nous creperie
Location: 27 Seah Street # 01-01, Singapore 188383 Singapore
Review:
this is my second visit to the restaurant,  still the same excellent food and excellent service.
will go back again for the delicious crepes.

Name: Entre-Nous creperie
Location: 27 Seah Street # 01-01, Singapore 188383 Singapore
Review: This is my second visit after almost a year. The food is still that good and yummy！ Definitely will visit again.

Name: Entre-Nous creperie
Location: 27 Seah Street # 01-01, Singapore 188383 Singapore
Review: As always absolutely exceptional customer service and that’s before you even get to the crepes! We love crepes and this place never disappoints. Absolutely perfect every time - just make sure you leave some space for pudding!

Name: Entre-Nous creperie
Location: 27 Seah Street # 01-01, Singapore 188383 Singapore
Review: Love the relaxing ambiance, all the dishes we ordered were yummy. Especially love the French onion soup and butter caramel crepe 😋

Name: Entre-Nous creperie
Location: 27 Seah Street # 01-01, Singapore 188383 Singapore
Review: Everything there is truly authentic: from the flour, the cider, the interior, the recipes, the names on the menu etc. This can only be achieved by owners driven by the will to offer a real experience to their customer

Name: Entre-Nous creperie
Location: 27 Seah Street # 01-01, Singapore 188383 Singapore
Review: This place is delightful! The crepes are light and airy and come with a variety of fillings. Save room for the Nutella one for dessert! Service is personable and friendly.

Name: Entre-Nous creperie
Location: 27 Seah Street # 01-01, Singapore 188383 Singapore
Review: My Significant Other and I considered ourselves fortunate to have dined at the Breizh Cafe in Paris's Le Marais neighborhood earlier this year. Fast forward to November where we find ourselves staying at Seah Street in Singapore, and a friend told us about this creperie. We got curious when the word "authentic" was used to describe the place, and decided to check it out ourselves. We had our bars set really high and boy, did this place meet every expectation! The buckwheat crepes reminded us of our experience at Breizh and our skepticism immediately dissipated as soon as we took our first bite. Geraldine was a gracious host/server, and tirelessly enforced social distancing, which we appreciate! It's just too bad they ran out of their imported Apple Cider! Definitely worth a visit if you are ever in the City Hall/Bugis area.

Name: Entre-Nous creperie
Location: 27 Seah Street # 01-01, Singapore 188383 Singapore
Review: Authentic. Loved the galettes and crepes. The cider was quiet nice too. Great food and efficient service. Would recommend to make a reservation on weekends, as it was busy.

Name: Entre-Nous creperie
Location: 27 Seah Street # 01-01, Singapore 188383 Singapore
Review: Really authentic french creperie. Buckwheat crepe dough is very thin, and delicious. I had one Stephan's favourite (chicken, mostard, onion), and for dessert Geraldines favourite, both were great. Only the cider I didn't like, we had the fruity one, I believe dry must be better.

Name: Entre-Nous creperie
Location: 27 Seah Street # 01-01, Singapore 188383 Singapore
Review: Due to covid, we had to order in advance which was nice because they sent me the menu in advance for me to pre-order. At the restaurant, the food came without waiting which was also nice as I was the only adult with 2 young ki

Name: Entre-Nous creperie
Location: 27 Seah Street # 01-01, Singapore 188383 Singapore
Review: Delicious crepe, really nice service and affordable pri

Name: Entre-Nous creperie
Location: 27 Seah Street # 01-01, Singapore 188383 Singapore
Review: The galettes make for a filling meal and they go well with the cider, which they have rustic-looking boules for. Friendly service helps and they checked on our meal. The wait wasn't long and the crowd was light on a midweek night. The maple coconut crepe was decadent stuff. Payments was by cash and PayNow at the time of our visit. A reasonably priced, casual and satisfying dinner.

Name: Entre-Nous creperie
Location: 27 Seah Street # 01-01, Singapore 188383 Singapore
Review: What with the Covid-19 travel restrictions, my annual visit to France is simply not happening this year. I miss France and fortunately, Entre-Nous Creperie is the closest we can get to France without hopping onto a plane (not that we can anyway

Name: Entre-Nous creperie
Location: 27 Seah Street # 01-01, Singapore 188383 Singapore
Review: Delicious, authentic french crepes, including options for gluten-free. The service was attentive, but not imposin

Name: Entre-Nous creperie
Location: 27 Seah Street # 01-01, Singapore 188383 Singapore
Review: Ordered both the sweet and savoury as well as escargots. All of it was delicious. Worth the waiting time. Will definitely be back again :)

Name: Entre-Nous creperie
Location: 27 Seah Street # 01-01, Singapore 188383 Singapore
Review: It was a great dining experience in Entre Nous Creperie. We ordered the Stephan's Favourite and the La Quessant for savory. Not only were the crepes crispy on the outside and soft on the inside, the fillings paired really well togeth

Name: Entre-Nous creperie
Location: 27 Seah Street # 01-01, Singapore 188383 Singapore
Review: Four friends met up for lunch this week. What a delicious treat for a Wednesday! The galettes were so yummy and filling!! We loved the salad and cider that came with the set lunch. Attentive and helpful staff. Already planning to go back!

Name: Entre-Nous creperie
Location: 27 Seah Street # 01-01, Singapore 188383 Singapore
Review: Restaurant serves authentic French style crepes. Perfect crepes and excellent service! Highly recommend!!

Name: Entre-Nous creperie
Location: 27 Seah Street # 01-01, Singapore 188383 Singapore
Review: Authentic french creperie,  brought us back to the memory of when we were in France.  Good service,  too

Name: Entre-Nous creperie
Location: 27 Seah Street # 01-01, Singapore 188383 Singapore
Review: Being from Brittany eating galettes and crepes is something I miss a lot here in Singapore, so it's always a pleasure to go to Entre Nous. The galettes are the real thing (cooked with butter!) and their menu is very good value with more than enough to eat. Geraldine is great - the last time we went there she managed to find us a table during rush hour (while respecting social distance). We will of course be back!

Name: Entre-Nous creperie
Location: 27 Seah Street # 01-01, Singapore 188383 Singapore
Review: First visit for us, definitely will visit agai

Name: Entre-Nous creperie
Location: 27 Seah Street # 01-01, Singapore 188383 Singapore
Review: The food is good and authent

Name: Entre-Nous creperie
Location: 27 Seah Street # 01-01, Singapore 188383 Singapore
Review: It was like to travel to Brittany. The crepes, both savory and sweet, and the apple cider were great. The service was great and they are really ell organized to face the actual situation (e.g. possibility of pre-order before arrive to the restaurant - the food is cooked only when you arrive at the place). We will surely come back and recommend it to friends!

Name: Entre-Nous creperie
Location: 27 Seah Street # 01-01, Singapore 188383 Singapore
Review: Entre-Nous has absolutely delicious and authentic buckwheat crepes, fantastic coconut crepe desserts, and the most delicious escarg

Name: Entre-Nous creperie
Location: 27 Seah Street # 01-01, Singapore 188383 Singapore
Review: Yummy French crepes, authentic and freshly made to order. We visit here multiple times a month and everything we’ve tried is good. Efficient and friendly service. This is a must for anyone who’s looking for good crepes in Singapore!

Name: Entre-Nous creperie
Location: 27 Seah Street # 01-01, Singapore 188383 Singapore
Review: I was recommended by a French friend (have to be authentic!) to check out this crêperie and had been back here a couple of times. I really enjoyed the chicken crêpe (think it was cutely labeled as the chef Stefan’s favorite), lemon crêpe and Nutella crêpe etc. I learnt from the co-owner Geraldine (the sweet lady who mans the service all by her herself, amazing) that they import the ingredients from Brittany / make many things from scratch, such as the chantilly cream, which is very yumm

Name: Entre-Nous creperie
Location: 27 Seah Street # 01-01, Singapore 188383 Singapore
Review: My husband and I come to this place very often and we are never disappointed! We are French and honestly even if in France you don’t easily find such great crepes. So tasty!! Great variety in the menu and service is very good, the host is very kind. I highly recommend it.

Name: Entre-Nous creperie
Location: 27 Seah Street # 01-01, Singapore 188383 Singapore
Review: We are rather difficult clients, but what a perfect balance of flavour and texture! We couldn’t prevent ourselves from taking 2 buckwheat crepes each before moving to sweet. délicieux!

Name: Entre-Nous creperie
Location: 27 Seah Street # 01-01, Singapore 188383 Singapore
Review: We visited for lunch today for the first time. This restaurant came highly recommended and certainly did not disappoint. The service was friendly and efficient and the crepes were delicious. I can highly recommend the French onion soup too. This restaurant is definitely worth a visit.

Name: Entre-Nous creperie
Location: 27 Seah Street # 01-01, Singapore 188383 Singapore
Review: Food is ok (it's only crêpes) but the service is appealing: you have to pay to book a table for lunch (?...not even Michelin restaurants do that), as soon as you arrive you feel like the waitress is only hoping you will leave soon, and at the end, cash or Paylah only (no CC).... worse kind of service you can get....

Name: Entre-Nous creperie
Location: 27 Seah Street # 01-01, Singapore 188383 Singapore
Review:
We had a very pleasant evening with Kids in Entre-Nous. Kids loved their crepes. Service was efficient And friendly despite a crowded room
Crepes salted and sweet were great
Highly recommended if you want a taste of French Crepes in singapore

Name: Entre-Nous creperie
Location: 27 Seah Street # 01-01, Singapore 188383 Singapore
Review: Excellent French crepes and warm welcome. I definitely recommend for anyone looking to taste traditional crepes from France. The sweet crepes are also amazing.

Name: Entre-Nous creperie
Location: 27 Seah Street # 01-01, Singapore 188383 Singapore
Review: We had an excellent meal at Entre-Nous Crêperie. Really enjoyed the crepes and the desserts. Would highly recommend it. Very good service from Geraldine the co-owner with her husband who is the Chef.

Name: Entre-Nous creperie
Location: 27 Seah Street # 01-01, Singapore 188383 Singapore
Review: My second visit in 3 weeks. The crepes are beautifully done. Excellent range of sweet and savoury selections. The coffee is also really good. I especially appreciate the excellent service. Geraldine, the co-owner, is warm and inviting. Always a smile on her face. We were there one especially busy weekend... the place was packed and her service staff had called in sick at short notice. So she managed the front of house, took food orders, served and was cashier all on her own. Understandably, the food took a while, but she had told us ahead we would be in for a wait. We didn’t mind. Throughout the service, she was pleasant and welcoming. The quality of the food was great and made so much better by the warmth of the hostess. Perfect quaint little place. We could do with more eating places like this.

Name: Entre-Nous creperie
Location: 27 Seah Street # 01-01, Singapore 188383 Singapore
Review: For a decade, Entre Nous has been simply a very cozy and authentic place where you can eat truly great crepes and receive impeccable service. It is definitely the best place in Singapore if you want to discover French crepes or if you have been missing them. Thank you to Geraldine for being such a good host. We will be back soon.

Name: Entre-Nous creperie
Location: 27 Seah Street # 01-01, Singapore 188383 Singapore
Review: Really nice authentic crepes, very attentive service and team that goes the extra mile to make you feel happy with your visit. Very nice attention with candle and extra ice cream for my daughter who was celebrating her birthday. Definitely recommended!

Name: Entre-Nous creperie
Location: 27 Seah Street # 01-01, Singapore 188383 Singapore
Review: A very authentic and delicious, yes affordable French crêperie, would definitely recommend. The service is really great

Name: Entre-Nous creperie
Location: 27 Seah Street # 01-01, Singapore 188383 Singapore
Review:
Both the savoury and sweet crepes are delicious. Nice and calm terasse.
All food is in the menu is homemade (give a try to the homemade chocolate ice-cream, yummy!!)

Name: Entre-Nous creperie
Location: 27 Seah Street # 01-01, Singapore 188383 Singapore
Review:
Being from Brittany, I can tell you this restaurant is the real deal.
The place is good, the owner really nice. Nice music too, not too loud!

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: Sooo BA

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: Very accommodating in a way that is not intimidating unlike other restaurants who always keeps an eye on you that’s not so comfortable

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: Disappointing for a restaurant that I loved in Chicago. Overpriced, sommelier doesn’t know wine properly and can’t give recommendatio

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: The lighting was too dim for my comfort. Service was friendly and good but food was not up to expectation. The Sea bass was dry, tasted muddy and difficult to eat despite the cream sauce. The steak for the grill platter was overdone. The Lobster Bisque was smothered with too much cream. The Ahi Tower and French fries with truffles and the melted chocolate cake was appreciated though.

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: The restaurant is beautiful and has a very good wine list. We came for the steaks. The cut was good quality, but it came lukewarm for my medium cooked steak. So when I tried to put the truffle butter over, it didn't melt the way it should. Had creamed cauliflower, nothing special. And also we didn't quite get the toppings for the baked potato - a bit cold by then. Tried the creme brûlée which tasted nice, but a tad lumpy. Worse of all, I went home and puked it all out. I don't know what happened, and which were the items that were off. Suspecting the lumpy creme brûl

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: I had high hopes for mortons given its brand, but sadly our steak was really tough, not worth the S$150 per pc price tag. Not sure if theres difficulty in sourcing for beef during covid but it was really bad. We didnt send it back becaus we dont usually complain as to not make the situation awkward but sadly we wont go back. Wooloomooloo at Swissotel and 665f at Andaz have far more superior steaks that are really juicy and tasty and of course, Cut by Wolfgang Puck is always a favorite.

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: Has been many years since we last visited Morton’s and wanted to relive some memories. However, despite the much appreciated prices, the fine dining experience is not the same and not worthy of the price. Service is attentive and steaks are still cooked to perfection. But expected more for ambience and thoughtful touches from a Michelin restaurant. While it’s always been dim, they used to bring a light to help diners read better. Instead, the servers just brought a menu with bigger font. Despite well spaced tables, the place is to noisy for a good dinner conversation. Server did not highlight the additional sauces and individual sides that we could have ordered to complement our steaks or did they caution on the size of the steaks and suggest ordering 2 or the porterhouse to share between our family of 4. The free dessert was the soufflé but was expecting a choice of flavors rather than the standard lemon. The restaurant did not even provide a holder for our masks which some restaurants that charge a fraction of the price provides since masks are compulsory now and is more hygienic being kept away during dining. Overall, expected more, not worth the price. What happened to fine dining in Singapore?

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: Upon reservation, staff asked if we’re celebrating any special occasion, so I said we are celebrating our 3year anniversary with my husband. However, there was nothing, seems they forgot about it completely. The food was good but too overpriced. They were charging Michelin star price. Atmosphere was too dark, could barely read the menu. Overall, I will not come back.

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: Morton's always comes up as a family favorite for special occasions. It was definitely still up to the standards as we have tried on many occasions for over past 20 years. There is something about the dim lit steak house that makes one enjoy the meal, drinks and ambience. Oysters were very refreshing as starters as was the iceberg lettuce with blue cheese and truffle fries were crisps and delicious. The beef selection were cooked to perfection and everyone enjoyed. Nice finishing touches with complimentary dessert, limencello and a nice memorable photo of the outing. Edwin and staff took good care of us! While on the pricey side, Morton's is worth it on special occasions.

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: Family affair of 4, we ordered porterhouse, and 2 side dishes (asparagus, and the bacon mac&cheese); when our food came i noticed there were 3 side dishes placed on the table. Apparently our server took the liberty of making us fries; no biggie we took it in and paid at the end with no fuss. Overall we enjoyed our meal.

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: Cosy booth seats, personalized menus and souvenir photographs of the night, great steak and wine, friendly servers that give you the right amount of space/privacy, was an enjoyable night celebrating our 2 year wedding anniversary here.

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: birthday celebration for my partner. name printer on the menu and surprise photo section. Food and service is excellent, but price is bit too high and the environment is too dark.

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: We choose the dinner set .Steak ( beef) was excellent! The place was not crowded and the restaurant has ensured that social distancing has been followed.The restaurant has also prepared a special treat for us.Indeed ,we had an awesome celebration!

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: I've never been disappointed with a visit to Morton's. From start to finish, service was great & staff made me glad of my 50th birthday celebration venue. Cajun ribeye & lobster are all the mains you need. I wouldn't bother with the other cuts of steak as the Cajun ribeye is the best! Desserts were a great ending to the evening. We were well satisfied. Only negative...the dim lighting.

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: My go-to place for superb USDA prime cuts grilled to perfection and also for celebrating special occasions. Only issue was the dim environment, would prefer more lighting. Staff were attentive and friendly. Average cost 200/pax with wine.

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: Been here a few times to celebrate my wife's birthday. They used to have to die for free orion bread, splendidly cooked ribeye steak and wonderful complimentary chocolate lava cake. Now the Orion bread is harder in texture and the complimentary dessert soffle is the only opti

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: My bf brought me here to celebrate my birthday. Excellent service, awesome steak, classy dimly-lit ambience! I love it so much. They printed a menu with my name on it for me to keep as souvenir. A free photo was taken, made into a card with all the staff’s signatures. That’s a very thoughtful gesture. Staff were well-trained in explaining the menu. We always order medium rare steaks and they cooked it just the way we wanted. It’s not the easiest doneness to achieve but they perfected it. Shrimp cocktail was very delicious too. We like the food very much. Pricey but worth it. Keep up the good work!

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: Visited for dinner here to celebrate our wedding anniversa

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: Morton's Steakhouse has never failed to deliver 5 stars satisfaction for my visits, time n aga

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: Went there for our last night in Singapore and were not disappointed. The service was great and the steaks cooked to perfection. We enjoyed the classy and elegant atmosphere. Be prepared for a high bill however.

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: I dined before many years ago but this time I come for the happy hour bar that last till 7pm. The 50% off martini is my favorite and continue the old charm with steak sandwiches to be tasted for free. Love the ambience and great choice of the Martini cocktails . My favourite one lady’s the lychee martini !

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: It’s been a long while since I dined at the Singapore restaurant. A visit at Morton’s always carried an air of classical vintage but with sophistication. Sad to say that has been lost since the take over by Landry’

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: Wow. Where can I even begin. Dining alone on business and what I can only describe as a huge loaf of bread was delivered to the table warm with perfect temp butter. This could have fed a family but there were no complaints from me. Beautiful. Next up we’re half a dozen of the finest oysters accompanied by every condiment one could dream of which included a spectacular champagne drizzle sauce, classic Tabasco, Horseradish and another which escapes me- amazing. For the main I had no choice but to follow my love for ribeye with the 22Oz bone in ribeye, the sides were for sharing but the staff were kind enough to arrange a special solution for me where I could choose two as I was dining alone, sautéd mushrooms and the truffle fries, subtle and tasty without detracting from the main event. And what an event it was! Perfectly cooked medium rare and accompanied with a cognac Au Poivre sauce. This really was that good that I’m sat outside the restaurant writing this review, bravo to all the staff, my compliments to the chefs and thank you for the complimentary drink back, it was my pleasure to taste such divine food in this beautiful settin

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: My husband proposed to me 17 years ago at Morton's. Now we added 2 more in our family to celebrate our wedding anniversary yearly. Great improvement in your Chicken Christopher and to die for lava cake. Loving the friendly Malay lady behind the counter, very accommodating to my requirements. Thanx

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: The restaurant is located inside Mandarin hotel. Environment is quite nice and the service is good. Taste is quite standard Morton quality.

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: Very nice athmosphere and service. The qualitiy of food is outstanding but too expensive. 2 Steaks, 1 fries, 1 bottle of wine (Australian Malbec), 2 espressi ... SGD 520.- ...

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: Personally my favorite restaurant for Rib Eye Steak compared to other equivalent stake restaurants in city.

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review:
Wow incredible service beautiful interiors lovely atmosphere and super attentive staff.. menu simple naturally steakhouse style however food perfect quality and quantity very good..

You won’t be disappointed lovely on all levels

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: The service was good with a personal photo and menu to commemorate my 29th Wedding Anniversary. Also a complementary soufflé... the restaurant made a memorable experience

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: I hadn't been here for around 5 years but always feast at the Mortons restaurant whenever I crave steaks in Singapor

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: Have been coming to Morton's for the past 3 years to celebrate any anniversary or birthdays as they provide such good servi

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: Went to Morton's to celebrate a special event. Food, Service and Ambiance were fantastic!! This is an annual event and will continue as such. Had drinks in the bar before dinner and watched

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: Wife Ordered the rib eye. It was great quality and portion could serve 2 person. I had the New York medallion. Meat was tender but over charred on the surface.

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: Went to celebrate birthday of my girlfriend on a Saturday night at Morton's Singapore as we are fans, we love the one in Hong Kong but had a very disappointing visit to the one in the IFC Shanghai so fingers were crossed as to what this one would bring, being in the Mandarin Oriental we hoped for the best and they didn't disappoin

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: Prime cuts deserve the name. The staff is Subash excellent and can recommend the best suited wines. A place to be visited who likes steaks and wines.

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: I had good experience at Mortons Steakhouse in Hong Kong and Taipei so thought I will try the Singapore establishment as well, which is situation at Mandarin Orienta

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: First time here. Came here for dinner to celebrate a Friend birthday. Impeccable service from the front door to the wait staffs.. Server for our table were Jini. And I have to say that she’s attentive. She gave great service. Steak was huge, could be shared with your buddy.. It was nicely done as per ordered. Food was delicious. Great service. Great vibe. Great ambiance. The foods. The place and service justified the high price that we paid for. Highly recommended. Would definitely come here again.

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: Went here several times just to chill. They have happy hours at 5 to 7PM with superb sandwich definitely must try! Their martinis are the best.

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: Had an amazing dinner here last night. Food was so delish- we shared a huge, scrumptious, melt-in-your-mouth marbled and flavourful USDA ribeye(glad we shared or else they may have to wheel me out in a wheelchair

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: We selected Morton’s for an important milestone birthday for our father in law. Nice little touches such as a customized title on the dinner menu (stating happy birthday to him). Also a nice individual soufflé presented following the meal as well as a commemorative photograph. This was appreciate

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: Heard so much about Morton’s and finally made it there. Although the beef fillet was not as succulent as I would have liked, everything else was perfect. The seared sea scallops with caviar butter simply melts in the mouth and the herbed crusted lamb chop with orzo was just perfect! The half lobster was also delicious. All went very well with Caymus red wine!

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review:
Huge portions.  Good quality steaks.  may be helpful to share cuts if party has smaller children.

Cream corn was excellent

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: Server's were not attentive. I requeted for a window table but was not granted. Hence, we were given the wrong bill.

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: The first US Steakhouse to come to Singapore still dishes up top quality nosh.  Pricey but the portions are enormous so a couple can easily share a appetizer, main, side & dessert and still be stuff.  Service remains impeccable!

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: visited morton’s bar for their famed happy hour, martinis were potent and great, sliders came every half an hour - definitely goo

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: Love their huge bread and steak! Sides comes in huge portion but so so, can skip. comes with great service and customized menu.

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: Pleasant dining, everyone was good there, didn’t manage to get the staff name. One female lady (short hair) and a Indian guy.. friendly approach by them, would come again!

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: Was there on a week day evening for drinks with work team mates to celebrate the completion of several major projects. We got a table for 6 of us and the place was getting crowdes as happy hour started at 5pm to 7pm. We got our drinks and ordered some food from the menu. But the best thing is the sliced beef steak buns that was served on the house to guest. It was juicy and tender and warm. Really nice bites. The place had tables well spaced out, adequately lit and the service was friendly and non intrusive. We did not recall any piped music and we just talked, joked, drank and ate, without being disturbed by the surroundings and neither were we disturbing others with our chatt

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: Enjoyed drinks with friends on the one occasion it was actually op

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: Had a birthday dinner in late June. The service is excellent and the food is marvellous. The Lobster Thermidor came with Mac and Lobster side dish and it was simply delicious. The Prime NY Steak flight has 3 pieces of small steak medallion (4oz ea). There is wagyu, prime US and I coudn't remember the 3rd one. Nice to try 3 different small chunks at one go. Simply exquisite!

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: Maybe it is just me but I really do find the steak served in Morton's to be nothing special. Probably your usual American food in a more lush setting, slightly more refined cooking methods and possibly a big dent in your wallet.

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: For a “reputable” steak house, the USDA porterhouse cut was tasteless (as if it got rinsed through some water) and the beef short rib was so dry. The only saving dish was seafood on the contrar

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: We are there for birthday celebration, when we settled down the staff come and take photo for us and later they pass us the photo with the menu printed with "Happy Birthday 24 May 2019" and at the end there is a birthday cake on our table, than

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: Below expectations compared to other Morton’s. Very expensive for the quality of the food and service you get there.

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: I can sum this restaurant up in one word, gre

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: Great food, good service and wonderful location make this one of my favorite restaurants of all time

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: Let’s be factu

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: Good Food... Good Atmosphere... everything is good. Service is tip top. Will revisit again at next occasion.

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: Come back again and again at Morton's. Always a great experience. Wonderful meat and good service. The wine was great, too

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: Three of us I enjoyed: filets, lobidter in sauce, and a pork chop. Desserts we enjoyed were chocolate layer cake, carrot cake, and key lime pie. Service was attentive and food was outstanding. We loved it and will return.

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review:
“Great” would be an understatement on how the Food and Service were. The Atmosphere is good however could be improved by increasing the brightness of the lights as it was a little difficult to even read the menu. 
Overall, a great experience.

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: Started off with 2 martinis in e bar ,good measure of vodka aprox 2.5 shots aprox 75ml. It packed a punch and took the edge of the day.They serve really yummy mini steak sandwich f

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: great food and ambiance. need to exercise caution when ordering as portion is huge! The steak has the great chargrill aroma.

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: Just had a business trip to Singapore and as usual - had to go to Morton’s for their stea

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: Late post of my birthday dinner at Mor

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: Consistent food from the US. The steaks are the mainstay but we usually have the chicken and fish which are good too. Of the appetisers, the tuna tower is good and lobster bisque (with lots of brandy) is excellent. Onion bread good too

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: High end steak house. Didn’t disappoint. Waitress knows the menu very well and is able to provide good recommendation. The food was very well done and the size of the servings are just nice, including desserts. Bill for 4 person including a bottle of wine comes up to around $200/- per pax, which is within expectation. Will certainly come again.

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: Service is fantastic and the food is really good. definitely worth the money. Ambiance is very lightly lit. a good setup for couples.

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: Had a great visit/steak at Morton's this week.  Service was incredible along with the food.  Best steak in a long time.

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: Went to Morton’s for the 3rd time to celebrate Valentine’s day and we ordered the ribeye steak instead of the usual fillet mignon. Although the waitress mentioned that it has more marbling than the lean fillet mignon, the marbling is not very well distributed like wagyu and we felt it’s just fats in some parts and some parts are lean so the taste is not perfect. Anyway it’s still good quality as usual but we felt the steak house could have introduce some other variety of beef steak instead. The sides like giant potato and mushrooms are good as well. Overall it is not bad!

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: Cannot deny that it's one of the best steakhouse in town, very worthy of its name. Of course, you would have to pay for this sort of quality

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: Thoroughly enjoyed dinner here again. Steak was excellent as always, likewise for the cocktails. Staff was patient and professional, and even recommended that we order less when we went finger happy pointing at multiple menu items - It was sound advice ultimately. Pricey, but value for money considering the quality of food and service.

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: This is a very expensive steak house in a posh hot

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: I had been to this restaurant a couple of times a long time ago, and had very fond memories of it. The new decor is nice, as dark as the previous restaurant and would feel quite intimate if it wasn’t for the noise. Portions are big, and the meat, while good, felt short of my expectations. We had the ribeye in the bone and the filet mignon. The meat was quite lean, which is fine, but I thought the taste was rather dull. Salads are decent and fresh, desserts overloaded with sugar but still good. Overall disappointing and not worth the whopping prices. The final touch was the waitress whispering to the unfortunate gentleman who received the bill that “gratuities were appreciated”. I guess. Service was good and professional beside that.

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: My husband and I love steak houses and we found a few good ones in Singapore. We've been to many Morton's in the world, and the food & service was always great. So when we were looking for something a little special for New Year's Day, we chose Morton's. We knew it's going to be expensive, that's probably why we haven't been here before. Anyway, so we went, had drinks at the bar first (very nice, love their steak sandwiches!) and then proceeded to the restaurant. We were seated in one of the corners and had a huge table and the seats are comfy too. First we ordered another drink each, then we shared a starter (jumbo prawn cocktail) and then we both had steak with 2 sides to share. We didn't have desert, but 2 more glasses of wine. The food and service was top notch from start to finish, absolutely nothing to complain. The steaks were so good... when we ordered the bill, we tried guessing how much it would be and although I thought we both added a few extras here and there, we never expected to get a bill for SGD 520.Wow! Despite the quality of the service, food and all, we will probably not go back soon, as there are equally good steakhouses in Singapore for almost half the price. So sad, I do love my Morton's though. Will go back when in the US later this year though.

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: Impressive as recommended by a friend. Well spent dinner, good grade of steak. One of my favourite restaurant in Singapore. Kudos to Morton's team! I'll see you again soon!

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: The call to confirm dinner and the matrie’d showing us to our table was so professional. We started with the warm seafood followed by steaks. Order the Oscar Style side dish. The Brussels sprouts were good too. The apricot chutney for the crab cake was outstanding. The creme brûlée to round off the evening was great. The atmosphere was marred by a few patrons who drank too much and talked too loud.

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: Firstly, I will start by saying I am a huge Mortons fan. The steaks are always ultra reliable and I usually visit 5+ different locations at least each yea

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: If you are looking for a good Steak whilst in Singapore, Morton’s Steak House is wort

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: Been visiting Mortons over the years in the US and in Singapore. This place 10 years ago was at its height. Whilst the quality of the steak has more or less remained reasonable consistent, the overall ambiance of the joint, the service needs a complete overhaul. When you pay 200 bucks per head you expect a place that does not look and sound like a fast food joint, You expect to be able to speak to a sommelier who understands wines . You get neither at this outpost of Mortons at the moment. Its also partly been eclipsed by the emergence of other steak restaurants in Singapore which offer a much better overall package.

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: I booked lunch in this restaurant and I knew it was quite pricey but honestly, it was worth it. I was celebrating my birthday, and the personalized menu, picture and even the free dessert were very much appreciat

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: Loved this restaurant. Food was delicious, tables were a decent distance away from each other and the staff were very friendly and took the time to chat to you. Consequently had a very relaxing evening where we didn’t feel rushed and could enjoy our meal in a lovely atmosphere. Would definitely recommend

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: Came here for my hubby's 40th birthday. Just the 2 of us. I emailed ahead to make a reservation. The restaurant service staff called back to confirm and asked it was a celebratory occasion. I said y

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: A lot of people pull back when they hear about the price of a single steak at Morton’s. However, when your final bill arrives, you do get the sense that it was worth paying for the value and satisfaction and highly attentive great service you receive. Even better, being someone there die their birthday or any special occasion. They will put up your name customised on the menu and you receive a complimentary photo card to take home with you.

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: This restaurant is always a favourite for birthday celebration as their service is great. We were not disappointed.

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: Great service and ambience. Celebrating my friend’s birthday 🎂 As Usual is our favorite steakhouse, as always with attentive server.

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: My husband & I always come back for the food. The bread is consistently good & the French onion soup is delicious. Best of all the Rib Eye steak is always made to perfection. Very lucky to get Harbbie as our server this time. His service was knowledgeable, gracious, & attentive. Definitely coming back.

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: As always - quality never fails! From the numerous steak houses I have tried in various countries, Morton’s still tops my li

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: Having been to the best stake houses around the world, and this being billed as one of Singapore’s be

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: The interior of the restaurant was dimly lit, creating a romantic, 'private' kind of ambien

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: When Morton's renovated a while back, it became too bright and looked like a Chinese restaurant. So we "migrated" to Cut which is dim and atmospheric. Recently my eldest daughter visited Morton's for her wedding anniversary and reported that the lighting is fixed and no longer bright like a Chinese restaurant so we came back tonight for me/my husband's wedding anniversary. Yay, it's nice and dim again. The steaks are decent n reliable. We had the NY strip plus yummy hash and bacon and tuna tacos etc. Very happy with the value. As long as it remains dim and elegant like a steakhouse, we will be back.

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: I’ve been to a few good steakhouses in my time and Morton’s has long been a chain that has eluded me; however, I found one in my hotel (Mandarin Oriental) while on business and seized the opportunity. Unfortunately, it turned out to be disappointing. Firstly, I had to find the restaurant in the hotel myself. Secondly, there was little-to-no ambience. Thirdly, the food was no better than a middle of the road steakhouse (e.g. Outback). Lastly, and nail in the coffin, the meal was expensive vis-a-vis the good steakhouses (e.g. Peter Luger’s, Sparks).

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: Excellent location, great steaks and service. We had the 16 oz steak, Cajun steak with large asparagus and mashed potatoes for sides. The meat was cooked to your preference of donenes

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: Everything was excellent...from the service to the ambience to the food. Desserts were fantabulous...and the meat was perfect!

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: My partner ordered a Steak and she said was fine. While i ordered a seafood platter with slice of Salmon. Salmon was definitely Not fresh and after eating i had this rashes for 3 days ! It was the Salmon ! It did not taste right but i still finished the food.

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: Looking for a classy happy hour place in the CBD? Try arriving early to book a table at the Mortons bar where they serve a WIDE variety of cocktails and martinis. Topped up with complimentary steak sandwiches which the waiters bring out to serve. Always a good experience meeting up with old friends to chat, in a cool ambience.

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: My wife and I had a very good time here to celebrate our wedding anniversary. Service was great, food was exceptional. As per Morton's usual service, we had a call from them to confirm our reservation, and had our names printed on the menu. Ambience was cosy, though it was too dark to take any decent photos on our own.

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: Haven’t tried the restaurant yet but the Morton’s Bar is one of my favourites in SG. The happy hour is not to be missed for their martini promotions; faves are gin martini with blue cheese olives, Apple and chocolate. The latter is like a desert but deceptively boozy. They bring around complimentary steak sandwiches from the restaurant throughout the happy hour which is a great touch.

Name: Morton's, The Steakhouse
Location: Mandarin Oriental Singapore Fourth Storey Mandarin Oriental, Singapore 039797 Singapore
Review: The service in Morton’s restaurants really do set the benchmark when it comes to customer service and food quali

Name: Samy's Curry
Location: 25 Dempsey Road Singapore Civil Service Sports Club, Singapore 249670 Singapore
Review: Simple , normal ‘restaurant’ in an up market area. Price wise reasonable but on the higher side. Place is ok - you will be taking the odour back after a meal especially if you’re seated inside . Food wise is good - the usual chicken tikka , Gobi, masala chicken , butter chicken , naan , and of course the white rice and briyani rice served with potatoes and daal. Mango or sweet lassi is ok - nothing to rave about here . Ambience is ok but wear proper shoes - not slippers - as the floor can be oily . Car park is abundance if you don’t mind walking. Overall - it’s good and worth a try and revisits. And yes - make an appointment as the place can be pretty busy .

Name: Samy's Curry
Location: 25 Dempsey Road Singapore Civil Service Sports Club, Singapore 249670 Singapore
Review: Food was average, fish head curry the meat was tough, find the Chinese type better, but maybe its personal preference.  Curry mutton meat was also tough.  Won't be going back.

Name: Samy's Curry
Location: 25 Dempsey Road Singapore Civil Service Sports Club, Singapore 249670 Singapore
Review: Authentic Indian food! Love the food and ambiance! Signature fish head curry is a must try! One of the best curry in Singapore!

Name: Samy's Curry
Location: 25 Dempsey Road Singapore Civil Service Sports Club, Singapore 249670 Singapore
Review: This place is a cult. Everyone has their preferred phở or burger joint. Samy’s is my fav place fir fish head curry. If you dare, best way to savour your meal here is to eat with your hand. Then you will understand what finger lickin’ good really means!

Name: Samy's Curry
Location: 25 Dempsey Road Singapore Civil Service Sports Club, Singapore 249670 Singapore
Review: Went there for a dinner and was blown away by the delicious food.We ordered briyani rice meal(briyani rice with 2 vegetables) black squid,fish cutlet,mysore mutton and fried cauliflow

Name: Samy's Curry
Location: 25 Dempsey Road Singapore Civil Service Sports Club, Singapore 249670 Singapore
Review: Popular among locals as well as visitors there is no air conditioning here. One sits outdoors or indoors. Indoors is an old colonial building with many overhead fans blowing. Served on a banana leaf for your rice and accompaniments. The curry fish head is famous, chicken tikka, braised lamb and cauliflower all taste good. Lassi is also available. Price is mid range.

Name: Samy's Curry
Location: 25 Dempsey Road Singapore Civil Service Sports Club, Singapore 249670 Singapore
Review: Confirming previous reviews, service a bit erratic, but if you count that as part of charm and fun its no issue as you eventually get there and the waiters are good natured rather than wilfully indifferent. Atmosphere fine, its not Atlas Bar inside, but it does its prime job, of serving great curry, very we

Name: Samy's Curry
Location: 25 Dempsey Road Singapore Civil Service Sports Club, Singapore 249670 Singapore
Review: If you are looking for a fine dining experience or decent service, give this place a skip. However, if all you care about is delicious Indian food, the masala chicken and cutlets are out if this world. Loved the fact that they let me bring my own whiskey

Name: Samy's Curry
Location: 25 Dempsey Road Singapore Civil Service Sports Club, Singapore 249670 Singapore
Review: Samy’s popularity is proven during circuit breaker. On Mother’s Day, there was a queue for about 1 hour to order lunch. In theory, you could order by phone or online, but unless you contact them the day before, no chance of an answer. The reasonably-priced and decent-quality food (except the fish head which is superb)n make it worth it. Distancing is not fantastic, let’s hope this doesn’t become a new cluster.

Name: Samy's Curry
Location: 25 Dempsey Road Singapore Civil Service Sports Club, Singapore 249670 Singapore
Review: This family restaurant has been in business since 1950, and at this Dempsey location since the 80’s. To its fans’ delight, it has recently been allowed to stay on, although many tenants in Blocks 15&16 have been invited out for redevelopment of the Tanglin Village area. Samy’s is a bit of a cult, with loyal customers, many of whom first came here as kids. The clientèle is largely Asian, and mainly local at that. The fish head curry is awesome. Other dishes are not the best Indian you can have in Singapore, but you come here mainly for the experience, and the fish head! To really savour the curry, eat with your fingers. Extraordinarily efficient service from friendly roaming wait staff, who can happily refill your needs in rice, pappadum, or vegs. The dishes, including the fish head curry, are served within ONE or TWO minutes after ordering! Prices are very reasonable. Don’t overindulge though - one look at the well-fed managers would tell you why you shouldn’t!

Name: Samy's Curry
Location: 25 Dempsey Road Singapore Civil Service Sports Club, Singapore 249670 Singapore
Review: My friend is a local, and he loves this place. So, it's a regular stop on my visits to S'pore. Authentic Indian food - inexpensive and healthy portions.

Name: Samy's Curry
Location: 25 Dempsey Road Singapore Civil Service Sports Club, Singapore 249670 Singapore
Review: Their masala chicken is a must, the masala is very rich & aromatic.  If can try their fish roe, claypot fish head curry & fish cutlets.  It's very tasty, yuymmy!!

Name: Samy's Curry
Location: 25 Dempsey Road Singapore Civil Service Sports Club, Singapore 249670 Singapore
Review: This place seems to do a few things right as it is here for 50y or

Name: Samy's Curry
Location: 25 Dempsey Road Singapore Civil Service Sports Club, Singapore 249670 Singapore
Review:
cheap and good... surprisingly! for the location.
food arrived very quickly even when we ordered at 9pm.

Name: Samy's Curry
Location: 25 Dempsey Road Singapore Civil Service Sports Club, Singapore 249670 Singapore
Review: If you love indian food, this is a place to go. Very good seafood, calm setup in a much nicer place than going to Little India.

Name: Samy's Curry
Location: 25 Dempsey Road Singapore Civil Service Sports Club, Singapore 249670 Singapore
Review:
We went with a family of 8 for dinner.
Great food, especially masala chicken and fish head curry.
Great and friendly staff

Name: Samy's Curry
Location: 25 Dempsey Road Singapore Civil Service Sports Club, Singapore 249670 Singapore
Review: On Friday 30th November 2018 – The OCC visited Samy’s Curry, Dempsey R

Name: Samy's Curry
Location: 25 Dempsey Road Singapore Civil Service Sports Club, Singapore 249670 Singapore
Review: Samy’s is an institution and we pay homage to it when we crave for a bout of good ‘ol fish head curry. And what’s not to love when you eat it off a banana leaf surrounded by thick forestry in Dempsey. This is truly a unique Singapore experience.... must try.

Name: Samy's Curry
Location: 25 Dempsey Road Singapore Civil Service Sports Club, Singapore 249670 Singapore
Review:
Went here with local colleagues for lunch.
Food is served on a large banana leaf and excellent choice of different dishes.
It was pretty busy, as it was a public holiday, but service was quick and friendly.

Name: Samy's Curry
Location: 25 Dempsey Road Singapore Civil Service Sports Club, Singapore 249670 Singapore
Review: We came looking for fish head curry and were not disappointed. It's a bit spicy but the beer is cold and the naan is fresh and hot.

Name: Samy's Curry
Location: 25 Dempsey Road Singapore Civil Service Sports Club, Singapore 249670 Singapore
Review: Sat outside with fans and had a delicious meal with friends. Choose your dishes and they are then served quickly directly onto a banana leaf! R

Name: Samy's Curry
Location: 25 Dempsey Road Singapore Civil Service Sports Club, Singapore 249670 Singapore
Review: I came here many years ago and found the food to be averag

Name: Samy's Curry
Location: 25 Dempsey Road Singapore Civil Service Sports Club, Singapore 249670 Singapore
Review: Went to Samy’s with APAC colleagues who are in Singapore for a summit. Food were good, ambiance is OK. No AC, just ceiling fans. Though it seems like it is intentional to keep a local vibe. best time to go during dinner. It might be a challenge during lunchtime where the temperature is warm and humid. Dahl and Mango Lazi is my favorite.

Name: Samy's Curry
Location: 25 Dempsey Road Singapore Civil Service Sports Club, Singapore 249670 Singapore
Review: We experienced a very pleasant evening with friends at Samy's. We were seated outside for dinner on a Friday and attended to by several staff. Each one knew the menu very well and had thoughtful suggestions. We had the fish head curry (tender flavourful fish), curry mutton, masala chicken (nicely spiced), sambal prawn (large and tasty) and the usual pappadam, nan, and beer. We were allowed to bring a bottle of wine at a nominal charge. We ate everything they brought - it was all nicely spiced and delicious. The service was attentive and fast. Samy's is family owned and operating for over 50 years. Samy's offers a great experience and a flavour of old Singapore (and India!).

Name: Samy's Curry
Location: 25 Dempsey Road Singapore Civil Service Sports Club, Singapore 249670 Singapore
Review: One of my favorite curry restaurants in Singapore. The food is served on banana leaf and is always fresh and delicious. Have never eaten anything that wasn’t delicious. Located of Dempsey road in a complex that has revitalized the old barracks from years past. Lots of Shoppe, restaurants and antiques there now. If you love curry...a must.

Name: Samy's Curry
Location: 25 Dempsey Road Singapore Civil Service Sports Club, Singapore 249670 Singapore
Review: I've was a regular at Samy's when I lived in Singapore in the 90's. But I still go there whenever I get an excuse to fly to S

Name: Samy's Curry
Location: 25 Dempsey Road Singapore Civil Service Sports Club, Singapore 249670 Singapore
Review: What I loved was friendly service, good choice of well-cooled beers and being able to sit outside. The quintessential banana leaf option gives you unlimited plain or basmati/pilau rice plus soupy curry toppings any time you want. Add to that the star dish of fish head curry, spicy and meaty and we would have been happy if we’d stopped the

Name: Samy's Curry
Location: 25 Dempsey Road Singapore Civil Service Sports Club, Singapore 249670 Singapore
Review: Fish head curry is a must. Everything we ordered without exception was simply delicious. Perfect balance and use of spice. Air-conditioned.

Name: Samy's Curry
Location: 25 Dempsey Road Singapore Civil Service Sports Club, Singapore 249670 Singapore
Review: I have visited Samy’s on family birthdays and anniversaries, the taste and food has never changed a bit since the father who started Samy’s years back. It’s now run by his family and the staff are very polite, knowledgeable in recommending dishes. Diners are of a cosmopolitan group. I have tasted most of the dishes and they maintain the same standards over the years.

Name: Samy's Curry
Location: 25 Dempsey Road Singapore Civil Service Sports Club, Singapore 249670 Singapore
Review: When in Singapore we loved the food and atmosphere from Samy's. Note to try and sit outside, you feel like you are at 2 different places so outside is much better

Name: Samy's Curry
Location: 25 Dempsey Road Singapore Civil Service Sports Club, Singapore 249670 Singapore
Review: Authentic banana leaf Indian restaurant. Nice curry fish head. Quite and nice location. Amber parking space.

Name: Samy's Curry
Location: 25 Dempsey Road Singapore Civil Service Sports Club, Singapore 249670 Singapore
Review: Samy's serves very good curries in the traditional manner, right from the bucket onto the banana leaf. The fishhead curry is excellent and their most famous dish. The place is relaxed, mostly open air although there is an air conditioned room in the back. Get one of the tables on the front porch overlooking gardens.

Name: Samy's Curry
Location: 25 Dempsey Road Singapore Civil Service Sports Club, Singapore 249670 Singapore
Review: Large set-up, both indoor and outdoor seating, a air conditioned section too. Very casual for friends and families to grab a decent tamil style south indian foo

Name: Samy's Curry
Location: 25 Dempsey Road Singapore Civil Service Sports Club, Singapore 249670 Singapore
Review: There's no aircon, but feels like the old days in Singapore. Indian food on a banana leaf and they have cutlery if u prefer. Favorite masala chicken n cauliflower.

Name: Samy's Curry
Location: 25 Dempsey Road Singapore Civil Service Sports Club, Singapore 249670 Singapore
Review: Samy's Curry curry has the Best Fish Head Curry in Singapore no denying about th

Name: Samy's Curry
Location: 25 Dempsey Road Singapore Civil Service Sports Club, Singapore 249670 Singapore
Review: We were taken here by friends who live in Singapore & love Indian food. Samys was great & our food was served on a giant banana leaf (no plates!). The food was great & plentiful and good service too.

Name: Samy's Curry
Location: 25 Dempsey Road Singapore Civil Service Sports Club, Singapore 249670 Singapore
Review:
Delicious fish head curry, chicken tikka, briyani, naan of various flavours, vegetable accompaniments , just to name a few.
Served on banana leaves.
Large selection from drink menu. Service is good .

Name: Samy's Curry
Location: 25 Dempsey Road Singapore Civil Service Sports Club, Singapore 249670 Singapore
Review: A trip to Singapore is not complete without a meal at Samy's. Authentic and delicious as always. Everything is worth ordering and the lime juice helps cool things down.

Name: Samy's Curry
Location: 25 Dempsey Road Singapore Civil Service Sports Club, Singapore 249670 Singapore
