Review: The High Tea has a wide variety of desserts so if you're a sweet-tooth lover, this is the right place for you. They also have many other food and appetisers which were decent. The service here was really good. Overall it's a very nice experience to have high tea with a cosy and elegant ambience. Thumb up special to Chef Ganesan Ashok who went the extra mile to prepare vegetarian serving for a friend of ours. Thank you so much chef.

Name: The Rose Veranda
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road, Shangri-La Hotel Mezzanine Level, Tower Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: Second time here and it is still my favourite f&b outlet in the hotel! Special shoutout to Chef Ganesan Ashok for the hospitality and sincerity from the heart. Joyce did a great job with recommending the popular teas too.

Name: The Rose Veranda
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road, Shangri-La Hotel Mezzanine Level, Tower Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: Visited Rose Veranda a few days ago and I am very impressed and delighted by my experience here. The laksa was very unique as it is a DIY station and desserts were amazing and have a wide variety as well. The warm scones were very delicious with the strawberry jam and cream. The service staff were very very very attentive and friendly especially Joyce, Elizabeth and Richelle, would like to thank them for their excellent service. I would like to thank Richelle specially for her tea recommendation as there were so many varieties of tea on the tea menu, I have personally heard from her that she is having an internship, would like to wish her all the best to her future endeavours. Would prefer more rose flavoured types of tea next time :) Keep up the amazing job, you live up to the Shangri-La name. So delighted to get a 15% credit card promotion as well :)

Name: The Rose Veranda
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road, Shangri-La Hotel Mezzanine Level, Tower Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: Came here for high tea buffet with my two friends. We were all very satisfied with the food the service. Especially staff , Elizabeth and Joyce. We ask for candle for birthday celebration. Then surprised us with a piece of cake with candle. Appreciate for the arrangement. And it’s a whole day dining timing. Can even enjoy talks with friends. Highly recommended.

Name: The Rose Veranda
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road, Shangri-La Hotel Mezzanine Level, Tower Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: We've been going to Rose Veranda for almost a decade, and the restaurant has always been consistently excellent for an afternoon tea with family, or to celebrate an occasion. My son is not a picky eater but he does love variety. Our latest visit was a touch off the lofty standards we usually expect from the Rose Veranda. Some of the dishes were overcooked, or took some time to be replenished. The service was extremely attentive, and there wasn't a single complaint to be had regarding the staff. There were some dishes which had some seasoning issues, like it was over-salty (the Cajun Chicken - and yet very tough), or bland (funnily enough the Laksa was a bit diluted compared to previously). The desserts were really excellent, BUT, the ice creams were a bit over soft.I know I am really commenting on very marginal issues, because seriously, there is no better place to do afternoon tea in Singapore, but it's really because I love the Rose Veranda so much, and have had so much better from you, that I really want you to do better! Please keep up the amazing job, and I look forward to coming back again very soon.

Name: The Rose Veranda
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road, Shangri-La Hotel Mezzanine Level, Tower Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: I created this account just so I could leave a review he

Name: The Rose Veranda
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road, Shangri-La Hotel Mezzanine Level, Tower Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: The high tea was without faul

Name: The Rose Veranda
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road, Shangri-La Hotel Mezzanine Level, Tower Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: I have been to the Rose Veranda on many occasions and have always been thoroughly satisfied with my experience. However, on this occasion, I noticed a marked difference in the quality and variety of the food on offer. The food trays were not replenished often enough, there was not as much of a selection of desserts and the crème brulee was way undercooked and runny. The most disappointing thing was that there were no scones on offer. You had to ask for them to be specially cooked for you. What is a High Tea without scones, cream and jam?! There always used to be scones and lots more delicious desserts. By 4.30 the chocolate fountain had been switched off and the whole dessert area looked decidedly sad! I won't be going back. :(

Name: The Rose Veranda
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road, Shangri-La Hotel Mezzanine Level, Tower Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: It’s been a wonderful high tea experience in this restaurant,especially the service and greeting of Joyce and Elizabeth,good environment , nice service and delicious food!

Name: The Rose Veranda
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road, Shangri-La Hotel Mezzanine Level, Tower Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: One of the nicest place for a casual family lunch. The ambience of the Rose Veranda lives up to its reputation; the staff (mostly ladies) are well groomed and service oriented. The selection of teas are comprehensive and the food selection was well planned for. The laksa was competent and the Crêpes was much appreciated by my daughter. Perhaps the best moments was the service rendered by the staff, Chef Azar (not sure of the spelling) served a new (hot) bowl of Pulut Hitam when he heard that it was served cold at the buffet line - that’s initiative! And the service rendered by the young man Zi Jian and Shelly together with the service team certainly made our lunch at The Rose Veranda a memorable one for my family. We will come back!

Name: The Rose Veranda
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road, Shangri-La Hotel Mezzanine Level, Tower Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: Afternoon tea is delicious and the scenery is beautiful. The waiter was very careful, thank you Joyce for knowing that I had a cold and arranged to sit in a warm place. Thank you Elizabeth, for giving me a cup of warm water. Everyone is very friendly.

Name: The Rose Veranda
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road, Shangri-La Hotel Mezzanine Level, Tower Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: The afternoon tea are delicious and exquisite, and the delicate and intimate service of Joyce makes the whole meal experience very enjoyable.Next time I come to Singapore, I hope Joyce can serve me.

Name: The Rose Veranda
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road, Shangri-La Hotel Mezzanine Level, Tower Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: It is always a pleasure to dine here at the Rose Veranda. Today, Chef Ashok makes our dining experience to another level of palate enjoyment. The prime beef accompanied with Blue salt is so yummy!!! Chef Ashok is full of passion in sharing with us the way to enjoy the slice of beef and a great host in interacting with us! Thank you Chef Ashok for your hospitality!

Name: The Rose Veranda
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road, Shangri-La Hotel Mezzanine Level, Tower Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: Huge selection of both savoury and sweet treats. Laksa, savouries, roast & veges, sushi & sashimi, salad, cheese bar, make your own ice cream sundae, mini macaroons, gelato and many other treats. Plenty of gluten free choices for the celiac in our group. I missed having a 3 tier service, but you can choose to do that downstairs. The rose tea set is gorgeous. One of my favourite high teas!

Name: The Rose Veranda
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road, Shangri-La Hotel Mezzanine Level, Tower Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: Revisit with much anticipation but ended with much disappointment. Rose veranda hi-tea is our favourite but the recent visit on 22 July was a great disappointment especially the dessert selection. Almost 50% of the selection are local kueh instead of the usual. We understand the need for change in varieties but not to the extend of way beyond the no

Name: The Rose Veranda
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road, Shangri-La Hotel Mezzanine Level, Tower Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: We visited years back but had little memory of it. What a way to jolt our memories! From start to finish, service was warm and impeccable. They made an effort and that's what counts. We had a choice view of the pool area, lots of natural ligh

Name: The Rose Veranda
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road, Shangri-La Hotel Mezzanine Level, Tower Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: Rose Veranda is a lovely place to have a afternoon tea time with friends! This place is a long time buffet on weekday. We are really enjoy! And the service is very nice. Thank you staff Allie and Joyce take good care of us. We will definitely come ba

Name: The Rose Veranda
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road, Shangri-La Hotel Mezzanine Level, Tower Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: Had memorable experience with Rose Veranda. The staffs especially Allie, Lina and Arianne is the best!

Name: The Rose Veranda
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road, Shangri-La Hotel Mezzanine Level, Tower Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review:
The service is impeccable.
Special thanks to the service manager Arienne who arranged for a small beautiful birthday cake for my sister.
Nothing to too much trouble for the staff.
Food are replenished quickly .
Good experience

Name: The Rose Veranda
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road, Shangri-La Hotel Mezzanine Level, Tower Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: Very good place, tea is fantastic, staff Shelly,joyce,Allie,arianne good service ,recommendation after lunch “rose veranda “ is a best choice.

Name: The Rose Veranda
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road, Shangri-La Hotel Mezzanine Level, Tower Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: Thank you to the staff Shelley, Lina and Joyce for such a lovey tea. The food is quite excellent and I certainly will come back.

Name: The Rose Veranda
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road, Shangri-La Hotel Mezzanine Level, Tower Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: Thanks for the good services provided by Shelley & Lina on our visit :) We always feel welcome whenever we eat here and they are always very helpful and quick with their service! It is also a great and cosy atmosphere here.

Name: The Rose Veranda
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road, Shangri-La Hotel Mezzanine Level, Tower Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: I read and compared reviews of hotels in Singapore for afternoon tea and decided on Rose Veranda becau

Name: The Rose Veranda
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road, Shangri-La Hotel Mezzanine Level, Tower Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: The afternoon tea was nice but really nothing special. I arrived very early - was maybe the first person to be there - so I sat on table but was asked to leave by a unfriendly waiter as the table was apparently the favourite place of b someone else - there were no reservation sign to be seen. I asked if the placed was reserved but it wasn't. The food was nice, however the buffet was rather small. The view was towards the pool was ok, Overall, it was nothing special . I don't know why this lace is so famous. Fullerton Hotels have several high tea options that i think are more attractive. Given the fact that waiters were not were friendly I don't think I would go back here.

Name: The Rose Veranda
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road, Shangri-La Hotel Mezzanine Level, Tower Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: Decided to come here to celebrate Father's day. Food are great, the Angus beef tomahawk is my favourite and not to forget the wonderful laksa too! It has a nice environment. Services were faultless, thanks to Allie and Shelley as they were so helpful. Would be coming back here for sure.

Name: The Rose Veranda
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road, Shangri-La Hotel Mezzanine Level, Tower Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: Food is wonderful as it has always been. Had lots of Angus beef, Halibut and salmon sashim

Name: The Rose Veranda
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road, Shangri-La Hotel Mezzanine Level, Tower Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: Have been wanting to come back to RV ever since my previous visit in 201

Name: The Rose Veranda
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road, Shangri-La Hotel Mezzanine Level, Tower Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: Food are great with huge variety to choose from with a nice environment. Belinda, Arianne and Shelley have been amazing with their services. They never fail to greet you with smiles.

Name: The Rose Veranda
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road, Shangri-La Hotel Mezzanine Level, Tower Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: I thought High Tea would have focused on tea, coffee and cakes and desserts. However this was more like a mini buffet lunch. In respect to the tea, there was a good range of teas however these were just tea bags and not made with tea leaves. In regard to the coffee this was a non event. I ordered a latte and received coffee from a machine like the office coffee machine or those in the airline lounges, not very nice at all. For a hotel as reputable at Shangri La, I would have thought that a latte would have come in a latte glass and be barista made coffee, especially as this was a high tea meal. There were no scones and only a fairly small dessert bar. The only good thing about our visit here was the great customer service we received from Arianne who ensured I got a proper latte and provided good overall customer service. Also be aware there are two types of high tea, apparently one with tea and cake which is around $35 and the high tea lunch which is around $60. We booked for the cheaper one online but were just seated and told to help ourselves so were not aware that two options existed, we were then charged for the more expensive option. I did not see anyone in the room having the tea and cake option which we later learned is served using the traditional 3 tier cake stand. I have little good to say about my experience at this venue and I feel was below standard of what would be expected from a Shangri La.

Name: The Rose Veranda
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road, Shangri-La Hotel Mezzanine Level, Tower Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: The dessert selection was more delightful than the mains. There is a tiny selection each of dim sum, salad, western, japanese (sashimi), bread,soup and stations for making your own laksa and hot chocolate. Nothing particularly memorable.  Service was prompt and friendly.

Name: The Rose Veranda
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road, Shangri-La Hotel Mezzanine Level, Tower Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: No scones. What a pity! Good selection of teas available. Faultless service. Unfortunately, the food was very very average. Nothing special at all.

Name: The Rose Veranda
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road, Shangri-La Hotel Mezzanine Level, Tower Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: I find that the buffet spread is not as nice compared to last year. However, the service is still very good. You feel welcome and gave a friendly smile.

Name: The Rose Veranda
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road, Shangri-La Hotel Mezzanine Level, Tower Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: Brought my mum for a high tea, time away from all the monsters (grandchildren). Absolutely love the ambience and food here. Special shout out to Belinda, Arianne and Shirley! Thanks for being so attentive. Clearing used plates and making sure we enjoyed the food.

Name: The Rose Veranda
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road, Shangri-La Hotel Mezzanine Level, Tower Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: Great ambience, food selection can improve for with more variety. The last time I went, the food is quite similar. But overall food quality is quite reasonable.

Name: The Rose Veranda
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road, Shangri-La Hotel Mezzanine Level, Tower Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: Very nice lunch or afternoon tea. Not wide variety of food but certainly high standard. Sashimi, Roast beef, sandwiches, laksa, desserts... excellent. Seating is comfortable and nicely decorated.

Name: The Rose Veranda
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road, Shangri-La Hotel Mezzanine Level, Tower Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: Service, food and atmosphere everthing is perfect. All of staffs are very kind and attentive. We really enjoyed our time at Rose Veranda. Thank you Mei, Joys, Sofia and Bell !

Name: The Rose Veranda
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road, Shangri-La Hotel Mezzanine Level, Tower Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: 6 star service from staff joyce, mei, sofia and manager Ms belinda. Really enjoyed dining at rose veranda with my friend. Thank you for your team!! (:

Name: The Rose Veranda
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road, Shangri-La Hotel Mezzanine Level, Tower Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: Service is excellent as always. Celebrated our anniversary here and received a cake and card with a polaroid of us.

Name: The Rose Veranda
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road, Shangri-La Hotel Mezzanine Level, Tower Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: Excellent high tea (lunch). A delicious wide range of exquisite dishes and desserts. Very attentive staff and very good service. I highly recommend a visit or two.

Name: The Rose Veranda
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road, Shangri-La Hotel Mezzanine Level, Tower Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: Thank you for making our wedding anniversary so special. The food was delicate and amazing. And the service was impeccable. Thank you!

Name: The Rose Veranda
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road, Shangri-La Hotel Mezzanine Level, Tower Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: There was a good spread of high tea buffet. Service was good and personal. As I was there to celebrate my bday, I was presented a birthday cake by the restaurant which is a pleasant surprise.

Name: The Rose Veranda
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road, Shangri-La Hotel Mezzanine Level, Tower Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: Went to so many Highteas & we’ve concluded that Rose Veranda is the Best! Wide spread for both Savory & Sweet items. Their signature dish Laksa (Slight spicy dish. White noodles soaking in coconut milk gravy & seafood) is a must try. My friends have gone for 2-4 helpings! Value for money too. Some credit cards offer 15% discount. When you asked for your bill, service staffs are nice to inform you on the credit card promotion. Really enjoyed our catch up session for a pack of 11 of us. Service staffs have been very helpful with our request too. Complimentary parking coupons provided.We’ll definitively return.

Name: The Rose Veranda
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road, Shangri-La Hotel Mezzanine Level, Tower Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: Food was a hit and miss. Nothing exceptional. What was most disappointing was when a senior chef told his Junior off, in front of the buffet line, with vulgarities, for not replenishing the food. That's not the experience one should get in a 5 star hotel and a Singapore institutio

Name: The Rose Veranda
Location: 22 Orange Grove Road, Shangri-La Hotel Mezzanine Level, Tower Wing, Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore 258350 Singapore
Review: Celebrated my good friend birthday at our favourite Hi-Tea place. The dessert spread make us forget about calories . Impeccable service from all the staff and my special request was delivered.Thank you all for making the birthday celebration a memorable one for us.
